
-----title
西安（长安） (出生地)
-----detail

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=773&endYear=773')">773年</a>　出生长安，父为长安主簿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=774&endYear=775')">774-775年</a>　居长安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=776&endYear=776')">776年</a>　居长安，母教以古赋十四首，皆讽传之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=777&endYear=782')">777-782年</a>　居长安。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='6b89a98231ef4459a21fa192e26c071d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6b89a98231ef4459a21fa192e26c071d");'><span id='6b89a98231ef4459a21fa192e26c071d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=788&endYear=793')">788-793年</a>，16-21岁</div><div id='6b89a98231ef4459a21fa192e26c071d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=788&endYear=788')">788年</a>　父柳镇入朝为殿中侍御史，宗元随父至长安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=789&endYear=789')">789年</a>　求进士未第。自后，连年在京应进士举。父柳镇贬夔州司马。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=790&endYear=790')">790年</a>　应进士落第。左补阙权德舆以奖掖才士著称，与宗元为故旧，故献启希求奖掖，以驰声成名。作品：《上权德舆补阙温卷决进退启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第909页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371001' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371001' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371001?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上权德舆补阙温卷决进退启</a><span class='authorDate'>（790年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371001")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371001_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371001'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371001'>补阙执事。宗元闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371001_comment'></div>重远轻迩。贱视贵听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371001_comment'></div>所由古矣。窃以宗元幼不知耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371001_comment'></div>少又躁进。拜揖长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371001_comment'></div>自于幼年。是以簉俊造之末迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371001_comment'></div>厕牒计之下列。贾艺求售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371001_comment'></div>阒无善价。载文笔而都儒林者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371001_comment'></div>匪亲乃旧。率皆携抚相示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371001_comment'></div>谈笑见眤。喔咿逡巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371001_comment'></div>为达者嗤。无乃睹其朴者鄙其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371001_comment'></div>狎其幼者薄其长耶。将行不拔异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371001_comment'></div>操不砥砺。学不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371001", 1371001, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>该广</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371001_comment'></div>文不炳耀。实可鄙而薄耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371001_comment'></div>今鸳鹭充朝。而独干执事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371001_comment'></div>特以顾下念旧。收接儒素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371001_comment'></div>异乎他人耳。敢问厥由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371001_comment'></div>庶几告之。俾识去就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371001_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。今将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371001", 1371001, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>慷慨激昂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371001_comment'></div>奋攘布衣。纵谈作者之筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371001_comment'></div>曳裾名卿之门。抵掌峨弁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371001_comment'></div>厚自润泽。进越无恧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371001_comment'></div>污达者之视听。狂狷愚妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371001_comment'></div>固不可为也。复欲俛默惕息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371001_comment'></div>謺足蹋翼。拜祈公侯之阍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371001_comment'></div>跪邀贤达之车。竦魂慄股。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371001_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371001", 1371001, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>兢恪</span>危惧。荣者倦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371001_comment'></div>弥忿厥心。又不可为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371001_comment'></div>若慎守其常。确执厥中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371001_comment'></div>固其所矣。则又色平气柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371001_comment'></div>言讷性鲁。无特达之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371001_comment'></div>无推择之行。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371001", 1371001, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>琐琐碌碌</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371001_comment'></div>一孺子耳。孰谓其可进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371001_comment'></div>孰谓其可退。抑又闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371001_comment'></div>不鼓踊无以超泥涂。不曲促无以由险艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371001_comment'></div>不守常无以处明分。不执中无以趋夷轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371001_comment'></div>今则鼓踊乎。曲促乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371001_comment'></div>守其常而执厥中乎。浩不知其宜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371001_comment'></div>进退无倚。宵不遑寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371001_comment'></div>乃访于故人而咨度之。其人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371001_comment'></div>补阙权君。著名踰纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371001_comment'></div>行为人高。言为人信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371001_comment'></div>力学掞文。朋侪称雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371001_comment'></div>子亟拜之。足以发扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371001_comment'></div>对曰。衷燕石而履元圃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371001_comment'></div>带鱼目而游涨海。祗取诮耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371001_comment'></div>曷予补乎。其人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371001_comment'></div>迹之勤者。情必生焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371001_comment'></div>心之恭者。礼必报焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371001_comment'></div>况子之文。不甚鄙薄者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371001_comment'></div>苟或勤以奉之。恭以下之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371001_comment'></div>则必勖励尔行。辉耀尔能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371001_comment'></div>言为建瓴。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371001", 1371001, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>晨发</span>夕被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371001_comment'></div>声驰而响溢。风振而草靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371001_comment'></div>可使尺泽之鲵。奋鳞而纵海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371001_comment'></div>密网之鸟。举羽而翔霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371001_comment'></div>子之一名。何足就矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371001_comment'></div>庶为终身之遇乎。曷不举驰声之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371001_comment'></div>挈成名之基。授之权君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371001_comment'></div>然后退行守常执中之道。斯可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371001_comment'></div>愚不敏。以为信然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371001_comment'></div>是以有前日之拜。又以为色取象恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371001_comment'></div>大贤所饫。朝造夕谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371001_comment'></div>大贤所倦。性颇疏野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371001_comment'></div>窃又不能。是以有今兹之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371001_comment'></div>仰惟览其鄙心而去就之。洁诚斋虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371001_comment'></div>不胜至愿。谨再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371001_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_66_1371001_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=790&endYear=790')">790年</a>　应省试，作应试诗。作品：《省试观庆云图诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷43第1262页，中华书局1979年版。《省试观庆云图诗》为宗元现存最早诗作。）</span><div id='poem_40619' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_40619' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/40619?labeling=true' target='_blank'>省试观庆云图诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（790年）</span><span class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_40619_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_40619'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_40619'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_40619", 40619, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>设色</span>既<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作初，一作方）</span>成象，卿云示国都。<div id='poem_sentence_0_40619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_40619'>九天开秘祉，百辟赞嘉谟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_40619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_40619'>抱日依龙衮，非烟近<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_40619", 40619, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>御炉</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_40619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_40619'>高标连汗漫，迥<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作回）</span>望接虚无。<div id='poem_sentence_3_40619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_40619'>裂素荣光发，舒华瑞色敷。<div id='poem_sentence_4_40619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_40619'>恒将配尧德，垂庆代河图。<div id='poem_sentence_5_40619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_40619'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_40619_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=791&endYear=791')">791年</a>　居长安应举。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=792&endYear=792')">792年</a>　居长安应举。父柳镇还为侍御史。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年2月</a>　登进士第，知贡举者礼部侍郎顾少连。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年5月17日</a>　居长安，父柳镇卒，时年五十七。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年9月</a>　居长安，葬父于万年县栖凤原。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　居长安。苑论登第后归觐，作序送之。作品：《送苑论登第后归觐诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷22第599页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371039' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371039' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371039?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送苑论登第后归觐诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（793年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371039")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371039_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371039'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371039'>八年冬。予与马邑苑言扬联贡于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371039_comment'></div>自时而后。车必挂轊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371039_comment'></div>席必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371039", 1371039, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>交衽</span>。量其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371039_comment'></div>知其达于昭代。究其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371039_comment'></div>辨其胜于太常。探而讨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371039_comment'></div>则明韬于朴厚之质。行浮于休显之闻<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作问）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371039_comment'></div>游公卿之间。质直而不犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371039_comment'></div>恪谨而不慑。交同列之群以诚信闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371039_comment'></div>予拜而兄之。以为执谊而固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371039_comment'></div>临节不夺。在兄而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371039_comment'></div>是岁小司徒顾公守春官之缺。而权择士之柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371039_comment'></div>明年春。同趋权衡之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371039_comment'></div>并就重轻之试。观其掉鞅于术艺之场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371039_comment'></div>游刃乎文翰之林。风雨生于笔札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371039_comment'></div>云霞发于简牍。左右圜视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371039_comment'></div>朋侪拱手。甚可壮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371039_comment'></div>二月丙子。有司题甲乙之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371039_comment'></div>揭于南宫。予与兄又联登焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371039_comment'></div>予不厚颜怀愧而陪其游久矣。夏四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371039_comment'></div>告归荆衡。拜手行迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371039_comment'></div>轮移都门之辙。辕指秦岭之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371039_comment'></div>方将高堂称庆。里闬更贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371039_comment'></div>曳裾峨冠。荣南诸侯之邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371039_comment'></div>遐登王粲之楼。高视刘表之榻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371039_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371039", 1371039, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>桂枝片玉</span>。光生于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371039_comment'></div>是宜砥商雒之阻艰。带江汉之浩荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371039_comment'></div>以谈笑顾盼。超越千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371039_comment'></div>而无倦极也。然而景炽气燠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371039_comment'></div>往即南方。乘陵炎云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371039_comment'></div>呼吸温风。可无敬乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371039_comment'></div>慎进药石。保安其躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371039_comment'></div>是亦非兄之所宜私也。群公追饯于霸陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371039_comment'></div>列筵而觞。送远之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371039_comment'></div>圭璋交映。或授首简于予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371039_comment'></div>子得非知言扬者乎。安得而默耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371039_comment'></div>予受而书之。编于群玉之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371039_comment'></div>非不知让。贵传信焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371039_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1371039_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='ed6f3b0b36324df3bead8776c13d1df9_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=801')">796-801年</a>，24-29岁</div><div id='ed6f3b0b36324df3bead8776c13d1df9' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　正月，叔父卒，宗元自邠州持丧归京，葬，撰墓版文。作品：《故叔父殿中侍御史府君墓版文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷12第316页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371263' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371263' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371263?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故叔父殿中侍御史府君墓版文</a><span class='authorDate'>（796年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371263")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371263_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371263'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371263'>柳氏之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371263_comment'></div>自黄帝及周鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371263_comment'></div>其著者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371263_comment'></div>无骇以字为展氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371263_comment'></div>禽以食采为柳姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371263_comment'></div>厥后昌大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371263_comment'></div>世家河东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371263_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371263_comment'></div>公讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371263_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371263_comment'></div>曾王父朝请大夫徐州长史讳子夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371263_comment'></div>遗贞白之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371263_comment'></div>表仪宗门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371263_comment'></div>王父朝请大夫沧洲清池令讳从裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371263_comment'></div>垂博裕之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371263_comment'></div>启佑后允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371263_comment'></div>皇考湖州德清令讳察躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371263_comment'></div>宏孝悌之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371263_comment'></div>振扬家声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371263_comment'></div>惟公端庄无谄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371263_comment'></div>徽柔有裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371263_comment'></div>峻而能容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371263_comment'></div>介而能群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371263_comment'></div>其在闺门也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371263_comment'></div>动合太和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371263_comment'></div>皆由顺正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371263_comment'></div>恺悌雍睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371263_comment'></div>莫有间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371263_comment'></div>故宗党歌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371263_comment'></div>其在公门也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371263_comment'></div>释回措枉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371263_comment'></div>造次秉直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371263_comment'></div>事不失当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371263_comment'></div>举无秕政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371263_comment'></div>故官府诵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371263_comment'></div>用冲退径尽之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371263_comment'></div>以宏正友道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371263_comment'></div>信称于外焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371263_comment'></div>用柔和博爱之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371263_comment'></div>以视遇孤弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371263_comment'></div>仁著于内焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371263_comment'></div>此公修己之大经也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371263_comment'></div>自进士登高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371263_comment'></div>调受河南府文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371263_comment'></div>秩满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371263_comment'></div>渭北节度使论惟明辟为从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371263_comment'></div>受太常寺协律郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371263_comment'></div>元戎即世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371263_comment'></div>罢职家食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371263_comment'></div>无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371263_comment'></div>朔方节度使张献甫辟署参谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371263_comment'></div>受大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371263_comment'></div>赐绯鱼袋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371263_comment'></div>改度支判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371263_comment'></div>转大理司直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371263_comment'></div>迁殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371263_comment'></div>加度支营田副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371263_comment'></div>此公从政之大略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371263_comment'></div>既佐戎事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371263_comment'></div>实司中府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371263_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1371263", 1371263, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>匪颁</span>有制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371263_comment'></div>会计明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371263_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371263_comment'></div>分阃委政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371263_comment'></div>繄公而成务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371263_comment'></div>朝右虚位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371263_comment'></div>待公而周事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371263_comment'></div>宗门期公而光大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371263_comment'></div>姻党仰公而振耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371263_comment'></div>贞元十二年岁在丙子正月九日壬寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371263_comment'></div>遇暴疾终于私馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371263_comment'></div>享年五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371263_comment'></div>痛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371263_comment'></div>夫人吴郡陆氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371263_comment'></div>洎仲弟综季弟续冢侄某等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371263_comment'></div>抱孤即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371263_comment'></div>牵率备礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371263_comment'></div>祗奉裳帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371263_comment'></div>归于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371263_comment'></div>以某年二月二十八日庚寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371263_comment'></div>安厝于万年县之少陵原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371263_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371263_comment'></div>公有男一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371263_comment'></div>始六年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371263_comment'></div>在髫知孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371263_comment'></div>呱呱涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371263_comment'></div>凡我宗戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371263_comment'></div>抚视增恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371263_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371263_comment'></div>初公元兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371263_comment'></div>以纯深之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371263_comment'></div>端直之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371263_comment'></div>名闻于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371263_comment'></div>官至侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371263_comment'></div>持斧登朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371263_comment'></div>宪章<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_1371263", 1371263, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>肃清</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371263_comment'></div>尝以先公之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371263_comment'></div>未克迁祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371263_comment'></div>不正席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371263_comment'></div>不甘味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371263_comment'></div>及撰日定期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371263_comment'></div>而昊天不吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371263_comment'></div>志夺礼废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371263_comment'></div>公实敬承遗志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371263_comment'></div>行有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371263_comment'></div>而闵凶荐及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371263_comment'></div>不克终事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371263_comment'></div>则我宗族之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1371263", 1371263, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>痛恨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371263_comment'></div>其有既乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371263_comment'></div>惟公尽敬于孝养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371263_comment'></div>致毁于居忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371263_comment'></div>表正宗姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371263_comment'></div>观示他族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371263_comment'></div>故宗人咸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371263_comment'></div>孝如方舆公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371263_comment'></div>修词以藻德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371263_comment'></div>振文而导志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371263_comment'></div>以为理化之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371263_comment'></div>莫尊乎尧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371263_comment'></div>作尧祠颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371263_comment'></div>以为述德之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371263_comment'></div>不忘于祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371263_comment'></div>作始祖碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371263_comment'></div>以为纪广大之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371263_comment'></div>叙正直之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371263_comment'></div>不嫌于亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371263_comment'></div>作元兄侍御史府君墓志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371263_comment'></div>其馀讽咏比兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371263_comment'></div>皆合于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371263_comment'></div>故宗人咸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371263_comment'></div>文如吴兴守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371263_comment'></div>当官贞固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371263_comment'></div>确乎不拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371263_comment'></div>持议端方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371263_comment'></div>直而不苛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371263_comment'></div>故宗人咸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371263_comment'></div>正如卫太史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371263_comment'></div>率性廉介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371263_comment'></div>怀贞抱洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371263_comment'></div>嗣家风之清白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371263_comment'></div>绍遗训于儒素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371263_comment'></div>故宗人咸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371263_comment'></div>清如鲁士师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371263_comment'></div>兼备四德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371263_comment'></div>具体而微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371263_comment'></div>公之谓矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371263_comment'></div>小子常以无兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371263_comment'></div>移其睦于朋友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371263_comment'></div>少孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371263_comment'></div>移其孝于叔父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371263_comment'></div>天将穷我而夺其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371263_comment'></div>故罔极之痛仍集焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371263_comment'></div>朴鲁甚騃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371263_comment'></div>不能文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371263_comment'></div>敢用书宗人之辞以致其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371263_comment'></div>故质而俚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371263_comment'></div>辍哭纪事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371263_comment'></div>哀不能文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371263_comment'></div>故叙而终焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_158_1371263_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_60_1371263_comment'></div>会计明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371263_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371263_comment'></div>分阃委政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371263_comment'></div>繄公而成务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371263_comment'></div>朝右虚位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371263_comment'></div>待公而周事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371263_comment'></div>宗门期公而光大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371263_comment'></div>姻党仰公而振耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371263_comment'></div>贞元十二年岁在丙子正月九日壬寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371263_comment'></div>遇暴疾终于私馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371263_comment'></div>享年五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371263_comment'></div>痛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371263_comment'></div>夫人吴郡陆氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371263_comment'></div>洎仲弟综季弟续冢侄某等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371263_comment'></div>抱孤即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371263_comment'></div>牵率备礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371263_comment'></div>祗奉裳帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371263_comment'></div>归于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371263_comment'></div>以某年二月二十八日庚寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371263_comment'></div>安厝于万年县之少陵原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371263_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371263_comment'></div>公有男一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371263_comment'></div>始六年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371263_comment'></div>在髫知孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371263_comment'></div>呱呱涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371263_comment'></div>凡我宗戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371263_comment'></div>抚视增恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371263_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371263_comment'></div>初公元兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371263_comment'></div>以纯深之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371263_comment'></div>端直之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371263_comment'></div>名闻于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371263_comment'></div>官至侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371263_comment'></div>持斧登朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371263_comment'></div>宪章<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_1371263", 1371263, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>肃清</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371263_comment'></div>尝以先公之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371263_comment'></div>未克迁祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371263_comment'></div>不正席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371263_comment'></div>不甘味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371263_comment'></div>及撰日定期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371263_comment'></div>而昊天不吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371263_comment'></div>志夺礼废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371263_comment'></div>公实敬承遗志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371263_comment'></div>行有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371263_comment'></div>而闵凶荐及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371263_comment'></div>不克终事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371263_comment'></div>其有既乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371263_comment'></div>惟公尽敬于孝养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371263_comment'></div>致毁于居忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371263_comment'></div>表正宗姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371263_comment'></div>观示他族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371263_comment'></div>故宗人咸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371263_comment'></div>孝如方舆公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371263_comment'></div>修词以藻德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371263_comment'></div>振文而导志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371263_comment'></div>以为理化之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371263_comment'></div>莫尊乎尧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371263_comment'></div>作尧祠颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371263_comment'></div>以为述德之道。<div id='poem_sentence_142_1371263_comment'></div>兼备四德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371263_comment'></div>具体而微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371263_comment'></div>公之谓矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371263_comment'></div>小子常以无兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371263_comment'></div>移其睦于朋友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371263_comment'></div>少孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371263_comment'></div>移其孝于叔父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371263_comment'></div>天将穷我而夺其志。<div id='poem_sentence_152_1371263_comment'></div>不能文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371263_comment'></div>敢用书宗人之辞以致其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371263_comment'></div>故质而俚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371263_comment'></div>辍哭纪事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371263_comment'></div>哀不能文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371263_comment'></div>故叙而终焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_158_1371263_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　居长安，应博学宏词科试作赋，未第。作品：《披沙拣金赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集卷上第1329页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370872' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370872' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370872?labeling=true' target='_blank'>披沙拣金赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（以求宝之道同乎选才为韵）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（796年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370872")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370872_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370872'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370872'>沙之为物兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370872_comment'></div>视污若浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370872_comment'></div>金之为宝兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370872_comment'></div>耻居下流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370872_comment'></div>沈其质兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370872_comment'></div>五材或阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370872_comment'></div>耀其光兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370872_comment'></div>六府以修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370872_comment'></div>然则抱成器之珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370872_comment'></div>必将有待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370872_comment'></div>当慎择之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370872_comment'></div>则又何求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370872_comment'></div>配圭璋而取贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370872_comment'></div>岂泥滓而为俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370872_comment'></div>披而择之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370872_comment'></div>斯焉见宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370872_comment'></div>荡浸淫而顾盼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370872_comment'></div>指炫熀而探讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370872_comment'></div>动而愈出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370872_comment'></div>幽以即明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370872_comment'></div>涅而不缁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370872_comment'></div>既坚既好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370872_comment'></div>潜虽伏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370872_comment'></div>获则取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370872_comment'></div>翻混混之浊质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370872_comment'></div>见熠熠之殊姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370872_comment'></div>久暗未彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370872_comment'></div>固亦将君是望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370872_comment'></div>先迷后得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370872_comment'></div>孰谓弃予如遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370872_comment'></div>其隐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370872_comment'></div>则杂昏昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370872_comment'></div>沦浩浩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370872_comment'></div>晦英姿兮自保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370872_comment'></div>和光同尘兮合于至道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370872_comment'></div>其遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370872_comment'></div>则散奕奕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370872_comment'></div>动融融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370872_comment'></div>焕美质兮其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370872_comment'></div>明道若昧兮契彼元同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370872_comment'></div>傥俯拾而不弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370872_comment'></div>谅致美于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370872_comment'></div>欲盖而彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370872_comment'></div>将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370872", 1370872, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>炯尔</span>而见素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370872_comment'></div>不索何获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370872_comment'></div>遂昭然而发蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370872_comment'></div>观其振拔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370872", 1370872, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>污涂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370872_comment'></div>积以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370872", 1370872, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>锱铢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370872_comment'></div>碎清光而竞出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370872_comment'></div>耀真<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作直）</span>质而持殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370872_comment'></div>锥处囊而纤光乍比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370872_comment'></div>剑拭土而异彩相符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370872_comment'></div>用之则行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370872_comment'></div>斯为美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370872_comment'></div>求而必得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370872_comment'></div>不亦悦乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370872_comment'></div>岂独媚旭日以晶荧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370872_comment'></div>带长川之清浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370872_comment'></div>皎如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370872", 1370872, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>珠吐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370872_comment'></div>疑剖蚌之乍分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370872_comment'></div>粲若星繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370872_comment'></div>似流云之初卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370872_comment'></div>是以周德思比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370872_comment'></div>而岐昌即咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370872_comment'></div>陆文可侔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370872_comment'></div>而昭明是选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370872_comment'></div>若然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370872_comment'></div>可以议披沙之所托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370872_comment'></div>明拣金之所裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370872_comment'></div>良工何远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370872_comment'></div>善价爰来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370872_comment'></div>拂以增光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370872_comment'></div>宁谢满籯之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370872_comment'></div>汰之愈朗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370872_comment'></div>讵惭掷地之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370872_comment'></div>客有希采掇于求宝之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370872_comment'></div>庶斯文之在哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1370872_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　居长安，试博学宏词科下第，献启崔少卿。作品：《上大理崔大卿应制举不敏启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第912页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371002' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371002' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371002?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上大理崔大卿应制举不敏启</a><span class='authorDate'>（796年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371002")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371002_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371002'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371002'>古之知己者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371002_comment'></div>不待来求而后施德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371002_comment'></div>举能而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371002_comment'></div>其受德者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371002_comment'></div>不待成身而后拜赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371002_comment'></div>感知而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371002_comment'></div>故不叩而响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371002_comment'></div>不介而合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371002_comment'></div>则其举必至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371002_comment'></div>而其感亦甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371002_comment'></div>斯道遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371002_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371002", 1371002, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>辽阔</span>千祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371002_comment'></div>何为乎今之世哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371002_comment'></div>若宗元者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371002_comment'></div>智不能经大务断大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371002_comment'></div>非有恢杰之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371002_comment'></div>学不能探奥义穷章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371002_comment'></div>为腐烂之儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371002_comment'></div>虽或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371002", 1371002, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>寘力</span>于文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371002_comment'></div>勤勤恳恳于岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371002_comment'></div>然而未能极圣人之规矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371002_comment'></div>恢作者之闻见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371002_comment'></div>劳费翰墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371002_comment'></div>徒尔拖逢掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371002_comment'></div>曳大带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371002_comment'></div>游于朋齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371002_comment'></div>且有愧色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371002_comment'></div>岂有能乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371002_comment'></div>阁下何相待之厚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371002_comment'></div>始者自谓抱无用之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371002_comment'></div>戴不肖之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371002_comment'></div>虽振身泥尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371002_comment'></div>仰睎云霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371002_comment'></div>何由而能哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371002_comment'></div>遂用收视内顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371002_comment'></div>頫首绝望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371002_comment'></div>甘以没没也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371002_comment'></div>今者果不自意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371002_comment'></div>他日琐琐之著述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371002_comment'></div>幸得流于衽席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371002_comment'></div>接在视听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371002_comment'></div>阁下乃谓可以蹈远大之途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371002_comment'></div>及制作之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371002_comment'></div>决然而不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371002_comment'></div>介然而独得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371002_comment'></div>是何收采之特达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371002_comment'></div>而顾念之勤备乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371002_comment'></div>且阁下知其为人何如哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371002_comment'></div>其貌之美陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371002_comment'></div>质之细大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371002_comment'></div>心之贤不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371002_comment'></div>阁下固未知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371002_comment'></div>而一遇文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371002_comment'></div>志在济拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371002_comment'></div>斯盖古之知巳者已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371002_comment'></div>故曰古之知己者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371002_comment'></div>不待来求而后施德者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371002_comment'></div>然则亟来而求者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371002_comment'></div>诚下科也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371002_comment'></div>宗元向以应博学宏词之举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371002_comment'></div>会阁下辱临考第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371002_comment'></div>司其升降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371002_comment'></div>当此之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371002_comment'></div>意谓运合事并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371002_comment'></div>适丁厥时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371002_comment'></div>其私心日以自负也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371002_comment'></div>无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371002_comment'></div>阁下以鲲鳞之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371002_comment'></div>不容尺泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371002_comment'></div>悠尔而自放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371002_comment'></div>廓然而高迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371002_comment'></div>其不我知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371002_comment'></div>遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1371002", 1371002, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>排逐</span>而委之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371002_comment'></div>委之诚当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371002_comment'></div>使古之知己犹在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371002_comment'></div>岂若是之求多乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371002_comment'></div>夫仕进之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371002_comment'></div>昔者窃闻于师矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371002_comment'></div>太上有专达之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371002_comment'></div>乘时得君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371002_comment'></div>不由乎表著之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371002_comment'></div>而取将相行其政焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371002_comment'></div>其次有文行之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371002_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1371002", 1371002, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>积能</span>累劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371002_comment'></div>不由乎举甲乙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371002_comment'></div>历科第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371002_comment'></div>登乎表著之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371002_comment'></div>显其名焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371002_comment'></div>又其次则曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371002_comment'></div>吾未尝举甲乙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371002_comment'></div>未尝历科第也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371002_comment'></div>彼朝廷之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371002_comment'></div>吾何修而可以登之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371002_comment'></div>必求举是科也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371002_comment'></div>然后得而登之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371002_comment'></div>其下不能知其利。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371002_comment'></div>由是观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371002_comment'></div>有爱锥刀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371002_comment'></div>然而至于感知之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371002_comment'></div>则细大一矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371002_comment'></div>成败亦一矣。<div id='poem_sentence_118_1371002_comment'></div>然则幸成其身者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371002_comment'></div>固末节也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371002_comment'></div>盖不知来求之下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371002_comment'></div>不足以收特达之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371002_comment'></div>伏惟以知己之道终抚荐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371002_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371002_comment'></div>宗元谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_158_1371002_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　居长安，娶弘农杨凭女为妻。凭与宗元父友善，二人婚姻乃父早年所订。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　居长安。夏洎秋不雨，皇帝使祷于终南山，创制祠堂，宗元撰碑记。作品：《终南山祠堂碑并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷5第126页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371201' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371201' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371201?labeling=true' target='_blank'>终南山祠堂碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（796年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371201")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371201_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371201'>贞元十二年。夏洎秋不雨。穑人焦劳。嘉谷用虞。皇帝使中谒者祷于终南。申命京兆尹韩府君。祗饬祀事。考视祠制。以为栋宇不称。宜有加饰。遂命盩厔令裴均。虔承圣谟。创制祠堂。乃徵土工木工石工。备器执用。来会祠下。斩板干。砻柱础。陶瓴甓。筑垣墉。恢度旧制。立三筵六寻。既兴功。元云触石。霈泽周被。植物擢茂。期于丰登。神道感而宣灵。人心欢而致和。嘉气充溢。忭蹈布野。于是邑令僚吏。至于胥徒黄发耆艾野夫版尹。佥曰。盖闻名山之列天下也。其有能奠方域。产财用。兴云雨。考于祭法。宜在祀典。惟终南据天之中。在都之南。西至于褒斜。又西至陇首。以临于戎。东至于商颜。又东至于太华。以距于关。实能作固。以屏王室。其物产之厚。器用之出。则璆琳琅玕。夏书载焉。纪堂条枚。秦风咏焉。今其神又能对于祷祝。化荒为穰。易沴为和。厥功章明。宜受大礼。俾有凭托。而宣其烈也。非我后敬神重谷。则曷能发大号。尊明灵。非我公勤人奉上。则曷能对休命。作新庙。人事既备。神用(一作明)时若。丰我公田。遂及我私。粢盛无虞。储峙用充。厥猷茂哉。遂相与东向蹈舞。拜手稽首。愿颂帝力。且宣神德。永著终古。辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371201_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371201'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371201'>皇帝垂德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371201_comment'></div>化为丰穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371201_comment'></div>实我粢盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371201_comment'></div>人赖蓄给。<div id='poem_sentence_20_1371201_comment'></div>巍巍灵山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371201_comment'></div>兴利产材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371201_comment'></div>作固镐京。<div id='poem_sentence_34_1371201_comment'></div>愿垂表经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371201_comment'></div>颂宣圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371201_comment'></div>篆刻金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371201_comment'></div>永世飞声。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1371201_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年7月</a>　居长安。孟秋大旱，皇帝使祷于太白山，建祠庙，宗元撰碑记。作品：《太白山祠堂碑并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷5第130页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年7月</a>　居长安。孟秋大旱，皇帝使祷于太白山，建祠庙，宗元撰碑阴以志韩皋、裴均二人创祠之功。作品：《太白山祠堂碑碑阴文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷5第131页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371204' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371204' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371204?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太白山祠堂碑<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>碑阴文</a><span class='authorDate'>（796年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371204'>时尹韩府君。讳皋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371204_comment'></div>祗奉制诏。发付邑吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371204_comment'></div>令裴府君。讳均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371204_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371204", 1371204, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>承荷</span>君公之命。督就祠宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371204_comment'></div>莅事谨甚。克媚神意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371204_comment'></div>用获显贶。邑人灵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371204_comment'></div>其事遂闻。诏书嘉异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371204_comment'></div>劳主者甚厚。乃刻兹石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371204_comment'></div>立于西序右阶之下。肆列裴氏之政于碑之阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371204_comment'></div>惟君教行于家。德施于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371204_comment'></div>抚字惠厚柔仁博爱之道。洽于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371204", 1371204, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>鳏嫠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371204_comment'></div>廉毅肃给威断猛制之令。行于强御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371204_comment'></div>狱讼不私于上。罪责不及于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371204_comment'></div>农事课励。厚生克勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371204_comment'></div>徵赋首入。而其人益赡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371204_comment'></div>创立<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371204", 1371204, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>传馆</span>。平易道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371204_comment'></div>改作甚力。而其人弥逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371204_comment'></div>韩府君每用嘉褒。称其理为甸服最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371204_comment'></div>今兹设庙位神。神欢而宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371215_comment'></div>气震奸佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371215_comment'></div>动获其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371215_comment'></div>斯盖得其死者与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371215_comment'></div>公之德之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371215_comment'></div>洽于传闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371215_comment'></div>卒以不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371215_comment'></div>而独申其节。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371040_comment'></div>如九江之拜。盖世俗不能移也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371040_comment'></div>自是战艺三北。左次陋巷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371040_comment'></div>未尝摽出处为二道。判屈伸于异门也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371040_comment'></div>固其本。养其正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371040_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年10月6日</a>　居长安。因曾在邠州省侍其叔时遍游邠宁各地、熟知邠宁进奏院之情，撰文记其人事。作品：《邠宁进奏院记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷26第714页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371092'>凡诸侯述职之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371092_comment'></div>必有栋宇建于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371092_comment'></div>朝觐为修容之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371092_comment'></div>会计为交政之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371092_comment'></div>其在周典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371092_comment'></div>则皆邑以具汤沭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371092_comment'></div>其在汉制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371092_comment'></div>则皆邸以奉朝请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371092_comment'></div>唐兴因之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371092_comment'></div>则皆院以备进奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371092_comment'></div>政以之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371092_comment'></div>礼于是具。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371092_comment'></div>恶凶虏之犹阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371092_comment'></div>博求群臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371092_comment'></div>以朗宁王张公为能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371092_comment'></div>俾其建节剖符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371092_comment'></div>守股肱之郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371092_comment'></div>统爪牙之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371092_comment'></div>董制三军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371092_comment'></div>抚柔万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371092_comment'></div>乃新斯院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371092_comment'></div>宏我旧制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371092_comment'></div>高其闬闳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371092_comment'></div>壮其门闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371092_comment'></div>以奉王制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371092_comment'></div>以修古典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371092_comment'></div>至敬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371092_comment'></div>以尊朝觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371092_comment'></div>以率贡职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371092_comment'></div>至忠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371092_comment'></div>执忠与敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371092_comment'></div>臣道毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371092_comment'></div>公尝鸣佩执玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371092_comment'></div>展礼天朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371092_comment'></div>又尝伐叛获丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371092_comment'></div>献功魏阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371092_comment'></div>其馀归时事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371092_comment'></div>修常职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371092_comment'></div>宾属受辞而来使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371092_comment'></div>旅贲奉章而上谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371092_comment'></div>稽疑于大宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371092_comment'></div>质政于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371092_comment'></div>下及奔走之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371092_comment'></div>传递之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371092_comment'></div>川流<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1371092", 1371092, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>环运</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371092_comment'></div>以达教令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371092_comment'></div>大凡展采于中都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371092_comment'></div>率由是焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371092_comment'></div>故领斯院者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371092_comment'></div>必获历阊阖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371092_comment'></div>登太清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371092_comment'></div>仰万乘之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371092_comment'></div>而通内外之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371092_comment'></div>王宫九关而不间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371092_comment'></div>辕门十舍而如近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371092_comment'></div>斯乃军府之要枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371092_comment'></div>邠宁之能政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371092_comment'></div>惟公端明而厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371092_comment'></div>温裕而肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371092_comment'></div>宏略特出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371092_comment'></div>大志高迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371092_comment'></div>施德下邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371092_comment'></div>而黎人咸怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371092_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1371092", 1371092, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>设险</span>西陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371092_comment'></div>而戎虏伏息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371092_comment'></div>茂功溢于太常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371092_comment'></div>盛烈动于人听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371092_comment'></div>则斯院之设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371092_comment'></div>乃他政之末者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371092_comment'></div>赞公于他政之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371092_comment'></div>故词不周德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371092_comment'></div>称公于天子之都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371092_comment'></div>故礼不称位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371092_comment'></div>斯古道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371092_comment'></div>贞元十二年十月六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371092_comment'></div>河东柳宗元为记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1371092_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　居长安。为堂兄、万年县丞柳元方撰墓志。作品：《万年县丞柳君墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集补遗第1389页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371239' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371239' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371239?labeling=true' target='_blank'>万年县丞柳君墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（796年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371239")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371239_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371239'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371239'>惟贞元十二年龙集景子三月日。前万年县丞柳君终于长安升平里之私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371239_comment'></div>享年五十。长子宏礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371239_comment'></div>承家当位。次曰传礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371239_comment'></div>幼曰好礼。奉夫人洎仲父之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371239_comment'></div>考时定制。动合古道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371239_comment'></div>三日而殡。三月而葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371239_comment'></div>粤五月十九日甲子。克开长安县高阳原祔于先茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371239_comment'></div>礼也。先时撰辰酌礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371239_comment'></div>称义备物。外姻毕至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371239_comment'></div>宗人来会。从弟宗元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371239_comment'></div>受族属之教。泣涕濡翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371239_comment'></div>书辞纪行曰。君讳元方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371239_comment'></div>字某。解人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371239_comment'></div>系自周鲁。后得柳姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371239_comment'></div>七代祖虬。后魏中书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371239_comment'></div>封美阳公。四叶至皇考惇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371239_comment'></div>皇朝散大夫资阳令。祖延州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371239_comment'></div>考颐。宣州宁国丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371239_comment'></div>济德克绍厥类。藏聪晦明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371239_comment'></div>粹为淑和。少孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371239_comment'></div>季父建抚字训道。通左氏春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371239_comment'></div>贯历代史。旨画罗列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371239_comment'></div>接在视听。嗜为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371239_comment'></div>辞富理精。以门荫出身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371239_comment'></div>调补宣州溧水尉。网簿贡职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371239_comment'></div>入于天府。特授同州冯翊尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371239_comment'></div>改京兆府云阳主簿。转长安主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371239_comment'></div>迁万年丞。端靖守贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371239_comment'></div>处剧不挠。秩满居养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371239_comment'></div>素食贫。常好竺乾之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371239_comment'></div>自搌尘昏之外。泊如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371239_comment'></div>既而婴被沈疾。不克永寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371239_comment'></div>姻戚动怀。朋友道伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371239_comment'></div>佥曰。天之报施善人何如哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371239_comment'></div>君前娶河南独孤氏。左司郎中缅之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371239_comment'></div>无子早世。继室以裴夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371239_comment'></div>谏议大夫虬之女。阴教内则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371239_comment'></div>著于闺闱。有女三人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371239_comment'></div>呜呼。铭志之来古矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371239_comment'></div>是不可阙。遂勒元石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371239_comment'></div>措于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1371239", 1371239, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>阴堂</span>。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371239_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1371239'>振振吾宗。德之宅耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371239_comment'></div>惟君之德。至期颐耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371239_comment'></div>德而不寿。今既厄耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371239_comment'></div>松柏苍耶。不朽石耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371239_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1371239_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=797&endYear=797')">797年</a>　居长安。辛殆庶三试皆北，遂游南郑，宗元作序送之。作品：《送辛殆庶下第游南郑序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第622页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371052' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371052' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371052?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送辛殆庶下第游南郑序</a><span class='authorDate'>（797年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371052")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371052_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371052'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371052'>朝廷用文字求士。每岁布衣束带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371052_comment'></div>偕计吏而造有司者。仅半孔徒之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371052_comment'></div>春官上大夫擢甲乙而升司徒者。于孔氏高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371052_comment'></div>亦再倍焉。仆在京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371052_comment'></div>凡九年于今。其间得意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371052_comment'></div>二百有六十人。其果以文克者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371052_comment'></div>十不能一二。尝从俊造之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371052_comment'></div>颇涉艺文之事。四贡乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371052_comment'></div>而后获焉。方之于钓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371052_comment'></div>丝纶不属。钓喙甚直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371052_comment'></div>怀有美饵。而觖望获鱼之暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371052_comment'></div>则善取者皆指而笑之。今辛生固穷而未达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371052_comment'></div>迟久而不试。褒衣之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371052_comment'></div>视子而捧腹者。盖不乏<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作不之知）</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371052_comment'></div>辛生尝南依<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371052", 1371052, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>蛮楚</span>。专志于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371052_comment'></div>为文无谬悠迂诬之谈。锻鍊剪截。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371052_comment'></div>动可观采。故相国齐公接礼加等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371052_comment'></div>常为右客。且佐其策名之愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371052_comment'></div>遂笈典坟。袖文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371052_comment'></div>北来王都。笑揖群伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371052_comment'></div>文昌下大夫上士之列。见而器异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371052_comment'></div>争为鼓誉。由是为闻人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371052_comment'></div>战术艺之场。莫与争锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371052_comment'></div>然而迁延三北。踯躅不振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371052_comment'></div>岂其直钩而钓。怀美饵而羡鱼者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371052_comment'></div>若辛生者。有司抑之则已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371052_comment'></div>不然。身都甲乙之籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371052_comment'></div>其果以文克欤。今则囊如悬罄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371052_comment'></div>佣室寓食。方将适千里求仁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371052_comment'></div>被冒畏景。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1371052", 1371052, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>陟降</span>栈道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371052_comment'></div>吾欲抑而不叹。其若心胸何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371052_comment'></div>然吾闻焚舟而克手剑而盟者。皆败北之馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371052_comment'></div>子之阨困而往。霸心勇气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371052_comment'></div>无乃发于是行乎。成拜赐之信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371052_comment'></div>刷压境之耻。无乃果于是举乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371052_comment'></div>往慎所履。如志遄返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371052_comment'></div>勉自固植。以遂子之欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371052_comment'></div>姑使谈者谓我言而中。不犹愈乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371052_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1371052_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年</a>　在长安，第博学宏词科，授集贤殿书院正字。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年9月26日</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。国子司业阳城出为道州刺史，太学生诣阙救之，宗元闻此事，遗书以勉励其志。作品：《与太学诸生喜诣阙留阳城司业书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第867页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370964' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370964' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370964?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与太学诸生喜诣阙留阳城司业书</a><span class='authorDate'>（798年9月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370964")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370964_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370964'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370964'>二十六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370964_comment'></div>集贤殿正字柳宗元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370964_comment'></div>敬致尺牍太学诸生足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370964_comment'></div>始朝廷用谏议大夫阳公为司业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370964_comment'></div>诸生陶煦醇懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370964_comment'></div>熙然大洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370964_comment'></div>于兹四祀而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370964_comment'></div>诏书出为道州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370964_comment'></div>仆时通籍光范门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370964_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370964", 1370964, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>就职</span>书府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370964_comment'></div>闻之悒然不喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370964_comment'></div>非特为诸生戚戚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370964_comment'></div>乃仆亦失其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370964", 1370964, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>师表</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370964_comment'></div>而莫有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370964", 1370964, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>矜式</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370964_comment'></div>既而署吏有传致诏草者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370964_comment'></div>仆得观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370964_comment'></div>盖主上知阳公甚熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370964_comment'></div>嘉美显宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370964_comment'></div>勤至备厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370964_comment'></div>乃知欲烦阳公宣风裔土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370964_comment'></div>覃布美化于黎献也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370964_comment'></div>遂宽然少喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370964_comment'></div>如获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370964", 1370964, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>慰荐</span>于天子休命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370964_comment'></div>然而退自感悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370964_comment'></div>幸生明圣不讳之代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370964_comment'></div>不能布露所蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370964_comment'></div>论列大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370964_comment'></div>闻于下执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370964_comment'></div>冀少见采取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370964_comment'></div>而还阳公之南也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370964_comment'></div>翌日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370964_comment'></div>退自书府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370964_comment'></div>就车于司马门外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370964_comment'></div>闻之于抱关掌管者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370964_comment'></div>道诸生爱慕阳公之德教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370964_comment'></div>不忍其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370964_comment'></div>顿首西阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370964_comment'></div>恳悃至愿乞留如故者百数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370964_comment'></div>辄用抚手喜甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370964_comment'></div>震抃不宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370964_comment'></div>不意古道复行于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370964_comment'></div>仆尝读李元礼嵇叔夜传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370964_comment'></div>观其言太学生徒仰阙赴诉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370964_comment'></div>仆谓讫千百年不可睹闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370964_comment'></div>乃今日闻而睹之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370964_comment'></div>诚诸生见赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370964_comment'></div>甚盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370964_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370964_comment'></div>始仆少时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370964_comment'></div>尝有意游太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370964_comment'></div>受师说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370964_comment'></div>以植志持身焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370964_comment'></div>当时说者咸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370964_comment'></div>太学生聚为朋曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370964_comment'></div>侮老慢贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370964_comment'></div>有堕窳败业而利口食者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370964_comment'></div>有崇饰恶言而肆斗讼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370964_comment'></div>有凌傲长上而谇骂有司者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370964_comment'></div>其退然自克特殊于众人者无几耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370964_comment'></div>仆闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370964_comment'></div>恟骇怛悸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370964_comment'></div>良痛其游圣人之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370964_comment'></div>而众为是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370964_comment'></div>遂退托乡闾家塾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370964_comment'></div>考厉志业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370964_comment'></div>过太学之门而不敢跼顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370964_comment'></div>尚何能仰视其学徒者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370964_comment'></div>今乃奋志厉义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370964_comment'></div>出乎千百年之表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370964_comment'></div>何闻见之乖刺欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370964_comment'></div>岂说者过也。<div id='poem_sentence_77_1370964_comment'></div>可无愧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370964_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370964_comment'></div>阳公有博厚恢宏之德。<div id='poem_sentence_87_1370964_comment'></div>无人师之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370964_comment'></div>是大不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370964_comment'></div>仲尼吾党狂狷。<div id='poem_sentence_92_1370964_comment'></div>致祸负刍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370964_comment'></div>孟轲馆齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370964_comment'></div>从者窃屦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370964_comment'></div>彼一圣两贤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370964_comment'></div>继为大儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370964_comment'></div>然犹不免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370964_comment'></div>如之何其拒人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370964_comment'></div><span id='poem_sentence_102_1370964_comment'></div>不拒枉材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370964_comment'></div>师儒之席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370964_comment'></div>不拒曲士。<div id='poem_sentence_113_1370964_comment'></div>而人实具瞻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370964_comment'></div>与其宣风一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370964_comment'></div>覃化一州。<div
