id='poem_sentence_127_1370964_comment'></div>柳宗元白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_128_1370964_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=798&endYear=798')">798年9月</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。国子司业阳城出为道州刺史，太学生诣阙救之，宗元闻此事，撰碣文述阳城德业以声援。作品：《国子司业阳城遗爱碣》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷9第204页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371216?labeling=true' target='_blank'>国子司业阳城遗爱碣</a><span class='authorDate'>（798年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371216")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371216_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371216'>四年五月。皇帝以银印赤绂。即隐所起阳公为谏议大夫。后七年。廷诤恳至。累日不解。帝尤嘉异。迁为国子司业。旌直优贤。道光师儒。又四年九月己巳。出拜道州刺史。太学生鲁郡季傥庐江何蕃等百六十人。投业奔走。稽首阙下。叫阍吁天。愿乞复旧。朝廷重更其事。如己巳诏。翌日。会徒北向如初。行至延喜门。公使追夺其章。遮道愿罢。遂不果献。生徒嗷嗷。顾盼徘徊。昔公之来。仁风扇扬。暴慠革面。柔软有立。听闻嘉言。乐甚钟鼓。瞻仰德宇。高逾嵩岱。及公当职施政。示人准程。良士勇善。伪夫去饰。惰者益勤。诞者益恭。沈酗腆酒。斥逐郊遂。违亲三岁。罢退乡党。令未及下。乞归就养者二十馀人。礼顺克彰。孝弟以兴。则又讲贯经籍。俾达奥义。简习孝秀。俾极儒业。冠屦裳衣。由公而严。进退揖让。由公而仪。公征甚遐。吾党谁师。遂相与咨度署吏。布告诸儒。愿立贞珉。侔高状明。乃访于学古之士。纪公名字。垂宪于后。公名城。字亢宗。家于北平。隐于条山。惟公端粹冲和。高嶷懿醇。道德仁明。孝爱友悌。薰袭里闬。布闻天下。守节贞固。患难不能迁其心。怡性坦厚。荣位不足动其神。为司谏。义震于周行。为司业。爱加于生徒。宜乎立石。俾后是宪。其词曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371216_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371216'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371216'>惟兹阳公。履道葆醇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371216_comment'></div>爰初隐声。覆篑基仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371216_comment'></div>德充而形。乃作谏臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371216_comment'></div>抗志励义。直道是陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371216_comment'></div>帝求师儒。贰我成均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371216_comment'></div>开朗蒙滞。宣明德教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371216_comment'></div>太和潜布。元机密照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371216_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371216", 1371216, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>群生</span>闻礼。后学知孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371216_comment'></div>进退作则。动言是效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371216_comment'></div>匪公之轨。人用奚蹈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371216_comment'></div>粗厉贪淩。待公顺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371216_comment'></div>欺伪谲诈。待公信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371216_comment'></div>少年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371216", 1371216, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>申申</span>。咸适其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371216_comment'></div>槚楚废弛。尊严而威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371216_comment'></div>公褒其良。俾升于堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371216_comment'></div>癯者既肥。荣如衮衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371216_comment'></div>公弃不用。惩咎内讼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371216_comment'></div>既讼于内。犹公之诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371216_comment'></div>匪仁孰亲。匪德孰尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371216_comment'></div>今公于征。孰表儒门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371216_comment'></div>生徒上言。稽首帝阍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371216_comment'></div>谓天盖高。曾莫我闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371216_comment'></div>青衿涕濡。阗街盈衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371216_comment'></div>远送于南。望慕踟蹰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371216_comment'></div>立石书德。用扬懿则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371216_comment'></div>呜呼斯文。遗爱罔极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371216_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1371216_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字，与当时文士交游甚广。因年少才高，一时倾慕者尤众，宗元意气亦甚盛。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年8月</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。夫人杨氏卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年9月</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。葬亡妻于万年县栖凤原，撰墓志。作品：《亡妻弘农杨氏志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷13第338页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371261' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371261' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371261?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亡妻宏农杨氏志</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371261")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371261_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371261'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371261'>亡妻宏农杨氏。讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371261_comment'></div>高祖皇司勋郎中讳元政。司勋生殿中侍御史讳志玄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371261_comment'></div>殿中生醴泉县尉讳成名。醴泉生今礼部郎中凝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371261_comment'></div>代济仁孝。号为德门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371261_comment'></div>郎中娶于陇西李氏。生夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371261_comment'></div>夫人生三年而皇妣即世。外王父兼居方伯连帅之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371261_comment'></div>历刺南部。夫人自幼及笄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371261_comment'></div>依于外族。所以抚爱视遇者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371261_comment'></div>殆过厚焉。夫人小心敬顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371261_comment'></div>居宠益畏。终始无骄盈之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371261_comment'></div>亲党难之。五岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371261_comment'></div>属先妣之忌。饭僧于仁祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371261_comment'></div>就问其故。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371261", 1371261, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>媬傅</span>以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371261_comment'></div>遂号泣不食。后每及是日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371261_comment'></div>必遑遑涕慕。抱终身之戚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371261_comment'></div>及许嫁于我。柔日既卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371261_comment'></div>乃归于柳氏。恭惟先府君重崇友道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371261_comment'></div>于郎中最深。髫稚好言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371261_comment'></div>始于善谑。虽间在他国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371261_comment'></div>终无异辞。凡十有三岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371261_comment'></div>而二姓克合。奉初言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371261_comment'></div>夫人既归。事太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371261_comment'></div>备敬养之道。敦睦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371261", 1371261, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>夫党</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371261_comment'></div>致肃雍之美。主中馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371261_comment'></div>佐蒸尝。怵惕之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371261_comment'></div>表于宗门。太夫人尝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371261_comment'></div>自吾得新妇。增一孝女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371261_comment'></div>况又通家。爱之如己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371261_comment'></div>崔氏裴氏姊视之如兄弟。故二族之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371261_comment'></div>异于他门。然以素被足疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371261_comment'></div>不能良行。未三岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371261_comment'></div>孕而不育。厥疾增甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371261_comment'></div>明年。以谒医<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371261", 1371261, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>救药</span>之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371261_comment'></div>来归女氏永宁里之私第。八月十日甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371261_comment'></div>至于大疾。年始二十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371261_comment'></div>呜呼痛哉。以夫人之柔顺淑茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371261_comment'></div>宜延于上寿。端明惠和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371261_comment'></div>宜齿于贵位。生知孝爱之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371261_comment'></div>宜承于馀庆。是三者皆虚其应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371261_comment'></div>天可问乎。衰门多舋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371261_comment'></div>上天无祐。故自辛未逮于兹岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371261_comment'></div>累服齐斩。继缠哀酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371261_comment'></div>其间冠衣纯采。期月者三而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371261_comment'></div>无乃以是累夫人之寿欤。悼恸之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371261_comment'></div>曷月而已矣。哀夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371261_comment'></div>遂以九月五日庚午。克葬于万年县栖凤原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371261_comment'></div>从先茔。礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371261_comment'></div>是岁唐贞元十五年龙集己卯。为之志云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371261_comment'></div>坤德柔顺。妇道肃雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371261_comment'></div>惟若人兮。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1371261", 1371261, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>婉娩</span>淑姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371261_comment'></div>锵翔令容。委穷尘兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371261_comment'></div>佳城<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371261", 1371261, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>郁郁</span>。闭白日兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371261_comment'></div>之死同穴。归此室兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371261_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1371261_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。朝廷兵讨淮西吴少诚，宗元撰文论“侵”“伐”之理。作品：《辩侵伐论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷3第93页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371131' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371131' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371131?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辨侵伐论</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371131")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371131_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371131'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371131'>春秋之说曰。凡师有钟鼓曰伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371131_comment'></div>无曰侵。周礼大司马九伐之法曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371131_comment'></div>贼贤害人则伐之。负固不服则侵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371131_comment'></div>然则所谓伐之者。声其恶于天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371131_comment'></div>声其恶于天下。必有以厌于天下之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371131_comment'></div>夫然后得行焉。古之守臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371131_comment'></div>有朘人之财。危人之生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371131_comment'></div>而又害贤人者。内必弃于其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371131_comment'></div>外必弃于诸侯。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371131", 1371131, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>从而</span>后加伐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371131_comment'></div>动必克矣。然犹校德而后举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371131_comment'></div>量力而后会。备三有馀以用其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371131_comment'></div>一曰义有馀。二曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371131", 1371131, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>人力</span>有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371131_comment'></div>三曰货食有馀。是三者大备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371131_comment'></div>则又立其礼。正其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371131_comment'></div>修其辞。其害物也小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371131_comment'></div>则诰誓徵令。不过其邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371131_comment'></div>虽大不出所暴。非有逆天地横四海者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371131_comment'></div>不以动天下之师。故师不踰时而功成焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371131_comment'></div>斯为人之举也。故公之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371131_comment'></div>公之而钟鼓作焉。夫所谓侵之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371131_comment'></div>独以其负固不服而壅王命也。内以保其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371131_comment'></div>外不犯于诸侯。其过恶不足暴于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371131_comment'></div>致文告。修文德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371131_comment'></div>而又不变。然后以师问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371131_comment'></div>是为制命之举。非为人之举也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371131_comment'></div>故私之。私之故钟鼓不作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371131_comment'></div>斯圣人之所志也。周道既坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371131_comment'></div>兵车之轨交于天下。而罕知侵伐之端焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371131_comment'></div>是故以无道而正无道者有之。以无道而正有道者有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371131_comment'></div>不增德而以遂威者又有之。故世日乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371131_comment'></div>一变而至于战国。而生人耗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371131_comment'></div>是以有其力。无其财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371131_comment'></div>君子不以动众。有其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371131_comment'></div>有其财。无其义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371131_comment'></div>君子不以帅师。合是三者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371131_comment'></div>而明其公私之说。而后可<span class='inlineComment2'>（可下一本有行字）</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371131_comment'></div>呜呼。后之用师者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371131_comment'></div>有能观其侵伐之端。则善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371131_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1371131_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。撰文传记其从祖柳浑之生平事迹。作品：《柳常侍行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷8第180页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371268' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371268' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371268?labeling=true' target='_blank'>银青光禄大夫右散骑常侍轻车都尉宜城县开国伯柳公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371268")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371268_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371268'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371268'>曾祖善才，皇荆王侍读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371268_comment'></div>祖尚素，皇润州曲阿县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371268_comment'></div>父庆休，皇渤海郡县丞赠蔡州刺史工部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371268_comment'></div>汝州梁县梁城乡思义里柳浑年七十四状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371268_comment'></div>公字惟深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371268_comment'></div>其先河东人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371268_comment'></div>晋永嘉年有济南太守卓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371268_comment'></div>去其土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371268_comment'></div>代仕江左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371268_comment'></div>公实后之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371268_comment'></div>柳氏自黄帝后稷降于周鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371268_comment'></div>以字命族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371268_comment'></div>因地受氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371268_comment'></div>载在左氏内外传及太史公书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371268_comment'></div>自卓至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371268_comment'></div>十有一代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371268_comment'></div>为士林盛族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371268_comment'></div>著于南朝历代史及柳氏家牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371268_comment'></div>惟公质貌魁杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371268_comment'></div>度量宏大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371268_comment'></div>宏和博达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371268_comment'></div>而遇节必立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371268_comment'></div>恢旷放弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371268_comment'></div>而应机能断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371268_comment'></div>其居室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371268_comment'></div>奉养抚字之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371268_comment'></div>仪于宗戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371268_comment'></div>而内行著焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371268_comment'></div>其莅政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371268_comment'></div>柔仁端直之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371268_comment'></div>洽于府寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371268_comment'></div>而外美彰焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371268_comment'></div>凡为学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371268_comment'></div>略章句之烦乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371268_comment'></div>采摭奥旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371268_comment'></div>以知道为宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371268_comment'></div>凡为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371268_comment'></div>去藻饰之华靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371268_comment'></div>汪洋自肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371268_comment'></div>以适己为用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371268_comment'></div>自始学至于大成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371268_comment'></div>耽嗜文籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371268_comment'></div>注意钻砺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371268_comment'></div>倦不知游息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371268_comment'></div>威不待槚楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371268_comment'></div>儒言雅旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371268_comment'></div>夙有闻知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371268_comment'></div>年十馀岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371268_comment'></div>有称神巫来告曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371268_comment'></div>若相法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371268_comment'></div>当夭且贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371268_comment'></div>幸而为释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371268_comment'></div>可以缓而死耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371268_comment'></div>位禄非若事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371268_comment'></div>公诸父素加抚爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371268_comment'></div>尤所信异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371268_comment'></div>遽命夺去其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371268_comment'></div>从巫之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371268_comment'></div>公不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371268_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371268_comment'></div>夫性命之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371268_comment'></div>圣人所罕言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371268_comment'></div>搢绅者所不道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371268_comment'></div>巫何为而能尽之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371268_comment'></div>且令从之而生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371268_comment'></div>去圣人之教而为异术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371268_comment'></div>不若速死之愈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371268_comment'></div>于是为学甚笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371268_comment'></div>其在童幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371268_comment'></div>固不惑于怪谲矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371268_comment'></div>开元中举汝州进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371268_comment'></div>计偕百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371268_comment'></div>公为之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371268_comment'></div>礼部侍郎韦陟异而目之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371268_comment'></div>一举上第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371268_comment'></div>调授宋州单父尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371268_comment'></div>操断举措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371268_comment'></div>通乎细大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371268_comment'></div>絜廉检守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371268_comment'></div>形于造次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371268_comment'></div>加云骑尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371268_comment'></div>秩满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371268_comment'></div>江南西道连帅闻其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371268_comment'></div>辟至公府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371268_comment'></div>以信州都邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371268_comment'></div>人罹凶害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371268_comment'></div>靡弊残耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371268_comment'></div>假守永丰令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371268_comment'></div>公于是用重典以威奸暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371268_comment'></div>溥太和以惠鳏嫠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371268_comment'></div>殴除物害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371268_comment'></div>消去人隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371268_comment'></div>吏无招权乾没之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371268_comment'></div>政无犯令厖茸之蠹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371268_comment'></div>宰制听断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371268_comment'></div>渐于讼息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371268_comment'></div>耕夫复于封疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371268_comment'></div>商旅交于关市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371268_comment'></div>既庶而富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371268_comment'></div>廉耻兴焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371268_comment'></div>既富而教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371268_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_101_1371268", 1371268, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>庠塾</span>列焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371268_comment'></div>里闬大变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371268_comment'></div>克有能称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371268_comment'></div>遂表为洪州丰城令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371268_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1371268", 1371268, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>到职</span>如永丰之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_318_1371268_comment'></div>上召对前殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_319_1371268_comment'></div>嘉叹者久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_320_1371268_comment'></div>时谏臣有廷诤陷于讪上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_321_1371268_comment'></div>上未之善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_322_1371268_comment'></div>公从容候间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_323_1371268_comment'></div>陈古以讽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_324_1371268_comment'></div>所以示宽裕之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_325_1371268_comment'></div>招谠正之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_326_1371268_comment'></div>词旨切直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_327_1371268_comment'></div>意气勤恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_328_1371268_comment'></div>动合圣谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_329_1371268_comment'></div>卒见纳用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_330_1371268_comment'></div>无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_331_1371268_comment'></div>工人有以理乘舆服器得罪于左右者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_332_1371268_comment'></div>有司以盗易御物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_333_1371268_comment'></div>请论如法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_334_1371268_comment'></div>制初可之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_335_1371268_comment'></div>公不奉诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_336_1371268_comment'></div>因抗疏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_337_1371268_comment'></div>迹其罪状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_338_1371268_comment'></div>未甚指明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_339_1371268_comment'></div>方春杀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_340_1371268_comment'></div>恐伤和气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_341_1371268_comment'></div>上览之大悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_342_1371268_comment'></div>即原其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_343_1371268_comment'></div>刑官慎恤之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_344_1371268_comment'></div>正于邦典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_345_1371268_comment'></div>圣君含育之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_346_1371268_comment'></div>彰于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_347_1371268_comment'></div>论者难之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_348_1371268_comment'></div>时上相与光禄卿裴腆不协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_349_1371268_comment'></div>候公休沐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_350_1371268_comment'></div>以御酒或阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_351_1371268_comment'></div>阴请贬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_352_1371268_comment'></div>制命既行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_353_1371268_comment'></div>公坚执不下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_354_1371268_comment'></div>请讯支计之吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_355_1371268_comment'></div>校其供入之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_356_1371268_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_357_1371268", 1371268, "Clauses/360/Comments/0")'>原本</span>定罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_357_1371268_comment'></div>穷理辩刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_358_1371268_comment'></div>而腆竟获宥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_359_1371268_comment'></div>克复本职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_360_1371268_comment'></div>白志贞有羁靮之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_361_1371268_comment'></div>献利屡中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_362_1371268_comment'></div>上嘉其功效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_363_1371268_comment'></div>特宠异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_364_1371268_comment'></div>方议大用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_365_1371268_comment'></div>公以为胥徒杂类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_366_1371268_comment'></div>出自微贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_367_1371268_comment'></div>负乘致寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_368_1371268_comment'></div>盗之招也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_369_1371268_comment'></div>累疏以闻而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_370_1371268_comment'></div>公竭诚尽忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_371_1371268_comment'></div>忧劳庶务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_372_1371268_comment'></div>有耄忘之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_373_1371268_comment'></div>恳迫陈让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_374_1371268_comment'></div>除右散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_375_1371268_comment'></div>罢知政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_376_1371268_comment'></div>贞元五年二月五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_377_1371268_comment'></div>薨于昌化里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_378_1371268_comment'></div>终于散地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_379_1371268_comment'></div>故褒赠不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_380_1371268_comment'></div>惟公致君之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_381_1371268_comment'></div>孜孜焉不有怠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_382_1371268_comment'></div>立诚之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_383_1371268_comment'></div>侃侃焉无所屈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_384_1371268_comment'></div>故处心积虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_385_1371268_comment'></div>博蹇之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_386_1371268_comment'></div>表于朝端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_387_1371268_comment'></div>弼违<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_388_1371268", 1371268, "Clauses/391/Comments/0")'>释回</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_388_1371268_comment'></div>朴忠之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_389_1371268_comment'></div>沃于帝念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_390_1371268_comment'></div>内有敢言之勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_391_1371268_comment'></div>进当不讳之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_392_1371268_comment'></div>用能直道自达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_393_1371268_comment'></div>而无罪悔者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_394_1371268_comment'></div>公累更重任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_395_1371268_comment'></div>禄秩之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_396_1371268_comment'></div>布于宗姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_397_1371268_comment'></div>无一廛之土以处其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_398_1371268_comment'></div>无一亩之宫以聚其族属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_399_1371268_comment'></div>待禄而饱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_400_1371268_comment'></div>佣室而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_401_1371268_comment'></div>终身坦荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_402_1371268_comment'></div>而细故不入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_403_1371268_comment'></div>其达生知足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_404_1371268_comment'></div>落落如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_405_1371268_comment'></div>夫其子恭父慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_406_1371268_comment'></div>善行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_407_1371268_comment'></div>拊循制理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_408_1371268_comment'></div>能政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_409_1371268_comment'></div>直廉洁静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_410_1371268_comment'></div>俭德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_411_1371268_comment'></div>拒疑独断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_412_1371268_comment'></div>明识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_413_1371268_comment'></div>冒危以捍牧圉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_414_1371268_comment'></div>大节也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_415_1371268_comment'></div>犯颜以陈吁谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_416_1371268_comment'></div>至忠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_417_1371268_comment'></div>有一于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_418_1371268_comment'></div>尚宜旌褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_419_1371268_comment'></div>矧兹备体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_420_1371268_comment'></div>焉可以已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_421_1371268_comment'></div>固当饰以荣号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_422_1371268_comment'></div>章示后来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_423_1371268_comment'></div>而故吏遗孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_424_1371268_comment'></div>沦寓遐壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_425_1371268_comment'></div>久稽彝典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_426_1371268_comment'></div>罪在宗属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_427_1371268_comment'></div>敢用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_428_1371268", 1371268, "Clauses/431/Comments/0")'>评骘</span>旧行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_428_1371268_comment'></div>敷赞遗风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_429_1371268_comment'></div>若乃扬孔氏褒贬之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_430_1371268_comment'></div>举周公惩劝之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_431_1371268_comment'></div>徵于诔谥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_432_1371268_comment'></div>则有司存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_433_1371268_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_434_1371268_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年初</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。妻叔杨凝自长安还汴，宗元作文送之。作品：《送杨凝郎中使还汴宋诗后序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷22第587页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371032' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371032' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371032?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送杨凝郎中使还汴宋诗后序</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年初）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371032")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371032_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371032'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371032'>谈者谓大梁多悍将劲卒。亟就猾乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371032_comment'></div>而未尝底宁。控制之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371032_comment'></div>难乎中道。盖以将骄卒暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371032_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371032", 1371032, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>近忧</span>且至。非所以和众而乂民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371032_comment'></div>将诛卒削。则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371032", 1371032, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>外虞</span>实生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371032_comment'></div>非所以捍城而固圉也。是宜慰荐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371032", 1371032, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>喣谕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371032_comment'></div>纳为腹心。然后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371032", 1371032, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>威怀</span>之道备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371032_comment'></div>圣上于是抚以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371032", 1371032, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>表臣</span>。赞以艺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371032_comment'></div>参刚柔而两用。化顺逆而同道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371032_comment'></div>既去大憝。遂安有众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371032_comment'></div>故杨公以谋议之隙。对扬王庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371032_comment'></div>不踰时而承诏复命。示信于外诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371032_comment'></div>时当朝之羽仪。凡同官之寮属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371032_comment'></div>皆饯焉。容受童孺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371032_comment'></div>使在末位。礼部郎中许公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371032_comment'></div>以宏才奥学。已任文字顾唱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371032_comment'></div>在席咸断章而赋焉。谓工部郎中崔公文为时雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371032_comment'></div>允宜首序。谓小子预离觞之馀沥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371032_comment'></div>俾撰后序。编以继之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371032_comment'></div>大凡军旅之制。赞佐之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371032_comment'></div>崔公序之备矣。膺命受简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371032_comment'></div>欲默不敢。故书谈者之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371032_comment'></div>拜手以献。用充馀篇云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371032_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1371032_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=799&endYear=799')">799年</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。为四门助教厅撰壁记。作品：《四门助教厅壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷26第691页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371086' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371086' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371086?labeling=true' target='_blank'>四门助教厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（799年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371086")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371086_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371086'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371086'>周人置虞庠于四郊。以养国老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371086_comment'></div>教冑子。祭统曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371086_comment'></div>天子设四学。盖其制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371086_comment'></div>易传太初篇曰。天子旦入东学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371086_comment'></div>昼入南学。夕入西学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371086_comment'></div>暮入北学。蔡邕引之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371086_comment'></div>以定明堂之位焉。大戴礼保傅篇曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371086_comment'></div>帝入东学以贵仁。入南学以贵信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371086_comment'></div>入西学以贵德。入北学以贵爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371086_comment'></div>贾生述之。以明太子之教焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371086_comment'></div>故曰为大教之宫。而四学具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371086_comment'></div>参明堂之政。原大教之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371086_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371086", 1371086, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>建置</span>之道宏也。后魏大和中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371086_comment'></div>立学于四门。置助教二十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371086_comment'></div>隋氏始隶于国子。而降置五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371086_comment'></div>皇朝始合于太学。又省至三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371086_comment'></div>员位弥简。其官尤难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371086_comment'></div>非儒之通者不列也。四门学之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371086_comment'></div>掌国之上士中士下士凡三等。侯伯子男凡四等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371086_comment'></div>其子孙之为冑子者。及庶士庶人之子为俊士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371086_comment'></div>使执其业而居其次。就师儒之官而考正焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371086_comment'></div>助教之职。佐博士以掌鼓箧槚楚之政令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371086_comment'></div>分其人而教育之。其有通经力学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371086_comment'></div>必于岁之杪。升于礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371086_comment'></div>听简试焉。课生徒之进退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371086_comment'></div>必酌于中道。非博雅庄敬之流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371086_comment'></div>固不得临于是。故有去而升于朝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371086_comment'></div>贺秘书由是为博士。归散骑由是为左拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371086_comment'></div>旧制以拾遗为八品清官。故必以名实者居于其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371086_comment'></div>贞元中。王化既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371086_comment'></div>经籍少间。有司命太学之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371086_comment'></div>颇以为易。专名誉好文章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371086_comment'></div>咸耻为学官。至是河东柳立始以前进士求署兹职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371086_comment'></div>天水武儒衡闽中欧阳詹又继之。是岁为四门助教凡三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371086_comment'></div>皆文士。京师以为异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371086_comment'></div>余与立同祖于方舆公。与武公<span class='inlineComment2'>（武公一作武君）</span>同升于礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371086_comment'></div>与欧阳生同志于文。四门助教署未尝纪前人名氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371086_comment'></div>余故为之记。而由夫三子者始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371086_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1371086_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年3月</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。仲姊适裴墐者卒，宗元作墓志。作品：《亡姊前京兆府参军裴君夫人墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷13第336页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371260' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371260' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371260?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亡姊前京兆府参军裴君夫人墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371260")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371260_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371260'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371260'>柳氏至于唐。其著者中书令讳奭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371260_comment'></div>中书之弟之子曰徐州府君讳子夏。实有孝德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371260_comment'></div>世其家业。清池府君讳从裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371260_comment'></div>继之以茂实。德清府君讳察躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371260_comment'></div>承之以善政。以至于侍御史府君讳镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371260_comment'></div>用贞信劲正达于邦家。克生贤女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371260_comment'></div>以配于裴氏。裴氏至于唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371260_comment'></div>其著者礼部尚书讳行俭。礼部之子曰侍中讳光庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371260_comment'></div>嗣用忠肃。书于国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371260_comment'></div>祠部府君讳贞。业之以贞直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371260_comment'></div>以至于金吾府君讳儆。用纯懿端亮闻于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371260_comment'></div>实生良子以配夫人。呜呼夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371260_comment'></div>与仁孝偕生。以礼顺偕长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371260_comment'></div>始于家。纯如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371260_comment'></div>终于夫族。穆如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371260_comment'></div>其为子道也。孝以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371260_comment'></div>恭以惠。取与承顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371260_comment'></div>必称所欲。先君与太夫人恩遇尤厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371260_comment'></div>故夫人侍侧。无威怒之教焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371260_comment'></div>天祸弊族。夙遭大故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371260_comment'></div>我诸孤奉太夫人之养。不敢图死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371260_comment'></div>至于复常。夫人三岁无汤沐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371260_comment'></div>无盐酪。顿踊叫号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371260_comment'></div>哀彻天地。外除发不胜笄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371260_comment'></div>体不胜带。太夫人泣而命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371260_comment'></div>固犹不食。朝夕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371260", 1371260, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>谕诲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371260_comment'></div>仅而济焉。其为妻道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371260_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371260", 1371260, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>贞顺</span>之宜。恒服于身体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371260_comment'></div>疑忌之虑。不萌于心术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371260_comment'></div>忿懥之色。不兆于容貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371260_comment'></div>同焉而合于礼。婉焉而得其正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371260_comment'></div>其为妇道也。惟听顺谨敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371260_comment'></div>睦姻任恤之行甚备。常以不幸不及姑舅之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371260_comment'></div>用为大恨。是故相春秋之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371260_comment'></div>视涤濯。羞簋簠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371260_comment'></div>劳以待旦。每怵惕之感至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371260_comment'></div>则又移其孝于裴氏之门。而以睦于冢妇介妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371260_comment'></div>必敬必亲。下以不失其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1371260", 1371260, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>赤子之心</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371260_comment'></div>姻族归厚。率由是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371260_comment'></div>呜呼。我之大谴欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371260_comment'></div>裴氏之大不幸欤。以夫人之德行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371260_comment'></div>宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1371260", 1371260, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>贵寿</span>。宜康宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371260_comment'></div>然而年始三十。不克至于寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371260_comment'></div>良人官为参军事。不及偕其贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371260_comment'></div>骨髓之疾。实钟于身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371260_comment'></div>以贞元十六年三月十三日甲子。终于光德里第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371260_comment'></div>痛矣夫。始夫人之疾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371260_comment'></div>夫人之族。视之如己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371260_comment'></div>其家老长妾臧获之微。皆以其私奔谒于道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371260_comment'></div>祷鬼神问卜筮者相及也。既病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371260_comment'></div>太夫人在侧。尚虑积忧伤于尊怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371260_comment'></div>犹持形立气。绐以少间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371260_comment'></div>故二稚未龀。良人在远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371260_comment'></div>不及有绪言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1371260", 1371260, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>遗念</span>以传于后。则我呼天之痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371260_comment'></div>宜有加焉。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371260_comment'></div>天胡厚是懿德。而阙其报施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371260_comment'></div>独何咎欤。予一不知天之忍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371260_comment'></div>既逾月。良人至自洛师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371260_comment'></div>望门而哭曰。无以立吾家成吾身矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371260_comment'></div>凡生三子。幼曰崔七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371260_comment'></div>先夫人八月而殡。魂气无不之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371260_comment'></div>次曰崔六。后夫人五旬而夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371260_comment'></div>因祔焉。今其存者曰崔五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371260_comment'></div>幸无恙。托于乳媪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371260_comment'></div>以虞水火。哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371260_comment'></div>其年八月十八日甲子。安厝于长安县之神禾原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371260_comment'></div>从于先茔。祔于皇姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371260_comment'></div>宜也。母弟号哭而为之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371260_comment'></div>毒痛凭塞。略不能具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371260_comment'></div>敢告无愧辞。无溢美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371260_comment'></div>庶用正直。克安神心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371260_comment'></div>呜呼。至哀无文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371260_comment'></div>至敬不饰。故无其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371260_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_73_1371260_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。受好友韩泰之托，为其兄、温县主簿韩慎撰墓志。作品：《故温县主簿韩君墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷11第280页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371251' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371251' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371251?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故温县主簿韩君墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371251")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371251_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371251'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371251'>有唐故温县主簿韩慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371251_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371251_comment'></div>汉弓高侯其先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371251_comment'></div>徙于南阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371251_comment'></div>传世至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371251_comment'></div>唐侍中讳瑗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371251_comment'></div>克用贞亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371251_comment'></div>奋于国难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371251_comment'></div>传侍中兄子郢州刺史讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371251_comment'></div>某生御史著作郎讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371251_comment'></div>某生尚书库部郎中万州刺史讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371251_comment'></div>嗣以文行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371251_comment'></div>大其家业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371251_comment'></div>君万州长子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371251_comment'></div>以父任为建陵挽郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371251_comment'></div>累调授王府参军襄州襄阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371251_comment'></div>至于是邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371251_comment'></div>贞元十六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371251_comment'></div>又调于天官署河阳丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371251_comment'></div>未拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371251_comment'></div>十有一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371251_comment'></div>暴病卒于长安永崇里先人之庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371251_comment'></div>又十有二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371251_comment'></div>龟策<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371251", 1371251, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>袭吉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371251_comment'></div>祔于咸阳洪渎原先人之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371251_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371251_comment'></div>先三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371251_comment'></div>外姻家老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371251_comment'></div>谋为之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371251_comment'></div>季弟泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371251_comment'></div>哀不能文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371251_comment'></div>故托于友焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371251_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371251_comment'></div>生也以其弟之恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371251_comment'></div>知君之为友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371251_comment'></div>没也以其弟之戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371251_comment'></div>知君之为爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371251_comment'></div>惟友爱出于孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371251_comment'></div>移于忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371251_comment'></div>施于人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371251_comment'></div>无往不达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371251_comment'></div>予故得受其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371251_comment'></div>书于石曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371251_comment'></div>友而爱而。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371251_comment'></div>忠孝宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371251_comment'></div>貌称其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371251_comment'></div>行称其词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371251_comment'></div>贱而不寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371251_comment'></div>为善是悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371251_comment'></div>祔于祖考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371251_comment'></div>初筮攸告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371251_comment'></div>季也之纯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371251_comment'></div>寘哀无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371251_comment'></div>终窭且贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371251_comment'></div>控于仁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371251_comment'></div>备物称家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371251_comment'></div>其仪式陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371251_comment'></div>爰相其悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371251_comment'></div>载刻兹珉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1371251_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。为伯祖妣李夫人撰墓志。作品：《伯祖妣赵郡李夫人墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷13第328页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第39页系《伯祖妣李夫人墓志》于贞元十九年，时柳宗元在京任监察御史里行。）</span><div id='poem_1371257' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371257' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371257?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伯祖妣赵郡李夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371257")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371257_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371257'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371257'>夫人姓李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371257_comment'></div>辨族氏者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371257_comment'></div>赵郡赞皇之东祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371257_comment'></div>祖某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371257_comment'></div>为某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371257_comment'></div>父冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371257_comment'></div>为单父尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371257_comment'></div>夫人生于良族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371257_comment'></div>嶷然殊异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371257_comment'></div>及笄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371257_comment'></div>德充于容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371257_comment'></div>行践于言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371257_comment'></div>高朗而不伤其柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371257_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371257", 1371257, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>严恪</span>而不害其和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371257_comment'></div>特善女工剪制之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371257_comment'></div>又能为雅琴素声操缦之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371257_comment'></div>妇道既备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371257_comment'></div>宜为君子之配偶焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371257_comment'></div>我伯祖临邛令府君讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371257_comment'></div>受夫人于李氏之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371257_comment'></div>而归于正室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371257_comment'></div>临邛府君之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371257_comment'></div>曰我曾王父清池府君讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371257_comment'></div>清池之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371257_comment'></div>曰徐州府君讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371257_comment'></div>又其先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371257_comment'></div>曰常侍府君讳楷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371257_comment'></div>常侍之兄曰中书令讳奭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371257_comment'></div>自中书以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371257_comment'></div>为宰相四世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371257_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371257_comment'></div>我伯祖以宗冑硕大而济其德厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371257_comment'></div>夫人以族属清显而修其礼范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371257_comment'></div>合二姓以承先祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371257_comment'></div>为士者荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371257_comment'></div>故佐奉养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371257_comment'></div>承祭祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371257_comment'></div>妇德用光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371257_comment'></div>家道甚宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371257_comment'></div>无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371257_comment'></div>伯祖终于临邛而窆焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371257_comment'></div>夫人从子而反于淮浒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371257_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371257_comment'></div>我先府君每得仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371257_comment'></div>未尝不奉迎供养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371257_comment'></div>必诚必亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371257_comment'></div>男既立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371257_comment'></div>必使之有禄仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371257_comment'></div>女必使之有家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371257_comment'></div>将嫁己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371257_comment'></div>必先择良士可以配诸姑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371257_comment'></div>定然后议焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371257_comment'></div>仲父殿中侍御史府君由是志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371257_comment'></div>夫人生男一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371257_comment'></div>讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371257_comment'></div>不幸终于宣州旌德尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371257_comment'></div>女三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371257_comment'></div>皆得良婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371257_comment'></div>陇西李伯和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371257_comment'></div>为杨子丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371257_comment'></div>疾痹癈痼而没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371257_comment'></div>太原王纾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371257_comment'></div>今为右补阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371257_comment'></div>颍川陈苌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371257_comment'></div>为校书郎渭南尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371257_comment'></div>知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371257_comment'></div>贞元十六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371257_comment'></div>王氏姑定省扶持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371257_comment'></div>自扬州至于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371257_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1371257", 1371257, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>道路</span>遇疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371257_comment'></div>遂馆于陈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371257_comment'></div>以诸婿之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371257_comment'></div>诸女之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371257_comment'></div>无不得意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371257_comment'></div>享年八十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371257_comment'></div>是岁六月二十九日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371257_comment'></div>终于平康里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371257_comment'></div>自小敛至于大敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371257_comment'></div>比及葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371257_comment'></div>则二婿实参主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371257_comment'></div>有孙二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371257_comment'></div>长曰曹郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371257_comment'></div>奉之以缞而正于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371257_comment'></div>八月二十四日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371257_comment'></div>葬于万年县之少陵原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371257_comment'></div>实栖凤原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371257_comment'></div>介于我先府君仲父二兆之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371257_comment'></div>神心之所安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371257_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371257_comment'></div>嗣子早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371257_comment'></div>临邛万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371257_comment'></div>以岁之不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371257_comment'></div>未克合祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371257_comment'></div>哀孰甚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371257_comment'></div>诸姑命宗元以为斯志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371257_comment'></div>以从人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371257_comment'></div>内夫家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371257_comment'></div>外父母家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371257_comment'></div>且又葬于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371257_comment'></div>志于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371257_comment'></div>故叙柳氏为备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371257_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371257_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_102_1371257'>蔼其芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371257_comment'></div>寿且康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371257_comment'></div>大梁鹑火沈幽光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371257_comment'></div>夙沦夫子嗣又丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371257_comment'></div>輤帏不复岷之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371257_comment'></div>兆灵趾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371257_comment'></div>栖凤里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371257_comment'></div>艮之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371257_comment'></div>兑之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371257_comment'></div>灵之车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371257_comment'></div>当返此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371257_comment'></div>子孙百代承灵祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371257_comment'></div>谁之言者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1371257", 1371257, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>青乌子</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_114_1371257_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。三月，义成节度使姚南仲牙将曹文洽救主身亡；五月，徐州节度使张建封卒后，军乱，幕从韦道安自杀。宗元感念其事，为二人作传。作品：《曹文洽韦道安传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷17第485页，中华书局1979年版。文阙仅目存。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。五月，徐州节度使张建封卒后，军乱，幕从韦道安自杀。宗元念其气节，作诗。作品：《韦道安》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷43第1206页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_40625' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_40625' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/40625?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韦道安<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（800年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_40625")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_40625_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_40625_0'>① 道安尝佐张建封于徐州，及军乱而道安自杀。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_40625'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7730, "poem_allusion_40625")'>师婚</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_40625_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_40625'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_40625'>道安本儒士，颇擅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_40625", 40625, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>弓剑</span>名。<div id='poem_sentence_0_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_40625'>二十游太行，暮闻号哭<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作哭泣）</span>声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_40625'>疾驱前致问，有叟垂华缨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_40625'>言我故刺史，失职还西京。<div id='poem_sentence_3_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_40625'>偶为群盗得，毫缕无馀赢。<div id='poem_sentence_4_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_40625'>货财足非吝，二女皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_40625", 40625, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>娉婷</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_40625'>苍黄见驱逐，谁识死与生。<div id='poem_sentence_6_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_40625'>便当此殒命，休复事晨征。<div id='poem_sentence_7_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_40625'>一闻激高义，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_40625", 40625, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>眦裂</span>肝胆横。<div id='poem_sentence_8_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_40625'>挂弓问所在，趫捷超峥嵘。<div id='poem_sentence_9_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_40625'>见盗寒涧阴，罗列方忿争。<div id='poem_sentence_10_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_40625'>一矢毙酋帅，馀党号且惊。<div id='poem_sentence_11_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_40625'>麾令递束缚，纆<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作缠）</span>索相拄撑。<div id='poem_sentence_12_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_40625'>彼姝久褫魄，刃下俟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_40625", 40625, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>诛刑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_40625'>却立不亲授，谕以从父行。<div id='poem_sentence_14_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_40625'>捃收自担肩，转道趋前程。<div id='poem_sentence_15_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_40625'>夜发敲石火，山林如昼明。<div id='poem_sentence_16_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_40625'>父子更抱持，涕血纷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_40625", 40625, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>交零</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_40625'>顿首愿归货，纳女称舅甥。<div id='poem_sentence_18_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_40625'>道安旧衣去，义重利固轻。<div id='poem_sentence_19_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_40625'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7730, "poem_sentence_20_40625")'>师婚</span>古所病，合姓非用兵。<div id='poem_sentence_20_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_40625'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_40625", 40625, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>朅来</span>事儒术，十载所能逞<span class='inlineComment2'>（必贞切）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_40625'>慷慨张徐州<span class='inlineComment2'>（徐泗濠节度使张建封）</span>，朱邸扬前旌。<div id='poem_sentence_22_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_40625'>投区获所愿，前马出王城<span class='inlineComment2'>（贞元十三年，建封来朝，道安从之）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_40625'>辕门立奇士，淮水秋风生。<div id='poem_sentence_24_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_40625'>君侯既即世，麾下相欹倾。<div id='poem_sentence_25_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_40625'>立孤抗王命，钟鼓四野鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_26_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_40625'>横溃非所壅，逆节非所婴。<div id='poem_sentence_27_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_40625'>举头自引刃，顾义谁顾形。<div id='poem_sentence_28_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_40625'>烈士不忘死，所死在忠贞。<div id='poem_sentence_29_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_40625'>咄嗟徇权子，翕习尤趋荣。<div id='poem_sentence_30_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_40625'>我歌非悼死，所悼时世情。<div id='poem_sentence_31_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_40625'></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_40625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_40625'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(40625)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。班肃擢第后归东川觐省，宗元受友人之托、作序送之。作品：《送班孝廉擢第归东川觐省诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷22第603页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371041' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371041' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371041?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送班孝廉擢第归东川觐省序</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371041")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371041_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371041'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371041'>陇西辛殆庶猥称吾文宜序事。晨持缣素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371041_comment'></div>以班孝廉之行为请。且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371041_comment'></div>夫人殆所谓吉士也。愿而信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371041_comment'></div>质而礼。言不黩慢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371041_comment'></div>行不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371041", 1371041, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>进越</span>。其先两汉间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371041_comment'></div>继修文儒。世其家业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371041_comment'></div>其风流后允。耽学笃志之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371041_comment'></div>往往出于其门。今夫人研精典坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371041_comment'></div>不告劬勚。属者举乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371041_comment'></div>登春官。获居其甲焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371041_comment'></div>家于蜀之东道。其严君以客卿之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371041_comment'></div>赞是方岳。为大夫良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371041_comment'></div>今将拜庆宁觐。光耀族属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371041_comment'></div>是其可歌也。道出于南郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371041_comment'></div>外王父以将相之重。九命赤社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371041_comment'></div>为诸侯师。今又将亟驾省谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371041_comment'></div>从容<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371041", 1371041, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>燕喜</span>。是又可歌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371041_comment'></div>故我与河南独孤申叔赵郡李行纯行敏等若干人皆歌之矣。若乃序者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371041_comment'></div>固吾子宜之。柳子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371041_comment'></div>吾尝读王命论及汉书。嘉其立言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371041_comment'></div>彼生彪固之冑欤。相国冯翊公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371041_comment'></div>功在社稷。德及生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371041_comment'></div>其门子游文章之府者。吾尝与之齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371041_comment'></div>彼生严氏之出欤。承世家之儒风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371041_comment'></div>沐外族之休光。彼生专圣人之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371041_comment'></div>而趋君子之林。宜矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371041_comment'></div>遂如辛氏之谈。濡翰于素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371041_comment'></div>因寓于辞曰。为我谢子之舅氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371041_comment'></div>珠玉将至。得无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371041", 1371041, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>修容</span>乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371041_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1371041_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年10月</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。代京兆尹韦夏卿作祭文。作品：《为韦京兆祭太常崔少卿文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1060页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371302' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371302' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371302?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为韦京兆祭太常崔少卿文</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371302")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371302_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371302'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371302'>维年月日甲子。京兆尹韦夏卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371302_comment'></div>谨以清酌庶羞之奠。敬祭于亡友故太常少卿崔君之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371302_comment'></div>惟灵率是良志。蹈其吉德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371302_comment'></div>炳蔚文彩。周流学殖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371302_comment'></div>孔氏之训。专其传释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371302_comment'></div>黄老之言。探乎幽赜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371302_comment'></div>六书奥秘。是究是索。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371302_comment'></div>叩尔元关。保其真宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371302_comment'></div>艺成行备。披云骋迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371302_comment'></div>康庄未穷。濛汜巳极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371302_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。夙岁同道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371302_comment'></div>从容洛师。接袂交襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371302_comment'></div>以遨以嬉。策驾嵩少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371302_comment'></div>溯舟瀍伊。笑咏周星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371302_comment'></div>其乐熙熙。丹霄可望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371302_comment'></div>青云可期。洛中十友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371302_comment'></div>谈者荣之。惟郑洎齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371302_comment'></div>各登鼎司。或丧或存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371302_comment'></div>山川是违。繄我夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371302_comment'></div>宜相清时。命之不遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371302_comment'></div>孰不悽悲。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371302_comment'></div>往佐居守。及尔同僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371302_comment'></div>笑遨交欢。匪夕则朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371302_comment'></div>入同其室。出联其镳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371302_comment'></div>投文<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371302", 1371302, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>报章</span>。既歌且谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371302_comment'></div>及我为郎。优游吏部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371302_comment'></div>公为御史。持宪天路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371302_comment'></div>文陛徐趋。眷恋相顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371302_comment'></div>欢爱之分。有加于素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371302_comment'></div>自我于迈。历刺东吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371302_comment'></div>离忧十年。复会名都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371302_comment'></div>余为侍郎。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371302", 1371302, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>铨总</span>攸居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371302_comment'></div>实得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371302", 1371302, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>茂彦</span>。奉其规模。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371302_comment'></div>联事合情。又倍其初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371302_comment'></div>我尹京兆。公亚奉常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371302_comment'></div>步武相望。佩玉以锵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371302_comment'></div>谓保愉乐。长此翱翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371302_comment'></div>抱疾几何。忽焉其亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371302_comment'></div>呜呼痛哉。原念往昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371302_comment'></div>爱均骨肉。我有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371302", 1371302, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>书笥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371302_comment'></div>盈君尺牍。寤言在耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371302_comment'></div>今古何速。失涕兴哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371302_comment'></div>匍匐往哭。抚筵一呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371302_comment'></div>心焉摧剥。日月逾迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371302_comment'></div>佳城遽卜。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1371302", 1371302, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>素车</span>千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371302_comment'></div>逶迤山谷。晦尔精灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371302_comment'></div>藏之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1371302", 1371302, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>斧屋</span>。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371302_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1371302", 1371302, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>丹旌</span>即路。祖奠在庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371302_comment'></div>去此昭昭。就尔冥冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371302_comment'></div>敬陈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1371302", 1371302, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>泂酌</span>。以告明灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371302_comment'></div>临觞永痛。庶写哀忱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371302_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。伏维尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371302_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1371302_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　在京任集贤殿书院正字。代叔父柳纁作祭文，祭六伯母李氏。作品：《祭六伯母文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷41第1095页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371288' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371288' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371288?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭六伯母文</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371288")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371288_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371288'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371288'>维贞元十七年岁次辛巳二月癸巳朔二十五日丁巳。侄男华州华阴县主簿纁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371288_comment'></div>谨以清酌庶羞之奠。敬祭于六伯母之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371288_comment'></div>伏惟天锡考寿。神资淑德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371288_comment'></div>高明而和。柔惠且直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371288_comment'></div>敬长慈幼。宗姻仰则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371288_comment'></div>不偕贵位。孰不悽恻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371288_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371288", 1371288, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>移天</span>夙丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371288_comment'></div>丁此闵凶。主器继夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371288_comment'></div>莫承于宗。懿彼贤女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371288_comment'></div>孝诚自中。温温良人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371288_comment'></div>竟扬德风。承顺必敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371288_comment'></div>滑甘则丰。致养有荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371288_comment'></div>其道克终。天祸弊族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371288_comment'></div>远承哀讣。缠牵官事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371288_comment'></div>奔哭无路。亦既请告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371288_comment'></div>聿来京师。以号以呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371288_comment'></div>祗拜堂帷。子姓凋落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371288_comment'></div>宗门日衰。托于外姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371288_comment'></div>陈此灵仪。幼女号恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371288_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371288", 1371288, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>誓言</span>固之。仁贤见容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371288_comment'></div>曲遂其私。内顾孱眇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371288_comment'></div>祗益摧悲。诚愧于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371288_comment'></div>岂曰得宜。今岁调选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371288_comment'></div>获参士林。主其簿书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371288_comment'></div>于华之阴。受禄虽微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371288_comment'></div>莫遂曩心。夙驾东征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371288_comment'></div>祖軷将临。朔望是违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371288_comment'></div>哀怀岂任。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371288_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1371288_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='3c458f285aab44c8b72ca274e1e27f58_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3c458f285aab44c8b72ca274e1e27f58");'><span id='3c458f285aab44c8b72ca274e1e27f58_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=805')">803-805年</a>，31-33岁</div><div id='3c458f285aab44c8b72ca274e1e27f58' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　弘农令柳府君既葬，立石表于坟前，宗元撰石表辞。作品：《故弘农令柳府君坟前石表辞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷12第320页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371221' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371221' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371221?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故宏农令柳府君坟前石表辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371221")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371221_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371221'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371221'>少陵原柳氏之大墓。唐贞元十九年某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371221_comment'></div>孤某奉其先府君洎夫人之丧祔于其位。由新墓而南若干步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371221_comment'></div>曰高祖王父兰州府君讳某字某之墓。又东若干步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371221_comment'></div>曰曾祖王父邠州府君讳某之墓。西若干步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371221_comment'></div>曰祖王父司议郎府君讳某之墓。咸异兆而相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371221_comment'></div>昭穆之有位序。壤树之有丰杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371221_comment'></div>皆如律令。府君讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371221_comment'></div>字某。由父任为太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371221_comment'></div>更许昌阳武伊阙华原尉王屋丞汝阴令。为宏农二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371221_comment'></div>推其诚心。裕于其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371221_comment'></div>辟土生谷。若有天相之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371221_comment'></div>衣食<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371221", 1371221, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>给足</span>。故人不札夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371221_comment'></div>教厉明具。故俗不争夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371221_comment'></div>遂以洽于太和。事理克彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371221_comment'></div>刺史卢杞加礼褒旌。考绩绝尤。<div class='inline'
