id='poem_sentence_14_1371221_comment'></div>推君之政。风于下邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371221_comment'></div>命为吏部尚书郎。庾河南受命黜陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371221_comment'></div>状君理绩殊异。宜升天朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371221_comment'></div>帝有叹焉。方图优升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371221_comment'></div>命用不长。年五十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371221_comment'></div>建中二年某月日。卒于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371221_comment'></div>以其素廉。家之蓄不足以充<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371221", 1371221, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>凶事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371221_comment'></div>遂殡于是邑。仍会危难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371221_comment'></div>至于今乃克返葬。孤某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371221_comment'></div>尝为黔州录事参军。今无禄仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371221_comment'></div>而志不敢缓。初公娶司农少卿京兆韦山之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371221_comment'></div>泾阳主簿回智之女。德容温良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371221_comment'></div>大历二年某月日。卒于越而假葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371221_comment'></div>孤某。徒行自越举夫人之丧至于虢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371221_comment'></div>举宏农君之丧。咸至于墓窆焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371221_comment'></div>既窆。立石表于坟前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371221_comment'></div>示后之人以无忘孝敬。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371221_comment'></div>世有难仕于外而葬其族者鲜矣。孝子之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371221_comment'></div>有待驷马五鼎而卒不至者焉。若今之杀衣黜食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371221_comment'></div>寒妻子。饥仆御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371221_comment'></div>终身由之。而志益不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371221_comment'></div>为旅人徒跣万里。以厄困终事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371221_comment'></div>孝之难者欤。五十而慕者舜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371221_comment'></div>禄千钟而悲者曾子也。圣且贤难之若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371221_comment'></div>今之人有由其道者。得不立于世乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371221_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1371221_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年闰10月</a>　自蓝田尉入为监察御史里行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年闰10月</a>　自蓝田尉拜监察御史里行，忧祖名“察躬”触讳所除官职名，上表辞让。作品：《让监察御史状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷39第1016页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370943' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370943' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370943?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让监察御史状</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年闰10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370943")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370943_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370943'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370943'>右。臣伏准名例律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370943_comment'></div>诸官与父祖讳同者。不合冒荣居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370943_comment'></div>臣祖名察躬。今臣蒙恩授前件官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370943_comment'></div>以幼年逮事王父。礼律之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370943_comment'></div>所不敢踰。臣不胜进退惶恐之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370943_comment'></div>谨诣光顺门奏状以闻。伏听敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370943_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1370943_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　在京任监察御史里行，主祀事。有问“祀朝日”之名，宗元即以之为题，作文考论。作品：《祀朝日说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷16第453页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371160' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371160' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371160?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝日说</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371160")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371160_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371160'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371160'>柳子为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371160_comment'></div>主祀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371160_comment'></div>将朝日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371160_comment'></div>其僚问曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371160_comment'></div>古之名曰朝日而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371160_comment'></div>今而曰祀朝日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371160_comment'></div>何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371160_comment'></div>予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371160_comment'></div>古之记者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371160_comment'></div>则朝拜之云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371160_comment'></div>今而加祀焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371160_comment'></div>则朝旦之云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371160_comment'></div>今之所云非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371160_comment'></div>问者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371160_comment'></div>以夕而偶诸朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371160_comment'></div>或者今之是乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371160_comment'></div>予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371160_comment'></div>夕之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371160_comment'></div>则朝拜之偶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371160_comment'></div>古者旦见曰朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371160_comment'></div>暮见曰夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371160_comment'></div>故诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371160_comment'></div>邦君诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371160_comment'></div>莫肯朝夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371160_comment'></div>左氏传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371160_comment'></div>百官承事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371160_comment'></div>朝而不夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371160_comment'></div>礼记曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371160_comment'></div>日入而夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371160_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371160_comment'></div>朝不废朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371160_comment'></div>暮不废夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371160_comment'></div>晋侯将杀竖襄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371160_comment'></div>叔向夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371160_comment'></div>楚子之留乾溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371160_comment'></div>右尹子革夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371160_comment'></div>齐之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371160_comment'></div>子我夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371160_comment'></div>赵文子砻其椽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371160_comment'></div>张老夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371160_comment'></div>智襄子为室美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371160_comment'></div>士茁夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371160_comment'></div>皆暮见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371160_comment'></div>汉仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371160_comment'></div>夕则两郎向琐闱拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371160_comment'></div>谓之夕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371160_comment'></div>亦出是名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371160_comment'></div>故曰大采朝日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371160_comment'></div>少采夕月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371160_comment'></div>又曰春朝朝日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371160_comment'></div>秋夕夕月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371160_comment'></div>若是足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371160_comment'></div>又加祀焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371160_comment'></div>盖不学者为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371160_comment'></div>僚曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371160_comment'></div>欲子之书其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371160_comment'></div>吾将施于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371160_comment'></div>可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371160_comment'></div>予从之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1371160_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　在京任监察御史里行，主祀事，将“示昔”，进有司问“示昔”之说，宗元作文论之。作品：《示昔说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷16第457页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　在京任监察御史里行。作赋。作品：《迎长日赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集卷上第1333页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370873' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370873' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370873?labeling=true' target='_blank'>迎长日赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（以三王郊礼日用夏正为韵）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370873")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370873_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370873'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370873'>惟飨帝以事天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370873_comment'></div>必推策而迎日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370873_comment'></div>寅方肇建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370873_comment'></div>俟启蛰以展仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370873_comment'></div>卯位将初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370873_comment'></div>爰用牲而协吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370873_comment'></div>送烈烈之凝气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370873_comment'></div>遵迟迟之阳律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370873_comment'></div>犹分可爱之辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370873_comment'></div>式伫寅宾之质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370873_comment'></div>稽之虞典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370873_comment'></div>期匪疾而匪徐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370873_comment'></div>行以夏时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370873_comment'></div>契惟精而惟一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370873_comment'></div>职在冯相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370873_comment'></div>事传小正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370873_comment'></div>符上春以备仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370873_comment'></div>必修其始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370873_comment'></div>先仲春而有事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370873_comment'></div>故谓之迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370873_comment'></div>时也淑景初延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370873_comment'></div>幽阳潜启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370873_comment'></div>当四时之首位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370873_comment'></div>用三代之达礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370873_comment'></div>探赜索隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370873_comment'></div>得郊祀之元辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370873_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370873", 1370873, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>极往知来</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370873_comment'></div>正邦家之大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370873_comment'></div>事冠前古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370873_comment'></div>仪标后王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370873_comment'></div>皮弁乍临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370873_comment'></div>土圭之影犹积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370873_comment'></div>泰坛既罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370873_comment'></div>玉漏之声渐长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370873_comment'></div>变熙熙之纯曜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370873_comment'></div>流杲杲之晴光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370873_comment'></div>璧影始融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370873_comment'></div>丽景才<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作欲）</span>凝于城阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370873_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370873", 1370873, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>轮形</span>尚疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370873_comment'></div>斜晖未驻于康庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370873_comment'></div>是知迎长日之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370873_comment'></div>实王心之所共。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370873_comment'></div>兆南郊之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370873_comment'></div>乃阳事之所用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370873_comment'></div>故可以知上下之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370873_comment'></div>见天人之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370873_comment'></div>动浮光于俎豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370873_comment'></div>散微照于包茅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370873_comment'></div>周流金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370873_comment'></div>晖照陶匏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370873_comment'></div>异乎天纪不修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370873_comment'></div>秦伯尚矜其泰畤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370873_comment'></div>日官失职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370873_comment'></div>晋侯徒继乎夏郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370873_comment'></div>于以迎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370873_comment'></div>则无违者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370873_comment'></div>委照将久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370873_comment'></div>岂三舍之足凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370873_comment'></div>延光可期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370873_comment'></div>胡再中之云假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370873_comment'></div>自然应以繁祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370873_comment'></div>锡之纯嘏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370873_comment'></div>礼仪允洽于神人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370873_comment'></div>正朔克周于戎夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370873_comment'></div>今我后再新古礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370873_comment'></div>与天地相参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370873_comment'></div>应戬谷之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370873_comment'></div>受之千亿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370873_comment'></div>奉郊祀之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370873_comment'></div>至于再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370873_comment'></div>然则迎长日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370873_comment'></div>恭祀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370873_comment'></div>并虞夏而何惭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1370873_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　在京任监察御史里行，为监祭史一职撰壁记。作品：《监祭使壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷26第687页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371085' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371085' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371085?labeling=true' target='_blank'>监祭使壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371085")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371085_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371085'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371085'>礼檀弓曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371085_comment'></div>祭礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371085_comment'></div>与其敬不足而礼有馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371085_comment'></div>不若礼不足而敬有馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371085_comment'></div>是必礼与敬皆足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371085_comment'></div>而后祭之义行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371085_comment'></div>周礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371085_comment'></div>祭仆视<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371085", 1371085, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>祭祀</span>有司百官之戒具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371085_comment'></div>诛其不敬者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371085_comment'></div>汉以侍御史<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371085", 1371085, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>监祠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371085_comment'></div>唐开元礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371085_comment'></div>凡大祠若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371085_comment'></div>中祠若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371085_comment'></div>咸以御史监视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371085_comment'></div>祠官有不如仪者以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371085_comment'></div>其刻印移书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371085_comment'></div>则曰监祭使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371085_comment'></div>宝应中尤异其礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371085_comment'></div>更号祠祭使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371085_comment'></div>俄复其初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371085_comment'></div>又制凡供祠之吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371085_comment'></div>虽当斋戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371085_comment'></div>得以决罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371085_comment'></div>由是礼与敬无不足者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371085_comment'></div>圣人之于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371085", 1371085, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>祭祀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371085_comment'></div>非必神之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371085_comment'></div>盖亦附之教焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371085_comment'></div>事于天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371085_comment'></div>示有尊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371085_comment'></div>不肃则无以教敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371085_comment'></div>事于宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371085_comment'></div>示广孝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371085_comment'></div>不肃则无以教爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371085_comment'></div>事于有功烈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371085_comment'></div>示报德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371085_comment'></div>不肃则无以劝善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371085_comment'></div>凡肃之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371085_comment'></div>自法制始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371085_comment'></div>奉法守制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371085_comment'></div>由御史出者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371085_comment'></div>故将有事焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371085_comment'></div>则祠部上其日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371085_comment'></div>吏部上其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371085_comment'></div>奉制书以来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371085_comment'></div>然后颁于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371085_comment'></div>以谨百事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371085_comment'></div>太常修其礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371085_comment'></div>光禄合其物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371085_comment'></div>百工之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371085_comment'></div>先一日咸至于祠而考阅焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371085_comment'></div>御史会公卿有司执简而临之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371085_comment'></div>故其粢盛牲牢酒醴菜果之馔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371085_comment'></div>必实于庖厨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371085_comment'></div>钟鼓笙竽琴瑟戛击之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371085_comment'></div>簨簴缀兆之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371085_comment'></div>必具于庭内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371085_comment'></div>樽彝罍洗俎豆盏斝之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371085_comment'></div>必洁于坛堂之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371085_comment'></div>奉奠之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371085_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1371085", 1371085, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>赞礼</span>之童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371085_comment'></div>乐工舞师洎执殳而卫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371085_comment'></div>咸引数<span class='inlineComment2'>（引数一作列若）</span>其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371085_comment'></div>设箠朴于堂下以修官刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371085_comment'></div>而群吏莫敢不备物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371085_comment'></div>罗奏牍于几上以严天宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371085_comment'></div>而众官莫敢不尽诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371085_comment'></div>而祭之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371085_comment'></div>先升立于西阶之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371085_comment'></div>以待卒事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371085_comment'></div>其礼之周旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371085_comment'></div>乐之节奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371085_comment'></div>必周知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371085_comment'></div>退而视其燔燎瘗埋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371085_comment'></div>终之以敬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371085_comment'></div>居常则饬四方祀贡之物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371085_comment'></div>以时登于王府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371085_comment'></div>服器之修具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371085_comment'></div>祠宇之缮理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371085_comment'></div>牛羊毛涤之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371085_comment'></div>三宫御廪之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371085_comment'></div>毕备而听命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371085_comment'></div>旧以监察御史之长居是职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371085_comment'></div>贞元十九年十二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371085_comment'></div>御史多缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371085_comment'></div>予班在三人之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371085_comment'></div>进而领焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371085_comment'></div>明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371085_comment'></div>中山刘禹锡始复旧制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371085_comment'></div>由礼与敬以临其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371085_comment'></div>而官事益理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371085_comment'></div>制令有不宜于时者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371085_comment'></div>必复于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371085_comment'></div>革而正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371085_comment'></div>于是始为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371085_comment'></div>求簿书得为是职者若干人书焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_94_1371085_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　在京任官监察御史里行。为户部郎中魏弘简撰墓志。作品：《户部郎中魏府君墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷9第223页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371228' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371228' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371228?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故尚书户部郎中魏府君墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371228")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371228_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371228'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371228'>魏氏世墓于某县某原。唐兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371228_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371228", 1371228, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>闻士</span>讳之逖者。与子及孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371228_comment'></div>咸举进士。嗣为儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371228_comment'></div>家绵州。涪城尉讳全宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371228_comment'></div>魏州临黄主簿讳钦慈。太常主簿讳绲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371228_comment'></div>尚书膳部员外郎兼江陵少尹讳万成。凡五代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371228_comment'></div>名高而不浮于行。才具而不得其禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371228_comment'></div>江陵府君益之以闳达之量。经纬之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371228_comment'></div>故豪士贤大夫痛慕加厚。生郎中府君讳宏简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371228_comment'></div>字曰裕之。以文行知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371228_comment'></div>既冠而德礼闻于乡党。既仕而法制立于官政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371228_comment'></div>温柔发乎外。见而人莫不亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371228_comment'></div>直方存乎内。久而人莫不敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371228_comment'></div>由进士策贤良。连居科首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371228_comment'></div>授太子校书。历桂管江西福建宣歙四府为判官副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371228_comment'></div>累授协律郎大理评事。三为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371228_comment'></div>赐绯鱼袋。在州六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371228_comment'></div>而人乐之。廉使崔衍曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371228_comment'></div>吾敢专天下之士。独惠兹人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371228_comment'></div>遂献于天子。拜度支员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371228_comment'></div>转户部郎中。邦赋克举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371228_comment'></div>人望逾重。年四十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371228_comment'></div>贞元二十年九月三十日。不疾而殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371228_comment'></div>震悼之声。遐迩一辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371228_comment'></div>且曰。斯人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371228_comment'></div>而不得为善之利。中人其怠乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371228_comment'></div>君尝三娶。而卒无主妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371228_comment'></div>庭无倚庐。堂无抱孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371228_comment'></div>有令兄弟以主其丧。有孝女以守其祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371228_comment'></div>故哭于客位。吊于殡东者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371228_comment'></div>咸加哀焉。凡为部从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371228_comment'></div>府丧而当其位者三。州缺而居其守者二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371228_comment'></div>皆得其理。君之先再世贫不得葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371228_comment'></div>故以禄仕游于诸侯。薄衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371228_comment'></div>损车马。凡十有馀祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371228_comment'></div>卒获于厥心。其族属之无主后者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371228_comment'></div>皆位于墓。娣侄之无归从者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371228_comment'></div>咸会于家。由是处约以终其世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371228_comment'></div>既敛。家宰庀其政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371228_comment'></div>视廪惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371228", 1371228, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>釜钟</span>。视藏惟束帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371228_comment'></div>无馀积焉。十有一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371228_comment'></div>遣车归于洛师。某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371228_comment'></div>祔于墓。监察御史柳宗元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371228_comment'></div>闻其道而玩其文也久。居又同闬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371228_comment'></div>故哀而铭之。其辞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371228_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1371228'>郎中之道。惟直是保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371228_comment'></div>淳泊坦厚。温恭孝友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371228_comment'></div>郎中之文。惟孝是宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371228_comment'></div>溥畅周流。炳蔚纷纶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371228_comment'></div>为周贤能。为汉贤良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371228_comment'></div>始仕雠校。篇籍有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371228_comment'></div>仍授使檄。吁谟用扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371228_comment'></div>二居郎位。征赋以理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371228_comment'></div>休声载起。显命伊始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371228_comment'></div>生而不寿。孰知其止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371228_comment'></div>殁而不嗣。孰济其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371228_comment'></div>有翩其旗。爰举裳帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371228_comment'></div>行道迟迟。望墓而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371228_comment'></div>象物是宜。卜筮孔时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371228_comment'></div>里人作铭。不愧于辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371228_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1371228_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　在京任监察御史里行。受上司武元衡之嘱，为“诸使兼御史中丞”一职撰壁记。作品：《诸使兼御史中丞壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷26第701页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371089?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诸使兼御史中丞厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371089")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371089_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371089'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371089'>古者交政于四方。谓之使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371089_comment'></div>今之制。受命临戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371089_comment'></div>职无所统属者。亦谓之使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371089_comment'></div>凡使之号。盖专焉而行其道者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371089_comment'></div>开元以来。其制愈重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371089_comment'></div>故取御史之名而加焉。至于今若干年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371089_comment'></div>其兼中丞者若干人。其使绝域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371089_comment'></div>统兵戎。桉州部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371089_comment'></div>专货食。而柔远人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371089_comment'></div>固王略。齐风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371089_comment'></div>和关石。大者戡复于内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371089_comment'></div>拓定于外。皆得以壮其威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371089_comment'></div>张其声。其用远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371089_comment'></div>假是名以莅厥职。而尊严若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371089_comment'></div>况乎总宪度于朝端。树风声于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371089_comment'></div>其所以翼于君正于人者。尤可以知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371089_comment'></div>武公以厚德在位。甚宜其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371089_comment'></div>视其署有记诸使中丞者。而多阙漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371089_comment'></div>于是求其故于诏制。而又质于史氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371089_comment'></div>增益备具。遂命其属书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371089_comment'></div>且曰。由其号而观其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371089_comment'></div>后之居于斯者。有以敬于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371089_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1371089_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　在京任监察御史里行。武元衡迁御史中丞，上赐御苑樱桃，宗元代为表谢恩。作品：《为武中丞谢赐樱桃表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷38第1008页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370929' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370929' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370929?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为武中丞谢赐樱桃表</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370929")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370929_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370929'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370929'>臣某言。中使某至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370929_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨。赐臣樱桃若干者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370929_comment'></div>天眷特深。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370929", 1370929, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>时珍</span>荐降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370929_comment'></div>宠惊里巷。恩溢圆方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370929_comment'></div>臣某诚喜诚惧顿首顿首。伏以含桃之羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370929_comment'></div>时令攸贵。况今采因御苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370929_comment'></div>分自天厨。使发九霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370929_comment'></div>集繁星而积耀。味调六气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370929_comment'></div>承湛露而不晞。盈眦而外被恩光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370929_comment'></div>适口而中含渥泽。顾惭素食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370929_comment'></div>弥切自公。岂图君子所先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370929_comment'></div>遂厌小人之腹。无任感恩欣喜之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370929_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1370929_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　在京任监察御史里行。应兴州人民之请，撰文记刺史兼御史大夫严砺开山导江之功，以镌刻江边岩石。作品：《兴州江运记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷26第714页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371093' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371093' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371093?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兴州江运记</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371093")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371093_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371093'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371093'>御史大夫严公牧于梁五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371093_comment'></div>嗣天子举周汉进律增秩之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371093_comment'></div>以亲诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371093_comment'></div>谓公有功德理行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371093_comment'></div>就加礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371093_comment'></div>是年四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371093_comment'></div>使中谒者来锡公命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371093_comment'></div>宾僚吏属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371093_comment'></div>将校卒士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371093_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371093", 1371093, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>黧老</span>童孺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371093_comment'></div>填溢公门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371093_comment'></div>舞跃欢呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371093_comment'></div>愿建碑纪德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371093_comment'></div>垂亿万祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371093_comment'></div>公固不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371093_comment'></div>退而相与怨咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371093_comment'></div>遑遑如不饮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371093_comment'></div>于是西鄙之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371093_comment'></div>密以公刊山导江之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371093_comment'></div>愿刻岩石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371093_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371093_comment'></div>惟梁之西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371093_comment'></div>其蔽曰某山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371093_comment'></div>其守曰兴州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371093_comment'></div>兴州之西为戎居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371093_comment'></div>岁备亭障。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371093_comment'></div>实以精卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371093_comment'></div>以道之险隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371093_comment'></div>兵困于食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371093_comment'></div>守用不固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371093_comment'></div>公患之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371093_comment'></div>吾尝为兴州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371093_comment'></div>凡其土人之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371093_comment'></div>吾能知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371093_comment'></div>自长举北至于青泥山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371093_comment'></div>又西抵于成州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371093_comment'></div>过栗亭川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371093_comment'></div>踰宝井堡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371093_comment'></div>崖谷峻隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371093_comment'></div>十里百折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371093_comment'></div>负重而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371093_comment'></div>若蹈利刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371093_comment'></div>盛秋水潦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371093_comment'></div>穷冬雨雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371093_comment'></div>深泥积水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371093_comment'></div>相辅为害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371093_comment'></div>颠踣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1371093", 1371093, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>腾藉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371093_comment'></div>血流栈道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371093_comment'></div>糗粮刍稿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371093_comment'></div>填谷委山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371093_comment'></div>马牛群畜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371093_comment'></div>相藉物故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371093_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1371093", 1371093, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>餫夫</span>毕力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371093_comment'></div>守卒延颈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371093_comment'></div>嗷嗷之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371093_comment'></div>其可哀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371093_comment'></div>若是者绵三百里而馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371093_comment'></div>自长举之西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371093_comment'></div>可以导江而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371093_comment'></div>二百里而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371093_comment'></div>昔之人莫得知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371093_comment'></div>吾受命于君而育斯人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371093_comment'></div>其可已乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371093_comment'></div>乃出军府之币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371093_comment'></div>以备器用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371093_comment'></div>即山僦功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371093_comment'></div>由是转巨石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371093_comment'></div>仆大木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371093_comment'></div>焚以炎火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371093_comment'></div>沃以食醯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371093_comment'></div>摧其坚刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371093_comment'></div>化为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1371093", 1371093, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>灰烬</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371093_comment'></div>畚锸之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371093_comment'></div>易甚朽坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371093_comment'></div>乃辟乃垦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371093_comment'></div>乃宣乃理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371093_comment'></div>随山之曲直以休人力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371093_comment'></div>顺地之高下以杀湍悍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371093_comment'></div>厥功既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371093_comment'></div>咸如其素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371093_comment'></div>于是决去<span id='poem_sentence_81_1371093_comment'></div>万夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1371093", 1371093, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>呼抃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371093_comment'></div>澹为安流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371093_comment'></div>烝徒讴歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371093_comment'></div>枕卧而至。<div 1371093, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>专力</span>待寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371093_comment'></div>惟我公之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371093_comment'></div>畴可侔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371093_comment'></div>而无以酬德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371093_comment'></div>致其大愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371093_comment'></div>又不可得命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371093_comment'></div>矧公之始来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371093_comment'></div>属当<span id='poem_sentence_120_1371093_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_121_1371093", 1371093, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>传馆</span>是饰。<div class='inline' "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>杠梁</span>以成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371093_comment'></div>人不履危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371093_comment'></div>若是者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371093_comment'></div>敦尚儒学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371093_comment'></div>抑损贵位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371093_comment'></div>率忠与仁。<div id='poem_sentence_137_1371093_comment'></div>行之坚勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371093_comment'></div>不俟终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371093_comment'></div>其兴功济物。<div 1371093, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>遗利</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371093_comment'></div>史起兴叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371093_comment'></div>白圭壑邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371093_comment'></div>孟子不与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371093_comment'></div>公能夷险休劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371093_comment'></div>以惠万代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371093_comment'></div>其功烈尤章章焉不可盖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371093_comment'></div>是用假辞谒工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371093_comment'></div>勒而存之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371093_comment'></div>用永宪于后祀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_154_1371093_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　在京任监察御史里行。幽州节度使刘济进献朝廷嘉禾图，宗元上表贺嘉禾顺成。作品：《御史台贺嘉禾表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第960页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370894' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370894' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370894?labeling=true' target='_blank'>御史台贺嘉禾表</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370894")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370894_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370894'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370894'>臣某言。今月日宰臣以幽州所进嘉禾图各一轴示百寮者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370894_comment'></div>伏以嘉谷顺成。灵贶昭格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370894_comment'></div>天人合应。遐迩同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370894_comment'></div>臣某诚欢诚庆顿首顿首。伏惟皇帝陛下睿谋广运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370894_comment'></div>神化旁行。植物知仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370894_comment'></div>祥图应圣。灵岳不愆于赞祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370894_comment'></div>燕谷用遂于生成。丰稔既均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370894_comment'></div>知朔南之被泽。休嘉克协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370894_comment'></div>见天地之同和。六穗惭称于汉臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370894_comment'></div>异亩耻书于周典。自中形外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370894_comment'></div>均庆同欢。臣某<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370894", 1370894, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>谬职</span>宪司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370894_comment'></div>获睹休瑞。无任忭跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370894_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1370894_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年5月22日</a>　在京任监察御史里行。作祭文与王播、刘禹锡等同僚悼李中丞汶。作品：《祭李中丞文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1055页，中华书局1979年版。李中丞，诸本注文均不详其名字。陈景云《柳集点勘》、中华书局校注本《柳宗元集》第1057页、肖伟韬《元和五大诗人年谱合订辨正》第109页皆以为李中丞名汶。）</span><div id='poem_1371300' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371300' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371300?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭李中丞文</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年5月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371300")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371300_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371300'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371300'>维贞元二十年岁次甲申五月某朔二十二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371300_comment'></div>故吏儒林郎守侍御史王播将仕郎守殿中侍御史穆质奉议郎行殿中侍御史冯邈承奉郎守监察御史韩泰宣德郎行监察御史范传正文林郎守监察御史刘禹锡承务郎监察御史里行柳宗元承务郎监察御史里行李程等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371300_comment'></div>谨以清酌之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371300_comment'></div>敬祭于故中丞赠刑部侍郎李公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371300_comment'></div>惟公坚贞守道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371300_comment'></div>洁廉成德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371300_comment'></div>当官秉彝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371300_comment'></div>卓尔孤直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371300_comment'></div>高节外峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371300_comment'></div>纯诚内植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371300_comment'></div>临事不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371300_comment'></div>执心无惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371300_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371300", 1371300, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>矫矫</span>劲质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371300_comment'></div>擢于天枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371300_comment'></div>式是邦族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371300_comment'></div>粲其羽仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371300_comment'></div>发迹内史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371300_comment'></div>参其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371300", 1371300, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>军事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371300_comment'></div>自下劘上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371300_comment'></div>直词屡至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371300_comment'></div>于后受邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371300_comment'></div>历抚疲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371300_comment'></div>公去逾久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371300_comment'></div>人滋咏呻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371300_comment'></div>复从京邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371300_comment'></div>辟署司录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371300_comment'></div>振其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371300", 1371300, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>纲条</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371300_comment'></div>端我甸服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371300_comment'></div>黠吏屏气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371300_comment'></div>贪官窒欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371300_comment'></div>赫赫有命。<div id='poem_sentence_32_1371300_comment'></div>国用是经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371300_comment'></div>实抗其长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371300_comment'></div>以奉准程。<div id='poem_sentence_37_1371300_comment'></div>进为正郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371300_comment'></div>勾会是专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371300_comment'></div>乃刺于商。<div id='poem_sentence_42_1371300_comment'></div>致夷于艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371300_comment'></div>道途讴歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371300_comment'></div>有诏徵还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371300_comment'></div>丞我御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371300_comment'></div>执其宪矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371300_comment'></div>纠逖之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371300_comment'></div>直清是举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371300_comment'></div>慎择寮吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371300_comment'></div>皂囊密启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371300_comment'></div>忠恳屡陈。<div class='inline' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1371300", 1371300, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>拖绅</span>遽闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371300_comment'></div>卷衣已复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371300_comment'></div>礼备赗赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371300_comment'></div>恩加命服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371300_comment'></div>窀穸有时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371300_comment'></div>岁月逾蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371300_comment'></div>播等猥备官属。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371300_comment'></div>近或逾月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371300_comment'></div>远则累年。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371300_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_80_1371300_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　在京任监察御史里行。为潞州兵曹柳君撰墓志。作品：《潞州兵曹柳君墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集补遗第1393页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第192页系《潞州兵马曹柳君墓志》于贞元二十一年七月。）</span><div id='poem_1371241' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371241' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371241?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潞州兵马曹柳君墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371241")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371241_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371241'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371241'>柳氏子某为平陆丞。王父母之丧寓于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371241_comment'></div>贞元二十一年。始葬于虢之阌乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371241_comment'></div>窆。墨遇食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371241_comment'></div>乃贻书其族尚书礼部员外郎宗元。使为其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371241_comment'></div>且曰。吾之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371241_comment'></div>自魏已来。为宰相者累世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371241_comment'></div>我高祖讳万齿。为伊阙令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371241_comment'></div>袭其先河间郡公。曾祖讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371241_comment'></div>浙州刺史。咸有懿德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371241_comment'></div>洎于兵曹府君讳某。勤身惠志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371241_comment'></div>好义能让而同。故交者固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371241_comment'></div>直而敬。故亲者睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371241_comment'></div>凡举明经者四。皆获美仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371241_comment'></div>初为陆浑主簿。次吴县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371241_comment'></div>次上党丞。次潞州兵曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371241_comment'></div>其勾稽摘发。毗赞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371241", 1371241, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>关决</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371241_comment'></div>无不胜职。加朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371241_comment'></div>某年月日。终于官次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371241_comment'></div>殡于州若干里。会世多难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371241_comment'></div>家又贫窭。故不及夫事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371241_comment'></div>呜呼。我曾祖王父葬于颍阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371241_comment'></div>我伯祖叔祖洎伯父皆葬阌乡皇天原望寿里。颍阳北临间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371241_comment'></div>其地阴狭。岸又数坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371241_comment'></div>大惧不克久安神居。是以从他兆于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371241_comment'></div>卜用七月六日甲子。将以具于元堂之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371241_comment'></div>固故有望乎尔也。于是删其书为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371241_comment'></div>置于邮中。俾移于石上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371241_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1371241_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　在京任监察御史里行。韩泰出任馆驿使，宗元为其作壁记。作品：《馆驿使壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷26第703页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371090' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371090' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371090?labeling=true' target='_blank'>馆驿使壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（804年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371090")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371090_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371090'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371090'>凡万国之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371090_comment'></div>四夷之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371090_comment'></div>天下之道途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371090_comment'></div>毕出于邦畿之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371090_comment'></div>奉贡输赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371090_comment'></div>修职于王都者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371090_comment'></div>入于近关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371090_comment'></div>则皆重足错毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371090_comment'></div>以听有司之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371090_comment'></div>徵令赐予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371090_comment'></div>布政于下国者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371090_comment'></div>出于甸服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371090_comment'></div>而后桉行成列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371090_comment'></div>以就诸侯之馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371090_comment'></div>故馆驿之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371090_comment'></div>于千里之内尤重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371090_comment'></div>自万年至于渭南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371090_comment'></div>其驿六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371090_comment'></div>其蔽曰华州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371090_comment'></div>其关曰潼关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371090_comment'></div>自华而北界于栎阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371090_comment'></div>其驿六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371090_comment'></div>其蔽曰同州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371090_comment'></div>其关曰蒲津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371090_comment'></div>自灞而南至于蓝田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371090_comment'></div>其驿六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371090_comment'></div>其蔽曰商州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371090_comment'></div>其关曰武关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371090_comment'></div>自长安至于盩厔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371090_comment'></div>其驿十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371090_comment'></div>其蔽曰洋州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371090_comment'></div>其关曰华阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371090_comment'></div>自武功而西至于好畤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371090_comment'></div>其驿三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371090_comment'></div>其蔽曰凤翔府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371090_comment'></div>其关曰陇关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371090_comment'></div>自渭而北至于华原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371090_comment'></div>其驿九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371090_comment'></div>其蔽曰坊州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371090_comment'></div>自咸阳而西至于奉天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371090_comment'></div>其驿六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371090_comment'></div>其蔽曰邠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371090_comment'></div>由四海之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371090_comment'></div>总而合之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371090_comment'></div>以至于关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371090_comment'></div>由关之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371090_comment'></div>束而会之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371090_comment'></div>以至于王都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371090_comment'></div>华人夷人往复而授馆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371090_comment'></div>旁午而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371090_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1371090", 1371090, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>传吏</span>奉符而阅其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371090_comment'></div>县吏执牍而书其物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371090_comment'></div>告至告去之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371090_comment'></div>不绝于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371090_comment'></div>寓望迎劳之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371090_comment'></div>无旷于日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371090_comment'></div>而春秋朝陵之邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371090_comment'></div>皆有传馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371090_comment'></div>其饮饫饩馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371090_comment'></div>咸出于丰给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371090_comment'></div>缮完筑复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371090_comment'></div>必归于整顿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371090_comment'></div>列其田租。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371090_comment'></div>布其货利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371090_comment'></div>权其入而用其积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371090_comment'></div>于是有出纳奇赢之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371090_comment'></div>勾会考校之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371090_comment'></div>大历十四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371090_comment'></div>始命御史为之使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371090_comment'></div>俾考其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371090_comment'></div>以质于尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371090_comment'></div>季月之晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371090_comment'></div>必合其簿书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371090_comment'></div>以视其等列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371090_comment'></div>而校其信宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371090_comment'></div>必称其制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371090_comment'></div>有不当者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371090_comment'></div>反之于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371090_comment'></div>尸其事者有劳焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371090_comment'></div>则复于天子而优升之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371090_comment'></div>劳大者增其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371090_comment'></div>其次者降其调之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371090_comment'></div>又其次犹异其考绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371090_comment'></div>官有不职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371090_comment'></div>则以告而罪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371090_comment'></div>故月受俸二万于太府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371090_comment'></div>史五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371090_comment'></div>承符者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371090_comment'></div>皆有食焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371090_comment'></div>先是假废官之印而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371090_comment'></div>贞元十九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371090_comment'></div>南阳韩泰告于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371090_comment'></div>始铸使印而正其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371090_comment'></div>然其嗣当斯职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371090_comment'></div>未尝有记之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371090_comment'></div>追而求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371090_comment'></div>盖数岁而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371090_comment'></div>则失之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371090_comment'></div>今余为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371090_comment'></div>遂以韩氏为首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371090_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371090_comment'></div>修其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371090_comment'></div>故首之也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_102_1371090_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　在京任监察御史里行。作墓石。作品：《清河张府君墓石》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集补遗第1396页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在京任监察御史里行。为御史中丞武元衡作表谢赐新茶。作品：《为武中丞谢赐新茶表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集卷下第1376页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370935' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370935' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370935?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为武中丞谢赐新茶表</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370935")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370935_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370935'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370935'>臣某言。中使窦某至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370935_comment'></div>奉宣旨。赐臣新茶一斤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370935_comment'></div>天眷忽临。时珍俯及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370935_comment'></div>捧戴惊忭。以喜以惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370935_comment'></div>中谢。臣以无能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370935_comment'></div>谬司邦宪。大明首出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370935_comment'></div>得亲仰于云霄。渥泽遂行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370935_comment'></div>忽先沾于草木。况兹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370935", 1370935, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>灵味</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370935_comment'></div>成自遐方。照临而甲坼惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370935_comment'></div>煦妪而芬芳可袭。调六气而成美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370935_comment'></div>扶万寿以效珍。岂臣贱微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370935_comment'></div>膺此殊锡。衔恩敢同于尝酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370935_comment'></div>涤虑方切于饮冰。抚事循涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370935_comment'></div>陨越无地。臣不任感戴欣忭之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370935_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1370935_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　正月二十三日，德宗崩，二十六日，顺宗即位；二月，顺宗任用王叔文、王伾等，开始永贞革新。时王叔文所交颇多知名之士，宗元受其赏识，自监察御史里行迁礼部员外郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。代某一节镇上表贺顺宗即位。作品：《贺践祚表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第948页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370885' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。时顺宗病失音，不能决事。百官奏事，自帷中可其奏。宗元代文武百官拟表请顺宗听政。作品：《礼部为文武百僚请听政表第一表》<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370882'>臣某等言。臣闻大道必体于至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370882_comment'></div>大孝莫高于善继。上观列圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370882_comment'></div>旁考前王。罔不俯就礼文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370882_comment'></div>仰承大事。严奉宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370882_comment'></div>慰安元元。然后德教惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370882_comment'></div>邦家永固。伏惟皇帝陛下寝苫泣血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370882_comment'></div>号慕无时。贯于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370882_comment'></div>动于天地。未临庶政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370882_comment'></div>蹈履成规。恢王者华夷之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370882_comment'></div>顺上帝乃眷之怀。臣等不胜哀迫诚恳之至。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　王叔文柄用凡五六月，其间颇多善政。宗元在京任礼部员外郎，为革新集团核心人物。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。撰文论“受命不于天于其人；休符不于祥于其仁”和“正德受命于生人之意”，批判“符命说”等神学迷信。作品：《贞符并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷1第29页，中华书局1979年版。《贞符》分正文及序两部分。据王国安《柳宗元诗笺释》第380页、吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第13页，此文始作于永贞元年，至元和三年谪居永州时定稿。）</span><div id='poem_40640' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_40640' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/40640?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贞符</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_40640")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_40640_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_40640'>负罪臣宗元惶恐言：臣所贬州流人吴武陵为臣言：『董仲舒对三代受命之符，诚然，非邪？』臣曰：『非也。何独仲舒尔？自司马相如、刘向、扬雄、班彪、彪子固，皆沿袭嗤嗤，推古瑞物以配受命。其言类淫巫瞽史，诳乱后代，不足以知圣人立极之本，显至德，扬大功，甚失厥趣。』臣为尚书郎时，尝著贞符，言唐家正德受命于生人之意，累积厚久，宜享年无极之义，本末闳阔。会贬逐中辍，不克备究。武陵即叩首邀臣（武陵即叩头邀臣）：『此大事，不宜以辱故休缺，使圣王之典不立，无以抑诡类，拔正道，表覈万代。』。臣不胜奋激，即具为书。念终泯没蛮夷，不闻于时，犹不为也；苟一明大道，施于人世，死无所憾，用是自决。臣宗元稽首拜手以闻，曰：『孰称古初，朴蒙空侗而无争，厥流以讹，越乃奋敚，斗怒振动，专肆为淫威。』曰：『是不知道。惟人之初，总总而生，林林而群。雪霜风雨雷雹暴其外，于是乃知架巢空穴，挽草木，取皮革；饥渴牝牡之欲驱其内，于是乃知噬禽兽，咀果谷，合偶而居。交焉而争，睽焉而斗。力大者搏，齿利者齧，爪刚者决，群众者轧，兵良者杀。披披藉藉，草野涂血。然后强有力者出而治之，往往为曹于险阻，用号令起，而君臣什伍之法立。德绍者嗣，道怠者夺。于是有圣人焉，曰黄帝，游其兵车，交贯乎其内，一统类，齐制量，然犹大公之道不克建，于是有圣人焉。曰尧，置州牧四岳，持而纲之，立有德有功有能者，参而维之，运臂率指，屈伸把握，莫不统率。尧年老，举圣人而禅焉，大公乃克建。由是观之，厥初罔匪极乱，而后稍可为也。而非德不树，故仲尼叙书，于尧曰：『克明俊德（克明峻德）。』；于舜曰：『浚哲文明。』；于禹曰：『文命祗承于帝。』；于汤曰：『克宽克仁，彰信兆民（章信兆民）。』；于武王曰：『有道曾孙。』。稽揆典誓，贞哉惟兹德，实受命之符，以奠永祀。后之妖淫嚚昏好怪之徒（后之妖淫嚣昏好怪之徒），乃始陈大电、大虹、玄鸟、巨迹、白狼、白鱼、流火之乌以为符。斯为诡谲阔诞，其可羞也，而莫知本于厥贞。汉用大度，克怀于有氓，登贤庸能（登能庸贤），濯痍煦寒，以瘳以熙，兹其为符也。而其妄臣乃下取虺蛇，上引天光，推类号休，用夸诬于无知之氓。增以驺虞神鼎，胁驱纵臾（胁驱纵踊），俾东之泰山、石闾，作大号，谓之封禅，皆《尚书》所无有。莽、述承效，卒奋骜逆。其后有贤帝曰光武，克绥天下，复承旧物，犹崇赤伏，以玷厥德。魏、晋而下，尨乱钓裂，厥符不贞，邦用不靖，亦罔克久，驳乎，无以议为也。积大乱至于隋氏，环四海以为鼎，跨九垠以为炉，爨以毒燎，煽以虐焰，其人沸涌灼烂，号呼腾蹈，莫有救止。于是大圣乃起，丕降霖雨，浚涤荡沃，蒸为清氛，疏为泠风。人皆漻然休然，相睎以生，相持以成，相弥以宁。琢斮屠剔膏流节离之祸不作，而人乃克完平舒愉，尸其饥肤，以达于夷途。焚坼抵掎奔走转徙之害不作（焚坼抵掎奔走转死之害不作），而人乃克鸠类集族，歌舞悦怿，用祗于元德。徒奋袒呼，犒迎义旅，欢动六合，至于麾下。大盗豪据，阻命遏德，义威殄戮，咸坠厥绪，无刘于虐。人乃并受休嘉，去隋氏，克归于唐，踯躅讴歌，灏灏和宁。帝庸威栗，惟人之为。敬奠厥赋，积藏于下，是谓丰国。乡为义廪，敛发谨饬，岁丁大侵，人以有年。简于厥刑，不残而惩，是谓严威。小属而支，大生而孥，恺悌祗敬，用底于理。凡其所欲，不谒而获；凡其所恶，不祈而息。四夷稽服，不作兵革，不竭货力。丕扬于后嗣，用垂于帝式。十圣济厥治（十圣济厥理），孝仁平宽，惟祖之则。泽久而逾深，仁增而益高。人之戴唐，永永无穷。是故受命不于天，于其人。休符不于祥，于其仁。惟人之仁，匪祥于天；匪祥于天，兹惟贞符哉！未有丧仁而久者也，未有恃祥而寿者也。商之王，以桑谷昌，以雉雊大，宋之君，以法星寿；郑以龙衰，鲁以麟弱，白雉亡汉，黄犀死莽，恶在其为符也？不胜唐德之代，光绍明浚，深鸿庞大，保人斯无疆。宜荐于郊庙，文之雅诗，祗告于德之休。帝曰：『谌哉！』。乃黜休祥之奏，究贞符之奥，思德之所未大，求仁之所未备，以极于邦治，以敬于人事。其诗曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_40640_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_40640'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_40640'>于穆<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作穆穆）</span>敬德，<span id='poem_sentence_10_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_40640'>子思孝父，易患于<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作丁）</span>已。<div id='poem_sentence_11_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_40640'>拱之戴之，神具尔宜。<div id='poem_sentence_12_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_40640'>神之曷依，宜仁<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作人）</span>之归。<div id='poem_sentence_15_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_40640'>濮沿于北，祝栗于南<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_40640'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_40640", 40640, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>幅员</span>西东，祗一乃心。<div id='poem_sentence_17_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_40640'>祝唐之纪，后天罔坠。<div id='poem_sentence_18_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_40640'>祝皇之寿，与地咸久。<div id='poem_sentence_19_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_40640'>俾弥亿万年，不震不危。<div id='poem_sentence_22_40640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_note_40640_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年3月</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。三月癸巳，顺宗立广陵郡王李淳为皇太子，改名李纯。宗元作表以贺。作品：《礼部贺立皇太子表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第951页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370888' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370888' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370888?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370888'>臣某等言。伏奉今月二十四日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370888_comment'></div>广陵郡王宜册为皇太子。改名某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370888_comment'></div>仍令所司择日备礼册命者。天序有奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370888_comment'></div>皇图载宁。臣某等诚庆诚贺顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370888_comment'></div>臣闻尚书载以贞之文。汉史传早建之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370888_comment'></div>不惟立爱。期在继明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370888_comment'></div>陛下奉率前规。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370888", 1370888, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>敷扬</span>盛典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370888_comment'></div>顾兹守器之重。爰正承华之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370888_comment'></div>尊义方之教。载锡嘉名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370888_comment'></div>崇建树之礼。式光典命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370888_comment'></div>以长而立。自符于慎择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370888_comment'></div>必子之选。遂合于至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370888_comment'></div>邦本不摇。王业弥固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370888_comment'></div>此皆宗社<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370888", 1370888, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>垂祉</span>。启佑皇心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370888_comment'></div>乾坤合谋。保安圣运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370888_comment'></div>足以播休气于四海。洽太和于万灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370888_comment'></div>食毛含齿。所同欢庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370888_comment'></div>臣等奉承制命。蹈舞周行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370888_comment'></div>踊跃之诚。倍百恒品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370888_comment'></div>无任庆忭感悦之至。谨奉表陈贺以闻。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370898'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370898_comment'></div>伏见今月日内出沧州所进白龙见图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370898_comment'></div>又出西内定礼池中青莲花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370898_comment'></div>并神龙寺前合欢莲子示百寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370898_comment'></div>二十三日又出盐州所进合欢黄瓜图者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370898_comment'></div>二气交泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370898_comment'></div>万国同和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370898_comment'></div>动植思协于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370898", 1370898, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>殊祥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370898_comment'></div>遐迩毕陈其嘉应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370898_comment'></div>披图桉牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370898_comment'></div>圣理彰明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370898_comment'></div>臣诚欢诚庆顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370898_comment'></div>伏以天地非远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370898_comment'></div>睿感必通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370898_comment'></div>叠瑞重祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370898_comment'></div>累集宫禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370898_comment'></div>池莲表异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370898_comment'></div>灵化非常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370898_comment'></div>敷彼青光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370898_comment'></div>徵佛书而尤绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370898_comment'></div>成其嘉实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370898_comment'></div>验祥经而甚稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370898_comment'></div>积庆旁流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370898_comment'></div>自中徂外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370898_comment'></div>遂使龙腾白质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370898_comment'></div>乘秋果应于金行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370898_comment'></div>瓜合黄中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370898_comment'></div>表圣更彰于土德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370898_comment'></div>远通边徼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370898_comment'></div>近出苑园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370898_comment'></div>合庆同欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370898_comment'></div>周于亿兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370898_comment'></div>况复邦畿之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370898_comment'></div>雨霁必时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370898_comment'></div>宿麦大穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370898_comment'></div>嘉谷滋茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370898_comment'></div>和风孕育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370898_comment'></div>灵气陶蒸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370898_comment'></div>是皆发自帝心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370898_comment'></div>达于天意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370898_comment'></div>周流升降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370898_comment'></div>成此岁功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370898_comment'></div>惠彼群生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370898_comment'></div>自为嘉瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370898_comment'></div>臣某深惟多幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370898_comment'></div>获遇斯时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370898_comment'></div>观灵贶之备臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370898_comment'></div>知人和之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370898", 1370898, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>溥洽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370898_comment'></div>无任庆忭跃蹈之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1370898_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。朝廷降旨宣示所进白鹊，以为祥瑞，宗元作表以贺。作品：《礼部贺白鹊表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第966页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370899' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370899' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370899?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370899'>臣某言。伏奉进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370899_comment'></div>宣示前件白鹊者。霜毛皎洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370899_comment'></div>玉羽鲜明。色实殊常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370899_comment'></div>性惟驯狎。臣闻圣王之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370899_comment'></div>无所不至。有感则应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370899_comment'></div>无幽不通。伏惟陛下恩沾动植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370899_comment'></div>仁洽飞翔。故得兹禽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370899_comment'></div>呈休效质。伏以白者正色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370899_comment'></div>实表金方。鹊以知来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370899_comment'></div>式彰寇服。用符归化之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370899_comment'></div>克耀太平之阶。臣职参禁垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370899_comment'></div>获睹嘉瑞。无任庆忭之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370899_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1370899_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。浙东观察使贾全进越州山阴县移凤乡百姓王献朝园内《产嘉瓜二实同蒂图》，宗元作表以贺。作品：《礼部贺嘉瓜表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第967页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370900' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370900' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370900?labeling=true' target='_blank'>礼部贺嘉瓜表</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370900")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370900_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370900'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370900'>臣某等今日内出浙东观察使贾全所进越州山阴移风乡产嘉瓜二实同蒂图示百寮者。宝祚惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370900_comment'></div>嘉瑞来应。式彰圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370900_comment'></div>克表天心。臣等诚庆诚贺顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370900_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下保合太和。缉熙黎庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370900_comment'></div>德馨上达。神化旁行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370900_comment'></div>嘉瓜发瑞。来自侯服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370900_comment'></div>质惟同蒂。见车书之永均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370900_comment'></div>地则移风。知化育之方始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370900_comment'></div>虽七月而食。豳土歌王业之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370900_comment'></div>五色称珍。东陵咏嘉宾之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370900_comment'></div>未闻感通若斯昭著者也。臣某等遭逢圣运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370900_comment'></div>亲仰珍图。忭跃之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370900_comment'></div>倍百恒品。无任庆悦之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370900_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1370900_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。徐州刺史张愔进《嘉瓜图》及白兔一只，陈、许等州观察使上官说进《许州连理棠树图》，宗元代京兆府作表以贺。作品：《京兆府贺嘉瓜白兔连理棠树等表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第962页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第109页系《京兆府贺嘉瓜白兔连理棠树等表》于贞元十九年,时宗元为蓝田县尉。）</span><div id='poem_1370896' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370896' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370896?labeling=true' target='_blank'>京兆府贺嘉瓜白兔连理棠树等表</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a
