class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370896'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370896'>臣某言。今月日中使王自宁出徐州刺史张愔所进嘉瓜图及白兔儿一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370896_comment'></div>并出陈许等州观察使上官说所进许州连理棠树图示百寮者。惟天眷命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370896_comment'></div>是降百祥。惟圣钦承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370896_comment'></div>用膺多福。臣某诚庆诚贺顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370896_comment'></div>臣伏以太和所蒸。至德斯应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370896_comment'></div>图物献瑞。周于远方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370896_comment'></div>神瓜合形。式表绵绵之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370896_comment'></div>异棠<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370896", 1370896, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>连质</span>。用彰韡韡之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370896_comment'></div>况金风发祥。白兔来扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370896_comment'></div>告有秋之嘉应。著成岁于神功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370896_comment'></div>杂遝纷纶。如山斯委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370896_comment'></div>人尽登于寿域。物咸畅于薰风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370896_comment'></div>况臣特感深恩。欣逢众瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370896_comment'></div>踊跃之至。倍万恒情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370896_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1370896_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。西内神龙寺前水渠内开合欢莲花，绘成《合欢莲花图》，由中使奉旨宣示百僚。宗元代京兆尹王权作表以贺。作品：《为王京兆贺嘉莲表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第968页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370901' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370901' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370901?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为王京兆贺嘉莲表</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370901")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370901_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370901'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370901'>臣某言。今日某时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370901_comment'></div>中使某奉宣圣旨。出西内神龙寺前水渠内合欢莲花图一轴示百寮者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370901_comment'></div>祥图焕开。异彩交映。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370901_comment'></div>赞天地之合德。表神人之同欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370901_comment'></div>臣某诚欢诚庆顿首顿首。伏惟皇帝陛下道协重华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370901_comment'></div>庆传种德。陶阴阳之粹美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370901_comment'></div>孕造化之精英。吉庆每见于天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370901_comment'></div>发祥必自于禁掖。是使双华擢秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370901_comment'></div>连蒂垂芳。香激大王之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370901_comment'></div>影耀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370901", 1370901, class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370901_comment'></div>神功允洽于大千。臣某获睹升平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370901_comment'></div>滥居荣宠。闻瑞应而称庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370901_comment'></div>仰缋事而增欢。无任忭蹈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370901", 1370901, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>喜跃</span>之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370901_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1370901_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。京兆府昭应等县夏苗旱损，宗元代京兆尹王权作状以奏。作品：《为京兆府昭应等九县诉夏苗旱损状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷39第1017页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370944")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370944_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370944'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370944'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370944_comment'></div>臣谬领京畿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370944_comment'></div>已逾两月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370944_comment'></div>政术无取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370944_comment'></div>诚恳莫申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370944_comment'></div>遂使雨泽愆时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370944_comment'></div>田苗微损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370944_comment'></div>夙夜兢惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370944_comment'></div>寝食靡遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370944_comment'></div>今长安二十四县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370944_comment'></div>并准常年例全徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370944_comment'></div>其昭应等九县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370944_comment'></div>臣各得状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370944_comment'></div>并令详审。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370944_comment'></div>各绝隐欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370944_comment'></div>谨具别状封进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370944_comment'></div>臣当府夏税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370944_comment'></div>通计约二十九万石以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370944_comment'></div>据所损矜免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370944_comment'></div>秪当三万石有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370944_comment'></div>恤人则深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370944_comment'></div>减数非广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370944_comment'></div>伏以圣慈宏贷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370944_comment'></div>悯念蒸黎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370944_comment'></div>臣忝职司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370944_comment'></div>不敢不奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370944_comment'></div>无任惭惧之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370944_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370944_comment'></div>伏听敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1370944_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年3月</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。春少雨，京兆尹王权奉旨，如月内无雨，即须祈祷。奉旨翌日即降甘露，宗元代作表以贺。作品：《为王京兆贺雨表五首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第970页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年5月</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。代户部侍郎王叔文作表，荐度支盐铁巡官李谅为谏官。作品：《为王户部荐李谅表》<span id='poem_sentence_1_1371269_comment'></div>祖某，皇晋陵郡司功参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371269_comment'></div>父某，皇右补阙翰林学士赠秘书少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371269_comment'></div>某州某县某乡某里陈京年若干状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371269_comment'></div>公姓陈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371269_comment'></div>自颍川来隶京兆万年冑贵里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371269_comment'></div>讳京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371269_comment'></div>既冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371269_comment'></div>字曰庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371269_comment'></div>复举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371269_comment'></div>为太子正字咸阳尉太常博士左补阙尚书膳部考功员外郎司封郎中给事中秘书少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371269_comment'></div>自考功以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371269_comment'></div>凡四命为集贤学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371269_comment'></div>德宗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371269", 1371269, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>登遐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371269_comment'></div>公病痼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371269_comment'></div>舆曳就位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371269_comment'></div>备哀敬之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371269_comment'></div>由是滋甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371269_comment'></div>遂以所居官致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371269_comment'></div>贞元二十一年四月二十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371269_comment'></div>终于安邑里妻党之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371269_comment'></div>无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371269_comment'></div>伯兄前监察御史珰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371269_comment'></div>仲兄前大理评事苌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371269_comment'></div>以公文行之大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371269_comment'></div>告于尝吏于公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371269_comment'></div>使辞而陈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371269_comment'></div>大历中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371269_comment'></div>公始来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371269_comment'></div>中书常舍人衮杨舍人炎读其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371269_comment'></div>惊以相视曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371269_comment'></div>子云之徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371269_comment'></div>常以兄之子妻公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371269_comment'></div>由是名闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371269_comment'></div>游太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371269_comment'></div>太原尹喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371269_comment'></div>重客至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371269_comment'></div>授馆致饩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371269_comment'></div>厚以泉布献焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371269_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371269_comment'></div>非是为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371269_comment'></div>某尝为北都赋未就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371269_comment'></div>愿即而就焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371269_comment'></div>其宫室城郭之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371269_comment'></div>河山之富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371269_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1371269", 1371269, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>关闬</span>之壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371269_comment'></div>与其土疆之所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371269_comment'></div>风俗之所安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371269_comment'></div>王业之所由兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371269_comment'></div>苟得闻而睹之足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371269_comment'></div>若曰受大利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371269_comment'></div>是以利来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371269_comment'></div>盖异前志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371269_comment'></div>吾不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371269_comment'></div>敢辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371269_comment'></div>遂逆大河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371269_comment'></div>踰北山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371269_comment'></div>徜徉而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371269_comment'></div>赋成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371269_comment'></div>果传天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371269_comment'></div>为咸阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371269_comment'></div>留府廷主文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371269_comment'></div>决大事得其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371269_comment'></div>为博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371269_comment'></div>举<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1371269", 1371269, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>疵礼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371269_comment'></div>修坠典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371269_comment'></div>合于大中者众焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371269_comment'></div>泾人作难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371269_comment'></div>公徒行以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371269_comment'></div>奔问官守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371269_comment'></div>段忠烈之死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371269_comment'></div>上议罢朝七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371269_comment'></div>宰相曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371269_comment'></div>不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371269_comment'></div>方居行宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371269_comment'></div>无以安天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371269_comment'></div>公进曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371269_comment'></div>是非宰相之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371269_comment'></div>天子褒大节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371269_comment'></div>哀大臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371269_comment'></div>天下所以安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371269_comment'></div>况其特异者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371269_comment'></div>上用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371269_comment'></div>其劳勤<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作勤劳）</span>侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371269_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1371269", 1371269, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>谋议</span>可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371269_comment'></div>时之所赖者大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371269_comment'></div>巡狩告至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371269_comment'></div>上行罪已之道焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371269_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371269_comment'></div>凡我执事之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371269_comment'></div>无所任罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371269_comment'></div>予惟不谨于理而有是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371269_comment'></div>将复前之为相者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371269_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371269_comment'></div>天子加惠群臣而引慝焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371269_comment'></div>德之厚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371269_comment'></div>而为相者复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371269_comment'></div>无以大警于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371269_comment'></div>且示天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371269_comment'></div>率其党争之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371269_comment'></div>上变于色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371269_comment'></div>在列者咸恟而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371269_comment'></div>公大呼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371269_comment'></div>赵需等勿退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371269_comment'></div>遂进而尽其辞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371269_comment'></div>不果复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371269_comment'></div>上迎访太后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371269_comment'></div>间数岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371269_comment'></div>外颇怠其礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371269_comment'></div>公密疏发之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371269_comment'></div>天子感悦焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371269_comment'></div>初礼部<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1371269", 1371269, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>试士</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371269_comment'></div>有与亲戚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371269_comment'></div>则附于考功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371269_comment'></div>莫不阴授其旨意而为进退者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371269_comment'></div>及公则否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371269_comment'></div>卓然有有司之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371269_comment'></div>不可犯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371269_comment'></div>太庙阙东向之礼且久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371269_comment'></div>公自为博士补阙尚书郎给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371269_comment'></div>凡二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371269_comment'></div>勤以为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371269_comment'></div>殷祭之不坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371269_comment'></div>繄公之忠恳是赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371269_comment'></div>故有赤绂银鱼之报焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371269_comment'></div>昭陵山峻而高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371269_comment'></div>寝宫在其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371269_comment'></div>内官惩其上下之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371269_comment'></div>挽汲之艰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371269_comment'></div>谒于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371269_comment'></div>请更之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371269_comment'></div>上下其议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371269_comment'></div>宰相承而讽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371269_comment'></div>召官属使如其请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371269_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371269_comment'></div>斯太宗之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371269_comment'></div>其俭足以为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371269_comment'></div>其严足以有奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371269_comment'></div>吾敢顾其私容而替之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371269_comment'></div>奏议不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371269_comment'></div>上又下其议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371269_comment'></div>凡是公者六七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371269_comment'></div>其馀皆曰更之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371269_comment'></div>上独断焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371269_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371269_comment'></div>京议得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371269_comment'></div>从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371269_comment'></div>在集贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371269_comment'></div>奏秘书官六员隶殿内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371269_comment'></div>而刊校益理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371269_comment'></div>纳资为胥而仕者罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371269_comment'></div>求遗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371269_comment'></div>凡增缮者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371269_comment'></div>乃作艺文新志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371269_comment'></div>制为之名曰贞元御府群书新录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371269_comment'></div>始御府有食本钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371269_comment'></div>月权其赢以为膳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371269_comment'></div>有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371269_comment'></div>则学士与校理官颁分之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371269_comment'></div>学士常受三倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371269_comment'></div>由公而杀其二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371269_comment'></div>书史之始至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371269_comment'></div>入礼币钱六十缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1371269_comment'></div>亦皆分焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371269_comment'></div>公悉致之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371269_comment'></div>以理府署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371269_comment'></div>作书閤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371269_comment'></div>广群官之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371269_comment'></div>不取于将作少府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371269_comment'></div>而用大足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371269_comment'></div>居门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1371269_comment'></div>简武官议典礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1371269_comment'></div>上以为能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1371269_comment'></div>益器之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1371269_comment'></div>与信臣议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1371269_comment'></div>且致相位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1371269_comment'></div>遇公有惑疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1371269_comment'></div>使视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1371269_comment'></div>疾甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1371269_comment'></div>不能知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1371269_comment'></div>遂不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1371269_comment'></div>用郑吏部高太常为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1371269_comment'></div>而以秘书命公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1371269_comment'></div>所以示优之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1371269_comment'></div>公有文章若干卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1371269_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_186_1371269", 1371269, "Clauses/190/Comments/0")'>深茂</span><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_187_1371269_comment'></div>而其诂训多尚书尔雅之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1371269_comment'></div>纪事朴实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1371269_comment'></div>不苟悦于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1371269_comment'></div>世得以传其稿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1371269_comment'></div>其学自圣人之书以至百家诸子之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1371269_comment'></div>推黄炎之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1371269_comment'></div>涉历代洎国朝之故实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1371269_comment'></div>钩引贯穿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1371269_comment'></div>举大苞小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1371269_comment'></div>若太仓之蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1371269_comment'></div>崇山之载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1371269_comment'></div>浩浩乎不可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1371269_comment'></div>岂杨子所谓仲尼驾说者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1371269_comment'></div>夫其忠烈之褒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1371269_comment'></div>相府之有诫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1371269_comment'></div>太庙之东向也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1371269_comment'></div>昭陵之不更其故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1371269_comment'></div>官守之不可夺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1371269_comment'></div>立言之不可诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1371269_comment'></div>利之不苟就也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1371269_comment'></div>害之不苟去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1371269_comment'></div>其忠类朱云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1371269_comment'></div>其孝类颍考叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1371269_comment'></div>廉类公仪休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1371269_comment'></div>而又文以文之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1371269_comment'></div>学以辅之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1371269_comment'></div>而天子以为之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1371269_comment'></div>既得其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1371269_comment'></div>又得其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1371269_comment'></div>而不为公卿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1371269_comment'></div>病也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1371269_comment'></div>故议者咸惜其始而哀其终焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1371269_comment'></div>公之丧凡五十四日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1371269_comment'></div>而夫人又没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1371269_comment'></div>毁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1371269_comment'></div>夫人之父曰偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1371269_comment'></div>司农卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1371269_comment'></div>祖曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1371269_comment'></div>赠太子太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1371269_comment'></div>宗元故集贤吏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1371269_comment'></div>得公之遗事于其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1371269_comment'></div>书而授公之友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1371269_comment'></div>以志公之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1371269_comment'></div>谨状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1371269_comment'></div>永贞元年八月五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1371269_comment'></div>尚书礼部员外郎柳宗元状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_233_1371269_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年8月6日</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。八月四日，顺宗禅位；五日，改元永贞；六日，贬王伾为开州司马、王叔文为渝州司户。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年8月9日</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。八月四日，顺宗禅位；五日，改元永贞；九日，宪宗即位于宣政殿。宗元依职掌拟定上尊号表。作品：《礼部为百官上尊号表二首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第931页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370875' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370875' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370875?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370875'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370875_comment'></div>伏以圣王之纂承天位也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370875_comment'></div>臣子必竭恳诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370875_comment'></div>献尊号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370875_comment'></div>安敢为佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370875_comment'></div>礼在其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370875_comment'></div>一则以告天地神祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370875_comment'></div>二则以奉宗庙社稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370875_comment'></div>三则以安华夏蛮貊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370875_comment'></div>巍巍大称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370875_comment'></div>其可废乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370875_comment'></div>臣等诚欢诚望顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370875_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下协周文之孝德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370875_comment'></div>齐大禹之约身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370875_comment'></div>宏帝尧之法天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370875_comment'></div>过殷汤之解网。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370875_comment'></div>未踰周月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370875_comment'></div>四海将致于时雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370875_comment'></div>甫及元正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370875_comment'></div>率土更欣于再造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370875_comment'></div>然神人之愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370875_comment'></div>亿兆之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370875_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370875", 1370875, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>祝嘏</span>无辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370875_comment'></div>凡百兢怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370875_comment'></div>华夷属望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370875_comment'></div>臣谨桉昔皋陶之颂舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370875_comment'></div>率由事实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370875_comment'></div>帝王尊号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370875_comment'></div>盖渐于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370875_comment'></div>皇家光被四表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370875_comment'></div>祖宗烈文。<div id='poem_sentence_48_1370875_comment'></div>元正戒期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370875_comment'></div>当品物惟新之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370875_comment'></div>乃皇王大礼之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370875_comment'></div>陛下郊天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370875_comment'></div>享宗祧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370875_comment'></div>阴阳协和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370875_comment'></div>动植交畅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370875_comment'></div>不建至尊之称。<div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370876'>臣某等言。臣等再陈丹悃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370876_comment'></div>谨献鸿名。天心未从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370876_comment'></div>陨越无措。臣某等诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370876_comment'></div>谨桉尧曰咨尔舜。舜曰格尔禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370876_comment'></div>汤曰吾甚武。自号曰武王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370876_comment'></div>则尧舜禹汤。皆当时王者之号也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370876_comment'></div>考皇帝之故实。徵往圣之宪章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370876_comment'></div>允协礼经。焕乎图牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370876_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下允恭克让。约巳谦尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370876_comment'></div>参天两地之功。为而不有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370876_comment'></div>安上理人之德。置而不论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370876_comment'></div>至哉王言。非群下所能仰望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370876_comment'></div>然臣等伏以为尊号者。所以类上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370876_comment'></div>飨祖宗。万人所称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370876_comment'></div>百蛮所仰。表圣德于率土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370876_comment'></div>播天声于无疆。臣下请之之谓礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370876_comment'></div>帝王承之之谓孝。孝大于让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370876_comment'></div>礼先于谦。百王不刊之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370876_comment'></div>安可得而废也。臣等又以春秋本于五始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370876_comment'></div>元者一岁之首。春者四时之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370876_comment'></div>王者受命之首。正月者政教之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370876_comment'></div>郊天大礼者立极之首。今天地交泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370876_comment'></div>俯临元辰。正始之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370876_comment'></div>正当其运。陛下确违群愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370876_comment'></div>固守谦冲。此臣等所以兢惕失图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370876_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370876", 1370876, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>恛惶</span>无措。上冒严宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370876_comment'></div>敢逃厚责。伏乞俯垂天听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370876_comment'></div>察纳微诚。诏礼官议臣所请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370876_comment'></div>揆日推礼。虔奉鸿休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370876_comment'></div>尽敬于此。犹恐天光未照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370876_comment'></div>三献无徵。彷徨阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370876_comment'></div>伏待斧锧。无任耸望之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370876_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1370876_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年8月</a>　在京任礼部员外郎。八月九日宪宗即位，宗元代京兆尹王权拟表以贺。作品：《为王京兆皇帝即位礼毕贺表》<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370890'>臣某等言。臣闻大人继明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370890_comment'></div>百神所以受职。天子有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370890_comment'></div>万国由是承风。伏以皇帝陛下缵圣垂休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370890_comment'></div>顺时御极。负扆而会朝夷夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370890_comment'></div>践祚而统和天人。幽明感通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370890_comment'></div>遐迩昭泰。遂使祥光下烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370890_comment'></div>嘉气旁通。周王谢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370890", 1370890, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>流火</span>之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370890_comment'></div>鲁史愧书云之典。食毛含齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370890_comment'></div>欢忭无穷。臣某等幸睹昌时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370890_comment'></div>获奉大庆。踊跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370890_comment'></div>倍万恒情。无任蹈舞欣跃之至。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年8月</a>　在京礼部员外郎。永贞革新失败前夕，为王叔文母刘氏撰墓志，借机赞扬王叔文之才德与功绩。作品：《故尚书户部侍郎王君先太夫人河间刘氏志文》<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371225'>夫人姓刘。其先汉河间王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371225_comment'></div>王有明德。世绍显懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371225_comment'></div>至于唐。有文昭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371225_comment'></div>为绵州刺史。号良二千石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371225_comment'></div>其嗣慎言。为仙居令光州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371225_comment'></div>克荷于前人。光州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371225_comment'></div>夫人之父也。夫人既笄五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371225_comment'></div>从于北海王府君讳某。府君举明经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371225_comment'></div>授任城尉左金吾卫兵曹。修经术以求圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371225_comment'></div>通古今以推<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371225", 1371225, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>一王</span>之典。会世多难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371225_comment'></div>不克如志。卒以隐终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371225_comment'></div>夫人生二子。长曰彝伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371225_comment'></div>举五经。早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371225_comment'></div>少曰叔文。坚明直亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371225_comment'></div>有文武之用。贞元中待诏禁中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371225_comment'></div>以道合于储后。凡十有八载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371225_comment'></div>献可替否。有匡弼调护之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371225_comment'></div>先帝弃万姓。嗣皇承大位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371225_comment'></div>公居禁中。吁谟定命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371225_comment'></div>有扶翼经纬之绩。由苏州司功参军为起居舍人翰林学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371225_comment'></div>将明出纳。有弥纶通变之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371225_comment'></div>副经邦阜财之职。加户部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371225_comment'></div>赐紫金鱼袋。重轻开塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371225_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371225", 1371225, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>和钧</span>肃给之效。内赞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371225", 1371225, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>谟画</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371225_comment'></div>不废其位。凡执事十四旬有六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371225_comment'></div>利安之道。将施于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371225_comment'></div>而夫人卒于堂。盖贞元之二十一年六月二十日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371225_comment'></div>知道之士。为苍生惜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371225_comment'></div>天子使中谒者临问其家。赙以布帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371225_comment'></div>呜呼。夫人之在女氏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371225_comment'></div>贞顺以自处。孝谨以有奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371225_comment'></div>其在夫族也。祗敬以承上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371225_comment'></div>严肃以莅下。事良人四十有九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371225_comment'></div>而勤劳不懈。生户部五十有三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371225_comment'></div>而教诫无阙。年七十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371225_comment'></div>而户部之道闻于天下。为大僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371225_comment'></div>垂紫绶。以就奉养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371225_comment'></div>公卿侯王。咸造于门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371225_comment'></div>既寿而昌。世用羡慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371225_comment'></div>然而天子有诏。俾定封邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371225_comment'></div>有司稽于论次。终以不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371225_comment'></div>时有痛焉。是年八月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371225_comment'></div>祔于兵曹府君之墓。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371225_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1371225'>夫人之德。温柔敬直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371225_comment'></div>承于阴教。式是嫔则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371225_comment'></div>克生良子。用扬懿美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371225_comment'></div>有其文武。宏我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1371225", 1371225, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>化理</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371225_comment'></div>天子是毗。邦人是望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371225_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1371225", 1371225, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>若若</span>紫绶。荣于高堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371225_comment'></div>惟昔孟氏。号为母师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371225_comment'></div>在汉称贤。有隽不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371225_comment'></div>懿懿夫人。惟其似之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371225_comment'></div>山北之里。神禾之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371225_comment'></div>问于灵龟。閟此显魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371225_comment'></div>勒石垂休。永永万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371225_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1371225_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。为儿时旧友虞九皋撰诔文。虞九皋，字鸣鹤。作品：《虞鸣鹤诔并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷11第284页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371277' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371277' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371277?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞鸣鹤诔</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371277")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371277_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371277'>维某年月日。前进士虞九皋字鸣鹤。终于长安亲仁里。既克葬于高阳原。二三友生皆至于墓。哀其行之不昭于世。追列遗懿。求诸后土。申荐嘉名。实曰恭甫。乃作诔曰。吴虞之分。爰宅大阳。其后优游。在越为乡。延诩辅汉。恢定封疆。东徙之贤。时惟仲翔。曰预曰喜。在晋克彰。义笃斯文。有苾其芳。秘书多能。垂耀于唐。洎于汉阳。世德以昌。毗赞尚父。休徽用扬。惟我先君。并时翱翔。洽主记室。蔚其耀光。实契伯仲。永永不忘。汉阳元子。实绍其美。传袭儒风。彪炳文史。克恭以孝。惟礼是履。誉洽于乡。论为秀士。百郡之选。丛于京师。昧没腾藉。乘淩蔽欺。生之始至。则奋其仪。退默以谦。人悦而随。名卿是挈。先进咸推。方出群类。振耀于时。祸丁舅氏。漂沦海沂。捧讣号呼。匍匐增悲。丧有幼主。礼或多遗。孰徇于名。而不是思。投袂就道。乘艰若夷。竭诚丧具。申敬裳帷。万里来复。祗祔于墓。遽不淩节。俭而有度。由其温恭。守以贞固。行道咨嗟。观礼兴慕。复从乡赋。焕发其华。克不再举。闻于邦家。倚闾千里。欢咏斯多。姻族盈门。载笑且歌。君之不淑。名立志阻。庆归其乡。身终逆旅。生死已间。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371277_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371277'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371277'>寿觞方举。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371277'>贺书在途。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371277'>委骨归土。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371277'>哀欢易地。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1371277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1371277'>思致其身。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1371277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1371277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1371277'>惟德之经。<div id='poem_sentence_34_1371277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1371277'>先民有作。<div id='poem_sentence_35_1371277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1371277'>今也是旌。<div id='poem_sentence_36_1371277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1371277'>呜呼恭甫。<div id='poem_sentence_37_1371277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1371277'>钦此嘉名。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1371277_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。撰文传记郭橐驼之事迹，由种树之道生发为官之道。作品：《种树郭橐驼传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷17第473页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371272' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371272' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371272?labeling=true' target='_blank'>种树郭橐驼传</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371272")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371272_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371272'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371272'>郭橐驼不知始自何名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371272_comment'></div>病偻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371272_comment'></div>癃然伏行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371272_comment'></div>有类橐驼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371272_comment'></div>故乡人号之驼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371272_comment'></div>驼闻之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371272_comment'></div>甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371272_comment'></div>名我固当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371272_comment'></div>因舍其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371272_comment'></div>亦自谓橐驼云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371272_comment'></div>其乡曰丰乐乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371272_comment'></div>在长安西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371272_comment'></div>驼业种树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371272_comment'></div>凡长安豪富人为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>观游</span>及卖果者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371272_comment'></div>皆争迎取养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371272_comment'></div>视驼所种树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371272_comment'></div>或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>移徙</span>无不活。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371272_comment'></div>且<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>硕茂</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>蚤实</span>以蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371272_comment'></div>他植者虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>窥伺</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>效慕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371272_comment'></div>莫能如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371272_comment'></div>有问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371272_comment'></div>对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371272_comment'></div>橐驼非能使木之寿且孳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371272_comment'></div>以能顺木之天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371272_comment'></div>以致其性焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371272_comment'></div>凡植木之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371272_comment'></div>其本欲舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371272_comment'></div>其培欲平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371272_comment'></div>其土欲故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371272_comment'></div>其筑欲密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371272_comment'></div>既然已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371272_comment'></div>勿动勿虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371272_comment'></div>去不复顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371272_comment'></div>其莳也若子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371272_comment'></div>其置也若弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371272_comment'></div>则其天者全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371272_comment'></div>而其性得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371272_comment'></div>故吾不害其长而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371272_comment'></div>非有能硕而茂之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371272_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>抑耗</span>其实而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371272_comment'></div>非有能蚤而蕃之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371272_comment'></div>他植者则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371272_comment'></div>根拳而土易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371272_comment'></div>其培之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371272_comment'></div>若不过焉则不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371272_comment'></div>苟有能反是者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371272_comment'></div>则又爱之太恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371272_comment'></div>忧之太勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371272_comment'></div>旦视而暮抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371272_comment'></div>已去而复顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371272_comment'></div>甚者爪其肤以验其生枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371272_comment'></div>摇其本以观其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>疏密</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371272_comment'></div>而木之性日以离矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371272_comment'></div>虽曰爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371272_comment'></div>其实害之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371272_comment'></div>虽曰忧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371272_comment'></div>其实雠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371272_comment'></div>故不我若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371272_comment'></div>吾又何能为矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371272_comment'></div>问者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371272_comment'></div>以子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371272_comment'></div>移之官理可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371272_comment'></div>驼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371272_comment'></div>我知种树而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371272_comment'></div>理非吾业也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371272_comment'></div>然吾居乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371272_comment'></div>见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>长人</span>者好烦其令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371272_comment'></div>若甚怜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371272_comment'></div>而卒以祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371272_comment'></div>旦暮吏来而呼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371272_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>官命</span>促尔耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371272_comment'></div>勖尔植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371272_comment'></div>督尔穫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371272_comment'></div>蚤缲而绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371272_comment'></div>蚤织而缕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371272_comment'></div>字而幼孩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371272_comment'></div>遂而鸡豚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371272_comment'></div>鸣鼓而聚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371272_comment'></div>击木而召之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371272_comment'></div>吾小人具飧餐以劳吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371272_comment'></div>且不得暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371272_comment'></div>又何以蕃吾生安吾性耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371272_comment'></div>故病且怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371272_comment'></div>若是则与吾业者其亦有类乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371272_comment'></div>问者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371272_comment'></div>嘻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371272_comment'></div>不亦善夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371272_comment'></div>吾问养树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371272_comment'></div>得养人术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371272_comment'></div>传其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371272_comment'></div>以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1371272", 1371272, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>官戒</span>也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_90_1371272_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。作文传记长安建筑工匠杨潜之事迹，借以发端，论为相之道。作品：《梓人传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷17第481页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371274' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371274' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371274?labeling=true' target='_blank'>梓人传</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371274")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371274_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371274'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371274'>裴封叔之第在光德里。有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>款其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371274_comment'></div>愿佣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>隙宇</span>而处焉。所职<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>寻引</span>规矩绳墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371274_comment'></div>家不居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>砻斲</span>之器。问其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371274_comment'></div>曰。吾善度材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371274_comment'></div>视栋宇之制。高深圆方短长之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371274_comment'></div>吾指使而群工役焉。舍我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371274_comment'></div>众莫能就一宇。故食于官府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371274_comment'></div>吾受禄三倍。作于私家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371274_comment'></div>吾收其直大半焉。他日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371274_comment'></div>入其室。其床阙足而不能理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371274_comment'></div>曰。将求他工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371274_comment'></div>余甚笑之。谓其无能而贪禄嗜货者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371274_comment'></div>其后京兆尹将饰官署。余往过焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371274_comment'></div>委群材。会<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>众工</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371274_comment'></div>或执斧斤。或执刀锯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371274_comment'></div>皆环立向之。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>左持引右执杖而中处焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371274_comment'></div>量栋宇之任。视木之能举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371274_comment'></div>挥其杖曰斧。彼执斧者奔而右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371274_comment'></div>顾而指曰锯。彼执锯者趋而左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371274_comment'></div>俄而斤者斲。刀者削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371274_comment'></div>皆视其色。俟其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371274_comment'></div>莫敢自断者。其不胜任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371274_comment'></div>怒而退之。亦莫敢愠焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371274_comment'></div>画宫于堵盈尺。而曲尽其制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371274_comment'></div>计其毫釐而构大厦。无进退焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371274_comment'></div>既成。书于上栋曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371274_comment'></div>某年某月某日某建。则其姓字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371274_comment'></div>凡执用之工不在列。余圜视大骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371274_comment'></div>然后知其术之工大矣。继而叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371274_comment'></div>彼将舍其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>手艺</span>。专其心智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371274_comment'></div>而能知体要者欤。吾闻劳心者役人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371274_comment'></div>劳力者役于人。彼其劳心者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371274_comment'></div>能者用而智者谋。彼其智者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371274_comment'></div>是足为佐天子相天下法矣。物莫近乎此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371274_comment'></div>彼为天下者本于人。其执役者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371274_comment'></div>为徒隶。为乡师里胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371274_comment'></div>其上为下士。又其上为中士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371274_comment'></div>为上士。又其上为大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371274_comment'></div>为卿为公。离而为六职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371274_comment'></div>判而为百役。外薄四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371274_comment'></div>有方伯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>连率</span>。郡有守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371274_comment'></div>邑有宰。皆有佐政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371274_comment'></div>其下有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>胥吏</span>。又其下皆有啬夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>版尹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371274_comment'></div>以就役焉。犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>众工</span>之各有执伎以食力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371274_comment'></div>彼佐天子相天下者。举而加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371274_comment'></div>指而使焉。条其纲纪而盈缩焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371274_comment'></div>齐其法制而整顿焉。犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>之有规矩绳墨以定制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371274_comment'></div>择天下之士。使称其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371274_comment'></div>居天下之人。使安其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371274_comment'></div>视都知野。视野知国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371274_comment'></div>视国知天下。其远迩细大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371274_comment'></div>可手据其图而究焉。犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>画宫于堵而绩于成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371274_comment'></div>能者进而由之。使无所德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371274_comment'></div>不能者退而休之。亦莫敢愠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371274_comment'></div>不衒能。不矜名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371274_comment'></div>不亲小劳。不侵众官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371274_comment'></div>日与天下之英才讨论其大经。犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>之善运<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/113/Comments/1")'>众工</span>而不伐艺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371274_comment'></div>夫然后相道得而万国理矣。相道既得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371274_comment'></div>万国既理。天下举首而望曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371274_comment'></div>吾相之功也。后之人循迹而慕曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371274_comment'></div>彼相之才也。士或谈殷周之理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371274_comment'></div>曰伊傅周召。其百执事之劳勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371274_comment'></div>而不得纪焉。犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>自名其功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371274_comment'></div>而执用者不列也。大哉相乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371274_comment'></div>通是道者。所谓相而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371274_comment'></div>其不知体要者反此。以恪勤为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371274_comment'></div>以簿书为尊。衒能矜名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371274_comment'></div>亲小劳。侵众官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371274_comment'></div>窃取六职百役之事。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>听听</span>于府庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371274_comment'></div>而遗其大者远者焉。所谓不通是道者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371274_comment'></div>犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>而不知绳墨之曲直。规矩之方圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371274_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>寻引</span>之短长。姑夺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/143/Comments/0")'>众工</span>之斧斤刀锯以佐其艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371274_comment'></div>又不能备其工。以至败绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371274_comment'></div>用而无所成也。不亦谬欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371274_comment'></div>或曰。彼主为室者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371274_comment'></div>傥或发其私智。牵制<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>之虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371274_comment'></div>夺其世守。而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>道谋</span>是用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371274_comment'></div>虽不能成功。岂其罪耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371274_comment'></div>亦在任之而已。余曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371274_comment'></div>不然。夫绳墨诚陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371274_comment'></div>规矩诚设。高者不可抑而下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371274_comment'></div>狭者不可张而广也。由我则固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371274_comment'></div>不由我则圮。彼将乐去固而就圮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371274_comment'></div>则卷其术。默其智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371274_comment'></div>悠尔而去。不屈吾道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371274_comment'></div>是诚良<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>耳。其或嗜其货利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371274_comment'></div>忍而不能舍也。丧其制量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371274_comment'></div>屈而不能守也。栋桡屋坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371274_comment'></div>则曰非我罪也。可乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371274_comment'></div>可乎哉。余谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/179/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>之道类于相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371274_comment'></div>故书而藏之。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/181/Comments/0")'>梓人</span>盖古之审曲面势者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371274_comment'></div>今谓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1371274", 1371274, "Clauses/182/Comments/0")'>都料匠</span>云。余所遇者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371274_comment'></div>杨氏。潜其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371274_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_93_1371274_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。为大理评事杨凌文集撰后序。作品：《杨评事文集后序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷21第578页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371029' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371029' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371029?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大理评事杨君文集后序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371029")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371029_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371029'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371029'>赞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371029_comment'></div>文之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371029_comment'></div>辞令褒贬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371029", 1371029, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>导扬</span>讽谕而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371029_comment'></div>虽其言鄙野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371029_comment'></div>足以备于用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371029_comment'></div>然而阙其文采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371029_comment'></div>固不足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371029", 1371029, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>竦动</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371029", 1371029, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>时听</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371029_comment'></div>夸示后学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371029_comment'></div>立言而朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371029_comment'></div>君子不由也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371029_comment'></div>故作者抱其根源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371029_comment'></div>而必由是假道焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371029_comment'></div>作于圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371029_comment'></div>故曰经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371029_comment'></div>述于才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371029_comment'></div>故曰文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371029_comment'></div>文有二道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371029_comment'></div>辞令褒贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371029_comment'></div>本乎著述者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371029_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371029", 1371029, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>导扬</span>讽谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371029_comment'></div>本乎比兴者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371029_comment'></div>著述者流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371029_comment'></div>盖出于书之谟训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371029_comment'></div>易之象系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371029_comment'></div>春秋之笔削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371029_comment'></div>其要在于高壮广厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371029_comment'></div>词正而理备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371029_comment'></div>谓宜藏于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371029", 1371029, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>简册</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371029_comment'></div>比兴者流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371029_comment'></div>盖出于虞夏之咏歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371029_comment'></div>殷周之风雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371029_comment'></div>其要在于丽则清越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371029_comment'></div>言畅而意美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371029_comment'></div>谓宜流于谣诵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371029_comment'></div>兹二者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371029_comment'></div>考其旨义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371029_comment'></div>乖离不合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371029_comment'></div>故秉笔之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371029_comment'></div>恒偏胜独得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371029_comment'></div>而罕有兼者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371029_comment'></div>厥有能而专美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371029_comment'></div>命之曰艺成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371029_comment'></div>虽古文雅之盛世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371029_comment'></div>不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371029", 1371029, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>并肩</span>而生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371029_comment'></div>唐兴以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371029_comment'></div>称是选而不怍者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371029_comment'></div>梓潼陈拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371029_comment'></div>其后燕文贞以著述之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371029_comment'></div>攻比兴而莫能极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371029_comment'></div>张曲江以比兴之隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371029_comment'></div>穷著述而不克备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371029_comment'></div>其馀各探一隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371029_comment'></div>相与背驰于道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371029_comment'></div>其去弥远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371029_comment'></div>文之难兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371029_comment'></div>斯亦甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371029_comment'></div>若杨君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371029_comment'></div>少以篇什著声于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371029_comment'></div>其炳耀尤异之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371029_comment'></div>讽诵于文人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371029_comment'></div>盈满于江湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371029_comment'></div>达于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371029_comment'></div>晚节遍悟文体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371029_comment'></div>尤邃叙述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371029_comment'></div>学富识远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371029_comment'></div>才涌未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371029_comment'></div>其雄杰老成之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371029_comment'></div>与时增加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371029_comment'></div>既获是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371029_comment'></div>不数年而夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371029_comment'></div>其季年所作尤善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371029_comment'></div>其为鄂州新城颂诸葛武侯传论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371029_comment'></div>饯送梓潼陈仲甫<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作众甫）</span>汝南周愿河东裴泰武都符义府泰山羊士谔陇西李谏<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作鍊）</span>凡六序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371029_comment'></div>庐山禅居记辞李常侍启远游赋七夕赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371029_comment'></div>皆人文之选已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371029_comment'></div>用是陪陈君之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371029_comment'></div>其可谓具体者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371029_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371029_comment'></div>公既悟文而疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371029_comment'></div>既即功而废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371029_comment'></div>废不逾年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371029_comment'></div>大病及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371029_comment'></div>卒不得穷其工竟其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371029_comment'></div>遗文未克流于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371029_comment'></div>休声未克充于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371029_comment'></div>凡我从事于文者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371029_comment'></div>所宜追惜而悼慕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371029_comment'></div>宗元以通家修好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371029_comment'></div>幼获省谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371029_comment'></div>故得奉公元兄命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371029_comment'></div>论次篇简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371029_comment'></div>遂述其制作之所诣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371029_comment'></div>以系于后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1371029_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。友独孤宓赴邠宁节度辟命任书记，宗元作序送之。作品：《送邠宁独孤书记赴辟命序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷22第590页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371034' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371034' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1371034'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371034'>仆间岁骤游<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371034", 1371034, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>邠疆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371034_comment'></div>今戎帅杨大夫时为候奄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371034_comment'></div>尽护群校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371034_comment'></div>用笞法箠令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371034_comment'></div>不吐强御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371034_comment'></div>下莫有逗挠淩暴而犯令者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371034_comment'></div>沈断壮勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371034_comment'></div>专志武力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371034_comment'></div>出麾下取主公之节钺而代之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371034_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371034", 1371034, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>鹖冠</span>者仰而荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371034_comment'></div>今又能旁贵文雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371034_comment'></div>以符召文士之秀者河南独孤宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371034_comment'></div>署为记室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371034_comment'></div>俾职文翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371034_comment'></div>岂滥也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371034_comment'></div>独孤生与仲兄实连举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371034_comment'></div>并时管记于汉中新平二连帅府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371034_comment'></div>俱以笔砚承荷旧德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371034_comment'></div>位未达而荣如贵仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371034_comment'></div>其难乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371034_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371034_comment'></div>自犬戎陷河右逼西鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371034_comment'></div>积兵备虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371034_comment'></div>县道告劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371034_comment'></div>内匮中府太仓之蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371034_comment'></div>仅而获餍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371034_comment'></div>投石而贾勇者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371034_comment'></div>思所以奋力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371034_comment'></div>论者以为天子且复河壖故疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371034_comment'></div>拓达西戎而罢诸侯之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371034_comment'></div>则曳裾戎幕之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371034_comment'></div>专弄文墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371034_comment'></div>为壮夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371034", 1371034, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>捧腹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371034_comment'></div>甚未可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371034_comment'></div>吾子历览古今之变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371034_comment'></div>而通其得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371034_comment'></div>是将植<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1371034", 1371034, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>密画</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1371034", 1371034, "Clauses/38/Comments/1")'>借箸</span>之宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371034_comment'></div>发群谋于章奏之笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371034_comment'></div>上为明天子论列熟计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371034_comment'></div>而导扬威命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371034_comment'></div>然后谈笑樽俎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371034_comment'></div>赋从军之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371034_comment'></div>移书飞文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371034_comment'></div>谕告西土劫胁之伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371034_comment'></div>俾其箪食壶浆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371034_comment'></div>犒迎王师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371034_comment'></div>在吾子而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371034_comment'></div>往慎辞令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371034_comment'></div>使谕蜀之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371034_comment'></div>燕然之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371034_comment'></div>炳烈于汉史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371034_comment'></div>真可慕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371034_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371034_comment'></div>是琐琐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371034_comment'></div>恶足置齿牙间而荣吾子哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1371034_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_1371036' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371036' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371036?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送宁国范明府诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371036")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371036_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371036'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371036'>近制凡得仕于王者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371036_comment'></div>岁登名于吏部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371036_comment'></div>兵<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作吏）</span>部则必参其等列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371036_comment'></div>分而合之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371036_comment'></div>率三十人以为曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371036_comment'></div>谓之甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371036_comment'></div>名书为三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371036_comment'></div>其一藏之有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371036_comment'></div>其二藏之中书洎门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371036_comment'></div>每大选置大考绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371036_comment'></div>必关决会验而视其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371036_comment'></div>有不合者下有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371036_comment'></div>罢去甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371036_comment'></div>由是吏得为奸以立威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371036_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371036", 1371036, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>贼知</span>以弄权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371036_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371036", 1371036, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>诡窃</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371036", 1371036, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>窜易</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371036_comment'></div>而莫示其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371036_comment'></div>必求端悫而习于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371036_comment'></div>辩达而勤其务者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371036_comment'></div>命之官而掌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371036_comment'></div>居三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371036_comment'></div>则又益其官而后去其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371036_comment'></div>有范氏传真者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371036_comment'></div>始来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371036_comment'></div>近臣多言其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371036_comment'></div>宰相闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371036_comment'></div>用以为是职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371036_comment'></div>在门下甚获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371036", 1371036, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>休问</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371036_comment'></div>初命京兆武功尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371036_comment'></div>既有成绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371036_comment'></div>复于有司。<div id='poem_sentence_32_1371036_comment'></div>由邦畿而调者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371036_comment'></div>命东西部尉以为美仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371036_comment'></div>范生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371036_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371036_comment'></div>夫仕之为美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371036_comment'></div>利乎人之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371036_comment'></div>与其给于供备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371036_comment'></div>孰若安于化导。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371036_comment'></div>故求发吾所学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371036_comment'></div>施于物而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371036_comment'></div>夫为吏者人役也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371036_comment'></div>役于人而食其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371036_comment'></div>可无报耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371036_comment'></div>今吾将致其慈爱礼节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371036_comment'></div>而去其欺伪淩暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371036_comment'></div>以惠斯人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371036_comment'></div>而后有其禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371036_comment'></div>庶可平吾心而不愧于色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371036_comment'></div>苟获是焉足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371036_comment'></div>季弟为殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371036_comment'></div>以是言也告于其寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371036_comment'></div>咸悦而尚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371036_comment'></div>故为诗以赠其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371036_comment'></div>而使予为序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1371036_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。好友独孤申叔侍亲往河东，宗元作序送之。作品：《送独孤申叔侍亲往河东序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷22第606页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371042' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371042' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371042?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送独孤申叔侍亲往河东序</a><span
