"poem_title_1371042")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371042_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371042'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371042'>河东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371042_comment'></div>古吾土也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371042_comment'></div>家世迁徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371042_comment'></div>莫能就绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371042_comment'></div>闻其间有大河<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371042", 1371042, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>条山</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371042_comment'></div>气盖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371042", 1371042, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>关左</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371042_comment'></div>文士往往仿佯临望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371042_comment'></div>坐得胜槩焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371042_comment'></div>吾固翘翘褰裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371042_comment'></div>奋怀旧都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371042_comment'></div>日以滋甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371042_comment'></div>独孤生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371042_comment'></div>周人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371042_comment'></div>往而先我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371042_comment'></div>且又爱慕文雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371042_comment'></div>甚达经要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371042_comment'></div>才与身长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371042_comment'></div>志益强力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371042_comment'></div>挟是而东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371042_comment'></div>夫岂徒往乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371042_comment'></div>温凊奉引之隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371042_comment'></div>必有美制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371042_comment'></div>傥飞以示我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371042_comment'></div>我将易观而待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371042_comment'></div>所不敢忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371042_comment'></div>古之序者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371042_comment'></div>期以申导志义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371042_comment'></div>不为富厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371042_comment'></div>而今也反是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371042_comment'></div>生至于晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371042_comment'></div>出吾斯文于笔砚之伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371042_comment'></div>其有评我太简者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371042_comment'></div>慎勿以知文许之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1371042_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。作序送豆卢膺秀才南游。作品：《送豆卢膺秀才南游序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷22第606页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371043' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371043' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371043?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送豆卢膺秀才南游诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371043")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371043_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371043'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371043'>君子病无乎内而饰乎外。有乎内而不饰乎外者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371043_comment'></div>无乎内而饰乎外。则是设覆为阱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371043_comment'></div>祸孰大焉。有乎内而不饰乎外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371043_comment'></div>则是焚梓毁璞也。诟孰甚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371043_comment'></div>于是有切磋琢磨镞砺栝羽之道。圣人以为重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371043_comment'></div>豆卢生。内之有者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371043_comment'></div>予是以好之。而欲其遂焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371043_comment'></div>而恒以幼孤羸馁为惧。恤恤焉游诸侯求给乎是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371043_comment'></div>是固所以有乎内者也。然而不克专志于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371043_comment'></div>饰乎外者未大。吾愿子以诗礼为冠履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371043_comment'></div>以春秋为襟带。以图史为佩服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371043_comment'></div>琅乎璆璜衡牙之响发焉。煌乎山龙华虫之采列焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371043_comment'></div>则揖让周旋乎宗庙朝廷。斯可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371043_comment'></div>惜乎予无禄食于世。不克称其欲成其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371043_comment'></div>而姑欲其速反也。故诗而序云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371043_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1371043_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。成德使府幕宾幸南容登第后归，宗元作序送之。作品：《送幸南容归使联句诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷22第596页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371037' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371037' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1371037'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371037'>昔汉室方盛。文章之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371037_comment'></div>合于京师。亦既充金马石渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371037_comment'></div>则又溢于诸侯。求达其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371037_comment'></div>故枚乘客于吴。相如游于梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371037_comment'></div>其或致书匡主。用极其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371037_comment'></div>节之大者也。适时观变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371037_comment'></div>以成其性。道之茂者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371037_comment'></div>渤海幸君。既登于太常之籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371037_comment'></div>又膺邯郸之召。北会元戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371037_comment'></div>直道自达。吾侪器其略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371037_comment'></div>南聘天朝。相礼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371037", 1371037, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>述职</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371037_comment'></div>公卿多其仪。合度于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371037", 1371037, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>易于</span>之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371037_comment'></div>虽枚生之节。长卿之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371037_comment'></div>无以尚也。冬十有二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371037_comment'></div>朝右礼备。复于辕门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371037_comment'></div>我同升之友。是用荣其趣舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371037_comment'></div>惜其离旷。卜兹良夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371037_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371037", 1371037, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>咏叹</span>其美。比词联韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371037_comment'></div>奇藻递发。烂若编贝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371037_comment'></div>粲如贯珠。琅琅清响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371037_comment'></div>交动左右。群公以侍御之往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371037_comment'></div>予阙其述。命系而序焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371037_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1371037_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。严公贶下第后归兴元觐省，宗元作序送之。作品：《送严公贶下第归兴元觐省诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第619页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371050' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371050' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371050?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送严公贶下第归兴元觐省诗序</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371050'>严氏之子有公贶者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371050_comment'></div>退自有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371050_comment'></div>踵门而告柳子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371050_comment'></div>吾献艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371050_comment'></div>不售于仪曹之贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371050_comment'></div>货不中度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371050_comment'></div>敢逃其咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371050_comment'></div>诘朝将行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371050_comment'></div>愿闻所以去我者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371050_comment'></div>其可乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371050_comment'></div>予谕之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371050_comment'></div>吾子以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371050", 1371050, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>冲退</span>之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371050_comment'></div>端其趋向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371050_comment'></div>以淬砺之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371050_comment'></div>修其文雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371050_comment'></div>行当承教戒于独立之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371050_comment'></div>浚发清源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371050_comment'></div>激扬洪音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371050_comment'></div>沛哉铿铿乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371050_comment'></div>充于四体之不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371050_comment'></div>吾何敢去子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371050_comment'></div>恭惟相国冯翊公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371050_comment'></div>有大勋力盈于旂常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371050_comment'></div>极人臣之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371050_comment'></div>分天子之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371050_comment'></div>殿邦坤隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371050_comment'></div>柄是文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371050_comment'></div>若子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371050_comment'></div>生而有黼缋粱肉之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371050_comment'></div>不知耕农之勤劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371050_comment'></div>物役之艰难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371050_comment'></div>趋其庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371050_comment'></div>有魏绛之金石焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371050_comment'></div>候其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371050_comment'></div>有亚夫之棨戟焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371050_comment'></div>中人处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371050_comment'></div>不能无傲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371050_comment'></div>而子之伯仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371050_comment'></div>皆脱略贵美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371050_comment'></div>服勤儒素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371050_comment'></div>退托于布衣韦带之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371050_comment'></div>如少习然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371050_comment'></div>故继登<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371050", 1371050, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>上科</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371050_comment'></div>以及于子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371050_comment'></div>是可举严氏之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371050_comment'></div>诵乎他门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371050_comment'></div>使有矜式也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371050_comment'></div>而吾子又引慝内讼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371050_comment'></div>撝谦如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371050_comment'></div>其何患乎贾之不售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371050_comment'></div>而自薄哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371050_comment'></div>于是文行之达若高阳齐据者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371050_comment'></div>偕赋命予序引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371050_comment'></div>予朴不晓文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371050_comment'></div>故书严子之嘉言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371050_comment'></div>编于右简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371050_comment'></div>窃褒贬之义以赠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1371050_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。元公瑾下第后东归，宗元作序送别。作品：《送元秀才下第东归序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第621页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371051' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371051' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371051?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送元秀才下第东归序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371051")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371051_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371051'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371051'>周乎志者。穷踬不能变其操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371051_comment'></div>周乎艺者。屈抑不能贬其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371051_comment'></div>其或处心定气。居斯二者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371051_comment'></div>虽有穷屈之患。则君子不患矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371051_comment'></div>元氏之子。其殆庶周乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371051_comment'></div>言恭而信。行端而静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371051_comment'></div>勇于讲学。急于进业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371051_comment'></div>既游京师。寓居侧陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371051_comment'></div>无使令之童。阙交易之财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371051_comment'></div>可谓穷踬矣。而操逾厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371051_comment'></div>志之周也。才浚而清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371051_comment'></div>词简而备。工于言理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371051_comment'></div>长于应卒。从计京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371051_comment'></div>受丙科之荐。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371051", 1371051, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>献艺</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371051", 1371051, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>春卿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371051_comment'></div>当三黜之辱。可谓屈抑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371051_comment'></div>而名益茂。艺之周也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371051_comment'></div>苟非处心定气。则曷能如此哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371051_comment'></div>予闻其欲退家殷墟。修志增艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371051_comment'></div>惧其沈郁伤气。怀愤而不达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371051_comment'></div>乃往送而谕焉。夫有湛卢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371051", 1371051, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>豪曹</span>之器者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371051_comment'></div>患不得犀兕而剸之。不患其不利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371051_comment'></div>今子有其器。宣其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371051_comment'></div>乘其时。夫何患焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371051_comment'></div>磨砺而坐待之可也。遂欣欣而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371051_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1371051_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。蔡秀才五就乡举而不获，下第后回南归觐，宗元作序送之。作品：《送蔡秀才下第归觐序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第626页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371054' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371054' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371054?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送蔡秀才下第归觐序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371054")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371054_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371054'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371054'>仆之始贡于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371054_comment'></div>蓍者卦之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371054_comment'></div>是所谓望之未睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371054_comment'></div>隐而未见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371054_comment'></div>矘乎远而有荣者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371054_comment'></div>今兹岁在鹑首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371054_comment'></div>若合于寿星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371054_comment'></div>其果合乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371054_comment'></div>仆时悒然迟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371054_comment'></div>谓其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371054", 1371054, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>诞慢</span>怪迂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371054_comment'></div>是将不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371054_comment'></div>然而仅寘于怀耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371054_comment'></div>未克决而忘之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371054_comment'></div>后果依违<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371054", 1371054, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>迁就</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371054_comment'></div>四进而获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371054_comment'></div>卒如其言云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371054_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371054_comment'></div>彼莫莫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371054_comment'></div>其有宰于人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371054_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371054_comment'></div>何其应前定若是之章明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371054_comment'></div>今蔡君驰声耀誉闻于公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371054_comment'></div>战艺之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371054_comment'></div>推为先登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371054_comment'></div>而五就乡举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371054_comment'></div>往则见罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371054_comment'></div>意者前定之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371054_comment'></div>殆未及欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371054_comment'></div>故君子之居易俟命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371054_comment'></div>乐天不忧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371054_comment'></div>果于自是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371054_comment'></div>君其励文学焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371054_comment'></div>丈人牧人南邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371054_comment'></div>君展觐承颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371054_comment'></div>婆娑愉乐之暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371054_comment'></div>则充其经笥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371054_comment'></div>茂是文苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371054_comment'></div>时焉逃哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371054_comment'></div>迟速之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371054_comment'></div>则瞽史之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371054_comment'></div>吾不及知。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1371054_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。韦中立三就进士而不选，宗元赠序送之。作品：《送韦七秀才下第求益友序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第628页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371055' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371055' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371055?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送韦七秀才下第求益友序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371055")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371055_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371055'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371055'>所谓先声后实者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371055_comment'></div>岂唯兵用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371055_comment'></div>虽士亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371055_comment'></div>若今由州郡抵有司求进士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371055_comment'></div>岁数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371055_comment'></div>咸多为文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371055_comment'></div>道今语古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371055_comment'></div>角夸丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371055_comment'></div>务富厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371055_comment'></div>有司一朝而受者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371055_comment'></div>几千万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371055_comment'></div>读不能十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371055_comment'></div>即偃仰疲耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371055_comment'></div>目眩而不欲视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371055_comment'></div>心废而不欲营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371055_comment'></div>如此而曰吾能不遗士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371055_comment'></div>伪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371055_comment'></div>唯声先焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371055_comment'></div>读至其文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371055_comment'></div>心目必专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371055_comment'></div>以故少不胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371055_comment'></div>京兆韦中立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371055_comment'></div>其文懿且高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371055_comment'></div>其行愿以恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371055_comment'></div>试其艺益工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371055_comment'></div>久与居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371055_comment'></div>益见其贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371055_comment'></div>然而进三年连不胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371055_comment'></div>是岂拙于为声者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371055_comment'></div>或以韦生之不胜为有司罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371055_comment'></div>予曰非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371055_comment'></div>谷梁子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371055_comment'></div>心志既通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371055_comment'></div>而名誉不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371055_comment'></div>友之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371055_comment'></div>名誉既闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371055_comment'></div>而有司不以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371055_comment'></div>有司之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371055_comment'></div>人之视听有所止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371055_comment'></div>神志有所不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371055_comment'></div>古之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371055_comment'></div>名誉未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371055_comment'></div>不以罪有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371055_comment'></div>而况今乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371055_comment'></div>今韦生乐植乎内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371055_comment'></div>而不欲扬乎外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371055_comment'></div>其志非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371055_comment'></div>孔子不避名誉以致其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371055_comment'></div>今韦生仗其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371055_comment'></div>简其友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371055_comment'></div>思自得于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371055_comment'></div>抑非古人之道欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371055_comment'></div>将行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371055_comment'></div>予为之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371055_comment'></div>既以迁其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371055_comment'></div>又以移其友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371055_comment'></div>且使惑者知释有司也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1371055_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。友辛殆庶因高名被恶，在科场八年不就，遂告归长沙。宗元深为不平，赠序送之。作品：《送辛生下第序略》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第629页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371056' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371056' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371056?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送辛生下第序略</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371056")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371056_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371056'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371056'>自命乡论士之制坏而不复。士莫有就绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371056_comment'></div>故丛于京师。京兆尹岁贡秀才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371056_comment'></div>常与百郡相抗。登贤能之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371056_comment'></div>或半天下。取其殊尤以为举首者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371056_comment'></div>仍岁皆上第。过而就黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371056_comment'></div>时谓怪事。有司或不问能否而成就之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371056_comment'></div>中书高舍人。备位于礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371056_comment'></div>攘袂矫枉。痛抑华耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371056_comment'></div>首京师之贡者。再岁连黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371056_comment'></div>辛生以是不在议甲乙伍中。其沈没阨困之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371056_comment'></div>閤户塞窦而得荣名者。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371056", 1371056, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>连畛</span>而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371056_comment'></div>谈者果以至公称焉。其能否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371056_comment'></div>世莫知也。若辛生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371056_comment'></div>其文简而有制。其行直而无犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371056_comment'></div>向使不闻于公卿。不扬于交游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371056_comment'></div>又不为京师贡首。则其甲乙可曲肱而有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371056_comment'></div>呜呼。名之果为不祥也有是夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371056_comment'></div>既受退。告归长沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371056_comment'></div>以辛生之文行。八年无就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371056_comment'></div>如其初而退返。吾甚愤焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371056_comment'></div>孟子曰。位卑而言高者罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371056_comment'></div>于辛生又不能已。故略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371056_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1371056_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。从兄称自淮阳抵京就选，下第东归，临行向其索诗。宗元赋诗五十七首，并作序列于其左。作品：《送从兄称罢选归江淮诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷24第631页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371057' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371057' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371057?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送从兄称罢选归江淮诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371057")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371057_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371057'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371057'>伯氏自淮阳从调。抵于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371057_comment'></div>冬十月。牒计不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371057_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371057", 1371057, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>摄衽</span>而退。顾谓宗元曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371057_comment'></div>昔吾祖士师。生于衰周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371057_comment'></div>与道同波。为世仪表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371057_comment'></div>故直道而仕。三黜不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371057_comment'></div>孔子称之。遗佚而不怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371057_comment'></div>厄穷而不悯。孟子赞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371057_comment'></div>今吾遑遑末路。寡偶希合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371057_comment'></div>进不知向。退不知守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371057_comment'></div>所不敢折其志。戚其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371057_comment'></div>遵祖训也。然而阙滫瀡之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371057_comment'></div>乏庾釜之畜。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371057", 1371057, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>逼迸</span>无成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371057_comment'></div>东辕淮湖。虽欲脱细故于胸中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371057_comment'></div>味道腴于舌端。勉修厥志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371057_comment'></div>惧不恒久。子当慰我穷局之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371057_comment'></div>袪我行役之愤。博之以文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371057_comment'></div>发于咏歌。吾非子之望将谁望焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371057_comment'></div>宗元再拜曰。夫闻善不慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371057_comment'></div>与聋瞆同。见善不敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371057_comment'></div>与昏瞽同。知善不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371057_comment'></div>与嚚瘖同。则闻之先达久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371057_comment'></div>矧吾兄有柔儒之茂质。恢旷之宏量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371057_comment'></div>敢不<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作无）</span>敬乎。有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371057", 1371057, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>述祖</span>之美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371057_comment'></div>安道之贞节。敢无慕乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371057_comment'></div>睹徽容而敬。闻嘉话而慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371057_comment'></div>敢无言乎。言不称德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371057_comment'></div>文不尽志。适为累而巳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371057_comment'></div>于是赋而序之。继其声者列于左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371057_comment'></div>凡五十七首。遂命从侄立编为后序终焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371057_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1371057_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。吴人凌士燮京师为官十二年，欲归不得，遂按乡俗构蓬室而居。群公题诗其壁，宗元序之。作品：《凌助教蓬屋题诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第651页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371066' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371066' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371066?labeling=true' target='_blank'>淩助教蓬屋题诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371066")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371066_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371066'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371066'>儒有蓬户瓮牖而自立者。河间淩士燮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371066_comment'></div>穷讨六籍。皆有著述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371066_comment'></div>而尤邃春秋。为儒官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371066_comment'></div>守道端庄。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371066", 1371066, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>植志</span>不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371066_comment'></div>在京师十二年。家本吴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371066_comment'></div>欲归而不可得。遂构蓬室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371066_comment'></div>以备揖让之位。栋宇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371066", 1371066, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>简易</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371066_comment'></div>仅除风雨。盖大江之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371066_comment'></div>其旧俗也。由是不出环堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371066_comment'></div>坐入吴甸。包山震泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371066_comment'></div>若在牖外。所谓求仁而得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371066_comment'></div>斯固然欤。与夫南音越吟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371066_comment'></div>慕望而不获者。异日道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371066_comment'></div>夫厚人伦。怀旧俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371066_comment'></div>固六义之本。群公是以有发德之什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371066_comment'></div>书在屋壁。予叙而引之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371066_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1371066_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。韩丰将游淮湖，群公于城外设宴饯别，各有饯诗，宗元作序。作品：《送韩丰群公诗后序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第652页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371067' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371067' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371067?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送韩丰群公诗后序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1371067'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371067'>春秋时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371067_comment'></div>晋有叔向者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371067_comment'></div>垂声迈烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371067_comment'></div>显白当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371067_comment'></div>而其兄铜鞮伯华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371067_comment'></div>匿德<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371067", 1371067, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>藏光</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371067_comment'></div>退居保和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371067_comment'></div>士大夫其不与叔向游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371067_comment'></div>罕知伯华矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371067_comment'></div>然仲尼称叔向曰遗直由义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371067_comment'></div>又称伯华曰多闻内植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371067_comment'></div>进退两尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371067_comment'></div>荣于策书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371067_comment'></div>故羊舌氏之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371067_comment'></div>至于今不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371067_comment'></div>宗元常与韩安平遇于上京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371067_comment'></div>追用古道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371067_comment'></div>交于今世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371067_comment'></div>以是知吾兄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371067_comment'></div>兄字茂实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371067_comment'></div>敦朴而知变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371067_comment'></div>宏和而守节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371067_comment'></div>温淳重厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371067_comment'></div>与直道为伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371067_comment'></div>尝又著书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371067_comment'></div>言礼家之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371067_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371067", 1371067, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>条综</span>古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371067_comment'></div>大备制量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371067_comment'></div>遗名居实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371067_comment'></div>澹泊如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371067_comment'></div>他日当为达者称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371067_comment'></div>在吾侪乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371067_comment'></div>则韩氏之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371067_comment'></div>亦将焜耀于后矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371067_comment'></div>今将浮游淮湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371067_comment'></div>观艺诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371067_comment'></div>凡知兄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371067_comment'></div>咸出祖于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371067_comment'></div>天水赵佶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371067_comment'></div>秉翰序事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371067_comment'></div>殷勤宣备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371067_comment'></div>词旨甚当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371067_comment'></div>予谓春秋之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371067_comment'></div>或始事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371067_comment'></div>或终义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371067_comment'></div>大易之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371067_comment'></div>序卦处末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371067_comment'></div>然则后序之设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371067_comment'></div>不为非经也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371067_comment'></div>于是编其饯诗若干篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371067_comment'></div>纪于末简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371067_comment'></div>以贶行李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371067_comment'></div>遂抗手而别。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1371067_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。文畅上人将游河朔礼佛五台，宗元与吏部尚书顾少连、兵部侍郎韩皋等赋诗作序送别。作品：《送文畅上人登五台遂游河朔序》<span href='/Writing/1371075?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送文畅上人登五台遂游河朔序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_1371075_comment'></div>晋宋以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371075_comment'></div>有道林道安远法师休上人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371075_comment'></div>其所与游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371075_comment'></div>则谢安石王逸少习凿齿谢灵运鲍昭之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371075_comment'></div>皆时之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371075_comment'></div>由是真乘法印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371075_comment'></div>与儒典并用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371075_comment'></div>而人知向方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371075_comment'></div>今有释文畅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371075_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371075", 1371075, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>道源</span>生知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371075_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371075", 1371075, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>善根</span>宿植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371075_comment'></div>深嗜法语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371075_comment'></div>忘甘露之味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371075_comment'></div>服道江表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371075_comment'></div>盖三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371075_comment'></div>谓王城雄都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371075_comment'></div>宜有大士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371075_comment'></div>遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371075", 1371075, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>蹑虚</span>而西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371075_comment'></div>驱锡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371075", 1371075, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>逾纪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371075_comment'></div>而秦人蒙利者益众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371075_comment'></div>云代之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371075_comment'></div>有灵山焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371075_comment'></div>与竺乾鹫岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371075_comment'></div>角立相望。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1371075_comment'></div>如在步武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371075_comment'></div>则勤求秘宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371075_comment'></div>作礼大圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371075_comment'></div>非此地莫可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371075_comment'></div>故又舍筏西土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371075_comment'></div>振尘朔陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371075_comment'></div>将欲与文殊不二之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371075_comment'></div>脱去秽累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371075_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371075", 1371075, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>超诣</span>觉路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371075_comment'></div>吾徒不得而留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371075_comment'></div>天官顾公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371075_comment'></div>夏官韩公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371075_comment'></div>廷尉郑公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371075_comment'></div>吏部郎中杨公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371075_comment'></div>有安石之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371075_comment'></div>逸少之高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371075_comment'></div>凿齿之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371075_comment'></div>皆厚于上人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371075_comment'></div>而袭其道风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371075_comment'></div>伫立瞻望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371075_comment'></div>惧往而不返也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371075_comment'></div>吾辈常希灵运明远之文雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371075_comment'></div>故诗而序之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371075_comment'></div>又从而谕之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371075_comment'></div>今燕魏赵代之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371075_comment'></div>天子分命重臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371075_comment'></div>典司方岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371075_comment'></div>辟用文儒之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371075_comment'></div>以缘饰政令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371075_comment'></div>服勤圣人之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371075_comment'></div>尊礼浮屠之事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371075_comment'></div>比比有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371075_comment'></div>上人之往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371075_comment'></div>将统合儒释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371075_comment'></div>宣涤疑滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371075_comment'></div>然后蔑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1371075", 1371075, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>衣裓</span>之赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371075_comment'></div>委财施之会不顾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371075_comment'></div>其来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371075_comment'></div>盍亦徵其歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371075_comment'></div>以焜耀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1371075", 1371075, id='poem_sentence_69_1371075_comment'></div>庶欲窃观风之职而知郑志耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1371075_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。浚上人东归淮南省侍双亲，右司员外郎刘公等以诗送行，宗元作序。作品：《送浚上人归淮南觐省序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第683页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371082' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371082' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371082?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送浚上人归淮南觐省序</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371082")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371082_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371082'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371082'>金仙氏之道。盖本于孝敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371082_comment'></div>而后积以众德。归于空无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371082_comment'></div>其敷演教戒于中国者。离为异门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371082_comment'></div>曰禅曰法曰律。以诱掖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371082", 1371082, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>迷浊</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371082_comment'></div>世用宗奉。其有修整观行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371082_comment'></div>尊严法容。以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371082", 1371082, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>仪范</span>于后学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371082_comment'></div>以为持律之宗焉。上人穷讨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371082", 1371082, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>秘义</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371082_comment'></div>发明上乘。奉威仪三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371082_comment'></div>虽造次必备。尝以此道宣于江湖之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371082_comment'></div>江湖之人悦其风而受其赐。攀慈航望彼岸者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371082_comment'></div>盖千百计。天子闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371082_comment'></div>徵至阙下。御大明秘殿以问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371082_comment'></div>导扬本教。颇甚称旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371082_comment'></div>京师士众。方且翘然仰大云之泽以植德本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371082_comment'></div>而上人不胜顾复之恩。退怀省侍之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371082_comment'></div>恳迫上乞。遂无以夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371082_comment'></div>由是杖锡东顾。振衣晨征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371082_comment'></div>右司员外郎刘公。深明世典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371082_comment'></div>通达释教。与上人为方外游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371082_comment'></div>始荣其至。今惜其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371082_comment'></div>于是合郎署之友。诗以贶之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371082_comment'></div>退使孺子执简而序之。因系其辞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371082_comment'></div>上人专于律行。恒久弥固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371082_comment'></div>其仪刑后学者欤。诲于生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371082_comment'></div>触类蒙福。其积众德者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371082_comment'></div>觐于高堂。视远如迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371082_comment'></div>其本孝敬者欤。若然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371082_comment'></div>是将心归空无。舍筏登地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371082_comment'></div>固何从而识之乎。古之赠礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371082_comment'></div>必以轻先重。故郑商之犒先乘韦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371082_comment'></div>鲁侯之赠后吴鼎。今饯诗之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371082_comment'></div>皆众吴鼎也。故乘韦之比得序而先之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371082_comment'></div>且曰由礼。而不敢让焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371082_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1371082_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。贡士沈起赠阅所著文五十篇，宗元作书答之。作品：《答贡士沈起书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷33第860页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370986' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370986' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370986?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答贡士沈起书</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370986")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370986_comment'></div>沈侯足下无恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370986_comment'></div>苍头至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370986_comment'></div>得所来问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370986_comment'></div>志气盈牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370986_comment'></div>博我以风赋比兴之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370986_comment'></div>仆之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370986", 1370986, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>朴騃</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370986", 1370986, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>专鲁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370986_comment'></div>而当惠施钟期之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370986_comment'></div>深自恧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370986_comment'></div>又览所著文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370986_comment'></div>宏博中正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370986_comment'></div>富我以琳琅圭璧之宝甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370986_comment'></div>仆之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370986", 1370986, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>狭陋</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370986", 1370986, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>蚩鄙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370986_comment'></div>而膺东阿昭明之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370986_comment'></div>又自惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370986_comment'></div>乌可取识者欢笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370986_comment'></div>以为知己羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370986_comment'></div>进越高视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370986_comment'></div>仆所不敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370986_comment'></div>然特枉将命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370986_comment'></div>猥承厚贶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370986_comment'></div>岂得固拒雅志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370986_comment'></div>默默而已哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370986_comment'></div>谨以所示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370986_comment'></div>布露于闻人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370986_comment'></div>罗列乎坐隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370986_comment'></div>使识者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370986", 1370986, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>动目</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370986_comment'></div>闻者倾耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370986_comment'></div>几于万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370986_comment'></div>用以为报也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370986_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370986_comment'></div>仆常病兴寄之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370986_comment'></div>堙郁于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370986_comment'></div>辞有枝叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370986_comment'></div>荡而成风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370986_comment'></div>益用慨然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370986_comment'></div>间岁兴化里萧氏之庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370986_comment'></div>睹足下咏怀五篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370986_comment'></div>仆乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370986", 1370986, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>拊掌</span>惬心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370986_comment'></div>吟玩为娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370986_comment'></div>告之能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370986_comment'></div>诚亦响应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370986_comment'></div>今乃有五十篇之赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370986_comment'></div>其数相什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370986_comment'></div>其功相百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370986_comment'></div>览者叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370986_comment'></div>谓予知文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370986_comment'></div>此又足下之赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370986_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370986_comment'></div>勉懋厥志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370986_comment'></div>以取荣盛时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370986_comment'></div>若夫古今相变之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370986_comment'></div>质文相生之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370986_comment'></div>高下丰约之所自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370986_comment'></div>长短大小之所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370986_comment'></div>子之言云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370986_comment'></div>又何讯焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370986_comment'></div>来使告遽。<div id='poem_sentence_62_1370986_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。元公瑾有文行而不能荐于有司，诉于宗元，宗元作文论仕进，以答之。作品：《答贡士元公瑾论仕进书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第874页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370989' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370989' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370989?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答贡士元公瑾论仕进书</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370989'>二十八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370989_comment'></div>宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370989_comment'></div>前时所枉文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370989_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370989", 1370989, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>讽读</span>累日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370989_comment'></div>辱致来简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370989_comment'></div>受赐无量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370989_comment'></div>然窃观足下所以殷勤其文旨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370989_comment'></div>岂非深寡和之愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370989_comment'></div>积无徒之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370989_comment'></div>怀不能已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370989_comment'></div>赴诉于仆乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370989_comment'></div>如仆尚何为者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370989_comment'></div>且士之求售于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370989_comment'></div>或以文进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370989_comment'></div>或以行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370989_comment'></div>达者称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370989_comment'></div>不患无成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370989_comment'></div>足下之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370989_comment'></div>左冯翊崔公先唱之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370989_comment'></div>秉笔之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370989_comment'></div>由是增敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370989_comment'></div>足下之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370989_comment'></div>汝南周颖客又先唱之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370989_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370989", 1370989, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>逢掖</span>之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370989_comment'></div>亦以加慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370989_comment'></div>夫如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370989_comment'></div>致隆隆之誉不久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370989_comment'></div>又何戚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370989_comment'></div>古之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370989_comment'></div>上延乎下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370989_comment'></div>下信乎上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370989_comment'></div>上下洽通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370989_comment'></div>而荐能之功行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370989_comment'></div>故天子得宜为天子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370989_comment'></div>荐之于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370989_comment'></div>诸侯得宜为诸侯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370989_comment'></div>荐之于王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370989_comment'></div>大夫得宜为大夫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370989_comment'></div>荐之于君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370989_comment'></div>士得宜为士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370989_comment'></div>荐于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370989_comment'></div>荐于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370989_comment'></div>尧舜是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370989_comment'></div>荐于王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370989_comment'></div>周公之徒是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370989_comment'></div>荐于君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370989_comment'></div>鲍叔牙子罕子皮是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370989_comment'></div>荐于有司而专其美者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370989_comment'></div>则仆未之闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370989_comment'></div>是诚难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370989_comment'></div>古犹难之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370989_comment'></div>而况今乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370989_comment'></div>独不得与足下偕生中古之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370989_comment'></div>进相援也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370989_comment'></div>退相拯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370989_comment'></div>已乃出乎今世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370989_comment'></div>虽王林国韩长孺复生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370989_comment'></div>不能为足下抗手而进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370989_comment'></div>以取僇笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370989_comment'></div>矧仆之龌龊者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370989_comment'></div>若将致仆于奔走先后之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370989_comment'></div>而役使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370989_comment'></div>则勉充雅素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370989_comment'></div>不敢告惫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370989_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370989_comment'></div>始仆之志学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370989_comment'></div>甚自尊大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370989_comment'></div>颇慕古之大有为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370989_comment'></div>汨没至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370989_comment'></div>自视缺然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370989_comment'></div>知其不盈素望久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370989_comment'></div>上之不能交诚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370989_comment'></div>达德行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370989_comment'></div>延孔子之光烛于后来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370989_comment'></div>次之未能励<span id='poem_sentence_75_1370989_comment'></div>致大康于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370989_comment'></div>垂不灭之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370989_comment'></div>退乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1370989", 1370989, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>伥伥</span>于下列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370989_comment'></div>呫呫于末位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370989_comment'></div>偃仰骄矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370989_comment'></div>道人短长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370989_comment'></div>不亦冒先圣之诛乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370989_comment'></div>固吾不得已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370989_comment'></div>树势使然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370989_comment'></div>谷梁子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370989_comment'></div>心志既通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370989_comment'></div>而名誉不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370989_comment'></div>友之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370989_comment'></div>盖举知扬善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370989_comment'></div>圣人不非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370989_comment'></div>况足下有文行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370989_comment'></div>唱之者有其人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370989_comment'></div>继其声者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370989_comment'></div>吾敢阙焉。<div id='poem_sentence_96_1370989_comment'></div>不悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370989_comment'></div>宗元白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1370989_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370994_comment'></div>退迹野庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370994_comment'></div>块守蒙陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370994_comment'></div>坐自拥塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370994_comment'></div>不意足下曲见记忆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370994_comment'></div>远辱书讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370994_comment'></div>贶以高文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370994_comment'></div>开其知思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370994_comment'></div>而又超仆以宗师之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370994_comment'></div>贷仆以邱山之号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370994_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370994", 1370994, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>流汗</span>伏地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370994_comment'></div>不知逃匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370994_comment'></div>幸过厚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370994_comment'></div>前时获足下灌钟城铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370994_comment'></div>窃用唱导于闻人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370994_comment'></div>仆常赧然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370994_comment'></div>羞其僭踰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370994_comment'></div>今览足下尺牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370994_comment'></div>殷勤备厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370994_comment'></div>似欲仆赞誉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370994_comment'></div>此固所愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370994_comment'></div>详视所贶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370994_comment'></div>旷然以喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370994_comment'></div>是何旨趣之博大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370994_comment'></div>词采之蔚然乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370994_comment'></div>鼓行于秀造之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370994_comment'></div>此其戈矛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370994_comment'></div>举以见投。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370994_comment'></div>为赐甚大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370994_comment'></div>俯用忖度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370994_comment'></div>不自谓宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370994_comment'></div>顾视何德而克堪哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370994_comment'></div>且又教以耘其芜秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370994_comment'></div>甚非所宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370994_comment'></div>仆不敢闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370994_comment'></div>其他唯命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370994_comment'></div>宗元白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1370994_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。代樊左丞作表陈让尚书左丞一职。作品：《为樊左丞让官表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷38第984页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370911' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370911' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370911?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为樊左丞让官表</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370911")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370911_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370911'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370911'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370911_comment'></div>伏奉今月二十八日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370911_comment'></div>除臣尚书左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370911_comment'></div>宠命俯临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370911_comment'></div>惭颜自失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370911_comment'></div>泛大鲸之海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370911_comment'></div>但觉魂摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370911_comment'></div>戴巨鳌之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370911_comment'></div>未如恩重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370911_comment'></div>臣闻尚书百揆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370911_comment'></div>翊亮万机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370911_comment'></div>故天上尊北斗中枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370911_comment'></div>陛下有南宫左辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370911_comment'></div>晋升孔坦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370911_comment'></div>谅直当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370911_comment'></div>汉拜杨乔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370911_comment'></div>闲练故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370911_comment'></div>庶得百僚有惮于会府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370911_comment'></div>诸侯取法于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370911_comment'></div>臣实謏才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370911_comment'></div>谬登清贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370911_comment'></div>握兰起草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370911_comment'></div>昔紊朝经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370911_comment'></div>剖竹颁条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370911_comment'></div>近贻人瘼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370911_comment'></div>备历中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370911_comment'></div>无闻声彩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370911_comment'></div>版图载缉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370911_comment'></div>贡赋未均于九州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370911_comment'></div>铜印更操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370911_comment'></div>威仪不检于三署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370911_comment'></div>次郎补缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370911_comment'></div>岂易其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370911_comment'></div>圣主求才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370911_comment'></div>宜难此受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370911_comment'></div>窃谓旁求俊乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370911_comment'></div>侧访瑰奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370911_comment'></div>必使德合准绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370911_comment'></div>言成纲纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370911_comment'></div>兴化致理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370911_comment'></div>时无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370911_comment'></div>况安上必在于荐贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370911_comment'></div>危身莫踰于旷职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370911_comment'></div>傥蒙垂收<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370911", 1370911, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>紫涣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370911_comment'></div>俯矜丹诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370911_comment'></div>愚臣保陈力之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370911_comment'></div>圣鉴有责成之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370911_comment'></div>无任腼冒惶悚之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370911_comment'></div>谨诣朝堂奉表陈让以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370911_comment'></div>臣所让人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370911_comment'></div>别状封进。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1370911_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。刘某除同州刺史，上表谢恩，宗元代作。作品：《为刘同州谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷38第995页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370920' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370920' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370920?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为刘同州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370920")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370920_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370920'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370920'>臣某言。伏奉某月日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370920_comment'></div>除臣同州刺史兼本州防御营田长春宫使。某月日到州上任讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370920_comment'></div>臣初奉纶言。震忭无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370920_comment'></div>及临所部。惊惧逾深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370920_comment'></div>投躯莫报于乾坤。陈力无裨于造化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370920_comment'></div>臣某诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。臣出自诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370920_comment'></div>不习为吏。有恇懦之质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370920_comment'></div>无区处之能。托迹儒门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370920_comment'></div>乏仲弓南面之德。委身郎署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370920_comment'></div>阙冯唐论将之对。常惧叨冒清列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370920_comment'></div>芜秽圣朝。岂意天听忽临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370920_comment'></div>鸿恩荐及。八命作牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370920_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370920", 1370920, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>一麾出守</span>。拔自下位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370920_comment'></div>寄之雄藩。非臣庸琐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370920_comment'></div>所宜膺据。况冯翊密迩王都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370920_comment'></div>古称三辅。爰自近代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370920_comment'></div>命秩逾崇。有兵食之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370920_comment'></div>有宫室之制。皆公卿将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370920_comment'></div>出入由之。仰徵甲令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370920_comment'></div>俯窥图记。跼蹐无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370920_comment'></div>以兢以惶。恩重命轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370920_comment'></div>不知所效。庶当刻精<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370920", 1370920, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>运力</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370920_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370920", 1370920, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>夙夜</span>祗勤。上奉雍熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370920_comment'></div>旁流恺悌。以日系月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370920_comment'></div>傥或有成。庶几之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370920_comment'></div>懔懔增惕。徒望云而就日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370920_comment'></div>喜近帝乡。将击壤以成风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370920_comment'></div>共歌尧代。天威咫尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370920_comment'></div>敢布丹诚。无任悃恳屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370920_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1370920_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　在长安。作赋。作品：《记里鼓赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集卷上第1337页，中华书局1979年版。在长安作,确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370874' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370874' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370874?labeling=true' target='_blank'>记里鼓赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（以圣人立制智者研精为韵）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370874")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370874_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370874'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370874'>异哉鼓之设也。恢制度于天邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370874_comment'></div>佐大礼于时行即行。赞盛容而立之斯立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370874_comment'></div>观其象可以守威仪之三千。节其音可以表吉行之五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370874_comment'></div>配和鸾以入用。并司南而为急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370874_comment'></div>若乃郊荐之仪既陈。封禅之礼攸执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370874_comment'></div>经千里而分寸可候。度四方而礼容是集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370874_comment'></div>施五击于华山之野。知雾气巳笼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370874_comment'></div>用百发乎南山之阳。识雷声所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370874_comment'></div>先圣有作。后王式遵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370874_comment'></div>启元机以求旧。运巧智而攸新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370874_comment'></div>相彼良工。自殊昧道之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370874_comment'></div>眷兹木偶。应异迷途之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370874_comment'></div>齐步武而无佚。差远近而有伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370874_comment'></div>遵大路罔愆乎礼典。听希声克正于时巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370874_comment'></div>虽道有环回。地分险易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370874_comment'></div>固善应而莫失。谅知几而有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370874_comment'></div>载考载击。所辨于长亭短亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370874_comment'></div>匪疾匪徐。足分乎有智无智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370874_comment'></div>观其妙矣。孰测其微细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370874_comment'></div>观其徼矣。讵知其启闭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370874_comment'></div>音不衰而得度。响其镗而有制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370874_comment'></div>于以翊龙御。于以引天旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370874_comment'></div>异铜浑之仪。亦可叙紫微之星次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370874_comment'></div>殊玉漏之制。而能步黄道之日躔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370874_comment'></div>周物之智斯设。极深之机是研。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370874_comment'></div>鄙繁音之坎坎。陋促节之阗阗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370874_comment'></div>妙出人谋。思由神假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370874_comment'></div>时然后击。赞赏典于今兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370874_comment'></div>动惟其常。契同文于古者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370874_comment'></div>由是皇衢以正。帝道斯盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370874_comment'></div>恭出震以成威。膺御乾而启圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370874_comment'></div>我后得以昭文物。展声明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370874_comment'></div>不愆于素。可举而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370874_comment'></div>宜乎骋墨妙。呈笔精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370874_comment'></div>固敢先三雅而献赋。庶将开万国之颂声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370874_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1370874_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年9月13日</a>　九月十三日，坐交王叔文，自礼部员外郎贬韶州刺史。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='add7795224594e42987feed4ef876482_label'><a "poem_title_40566")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_40566_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_40566'><span id='poem_content_40566'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_40566'>贞一来时送彩笺，一行归雁慰<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3380, "poem_sentence_0_40566")'>惊弦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_40566_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_40566'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_40566", 40566, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>翰林</span>寂寞谁为主，鸣凤应须早上天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_40566_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_40566'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_40566_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_40739' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_40739' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/40739?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_40739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_40739'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_40739_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年3月</a>　三月，再贬柳州刺史。时刘禹锡授播州刺史，宗元以播州远，刘禹锡有老母奉养，力请互易。适裴度为刘禹锡请移近处，改授连州，乃罢。<br /></div>
-----end
