-----title
长沙
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='db9911aea1164ba496bfde10c2eae073_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("db9911aea1164ba496bfde10c2eae073");'><span id='db9911aea1164ba496bfde10c2eae073_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=785&endYear=785')">785年</a>，13岁</div><div id='db9911aea1164ba496bfde10c2eae073' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=785&endYear=785')">785年</a>　南游长沙，与德公别。后有《长沙驿前南楼感旧》诗怀旧。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='9220f3326a154f6eacf2803a659880f9_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9220f3326a154f6eacf2803a659880f9");'><span id='9220f3326a154f6eacf2803a659880f9_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>，33岁</div><div id='9220f3326a154f6eacf2803a659880f9' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　谪永途中过潭州，奉岳父杨凭之命，为东池盛景及戴简所筑的戴氏祠堂撰记文。作品：《潭州杨中丞作东池戴氏堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷27第723页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371095' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371095' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371095?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潭州杨中丞作东池戴氏堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371095")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371095_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371095'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371095'>宏农公刺潭三年。因东泉为池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371095_comment'></div>环之九里。邱陵林麓距其涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371095_comment'></div>坻岛渚洲交其中。其岸之突而出者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371095_comment'></div>水萦之若玦焉。池之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371095_comment'></div>于是为最。公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371095_comment'></div>是非离世乐道者不宜有此。卒授宾客之选者谯国戴氏曰简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371095_comment'></div>为堂而居之。堂成而胜益奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371095_comment'></div>望之若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371095", 1371095, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>连舻</span>縻舰。与波上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371095_comment'></div>就之颠倒万物。辽廓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371095", 1371095, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>眇忽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371095_comment'></div>树之松柏杉槠。被之菱芡芙渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371095_comment'></div>郁然而阴。粲然而荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371095_comment'></div>凡观望浮游之美。专于戴氏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371095_comment'></div>戴氏尝以文行累为连率所宾礼。贡之泽宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371095_comment'></div>而志不愿仕。与人交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371095_comment'></div>取其退让。受诸侯之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371095_comment'></div>不以自大。其离世欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371095_comment'></div>好孔氏书。旁及庄文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371095_comment'></div>莫不总统。以至虚为极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371095_comment'></div>得受益之道。其乐道欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371095_comment'></div>贤者之举也必以类。当宏农公之选而专兹地之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371095_comment'></div>岂易而得哉。地虽胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371095_comment'></div>得人焉而居之。则山若增而高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371095_comment'></div>水若辟而广。堂不待饰而已奂矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371095_comment'></div>戴氏以泉池为宅居。以云物为朋徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371095_comment'></div>摅幽发粹。日与之娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371095_comment'></div>则行宜益高。文宜益峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371095_comment'></div>道宜益懋。交相赞者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371095_comment'></div>既硕其内。又扬于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371095_comment'></div>吾惧其离世之志不果矣。君子谓宏农公刺潭得其政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371095_comment'></div>为东池得其胜。授之得其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371095_comment'></div>岂非动而时中者欤。于戴氏堂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371095_comment'></div>见公之德。不可以不记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371095_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1371095_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='610633461d9a4e289ce3e4de4cdd0214_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("610633461d9a4e289ce3e4de4cdd0214");'><span id='610633461d9a4e289ce3e4de4cdd0214_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>，43岁</div><div id='610633461d9a4e289ce3e4de4cdd0214' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　赴柳途中，至长沙驿，追忆少时与德公在此作别，感旧作诗。作品：《长沙驿前南楼感旧》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷42第1164页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_40558' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_40558' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/40558?labeling=true' target='_blank'>长沙驿前南楼感旧<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注，昔于德公别于此。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_40558")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_40558_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_40558'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_40558'>海鹤一为别，存亡三十秋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_40558_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_40558'>今来数行泪，独上驿南楼。<div 九江（浔阳）

-----title
彬县（新平）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8c18808b07d24079beba6f63c0301cf1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8c18808b07d24079beba6f63c0301cf1");'><span id='8c18808b07d24079beba6f63c0301cf1_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>　居邠州，王纬、王纾、王绍兄弟慕名自南徐执文来会，宗元为序。作品：《王氏伯仲唱和诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷21第583页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》附录《柳宗元年表》认为柳宗元时居长安，守父丧，《王氏伯仲唱和诗序》亦作于长安。）</span><div id='poem_1371031' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371031' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371031?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王氏伯仲唱和诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（795年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371031")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371031_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371031'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371031'>仆闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371031_comment'></div>世其家业不陨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371031_comment'></div>虽古犹乏<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作今）</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371031_comment'></div>求之于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371031_comment'></div>而有获焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371031_comment'></div>王氏子某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371031_comment'></div>与予通家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371031_comment'></div>代为文儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371031_comment'></div>自先天以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371031_comment'></div>策名闻达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371031_comment'></div>秉毫翰而践文昌登禁掖者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371031_comment'></div>纷纶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371031", 1371031, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>华耀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371031_comment'></div>继武而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371031_comment'></div>士大夫掉鞅于文囿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371031_comment'></div>咸不得攀而伦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371031_comment'></div>乙亥岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371031_comment'></div>某自南徐来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371031_comment'></div>执文贶予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371031_comment'></div>词有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371031", 1371031, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>远致</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371031_comment'></div>又著论非班超不能读<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作续）</span>父兄之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371031_comment'></div>而乃徼狂疾之功以为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371031_comment'></div>吾知其奉儒素之道专矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371031_comment'></div>间以兄弟嗣来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371031_comment'></div>会于旧里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371031_comment'></div>若璩玚在魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371031_comment'></div>机云入洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371031_comment'></div>由是正声迭奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371031_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371031", 1371031, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>雅引</span>更和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371031_comment'></div>播埙篪之音韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371031_comment'></div>调律吕之气候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371031_comment'></div>穆然清风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371031_comment'></div>发在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371031", 1371031, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>简素</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371031_comment'></div>非文章之冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371031_comment'></div>曷能及兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371031_comment'></div>况宗兄握炳然之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371031_comment'></div>以赞关石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371031_comment'></div>廌冠银章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371031_comment'></div>荣映江湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371031_comment'></div>则向时之美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371031_comment'></div>必复其始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371031_comment'></div>某也谓予传卜氏之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371031_comment'></div>宜叙于首章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371031_comment'></div>操斧于班郢之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371031_comment'></div>斯强颜耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371031_comment'></div>诗凡若干首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1371031_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　正月，叔父卒，宗元自邠州持丧归京。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
蓝田
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='95c427e8d08d4850ba09ed592d29053c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("95c427e8d08d4850ba09ed592d29053c");'><span id='95c427e8d08d4850ba09ed592d29053c_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　自集贤殿书院正字调蓝田尉。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　在蓝田尉任。为姑母、渭南县尉陈苌之妻撰墓志。作品：《亡姑陈君夫人墓志》<div id='poem_1371259' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371259' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371259?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亡姑渭南县尉陈君夫人权厝志</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371259")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371259_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371259'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371259'>唐贞元十七年九月六日甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371259_comment'></div>前渭南县尉颍川陈君之夫人河东柳氏终于平康里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371259_comment'></div>将终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371259_comment'></div>告于陈君曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371259_comment'></div>吾生四十有四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371259_comment'></div>为陈氏介妇九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371259_comment'></div>谨饬不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371259_comment'></div>以至此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371259_comment'></div>命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371259_comment'></div>既成妇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371259_comment'></div>宜祔于皇姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371259_comment'></div>从兆于三原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371259_comment'></div>然而不幸中道而有痼疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371259_comment'></div>既不及养于舅姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371259_comment'></div>又不得佐于蒸尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371259_comment'></div>生君之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371259_comment'></div>不期月而殒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371259_comment'></div>尝谓君宜有贵位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371259_comment'></div>而不克见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371259_comment'></div>执亲之丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371259_comment'></div>不得终纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371259_comment'></div>皆天谴之大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371259_comment'></div>且愿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371259", 1371259, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>杀礼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371259_comment'></div>以成吾私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371259_comment'></div>迩先夫人之墓而窆我焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371259_comment'></div>将俟君之不讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371259_comment'></div>而归复于正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371259_comment'></div>其可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371259_comment'></div>陈君乃卜十二月十八日权厝于城南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371259_comment'></div>原曰栖凤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371259_comment'></div>如夫人之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371259_comment'></div>且以时日甲子授于宗元曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371259_comment'></div>子之姑孝于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371259_comment'></div>移于我之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371259_comment'></div>睦于族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371259_comment'></div>施于我之党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371259_comment'></div>是用宾而礼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371259_comment'></div>如益者之友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371259_comment'></div>今则去我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371259_comment'></div>已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371259_comment'></div>吾无以报焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371259_comment'></div>他日尝谓子悫而文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371259_comment'></div>愿以为志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371259_comment'></div>庶幸而有知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371259_comment'></div>将安子之为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371259_comment'></div>苌无恨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371259_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371259_comment'></div>贵不必贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371259_comment'></div>寿不必仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371259_comment'></div>天之不可恃也久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371259_comment'></div>遂哭而受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371259_comment'></div>书夫人之世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371259_comment'></div>以记于兹石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371259_comment'></div>夫人六代祖讳庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371259_comment'></div>五代祖讳旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371259_comment'></div>位皆至宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371259_comment'></div>高祖讳楷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371259_comment'></div>为济州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371259_comment'></div>曾祖讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371259_comment'></div>为徐州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371259_comment'></div>祖讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371259_comment'></div>为清池令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371259_comment'></div>考讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371259_comment'></div>为临邛令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371259_comment'></div>妣李氏。<div id='poem_sentence_66_1371259_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　在蓝田尉任。伯姊适崔简者卒，宗元撰墓志。作品：《亡姊崔氏夫人墓志盖石文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷13第334页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371262' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371262' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371262?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亡姊崔氏夫人墓志盖石文</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371262")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371262_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371262'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371262'>我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371262", 1371262, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>伯姊</span>之葬。良人博陵崔氏为之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371262_comment'></div>凡归于夫家为妇为妻为母之道。我之知不若崔之悉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371262_comment'></div>然而自笄而上以至于幼孩。崔固不若我之知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371262_comment'></div>又乌可以已。今之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371262_comment'></div>凡志于墓者。琢密石加盖于其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371262_comment'></div>用敢附<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371262", 1371262, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>碑阴</span>之义。假兹石而书焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371262_comment'></div>呜呼夫人。天命之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371262_comment'></div>固有以异于人。孩而声和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371262_comment'></div>幼而气柔。以吾族之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371262_comment'></div>尊长之多。夫人自能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371262_comment'></div>而未尝误举其讳。与其类戏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371262_comment'></div>游弄之具未尝有争。先公自鄂如京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371262_comment'></div>其时事会世难。教告罕至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371262_comment'></div>夫人忧劳踰月。默泣不食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371262_comment'></div>又惧贻太夫人之忧虑。绐以疾告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371262_comment'></div>书至而愈。人乃知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371262_comment'></div>善隶书。为雅琴以自娱乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371262_comment'></div>隐而不耀。工足以致美于服而不为异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371262_comment'></div>言足以发扬于礼而不为辩。孝之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371262_comment'></div>敬之备。仁之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371262_comment'></div>又以配君子。然而不克会于贵寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371262_comment'></div>以至于斯。孰谓之天有知者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371262_comment'></div>太夫人生二女。幼曰裴氏妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371262_comment'></div>如夫人之懿。在二族咸以令德闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371262_comment'></div>而皆早世。其弟昏愚而独存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371262_comment'></div>孰谓天可问耶。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371262_comment'></div>痛其甚欤。遂濡血以书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371262_comment'></div>志终天之哀。与兹石永久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371262_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1371262_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　在蓝田尉任。七月十九日，南岳高僧承远圆寂，时人为其建寺庙，德宗赐名“弥陀寺”。宗元应约撰碑铭。作品：《南岳弥陀和尚碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷6第152页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371208?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南岳弥陀和尚碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371208")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371208_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371208'>在代宗时。有僧法照为国师。乃言其师南岳大长老有异德。天子南向而礼焉。度其道不可徵。乃名其居曰般舟道场。用尊其位。公始居山西南岩石之下。人遗之食则食。不遗。则食土泥。茹草木。其取衣类是。南极海裔。北自幽都来求厥道。或值之崖谷。羸形垢面。躬负薪槱。以为仆役而媟之。乃公也。凡化人。立中道而教之权。俾得以疾至。故示专念。书涂巷。刻溪谷。丕勤诱掖。以援于下。不求而道备。不言而物成。人皆负布帛。斩木石。委之岩户。不拒不营。祠宇既具。以洎于德宗。申诏褒立。是为弥陀寺。施之馀则与饿疾者。不尸其功。公始学成都唐公。次资川诜公。诜公学于东山忍公。皆有道。至荆州。进学玉泉真公。真公授公以衡山。俾为教魁。人从而化者以万计。初法照居庐山。由正定趣安乐国。见蒙恶衣侍佛者。佛告曰。此衡山承远也。出而求之。肖焉。乃从而学。传教天下。由公之训。公为僧凡五十六年。其寿九十一。贞元十八年七月十九日。终于寺。葬于寺之南冈。刻石于寺大门之右。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371208'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371208'>一气回薄茫无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371208_comment'></div>其上无初下无终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371208_comment'></div>离而为合蔽而通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371208_comment'></div>始末或异今焉同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371208_comment'></div>虚无混冥道乃融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371208_comment'></div>圣袖无迹示教功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371208_comment'></div>公之率众峻以容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371208_comment'></div>公之立诚教其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371208_comment'></div>服庇草木蔽穹隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371208_comment'></div>仰攀俯取食以充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371208_comment'></div>形游无极交大雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371208_comment'></div>天子稽首师顺风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371208_comment'></div>四方奔走云之从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371208_comment'></div>经始寻尺成灵宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371208_comment'></div>始自蜀道至临洪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371208_comment'></div>咨谋往复穷真宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371208_comment'></div>弟子传教国师公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371208_comment'></div>化流万亿代所崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371208_comment'></div>奉公寓形于南冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371208_comment'></div>幼曰宏愿惟孝恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371208_comment'></div>立之兹石书元踪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1371208_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　在蓝田尉任。四月五日，好友独孤申叔卒，宗元撰墓碣。作品：《亡友故秘书省校书郎独孤君墓碣》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷11第276页，中华书局1979年版。独孤申叔所卒月日,据宗元作撰《墓碣》补。）</span><div id='poem_1371222' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371222' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371222")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371222_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371222'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371222'>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371222_comment'></div>有唐仁人独孤君之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371222_comment'></div>祔于其父太子舍人讳助之墓之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371222_comment'></div>自其祖赠太子少保讳问俗而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371222_comment'></div>其墓皆在灞水之左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371222_comment'></div>今王父营陵于其侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371222_comment'></div>故再世在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371222_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371222_comment'></div>在独孤君之道和而纯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371222_comment'></div>其用端而明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371222_comment'></div>内之为孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371222_comment'></div>外之为仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371222_comment'></div>默而智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371222_comment'></div>言而信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371222_comment'></div>其穷也不忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371222_comment'></div>其乐也不淫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371222_comment'></div>读书推孔子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371222_comment'></div>必求诸其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371222_comment'></div>其为文深而厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371222_comment'></div>尤慕古雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371222_comment'></div>善赋颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371222_comment'></div>其要咸归于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371222_comment'></div>昔孔子之世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371222_comment'></div>有颜回者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371222_comment'></div>能得于孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371222_comment'></div>后之仰其贤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371222_comment'></div>譬之如日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371222_comment'></div>而莫有议者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371222_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371222_comment'></div>独孤君之明且仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371222_comment'></div>如遭孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371222_comment'></div>是有两颜氏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371222_comment'></div>今之世有知其然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371222_comment'></div>其信于天下乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371222_comment'></div>使夫人也夭而不嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371222_comment'></div>世之惑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371222_comment'></div>犹曰尚有天道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371222_comment'></div>噫乎甚邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371222_comment'></div>君讳申叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371222_comment'></div>字子重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371222_comment'></div>年二十二举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371222_comment'></div>又二年用博学宏词为校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371222_comment'></div>又三年居父丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371222_comment'></div>未练而没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371222_comment'></div>盖贞元十八年四月五日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371222_comment'></div>是年七月十日而葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371222_comment'></div>乡曰某乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371222_comment'></div>原曰某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371222_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371222_comment'></div>君短命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371222_comment'></div>行道之日未久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371222_comment'></div>故其道信于其友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371222_comment'></div>而未信于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371222_comment'></div>今记其知君者于墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371222_comment'></div>韩泰安平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371222_comment'></div>南阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371222_comment'></div>李行谌元固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371222_comment'></div>其弟行敏中明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371222_comment'></div>赵郡赞皇人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371222_comment'></div>柳宗元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371222_comment'></div>河东解人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371222_comment'></div>崔广略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371222_comment'></div>清河人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371222_comment'></div>韩愈退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371222_comment'></div>昌黎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371222_comment'></div>王涯广津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371222_comment'></div>太原人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371222_comment'></div>吕温和叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371222_comment'></div>东平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371222_comment'></div>崔群敦诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371222_comment'></div>清河人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371222_comment'></div>刘禹锡梦得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371222_comment'></div>中山人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371222_comment'></div>李景俭致用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371222_comment'></div>陇西人。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371222_comment'></div>京兆杜陵人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1371222_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　在蓝田尉任。武功县丞厅壁坏，官署旧记皆逸。宗元应县丞陈南仲族子陈存之请，撰壁记。作品：《武功县丞厅壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷26第695页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371087?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武功县丞厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371087'>殷颂曰。邦畿千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371087_comment'></div>周制千里之内曰甸服。谷梁谓之寰内诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371087_comment'></div>为王内臣。其制甚重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371087_comment'></div>今京兆尹理京师。部二十有三县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371087_comment'></div>幅员之广。其犹古也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371087_comment'></div>县吏之长。曰令曰丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371087_comment'></div>丞之位正八品下。盖丞述六职以辅其令也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371087_comment'></div>秦汉有丞相。今<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作令）</span>尚书有左右丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371087_comment'></div>御史有中丞。至于九卿之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371087_comment'></div>亦皆有丞。下以达天下之县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371087_comment'></div>政有大小。其旨同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371087_comment'></div>武功为甸内大县。桉其图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371087_comment'></div>古后稷封有斄之地。秦作四十一县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371087_comment'></div>斄美阳武功各异。至是合焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371087_comment'></div>盖尝为稷州。已而复县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371087_comment'></div>其土疆沃美高厚。有邱陵坟衍之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371087_comment'></div>其植物<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371087", 1371087, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>丰畅</span>茂遂。有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371087", 1371087, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>秬秠</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371087", 1371087, "Clauses/33/Comments/1")'>藿菽</span>之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371087_comment'></div>其人善树艺。其俗有礼让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371087_comment'></div>宜乎其大雅之遗烈焉。贞元十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371087_comment'></div>改邑于南里。既成新城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371087_comment'></div>凡官署旧记。壁坏文逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371087_comment'></div>而未克继之者。后三年而颍川陈南仲居是官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371087_comment'></div>邑人宜之。号为简靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371087_comment'></div>因其族子存持地图以来。谒余为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371087_comment'></div>夫以武功疆理之大。人徒之多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371087_comment'></div>而陈生以简靖辅其理。斯固难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371087_comment'></div>汉高帝尝诏天下。凡以战得爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371087_comment'></div>七大夫公乘以上。令丞与抗礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371087_comment'></div>故为吏益难。今天子崇武念功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371087_comment'></div>与汉初相类。分禁旅以守县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371087_comment'></div>道武功为多。陈生为丞于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371087_comment'></div>而又职盗贼。其为理无败事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371087_comment'></div>吾庸可以度哉。为之记云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371087_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1371087_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年5月</a>　在蓝田尉任。盩厔县新食堂成，始会食，来告请为记。作品：《盩厔县新食堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷26第699页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371088' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371088")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_1371088'>贞元十八年五月某日。新作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371088", 1371088, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>食堂</span>于县内之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371088_comment'></div>始会食也。自兵兴以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371088_comment'></div>西郊捍戎。县为军垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371088_comment'></div>二十有六年。群吏咸寓于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371088_comment'></div>兵去邑荒。栋宇倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371088_comment'></div>又十有九年。不克以居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371088_comment'></div>由是县之联事。离散而不属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371088_comment'></div>凡其官僚。罕或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371088", 1371088, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>觌见</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371088_comment'></div>及是主簿某病之。于是且掌工役之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371088_comment'></div>俾复其邑居。廪库既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371088_comment'></div>学校既修。取其馀材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371088_comment'></div>以构斯堂。其上栋自南而北者二十有二尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371088_comment'></div>周阿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371088", 1371088, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>峻严</span>。列楹齐同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371088_comment'></div>其饰之文质。阶之高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371088_comment'></div>视邑之大小与群吏之品秩。不陋不盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371088_comment'></div>高山在前。流水在下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371088_comment'></div>可以俯仰。可以宴乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371088_comment'></div>堂既成。得羡财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371088_comment'></div>可以为食本。月权其赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371088_comment'></div>羞膳以充。乃合群吏于兹新堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371088_comment'></div>升降坐起。以班先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371088_comment'></div>始正位秩之叙。礼仪笑语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371088_comment'></div>讲议往复。始会政事之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371088_comment'></div>筵席肃庄。笾豆静嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371088_comment'></div>燔炮烹饪。益以酒醴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371088_comment'></div>始获僚友之乐。卒事而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371088_comment'></div>举欣欣焉。曰惟礼食之来古也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371088_comment'></div>今京师百官。咸有斯制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371088_comment'></div>甸服亦王之内邑。且官有联属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371088_comment'></div>则宜统会以齐之也。向之离而今之合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371088_comment'></div>其得失也远甚。我是以肃焉而庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371088_comment'></div>衎焉而和。群疑以亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371088_comment'></div>嘉言以彰。旨乎其在此堂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371088_comment'></div>不惟其馨香醉饱之谓。某之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371088_comment'></div>夫宜伐石以志。使是道也不替于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371088_comment'></div>乃列其事来告。使余书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371088_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1371088_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年9月</a>　在蓝田尉任。九月，岳父杨凭出任潭州刺史、湖南观察使。中使奉宣圣旨，赐宴长乐驿。宗元代岳父作表以谢。作品：《为杨湖南谢设表》<span id='poem_sentence_1_1370928_comment'></div>恩荣特殊。宴饮斯及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370928_comment'></div>顾兹厚礼。猥集微躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370928_comment'></div>臣某诚欢诚庆顿首顿首。臣以多幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370928_comment'></div>属此昌时。任重方隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370928_comment'></div>职忝文武。甘受素餐之刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370928_comment'></div>知无肉食之谋。以忧以惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370928_comment'></div>寤寐无措。岂谓鸿恩继至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370928_comment'></div>丰膳爰来。陆海兼陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370928_comment'></div>饴醴皆设。庶当奉扬圣泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370928_comment'></div>覃布远人。流恺悌于皇风。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　在蓝田尉任。京兆尹韦夏卿荐窦群于朝，窦群召授右拾遗，宗元代韦作表以贺。作品：《为韦侍郎贺布衣窦群除右拾遗表》<span id='poem_sentence_1_1370910_comment'></div>臣闻直道之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370910_comment'></div>四方向德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370910_comment'></div>逸人是举。<div id='poem_sentence_69_1370878_comment'></div>谨言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1370878_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370879' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370879' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370879?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为京兆府请复尊号第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370879")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370879_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370879'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370879'>京兆府长安县耆老臣石灵等言。伏奉墨诏批答臣所请复尊号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370879_comment'></div>未蒙允许者。捧对惶遽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370879_comment'></div>不知所裁。天实命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370879_comment'></div>于臣何有。臣等诚恳诚惧顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370879_comment'></div>臣闻圣君以奉天为心。不以执谦为德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370879_comment'></div>以顺人为大。不以崇让为优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370879_comment'></div>今陛下深拒天人之诚。犹怀谦让之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370879_comment'></div>臣等愚惑。未知所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370879_comment'></div>且百祥荐臻。特表昊穹之眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370879_comment'></div>五谷蕃熟。用彰后土之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370879_comment'></div>亿兆嗷嗷。吁天请命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370879_comment'></div>上下交应。幽明同心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370879_comment'></div>举而违之。臣所未识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370879_comment'></div>况臣等共被仁育。同臻太和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370879_comment'></div>陛下德达上元。以丰臣之衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370879_comment'></div>道跻寿域。以延臣之岁年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370879_comment'></div>沐浴皇风。二十馀载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370879_comment'></div>儿童感化。鳏寡知恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370879_comment'></div>故臣等出乡之时。欢呼遍野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370879_comment'></div>闾里勉臣以不进不止。妻孥誓臣以不遂不归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370879_comment'></div>惟竭血诚。退无面目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370879_comment'></div>便当殒首阙下。终不徒还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370879_comment'></div>伏惟陛下照臣恳迫之情。哀臣羸老之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370879_comment'></div>臣等不胜呜咽惭恨之至。谨奉表陈谢以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370879_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1370879_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1370880' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370880' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370880?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为京兆府请复尊号第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370880")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370880_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370880'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370880'>臣某言。臣伏以耆老等并发丹诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370880_comment'></div>将贯白日。请复徽号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370880_comment'></div>以光圣谟。臣以其恳款自中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370880_comment'></div>不可禁止。遂抗表陈请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370880_comment'></div>备述微诚。伏奉墨诏批答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370880_comment'></div>未蒙允许者。众心尚阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370880_comment'></div>天意未从。恳迫愈深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370880_comment'></div>兢惶无措。臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370880_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下道大益谦。化成弥损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370880_comment'></div>虽江海善下。每应朝宗之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370880_comment'></div>而日月居高。久称照临之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370880_comment'></div>况复上承天命。下睹人诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370880_comment'></div>若然辞之。理有不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370880_comment'></div>伏以陛下功参造化。政体乾坤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370880_comment'></div>万邦宅心。百灵效职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370880_comment'></div>此圣之至也。明并两曜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370880_comment'></div>信如四时。先天不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370880_comment'></div>穷神知化。此神之极也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370880_comment'></div>道德纯备。礼乐兴行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370880_comment'></div>宸翰动于三光。睿藻穷于六义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370880_comment'></div>此文之备也。五兵不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370880_comment'></div>七德咸宣。殊方者知归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370880_comment'></div>负固者率服。此武之成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370880_comment'></div>黄龙皓兔。甘露庆云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370880_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370880", 1370880, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>神禾</span>嘉瓜。祥莲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370880", 1370880, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>瑞木</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370880_comment'></div>万物畅遂。百谷茂滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370880_comment'></div>此天之至灵也。黎老班白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370880_comment'></div>伏守阙庭。鳏嫠童幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370880_comment'></div>谣歌道路。此人之至诚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370880_comment'></div>有其德而无其号。拒乎天而违乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370880_comment'></div>虽陛下谦让之至美。抑非臣心之所安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370880_comment'></div>伏以贱志难明。微诚莫达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370880_comment'></div>戴天弥惧。履地益惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370880_comment'></div>不任恳迫屏营之至。伏愿早建大号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370880_comment'></div>以称天人之心。谨再奉表昧死陈请以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370880_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1370880_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　在蓝田尉任。为京兆府长安县耆老等作表请复德宗“圣神文武”尊号。作品：《为耆老等请复尊号表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第942页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第107页系《为耆老等请复尊号表》于贞元十八年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　在蓝田尉任。为长安等县耆寿作状呈宰相，请复德宗“圣神文武”尊号。作品：《为长安等县耆寿诣相府乞奏复尊号状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷39第1043页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370959' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370959' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370959?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为长安等县耆寿诣相府乞奏复尊号状</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370959")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370959_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370959'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370959'>长安等县耆寿某乙若干人。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370959_comment'></div>某等伏以生长明时。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370959", 1370959, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>游泳</span>皇泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370959_comment'></div>鼓腹且知于帝力。食毛敢忘于君恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370959_comment'></div>窃见近者祥瑞所呈。周于百郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370959_comment'></div>丰稔之报。均于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370959_comment'></div>有以知上元降灵。诞告嘉应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370959_comment'></div>彰我君文明之化。仁育之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370959_comment'></div>大道既行。鸿名未举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370959_comment'></div>是以殷勤昭著。如斯而不已者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370959_comment'></div>某皆陶煦纯仁。成此耇老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370959_comment'></div>生既无补。死而何求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370959_comment'></div>唯愿上闻帝阍。复建尊号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370959_comment'></div>用彰圣德。以报皇慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370959_comment'></div>披露血诚。伏守天阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370959_comment'></div>糜躯碎骨。犹生之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370959_comment'></div>谨以今日诣光顺门辄进表讫。伏惟相公赞翊明主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370959_comment'></div>共致太平。而使名号尚郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370959_comment'></div>天人失望。草野愚鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370959_comment'></div>窃有惑焉。伏望敷奏之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370959_comment'></div>开陈其要。俾下情允达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370959_comment'></div>大愿克从。退就泉壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370959_comment'></div>乐而无恨。轻黩国相<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作相国）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370959_comment'></div>伏待典刑。谨状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370959_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1370959_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　在蓝田尉任。为京兆父老状奏请复德宗“圣神文武”尊号。作品：《为京畿父老上府尹乞奏复尊号状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷39第1044页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370960' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370960' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370960?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为京畿父老上府尹乞奏复尊号状</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370960")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370960_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370960'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370960'>长安县耆老某乙等若干人。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370960_comment'></div>某等幸以羸老。获睹升平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370960_comment'></div>蹈舞薰风。讴歌寿域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370960_comment'></div>譬之草木。何以报天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370960_comment'></div>寤寐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370960", 1370960, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>焦劳</span>。不知所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370960_comment'></div>伏见圣君临御。元化升闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370960_comment'></div>瑞应匝于万方。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370960", 1370960, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>丰报</span>穷于四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370960_comment'></div>神祇注意。天地倾心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370960_comment'></div>觉悟生人。必有为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370960_comment'></div>盖以挹损徽号。近二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370960_comment'></div>盛德益光。大名未复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370960_comment'></div>致远迩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370960", 1370960, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>积虑</span>。幽明愤怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370960_comment'></div>故自古以来。嘉瑞之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370960_comment'></div>未有如今岁之盛也。斯乃上元深旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370960_comment'></div>下人恳诚。勤勤相符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370960_comment'></div>正在于此。某等眷恋明时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370960_comment'></div>朝夕是切。唯愿早复大号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370960_comment'></div>以契天心。庶得圣政益光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370960_comment'></div>鸿化弥远。少遂踊跃之甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370960_comment'></div>今请诣光顺门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370960", 1370960, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>进表</span>昧死上陈。伏以侍郎道合君臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370960_comment'></div>惠敷黎庶。傥遂收采愚虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370960_comment'></div>致贡天庭。俾草莱微诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370960_comment'></div>得达万乘。非所敢望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370960_comment'></div>惶惧伏深。谨状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370960_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1370960_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　在蓝田尉任。正月，从岳丈杨凭弟杨凝卒。某月日，葬奉先县。宗元撰墓碣。作品：《兵部郎中杨君墓碣》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷9第211页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371224' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371224' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371224?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故兵部郎中杨君墓碣</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371224")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371224_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371224'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371224'>贞元十九年正月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371224_comment'></div>守尚书兵部郎中杨君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371224_comment'></div>某年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371224_comment'></div>葬于奉先县某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371224_comment'></div>既葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371224_comment'></div>其子侄洎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371224", 1371224, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>家老</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371224_comment'></div>谋立石以表于墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371224_comment'></div>葬令曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371224_comment'></div>凡五品以上为碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371224_comment'></div>龟趺螭首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371224_comment'></div>降五品为碣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371224_comment'></div>方趺圆首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371224_comment'></div>其高四尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371224_comment'></div>桉郎中品第五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371224_comment'></div>以其秩不克偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371224_comment'></div>降而从碣之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371224_comment'></div>其世系则纪于大墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371224_comment'></div>君讳凝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371224_comment'></div>字懋功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371224_comment'></div>与季弟凌生同日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371224_comment'></div>不周月而孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371224_comment'></div>伯兄凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371224_comment'></div>剪发为童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371224_comment'></div>家居于吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371224_comment'></div>太夫人母道尊爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371224_comment'></div>教饬谨备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371224_comment'></div>君之昆弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371224_comment'></div>孝敬出于其性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371224_comment'></div>礼范奉于其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371224_comment'></div>克有成德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371224_comment'></div>辑其休光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371224_comment'></div>东薄海岱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371224_comment'></div>南极衡巫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371224_comment'></div>文学者皆知诵其词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371224_comment'></div>而以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371224", 1371224, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>模准</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371224_comment'></div>进修者率用歌其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371224_comment'></div>而有所矜式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371224_comment'></div>君既举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371224_comment'></div>以校书郎为书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371224_comment'></div>毗赞元侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371224_comment'></div>于汉之阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371224_comment'></div>式徙荆州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371224_comment'></div>由协律郎三转御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371224_comment'></div>元戎出师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371224_comment'></div>用显厥谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371224_comment'></div>遂入王庭为起居郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371224_comment'></div>书事不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371224_comment'></div>著垂国典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371224_comment'></div>又为尚书司封员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371224_comment'></div>革正封邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371224_comment'></div>申明嫡媵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371224_comment'></div>事连权右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371224_comment'></div>斥退勿惮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371224_comment'></div>直声彰闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371224_comment'></div>仍参选部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371224_comment'></div>以驭群吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371224_comment'></div>奸臣席势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371224_comment'></div>威福自已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371224_comment'></div>他人求附离而不可得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371224_comment'></div>公则郤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371224_comment'></div>私以胥吏求署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371224_comment'></div>一皆罢遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371224_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371224_comment'></div>吾不以三尺法为己利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371224_comment'></div>居丧致哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371224_comment'></div>内尽其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371224_comment'></div>外尽其物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371224_comment'></div>而无有不得于心者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371224_comment'></div>服除为右司郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371224_comment'></div>危言直已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371224_comment'></div>以致其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371224_comment'></div>然卒中于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1371224", 1371224, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>诐辞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371224_comment'></div>不得朝请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371224_comment'></div>以检校吏部郎中为宣武军节度判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371224_comment'></div>亳人缺守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371224_comment'></div>往莅其政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371224_comment'></div>孤老抚安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371224_comment'></div>强猾戮死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371224_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1371224", 1371224, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>垦凿</span>硗卤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371224_comment'></div>芟艾榛荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371224_comment'></div>作爰田以赡人食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371224_comment'></div>浚决潢污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371224_comment'></div>筑复堤防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371224_comment'></div>为落渠以定水祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371224_comment'></div>理不半岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371224_comment'></div>利垂千祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371224_comment'></div>会朝复命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371224_comment'></div>次于汴郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371224_comment'></div>帅丧卒乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371224_comment'></div>不可以入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371224_comment'></div>遂西走阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371224_comment'></div>玺书迎门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371224_comment'></div>劳徕甚备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371224_comment'></div>以疾居家三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371224_comment'></div>复登于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371224_comment'></div>遐迩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_1371224", 1371224, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>咏歌</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371224_comment'></div>仍遇痼疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371224_comment'></div>天子致问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371224_comment'></div>逾三月不赐告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371224_comment'></div>幸其愈而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371224_comment'></div>遂卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371224_comment'></div>天下文行之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371224_comment'></div>为之悲哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371224_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371224_comment'></div>君有深淳之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371224_comment'></div>有强毅之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371224_comment'></div>内以和于亲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371224_comment'></div>正于族属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371224_comment'></div>外以信于朋友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371224_comment'></div>施于政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371224_comment'></div>故身之进退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371224_comment'></div>人之喜戚系焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371224_comment'></div>凡其昆弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371224_comment'></div>申明于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371224_comment'></div>制书咸曰孝友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371224_comment'></div>君子谓杨氏其仁义之府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371224_comment'></div>君之文若干什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371224_comment'></div>皆可以传于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371224_comment'></div>若某者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371224_comment'></div>以姻旧获爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371224_comment'></div>不腆之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371224_comment'></div>君实知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371224_comment'></div>惟车马币玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371224_comment'></div>无可以称其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371224_comment'></div>用君之所以知者酬焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_124_1371224_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　在蓝田尉任。正月，从岳丈杨凭弟杨凝卒。宗元为京兆尹李实撰文祭之。作品：《为李京兆祭杨凝郎中文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1063页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371303' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371303' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371303?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为李京兆祭杨凝郎中文</a><span class='authorDate'>（803年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371303")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371303_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371303'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371303'>维贞元十九年岁次癸未四月辛未朔某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371303_comment'></div>检校工部尚书京兆尹司农卿李实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371303_comment'></div>谨以清酌庶羞之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371303_comment'></div>敬祭于故兵部郎中杨公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371303_comment'></div>惟灵清标<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371303", 1371303, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>霜洁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371303_comment'></div>馨德兰薰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371303_comment'></div>冲和茂著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371303_comment'></div>孝友彰闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371303_comment'></div>浚发洪绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371303_comment'></div>激扬清芬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371303_comment'></div>思侔德祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371303_comment'></div>学绍子云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371303_comment'></div>莹彼灵府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371303_comment'></div>彬其英文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371303_comment'></div>吐论冠时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371303_comment'></div>舒华轶群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371303_comment'></div>百氏之奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371303_comment'></div>一言可分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371303_comment'></div>旁贯释老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371303_comment'></div>岂伊典坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371303_comment'></div>谓蹑公相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371303_comment'></div>赞扬圣君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371303_comment'></div>高山安仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371303_comment'></div>逝水沄沄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371303_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371303_comment'></div>惟是伯仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371303_comment'></div>并为士则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371303_comment'></div>连擢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371303", 1371303, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>首科</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371303_comment'></div>迭居显职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371303_comment'></div>公之懿美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371303_comment'></div>发自朋僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371303_comment'></div>播于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371303_comment'></div>令闻克昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371303_comment'></div>炯然烛识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371303_comment'></div>卓尔孤标。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371303_comment'></div>翼翼其容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371303_comment'></div>羽仪清朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371303_comment'></div>载笔东掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371303_comment'></div>动无不纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371303_comment'></div>起草南宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371303_comment'></div>时论增美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371303_comment'></div>大梁有艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371303_comment'></div>天子是使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371303_comment'></div>密勿之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371303_comment'></div>唯道是履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371303_comment'></div>复归郎署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371303_comment'></div>职兹中兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371303_comment'></div>简稽无挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371303_comment'></div>以考其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371303_comment'></div>英风未摅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371303_comment'></div>沈疴遽婴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371303_comment'></div>孰云积善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371303_comment'></div>降以促龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371303_comment'></div>昔岁江表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371303_comment'></div>获同宴语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371303_comment'></div>谬为好仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371303_comment'></div>不我遐阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371303_comment'></div>公之元兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371303_comment'></div>复惠德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371303_comment'></div>优游多暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371303_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1371303", 1371303, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>眷眄</span>逾深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371303_comment'></div>情言盈耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371303_comment'></div>尺素相寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371303_comment'></div>冀兹竞爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371303_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1371303", 1371303, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>焜耀</span>儒林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371303_comment'></div>及此彫落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371303_comment'></div>祗摧我心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371303_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371303_comment'></div>遣车就引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371303_comment'></div>哀挽先路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371303_comment'></div>迅风悽悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371303_comment'></div>颓景幽暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371303_comment'></div>倾都殄瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371303_comment'></div>挥涕相顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371303_comment'></div>矧兹故人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371303_comment'></div>谁任痛慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371303_comment'></div>潢污一觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371303_comment'></div>讵写平素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371303_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1371303_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
湖南
-----detail

id='poem_sentence_1_1371280'>求先生之汨罗兮。揽蘅若以荐芳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371280'>愿荒忽之顾怀兮。冀陈辞而有光。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371280'>先生之不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371280", 1371280, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>从世</span>兮。惟道是就。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371280'>支离<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371280", 1371280, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>哇咬</span>环观兮。蒙耳大吕。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1371280'>堇喙以为羞兮。焚弃稷黍。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1371280'>岸狱之不知避兮。宫庭之不处。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1371280'>陷涂藉秽兮。荣若绣黼。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1371280'>榱折火烈兮。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371280", 1371280, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>娱娱</span>笑舞。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1371280'>谗巧之哓哓兮。惑以为咸池。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1371280'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371280", 1371280, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>便媚</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371280", 1371280, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>鞠恧</span>兮。美逾西施。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1371280'>谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371280", 1371280, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>谟言</span>之怪诞兮。反寘瑱而远违。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1371280'>匿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371280", 1371280, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>重痼</span>以讳避兮。进俞缓之不可为。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1371280'>何先生之凛凛兮。厉针石而从之。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1371280'>但仲尼之去鲁兮。曰吾行之迟迟。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1371280'>柳下惠之直道兮。又焉往而可施。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1371280'>今夫世之议夫子兮。曰胡隐忍而怀斯。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1371280'>惟达人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371280", 1371280, id='poem_sentence_21_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1371280'>立而视其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371280", 1371280, id='poem_sentence_23_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1371280'>矧先生之悃愊兮。蹈大故而不贰。<div id='poem_sentence_24_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1371280'>沈璜瘗佩兮。孰幽而不光。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1371280'>荃蕙蔽匿兮。胡久而不芳。<div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1371280'>托遗编而叹喟兮。涣余涕之盈眶。<div id='poem_sentence_28_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1371280'>呵星辰而驱诡怪兮。夫孰救于崩亡。<div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1371280'>耀姱辞之矘朗兮。世果以是之为狂。<div id='poem_sentence_31_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1371280'>哀余衷之<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_33_1371280'>谅先生之不言兮。后之人又何望。<div id='poem_sentence_33_1371280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1371280'><span class='link'
