-----title
零陵
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d4c75fe524d542c1a2ef810ab8cbab22_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d4c75fe524d542c1a2ef810ab8cbab22");'><span id='d4c75fe524d542c1a2ef810ab8cbab22_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=815')">806-815年</a>，34-43岁</div><div id='d4c75fe524d542c1a2ef810ab8cbab22' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年5月</a>　在永州司马任。五月，母卢氏卒于永州零陵佛寺，年六十八。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　在永州司马任。正月宪宗改元大赦，而八月有诏，左降官韦执谊、韩泰、陈谏、柳宗元、刘禹锡、韩晔、凌准、程异等八人，纵逢恩赦，不在量移之限。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　在永州司马任。永贞党人王叔文赐死。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　同时被贬之革新旧友凌准卒于连州，宗元谪居永州，应凌准后人之请，撰权厝志。作品：《故连州员外司马凌君权厝志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷10第263页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371237' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371237' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371237?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故连州员外司马淩君权厝志</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371237")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371237_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371237'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371237'>年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371237_comment'></div>尚书都官员外郎和州刺史连州司马富春淩君讳准卒于桂阳佛寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371237_comment'></div>先是六月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371237_comment'></div>告于州刺史博陵崔君曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371237_comment'></div>余尝学黄帝书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371237_comment'></div>切脉视病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371237_comment'></div>今余肝伏以涩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371237_comment'></div>肾浮以代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371237_comment'></div>将不腊而死审矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371237_comment'></div>凡予之学孔氏为忠孝礼信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371237_comment'></div>而事固大谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371237_comment'></div>卒不能有立乎世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371237_comment'></div>命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371237_comment'></div>臣道无以明乎国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371237_comment'></div>子道无以成乎家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371237_comment'></div>下之得罪于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371237_comment'></div>以谪徙丑地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371237_comment'></div>上之得罚于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371237_comment'></div>以降被罪疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371237_comment'></div>余无以御也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371237_comment'></div>敢以鬼事为累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371237_comment'></div>又告为老氏者某曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371237_comment'></div>余生于辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371237_comment'></div>今而寓乎戌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371237_comment'></div>辰戌冲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371237_comment'></div>吾命与脉叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371237_comment'></div>其死矣乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371237_comment'></div>吾罪大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371237_comment'></div>惧不克归柩于吾乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371237_comment'></div>是州之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371237_comment'></div>有大冈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371237", 1371237, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>不食</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371237_comment'></div>吾甚乐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371237_comment'></div>子其以是葬吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371237_comment'></div>及是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371237_comment'></div>咸如其言云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371237_comment'></div>孤夷仲求仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371237_comment'></div>以其先人之善余也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371237_comment'></div>勤以志为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371237_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371237_comment'></div>君字宗一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371237_comment'></div>以孝悌闻于其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371237_comment'></div>杭州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371237_comment'></div>常召君以训于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371237_comment'></div>读书为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371237_comment'></div>著汉后春秋二十馀万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371237_comment'></div>又著六经解围又文集未就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371237_comment'></div>有谋略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371237_comment'></div>尚气节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371237_comment'></div>赒人之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371237_comment'></div>出货力犹弃秕稗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371237_comment'></div>年二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371237_comment'></div>以书干丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371237_comment'></div>丞相以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371237_comment'></div>试其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371237_comment'></div>日万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371237_comment'></div>擢为崇文馆校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371237_comment'></div>又以金吾兵曹为邠宁节度掌书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371237_comment'></div>泚泾之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371237_comment'></div>以谋画佐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1371237", 1371237, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>元戎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371237_comment'></div>常有大功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371237_comment'></div>累加大理评事御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371237_comment'></div>赐绯鱼袋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371237_comment'></div>换节度判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371237_comment'></div>转殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371237_comment'></div>府丧罢职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371237_comment'></div>后迁侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371237_comment'></div>为浙东廉使判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371237_comment'></div>抚循罢人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371237_comment'></div>桉验污吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371237_comment'></div>吏人敬爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371237_comment'></div>厥绩以懋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371237_comment'></div>粹然而光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371237_comment'></div>声闻于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371237_comment'></div>召以为翰林学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371237_comment'></div>德宗崩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371237_comment'></div>迩臣议秘三日乃下遗诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371237_comment'></div>君独抗危词以语同列王伾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371237_comment'></div>画其不可者十六七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371237_comment'></div>乃以旦日发丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371237_comment'></div>六师万姓安其分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371237_comment'></div>遂入为尚书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371237_comment'></div>仍以文章侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371237_comment'></div>由本官参度支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371237_comment'></div>调发出纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371237_comment'></div>奸吏衰止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371237_comment'></div>以连累出和州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371237_comment'></div>降连州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371237_comment'></div>居母丧不得归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371237_comment'></div>而二弟继死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371237_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1371237", 1371237, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>不食</span>哭泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371237_comment'></div>遂丧其明以没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371237_comment'></div>盖君之行事如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371237_comment'></div>其报应如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371237_comment'></div>夫人高氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371237_comment'></div>在越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371237_comment'></div>孤四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371237_comment'></div>南仲殷仲在夫人所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371237_comment'></div>未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371237_comment'></div>执友河东柳宗元哀君有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371237_comment'></div>而不明白于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371237_comment'></div>离悯逢尤夭其生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371237_comment'></div>且又同过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371237_comment'></div>故哭以为志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371237_comment'></div>其辞哀焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371237_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371237_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_105_1371237'>噫淩君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371237_comment'></div>生不淑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371237_comment'></div>学孔氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371237_comment'></div>扬芬郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371237_comment'></div>好谋谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371237_comment'></div>富天禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371237_comment'></div>雠禁书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371237_comment'></div>赞推毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371237_comment'></div>观灵龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371237_comment'></div>获贞卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371237_comment'></div>徙东越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371237_comment'></div>翊明牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371237_comment'></div>罢人苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371237_comment'></div>污吏覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371237_comment'></div>升侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371237_comment'></div>躬启沃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371237_comment'></div>匡危疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371237_comment'></div>兴大福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371237_comment'></div>吏尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371237_comment'></div>徒隶肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371237_comment'></div>佐经邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371237_comment'></div>财用足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371237_comment'></div>道之踬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371237_comment'></div>身则辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371237_comment'></div>乌江垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371237_comment'></div>九疑麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371237_comment'></div>仍祸凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371237_comment'></div>遘兹酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371237_comment'></div>能知命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371237_comment'></div>无怨毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371237_comment'></div>罪不泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371237_comment'></div>死犹僇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371237_comment'></div>何以葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371237_comment'></div>南岭曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371237_comment'></div>魂有灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371237_comment'></div>故乡复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371237_comment'></div>封兹壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371237_comment'></div>归骨肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371237_comment'></div>为之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371237_comment'></div>志陵谷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_144_1371237_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　同时被贬之革新旧友凌准卒于连州，宗元谪居永州，作诗哭之。作品：《哭连州凌员外司马》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷43第1208页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_40671' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_40671' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/40671?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭连州凌员外司马<span class='inlineComment2'>（凌员外准也）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_40671")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_40671_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_40671'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_40671'>废逐人所弃，遂为鬼神欺。<div id='poem_sentence_0_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_40671'>才难不其然，卒与大患期。<div id='poem_sentence_1_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_40671'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_40671", 40671, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>凌人</span>古受氏，吴世夸雄姿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_40671'>寂寞富春水，英气方在斯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_40671'>六学诚一贯，精义穷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_40671", 40671, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>发挥</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_40671'>著书逾十年，幽颐靡不推。<div id='poem_sentence_5_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_40671'>天庭掞高文，万<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作寓）</span>字若波驰。<div id='poem_sentence_6_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_40671'>记室征西府，宏谋耀其奇。<div id='poem_sentence_7_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_40671'>輶轩下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_40671", 40671, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>东越</span>，列郡苏疲羸。<div id='poem_sentence_8_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_40671'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_40671", 40671, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>宛宛</span>凌江羽，来栖翰林枝。<div id='poem_sentence_9_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_40671'>孝文留弓剑，中外方危疑。<div id='poem_sentence_10_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_40671'>抗声促遗诏，定命由陈辞<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_40671'>徒隶肃曹官，征赋参有司。<div id='poem_sentence_12_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_40671'>出守乌江浒，老迁湟水湄。<div id='poem_sentence_13_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_40671'>高堂倾故国，葬祭限囚羁。<div id='poem_sentence_14_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_40671'>仲叔继幽沦，狂叫唯童儿<span class='inlineComment2'>（准母卒于家，不得归）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_40671'>泣尽目无见<span class='inlineComment2'>（准哭母丧明）</span>，肾伤足不持。<div id='poem_sentence_18_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_40671'>溘<span class='inlineComment2'>（渴合切）</span>死委炎荒，臧获守灵帷。<div id='poem_sentence_19_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_40671'>平生负国谴，骸骨非敢私。<div id='poem_sentence_20_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_40671'>盖棺未塞责，孤旐凝寒飔。<div id='poem_sentence_21_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_40671'>念昔始相遇，腑肠为君知。<div id='poem_sentence_22_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_40671'>进身齐选择，失路同瑕疵。<div id='poem_sentence_23_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_40671'>本期济仁义，今为众所嗤。<div id='poem_sentence_24_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_40671'>灭名竟不试，世义安可支。<div id='poem_sentence_25_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_40671'>恬死百忧尽，苟生万虑滋。<div id='poem_sentence_26_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_40671'>顾余九逝魂，与子各何之。<div id='poem_sentence_27_40671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_40671'>我歌诚自恸，非独为君悲。<div id='poem_note_40671'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_40671_0'>⑴ 德宗崩，迩臣议秘五日下遗诏，准独抗危辞，言其不可，乃以旦日发丧</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_40671_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　王叔文赐死后，秋，宗元在永州有诗感怀。作品：《感遇二首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷43第1255页，中华书局1979年版。施子愉《柳宗元年谱》第137页系《感遇二首》于永州时期，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_content_40705'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_40705'>西陆动凉气，惊乌号北林。<div id='poem_sentence_0_40705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_40705'>鸿鹄去不返，勾吴阻且深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_40705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_40705'>徒嗟日沈湎，<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_6_40705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_40705'>危根一以振，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6804, "poem_sentence_7_40705")'>齐斧</span>来相寻。<div id='poem_sentence_7_40705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_40705'>揽衣中夜起，感物涕盈襟。<div id='poem_sentence_8_40705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_40705'>微霜众所践，谁念岁寒心。<div id='poem_sentence_9_40705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_40706_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_40706'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_40706'>旭日照寒野，鸒<span class='inlineComment2'>（音豫）</span>斯起蒿莱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_40706_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_40706'>啁啾有馀乐，飞舞西陵隈。<div id='poem_sentence_1_40706_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　谪居永州，为东明张因撰墓志。作品：《东明张先生墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷11第282页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第36页系《张先生墓志》于贞元二十一年长安时期。）</span><div id='poem_1371252' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371252' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371252?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东明张先生墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371252")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371252_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371252'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371252'>东明先生张氏曰因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371252_comment'></div>尝有以文荐于天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371252_comment'></div>天子策试甚高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371252_comment'></div>以为长安尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371252_comment'></div>一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371252_comment'></div>投去印绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371252_comment'></div>愿为黄老术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371252_comment'></div>诏许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371252_comment'></div>居东明观三十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371252_comment'></div>受毕法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371252_comment'></div>道行峻异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371252_comment'></div>得众真秘书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371252", 1371252, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>诀箓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371252_comment'></div>聚经籍图史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371252_comment'></div>侔于麟阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371252_comment'></div>以弟回降秩封州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371252_comment'></div>先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371252_comment'></div>吾老矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371252_comment'></div>支体不可解也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371252_comment'></div>遂从以去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371252_comment'></div>明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371252_comment'></div>回之子袭死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371252_comment'></div>哭之恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371252_comment'></div>遂病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371252_comment'></div>既亟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371252_comment'></div>以命回曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371252_comment'></div>吾生天宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371252_comment'></div>讫贞元乙酉岁十月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371252_comment'></div>今死于汝之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371252_comment'></div>盈吾志矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371252_comment'></div>京师吾生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371252_comment'></div>毕原先人之归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371252_comment'></div>必以返葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371252_comment'></div>乃自为志而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371252_comment'></div>明年正月某日葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371252_comment'></div>如其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371252_comment'></div>弟子某等为碑以志于墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371252_comment'></div>辞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371252_comment'></div>匪禄而康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371252_comment'></div>匪爵而荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371252_comment'></div>漠焉以虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371252_comment'></div>充焉以盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371252_comment'></div>言而不为华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371252_comment'></div>光而不为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371252_comment'></div>介洁而周流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371252_comment'></div>苞涵而清宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371252_comment'></div>幽观其形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371252_comment'></div>与化为冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371252_comment'></div>寂寞以成其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371252_comment'></div>是以勿婴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371252_comment'></div>世皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1371252", 1371252, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>狂狂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371252_comment'></div>奔利死名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371252_comment'></div>我独浩浩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371252_comment'></div>端一以生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371252_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371252_comment'></div>先生友弟以遁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371252_comment'></div>慈幼以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371252_comment'></div>若不能忘情者何耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371252_comment'></div>吾曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371252_comment'></div>道去友耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371252_comment'></div>去慈耶。<div id='poem_sentence_61_1371252_comment'></div>荡莽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1371252", 1371252, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>狠悻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371252_comment'></div>道之非耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371252_comment'></div>且夫亏恩坏礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371252_comment'></div>枯槁憔悴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371252_comment'></div>堕圣图寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371252_comment'></div>离中就异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371252_comment'></div>歘然与神鬼为偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371252_comment'></div>顽然以木石为类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371252_comment'></div><span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1371252", 1371252, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>无死</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371252_comment'></div>先生之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371252_comment'></div>固知异夫此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371252_comment'></div>乃书于石以纪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1371252_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　至永州后，与家人寄寓龙兴寺西厢房。为改善居所环境，于西墙开窗造门，门外建轩，并撰文记之。作品：《永州龙兴寺西轩记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷28第751页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371106' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371106' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371106?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永州龙兴寺西轩记</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371106")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371106_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371106'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371106'>永贞年。予名在党人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371106_comment'></div>不容于尚书省。出为邵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371106_comment'></div>道贬永州司马。至则无以为居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371106_comment'></div>居龙兴寺西序之下。予知释氏之道且久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371106_comment'></div>固所愿也。然子所庇之屋甚隐蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371106_comment'></div>其户北向。居昧昧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371106_comment'></div>寺之居。于是州为高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371106_comment'></div>西序之西。属当大江之流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371106_comment'></div>江之外山谷林麓甚众。于是凿西墉以为户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371106_comment'></div>户之外为轩。以临群木之杪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371106_comment'></div>无所不瞩焉。不徙席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371106_comment'></div>不运几。而得大观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371106_comment'></div>夫室。向者之室也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371106_comment'></div>席与几。向者之处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371106_comment'></div>向也昧而今也显。岂异物耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371106_comment'></div>因悟夫佛之道。可以转惑见为真智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371106_comment'></div>即群迷为正觉。舍大闇为光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371106_comment'></div>夫性岂异物耶。孰能为予凿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371106", 1371106, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>大昏</span>之墉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371106_comment'></div>辟灵照之户。广应物之轩者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371106_comment'></div>吾将与为徒。遂书为二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371106_comment'></div>其一志诸户外。其一以贻巽上人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371106_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1371106_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　初谪永州，为破除修建龙兴寺时所谓“息壤”的迷信思想，撰记文。作品：《永州龙兴寺息壤记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷28第746页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371103' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371103' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371103?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永州龙兴寺息壤记</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371103_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371103'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371103'>永州龙兴寺东北陬有堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371103_comment'></div>堂之地隆然负塼甓而起者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371103_comment'></div>广四步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371103_comment'></div>高一尺五寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371103_comment'></div>始之为堂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371103_comment'></div>夷之而又高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371103_comment'></div>凡持锸者尽死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371103_comment'></div>永州居楚越间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371103_comment'></div>其人鬼且禨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371103_comment'></div>由是寺之人皆神之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371103_comment'></div>人莫敢夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371103_comment'></div>史记天官书及汉志有地长之占。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371103_comment'></div>而亡其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371103_comment'></div>甘茂盟息壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371103_comment'></div>盖其地有是类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371103_comment'></div>昔之异书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371103_comment'></div>有记洪水滔天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371103_comment'></div>鲧窃帝之息壤以堙洪水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371103_comment'></div>帝乃令祝融杀鲧于羽郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371103_comment'></div>其言不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371103", 1371103, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>经见</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371103_comment'></div>今是土也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371103_comment'></div>夷之者不幸而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371103_comment'></div>岂帝之所爱耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371103_comment'></div>南方多疫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371103_comment'></div>劳者先死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371103_comment'></div>则彼持锸者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371103_comment'></div>其死于劳且疫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371103_comment'></div>土乌能神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371103_comment'></div>予恐学者之至于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371103_comment'></div>徵是言而唯异书之信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371103_comment'></div>故记于堂上。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1371103_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　初谪永州，发现并设计改建寓所龙兴寺北侧的荒地东丘，撰文记之。作品：《永州龙兴寺东丘记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷28第748页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371104'>游之适大率有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371104_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371104", 1371104, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>旷如</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371104_comment'></div>奥如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371104_comment'></div>如斯而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371104_comment'></div>其地之陵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371104", 1371104, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>阻峭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371104_comment'></div>出幽郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371104_comment'></div>寥廓悠长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371104_comment'></div>则于旷宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371104_comment'></div>抵邱垤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371104_comment'></div>伏灌莽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371104_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371104", 1371104, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>迫遽</span>回合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371104_comment'></div>则于奥宜。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1371104_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371104", 1371104, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>临瞰</span>风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371104_comment'></div>不可病其敞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371104_comment'></div>因其奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371104_comment'></div>虽增以茂树丛石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371104_comment'></div>穹若洞谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371104_comment'></div>蓊若林麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371104_comment'></div>不可病其邃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371104_comment'></div>今所谓东邱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371104_comment'></div>奥之宜者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371104_comment'></div>其始龛之外弃地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371104_comment'></div>予得而合焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371104_comment'></div>以属于堂之北陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371104_comment'></div>凡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371104", 1371104, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>坳洼</span>坻岸之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371104_comment'></div>无废其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371104_comment'></div>屏以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1371104", 1371104, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>密竹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371104_comment'></div>联以曲梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371104_comment'></div>桂桧松杉楩楠之植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371104_comment'></div>几三百本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371104_comment'></div>嘉卉美石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371104_comment'></div>又经纬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371104_comment'></div>俛入绿缛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371104_comment'></div>幽荫荟蔚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371104_comment'></div>步武错迕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371104_comment'></div>不知所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371104_comment'></div>温风不烁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371104_comment'></div>清气自至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371104_comment'></div>水亭狭室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371104_comment'></div>曲有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371104", 1371104, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>奥趣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371104_comment'></div>然而至焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371104_comment'></div>往往以邃为病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371104_comment'></div>噫龙兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371104_comment'></div>永之佳寺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371104_comment'></div>登高殿可以望南极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371104_comment'></div>辟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1371104", 1371104, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>大门</span>可以瞰湘流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371104_comment'></div>若是其旷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371104_comment'></div>而于是小邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371104_comment'></div>又将披而攘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371104_comment'></div>则吾所谓游有二者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371104_comment'></div>无乃阙焉而丧其地之宜乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371104_comment'></div>邱之幽幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371104_comment'></div>可以处休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371104_comment'></div>邱之窅窅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371104_comment'></div>可以观妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371104_comment'></div>溽暑遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371104_comment'></div>兹邱之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371104_comment'></div>太和不迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371104_comment'></div>兹邱之巅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371104_comment'></div>奥乎兹邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371104_comment'></div>孰从我游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371104_comment'></div>予无召公之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371104_comment'></div>惧剪伐之及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371104_comment'></div>故书以祈后君子。</div><div id='poem_sentence_66_1371104_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　初谪永州，母丧，宗元上书赵宗儒以陈郁情。作品：《上广州赵宗儒尚书陈情启》<span href='/Writing/1371018?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上广州赵宗儒尚书陈情启</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371018")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371018_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371018'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371018'>某启。某天罚深重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371018_comment'></div>馀息苟存。沈窜俟罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371018_comment'></div>朝不图夕。伏谒无路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371018_comment'></div>不任荒恋之诚。伏念宗元初授御史之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371018_comment'></div>尚书与杜司空先赐临顾。光耀里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371018_comment'></div>下情至今。尚增<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371018", 1371018, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>惶惕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371018_comment'></div>顷以党与进退。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371018", 1371018, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>投窜</span>零陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371018_comment'></div>囚系所迫。不得归奉松槚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371018_comment'></div>哀荒穷毒。人理所极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371018_comment'></div>亲故遗忘。况于他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371018_comment'></div>朝夕之急。饘粥难继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371018_comment'></div>宗祀所重。不敢死亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371018_comment'></div>偷视累息。已逾岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371018_comment'></div>伏以尚书德量宏纳。义风远扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371018_comment'></div>收抚之恩。始于枯朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371018_comment'></div>敢以馀喘。上累深仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371018_comment'></div>伏惟恻然见哀。使得存济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371018_comment'></div>慺慺荒恳。叩颡南望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371018_comment'></div>窃以动心于无情之地。施惠于不报之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371018_comment'></div>古烈尚难。况在今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371018_comment'></div>而率然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371018", 1371018, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>干冒</span>。决不自疑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371018_comment'></div>盖以闻风之日久。向德之诚至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371018_comment'></div>振高义于流俗之外。合大度于古人之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371018_comment'></div>独有望于阁下而已。非敢以寻常祈向之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371018_comment'></div>当大贤匍匐之仁。夙夜忖度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371018_comment'></div>果于自卜。方在困辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371018_comment'></div>不敢多言。伏纸惶恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371018_comment'></div>不胜战越。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371018_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1371018_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　初贬永州，撰铭文记严砺平定剑南西川节度副使刘辟叛乱之功。作品：《剑门铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷20第542页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371154' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371154' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371154?labeling=true' target='_blank'>剑门铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371154")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371154_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371154'>惟蜀都重险多货。混同戎蛮。人尨俗剽。嗜为寇乱。皇帝元年八月。帅丧众暴。群疑不制。妖孽煽行。怙恃富强。滔天阻兵。攻陷他部。北包剑门。凭负邱陵。以张骜猛。坚利锋镝。以拒大顺。谓雷霆之诛。莫已加也。惟梁守臣礼部尚书严公。以国害为私雠。以天讨为己任。推仁仗信。不待司死。而人致其命。立义抗愤。不待喋血。而士一其心。悉师出次。祗俟明诏。凡诸侯之师。必出于是。储峙飨赉。取其丰穰。乃遣前军严秦。奉扬王诛。诞告南土。十一月。右师逾利州。蹈寇地。乘山斩虏。以遏奔冲。左师出于剑门。大攘顽嚚。谕引劫胁。蚁溃鼠骇。险无以固。收夺利地。以须王师。刲刳肾肠。振拔根柢。俾无以肆毒。用集我勋力。𪔵鼓一振。元戎启行。取其渠魁。以为大戮。由公忠勇愤悱。授任坚明。谋猷宏长。用能启辟险阨。夷为大涂。衰沮害气。对乎天意。帝用休嘉。议功居首。增秩师长。进为大藩。宅是南服。将校群吏。愿刊山石。昭著公之功。垂号无穷。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371154_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371154'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371154'>井络<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371154", 1371154, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>坤垠</span>，时惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371154", 1371154, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>外区</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371154'>界山为门，环于蜀都。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371154'>丛险积货，混并羌髳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371154'>狂猾窥隙，狺狺啸呼。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371154'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371154", 1371154, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>凭据</span>势胜，厚其凶徒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1371154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1371154'>皇帝之仁，宥而不诛。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1371154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1371154'>暴非德驯，害及巴渝。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1371154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1371154'>人无增赋，师以饶足。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1371154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1371154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1371154'>右逾岷山，左直剑门。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1371154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
