id='poem_sentence_24_1371154'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1371154_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　初贬永州，东川节度使严砺平刘辟反，宗元作《剑门铭》纪其事，并书启上之。作品：《上严东川寄剑门铭启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第923页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371008' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371008' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371008?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上严东川寄剑门铭启</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371008")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371008_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371008'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371008'>宗元伏惟仆射以仁厚蓄生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371008_comment'></div>以勇义平国难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371008_comment'></div>而剑门用兵之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371008_comment'></div>最为天下倡首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371008_comment'></div>取其险固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371008_comment'></div>为我要冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371008_comment'></div>王师得以由其门而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371008_comment'></div>彷徉布濩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371008_comment'></div>遂无留滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371008_comment'></div>是阁下之勋力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371008_comment'></div>宜著于万世而不巳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371008_comment'></div>宗元负罪俟命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371008_comment'></div>晷刻观望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371008_comment'></div>道里深远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371008_comment'></div>不得悉闻当时之威声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371008_comment'></div>然而窃以累受顾念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371008_comment'></div>踊跃盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371008_comment'></div>恐没身炎瘴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371008_comment'></div>卒无以少报于阁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371008_comment'></div>是以昼夜恟恟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371008_comment'></div>不克自宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371008_comment'></div>今身虽败弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371008_comment'></div>庶几其文犹或传于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371008_comment'></div>又焉知非因阁下之功烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371008_comment'></div>所以为不朽之一端也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371008_comment'></div>敢默默而巳乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371008_comment'></div>谨撰剑门铭一首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371008_comment'></div>惶恐献上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371008_comment'></div>诚无以称宏大之略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371008_comment'></div>亦足以发平生之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371008_comment'></div>不胜惭惧战越之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1371008_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　宪宗大赦天下。柳宗元谪居永州，代永州刺史韦彪作表以贺。作品：《代韦中丞贺元和大赦表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第955页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370891' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370891' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370891?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代韦中丞贺元和大赦表</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370891")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370891_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370891'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370891'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370891_comment'></div>伏奉正月二日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370891_comment'></div>大赦天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370891_comment'></div>永贞二年宜改为元和元年者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370891_comment'></div>太阳既升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370891_comment'></div>煦育资始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370891_comment'></div>霈泽斯降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370891_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370891", 1370891, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>膏润</span>无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370891_comment'></div>臣某诚庆诚贺顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370891_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下仁化旁流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370891_comment'></div>孝理宏阐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370891_comment'></div>纪元示布和之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370891_comment'></div>肆眚见恤人之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370891_comment'></div>旷然涤瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370891_comment'></div>得以迁善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370891_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370891", 1370891, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>涣发大号</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370891_comment'></div>申明旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370891_comment'></div>农有薄征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370891_comment'></div>韨无强贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370891_comment'></div>勋勤是录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370891_comment'></div>爵秩以班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370891_comment'></div>宠宁间于幽明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370891_comment'></div>泽必周于夷夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370891_comment'></div>近甸轻榷酤之入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370891_comment'></div>远人忘水旱之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370891_comment'></div>既行庆于官僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370891_comment'></div>亦推恩于天属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370891_comment'></div>诸生喜黉塾之广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370891_comment'></div>庶老加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370891", 1370891, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>絮帛</span>之优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370891_comment'></div>量入所以备凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370891_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370891", 1370891, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>兴廉</span>期于变俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370891_comment'></div>爰褒有客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370891_comment'></div>尊贤之典惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370891_comment'></div>载奉素王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370891_comment'></div>宗子之道斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370891_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370891", 1370891, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>纶言</span>一降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370891_comment'></div>庶政毕行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370891_comment'></div>怀生之伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370891_comment'></div>感悦无量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370891_comment'></div>臣某等守在遐远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370891_comment'></div>亲奉诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370891_comment'></div>踊跃之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370891_comment'></div>倍百恒品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370891_comment'></div>无任感恩忭舞屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370891_comment'></div>谨奉表陈贺以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1370891_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　谪居永州。荆南节度使赵宗儒辟符载为记室，宗元作启相贺。作品：《贺赵江陵宗儒辟符载启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷35第899页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371021' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371021' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371021?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺赵江陵宗儒辟符载启</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371021")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371021_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371021'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371021'>某启。伏闻以武都符载为记室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371021_comment'></div>天下立志之士。杂然相顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371021_comment'></div>继以叹息。知为善者得其归向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371021_comment'></div>流言者有所间执。直道之所行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371021_comment'></div>义风之所扬。堂堂焉实在荆山之南矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371021_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。伏以符君之艺术志气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371021_comment'></div>为时闻人。才位未会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371021_comment'></div>盘桓固久。中间因缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371021_comment'></div>陷在危邦。与时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371021", 1371021, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>偃仰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371021_comment'></div>不废其道。而为见忌嫉者横致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371021", 1371021, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>唇吻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371021_comment'></div>房给事以高节特立。明之于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371021_comment'></div>王吏部以清议自任。辨之于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371021_comment'></div>然犹小人浮议。困在交戟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371021_comment'></div>凡诸侯之欲得符君者。域联壤接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371021_comment'></div>而惑于腾沸。环视相让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371021_comment'></div>莫敢先举。及受署之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371021_comment'></div>则皆开口垂臂。怅望悼悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371021_comment'></div>譬之求珠于海。而径寸先得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371021_comment'></div>则众皆怏然罢去。知奇宝之有所归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371021_comment'></div>呜呼。巧言难明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371021_comment'></div>下流多讪。自非大君子出世之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371021_comment'></div>则何望焉。瞻望清风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371021_comment'></div>若在天外。无任感激欣跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371021_comment'></div>轻黩陈贺。不胜战越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371021_comment'></div>不宣。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371021_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1371021_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　元和元年五月，母卢氏病故于永州龙兴寺。宗元谪居永州，不得奉丧事以归。次年，因卢氏侄卢遵护送，得归母祔于万年县栖凤原，与父合葬。宗元撰归祔志。作品：《先太夫人河东县太君归祔志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷13第325页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371256' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371256' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371256?labeling=true' target='_blank'>先太夫人河东县太君归祔志</a><span class='authorDate'>（807年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371256")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371256_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371256'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371256'>先夫人姓卢氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371256_comment'></div>讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371256_comment'></div>世家涿郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371256_comment'></div>寿止六十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371256_comment'></div>元和元年岁次丙戌五月十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371256_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371256", 1371256, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>弃代</span>于永州零陵佛寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371256_comment'></div>明年某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371256_comment'></div>安祔于京兆万年栖凤原先侍御史府君之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371256_comment'></div>其孤有罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371256_comment'></div>衔哀待刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371256_comment'></div>不得归奉丧事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371256_comment'></div>以尽其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371256_comment'></div>侄洎太夫人兄之子宏礼承事焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371256_comment'></div>呜呼天乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371256_comment'></div>太夫人有子不令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371256_comment'></div>而陷于大僇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371256_comment'></div>徙播厉土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371256_comment'></div>医巫药膳之不具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371256_comment'></div>以速天祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371256_comment'></div>非天降之酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371256_comment'></div>将不幸而有恶子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371256_comment'></div>以及是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371256_comment'></div>又今无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371256", 1371256, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>适主</span>以葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371256_comment'></div>天地有穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371256_comment'></div>此冤无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371256_comment'></div>既举葬纼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371256_comment'></div>犹以不孝之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371256_comment'></div>拟述先德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371256_comment'></div>且志其酷焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371256_comment'></div>尝逮事伯舅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371256_comment'></div>闻其称太夫人之行以教曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371256_comment'></div>汝宜知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371256_comment'></div>七岁通毛诗及刘氏列女传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371256_comment'></div>斟酌而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371256_comment'></div>不坠其旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371256_comment'></div>汝宗大家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371256_comment'></div>既事舅姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371256_comment'></div>周睦姻族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371256_comment'></div>柳氏之孝仁益闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371256_comment'></div>岁恶少食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371256_comment'></div>不自足而饱孤幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371256_comment'></div>是良难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371256_comment'></div>又尝侍先君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371256_comment'></div>有闻如舅氏之谓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371256_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371256_comment'></div>吾所读旧史及诸子书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371256_comment'></div>夫人闻而尽知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371256_comment'></div>无遗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371256_comment'></div>某始四岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371256_comment'></div>居京城西田庐中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371256_comment'></div>先君在吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371256_comment'></div>家无书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371256_comment'></div>太夫人教古赋十四首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371256_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1371256", 1371256, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>讽传</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371256_comment'></div>以诗礼图史及剪制缕结授诸女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371256_comment'></div>及长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371256_comment'></div>皆为名妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371256_comment'></div>先君之仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371256_comment'></div>伯母叔母姑姊妹子侄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371256_comment'></div>虽远在数千里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371256_comment'></div>必奉迎以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371256_comment'></div>太夫人之承之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371256_comment'></div>尊己者敬之如臣事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371256_comment'></div>下己者慈之如母畜子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371256_comment'></div>敌己者友之如兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371256_comment'></div>无不得志者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371256_comment'></div>诸姑之有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371256_comment'></div>必废寝食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371256_comment'></div>礼既备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371256_comment'></div>尝有劳疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371256_comment'></div>先君将改葬王父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371256_comment'></div>太夫人泣以莅事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371256_comment'></div>事既具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371256_comment'></div>而大故及焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371256_comment'></div>不得成礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371256_comment'></div>既得命于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371256_comment'></div>祗奉教曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371256_comment'></div>汝忘大事乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371256_comment'></div>吾冢妇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371256_comment'></div>今也宜老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371256_comment'></div>而唯是则不敢暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371256_comment'></div>抑将任焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371256_comment'></div>苟有日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371256_comment'></div>吾其行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371256_comment'></div>及命为邵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371256_comment'></div>又喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371256_comment'></div>吾愿得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371256_comment'></div>竟不至官而及于罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371256_comment'></div>是岁之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371256_comment'></div>天子加恩群臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371256_comment'></div>以宗元任御史尚书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371256_comment'></div>封太夫人河东县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371256_comment'></div>八月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371256_comment'></div>会册太上皇后于兴庆宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371256_comment'></div>礼无违者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371256_comment'></div>既至永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371256_comment'></div>又奉教曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371256_comment'></div>汝唯不恭宪度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371256_comment'></div>既获戾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371256_comment'></div>今将大儆于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371256_comment'></div>以盖前恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371256_comment'></div>敬惧而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371256_comment'></div>苟能是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371256_comment'></div>吾何恨哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371256_comment'></div>明者不悼往事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371256_comment'></div>吾未尝有戚戚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371256_comment'></div>而卒以无孝道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371256_comment'></div>不能有报焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371256_comment'></div>丧主子妇七岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371256_comment'></div>而不果娶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371256_comment'></div>窜穷徼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371256_comment'></div>人多疾殃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371256_comment'></div>炎暑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1371256", 1371256, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>熇蒸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371256_comment'></div>其下卑湿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371256_comment'></div>非所以养也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371256_comment'></div>诊视无所问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371256_comment'></div>药石无所求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371256_comment'></div>祷祠无所实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371256_comment'></div>苍黄叫呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371256_comment'></div>遂遘大罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371256_comment'></div>天乎神乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371256_comment'></div>其忍是乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371256_comment'></div>而独生者谁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371256_comment'></div>为祸为逆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371256_comment'></div>又顽狠而不得死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371256_comment'></div>逾月逾时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371256_comment'></div>以至于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371256_comment'></div>灵车远去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371256_comment'></div>而身独止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371256_comment'></div>元堂暂开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371256_comment'></div>而目不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371256_comment'></div>孤囚穷絷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371256_comment'></div>魄逝心坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371256_comment'></div>苍天苍天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371256_comment'></div>有如是耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371256_comment'></div>而犹言犹食者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371256_comment'></div>何如人耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371256_comment'></div>已矣已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371256_comment'></div>穷天下之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371256_comment'></div>无以舒其哀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371256_comment'></div>尽天下之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371256_comment'></div>无以传其酷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371256_comment'></div>刻之坚石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371256_comment'></div>措之幽阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371256_comment'></div>终天而止矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_144_1371256_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　谪居永州，作赋自哀。作品：《惩咎赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷2第53页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第15页系《惩咎赋》于元和三年之后。）</span><div id='poem_1370867' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370867' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370867?labeling=true' target='_blank'>惩咎赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（807年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370867")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370867_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370867'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370867'>惩咎愆以本始兮。孰非予心之所求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370867_comment'></div>处<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>卑污</span>以闵世兮。固前志之为尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370867_comment'></div>始予学而观古兮。怪今昔之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>异谋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370867_comment'></div>惟聪明为可考兮。追<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>骏步</span>而遐游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370867_comment'></div>洁诚之既信直兮。仁友蔼而萃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370867_comment'></div>日施陈以系縻兮。邀尧舜与之为师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370867_comment'></div>上睢盱而混茫兮。下駮诡而怀私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370867_comment'></div>旁罗列以交贯兮。求大中之所宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370867_comment'></div>曰道有象兮而无其形。推变乘时兮与志相迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370867_comment'></div>不及则殆兮过则失贞。谨守而中兮与时偕行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370867_comment'></div>万类芸芸兮率由以宁。刚柔弛张兮出入纶经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370867_comment'></div>登能抑枉兮白黑浊清。蹈乎大方兮物莫能婴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370867_comment'></div>奉吁谟以植内兮。欣余志之有获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370867_comment'></div>再<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>徵信</span>乎策书兮。谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>炯然</span>而不惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370867_comment'></div>愚者果于自用兮。惟惧夫诚之不一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370867_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>顾虑</span>以周图兮。专兹道以为服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370867_comment'></div>谗妒构而不戒兮。犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>断断</span>于所执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370867_comment'></div>哀吾党之不淑兮。遭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>任遇</span>之卒迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370867_comment'></div>势危疑而多诈兮。逢天地之否隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370867_comment'></div>欲图退而保巳兮。悼乖期乎曩昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370867_comment'></div>欲操术以致忠兮。众呀然而互吓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370867_comment'></div>进与退吾无归兮。甘脂润乎鼎镬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370867_comment'></div>幸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>皇鉴</span>之明宥兮。累郡印而南适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370867_comment'></div>惟罪大而宠厚兮。宜夫重仍乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>祸谪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370867_comment'></div>既明惧乎天讨兮。又幽慄乎鬼责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370867_comment'></div>惶惶乎夜寐而昼骇兮。类麇麚之不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370867_comment'></div>凌洞庭之洋洋兮。溯湘流之沄沄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370867_comment'></div>飘风击以扬波兮。舟摧抑而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>回邅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370867_comment'></div>日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>霾曀</span>以昧幽兮。黝云涌而上屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370867_comment'></div>暮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>屑窣</span>以淫雨兮。听嗷嗷之哀猿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370867_comment'></div>众鸟萃而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>啾号</span>兮。沸洲渚以连山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370867_comment'></div>漂遥逐其讵止兮。逝莫属余之形魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370867_comment'></div>攒峦奔以纡委兮。束汹涌之奔湍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370867_comment'></div>畔尺进而寻退兮。荡回汨乎沦涟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370867_comment'></div>际穷冬而止居兮。羁累棼以萦缠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370867_comment'></div>哀吾生之孔艰兮。循凯风之悲诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370867_comment'></div>罪通天而降酷兮。不殛死而生为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370867_comment'></div>逾再岁之寒暑兮。犹贸贸而自持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370867_comment'></div>将沈渊而陨命兮。讵蔽罪以塞祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370867_comment'></div>惟灭身而无后兮。顾前志犹未可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370867_comment'></div>进路呀以划绝兮。退伏匿又不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370867_comment'></div>为孤囚以终世兮。长拘挛而轗轲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370867_comment'></div>曩予志之修蹇兮。今何为此戾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370867_comment'></div>夫岂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>贪食</span>而盗名兮。不混同于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370867_comment'></div>将显身以直遂兮。众之所宜蔽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370867_comment'></div>不择言以危肆兮。固群祸之际也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370867_comment'></div>御长辕之无桡兮。行九折之峨峨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370867_comment'></div>却<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370867", 1370867, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>惊棹</span>以横江兮。溯凌天之腾波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370867_comment'></div>幸余死之已缓兮。完形躯之既多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370867_comment'></div>苟馀齿之有惩兮。蹈前烈而不颇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370867_comment'></div>死蛮夷固吾所兮。虽显宠其焉加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370867_comment'></div>配大中以为偶兮。谅天命之谓何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370867_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1370867_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　谪居永州。为父柳镇作神道表，详述父亲一生经历及品德政绩。作品：《先侍御史府君神道表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷12第293页，中华书局1979年版。与《先太夫人归祔志》同时作。）</span><div id='poem_1371218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371218' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371218?labeling=true' target='_blank'>先侍御史府君神道表</a><span class='authorDate'>（807年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371218")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371218_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371218'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371218'>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371218_comment'></div>先君之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371218_comment'></div>仲父殿中君志焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371218_comment'></div>孤宗元不敢称道先德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371218_comment'></div>然而无以昭于外者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371218_comment'></div>用敢悉取仲父之所陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371218_comment'></div>而系其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371218_comment'></div>刻兹石表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371218_comment'></div>先君讳镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371218_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371218_comment'></div>六代祖讳庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371218_comment'></div>后魏侍中平齐公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371218_comment'></div>五代祖讳旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371218_comment'></div>周中书侍郎济阴公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371218_comment'></div>高祖讳楷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371218_comment'></div>隋刺济房兰廓四州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371218_comment'></div>曾伯祖讳奭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371218_comment'></div>字子燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371218_comment'></div>唐中书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371218_comment'></div>曾祖讳子夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371218_comment'></div>徐州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371218_comment'></div>祖讳从裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371218_comment'></div>沧州清池令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371218_comment'></div>皇考讳察躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371218_comment'></div>湖州德清令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371218_comment'></div>世德廉孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371218_comment'></div>飏于河浒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371218_comment'></div>士之称家风者归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371218_comment'></div>先君之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371218_comment'></div>得诗之群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371218_comment'></div>书之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371218_comment'></div>易之直方大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371218_comment'></div>春秋之惩劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371218_comment'></div>以植于内而文于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371218_comment'></div>垂声当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371218_comment'></div>天宝末经术高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371218_comment'></div>遇乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371218_comment'></div>奉德清君夫人载家书隐王屋山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371218_comment'></div>间行以求食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371218_comment'></div>深处以修业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371218_comment'></div>作避暑赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371218_comment'></div>合群从弟子侄讲春秋左氏易王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371218_comment'></div>衎衎无倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371218_comment'></div>以忘其忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371218_comment'></div>德清君喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371218_comment'></div>兹谓遁世无闷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371218_comment'></div>乱有间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371218_comment'></div>举族如吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371218_comment'></div>无以为食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371218_comment'></div>先君独乘驴无僮御以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371218_comment'></div>求仁者冀以给食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371218_comment'></div>尝经山涧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371218_comment'></div>水卒至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371218_comment'></div>流抵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1371218", 1371218, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>大壑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371218_comment'></div>得以无苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371218_comment'></div>被濡涂以行无愠容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371218_comment'></div>观者哀悼而致礼加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371218_comment'></div>季王父六合君忤贵臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371218_comment'></div>死于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1371218", 1371218, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>吏舍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371218_comment'></div>犹鞫其状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371218_comment'></div>先君改服徒行逾四千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371218_comment'></div>告于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371218_comment'></div>由是贷其问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371218_comment'></div>既而以为天子平大难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371218_comment'></div>发大号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371218_comment'></div>且致太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371218_comment'></div>人罹兵戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371218_comment'></div>农去耒耜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371218_comment'></div>宜以时兴太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371218_comment'></div>劝耦耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371218_comment'></div>作三老五更议耤田书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371218_comment'></div>斋沐以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371218_comment'></div>道不果用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371218_comment'></div>授左卫率府兵曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371218_comment'></div>尚父汾阳王居朔方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371218_comment'></div>备礼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1371218", 1371218, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>延望</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371218_comment'></div>授左金吾卫仓曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371218_comment'></div>为节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371218_comment'></div>专掌书奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371218_comment'></div>进大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371218_comment'></div>以为刑法者军旅之桢干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371218_comment'></div>斥候者边鄙之视听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371218_comment'></div>不可以不具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371218_comment'></div>作晋文公三罪议守边论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371218_comment'></div>议事确直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371218_comment'></div>世不能容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371218_comment'></div>表为晋州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371218_comment'></div>晋之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371218_comment'></div>故将也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371218_comment'></div>少文而悍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371218_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1371218", 1371218, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>酣嗜</span>杀戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371218_comment'></div>吏莫敢与之争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371218_comment'></div>先君独抗以理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371218_comment'></div>无辜将死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371218_comment'></div>常以身捍笞箠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371218_comment'></div>拒不受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371218_comment'></div>守大怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371218_comment'></div>投几折箦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371218_comment'></div>而无以夺焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371218_comment'></div>以为自下绳上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371218_comment'></div>其势将殆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371218_comment'></div>作泉竭木摧诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371218_comment'></div>终秉直以免于耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371218_comment'></div>调长安主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371218_comment'></div>居德清君之丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371218_comment'></div>哀有过而礼不逾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371218_comment'></div>为士者咸服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371218_comment'></div>服既除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371218_comment'></div>常吏部命为太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371218_comment'></div>先君固曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371218_comment'></div>有尊老孤弱在吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371218_comment'></div>愿为宣城令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371218_comment'></div>三辞而后获徙为宣城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371218_comment'></div>四年作阌乡令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371218_comment'></div>考绩皆最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371218_comment'></div>吏人怀思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371218_comment'></div>立石颂德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371218_comment'></div>迁殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371218_comment'></div>为鄂岳沔都团练判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371218_comment'></div>元戎大攘狡虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371218_comment'></div>增地进律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371218_comment'></div>作夏口破虏颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371218_comment'></div>后数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371218_comment'></div>登朝为真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371218_comment'></div>会宰相与宪府比周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371218_comment'></div>诬陷正士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371218_comment'></div>以校私雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371218_comment'></div>有击<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_127_1371218", 1371218, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>登闻鼓</span>以闻于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371218_comment'></div>上命先君总三司以听理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371218_comment'></div>至则平反之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371218_comment'></div>为相者不敢恃威以济欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371218_comment'></div>为长者不敢怀私以请间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371218_comment'></div>群冤获宥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371218_comment'></div>邪党侧目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371218_comment'></div>封章密献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371218_comment'></div>归命天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371218_comment'></div>遂莫敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371218_comment'></div>逾年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371218_comment'></div>卒中以他事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371218_comment'></div>贬夔州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371218_comment'></div>作鹰鹯诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371218_comment'></div>居三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371218_comment'></div>丑类就殛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371218_comment'></div>拜侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371218_comment'></div>制书曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371218_comment'></div>守正为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371218_comment'></div>疾恶不惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371218_comment'></div>先君捧以流涕曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371218_comment'></div>吾惟一子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371218_comment'></div>爱甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371218_comment'></div>方谪去至蓝田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371218_comment'></div>诀曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371218_comment'></div>吾目无涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371218_comment'></div>今而不知衣之濡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371218_comment'></div>抑有当我哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371218_comment'></div>作喜霁之歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371218_comment'></div>副职持宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371218_comment'></div>以正经纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371218_comment'></div>贞元九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371218_comment'></div>宗元得进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371218_comment'></div>上问有司曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371218_comment'></div>得无以朝士子冒进者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371218_comment'></div>有司以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371218_comment'></div>上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1371218_comment'></div>是故抗奸臣窦参者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371218_comment'></div>吾知其不为子求举矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371218_comment'></div>是岁五月十七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371218_comment'></div>终于亲仁里第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371218_comment'></div>享年五十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371218_comment'></div>七月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371218_comment'></div>葬于万年县栖凤原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371218_comment'></div>后十一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1371218_comment'></div>宗元由御史为尚书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1371218_comment'></div>天子行庆于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1371218_comment'></div>申命崇赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1371218_comment'></div>而有司草创颇缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1371218_comment'></div>会宗元得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1371218_comment'></div>遂寝不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1371218_comment'></div>太夫人范阳卢氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1371218_comment'></div>某官某之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1371218_comment'></div>实有全德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1371218_comment'></div>为九族宗师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1371218_comment'></div>用柔明勤俭以行其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1371218_comment'></div>用图史<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_183_1371218", 1371218, "Clauses/183/Comments/0")'>箴诫</span>以施其教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1371218_comment'></div>故二女之归他姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1371218_comment'></div>咸为表式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1371218_comment'></div>太夫人既授封河东县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1371218_comment'></div>会册太上皇后于兴庆宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1371218_comment'></div>既乃宗元贬秩为永州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1371218_comment'></div>奉侍温凊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1371218_comment'></div>未尝见忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1371218_comment'></div>元和元年五月十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1371218_comment'></div>终于州之佛寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1371218_comment'></div>享年六十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1371218_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1371218_comment'></div>宗元不谨先君之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1371218_comment'></div>以陷大祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1371218_comment'></div>幸而缓于死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1371218_comment'></div>既不克成先君之宠赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1371218_comment'></div>又无以宁太夫人之饮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1371218_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_200_1371218", 1371218, "Clauses/200/Comments/0")'>天殛</span>荐酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1371218_comment'></div>名在刑书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1371218_comment'></div>不得手开元堂以奉安祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1371218_comment'></div>罪恶益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1371218_comment'></div>世无所容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1371218_comment'></div>尚顾嗣续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1371218_comment'></div>不敢即死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1371218_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_207_1371218", 1371218, "Clauses/207/Comments/0")'>支缀</span>气息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1371218_comment'></div>以严邦刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1371218_comment'></div>大惧祭祀之无主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1371218_comment'></div>以忝盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1371218_comment'></div>敢用特牲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1371218_comment'></div>昭告神道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1371218_comment'></div>号叫万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1371218_comment'></div>以毕其辞云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_214_1371218_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　谪居永州。为父柳镇撰先友记，记其先友六十七人，以刻于墓碑之阴。作品：《先君石表阴先友记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷12第298页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371219' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371219_comment'></div>河南人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371219_comment'></div>以给事中敢谏争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371219_comment'></div>贞直忠蹇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371219_comment'></div>举无与比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371219_comment'></div>能使所居官大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371219_comment'></div>再赠至礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371219_comment'></div>姜公辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371219_comment'></div>为内学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371219_comment'></div>以奇策取相位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371219_comment'></div>好谏诤免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371219_comment'></div>后以罪贬为复州刺史卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371219_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1371219'>齐映。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371219_comment'></div>南阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371219_comment'></div>为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371219_comment'></div>以文敏显用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371219_comment'></div>严郢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371219_comment'></div>河南人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371219_comment'></div>刚厉好杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371219_comment'></div>号忠能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371219_comment'></div>为京兆河南尹御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371219_comment'></div>善举职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371219_comment'></div>为邪险构扇。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1371219_comment'></div>好以德报怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371219_comment'></div>恢然者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371219_comment'></div>为大官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371219_comment'></div>有土地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371219_comment'></div>入为太子宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371219_comment'></div>杜黄裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371219_comment'></div>京兆人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371219_comment'></div>宏大人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371219_comment'></div>善言体要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371219_comment'></div>为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371219_comment'></div>有墙仞不佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371219_comment'></div>以谋克蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371219_comment'></div>加司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371219_comment'></div>出为河中节度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371219_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1371219'>刘公济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371219_comment'></div>河间人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371219_comment'></div>厚宽硕大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371219_comment'></div>与物无忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371219_comment'></div>为渭北节度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371219_comment'></div>入为工部尚书卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371219_comment'></div>杨氏兄弟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371219_comment'></div>宏农人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371219_comment'></div>皆孝友有文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371219_comment'></div>凭由江南西道入为散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371219_comment'></div>凝以兵部郎中卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371219_comment'></div>凌以大理评事卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371219_comment'></div>最善文。<div id='poem_sentence_54_1371219_comment'></div>河南人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371219_comment'></div>皆强毅仁孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371219_comment'></div>赞为御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371219_comment'></div>捍佞倖得贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371219_comment'></div>后至宣池歙处置使卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371219_comment'></div>质为尚书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371219_comment'></div>以侍御史内供奉卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371219_comment'></div>最善文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371219_comment'></div>皇甫政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371219_comment'></div>河南人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371287_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　谪居永州。长沙龙安寺禅师如海卒，宗元应其弟子浩初等人之请，撰碑文。作品：《龙安海禅师碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷6第159页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371212' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371212' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371212?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙安海禅师碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371212")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371212_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371212'>佛之生也。远中国仅二万里。其没也。距今兹仅二千载。故传道益微。而言禅最病。拘则泥乎物。诞则离乎真。真离而诞益胜。故今之空愚失惑纵傲自我者。皆诬禅以乱其教。冒于嚚昏。放于淫荒。其异是者。长沙之南曰龙安师。师之言曰。由迦叶至师子。二十二世而离。离而为达摩。由达摩至忍。五世而益离。离而为秀为能。南北相訾。反戾斗狠。其道遂隐。呜呼。吾将合焉。且世之传书者。皆马鸣龙树道也。二师之道。其书具存。徵其书。合于志。可以不慁。于是北学于惠隐。南求于马素。咸黜其异。以蹈乎中。乖离而愈同。空洞而益实。作安禅通明论。推一而适万。则事无非真。混万而归一。则真无非事。推而未尝推。故无适。混而未尝混。故无归。块然趣定。至于旬时。是之谓施用。茫然同俗。极乎流动。是之谓真常。居长沙在定十四日。人即其处而成室宇。遂为宝应寺。去于湘之西。人又从之。负大木。砻密石。以益其居。又为龙安寺焉。尚书裴公某李公某侍郎吕公某杨公某御史中丞房公某。咸尊师之道。执弟子礼。凡年八十一。为僧五十三期。元和三年二月九日而没。其弟子元觉洎怀直浩初等。状其师之行。谒予为碑。曰。师周姓。如海名也。世为士。父曰择交。同州录事参军。叔曰择从。尚书礼部侍郎。师始为释。其父夺之志使仕。至成都主簿。不乐也。天宝之乱。复其初心。尝居京师西明寺。又居岣嵝山。终龙安寺。葬其原。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371212_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371212'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371212'>浮图之修。其奥为禅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371212_comment'></div>殊区异世。谁得其传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371212_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371212", 1371212, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>遁隐</span>乖离。浮游散迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371212_comment'></div>莫徵旁行。徒听浮言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371212_comment'></div>空有互斗。南北相残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371212_comment'></div>谁其会之。楚有龙安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371212_comment'></div>龙安之德。惟觉是则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371212_comment'></div>苞并绝异。表正失惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371212_comment'></div>貌昧形静。功流无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371212_comment'></div>动言有为。弥寂而默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371212_comment'></div>祠庙之严。我居不饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371212_comment'></div>贵贱之来。我道无得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371212_comment'></div>逝耶匪追。至耶谁抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371212_comment'></div>惟世之几。惟道之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371212_comment'></div>既陈而明。乃去而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371212_comment'></div>象物徒设。真源无依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371212_comment'></div>后学谁师。呜呼兹碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371212_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1371212_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　谪居永州。应龙兴寺主持僧、般舟和尚之徒重巽之请，为般舟和尚撰碑文。作品：《南岳般舟和尚第二碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷7第167页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371210' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371210' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371210?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南岳般舟和尚第二碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371210")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371210_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371210'>佛法至于衡山及津大师。始修起律教。由其坛场而出者。为得正法。其大弟子曰日悟和尚。尽得师之道。次补其处为浮图者宗。世家于零陵。蒋姓也。和尚心大而行密。体卑而道尊。以为由定发慧。必用毗尼为之室宇。遂执业于东林恩大师。究观秘义。乃归传教。不视文字。悬判深微。登坛莅事。度比邱众。凡岁千人者三十有七。而道不慁。以为去凡即圣。必以三昧为之轨道。遂服勤于紫霄远大师。修明要奥。得以观佛浩。入性海。洞开真源。道场专精。长跪右绕。不衡不倚。凡七日者百有二十。而志不衰。初开元中诏定制度。师乃居本郡龙兴寺。肃宗制天下名山置大德七人。兹岳尤重。推择居首。师乃即崇岭。是作精室。辟林莽。刳岩峦。殿舍宏大。廊庑修直。不命而献力。不祈而荐货。凡南方人颛念佛三昧者。必由于是。命曰般舟台焉。和尚生十三年而始出家。又九年而受具戒。又十年而处坛场。又三十七年而当贞元二十年正月十七日。化于兹室。呜呼。无德而修。故念为实相。不取于法。故律为大乘。坏衣不饰。揣食不味。覆荐服役。凡出于生物者。摈而勿用。不自知其慈。摄取调御。凡归于正真者。动而成群。不自知其教。万行方厉。一性恒如。寂用之涯。不可得也。有弟子曰景秀。嗣居法会。欲广其师之德。延于罔极。故申明陈辞。俾刊之兹碑。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371210_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371210'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371210'>像教南被。及津而尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371210_comment'></div>威仪有严。载辟其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371210_comment'></div>吾师是嗣。增浚道源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371210_comment'></div>度众逾广。大明群昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371210_comment'></div>乃兴毗尼。微密是论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371210_comment'></div>八万总结。彰于一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371210_comment'></div>声闻熙熙。遐迩来奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371210_comment'></div>如木既拔。有植其根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371210_comment'></div>乃法般舟。奥妙斯存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371210_comment'></div>百亿冥会。观于化元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371210_comment'></div>同道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371210", 1371210, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>祁祁</span>。功庸以敦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371210_comment'></div>如水斯壅。流之无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371210_comment'></div>帝求人师。登我先觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371210_comment'></div>赫矣明命。表兹灵岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371210_comment'></div>于彼南阜。斋宫爰作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371210_comment'></div>负揭致货。时靡要约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371210_comment'></div>袒奋程力。不呼而诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371210_comment'></div>是刈是凿。既涂既斲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371210_comment'></div>层构孔硕。以延后学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371210_comment'></div>出不牛马。服不絮帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371210_comment'></div>匪安其躬。亦菲其食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371210_comment'></div>勤而不劳。在用恒寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371210_comment'></div>纵而不傲。在舍恒得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371210_comment'></div>洪融混合。孰究其迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371210_comment'></div>懿兹遗光。式是嘉则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371210_comment'></div>容貌往矣。轨仪无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371210_comment'></div>其徒追思。赓荐兹石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371210_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1371210_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　在永州司马任。吴武陵坐事贬永，宗元与之交甚厚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　谪居永州。以吴武陵和柳先生问答为题，撰文称许晋地文明。作品：《晋问》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷15第415页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371187' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371187' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371187?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晋问</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371187")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371187_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371187'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371187'>吴子问于柳先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371187_comment'></div>先生晋人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371187_comment'></div>晋之故宜知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371187_comment'></div>曰然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371187_comment'></div>然则吾愿闻之可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371187_comment'></div>曰可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371187_comment'></div>晋之故封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371187_comment'></div>太行掎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371187_comment'></div>首阳起之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371187_comment'></div>黄河迤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371187_comment'></div>大陆靡之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371187_comment'></div>或巍而高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371187_comment'></div>或呀而渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371187_comment'></div>景霍汾浍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371187_comment'></div>以经其壖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371187_comment'></div>若化若迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371187_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>钩婴</span>蝉联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371187_comment'></div>然后融为平川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371187_comment'></div>而侯之都居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371187_comment'></div>大夫之邑建焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371187_comment'></div>其高壮则腾突<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>撑拒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371187_comment'></div>聱岈郁怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371187_comment'></div>若熊罴之咆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371187_comment'></div>虎豹之嗥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371187_comment'></div>终古而不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371187_comment'></div>攫秦搏齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371187_comment'></div>当者失据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371187_comment'></div>燕狄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>惴怯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371187_comment'></div>若卵就压。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371187_comment'></div>振振业业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371187_comment'></div>觑关蹀户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371187_comment'></div>惕若仆妾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371187_comment'></div>其桉衍则平盈旋缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371187_comment'></div>纡徐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>夷延</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371187_comment'></div>若飞䳒之翔舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371187_comment'></div>洄水之容与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371187_comment'></div>以稼则硕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371187_comment'></div>以植则茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371187_comment'></div>以牧则蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371187_comment'></div>以畜则庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371187_comment'></div>而人用是富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371187_comment'></div>而邦以之阜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371187_comment'></div>其河则浚源昆崙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371187_comment'></div>入于天渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371187_comment'></div>出乎无门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371187_comment'></div>行乎无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371187_comment'></div>自匈奴而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371187_comment'></div>以介西鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371187_comment'></div>冲奔太华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371187_comment'></div>运肘东指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371187_comment'></div>混溃后土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371187_comment'></div>濆浊麋沸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371187_comment'></div>鼋鼍诡怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371187_comment'></div>于于汨汨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371187_comment'></div>腾倒䭿越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371187_comment'></div>委泊涯涘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371187_comment'></div>呀呷欱纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371187_comment'></div>摧杂失坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371187_comment'></div>其所荡激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371187_comment'></div>则连山参差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371187_comment'></div>广野坏裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371187_comment'></div>轰雷怒风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371187_comment'></div>撼鵨于⿰<span class='inlineComment2'>（山戛）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371187_comment'></div>崩石之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>转跃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371187_comment'></div>大木之所擢拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371187_comment'></div><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_66_1371187_comment'></div>若万夫之斩伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371187_comment'></div>而其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>轴轳</span>之所负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371187_comment'></div>橦樯之所御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371187_comment'></div>鳞川林壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371187_comment'></div>隳云遁雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371187_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>瞬目</span>而下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371187_comment'></div>榛榛沄沄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371187_comment'></div>百舍一赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371187_comment'></div>若是何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371187_comment'></div>吴子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371187_comment'></div>先生之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371187_comment'></div>丰厚险固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371187_comment'></div>诚晋之美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371187_comment'></div>然晋人之言表里山河者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371187_comment'></div>备败而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371187_comment'></div>非以为荣观显大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371187_comment'></div>吴起所谓在德不在险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371187_comment'></div>此晋人之藉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371187_comment'></div>愿闻其他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371187_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_86_1371187'>先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371187_comment'></div>大卤之金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371187_comment'></div>棠溪之工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371187_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>火化</span>水淬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371187_comment'></div>器备以充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371187_comment'></div>为棘为矛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371187_comment'></div>为锻为钩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371187_comment'></div>为镝为镞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371187_comment'></div>为槊为鍭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371187_comment'></div>出太白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371187_comment'></div>徵蓐收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371187_comment'></div>召招摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371187_comment'></div>伏蚩尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371187_comment'></div>肃肃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>褷褷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371187_comment'></div>合众灵而成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371187_comment'></div>博者狭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371187_comment'></div>曲者直者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371187_comment'></div>歧者劲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371187_comment'></div>长者短者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371187_comment'></div>攒之如星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371187_comment'></div>奋之如霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371187_comment'></div>运之如萦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371187_comment'></div>浩浩奕奕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371187_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>淋淋</span>涤涤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371187_comment'></div>荧荧的的。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371187_comment'></div>若雪山冰谷之积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371187_comment'></div>观者胆掉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371187_comment'></div>目出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_113_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>寒液</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371187_comment'></div>当空<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>发耀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371187_comment'></div>英精互绕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371187_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_116_1371187", 1371187, id='poem_sentence_126_1371187_comment'></div>南瞰诸华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371187_comment'></div>北詟群夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371187_comment'></div>技击节制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371187_comment'></div>闻于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371187_comment'></div>是为善师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371187_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_132_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>延目</span>而望之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371187_comment'></div>固以拳拘喘汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371187_comment'></div>免冑肉袒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371187_comment'></div>进不敢降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371187_comment'></div>退不敢窜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371187_comment'></div>若是何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371187_comment'></div>吴子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371187_comment'></div>夫兵之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371187_comment'></div>由德则吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371187_comment'></div>由暴则凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371187_comment'></div>是又不可为美观也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371187_comment'></div>先轸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371187_comment'></div>师直为壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371187_comment'></div>曲为老。<div id='poem_sentence_154_1371187_comment'></div>师师兟兟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371187_comment'></div>溶溶沄沄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371187_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_157_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>轠轠</span>辚辚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371187_comment'></div>或赤或黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371187_comment'></div>或元或苍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371187_comment'></div>或醇或䮾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371187_comment'></div>黭然而阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371187_comment'></div>炳然而阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371187_comment'></div>若旌旃旂帜之煌煌。<div
