id='poem_sentence_365_1371187_comment'></div>则掩鼻蹙頞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_366_1371187_comment'></div>贱甚粪土而莫顾者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_367_1371187_comment'></div>若是何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_368_1371187_comment'></div>吴子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_369_1371187_comment'></div>一时之观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_370_1371187_comment'></div>不足以夸后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_371_1371187_comment'></div>口舌之味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_372_1371187_comment'></div>不足以利百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_373_1371187_comment'></div>姑欲闻其上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_374_1371187_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_375_1371187'>先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_375_1371187_comment'></div>猗氏之盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_376_1371187_comment'></div>晋宝之大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_377_1371187_comment'></div>人之赖之与谷同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_378_1371187_comment'></div>化若神造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_379_1371187_comment'></div>非人力之功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_380_1371187_comment'></div>但至其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_381_1371187_comment'></div>则见沟塍畦畹之交错轮囷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_382_1371187_comment'></div>若稼若圃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_383_1371187_comment'></div>敞兮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_384_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/384/Comments/0")'>匀匀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_384_1371187_comment'></div>涣兮鳞鳞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_385_1371187_comment'></div>逦㳽纷属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_386_1371187_comment'></div>不知其垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_387_1371187_comment'></div>俄然决源酾流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_388_1371187_comment'></div>交灌互澍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_389_1371187_comment'></div>若枝若股。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_390_1371187_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_391_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/391/Comments/0")'>委屈</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_391_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/391/Comments/1")'>延布</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_391_1371187_comment'></div>脉写膏浸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_392_1371187_comment'></div>潗湿滑汨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_393_1371187_comment'></div>弥高掩庳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_394_1371187_comment'></div>漫垄冒块。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_395_1371187_comment'></div>决决<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_396_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/396/Comments/0")'>没没</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_396_1371187_comment'></div>远近混会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_397_1371187_comment'></div>抵值堤防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_398_1371187_comment'></div>瀴瀛沛濊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_399_1371187_comment'></div>偃然成渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_400_1371187_comment'></div>漭然成川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_401_1371187_comment'></div>观之者徒见浩浩之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_402_1371187_comment'></div>而莫知其以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_403_1371187_comment'></div>及神液阴漉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_404_1371187_comment'></div>甘卤密起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_405_1371187_comment'></div>孕灵富媪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_406_1371187_comment'></div>不爱其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_407_1371187_comment'></div>无声无形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_408_1371187_comment'></div>熛结迅诡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_409_1371187_comment'></div>回眸一瞬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_410_1371187_comment'></div>积雪百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_411_1371187_comment'></div>皛皛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_412_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/412/Comments/0")'>羃羃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_412_1371187_comment'></div>奋偾离析。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_413_1371187_comment'></div>锻圭椎璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_414_1371187_comment'></div>眩转的皪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_415_1371187_comment'></div>乍似陨星及地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_416_1371187_comment'></div>明灭相射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_417_1371187_comment'></div>冰裂雹碎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_418_1371187_comment'></div>巃嵷增益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_419_1371187_comment'></div>大者印累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_420_1371187_comment'></div>小者珠剖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_421_1371187_comment'></div>涌者如坻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_422_1371187_comment'></div>坳者如缶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_423_1371187_comment'></div>日晶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_424_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/424/Comments/0")'>熠煜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_424_1371187_comment'></div>萤骇电走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_425_1371187_comment'></div>亘步盈车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_426_1371187_comment'></div>方尺数斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_427_1371187_comment'></div>于是裒敛合集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_428_1371187_comment'></div>举而堆之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_429_1371187_comment'></div>皓皓乎悬圃之巍巍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_430_1371187_comment'></div>皦乎溔乎狂山太白之淋漓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_431_1371187_comment'></div>骇化变之神奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_432_1371187_comment'></div>卒不可推也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_433_1371187_comment'></div>然后驴骡牛马之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_434_1371187_comment'></div>西出秦陇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_435_1371187_comment'></div>南过樊邓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_436_1371187_comment'></div>北极燕代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_437_1371187_comment'></div>东逾周宋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_438_1371187_comment'></div>家获作咸之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_439_1371187_comment'></div>人被六气之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_440_1371187_comment'></div>和钧兵食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_441_1371187_comment'></div>以征以贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_442_1371187_comment'></div>其赉天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_443_1371187_comment'></div>与海分功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_444_1371187_comment'></div>可谓有济矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_445_1371187_comment'></div>若是何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_446_1371187_comment'></div>吴子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_447_1371187_comment'></div>魏绛之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_448_1371187_comment'></div>近宝则公室乃贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_449_1371187_comment'></div>岂谓是耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_450_1371187_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_451_1371187_comment'></div>此可以利民矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_452_1371187_comment'></div>而未为民利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_453_1371187_comment'></div>先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_454_1371187_comment'></div>愿闻民利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_455_1371187_comment'></div>吴子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_456_1371187_comment'></div>安其常而得所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_457_1371187_comment'></div>服其教而便于己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_458_1371187_comment'></div>百货通行而不知所自来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_459_1371187_comment'></div>老幼亲戚相保而无德之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_460_1371187_comment'></div>不若兵刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_461_1371187_comment'></div>不疾赋力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_462_1371187_comment'></div>所谓民利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_463_1371187_comment'></div>民自利者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_464_1371187_comment'></div>先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_465_1371187_comment'></div>文公之霸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_466_1371187_comment'></div>援秦破楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_467_1371187_comment'></div>囊括齐宋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_468_1371187_comment'></div>曹卫解裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_469_1371187_comment'></div>鲁郑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_470_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/470/Comments/0")'>震恐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_470_1371187_comment'></div>定周于温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_471_1371187_comment'></div>奉册受锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_472_1371187_comment'></div>夹辅纠逖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_473_1371187_comment'></div>以为侯伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_474_1371187_comment'></div>齐盟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_475_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/475/Comments/0")'>践土</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_475_1371187_comment'></div>低昂玉帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_476_1371187_comment'></div>天子恃焉以有诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_477_1371187_comment'></div>诸侯恃焉以有其国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_478_1371187_comment'></div>百姓恃焉以有其妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_479_1371187_comment'></div>而食其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_480_1371187_comment'></div>叛者力取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_481_1371187_comment'></div>附者仁抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_482_1371187_comment'></div>推德义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_483_1371187_comment'></div>立信让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_484_1371187_comment'></div>示必行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_485_1371187_comment'></div>明所向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_486_1371187_comment'></div>达禁止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_487_1371187_comment'></div>一好尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_488_1371187_comment'></div>春秋之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_489_1371187_comment'></div>公侯大夫策文马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_490_1371187_comment'></div>驰轩车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_491_1371187_comment'></div>出入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_492_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/492/Comments/0")'>环连</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_492_1371187_comment'></div>贯于国都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_493_1371187_comment'></div>则有五筵之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_494_1371187_comment'></div>九凡之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_495_1371187_comment'></div>大小定位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_496_1371187_comment'></div>左右有秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_497_1371187_comment'></div>禽牢饩馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_498_1371187_comment'></div>交错文质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_499_1371187_comment'></div>飨有嘉乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_500_1371187_comment'></div>宴有庭实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_501_1371187_comment'></div>登降好赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_502_1371187_comment'></div>牺象毕出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_503_1371187_comment'></div>犒劳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_504_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/504/Comments/0")'>赠贿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_504_1371187_comment'></div>率礼无失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_505_1371187_comment'></div>六卿理兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_506_1371187_comment'></div>大戎小戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_507_1371187_comment'></div>钟鼓丁宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_508_1371187_comment'></div>以讨不恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_509_1371187_comment'></div>车埒万乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_510_1371187_comment'></div>卒半天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_511_1371187_comment'></div>鼓之则震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_512_1371187_comment'></div>旆之则畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_513_1371187_comment'></div>其号令之动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_514_1371187_comment'></div>若水之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_515_1371187_comment'></div>若轮之旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_516_1371187_comment'></div>莫不如志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_517_1371187_comment'></div>当此之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_518_1371187_comment'></div>咸能驩娱以奉其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_519_1371187_comment'></div>故其民至于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_520_1371187_comment'></div>好义而任力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_521_1371187_comment'></div>此以民力自固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_522_1371187_comment'></div>假仁义而用天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_523_1371187_comment'></div>其遗风尚有存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_524_1371187_comment'></div>若是可以为民利也乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_525_1371187_comment'></div>吴子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_526_1371187_comment'></div>近之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_527_1371187_comment'></div>然犹未也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_528_1371187_comment'></div>彼霸者之为心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_529_1371187_comment'></div>引大利以自向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_530_1371187_comment'></div>而搂他人之力以自为固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_531_1371187_comment'></div>而民乃后焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_532_1371187_comment'></div>非不知而化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_533_1371187_comment'></div>不令而一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_534_1371187_comment'></div>异乎吾向之陈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_535_1371187_comment'></div>故曰近之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_536_1371187_comment'></div>犹未也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_537_1371187_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_538_1371187'>先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_538_1371187_comment'></div>三河古帝王之更都焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_539_1371187_comment'></div>而平阳尧之所理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_540_1371187_comment'></div>有茅茨采椽土型之度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_541_1371187_comment'></div>故其人至于今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_542_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/542/Comments/0")'>俭啬</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_542_1371187_comment'></div>有温恭克让之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_543_1371187_comment'></div>故其人至于今善让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_544_1371187_comment'></div>有师锡佥曰畴咨之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_545_1371187_comment'></div>故其人至于今好谋而深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_546_1371187_comment'></div>有百兽率舞凤凰来仪于变时雍之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_547_1371187_comment'></div>故其人至于今和而不怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_548_1371187_comment'></div>有昌言儆戒之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_549_1371187_comment'></div>故其人至于今忧思而畏祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_550_1371187_comment'></div>有无为不言垂衣裳之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_551_1371187_comment'></div>故其人至于今恬以愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_552_1371187_comment'></div>此尧之遗风也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_553_1371187_comment'></div>愿以闻于子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_554_1371187_comment'></div>何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_555_1371187_comment'></div>吴子离席而立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_556_1371187_comment'></div>拱而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_557_1371187_comment'></div>美矣善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_558_1371187_comment'></div>其蔑有加矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_559_1371187_comment'></div>此固吾之所欲闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_560_1371187_comment'></div>夫俭则人用足而不淫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_561_1371187_comment'></div>让则遵分而进善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_562_1371187_comment'></div>其道不斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_563_1371187_comment'></div>谋则通于远而周于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_564_1371187_comment'></div>和则仁之质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_565_1371187_comment'></div>戒则义之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_566_1371187_comment'></div>恬以愉则安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_567_1371187_comment'></div>而久于其道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_568_1371187_comment'></div>至乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_569_1371187_comment'></div>今主上方致太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_570_1371187_comment'></div>动以尧为准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_571_1371187_comment'></div>先生之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_572_1371187_comment'></div>道之奥者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_573_1371187_comment'></div>若果有贡于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_574_1371187_comment'></div>则吾知其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_575_1371187", 1371187, "Clauses/575/Comments/0")'>易易</span>焉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_575_1371187_comment'></div>举晋国之风以一诸天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_576_1371187_comment'></div>如斯而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_577_1371187_comment'></div>敬再拜受赐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_578_1371187_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　谪居永州。受吴武陵之请，为其父文集作序。作品：《濮阳吴君文集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷21第581页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371030' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371030' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371030?labeling=true' target='_blank'>濮阳吴君文集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371030")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371030_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371030'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371030'>博陵崔成务尝为信州从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371030_comment'></div>为予言邑有闻人濮阳吴君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371030_comment'></div>弱龄长鬣而广额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371030_comment'></div>好学而善文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371030_comment'></div>居乡党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371030_comment'></div>未尝不以信义交于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371030_comment'></div>教子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371030_comment'></div>未尝不以忠孝端其本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371030_comment'></div>以是卿相贤士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371030_comment'></div>率与亢礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371030_comment'></div>予尝闻而志乎心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371030_comment'></div>会其子侃更名武陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371030_comment'></div>升进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371030_comment'></div>得罪来永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371030_comment'></div>因奉其先人文集十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371030_comment'></div>再拜请予以文冠其首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371030_comment'></div>予得遍观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371030_comment'></div>其为辞赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371030_comment'></div>有戒苟冒陵僭之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371030_comment'></div>其为诗歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371030_comment'></div>有交王公大人之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371030_comment'></div>其为诔志吊祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371030_comment'></div>有孝恭慈仁之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371030_comment'></div>而多举六经圣人之大旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371030_comment'></div>发言成章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371030_comment'></div>有可观者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371030_comment'></div>古之司徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371030_comment'></div>必求秀士由乡而升之天官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371030_comment'></div>古之太史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371030_comment'></div>必采民风陈诗以献于法宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371030_comment'></div>然后材不遗而志可见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371030_comment'></div>近世之居位者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371030_comment'></div>或未能尽用古道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371030_comment'></div>故吴君之行不昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371030_comment'></div>而其辞不荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371030_comment'></div>虽一命于王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371030_comment'></div>而终伏其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371030_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371030_comment'></div>其可惜哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371030_comment'></div>武陵又论次志传三卷继于末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371030_comment'></div>其官氏及他才行甚具云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1371030_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　谪居永州。赵大秀才往江陵谒尚书赵昌，宗元作序送之。作品：《送赵大秀才往江陵谒赵尚书序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷22第608页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371044' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371044' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371044?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送赵大秀才往江陵谒赵尚书序</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371044")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371044_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371044'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371044'>士之知感激许与。常欲以有报为志者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371044_comment'></div>则凡志乎道者。咸愿为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371044_comment'></div>如赵生庶乎哉。来谓予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371044_comment'></div>宗人尚书以硕德崇功。由交广临荆州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371044_comment'></div>仁我若子姓。恩礼重厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371044_comment'></div>有贤子为御史。好学而甚文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371044_comment'></div>友我若同生。欢欣交通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371044_comment'></div>我诚乐为之用。甚不辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371044_comment'></div>不幸遭重痼。六旬而后知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371044_comment'></div>方其急也。大惧不克报尚书公之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371044_comment'></div>又惧无以当御史君之心以没。每念于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371044_comment'></div>未尝不衋然内伤。若受锋刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371044_comment'></div>自是而后。调药石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371044_comment'></div>时饮食。生血补气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371044_comment'></div>强筋植骨。荣卫之和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371044_comment'></div>膂力之刚。迨今兹始全然为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371044_comment'></div>舒干抗首。文翰端丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371044_comment'></div>材足以用。敢辞而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371044_comment'></div>以效于戏下。其言云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371044_comment'></div>自吾窜永州三年。赵生亟见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371044_comment'></div>视其状。专谨愿悫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371044_comment'></div>观其迹。温密简靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371044_comment'></div>闻其言。径直端诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371044_comment'></div>自尚书理<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作之为）</span>荆州。异政日至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371044_comment'></div>至则赵生喜忭起立。伸目四顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371044_comment'></div>不啻若自巳而为之者。诚宜有报知已之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371044_comment'></div>又诚宜有大贤而为之知也。是行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371044_comment'></div>赵生其将奋六翮。翔千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371044_comment'></div>以为辕门大府之重。增羽仪之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371044_comment'></div>其道美矣。故予继之以辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371044_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1371044_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　谪居永州。反臣李锜伏诛，为其所诬而被贬至南海的睦州刺史李幼清量移永州，宗元同好友吴武陵诗文赠之。作品：《同吴武陵赠李睦州诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第611页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371045' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371045' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371045?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同吴武陵赠李睦州诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371045")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371045_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371045'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371045'>润之盗锜。窃货财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371045_comment'></div>聚徒党。为反谋十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371045_comment'></div>今天子即位三年。大立制度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371045_comment'></div>于是盗恐且奋。将遂其不善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371045_comment'></div>视部中良守不为已用者。诬陷去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371045_comment'></div>睦州由是得罪。天子使御史桉问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371045_comment'></div>馆于睦。自门及堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371045_comment'></div>皆其私卒为卫。天子之卫不得摇手辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371045_comment'></div>卒致具。有间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371045_comment'></div>盗遂作。而廷臣犹用其文斥睦州南海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371045_comment'></div>既上道。盗以徒百人遮于楚越之郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371045_comment'></div>战且走。乃得完为左官吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371045_comment'></div>无几。盗就禽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371045_comment'></div>斩之于社垣之外。论者谓宜还睦州以明其诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371045_comment'></div>既更大赦。始移永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371045_comment'></div>去长安尚四千里。睦州未尝自言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371045_comment'></div>吴武陵。刚健士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371045_comment'></div>怀不能忍。于是踊跃其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371045_comment'></div>铿锵其声。出而为之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371045_comment'></div>然后慊于内。予固知睦州之道也熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371045_comment'></div>衔匿而未发且久。闻吴之先焉<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作言）</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371045_comment'></div>激于心。若钟鼓之考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371045_comment'></div>不知声之发也。遂系之而重以序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371045_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1371045_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　谪居永州。睦州刺史李幼清外妇马孺人信佛，卒后，李幼清为之立幢于墓，宗元应李之请，作赞，以附刻于幢。作品：《尊胜幢赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷19第526页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371145?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尊胜幢赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371145")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371145_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371145'>以佛之为尊而尊是法。严之于顶。其为最胜宜也。既尊而胜矣。其为拔济尤大。尘飞而灾去。影及而福至。睦州于是诚焉不疑。砻石六觚。其长半寻。乃篆乃刻。立之为福马孺人之墓。孺人之生。奉佛道未尝敢怠。今既没。睦州又成其志。择最胜且尊之道。文之于石。以延其休。则其生佛所得佛道。宜无疑也。赞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371145'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371145'>世所尊兮又尊道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371145_comment'></div>胜无上兮以为宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371145_comment'></div>拔大苦兮升至真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371145_comment'></div>灵合赞兮神而神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371145_comment'></div>驾元气兮济元津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371145_comment'></div>谁为友兮上品人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371145_comment'></div>德无已兮石无磷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371145_comment'></div>延永世兮奠坤垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371145_comment'></div>灵受福兮公之勤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1371145_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　在永州司马任。春，陪永州刺史崔敏宴游，作序记之。作品：《陪永州崔使君游宴南池序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷24第640页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第73页系《陪永州崔使君游宴南池序》一诗于元和四年或五年春暮。）</span><div id='poem_1371062' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371062' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371062?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陪永州崔使君游宴南池序</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371062")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371062_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371062'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371062'>零陵城南。环以群山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371062_comment'></div>延以林麓。其涯谷之委会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371062_comment'></div>则泓然为池。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371062", 1371062, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>湾然</span>为溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371062_comment'></div>以上多枫楠竹箭哀鸣之禽。其下多芡芰蒲蕖腾波之鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371062_comment'></div>韬涵太虚。澹滟闾里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371062_comment'></div>诚游观之佳丽者已。崔公既来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371062_comment'></div>其政宽以肆。其风和以廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371062_comment'></div>既乐其人。又乐其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371062_comment'></div>于暮之春。徵贤合姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371062_comment'></div>登舟于兹水之津。连山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371062", 1371062, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>倒垂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371062_comment'></div>万象在下。浮空泛影。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371062_comment'></div>荡若无外。横碧落以中贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371062_comment'></div>陵太虚而径度。羽觞飞翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371062_comment'></div>匏竹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371062", 1371062, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>激越</span>。熙然而歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371062_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371062", 1371062, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>婆然</span>而舞。持颐而笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371062_comment'></div>瞪目而倨。不知日之将暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371062_comment'></div>则于向之物者。可谓无负矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371062_comment'></div>昔之人知乐之不可常。会之不可必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371062_comment'></div>当欢而悲者有之。况公之理行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371062_comment'></div>宜去受厚锡。而席之贤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371062_comment'></div>率皆左官蒙泽。方将脱鳞介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371062_comment'></div>生羽翮。夫岂趑趄湘中为憔悴客耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371062_comment'></div>予既委废于世。恒得与是山水为伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371062_comment'></div>而悼兹会不可再也。故为文志之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371062_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1371062_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　在永州司马任。张后余元和二年中进士后转年即逝，年仅二十九岁，宗元作文痛惜。作品：《哭张后余辞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1076页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371310")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371310_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371310'>后馀常山张氏。孝其家。忠其友。为经术甚邃而文。少余七年。颇弟畜之。与之居。终日冲然忘其有。人与之言。铿尔而厉。辨而归乎中。凡人有道而不显于世。则曰非其世也。道而得乎世。然犹不显。则曰命。命之微不可知。知而索乎外者曰性与貌。后馀之性。可谓良矣。其貌可谓肃矣。博实宏裕。宜为大官耇老。求其所以夭贱。无可得焉。既得进士。明年。疽发髀卒。后馀之死。人咸痛之。曰。天之祐善人而杀是子。何也。激者曰。天之杀恒在善人。而祐不肖。庄周之说。以为人之君子。天之小人。张君岂天所谓小人者耶。是二者又非论之适也。吾谓善与恶。夭与寿。贵与贱。异道而出者也。无所喜怒于其中。道之出者多。其合焉固少。是以君子之难贵且寿也。后馀母老而丧良子。东西行者。助之哭焉。况其知者耶。然后馀不与谄冒者同贵。不与悖乱者同寿。归洁乎身。闻道而死。虽勿哭焉可也。呜呼。向更使既闻道而且贵且寿。则其显庸也远矣。又乌能勿痛乎。遂哭之以辞。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371310_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371310'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371310'>嗟嗟张君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371310_comment'></div>善不必寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371310_comment'></div>惟道之闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371310_comment'></div>一日为老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371310_comment'></div>人皆反是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371310_comment'></div>百稔犹幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371310_comment'></div>子之优游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371310_comment'></div>是亦黄耇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371310_comment'></div>嗟嗟张君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371310_comment'></div>宠不必贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371310_comment'></div>尊严为仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371310_comment'></div>早服高位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371310_comment'></div>淫谀肆欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371310_comment'></div>银艾沦弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371310_comment'></div>子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371310", 1371310, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>崇高</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371310_comment'></div>无愧三事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371310_comment'></div>吾见皤皤而童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371310_comment'></div>赫赫而辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371310_comment'></div>进襦裤于几杖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371310_comment'></div>负泥涂于冕服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371310_comment'></div>己虽有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371310_comment'></div>人视不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371310_comment'></div>子之迹不混乎其间者幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371310_comment'></div>宜贺而吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371310_comment'></div>宜歌而哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371310_comment'></div>吾其过乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371310_comment'></div>与其宠而加贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371310_comment'></div>善而加寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371310_comment'></div>道施于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371310_comment'></div>庆及于母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371310_comment'></div>从容邦家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371310_comment'></div>乐我朋友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371310_comment'></div>岂不光裕显大欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371310_comment'></div>而不克也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371310_comment'></div>则吊而哭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371310_comment'></div>其无过乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371310_comment'></div>呜呼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1371310_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　在永州司马任。秋，游南亭夜还，感怀作诗。作品：《游南亭夜还叙志七十韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷43第1198页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370965'>宗元再拜五丈座前。伏蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>赐书</span>诲谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370965_comment'></div>微悉重厚。欣踊恍惚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370965_comment'></div>疑若梦寐。捧书叩头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370965_comment'></div>悸不自定。伏念得罪来五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370965_comment'></div>未尝有故旧大臣肯以书见及者。何则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370965_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>罪谤</span>交积。群疑当道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370965_comment'></div>诚可怪而畏也。是以兀兀忘行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370965_comment'></div>尤负重忧。残骸馀魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370965_comment'></div>百病所集。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>痞结</span>伏积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370965_comment'></div>不食自饱。或时寒热。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370965_comment'></div>水火互至。内消肌骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370965_comment'></div>非独瘴疠为也。忽奉教命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370965_comment'></div>乃知幸为大君子所宥。欲使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>膏肓</span>沈没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370965_comment'></div>复起为人。夫何素望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370965_comment'></div>敢以及此。宗元早岁与负罪者亲善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370965_comment'></div>始奇其能。谓可以共立仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370965_comment'></div>裨教化。过不自料。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370965_comment'></div>勤勤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>勉励</span>。唯以忠正信义为志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370965_comment'></div>以兴尧舜孔子之道。利安元元为务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370965_comment'></div>不知愚陋不可力强。其素意如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370965_comment'></div>末路孤危。阨塞臲卼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370965_comment'></div>凡事壅隔。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>很忤</span>贵近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370965_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>狂疏</span>缪戾。蹈不测之辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370965_comment'></div>群言沸腾。鬼神交怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370965_comment'></div>加以素卑贱。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>暴起</span>领事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370965_comment'></div>人所不信。射利求进者填门排户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370965_comment'></div>百不一得。一旦快意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370965_comment'></div>更造怨讟。以此大罪之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370965_comment'></div>诋诃万端。旁午构扇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370965_comment'></div>尽为敌雠。协心同攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370965_comment'></div>外连强暴失职者以致其事。此皆丈人所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370965_comment'></div>不敢为他人道说。怀不能已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370965_comment'></div>复载简牍。此人虽万被诛戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370965_comment'></div>不足<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>塞责</span>。而岂有偿哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370965_comment'></div>今其党与。幸获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>宽贷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370965_comment'></div>各得善地。无公事<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作无分毫事）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370965_comment'></div>坐食俸禄。明德至渥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370965_comment'></div>尚何敢更俟除弃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>废痼</span>。以希望外之泽哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370965_comment'></div>年少气锐。不识<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>几微</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370965_comment'></div>不知当否。但欲一心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>直遂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370965_comment'></div>果陷刑法。皆自所求取得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370965_comment'></div>又何怪也。宗元于众党人中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370965_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>罪状</span>最甚。神理降罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370965_comment'></div>又不能即死。犹对人言语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370965_comment'></div>求食自活。迷不知耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370965_comment'></div>日复一日。然亦有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>大故</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370965_comment'></div>自以得姓来二千五百年。代为冢嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370965_comment'></div>今抱非常之罪。居夷獠之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370965_comment'></div>卑湿昏霿。恐一日填委沟壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370965_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>旷坠</span>先绪。以是怛然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>痛恨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370965_comment'></div>心骨沸热。煢煢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>孑立</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370965_comment'></div>未有子息。荒隅中少士人女子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370965_comment'></div>无与为婚。世亦不肯与罪大者亲昵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370965_comment'></div>以是嗣续之重。不绝如缕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370965_comment'></div>每当春秋时飨。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>孑立</span>捧奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370965_comment'></div>顾盼无后继者。懔懔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/111/Comments/1")'>欷歔</span>惴惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370965_comment'></div>恐此事便已。催心伤骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370965_comment'></div>若受锋刃。此诚丈人所共悯惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370965_comment'></div>先墓在城南。无异子弟为主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370965_comment'></div>独托村邻。自谴逐来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370965_comment'></div>消息存亡。不一至乡闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370965_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>主守</span>者因以益怠。昼夜哀愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370965_comment'></div>惧便毁伤松柏。刍牧不禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370965_comment'></div>以成大戾。近世礼重拜扫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370965_comment'></div>今已阙者四年矣。每遇寒食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370965_comment'></div>则北向<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>长号</span>。以首顿地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370965_comment'></div>想田野道路。士女遍满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370965_comment'></div>皂隶佣丏。皆得上父母邱墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370965_comment'></div>马医<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>夏畦</span>之鬼。无不受子孙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>追养</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370965_comment'></div>然此巳息望。又何以云哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370965_comment'></div>城西有数顷田。果树数百株。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370965_comment'></div>多先人手自封植。今巳荒秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370965_comment'></div>恐便斩伐。无复爱惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370965_comment'></div>家有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>赐书</span>三千卷。尚在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>善和</span>里旧宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370965_comment'></div>宅今已三易主。书存亡不可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370965_comment'></div>皆付受所重。常系心腑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370965_comment'></div>然无可为者。立身一败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370965_comment'></div>万事瓦裂。身残家破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370965_comment'></div>为世大僇。复何敢更望大君子抚慰收恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370965_comment'></div>尚置人数中耶。是以当食不知辛咸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/159/Comments/0")'>节适</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370965_comment'></div>洗沐盥漱。动逾岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370965_comment'></div>一搔皮肤。尘垢满爪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370965_comment'></div>诚忧恐悲伤。无所告愬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370965_comment'></div>以至此也。自古贤人才士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370965_comment'></div>秉志遵分。被谤议不能自明者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370965_comment'></div>仅以百数。故有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/171/Comments/0")'>无兄盗嫂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370965_comment'></div>娶孤女云挝妇翁者。然赖当世豪杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370965_comment'></div>分明辨别。卒光史籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370965_comment'></div>管仲遇盗。升为功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370965_comment'></div>匡章被不孝之名。孟子礼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370965_comment'></div>今已无古人之实为。而有其诟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370965_comment'></div>犹欲望世人之明已。不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370965_comment'></div>直不疑买金以偿同舍。刘宽下车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370965_comment'></div>归牛乡人。此诚知疑似之不可辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370965_comment'></div>非口舌所能胜也。郑詹束缚于晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370965_comment'></div>终以无死。钟仪南音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370965_comment'></div>卒获返国。叔向囚虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370965_comment'></div>自期必免。范痤骑危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370965_comment'></div>以生易死。蒯通据鼎耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370965_comment'></div>为齐上客。张苍韩信伏斧锧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370965_comment'></div>终取将相。邹阳狱中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370965_comment'></div>以书自活。贾生斥逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370965_comment'></div>复召宣室。倪宽摈死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370965_comment'></div>后至御史大夫。董仲舒刘向下狱当诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370965_comment'></div>为汉儒宗。此皆瑰伟博辨奇壮之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370965_comment'></div>能自解脱。今以恇怯淟涊下才末伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370965_comment'></div>又婴恐惧痼病。虽欲慷慨攘臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370965_comment'></div>自同昔人。愈疏阔矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370965_comment'></div>贤者不得志于今。必取贵于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370965_comment'></div>古之著书者皆是也。宗元近欲务此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370965_comment'></div>然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/220/Comments/0")'>力薄</span>才劣。无异<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/221/Comments/0")'>能解</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370965_comment'></div>虽欲秉笔覼缕。神志荒耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370965_comment'></div>前后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/224/Comments/0")'>遗忘</span>。终不能成章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370965_comment'></div>往时读书。自以不至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_113_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/227/Comments/0")'>抵滞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370965_comment'></div>今皆顽然无复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/228/Comments/0")'>省录</span>。每读古人一传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370965_comment'></div>数纸已后。则再三<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/231/Comments/0")'>伸卷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370965_comment'></div>复观姓氏。旋又废失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370965_comment'></div>假令万一除刑部<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_117_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/234/Comments/0")'>囚籍</span>。复为士列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370965_comment'></div>亦不堪当世用矣。伏惟兴哀于无用之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370965_comment'></div>垂德于不报之所。但以通家宗祀为念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370965_comment'></div>有可动心者。操之勿失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370965_comment'></div>虽不敢望归扫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_121_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/242/Comments/0")'>茔域</span>。退托先人之庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370965_comment'></div>以尽馀齿。姑遂少北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370965_comment'></div>益轻瘴疠。就婚娶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370965_comment'></div>求允嗣。有可付托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370965_comment'></div>即冥然长辞。如得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_125_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/251/Comments/0")'>甘寝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370965_comment'></div>无复恨矣。书辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_126_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/253/Comments/0")'>繁委</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370965_comment'></div>无以自道。然即文以求其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370965_comment'></div>君子固得其肺肝焉。无任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_128_1370965", 1370965, "Clauses/257/Comments/0")'>恳恋</span>之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370965_comment'></div>不宣。宗元再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370965_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_130_1370965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1370965'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_55_1370965_0'>⑴ 一作茕茕一作剽剽</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1370965_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。续妾。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州，以地处荒僻，又病痞气，故恒郁郁不欢；惟刻苦读书，或游山水以自适，所为文乃视前大进。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州，梦归，作赋怀乡。作品：《梦归赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷2第60页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370869?labeling=true' target='_blank'>梦归赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370869")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370869'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370869'>罹摈斥以窘束兮。予惟梦之为归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370869_comment'></div>精气注以凝冱兮。循旧乡而顾怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370869_comment'></div>夕予寐于荒陬兮。心慊慊而莫违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370869_comment'></div>质舒解以自恣兮。息<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370869", 1370869, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>愔翳</span>而愈微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370869_comment'></div>歘腾涌而上浮兮。俄滉瀁之无依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370869_comment'></div>圆方混而不形兮。颢醇白之霏霏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370869_comment'></div>上茫茫而无星辰兮。下不见夫水陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370869_comment'></div>若有鉥予以往路兮。驭儗儗以回复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370869_comment'></div>浮云纵以直度兮。云济予乎西北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370869_comment'></div>风<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370869", 1370869, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>纚纚</span>以经耳兮。类行舟迅而不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370869_comment'></div>洞然于以㳽漫兮。虹蜺罗列而倾侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370869_comment'></div>横冲飙以荡击兮。忽中断而迷惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370869_comment'></div>灵幽漠以瀄汨兮。进怊怅而不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370869_comment'></div>白日邈其中出兮。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370869", 1370869, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>阴霾</span>披离以泮释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370869_comment'></div>施岳渎以定位兮。互参差之白黑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370869_comment'></div>忽崩骞上下兮。聊桉行而自抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370869_comment'></div>指故都以委坠兮。瞰乡闾之修直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370869_comment'></div>原田芜秽兮。峥嵘榛棘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370869_comment'></div>乔木摧解兮。垣庐不饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370869_comment'></div>山嵎嵎以岩立兮。水汨汨以漂激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370869_comment'></div>魂恍惘若有亡兮。涕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370869", 1370869, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>汪浪</span>以陨轼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370869_comment'></div>类曛黄之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370869", 1370869, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>黭漠</span>兮。欲周流而无所极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370869_comment'></div>纷若喜而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370869", 1370869, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>佁儗</span>兮。心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370869", 1370869, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>回互</span>以壅塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370869_comment'></div>钟鼓喤以戒旦兮。陶去幽而开寤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370869_comment'></div>罾罻蒙其复体兮。孰云桎梏之不固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370869_comment'></div>精诚之不可再兮。予无蹈夫归路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370869_comment'></div>伟仲尼之圣德兮。谓九夷之可居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370869_comment'></div>惟道大而无所入兮。犹流游乎旷野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370869_comment'></div>老聃遁而适戎兮。指<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370869", 1370869, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>淳茫</span>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370869", 1370869, "Clauses/57/Comments/1")'>纵步</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370869_comment'></div>蒙庄之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370869", 1370869, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>恢怪</span>兮。寓大鹏之远去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370869_comment'></div>苟远适之若兹兮。胡为故国之为慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370869_comment'></div>首邱之仁类兮。斯君子之所誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370869_comment'></div>鸟兽之鸣号兮。有动心而曲顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370869_comment'></div>胶予衷之莫能舍兮。虽判折而不悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370869_comment'></div>列兹梦以三复兮。极明昏而告愬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370869_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1370869_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。有书与岳父杨凭，述谪永情状，希以援手。作品：《与杨京兆凭书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷30第786页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370966' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370966' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370966?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与杨京兆凭书</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370966")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370966_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370966'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370966'>月日。宗元再拜献书丈人座前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370966_comment'></div>役人胡要返命。奉教诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370966_comment'></div>壮厉感发。铺陈广大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370966_comment'></div>上言推延贤隽之道。难于今之世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370966_comment'></div>次及文章。末以愚蒙剥丧顿悴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370966_comment'></div>无以守宗族复田亩为念。忧悯备极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370966_comment'></div>不惟其亲密故旧是与。复有公言显赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370966_comment'></div>许其素尚。而激其忠诚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370966_comment'></div>用是踊跃敬惧。类<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370966", 1370966, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>向时</span>所被简牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370966_comment'></div>万万有加焉。故敢悉其愚以献左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370966_comment'></div>大凡荐举之道。古人之所谓难者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370966_comment'></div>其难非苟一而已也。知之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370966_comment'></div>言之难。听信之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370966_comment'></div>夫人有有之而耻言之者。有有之而乐言之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370966_comment'></div>有无之而工言之者。有无之而不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370966_comment'></div>似有之者。有之而耻言之者上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370966_comment'></div>虽舜犹难于知之。孔子亦曰失之子羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370966_comment'></div>下斯而言。知而不失者妄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370966_comment'></div>有之而言之者次也。德如汉光武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370966_comment'></div>冯衍不用。才如王景略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370966_comment'></div>以尹纬为令史。是皆终日号鸣大吒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370966_comment'></div>而卒莫之省。无之而工言之者贼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370966_comment'></div>赵括得以代廉颇。马谡得以惑孔明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370966_comment'></div>今之若此类者。不乏于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370966_comment'></div>将相大臣。闻其言而必能辨之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370966_comment'></div>亦妄矣。无之而不言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370966_comment'></div>土木类也。周仁以重臣为二千石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370966_comment'></div>许靖以人誉而致三公。近世尤好此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370966_comment'></div>以为长者。最得荐宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370966_comment'></div>夫言朴愚无害者。其于田野乡闾为匹夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370966_comment'></div>虽称为长者可也。自抱关击柝以往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370966_comment'></div>则必敬其事。愈上则及物者愈大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370966_comment'></div>何事无用之朴哉。今之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370966_comment'></div>某子长者。可以为大官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370966_comment'></div>类非古之所谓长者也。则必土木而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370966_comment'></div>夫捧土揭木而致之岩廊之上。蒙以绂冕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370966_comment'></div>翼以徒隶。而趋走其左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370966_comment'></div>岂有补于万民之劳苦哉。圣人之道不益于世用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370966_comment'></div>凡以此也。故曰知之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370966_comment'></div>孔子曰。仁者其言也讱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370966_comment'></div>孟子病未同而言。然则彼未吾信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370966_comment'></div>而吾告之以士。必有三间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370966_comment'></div>是将曰。彼诚知士欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370966_comment'></div>知文欤。疑之而未重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370966_comment'></div>一间也。又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370966_comment'></div>彼无乃私好欤。交以利欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370966_comment'></div>二间也。又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370966_comment'></div>彼不足我而惎我哉。兹咈吾事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370966_comment'></div>三间也。畏是而不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370966_comment'></div>故曰言之难。言而有是患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370966_comment'></div>故曰听信之难。唯明者为能得其所以荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370966_comment'></div>得其所以听。一不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370966_comment'></div>则不可冀矣。然而君子不以言听之难而不务取士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370966_comment'></div>士理之本也。苟有司之不我信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370966_comment'></div>吾知之而不舍。其必有信吾者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370966_comment'></div>苟知之。虽无有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370966_comment'></div>而士可以显。则吾一旦操用人之柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370966_comment'></div>其必有施矣。故公卿之大任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370966_comment'></div>莫若索士。士不预备而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370966", 1370966, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>熟讲</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370966_comment'></div>卒然君有问焉。宰相有咨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370966_comment'></div>有司有求焉。其无以应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370966_comment'></div>则大臣之道或阙。故不可惮烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370966_comment'></div>今之世言士者先文章。文章士之末也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370966_comment'></div>然立言存乎其中。即末而操其本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370966_comment'></div>可十七八。未易忽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370966_comment'></div>自古文士之多莫如今。今之后生为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370966_comment'></div>希屈马者。可得数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370966_comment'></div>希王褒刘向之徒者。又可得十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370966_comment'></div>至陆机潘岳之比。累累相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370966_comment'></div>若皆为之不巳。则文章之大盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370966_comment'></div>古未有也。后代乃可知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370966_comment'></div>今之俗耳庸目。无所取信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370966_comment'></div>杰然特异者。乃见此耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370966_comment'></div>丈人以文律通流当世。叔仲鼎列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370966_comment'></div>天下号为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370966", 1370966, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>文章家</span>。今又生敬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370966_comment'></div>敬之希屈马者之一也。天下方理平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370966_comment'></div>今之文士。咸能先理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370966_comment'></div>理不一断于古书老生。直趋尧舜大道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370966_comment'></div>孔氏之志。明而出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370966_comment'></div>又古之所难有也。然则文章未必为士之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370966_comment'></div>独采取何如耳。宗元自小学为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370966_comment'></div>中间幸联得甲乙科第。至尚书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370966_comment'></div>专百官章奏。然未能究知为文之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370966_comment'></div>自贬官来。无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370966_comment'></div>读百家书。上下驰骋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370966_comment'></div>乃少得知文章利病。去年吴武陵来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370966_comment'></div>美其齿少。才气壮健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370966_comment'></div>可以兴西汉之文章。日与之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370966_comment'></div>因为之出数十篇书。庶几铿锵陶冶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370966_comment'></div>时时得见古人情状。然彼古人亦人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370966_comment'></div>夫何远哉。凡人可以言古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370966_comment'></div>不可以言今。桓谭亦云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370966_comment'></div>亲见扬子云容貌不能动人。安肯传其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370966_comment'></div>诚使博如庄周。哀如屈原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370966_comment'></div>奥如孟轲。壮如李斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370966_comment'></div>峻如马迁。富如相如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370966_comment'></div>明如贾谊。专如扬雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370966_comment'></div>犹为今之人。则世之高者至少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370966_comment'></div>由此观之。古之人未必<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作始）</span>不薄于当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370966_comment'></div>而荣于后世也。若吴子之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370966_comment'></div>非丈人无以知之。独恐世人之才高者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370966_comment'></div>不肯久学。无以尽训诂风雅之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370966_comment'></div>以为一世甚盛。若宗元者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370966_comment'></div>才力缺败。不能远骋高厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370966_comment'></div>与诸生摩九霄。抚四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370966_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1370966", 1370966, "Clauses/210/Comments/0")'>夸耀</span>于后之人矣。何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370966_comment'></div>凡为文以神志为主。自遭责逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370966_comment'></div>继以大故。荒乱耗竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370966_comment'></div>又常积忧。恐神志少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370966_comment'></div>所读书随又遗忘。一二年来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370966_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1370966", 1370966, "Clauses/220/Comments/0")'>痞气</span>尤甚。加以众疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370966_comment'></div>动作不常。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1370966", 1370966, "Clauses/223/Comments/0")'>眊眊</span>然骚扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370966_comment'></div>内生霾雾。填拥惨沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370966_comment'></div>虽有意穷文章。而病夺其志矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370966_comment'></div>每闻人大言。则蹶气震怖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370966_comment'></div>抚心桉胆。不能自止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370966_comment'></div>又永州多火灾。五年之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370966_comment'></div>四为天火所迫。徒跣走出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370966_comment'></div>坏墙穴牖。仅免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_118_1370966", 1370966, "Clauses/237/Comments/0")'>燔灼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370966_comment'></div>书籍散乱毁裂。不知所往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370966_comment'></div>一遇火恐。累日茫洋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370966_comment'></div>不能出言。又安能尽意于笔砚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370966_comment'></div>矻矻自苦。以伤危败之魂哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370966_comment'></div>中心之悃愊郁结。具载所献许京兆丈人书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370966_comment'></div>不能重烦于陈列。凡人之黜弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370966_comment'></div>皆望望思得效用。而宗元独以无有是念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370966_comment'></div>自以罪大不可解。才质无所入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370966_comment'></div>苟焉以叙忧慄为幸。敢有他志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370966_comment'></div>伏以先君禀孝德。秉直道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370966_comment'></div>高于天下。仕再登朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370966_comment'></div>至六品官。宗元无似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370966_comment'></div>亦尝再登朝至六品矣。何以堪此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370966_comment'></div>且柳氏号为大族。五六从以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370966_comment'></div>无为朝士者。岂愚蒙独出数百人右哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370966_comment'></div>以是自忖。官已过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370966_comment'></div>宠已厚矣。夫知足与知止异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370966_comment'></div>宗元知足矣。若便止不受禄位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370966_comment'></div>亦所未能。今复得好官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370966_comment'></div>犹不辞让。何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370966_comment'></div>以人望人。尚足自进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370966_comment'></div>如其不至。则故无憾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370966_comment'></div>进取之志息矣。身世孑然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1370966_comment'></div>无可以为家。虽甚崇宠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1370966_comment'></div>孰与为荣。独恨不幸获托姻好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1370966_comment'></div>而早凋落。寡居十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1370966_comment'></div>尝有一男子。然无一日之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1370966_comment'></div>至今无以托嗣续。恨痛常在心目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1370966_comment'></div>孟子称不孝有三。无后为大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1370966_comment'></div>今之汲汲于世者。唯惧此而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1370966_comment'></div>天若不弃先君之德。使有世嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1370966_comment'></div>或者犹望延寿命以及大宥。得归乡闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1370966_comment'></div>立家室。则子道毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1370966_comment'></div>夫是而犹竞于宠利者。天厌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1370966_comment'></div>天厌之。丈人旦夕归朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1370966_comment'></div>复为大僚。伏惟以此为念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1370966_comment'></div>流涕顿颡。布之座右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1370966_comment'></div>不胜感激之至。宗元再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1370966_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_157_1370966_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。有书与座主顾少连之子顾十郎，述谪永情状，希以援手。作品：《与顾十郎书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷30第804页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第93页系《与顾十郎书》于元和八九年间。）</span><div id='poem_1370970' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370970' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370970?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与顾十郎书</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370970")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370970_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370970'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370970'>四月五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370970_comment'></div>门生守永州司马员外置同正员柳宗元谨致书十郎执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370970_comment'></div>凡号门生而不知恩之所自者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370970_comment'></div>非人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370970_comment'></div>缨冠束衽而趋以进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370970_comment'></div>咸曰我知恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370970_comment'></div>知恩则恶乎辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370970_comment'></div>然而辨之亦非难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370970_comment'></div>大抵当隆赫柄用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370970_comment'></div>而蜂附蚁合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370970_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370970", 1370970, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>喣喣</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370970", 1370970, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>趄趄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370970_comment'></div>便僻匍匐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370970_comment'></div>以非乎人而售乎己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370970_comment'></div>若是者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370970_comment'></div>一旦势异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370970_comment'></div>则电灭飙逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370970_comment'></div>不为门下用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370970_comment'></div>其或少知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370970", 1370970, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>耻惧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370970_comment'></div>恐世人之非己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370970_comment'></div>则矫于中以貌于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370970_comment'></div>其实亦莫能至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370970_comment'></div>然则当其时而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370970", 1370970, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>确固</span>自守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370970_comment'></div>蓄力秉志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370970_comment'></div>不为向者之态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370970_comment'></div>则于势之异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370970_comment'></div>固有望焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370970_comment'></div>大凡以文出门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370970_comment'></div>由庶士而登司徒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370970_comment'></div>七十有九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370970_comment'></div>执事试追状其态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370970_comment'></div>则果能效用者出矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370970_comment'></div>然而中间招众口飞语<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370970", 1370970, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>哗然</span>诪张者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370970_comment'></div>岂他人耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370970_comment'></div>夫固出自门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370970_comment'></div>赖中山刘禹锡等遑遑惕忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370970_comment'></div>无日不在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370970", 1370970, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>信臣</span>之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370970_comment'></div>以务白大德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370970_comment'></div>顺宗时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370970_comment'></div>显增荣谥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370970_comment'></div>扬于天官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370970_comment'></div>敷于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370970_comment'></div>以为亲戚门生光宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370970_comment'></div>不意璅璅者复以病执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370970_comment'></div>此诚私心痛之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370970_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370970", 1370970, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>堙郁</span>汹涌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370970_comment'></div>不知所发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370970_comment'></div>常以自憾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370970_comment'></div>在朝不能有奇节宏议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370970_comment'></div>以立于当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370970_comment'></div>卒就废逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370970_comment'></div>居穷阨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370970_comment'></div>又不能著书断往古明圣法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370970_comment'></div>以致无穷之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370970_comment'></div>进退无以异于众人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370970_comment'></div>不克显明门下得士之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370970_comment'></div>今抱德厚蓄愤悱思有以效于前者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370970_comment'></div>则既乖谬于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370970_comment'></div>离散摈抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370970_comment'></div>而无所施用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370970_comment'></div>长为孤囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370970_comment'></div>不能自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370970_comment'></div>恐执事终于不知其始偃蹇退匿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370970_comment'></div>将以有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370970_comment'></div>犹流于向时求进者之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370970_comment'></div>而下情无以通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370970_comment'></div>盛德无以酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370970_comment'></div>用为大恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370970_comment'></div>固尝不欲言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370970_comment'></div>今惧老死瘴土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370970_comment'></div>而他人无以辨其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370970_comment'></div>故为执事一出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370970_comment'></div>古之人耻躬之不逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370970_comment'></div>傥或万万有一可冀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370970_comment'></div>复得处人间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370970_comment'></div>则斯言几乎践矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370970_comment'></div>因言感激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370970_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1370970", 1370970, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>浪然</span>出涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370970_comment'></div>书不能既<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作就）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370970_comment'></div>宗元谨再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1370970_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。有书与裴埙，述谪永情状，希以援手。作品：《与裴埙书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷30第794页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370967' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370967' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370967?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与裴埙书</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370967")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370967_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370967'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370967'>应叔十四兄足下。比得书示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370967_comment'></div>勤勤不以仆罪过为大故有动止相悯者。仆望巳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370967_comment'></div>世所共弃。唯应叔辈一二公独未耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370967_comment'></div>仆未之罪。在年少好事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370967_comment'></div>进而不能止。俦辈恨怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370967_comment'></div>以先得官。又不幸早尝与游者居权衡之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370967_comment'></div>十荐贤幸乃一售。不得者诪张排恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370967_comment'></div>仆可出而辨之哉。性又倨野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370967_comment'></div>不能摧折。以故名益恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370967_comment'></div>势益险。有喙有耳者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370967_comment'></div>相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370967", 1370967, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>邮传</span>作丑语耳。不知其卒云何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370967_comment'></div>中心之愆尤。若此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370967_comment'></div>既受禁锢。而不能即死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370967_comment'></div>以为久当自明。今亦久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370967_comment'></div>而嗔骂者尚不肯已。坚然相白者无数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370967_comment'></div>圣上日兴太平之理。不贡不王者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370967_comment'></div>悉以诛讨。而制度大立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370967_comment'></div>长使仆辈为匪人耶。其终无以见明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370967_comment'></div>而不得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370967", 1370967, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>击壤鼓腹</span>。乐尧舜之道耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370967_comment'></div>且天下熙熙。而独呻吟者四五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370967_comment'></div>何其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370967", 1370967, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>优裕</span>者博。而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370967", 1370967, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>局束</span>者寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370967_comment'></div>其为不一徵也。何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370967_comment'></div>太和蒸物。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370967", 1370967, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>燕谷</span>不被其煦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370967_comment'></div>一邹子尚能耻之。今若应叔辈知我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370967_comment'></div>岂下邹子哉。然而不耻者何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370967_comment'></div>河北之师。当巳平奚虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370967_comment'></div>闻吉语矣。然若仆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370967_comment'></div>承大<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作天）</span>庆之后。必有殊泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370967_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370967", 1370967, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>流言飞文</span>之罪。或者其可以巳乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370967_comment'></div>幸致数百里之地。使天下之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370967_comment'></div>不谓仆为明时异物。死不恨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370967_comment'></div>金州考绩巳久。独蔑然不迁者何耶。<div class='inline'
