id='poem_sentence_31_1370967_comment'></div>十二兄宜当更转右职。十四兄尝得数书无恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370967_comment'></div>兄顾惟仆之穷途。得无意乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370967_comment'></div>比当大寒。人愈平和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370967_comment'></div>惟楚南极海。元冥所不统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370967_comment'></div>炎昏多疾。气力益劣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370967_comment'></div>昧然人事。百不记一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370967_comment'></div>舍忧慄则怠而睡耳。偶书如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370967_comment'></div>不宣。宗元再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370967_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1370967_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。有书与萧俛，述谪永情状，希以援手。作品：《与萧翰林俛书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷30第797页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370968' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370968' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370968?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与萧翰林俛书</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370968")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370968_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370968'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370968'>思谦兄足下。昨祁县王师范过永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370968_comment'></div>为仆言得张左司书。道思谦蹇然有当官之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370968_comment'></div>乃诚助太平者也。仆闻之喜甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370968_comment'></div>然微王生之说。仆岂不素知耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370968_comment'></div>所喜者耳与心叶。果于不谬焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370968_comment'></div>仆不幸。向者进当臲卼不安之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370968_comment'></div>平居闭门。口舌无数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370968_comment'></div>况又有久与游者。乃岌岌而造其门哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370968_comment'></div>其求进而退者。皆聚为仇怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370968_comment'></div>造作粉饰。蔓延益肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370968_comment'></div>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>的然</span>昭晰自断于内。则孰能了仆于冥冥之间哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370968_comment'></div>然仆当时年三十三。甚少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370968_comment'></div>自御史里行得礼部员外郎。超取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>显美</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370968_comment'></div>欲免世之求进者怪怒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>媢嫉</span>。其可得乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370968_comment'></div>凡人皆欲自达。仆先得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>显处</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370968_comment'></div>才不能踰同列。声不能压当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370968_comment'></div>世之怒仆宜也。与罪人交十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370968_comment'></div>官又以是进。辱在附会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370968_comment'></div>圣朝宏大。贬黜甚簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370968_comment'></div>不能塞众人之怒。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>谤语</span>转侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370968_comment'></div>嚣嚣嗷嗷。渐成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>怪民</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370968_comment'></div>饰智求仕者。更詈仆以悦雠人之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370968_comment'></div>日为新奇。务相喜可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370968_comment'></div>自以速援引之路。而仆辈坐益困辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370968_comment'></div>万罪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>横生</span>。不知其端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370968_comment'></div>伏自思念。过大恩甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370968_comment'></div>乃以致此。悲夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370968_comment'></div>人生少得六七十者。今已三十七矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370968_comment'></div>长来觉日月益促。岁岁更甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370968_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>大都</span>不过数十寒暑。则无此身矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370968_comment'></div>是非荣辱。又何足道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370968_comment'></div>云云不已。祗益为罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370968_comment'></div>兄知之。勿为他人言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370968_comment'></div>居蛮夷中久。惯习<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>炎毒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370968_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>昏眊</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/68/Comments/1")'>重膇</span>。意以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370968_comment'></div>忽遇北风晨起。薄寒中体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370968_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>肌革</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/72/Comments/1")'>惨懔</span>。毛发萧条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370968_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>瞿然</span>注视。怵惕以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>异候</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370968_comment'></div>意绪殆非中国人。楚越间声音特异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370968_comment'></div>鴂舌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>啅噪</span>。今听之怡然不怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370968_comment'></div>已与为类矣。家生小童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370968_comment'></div>皆自然哓哓。昼夜满耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370968_comment'></div>闻北人言。则啼呼走匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370968_comment'></div>虽病夫亦怛然骇之。出门见适州闾市井者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370968_comment'></div>其十有八九。杖而后兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370968_comment'></div>自料居此。尚复几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370968_comment'></div>岂可更不知止。言说长短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370968_comment'></div>重为一世非笑哉。读周易困卦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370968_comment'></div>至有言不信尚口乃穷也。往复益喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370968_comment'></div>嗟乎。余虽家置一喙以自称道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370968_comment'></div>诟益甚耳。用是更乐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>瘖默</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370968_comment'></div>思与木石为徒。不复致意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370968_comment'></div>今天子兴教化。定邪正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370968_comment'></div>海内皆欣欣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>怡愉</span>。而仆与四五子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370968_comment'></div>独沦陷如此。岂非命欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370968_comment'></div>命乃天也。非云云者所制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370968_comment'></div>余又何恨。独喜思谦之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370968_comment'></div>遭时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>言道</span>。道之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370968_comment'></div>物得其利。仆诚有罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370968_comment'></div>然岂不在一物之数耶。身被之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370968_comment'></div>目睹之。足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370968_comment'></div>何必攘袂用力。而矜自我出耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370968_comment'></div>果矜之。又非道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370968_comment'></div>事诚如此。然居理平之世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370968_comment'></div>终身为顽人之类。犹有少耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370968_comment'></div>未能尽忘。傥因贼平庆赏之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370968_comment'></div>得以见白。使受天泽馀润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370968_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>朽蘖</span>败腐。不能生植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370968_comment'></div>犹足蒸出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>芝菌</span>。以为瑞物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370968_comment'></div>一释废锢。移数县之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370968_comment'></div>则世必曰。罪稍解矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370968_comment'></div>然后收召魂魄。买土一廛为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1370968", 1370968, "Clauses/143/Comments/0")'>耕氓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370968_comment'></div>朝夕歌谣。使成文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370968_comment'></div>庶木铎者采取。献之法宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370968_comment'></div>增圣唐大雅之什。虽不得位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370968_comment'></div>亦不虚为太平之人矣。此在望外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370968_comment'></div>然终欲为兄一言焉。宗元再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370968_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_77_1370968_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。有书与李建，述谪永情状，希以援手。作品：《与李翰林建书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷30第800页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370969' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370969' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370969?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与李翰林建书</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370969")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370969_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370969'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370969'>杓直足下。州传递至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370969_comment'></div>得足下书。又于梦得处得足下前次一书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370969_comment'></div>意皆勤厚。庄周言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370969_comment'></div>逃蓬藋者。闻人足音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370969_comment'></div>则跫然喜。仆在蛮夷中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370969_comment'></div>比得足下二书。及致药饵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370969_comment'></div>喜复何言。仆自去年八月来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370969_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370969", 1370969, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>痞疾</span>稍已。往时间一二日作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370969_comment'></div>今一月乃二三作。用南人槟榔馀甘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370969_comment'></div>破决壅隔大过。阴邪虽败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370969_comment'></div>已伤正气。行则膝颤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370969_comment'></div>坐则髀痹。所欲者补气丰血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370969_comment'></div>强筋骨。辅心力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370969_comment'></div>有与此宜者。更致数物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370969_comment'></div>忽得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370969", 1370969, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>良方</span>偕至。益喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370969_comment'></div>永州于楚为最南。状与越相类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370969_comment'></div>仆闷即出游。游复多恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370969_comment'></div>涉野则有蝮虺大蜂。仰空视地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370969_comment'></div>寸步劳倦。近水即畏射工沙虱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370969_comment'></div>含怒窃发。中人形影。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370969_comment'></div>动成疮痏。时到幽树好石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370969_comment'></div>暂得一笑。已复不乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370969_comment'></div>何者。譬如囚拘圜土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370969_comment'></div>一遇和景。负墙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370969", 1370969, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>搔摩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370969_comment'></div>伸展支体。当此之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370969_comment'></div>亦以为适。然顾地窥天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370969_comment'></div>不过寻丈。终不得出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370969_comment'></div>岂复能久为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370969", 1370969, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>舒畅</span>哉。明时百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370969_comment'></div>皆获欢乐。仆士人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370969_comment'></div>颇识古今理道。独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370969", 1370969, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>怆怆</span>如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370969_comment'></div>诚不足为理世下执事。至比愚夫愚妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370969_comment'></div>又不可得。窃自悼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370969_comment'></div>仆曩时所犯。足下适在禁中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370969_comment'></div>备观本末。不复一一言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370969_comment'></div>今仆癃残顽鄙。不死幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370969_comment'></div>苟为尧人。不必立事程功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370969_comment'></div>唯欲为量移官。差轻罪累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370969_comment'></div>即便耕田艺麻。取老农女为妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370969_comment'></div>生男育孙。以共力役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370969_comment'></div>时时作文。以咏太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370969_comment'></div>摧伤之馀。气力可想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370969_comment'></div>假令病尽。已身复壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370969_comment'></div>悠悠人世。越不过为三十年客耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370969_comment'></div>前过三十七年。与瞬息无异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370969_comment'></div>复所得者。其不足<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1370969", 1370969, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>把玩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370969_comment'></div>亦已审矣。杓直以为诚然乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370969_comment'></div>仆近求得经史诸子数百卷。尝候战悸稍定时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370969_comment'></div>即伏读。颇见圣人用心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370969_comment'></div>贤士君子立志之分。著书亦数十篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370969_comment'></div>心病言少次第。不足远寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370969_comment'></div>但用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370969", 1370969, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>自释</span>。贫者士之常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370969_comment'></div>今仆虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1370969", 1370969, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>羸馁</span>。亦甘如饴矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370969_comment'></div>足下言巳白常州煦仆。仆岂敢众人待常州耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370969_comment'></div>若众人。即不复煦仆矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370969_comment'></div>然常州未尝有书遗仆。仆安敢先焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370969_comment'></div>裴应叔萧思谦各有书。足下求取观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370969_comment'></div>相戒勿示人。敦诗在近地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370969_comment'></div>简人事。今不能致书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370969_comment'></div>足下默以此书见之。勉尽志虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370969_comment'></div>辅成一王之法。以宥罪戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370969_comment'></div>不悉。某白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370969_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1370969_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年4月3日</a>　谪居永州。撰《非国语》，并修书寄与道州刺史吕温，告撰此著之缘起及学术观点。作品：《与吕道州温论非国语书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷31第822页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370978' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370978' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370978?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与吕道州温论非国语书</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年4月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370978")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370978_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370978'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370978'>四月三日。宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370978_comment'></div>化光足下。近世之言理道者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370978_comment'></div>率由<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>大中</span>而出者咸无焉。其言本儒术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370978_comment'></div>则迂回茫洋。而不知其适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370978_comment'></div>其或切于事。则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>苛峭</span>刻覈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370978_comment'></div>不能从容。卒泥乎大道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370978_comment'></div>甚者好怪而妄言。推天引神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370978_comment'></div>以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>灵奇</span>。恍惚若化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370978_comment'></div>而终不可逐。故道不明于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370978_comment'></div>而学者之至少也。吾自得友君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370978_comment'></div>而后知中庸之门户<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>阶室</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>渐染</span>砥砺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370978_comment'></div>几乎道真。然而常欲立言垂文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370978_comment'></div>则恐而不敢。今动作悖谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370978_comment'></div>以为僇于世。身编夷人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370978_comment'></div>名列囚籍。以道之穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370978_comment'></div>而施乎事者无日。故乃挽引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370978_comment'></div>强为小书。以志乎中之所得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370978_comment'></div>尝读国语。病其文胜而言厖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370978_comment'></div>好诡以反伦。其道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>舛逆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370978_comment'></div>而学者以其文也。咸嗜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370978_comment'></div>伏膺呻吟者。至比六经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370978_comment'></div>则溺其文。必信其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370978_comment'></div>是圣人之道翳也。余勇不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>自制</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370978_comment'></div>以当后世之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>讪怒</span>。辄乃黜其不臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370978_comment'></div>究世之谬。凡为六十七篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370978_comment'></div>命之曰非国语。既就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370978_comment'></div>累日怏怏然不喜。以道之难明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370978_comment'></div>而习俗之不可变也。如其知我者果谁欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370978_comment'></div>凡今之及道者。果可知也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370978_comment'></div>后之来者。则吾未之见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370978_comment'></div>其可忽耶。故思欲尽其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>瑕颣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370978_comment'></div>以别白中正。度成吾书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370978_comment'></div>非化光而谁。辄令往一通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370978_comment'></div>惟少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>留视</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370978", 1370978, "Clauses/66/Comments/1")'>役虑</span>。以卒相之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370978_comment'></div>往时致用作孟子评。有韦词者告余曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370978_comment'></div>吾以致用书示路子。路子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370978_comment'></div>善则善矣。然昔之为书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370978_comment'></div>岂若是摭前人耶。韦子贤斯言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370978_comment'></div>余曰。致用之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370978_comment'></div>以明道也。非以摭孟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370978_comment'></div>盖求诸中而表乎世焉尔。今余为是书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370978_comment'></div>非左氏尤甚。若二子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370978_comment'></div>固世之好言者也。而犹出乎是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370978_comment'></div>况不及是者滋众。则余之望乎世也愈狭矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370978_comment'></div>卒如之何。苟不悖于圣道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370978_comment'></div>而有以启明者之虑。则用是罪余者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370978_comment'></div>虽累百世。滋不憾而恧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370978_comment'></div>于化光何如哉。激乎中必厉乎外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370978_comment'></div>想不思而得也。宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370978_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1370978_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。将所撰《非国语》示于知友吴武陵，武陵回论后，宗元作书答之。作品：《答吴武陵论非国语书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷31第824页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370977' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370977' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370977?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答吴武陵论非国语书</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370977")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370977_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370977'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370977'>濮阳吴君足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370977_comment'></div>仆之为文久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370977_comment'></div>然心少之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370977_comment'></div>不务也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370977_comment'></div>以为是特博奕之雄耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370977_comment'></div>故在长安时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370977_comment'></div>不以是取名誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370977_comment'></div>意欲施之事实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370977_comment'></div>以辅时及物为道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370977_comment'></div>自为罪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370977_comment'></div>舍恐惧则闲无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370977_comment'></div>故聊复为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370977_comment'></div>然而辅时及物之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370977_comment'></div>不可陈于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370977_comment'></div>则宜垂于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370977_comment'></div>言而不文则泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370977_comment'></div>然则文者固不可少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370977_comment'></div>拘囚以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370977_comment'></div>无所发明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370977_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370977", 1370977, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>蒙覆</span>幽独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370977_comment'></div>会足下至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370977_comment'></div>然后有助我之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370977_comment'></div>一观其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370977_comment'></div>心朗目舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370977_comment'></div>炯若深井之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370977_comment'></div>仰视白日之正中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370977_comment'></div>足下以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1370977", 1370977, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>超轶</span>如此之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370977_comment'></div>每以师道命仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370977_comment'></div>仆滋不敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370977_comment'></div>仆每为一书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370977_comment'></div>足下必大光耀以明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370977_comment'></div>固又非仆之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370977", 1370977, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>安处</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370977_comment'></div>若非国语之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370977_comment'></div>仆病之久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370977_comment'></div>尝难言于世俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370977_comment'></div>今因其闲也而书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370977_comment'></div>恒恐后世之知言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370977_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370977", 1370977, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>用是</span>诟病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370977_comment'></div>狐疑犹豫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370977_comment'></div>伏而不出者累月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370977_comment'></div>方示足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370977_comment'></div>足下乃以为当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370977_comment'></div>仆然后敢自是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370977_comment'></div>吕道州善言道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370977_comment'></div>亦若吾子之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370977_comment'></div>意者斯文殆可取乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370977_comment'></div>夫为一书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370977_comment'></div>务富文采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370977_comment'></div>不顾事实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370977_comment'></div>而益之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1370977", 1370977, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>诬怪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370977_comment'></div>张之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1370977", 1370977, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>阔诞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370977_comment'></div>以炳然诱后生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370977_comment'></div>而终之以僻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370977_comment'></div>是犹用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1370977", 1370977, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>文锦</span>覆陷阱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370977_comment'></div>不明而出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370977_comment'></div>则颠者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370977_comment'></div>仆故为之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1370977", 1370977, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>标表</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370977_comment'></div>以告夫游乎中道者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370977_comment'></div>仆无闻而甚陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370977_comment'></div>又在黜辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370977_comment'></div>居泥涂若螾蛭然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370977_comment'></div>虽鸣其声音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370977_comment'></div>谁为听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370977_comment'></div>独赖世之知言者为准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370977_comment'></div>其不知言而罪我者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370977_comment'></div>吾不有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370977_comment'></div>仆又安敢期如汉时列官以立学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370977_comment'></div>故为天下笑耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370977_comment'></div>是足下爱我厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370977_comment'></div>始言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370977_comment'></div>前一通如来言以污<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1370977", 1370977, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>箧牍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370977_comment'></div>此在明圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370977_comment'></div>微足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370977_comment'></div>仆又何托焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370977_comment'></div>宗元白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1370977_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。撰著批判《国语》错误观点。作品：《非国语》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷44-45第1265-1328页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论守道及守官，表居官行道之观点。作品：《守道论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷3第81页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371127' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371127' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371127?labeling=true' target='_blank'>守道论</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371127")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371127_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371127'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371127'>或问曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371127_comment'></div>守道不如守官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371127_comment'></div>何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371127_comment'></div>对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371127_comment'></div>是非圣人之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371127_comment'></div>传之者误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371127_comment'></div>官也者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371127_comment'></div>道之器也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371127_comment'></div>离之非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371127_comment'></div>未有守官而失道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371127_comment'></div>守道而失官之事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371127_comment'></div>是固非圣人之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371127_comment'></div>乃传之者误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371127_comment'></div>夫皮冠者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371127_comment'></div>是虞人之物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371127_comment'></div>物者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371127_comment'></div>道之准也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371127_comment'></div>守其物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371127_comment'></div>由其准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371127_comment'></div>而后其道存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371127_comment'></div>苟舍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371127_comment'></div>是失道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371127_comment'></div>凡圣人之所以为经纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371127_comment'></div>为名物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371127_comment'></div>无非道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371127_comment'></div>命之曰官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371127_comment'></div>官是以行吾道云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371127_comment'></div>是故立之君臣官府衣裳舆马章绶之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371127_comment'></div>会朝表著周旋行列之等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371127_comment'></div>是道之所存也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371127_comment'></div>则又示之典命书制符玺奏复之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371127_comment'></div>参伍殷辅陪台之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371127_comment'></div>是道之所由也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371127_comment'></div>则又劝之以爵禄庆赏之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371127_comment'></div>惩之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371127", 1371127, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>黜远</span>鞭扑梏拲斩杀之惨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371127_comment'></div>是道之所行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371127_comment'></div>故自天子至于庶民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371127_comment'></div>咸守其经分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371127_comment'></div>而无有失道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371127_comment'></div>和之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371127_comment'></div>失其物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371127_comment'></div>去其准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371127_comment'></div>道从而丧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371127_comment'></div>易其小者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371127_comment'></div>而大者亦从而丧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371127_comment'></div>古者居其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371127_comment'></div>思死其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371127_comment'></div>可易而失之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371127_comment'></div>礼记曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371127_comment'></div>道合则服从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371127_comment'></div>不可则去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371127_comment'></div>孟子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371127_comment'></div>有官守者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371127_comment'></div>不得其职则去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371127_comment'></div>然则失其道而居其官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371127_comment'></div>古之人不与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371127_comment'></div>是故在上不为抗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371127_comment'></div>在下不为损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371127_comment'></div>矢人者不为不仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371127_comment'></div>函人者不为仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371127_comment'></div>率其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371127_comment'></div>司其局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371127_comment'></div>交相致以全其工也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371127_comment'></div>易位而处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371127_comment'></div>各安其分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371127_comment'></div>而道达于天下也<span class='inlineComment2'>（也一作矣）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371127_comment'></div>且夫官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371127_comment'></div>所以行道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371127_comment'></div>而曰守道不如守官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371127_comment'></div>盖亦丧其本矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371127_comment'></div>未有守官而失道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371127_comment'></div>守道而失官之事者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371127_comment'></div>是非圣人之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371127_comment'></div>传之者误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371127_comment'></div>果矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1371127_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论《作传》“六逆”之说，倡任人唯贤。作品：《六逆论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷3第95页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371132' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371132' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371132?labeling=true' target='_blank'>六逆论</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371132")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371132_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371132'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371132'>春秋左氏言卫州吁之事。因载六逆之说曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371132_comment'></div>贱妨贵。少陵长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371132_comment'></div>远间亲。新间旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371132_comment'></div>小加大。淫破义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371132_comment'></div>六者乱之本也。余谓少陵长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371132_comment'></div>小加大。淫破义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371132_comment'></div>是三者固诚为乱矣。然其所谓贱妨贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371132_comment'></div>远间亲。新间旧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371132_comment'></div>虽为理之本可也。何必曰乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371132_comment'></div>夫所谓贱妨贵者。盖斥言择嗣之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371132_comment'></div>子以母贵者也。若贵而愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371132_comment'></div>贱而圣且贤。以是而妨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371132_comment'></div>其为理本大矣。而可舍之以从斯言乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371132_comment'></div>此其不可固也。夫所谓远间亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371132_comment'></div>新间旧者。盖言任用者之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371132_comment'></div>使亲而旧者愚。远而新者圣且贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371132_comment'></div>以是而间之。其为理本亦大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371132_comment'></div>又可舍之以从斯言乎。必从斯言而乱天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371132_comment'></div>谓之师古训可乎。此又不可者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371132_comment'></div>呜呼。是三者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371132_comment'></div>择君置臣之事。天下理乱之大本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371132_comment'></div>为书者执斯言。著一定之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371132_comment'></div>以遗后代。上智之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371132_comment'></div>固不惑于是矣。自中人而降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371132_comment'></div>守是为大。据而以致败乱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371132_comment'></div>固不乏焉。晋厉死而悼公入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371132_comment'></div>乃理。宋襄嗣而子鱼退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371132_comment'></div>乃乱。贵不足尚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371132_comment'></div>秦用张禄而黜穰侯。乃安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371132_comment'></div>魏相成璜而疏吴起。乃危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371132_comment'></div>亲不足与也。符氏进王猛而杀樊世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371132_comment'></div>乃兴。胡亥任赵高而族李斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371132_comment'></div>乃亡。旧不足倚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371132_comment'></div>顾所信何如尔。然则斯言殆可以废矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371132_comment'></div>噫。古之言理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371132_comment'></div>罕能尽其说。建一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371132_comment'></div>立一辞。则臲卼而不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371132_comment'></div>谓之是可也。谓之非亦可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371132_comment'></div>混然而已。教于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371132_comment'></div>莫知其所以去就。明者慨然将定其是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371132_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1371132", 1371132, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>拘儒</span>瞽生相与群而咻之。以为狂为怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371132_comment'></div>而欲世之多有知者。可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371132_comment'></div>夫中人可以及化者。天下为不少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371132_comment'></div>然而罕有知圣人之道。则固为书者之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371132_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1371132_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论晋文公听信宦官之事，影射现实。作品：《晋文公问守原议》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷4第99页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370961' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370961' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370961?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晋文公问守原议</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370961")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370961_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370961'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370961'>晋文公既受原于王。难其守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370961_comment'></div>问寺人勃鞮。以畀赵衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370961_comment'></div>余谓守原。政之大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370961_comment'></div>所以承天子。树<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370961", 1370961, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>霸功</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370961_comment'></div>致命诸侯。不宜谋及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370961", 1370961, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>媟近</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370961_comment'></div>以忝王命。而晋君择大任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370961_comment'></div>不公议于朝。而私议于宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370961_comment'></div>不博谋于卿相。而独谋于寺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370961_comment'></div>虽或衰之贤。足以守国之政不为败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370961_comment'></div>而贼贤失政之端。由是滋矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370961_comment'></div>况当其时不乏言议之臣乎。狐偃为谋臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370961_comment'></div>先轸将中军。晋君疏而不咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370961_comment'></div>外而不求。乃卒定于内竖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370961_comment'></div>其可以为法乎。且晋君将袭齐桓之业以翼天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370961_comment'></div>乃大志也。然而齐桓任管仲以兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370961_comment'></div>进竖刁以败。则获原启疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370961_comment'></div>适其始政。所以观视诸侯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370961_comment'></div>而乃背其所以兴。迹其所以败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370961_comment'></div>然而能霸诸侯者。以土则大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370961_comment'></div>以力则彊。以义则天子之册也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370961_comment'></div>诚畏之矣。乌能得其心服哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370961_comment'></div>其后景监得以相卫鞅。宏石得以杀望之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370961_comment'></div>误之者晋文公也。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370961_comment'></div>得贤臣以守大邑。则问非失举也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370961_comment'></div>盖失问也。然犹羞当时陷后代若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370961_comment'></div>况于问与举又两失者。其何以救之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370961_comment'></div>余故著晋君之罪。以附春秋许世子止赵盾之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370961_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1370961_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　十一月二十二日杜兼卒，其人品于其时颇有争议。宗元谪居永州，就杜兼人品撰对答文。作品：《杜兼对》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷14第363页，中华书局1979年版。文章不全，后半部分阙。）</span><div id='poem_1371185' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371185' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371185?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杜兼对</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371185")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371185_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371185'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371185'>或问曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371185_comment'></div>朝廷以公且明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371185_comment'></div>进善退不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371185_comment'></div>未尝不当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371185_comment'></div>然吾有一疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371185_comment'></div>愿有闻于子以释予也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371185_comment'></div>曰何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371185_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371185_comment'></div>杜兼为濠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371185_comment'></div>幸兵之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371185_comment'></div>杀无罪士二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371185_comment'></div>蓄货足欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371185_comment'></div>吾以为唐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371185", 1371185, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>梼杌</span>饕餮者亡以异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371185_comment'></div>然而卒入为郎中给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371185_comment'></div>出由商至河南尹乃死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371185_comment'></div>夫何取于兼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371185_comment'></div>若是幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371185_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371185_comment'></div>若子之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371185_comment'></div>兼之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371185_comment'></div>吾虽不睹乎目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371185_comment'></div>然闻之熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371185_comment'></div>宜废而不用久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371185_comment'></div>然而吾有一取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371185_comment'></div>吾闻兼在濠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371185_comment'></div>有钟离令卢某者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371185_comment'></div>宰相戚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371185_comment'></div>而谗且谀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371185_comment'></div>日状其僚之过愆以致于兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371185_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371185_comment'></div>是过是愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371185_comment'></div>我独无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371185_comment'></div>其僚因惴恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371185_comment'></div>以俟谪怒于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371185_comment'></div>令日施施自负曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371185_comment'></div>州君将我陟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371185_comment'></div>兼得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371185_comment'></div>乃大怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371185_comment'></div>罚令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371185_comment'></div>使僚也咸得自达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371185_comment'></div>以进乎善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371185_comment'></div>因摈令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371185_comment'></div>终不得面焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371185_comment'></div>人由是不苟免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371185_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1371185", 1371185, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>谗谀</span>之道大息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371185_comment'></div>朝廷进兼于内则给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371185_comment'></div>于外则至河南尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371185_comment'></div>盖知兼有是善也欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371185_comment'></div>诚然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371185_comment'></div>不为公且明耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371185_comment'></div>或者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371185_comment'></div>兼凶狡人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371185_comment'></div>恣杀以充已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371185_comment'></div>其为过章章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371185_comment'></div>凡天下儿童<span class='inlineComment2'>（后阙）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1371185_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。小侄女柳雅卒，年仅六岁。宗元墓葬于零陵东城门外山冈，撰墓砖志。作品：《小侄女墓砖记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷13第342页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371123' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371123' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371123?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371123'>字为雅。氏为柳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371123_comment'></div>生甲申。死己丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371123_comment'></div>日十二。月在九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371123_comment'></div>是日葬。东岗首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371123_comment'></div>生而惠。命则夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371123_comment'></div>始也无。今何有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371123_comment'></div>质之微。当速朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371123_comment'></div>铭兹瓦。期永久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371123_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1371123_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。同时被贬之革新旧友凌准元和元年卒于连州，宗元撰权厝志；元和四年大赦，凌准灵柩得以返葬故里，宗元又撰墓后志。作品：《故连州员外司马凌君墓后志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷10第266页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371238' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371238' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371238?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故连州员外司马淩君墓后志</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371238")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371238_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371238'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371238'>元和某年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371238_comment'></div>立太子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371238_comment'></div>赦下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371238_comment'></div>尝有非其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371238_comment'></div>柩得返葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371238_comment'></div>淩氏孤夷仲求仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371238_comment'></div>自连桂阳举其先人之柩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371238_comment'></div>龟筮吉利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371238_comment'></div>某年月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371238_comment'></div>归于杭之新城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371238_comment'></div>祔于其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371238_comment'></div>刻前志志其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371238_comment'></div>益以后志志其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371238_comment'></div>立碣于坟东南隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371238_comment'></div>申志于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371238_comment'></div>噫亦勤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371238_comment'></div>以其先人之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371238_comment'></div>宜克大于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371238_comment'></div>以其孤之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371238_comment'></div>宜克承于初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371238_comment'></div>艰其躬以延于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371238_comment'></div>承而大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371238_comment'></div>宜哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1371238_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。涪州刺史南承嗣以立太子赦量移澧州，宗元作序送之。作品：《送南涪州量移澧州序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第613页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371046' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371046' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371046?labeling=true' "poem_title_1371046")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371046_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371046'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371046'>越有纳官之令以胜大敌。汉有羽林之制以威四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371046_comment'></div>国家宠先中丞迈古人之烈。故君自未成童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371046_comment'></div>品常第四人。犹曰于古为薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371046_comment'></div>汉北地都尉卬以不胜任陷匈奴。而子单侯于瓶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371046_comment'></div>济北相韩千秋以匹夫之谅。奋触南越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371046_comment'></div>而子延年侯于成安。君之土田之锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371046_comment'></div>犹挫于有司之手。始由施州为涪州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371046_comment'></div>捍蜀道勍寇。昼不释刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371046_comment'></div>夜不释甲。曰我忠烈允也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371046_comment'></div>期死待敌。敌亦曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371046_comment'></div>彼忠烈允也。尽力致命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371046_comment'></div>是不可犯。然而笔削之吏以簿书校计赢缩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371046_comment'></div>受谴兹郡。凡二岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371046_comment'></div>朝廷建大本。贞万邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371046_comment'></div>庆泽之濡。洗濯生植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371046_comment'></div>又况涪州家声之大。裕蛊之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371046_comment'></div>宜尤被显宠者也。自汉而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371046_comment'></div>州之美者十七八。莫若澧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371046_comment'></div>澧之佐理。莫踰于长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371046_comment'></div>以是进秩。人犹曰且有后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371046_comment'></div>永州多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371046", 1371046, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>谪吏</span>。而君侯惠和温良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371046_comment'></div>故其欢愉异于他部。优诏既至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371046_comment'></div>而君适雠于文。其往也独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371046_comment'></div>故凡羡慕之辞。无不加等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371046_comment'></div>噫。以君承荷之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371046_comment'></div>恭肃之美。四方之求忠壮义烈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371046_comment'></div>将于君是观。凡君子之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371046_comment'></div>欲其优柔而益固。愤悱而不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371046_comment'></div>以增太史世家之籍。用是为贶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371046_comment'></div>则拱璧大鼎。乌可以言重乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371046_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1371046_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。为南霁云撰庙碑。作品：《南霁云睢阳庙碑并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷5第138页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。十月，朝廷讨伐叛臣河朔三镇节度使留后王承宗，宗元为亦谪居永州的南承嗣作状上奏，请从军。作品：《为南承嗣请从军状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷39第1018页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_50_1370945_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。十月，朝廷讨伐叛臣河朔三镇节度使留后王承宗，宗元为亦谪居永州的南承嗣作《请从军状》上奏皇帝，同作状呈中书门下。作品：《为南承嗣乞两河效用状》<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370957_comment'></div>以成其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370957_comment'></div>无任恳迫惶恐之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1370957_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。因朝廷大赦，判官薛巽自连州量移朗州，经永州，宗元作序送之。作品：《送薛判官量移序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第617页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371048' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371048' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371048?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送薛判官量移序</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371048")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371048_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371048'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371048'>仕于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371048_comment'></div>有劳而见罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371048_comment'></div>凡人处是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371048_comment'></div>鲜不怨怼忿愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371048_comment'></div>列于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371048_comment'></div>愬于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371048_comment'></div>此恒状也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371048_comment'></div>异于恒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371048_comment'></div>其道宜显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371048_comment'></div>薛生司货贿于军兴之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371048_comment'></div>兵乱不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371048_comment'></div>然得以不犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371048_comment'></div>由太行以东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371048_comment'></div>皆传道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371048_comment'></div>可以为劳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371048_comment'></div>而竟连大狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371048_comment'></div>以致于放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371048_comment'></div>不戚于貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371048_comment'></div>不悱于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371048_comment'></div>乐以自肥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371048_comment'></div>而未尝尤于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371048_comment'></div>其有异于恒矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371048_comment'></div>朝廷施恩泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371048_comment'></div>凡受谪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371048_comment'></div>罪得而未<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作末）</span>薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371048_comment'></div>乃命以近壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371048_comment'></div>薛君去连而吏于朗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371048_comment'></div>是其渐于显欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371048_comment'></div>君子学以植其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371048_comment'></div>信以笃其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371048_comment'></div>有异于恒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371048_comment'></div>充而大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371048_comment'></div>苟推是以往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371048_comment'></div>虽欲辞显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371048_comment'></div>难矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1371048_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。袁州刺史王涯为故丞相房琯刻石立碑，李华曾作《唐丞相太尉房公德铭》，宗元再撰碑阴文，称颂房琯德政。作品：《相国房公德铭之阴》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷9第201页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371214' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371214?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐相国房公德铭之阴</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371214")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371214_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371214'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371214'>天子之三公称公。王者之后称公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371214_comment'></div>诸侯之入为王卿士。亦曰公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371214_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371214", 1371214, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>土封</span>。其臣称之曰公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371214_comment'></div>尊其道而师之。称曰公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371214_comment'></div>楚之僭。凡为县者皆曰公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371214_comment'></div>古之人通谓年之长老曰公。故言三公若周公召公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371214_comment'></div>王者之后若宋公。为王卿士若卫武公虢文公郑桓公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371214_comment'></div>其臣称之。则列国皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371214_comment'></div>师之尊若太公。楚之为县者若叶公白公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371214_comment'></div>年之长老若毛公申培公。而大臣罕能以姓配公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371214_comment'></div>虽近有之。然不能著也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371214_comment'></div>唐之大臣以姓配公最著者曰房公。房公相玄宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371214_comment'></div>有劳于蜀。人咸服其节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371214_comment'></div>相肃宗。作训于岐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371214_comment'></div>人咸尊其道。惟正直慈爱以成于德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371214_comment'></div>用是进退。所居而事理辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371214_comment'></div>所去而人哀号。理袁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371214_comment'></div>袁人不胜其怀。为文士赵郡李华铭公之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371214_comment'></div>乱故不克立。今刺史太原王涯嘉公之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371214_comment'></div>犹在乎人。袁人不忘公之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371214_comment'></div>为之刻石。且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371214_comment'></div>州之南有亭曰需宴亭。公之为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371214_comment'></div>人之思也。乃增饰栋宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371214_comment'></div>即而立焉。州人大悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371214_comment'></div>咸会。陨涕言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371214_comment'></div>昔公以周召之德。微子之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371214_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371214", 1371214, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>土封</span>以为卿士。道为三公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371214_comment'></div>德为国师。年为元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371214_comment'></div>尝为县。县怀其化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371214_comment'></div>至于州。州濡其泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371214_comment'></div>凡我子孙。罔不戴慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371214_comment'></div>盛德之词。文而不刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371214_comment'></div>更刺史数十。莫克兴起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371214_comment'></div>乃卒归于王公。王公尝以机密匡天子于禁中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371214_comment'></div>承公之道。刺于我邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371214_comment'></div>由公之理。又能尊公之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371214_comment'></div>起遗文以昭前烈。则其入为卿士三公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371214_comment'></div>孰曰不宜。吾惧其去我也遽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371214_comment'></div>愿书于铭之阴。用永表于邦之良政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371214_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1371214_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。作文记述假药害人之事，劝戒世人明辨真假。作品：《辨伏神文并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷18第502页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371139' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371139' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371139?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辩伏神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371139")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371139_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371139'>余病痞且悸。谒医视之。曰唯伏神为宜。明日买诸市。烹而饵之。病加甚。召医而尤其故。医求观其滓。曰吁。尽老芋也。彼鬻药者欺子而获售。子之懵也。而反尤于余。不以过乎。余戍然惭。忾然忧。推是类也以往。则世之以芋自售而病乎人者众矣。又谁辩焉。申以词云。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371139_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371139'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371139'>伏神之神兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371139_comment'></div>惟饵之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371139_comment'></div>愉心舒肝兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371139_comment'></div>魂平志康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371139_comment'></div>驱开滞结兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371139_comment'></div>调护柔刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371139_comment'></div>和宁悦怿兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371139_comment'></div>复彼恒常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371139_comment'></div>休嘉诉合兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371139_comment'></div>邪怪遁藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371139_comment'></div>君子食之兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371139_comment'></div>其乐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371139", 1371139, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>扬扬</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371139_comment'></div>余殆于理兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371139_comment'></div>荣卫蹇极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371139_comment'></div>伏杯积块兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371139_comment'></div>悸不得息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371139_comment'></div>有医道余兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371139_comment'></div>求是以食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371139_comment'></div>往沽之市兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371139_comment'></div>欣焉有得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371139_comment'></div>涤濯爨烹兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371139_comment'></div>专恃尔力。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371139_comment'></div>往尤于医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371139_comment'></div>徵滓以观兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371139_comment'></div>既笑而嘻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371139_comment'></div>曰子胡昧愚兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371139_comment'></div>兹谓蹲鸱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371139_comment'></div>处身猥大兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371139_comment'></div>善植圩卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371139_comment'></div>受气顽昏兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371139_comment'></div>阴僻欹危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371139_comment'></div>累积星纪兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371139_comment'></div>以老为奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371139_comment'></div>潜苞水土兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371139_comment'></div>混杂蝝蚳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371139_comment'></div>不幸充腹兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371139_comment'></div>唯痼之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371139_comment'></div>外泽而夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371139_comment'></div>误而为饵兮。<div class='inline'
