class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371139_comment'></div>书而为词兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371139_comment'></div>愿寤来者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1371139_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。妻叔杨凌之子承之卒，年仅二十一岁。宗元作哀辞悼之。作品：《杨氏子承之哀辞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1081页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371311' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371311' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371311?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杨氏子承之哀辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371311")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371311_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371311'>杨氏子承之。既冠。有成人之道。其明年四月。不幸而夭。其外姻解人柳宗元。为之恸且出涕。噫。是子也。气淳以愿。志专以勤。确然而直方。吾未知其止也。作辞赋书论。其言甚伟。余方爱之。谓可以成器者。故不知恸且出涕。况其亲戚者乎。凡天之生物也不类。精粗纷庞。贤愚混同。或远而合。或亲而殊。然则虽人亲戚。亦将有不克知其美者。若杨氏子者。其亲戚皆贤。咸得知之者也。使知之徒以增其悲愁怨号之声。无为也。用是为之辞。以相其哀焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371311_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371311'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371311'>葆醇熙兮承<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371311", 1371311, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>贞则</span>。懿文章兮好循直。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371311'>诚耿介兮又绰宽。学之勤兮行弥专。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371311'>质圭璋兮文虎豹。超凌厉兮驰圣道。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371311'>力未具兮志求通。道之远兮足先穷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371311'>有母噭噭兮有弟哀号。世父孔悲兮湘水滔滔。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1371311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1371311'>去昭旷兮沈幽寞。魂冥冥兮竟难托。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1371311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1371311'>死者静兮生者愁。子之淑兮徒增忧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1371311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1371311'>志甚良兮命甚蹙。子之生兮又何欲。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1371311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1371311'>悲吾心兮动吾神。谁使子兮淑且仁。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1371311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1371311'>呜呼已乎不可追。终怨苦兮徒何为。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1371311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1371311'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1371311_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。七月，岳父杨凭贬临贺尉，子诲之随父至临贺，道经永州，宗元赠文诲之说“圆外方中”处世之道。作品：《说车赠杨诲之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷16第461页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第46页系《说车赠杨诲之》于元和五年。）</span><div id='poem_1371164' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371164' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371164?labeling=true' target='_blank'>说车赠杨诲之</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371164")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371164_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371164'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371164'>杨诲之将行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371164_comment'></div>柳子起而送之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371164_comment'></div>有车过焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371164_comment'></div>指焉而告之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371164_comment'></div>若知是之所以任重而行于世乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371164_comment'></div>材良而器攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371164_comment'></div>圆其外而方其中然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371164_comment'></div>材而不良则速坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371164_comment'></div>工之为功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371164_comment'></div>不攻则速败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371164_comment'></div>中不方则不能以载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371164_comment'></div>外不圆则窒拒而滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371164_comment'></div>方之所谓者箱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371164_comment'></div>圆之所谓者轮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371164_comment'></div>匪箱不居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371164_comment'></div>匪轮不涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371164_comment'></div>吾子其务法焉者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371164_comment'></div>曰然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371164_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371164_comment'></div>是一车之说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371164_comment'></div>非众车之说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371164_comment'></div>吾将告子乎众车之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371164_comment'></div>泽而杼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371164_comment'></div>山而侔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371164_comment'></div>上而轾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371164_comment'></div>下而轩且曳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371164_comment'></div>祥而旷左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371164_comment'></div>革而长毂以戟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371164_comment'></div>巢焉而以望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371164_comment'></div>安以爱老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371164_comment'></div>辎以蔽内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371164_comment'></div>垂绥而以畋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371164_comment'></div>载十二旒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371164_comment'></div>而以庙以郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371164_comment'></div>以陈于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371164_comment'></div>其类众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371164_comment'></div>然而其要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371164_comment'></div>存乎材良而器攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371164_comment'></div>圆其外而方其中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371164_comment'></div>是故任而安之者箱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371164_comment'></div>达而行之者轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371164_comment'></div>恒中者轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371164_comment'></div>挶而固者蚤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371164_comment'></div>长而挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371164_comment'></div>进不罪乎马退不罪乎人者辕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371164_comment'></div>却暑与雨者盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371164_comment'></div>敬而可伏者轼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371164_comment'></div>服而制者马若牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371164_comment'></div>然后众车之用具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371164_comment'></div>今杨氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371164_comment'></div>仁义之林也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371164_comment'></div>其产材良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371164_comment'></div>诲之学古道为古辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371164_comment'></div>冲然而有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371164_comment'></div>其为工也攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371164_comment'></div>果能恢其量若箱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371164_comment'></div>周而通之若轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371164_comment'></div>守大中以动乎外而不变乎内若轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371164_comment'></div>摄之以刚健若蚤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371164_comment'></div>引焉而且御乎物若辕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371164_comment'></div>高以远乎污若盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371164_comment'></div>下以成乎礼若轼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371164_comment'></div>险而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371164_comment'></div>易而利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371164_comment'></div>动而法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371164_comment'></div>则庶乎车之全也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371164_comment'></div>诗之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371164_comment'></div>驷牡騑騑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371164_comment'></div>六辔如琴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371164_comment'></div>孔氏语曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371164_comment'></div>左为六官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371164_comment'></div>右为执法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371164_comment'></div>此其以达于大政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371164_comment'></div>凡人之质不良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371164_comment'></div>莫能方且恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371164_comment'></div>质良矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371164_comment'></div>用不周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371164_comment'></div>莫能以圆遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371164_comment'></div>孔子于乡党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371164_comment'></div>恂恂如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371164_comment'></div>遇阳货必曰诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371164_comment'></div>而其在夹谷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371164_comment'></div>视叱齐侯类蓄狗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371164_comment'></div>不震乎其内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371164_comment'></div>后之学孔子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371164_comment'></div>不志于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371164_comment'></div>则吾无望焉耳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371164_comment'></div>诲之吾戚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371164_comment'></div>长而益良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371164_comment'></div>方其中矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371164_comment'></div>吾固欲其任重而行于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371164_comment'></div>惧圆其外者未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371164_comment'></div>故说车以赠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1371164_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。读内弟杨诲之过永时所带韩愈《毛颍传》，恐世人非之，撰文评说予以声援。作品：《读韩愈所著毛颍传后题》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷21第569页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371190' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371190' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371190?labeling=true' target='_blank'>读韩愈所著毛颖传后题</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371190")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371190_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371190'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371190'>自吾居夷。不与中州人通书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371190_comment'></div>有来南者。时言韩愈为毛颖传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371190_comment'></div>不能举其辞。而独大笑以为怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371190_comment'></div>而吾久不克见。杨子诲之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371190_comment'></div>始持其书。索而读之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371190_comment'></div>若捕龙蛇搏虎豹。急与之角而力不敢暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371190_comment'></div>信韩子之怪于文也。世之模拟窜窃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371190_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371190", 1371190, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>取青媲白</span>。肥皮厚肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371190_comment'></div>柔筋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371190", 1371190, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>脆骨</span>。而以为辞者之读之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371190_comment'></div>其大笑固宜。且世人笑之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371190_comment'></div>不以其俳乎。而俳又非圣人之所弃者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371190_comment'></div>诗曰。善戏谑兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371190_comment'></div>不为虐兮。太史公书有滑稽列传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371190_comment'></div>皆取乎有益于世者也。故学者终日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371190", 1371190, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>讨说</span>答问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371190_comment'></div>呻吟习复。应对进退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371190_comment'></div>掬溜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371190", 1371190, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>播洒</span>。则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371190", 1371190, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>罢惫</span>而废乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371190_comment'></div>故有息焉游焉之说。不学操缦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371190_comment'></div>不能安弦。有所拘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371190_comment'></div>有所纵也。太羹元酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371190_comment'></div>体节之荐。味之至者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371190_comment'></div>而又设以奇异小虫水草楂梨橘柚。苦咸酸辛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371190_comment'></div>虽蜇吻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371190", 1371190, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>裂鼻</span>。缩舌涩齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371190_comment'></div>而咸有笃好之者。文王之昌蒲菹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371190_comment'></div>屈到之芰。曾皙之羊枣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371190_comment'></div>然后尽天下之味以足于口。独文异乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371190_comment'></div>韩子之为也。亦将弛焉而不为虐欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371190_comment'></div>息焉游焉而有所纵欤。尽六艺之奇味以足其口欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371190_comment'></div>而不若是。则韩子之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371190_comment'></div>若壅大川焉。其必决而放诸陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371190_comment'></div>不可以不陈也。且凡古今是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371190_comment'></div>六艺百家。大细穿穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371190_comment'></div>用而不遗者。毛颖之功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371190_comment'></div>韩子穷古书。好斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371190_comment'></div>嘉颖之能尽其意。故奋而为之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371190_comment'></div>以发其郁积。而学者得以励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371190_comment'></div>其有益于世欤。是其言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371190_comment'></div>固与异世者语。而贪常嗜琐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371190_comment'></div>犹呫呫然动其喙。亦劳甚矣乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371190_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1371190_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　贬永时，舅弟卢遵随至。是年卢遵赴桂州拜谒桂管观察使李中丞，宗元作序送别。作品：《送内弟卢遵游桂州序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷24第636页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371060' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371060' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371060?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送内弟卢遵游桂州序</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371060")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371060_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371060'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371060'>外氏之世德。存乎古史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371060_comment'></div>扬乎人言。其敦大朴厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371060_comment'></div>尤异乎他族。由遵而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371060_comment'></div>五世为大儒。兄弟三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371060_comment'></div>咸为帝者师。其风之流者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371060_comment'></div>皆好学而质重。遵予弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371060_comment'></div>广而不肆。巽而不慑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371060_comment'></div>孝敬忠信之道。拳拳然未尝去乎其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371060_comment'></div>盖由其中出者也。浸润以诗易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371060_comment'></div>动摇以文采。以予弃于南服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371060_comment'></div>来从予居五年矣。未尝见其行有悖乎义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371060_comment'></div>言有异乎行者。则予之弃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371060_comment'></div>适累斯人焉。以爱予而慰其忧思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371060_comment'></div>故不为京师游。以取名当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371060_comment'></div>以桂之迩也。而中丞之道光大多容贤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371060_comment'></div>故洋洋焉乐附而趋。以出其中之有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371060_comment'></div>夫如是。则宜奋翼鳞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371060_comment'></div>乘风波。以游乎无倪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371060_comment'></div>往哉。其渐乎是行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371060_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1371060_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　贬永时，舅弟卢遵随至。是年卢遵离永游桂州，宗元寄启与桂州李中丞为其推荐。作品：《上桂州李中丞荐卢遵启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷35第906页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371025' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371025' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371025?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上桂州李中丞荐卢遵启</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371025")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371025_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371025'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371025'>凡士之当显宠贵剧。则其受赐于人也无德心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371025_comment'></div>何也。彼将曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371025_comment'></div>吾势能得之。是其所出者大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371025_comment'></div>而其报也必细。居穷厄困辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371025_comment'></div>则感慨捧戴。万万有加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371025_comment'></div>是其所出者小。而其报也必巨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371025_comment'></div>审矣。故凡明智之君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371025_comment'></div>务其巨以遗其细。则功业光乎当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371025_comment'></div>声名流乎无穷。其所以激之于中者异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371025_comment'></div>若宗元者。可谓穷厄困辱者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371025_comment'></div>世皆背去。憔悴旷野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371025_comment'></div>独赖大君子以明智垂仁问讯如平生。光耀囚锢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371025_comment'></div>若被文绣。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371025_comment'></div>世之知止足者鲜矣。既受厚遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371025_comment'></div>则又有不巳之求。以黩阁下之严威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371025_comment'></div>然而亦欲出其感慨捧戴而效其巨者。伏惟阁下留意裁择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371025_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。伏以外族积德儒厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371025_comment'></div>以为家风。周齐之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371025_comment'></div>兄弟三人。咸为帝者师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371025_comment'></div>孝仁之誉。高于他门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371025_comment'></div>伯舅叔仲。咸以孝德通于鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371025_comment'></div>为文士所纪述。相国彭城公尝号于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371025_comment'></div>名其孝以求其类。则其后咸宜硕大光宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371025_comment'></div>以充神明之心。今乃凋丧沦落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371025_comment'></div>莫有达者。岂与善之道无可取耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371025_comment'></div>独内弟卢遵。其行类诸父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371025_comment'></div>静专温雅。好礼而信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371025_comment'></div>饰以文墨。达于政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371025_comment'></div>今所以闻于阁下者。无怍于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371025_comment'></div>无愧于色焉。以宗元弃逐枯槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371025_comment'></div>故不求远仕。务显名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371025_comment'></div>而又难乎其进也。窃高阁下之举贤容众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371025_comment'></div>故愿委心焉。则施泽于遵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371025_comment'></div>过于厚赐小人也远矣。以今日之形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371025_comment'></div>而不废其言。使遵也有籍名于天官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371025_comment'></div>获禄食以奉养。用成其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371025_comment'></div>一举而有知恩之士二焉。可不务其巨者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371025_comment'></div>伏惟试详择焉。言而无实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371025_comment'></div>罪也。其敢逃大谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371025_comment'></div>进退恐惧。不知所裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371025_comment'></div>不宣。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371025_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1371025_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。舅弟卢遵任全义县丞，修复并开通县丞北门，宗元撰记。作品：《全义县复北门记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷26第719页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371094' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371094' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371094?labeling=true' target='_blank'>全义县复北门记</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371094")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371094_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371094'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371094'>贤者之兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371094_comment'></div>而愚者之废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371094_comment'></div>废而复之为是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371094_comment'></div>循而习之为非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371094_comment'></div>恒人犹且知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371094_comment'></div>不足乎列也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371094_comment'></div>然而复其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371094_comment'></div>必由乎贤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371094_comment'></div>推是类以从于政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371094_comment'></div>其事可少哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371094_comment'></div>贤莫大于成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371094_comment'></div>愚莫大于吝且诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371094_comment'></div>桂之中岭而邑者曰全义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371094_comment'></div>卫公城之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371094_comment'></div>南越以平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371094_comment'></div>卢遵为全义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371094_comment'></div>视其城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371094_comment'></div>塞北门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371094_comment'></div>凿他雉以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371094_comment'></div>问之其门人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371094_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371094_comment'></div>馀百年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371094_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371094_comment'></div>巫言是不利于令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371094_comment'></div>故塞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371094_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371094_comment'></div>以宾旅之多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371094_comment'></div>有惧竭其饩馈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371094_comment'></div>欲回其途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371094_comment'></div>故塞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371094_comment'></div>遵曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371094_comment'></div>是非吝且诬欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371094_comment'></div>贤者之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371094_comment'></div>思利乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371094_comment'></div>反是罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371094_comment'></div>余其复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371094_comment'></div>询于群吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371094_comment'></div>吏叶厥谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371094_comment'></div>上于大府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371094_comment'></div>大府以俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371094_comment'></div>邑人便焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371094_comment'></div>欢舞里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371094_comment'></div>居者思止其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371094_comment'></div>行者乐出其途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371094_comment'></div>由道废邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371094_comment'></div>用贤弃愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371094_comment'></div>推以革物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371094_comment'></div>宜民之苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371094_comment'></div>若是而不列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371094_comment'></div>殆非孔子徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371094_comment'></div>为之记云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1371094_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。于法华寺西侧伐除荆棘，构建西亭，并撰文记之。作品：《永州法华寺西亭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷28第749页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371105' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371105' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371105?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永州法华寺新作西亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371105")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371105_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371105'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371105'>法华寺居永州地最高。有僧曰觉照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371105_comment'></div>照居寺西庑下。庑之外有大竹数万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371105_comment'></div>又其外山形下绝。然而薪蒸筱簜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371105_comment'></div>蒙杂拥蔽。吾意伐而除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371105_comment'></div>必将有见焉。照谓予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371105_comment'></div>是其下有陂池芙蕖。申以湘水之流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371105_comment'></div>众山之会。果去是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371105_comment'></div>其见远矣。遂命仆人持刀斧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371105_comment'></div>群而剪焉。䕺莽下颓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371105_comment'></div>万类皆出。旷焉茫焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371105_comment'></div>天为之益高。地为之加辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371105_comment'></div>邱陵山谷之峻。江湖池泽之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371105_comment'></div>咸若有增广之者。夫其地之奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371105_comment'></div>必以遗乎后。不可旷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371105_comment'></div>予时谪为州司马。官外乎常员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371105_comment'></div>而心得无事。乃取官之禄秩以为其亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371105_comment'></div>其高且广。盖方丈者一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371105_comment'></div>或异照之居于斯。而不蚤为是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371105_comment'></div>余谓昔之上人者。不起宴坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371105_comment'></div>足以观于空色之实。而游乎物之终始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371105_comment'></div>其照也逾寂。其觉也逾有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371105_comment'></div>然则向之碍之者为果碍耶。今之辟之者为果辟耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371105_comment'></div>彼所谓觉而照者。吾讵知其不由是道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371105_comment'></div>岂若吾族之挈挈于通塞有无之方以自狭耶。或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371105_comment'></div>然则宜书之。乃书于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371105_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1371105_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。与友聚于法华寺西亭夜饮赋诗，作序文。作品：《法华寺西亭夜饮赋诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷24第645页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371065' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371065' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371065?labeling=true' target='_blank'>法华寺西亭夜饮赋诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371065")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371065_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371065'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371065'>予既谪永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371065_comment'></div>以法华浮图之西临陂池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371065_comment'></div>邱陵大江连山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371065_comment'></div>其高可以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371065_comment'></div>其远可以望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371065_comment'></div>遂伐木为亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371065_comment'></div>以临风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371065_comment'></div>观物初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371065_comment'></div>而游乎颢气之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371065_comment'></div>间岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371065_comment'></div>元克己由柱下史亦谪焉而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371065_comment'></div>无几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371065_comment'></div>以文从予者多萃焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371065_comment'></div>是夜会兹亭者凡八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371065_comment'></div>既醉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371065_comment'></div>克己欲志是会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371065_comment'></div>以贻于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371065_comment'></div>咸命为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371065_comment'></div>而授予序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371065_comment'></div>昔赵孟至于郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371065_comment'></div>赋七子以观郑志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371065_comment'></div>克己其慕赵者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371065_comment'></div>卜子夏为诗序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371065_comment'></div>使后世知风雅之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371065_comment'></div>予其慕卜者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371065_comment'></div>诚使斯文也而传于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371065_comment'></div>庶乎其近于古矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1371065_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。得西山胜景并于其上宴游，撰文记之。作品：《始得西山宴游记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷29第762页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371111' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371111' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371111?labeling=true' "poem_title_1371111")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371111_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371111'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371111'>自予为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>僇人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371111_comment'></div>居是州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371111_comment'></div>恒惴慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371111_comment'></div>其隙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371111_comment'></div>则施施而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371111_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>漫漫</span>而游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371111_comment'></div>日与其徒上高山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371111_comment'></div>入深林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371111_comment'></div>穷回溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371111_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>幽泉</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>怪石</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371111_comment'></div>无远不到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371111_comment'></div>到则披草而坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371111_comment'></div>倾壶而醉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371111_comment'></div>醉则更相枕而卧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371111_comment'></div>卧而梦<span class='inlineComment2'>（一无卧而梦三字）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371111_comment'></div>意有所极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371111_comment'></div>梦亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>同趣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371111_comment'></div>觉而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371111_comment'></div>起而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371111_comment'></div>以为凡是州之山有异态者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371111_comment'></div>皆我有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371111_comment'></div>今年九月二十八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371111_comment'></div>因坐法华西亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371111_comment'></div>望西山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371111_comment'></div>始指异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371111_comment'></div>遂命仆人过<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>湘江</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371111_comment'></div>缘染溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371111_comment'></div>斫榛莽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371111_comment'></div>焚茅茷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371111_comment'></div>穷山之高而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371111_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>攀援</span>而登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371111_comment'></div>箕踞而遨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371111_comment'></div>则凡数州之土壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371111_comment'></div>皆在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>衽席</span>之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371111_comment'></div>其高下之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371111_comment'></div>岈然洼然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371111_comment'></div>若垤若穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371111_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>尺寸千里</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371111_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>攒蹙</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/39/Comments/1")'>累积</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371111_comment'></div>莫得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>遁隐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371111_comment'></div>萦青缭白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371111_comment'></div>外与天际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371111_comment'></div>四望如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371111_comment'></div>然后知是山之特出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371111_comment'></div>不与培塿为类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371111_comment'></div>悠悠乎与灏气俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371111_comment'></div>而莫得其涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371111_comment'></div>洋洋乎与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>造物者</span>游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371111_comment'></div>而不知其所穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371111_comment'></div><span class='link' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371111_comment'></div>而犹不欲归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371111_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1371111", "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>万化</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1371111", 1371111, "Clauses/58/Comments/1")'>冥合</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371111_comment'></div>然后知吾向之未始游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371111_comment'></div>游于是乎始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371111_comment'></div>故为之文以志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371111_comment'></div>是岁元和四年也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1371111_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。买钴鉧潭并予改造，撰文记之。作品：《钴鉧潭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷29第764页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371112' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371112?labeling=true' target='_blank'>钴鉧潭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371112")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371112_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371112'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371112'>钴鉧潭在西山西。其始盖冉水自南奔注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371112_comment'></div>抵山石。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371112", 1371112, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>屈折</span>东流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371112_comment'></div>其巅委势峻。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371112", 1371112, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>荡击</span>益暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371112_comment'></div>齧其涯。故旁广而中深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371112_comment'></div>毕至石乃止。流沫成轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371112_comment'></div>然后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371112", 1371112, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>徐行</span>。其清而平者且十亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371112_comment'></div>有树环焉。有泉悬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371112_comment'></div>其上有居者。以予之亟游也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371112_comment'></div>一旦款门来告曰。不胜官租<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371112", 1371112, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>私券</span>之委积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371112_comment'></div>既芟山而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371112", 1371112, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>更居</span>。愿以潭上田贸财以缓祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371112_comment'></div>予乐而如其言。则崇其台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371112_comment'></div>延其槛。行其泉于高者而坠之潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371112_comment'></div>有声潨然。尤与中秋观月为宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371112_comment'></div>于以见天之高。气之迥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371112_comment'></div>孰使予乐居夷而忘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371112", 1371112, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>故土</span>者。非兹潭也欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371112_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1371112_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。买钴鉧潭西小丘，伐木刈秽，游赏其中，撰记。作品：《钴鉧潭西小丘记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷29第765页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_1_1371113_comment'></div>又得钴鉧潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371113_comment'></div>西二十五步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371113_comment'></div>当湍而浚者为鱼梁。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1371113_comment'></div>其石之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371113", 1371113, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>突怒</span>偃蹇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371113_comment'></div>负土而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371113_comment'></div>争为奇状者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371113_comment'></div>殆不可数。<div "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>角列</span>而上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371113_comment'></div>若熊罴之登于山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371113_comment'></div>邱之小不能一亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371113_comment'></div>可以笼而有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371113_comment'></div>问其主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371113_comment'></div>溪之流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371113_comment'></div>鸟兽之遨游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371113_comment'></div>举熙熙然<span "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>瀯瀯</span>之声与耳谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371113_comment'></div>悠然而虚者与神谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371113_comment'></div>渊然而静者与心谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371113_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1371113", 1371113, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>匝旬</span>而得异地者二。<div id='poem_sentence_47_1371113_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371113_comment'></div>以兹邱之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371113_comment'></div>致之丰镐鄠杜。<div id='poem_sentence_52_1371113_comment'></div>今弃是州也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371113_comment'></div>农夫渔父过而陋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371113_comment'></div>价四百。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　谪居永州。游小石潭，撰记。作品：《至小丘西小石潭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷29第767页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371114' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371114' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371114?labeling=true' target='_blank'>至小邱西小石潭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371114")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371114_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371114'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371114'>从小邱西行百二十步。隔篁竹闻水声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371114_comment'></div>如鸣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>佩环</span>。心乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371114_comment'></div>伐竹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>取道</span>。下见小潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371114_comment'></div>水尤清洌。全石以为底。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371114_comment'></div>近岸卷石底以出。为坻为屿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371114_comment'></div>为嵁为岩。青树翠蔓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371114_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>蒙络</span>摇缀。参差披拂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371114_comment'></div>潭中鱼可百许头。皆若空游无所依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371114_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>日光</span>下澈。影布石上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371114_comment'></div>怡然不动。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>俶尔</span>远逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371114_comment'></div>往来翕忽。似与游者相乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371114_comment'></div>明灭可见。其岸势犬牙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>差互</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371114_comment'></div>不可知其源。坐潭上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371114_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>四面</span>竹树<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/28/Comments/1")'>环合</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>寂寥</span>无人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371114_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>凄神</span>寒骨。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371114", 1371114, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>悄怆</span>幽邃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371114_comment'></div>以其境过清。不可久居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371114_comment'></div>乃记之而去。同游者吴武陵龚古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371114_comment'></div>予弟宗圆。隶而从者崔氏二小生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371114_comment'></div>曰恕己。曰奉壹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371114_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1371114_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。与娄图南等于小丘溪边石上置酒聚饮，作序记之。作品：《序饮》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷24第646页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371083' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371083' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371083?labeling=true' target='_blank'>序饮</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371083")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371083_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371083'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371083'>买小邱。一日锄理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371083_comment'></div>二日洗涤。遂置酒溪石上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371083_comment'></div>向之为记所谓牛马之饮者。离坐其背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371083_comment'></div>实觞而流之。接取以饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371083_comment'></div>乃置监史而令曰。当饮者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371083_comment'></div>举筹之十寸者三。逆而投之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371083_comment'></div>能不洄于洑。不止于坁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371083_comment'></div>不沈于底者。过不饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371083_comment'></div>而洄而止而沈者。饮如筹之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371083_comment'></div>既或投之。则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371083", 1371083, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>旋眩</span>滑汨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371083_comment'></div>若舞若跃。速者迟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371083_comment'></div>去者住者。众皆据石注视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371083_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371083", 1371083, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>欢抃</span>以助其势。突然而逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371083_comment'></div>乃得无事。于是或一饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371083_comment'></div>或再饮。客有娄生图南者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371083_comment'></div>其投之也。一洄一止一沈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371083_comment'></div>独三饮。众乃大笑驩甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371083_comment'></div>予病痞。不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371083", 1371083, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>食酒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371083_comment'></div>至是醉焉。遂损益其令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371083_comment'></div>以穷日夜而不知归。吾闻昔之饮酒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371083_comment'></div>有揖让酬酢百拜以为礼者。有叫号屡舞如沸如羹以为极者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371083_comment'></div>有裸裎袒裼以为达者。有资丝竹金石之乐以为和者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371083_comment'></div>有以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371083", 1371083, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>促数</span>糺逖而为密者。今则举异是焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371083_comment'></div>故舍百拜而礼。无叫号而极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371083_comment'></div>不袒裼而达。非金石而和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371083_comment'></div>去糺逖而密。简而同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371083_comment'></div>肆而恭。衎衎而从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371083_comment'></div>于以合山水之乐。成君子之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371083_comment'></div>宜也。作序饮以贻后之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371083_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1371083_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在永州司马任。秋，裴韶州以诗见及，用韵高绝，宗元拾韵酬和。作品：《酬韶州裴曹长使君寄道州吕八大使因以见示二十韵一首并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷42第1128页，中华书局1979年版。韶州裴曹长,不详其名。）</span><div id='poem_40622' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_40622' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/40622?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙马图赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371146")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371146_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371146'>始吾闻明皇帝在位。灵昌郡得异马于河西。而莫知其形。好事者涿人卢遵以其图来示余。其状龙鳞虺尾。拳毛环目肉鬣。马之灵怪有是耶。居帝闲为马几二十年。从封禅郊藉。鸣和銮者数十事。遇乱。帝西幸。马至咸阳西入渭水。化为龙。泳去。不知所终。且其来也宜于时。其去也存其神。是全德也。既睹其形。不可以不赞。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371146_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371146'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371146'>灵和粹异。孕至神兮。<div id='poem_sentence_49_1371229_comment'></div>长史司徒杜公与之揖让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371229_comment'></div>异于宾僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371229_comment'></div>入为太子司议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371229_comment'></div>拜归州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371229_comment'></div>岩险湍悍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371229_comment'></div>人类鸟兽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371229_comment'></div>古号难理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371229_comment'></div>公克有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371229_comment'></div>迁永州刺史朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371229_comment'></div>惟是南楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371229_comment'></div>风浮俗鬼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371229_comment'></div>户为胥徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371229_comment'></div>家有禳𥙴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371229_comment'></div>大者虐鳏孤以盗邦赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371229_comment'></div>殴愚蒙以神讹言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371229_comment'></div>悖于政经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371229_comment'></div>莫有禁御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371229_comment'></div>公于是修整部吏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371058_comment'></div>谋少吾二岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371058_comment'></div>往时在长安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371058_comment'></div>居相迩也。<div
