class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371058_comment'></div>无求于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371058_comment'></div>日率诸弟具滑甘丰柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371058_comment'></div>视寒暖之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371058_comment'></div>其隙则读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371058_comment'></div>讲古人所谓求其道之至者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371058_comment'></div>以相励也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371058_comment'></div>过永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371058_comment'></div>为吾留信次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371058_comment'></div>具道其所为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371058_comment'></div>凡士人居家孝悌恭俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371058_comment'></div>为吏祗肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371058_comment'></div>出则信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371058_comment'></div>入则厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371058_comment'></div>足其家不以非道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371058_comment'></div>进其身不以苟得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371058_comment'></div>时退则退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371058_comment'></div>尊老无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1371058", 1371058, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>井臼</span>之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371058_comment'></div>和安而益寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371058_comment'></div>兄弟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1371058", 1371058, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>衎衎</span>以相友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371058_comment'></div>不谋食而食给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371058_comment'></div>不谋道而道显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371058_comment'></div>则谋之去进士为从事于远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371058_comment'></div>始也吾疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371058_comment'></div>今也吾是焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371058_comment'></div>别九岁而会于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371058_comment'></div>视其貌益伟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371058_comment'></div>问其业益习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371058_comment'></div>叩其志益坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371058_comment'></div>于虖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371058_comment'></div>吾宗不振久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371058_comment'></div>识者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371058_comment'></div>今之世稍有人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371058_comment'></div>若谋之出处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371058_comment'></div>庸非所谓人欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371058_comment'></div>或问管仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371058_comment'></div>孔子曰人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371058_comment'></div>谋虽不试于管仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371058_comment'></div>其为道无悖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371058_comment'></div>亦可以有是名焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371058_comment'></div>抑又闻圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371058_comment'></div>学焉而必至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371058_comment'></div>谋之业良矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371058_comment'></div>而又增焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371058_comment'></div>志专矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371058_comment'></div>而又若不足焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371058_comment'></div>孔子之门不道管晏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371058_comment'></div>则谋之为人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371058_comment'></div>其可度哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371058_comment'></div>吾不智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371058_comment'></div>触罪摈越楚间六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371058_comment'></div>筑室<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1371058", 1371058, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>茨草</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371058_comment'></div>为圃乎湘之西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371058_comment'></div>穿池可以渔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371058_comment'></div>种黍可以酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371058_comment'></div>甘终为永州民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371058_comment'></div>又恨徒费禄食而无所答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371058_comment'></div>下愧农夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371058_comment'></div>上惭王官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371058_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1371058", 1371058, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>追计</span>往时咎过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371058_comment'></div>日夜反覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371058_comment'></div>无一食而安于口平于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371058_comment'></div>若是者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371058_comment'></div>岂不以少好名誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371058_comment'></div>嗜味得毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371058_comment'></div>而至于是耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371058_comment'></div>用是愈贤谋之去进士为从事以足其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371058_comment'></div>终始孝悌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371058_comment'></div>今虽羡之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371058_comment'></div>岂复可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371058_comment'></div>谋在南方有令名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371058_comment'></div>其所为日闻于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371058_comment'></div>吾恐谋不幸又为吾之所悔者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371058_comment'></div>将已之而不能得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371058_comment'></div>可若何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371058_comment'></div>然谋以信厚少言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371058_comment'></div>蓄其志以周于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371058_comment'></div>虽履吾迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371058_comment'></div>将不至乎吾之祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371058_comment'></div>则谋何悔之有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371058_comment'></div>苟能是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371058_comment'></div>虽至于大富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371058_comment'></div>又何慄耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371058_comment'></div>振吾宗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371058_comment'></div>其惟望乎尔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_112_1371058_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　谪居永州。于冉溪筑室定居，名之为愚溪，撰序以记其事。作品：《愚溪诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷24第642页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371063' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371063' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371063?labeling=true' target='_blank'>愚溪诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371063")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371063_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371063'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371063'>灌水之阳有溪焉。东流入于潇水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371063_comment'></div>或曰冉氏尝居也。故姓是溪为冉溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371063_comment'></div>或曰可以染也。名之以其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371063_comment'></div>故谓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371063", 1371063, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>染溪</span>。予以愚触罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371063_comment'></div>谪潇水上。爱是溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371063_comment'></div>入二三里。得其尤绝者家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371063_comment'></div>古有愚公谷。今予家是溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371063_comment'></div>而名莫能定。土之居者犹龂龂然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371063_comment'></div>不可以不更也。故更之为愚溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371063_comment'></div>愚溪之上。买小邱为愚邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371063_comment'></div>自愚邱东北行六十步。得泉焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371063_comment'></div>又买居之为愚泉。愚泉凡六穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371063_comment'></div>皆出山下平地。盖上出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371063_comment'></div>合流屈曲而南为愚沟。遂负土累石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371063_comment'></div>塞其隘为愚池。愚池之东为愚堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371063_comment'></div>其南为愚亭。池之中为愚岛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371063_comment'></div>嘉木异石<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371063", 1371063, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>错置</span>。皆山水之奇者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371063_comment'></div>以予故。咸以愚辱焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371063_comment'></div>夫水。智者乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371063_comment'></div>今是溪独见辱于愚。何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371063_comment'></div>盖其流甚下。不可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371063", 1371063, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>溉灌</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371063_comment'></div>又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371063", 1371063, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>峻急</span>多坻石。大舟不可入也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371063_comment'></div>幽邃浅狭。蛟龙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371063", 1371063, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>不屑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371063_comment'></div>不能兴云雨。无以利世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371063_comment'></div>而适类于予。然则虽辱而愚之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371063_comment'></div>宁武子邦无道则愚。智而为愚者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371063_comment'></div>颜子终日不违如愚。睿而为愚者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371063_comment'></div>皆不得为真愚。今予遭有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371063_comment'></div>而违于理。悖于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371063_comment'></div>故凡为愚者。莫我若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371063_comment'></div>夫然。则天下莫能争是溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371063_comment'></div>予得专而名焉。溪虽莫利于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371063_comment'></div>而善鉴万类。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371063", 1371063, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>清莹</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371063", 1371063, "Clauses/65/Comments/1")'>秀澈</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371063_comment'></div>锵鸣金石。能使愚者喜笑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371063", 1371063, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>眷慕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371063_comment'></div>乐而不能去也。予虽不合于俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371063_comment'></div>亦颇以文墨自慰。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1371063", 1371063, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>漱涤</span>万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371063_comment'></div>牢笼百态。而无所避之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371063_comment'></div>以愚辞歌愚溪。则茫然而不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371063_comment'></div>昏然而同归。超鸿蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371063_comment'></div>混希夷。寂寥而莫我知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371063_comment'></div>于是作八愚诗。纪于溪石上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371063_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1371063_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在永州移居愚溪后，以柳子、溪神问答愚溪得名之由为主题，撰寓言文以抒怨愤。作品：《愚溪对》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷14第357页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371183' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371183' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371183?labeling=true' target='_blank'>愚溪对</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371183")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371183_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371183'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371183'>柳子名愚溪而居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371183_comment'></div>五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371183_comment'></div>溪之神夜见梦曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371183_comment'></div>子何辱予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371183_comment'></div>使予为愚耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371183_comment'></div>有其实者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371183_comment'></div>名固从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371183_comment'></div>今予固若是耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371183_comment'></div>予闻闽有水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371183_comment'></div>生毒雾厉气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371183_comment'></div>中之者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>温屯</span>呕泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371183_comment'></div>藏石走濑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371183_comment'></div>连舻糜解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371183_comment'></div>有鱼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371183_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>锯齿</span>锋尾而兽蹄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371183_comment'></div>是食人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371183_comment'></div>必断而跃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371183_comment'></div>乃仰噬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371183_comment'></div>故其名曰恶溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371183_comment'></div>西海有水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371183_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>散涣</span>而无力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371183_comment'></div>不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>负芥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371183_comment'></div>投之则委靡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>垫没</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371183_comment'></div>及底而后止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371183_comment'></div>故其名曰弱水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371183_comment'></div>秦有水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371183_comment'></div>掎汨泥淖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371183_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>挠混</span>沙砾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371183_comment'></div>视之分寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371183_comment'></div>眙若睨壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371183_comment'></div>浅深险易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371183_comment'></div>昧昧不觌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371183_comment'></div>乃合泾渭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371183_comment'></div>以自彰秽迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371183_comment'></div>故其名曰浊泾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371183_comment'></div>雍之西有水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371183_comment'></div>幽险若漆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371183_comment'></div>不知其所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371183_comment'></div>故其名曰黑水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371183_comment'></div>夫恶弱六极也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371183_comment'></div>浊黑贱名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371183_comment'></div>彼得之而不辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371183_comment'></div>穷万世而不变者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371183_comment'></div>有其实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371183_comment'></div>今予甚清与美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371183_comment'></div>为子所喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371183_comment'></div>而又功可以及圃畦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371183_comment'></div>力可以载方舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371183_comment'></div>朝夕者济焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371183_comment'></div>子幸择而居予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371183_comment'></div>而辱以无实之名以为愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371183_comment'></div>卒不见德而肆其诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371183_comment'></div>岂终不可革耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371183_comment'></div>柳子对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371183_comment'></div>汝诚无其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371183_comment'></div>然以吾之愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371183_comment'></div>而独好汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371183_comment'></div>汝恶得避是名耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371183_comment'></div>且汝不见贪泉乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371183_comment'></div>有饮而南者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371183_comment'></div>见交趾宝货之多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371183_comment'></div>光溢于目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371183_comment'></div>思以两手左右攫而怀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371183_comment'></div>岂泉之实耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371183_comment'></div>过而往贪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371183_comment'></div>犹以为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371183_comment'></div>今汝独招愚者居焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371183_comment'></div>久留而不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371183_comment'></div>虽欲革其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371183_comment'></div>不可得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371183_comment'></div>夫明王之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371183_comment'></div>智者用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371183_comment'></div>愚者伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371183_comment'></div>用者宜迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371183_comment'></div>伏者宜远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371183_comment'></div>今汝之托也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371183_comment'></div>远王都三千馀里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371183_comment'></div>仄僻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>回隐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371183_comment'></div>蒸郁之与曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371183_comment'></div>螺蚌之与居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371183_comment'></div>唯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>触罪</span>摈辱愚陋黜伏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371183_comment'></div>日骎骎以游汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371183_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>闯闯</span>以守汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371183_comment'></div>汝欲为智乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371183_comment'></div>胡不呼今之聪明皎厉握天子有司之柄以生育天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371183_comment'></div>使一经于汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371183_comment'></div>而唯我独处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371183_comment'></div>汝既不能得彼而见获于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371183_comment'></div>是则汝之实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371183_comment'></div>当汝为愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371183_comment'></div>而犹以为诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371183_comment'></div>宁有说耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371183_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371183_comment'></div>是则然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371183_comment'></div>敢问子之愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371183_comment'></div>何如而可以及我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371183_comment'></div>柳子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371183_comment'></div>汝欲穷我之愚说耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371183_comment'></div>虽极汝之所往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371183_comment'></div>不足以申吾喙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371183_comment'></div>涸汝之所流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371183_comment'></div>不足以濡吾翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371183_comment'></div>姑示子其略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371183_comment'></div>吾茫洋乎无知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371183_comment'></div>冰雪之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371183_comment'></div>众裘我絺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371183_comment'></div>溽暑之铄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371183_comment'></div>众从之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371183_comment'></div>而我从之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371183_comment'></div>吾荡而趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371183_comment'></div>不知太行之异乎九衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371183_comment'></div>以败吾车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371183_comment'></div>吾放而游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371183_comment'></div>不知吕梁之异乎安流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371183_comment'></div>以没吾舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371183_comment'></div>吾足蹈坎井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371183_comment'></div>头抵木石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371183_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_117_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>冲冒</span>榛棘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371183_comment'></div>僵仆虺蜴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371183_comment'></div>而不知怵惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371183_comment'></div>何丧何得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371183_comment'></div>进不为盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371183_comment'></div>退不为抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371183_comment'></div>荒凉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_123_1371183", 1371183, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>昏默</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371183_comment'></div>卒不自克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371183_comment'></div>此其大凡者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371183_comment'></div>愿以是污汝可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371183_comment'></div>于是溪神深思而叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371183_comment'></div>嘻有馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371183_comment'></div>是及我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371183_comment'></div>因俯而羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371183_comment'></div>仰而吁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371183_comment'></div>涕泣交流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371183_comment'></div>举手而辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371183_comment'></div>一晦一明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371183_comment'></div>觉而莫知所之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371183_comment'></div>遂书其对。</div><div id='poem_sentence_136_1371183_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　谪居永州。作书与睦州刺史李幼清，劝诫其服食之事。作品：《与李睦州论服气书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷32第842页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370983' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370983' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370983?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与李睦州论服气书</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370983")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370983_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370983'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370983'>二十六日。宗元再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370983_comment'></div>前四五日。与邑中可与游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370983_comment'></div>游愚溪上池西小邱。坐柳下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370983_comment'></div>酒行甚欢。坐者咸望兄不能俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370983_comment'></div>以为兄由服气以来。貌加老而心少欢愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370983_comment'></div>不若前去年时。是时既言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370983_comment'></div>皆沮然眄睐。思有以已兄用斯术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370983_comment'></div>而未得路。间一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370983_comment'></div>濮阳吴武陵最轻健。先作书道天地日月黄帝等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370983_comment'></div>下及列仙方士皆死状。出千馀字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370983_comment'></div>颇甚快辩。伏睹兄貌笑口顺而神不偕来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370983_comment'></div>及食时。窃睨和糅燥湿与啖饮多寡犹自若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370983_comment'></div>是兄阳德其言。而阴黜其忠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370983_comment'></div>若古之强大诸侯然。负固怙力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370983_comment'></div>敌至则诺。去则肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370983_comment'></div>是不可变之尤者也。攻之不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370983_comment'></div>则宜济师。今吴子之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370983_comment'></div>已遭诺而退矣。愚敢厉锐擐坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370983_comment'></div>鸣钟鼓以进决于城下。惟兄明听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370983_comment'></div>凡服气之大不可者。吴子已悉陈矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370983_comment'></div>悉陈而不变者无他。以服气书多美言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370983_comment'></div>以为得恒久大利。则又安得弃吾美言大利而从他人之苦言哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370983_comment'></div>今愚甚呐。不能多言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370983_comment'></div>大凡服气之可不死欤不可欤。寿欤夭欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370983_comment'></div>康宁欤疾病欤。若是者愚皆不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370983_comment'></div>但以世之两事已所经见者类之。以明兄所信书必无可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370983_comment'></div>愚幼时尝嗜音。见有学操琴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370983_comment'></div>不能得硕师。而偶传其谱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370983_comment'></div>读其声以布其爪指。蚤起则嘐嘐譊譊以逮夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370983_comment'></div>又增以脂烛。烛不足则讽而鼓诸席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370983_comment'></div>如是十年。以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370983", 1370983, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>极工</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370983_comment'></div>出至大都邑。操于众人之座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370983_comment'></div>则皆得大笑曰。嘻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370983_comment'></div>何清浊之乱。而疾舒之乖欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370983_comment'></div>卒大惭而归。及年已长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370983_comment'></div>则嗜书。又见有学书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370983_comment'></div>亦不能得硕书。独得国故书伏而攻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370983_comment'></div>其勤若向之为琴者。而年又倍焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370983_comment'></div>出曰。吾书之工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370983_comment'></div>能为若是。知书者又大笑曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370983_comment'></div>是形纵而理逆。卒为天下弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370983_comment'></div>又大惭而归。是二者皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370983", 1370983, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>极工</span>而反弃者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370983_comment'></div>何哉。无所师而徒状其文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370983_comment'></div>其所不可传者。卒不能得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370983_comment'></div>故虽穷日夜。弊岁纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370983_comment'></div>愈远而不近也。今兄之所以为服气者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370983_comment'></div>果谁师耶。始者独见兄传得气书于卢遵所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370983_comment'></div>伏读三两日。遂用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370983_comment'></div>其次得气诀于李计所。又参取而大施行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370983_comment'></div>是书是诀。遵与计皆不能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370983_comment'></div>然则兄之所以学者。无硕师矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370983_comment'></div>是与向之两事者。无毫末差矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370983_comment'></div>宋人有得遗契者。密数其齿曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370983_comment'></div>吾富可待矣。兄之术或者其类是欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370983_comment'></div>兄之不信。今使号于天下曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370983_comment'></div>孰为李睦州友者。今欲已睦州气术者左袒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370983_comment'></div>不欲者右袒。则凡兄之友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370983_comment'></div>皆左袒矣。则又号曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370983_comment'></div>孰为李睦州客者。今欲已睦州气术者左袒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370983_comment'></div>不欲者右袒。则凡兄之客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370983_comment'></div>皆左袒矣。则又以是号于兄之宗族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370983_comment'></div>皆左袒矣。号姻娅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370983_comment'></div>则左袒矣。入而号之闺门之内子姓亲昵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370983_comment'></div>则子姓亲昵皆左袒矣。下之号于臧获仆妾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370983_comment'></div>则臧获仆妾皆左袒矣。出而号于素为将率胥吏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370983_comment'></div>则将率胥吏皆左袒矣。则又之天下号曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370983_comment'></div>孰为李睦州雠者。今欲已睦州气术者左袒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370983_comment'></div>不欲者右袒。则凡兄之雠者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370983_comment'></div>皆右袒矣。然则利害之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370983_comment'></div>不可知也。友者欲久存其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370983_comment'></div>客者欲久存其利。宗族姻娅欲久存其戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370983_comment'></div>闺门之内子姓亲昵欲久存其恩。臧获仆妾欲久存其主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370983_comment'></div>将率胥吏欲久存其势。雠欲速去其害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370983_comment'></div>兄之为是术。凡今天下欲兄久存者皆惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370983_comment'></div>而欲兄速去者独喜。兄为而不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370983_comment'></div>则是背亲而与雠矣。背亲而与雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370983_comment'></div>不及中人者。皆知其为大戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370983_comment'></div>而兄安焉。固小子之所懔懔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370983_comment'></div>兄其有意乎。卓然自更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370983_comment'></div>使雠者失望而慄。亲者得欲而忭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370983_comment'></div>则愚愿椎肥牛击大豕刲群羊以为兄饩。穷陇西之麦殚江南之稻以为兄寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370983_comment'></div>盐东海之水以为咸。醯敖仓之粟以为酸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370983_comment'></div>极五味之适。致五藏之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370983_comment'></div>心恬而志逸。貌美而身胖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370983_comment'></div>醉饱讴歌。愉怿欣欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370983_comment'></div>流声誉于无穷。垂功烈而不刊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370983_comment'></div>不亦旨哉。孰与去味以即淡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370983_comment'></div>去乐以即愁。悴悴焉肤日皱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370983_comment'></div>肌日虚。守无所师之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370983_comment'></div>尊不可传之书。悲所爱而庆所憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370983_comment'></div>徒曰我能坚壁拒境以为强大。是岂所谓强而大也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370983_comment'></div>无任疑惧之甚。谨再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370983_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1370983_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年11月</a>　谪居永州。作书与妻弟杨诲之。作品：《与杨诲之书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷33第847页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　谪居永州。寄启、献文与荆南节度使赵宗儒，希求援引。作品：《上江陵赵相公寄所著文启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第922页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371007' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371007' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371007?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上江陵赵相公寄所著文启</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371007")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371007_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371007'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371007'>宗元启。宗元往者尝侍坐于崔比部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371007_comment'></div>闻其言曰。今之为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371007_comment'></div>莫有居赵司勋右者。自是恒欲饰其所论著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371007_comment'></div>荐之阁下。病其未就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371007_comment'></div>将进且退者。殆十数焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371007_comment'></div>幸以废逐伏匿。获伸其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371007_comment'></div>类于向者。若有可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371007_comment'></div>然又以罪恶显大。甘死荒野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371007_comment'></div>不能出其固陋。以求知于阁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371007_comment'></div>则固昧昧徒生于世矣。谨献杂文十首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371007_comment'></div>倘还以数字定其是非。使得存于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371007_comment'></div>则虽生与蛮夷居。魂与魑魅游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371007_comment'></div>所不辞也。轻渎威重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371007_comment'></div>伏增战惧<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作惶灼）</span>。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371007_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1371007_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　谪居永州。寄启、献文与淮南节度使李吉甫，希求援引。作品：《上扬州李吉甫相公献所著文启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第918页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371005' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371005' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371005?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上杨州李吉甫相公献所著文启</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371005")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371005_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371005'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371005'>宗元启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371005_comment'></div>始阁下为尚书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371005_comment'></div>荐宠下辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371005_comment'></div>士之显于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371005", 1371005, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>门闼</span>者以十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371005_comment'></div>而某尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371005_comment'></div>不得与于厮役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371005_comment'></div>及阁下遭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371005", 1371005, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>谗妒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371005_comment'></div>在外十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371005_comment'></div>又不得效薄伎于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371005_comment'></div>以希一字之褒贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371005_comment'></div>公道之行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371005_comment'></div>阁下乃始为赞书训辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371005_comment'></div>擅文雅于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371005_comment'></div>以宗天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371005_comment'></div>而某又以此时去表著之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371005_comment'></div>受放逐之罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371005_comment'></div>荐仍囚锢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371005_comment'></div>视日请命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371005_comment'></div>进退违背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371005_comment'></div>思欲一日伏在<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作于）</span>门下而不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371005_comment'></div>常恐抱斯志以没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371005_comment'></div>卒无以知于门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371005_comment'></div>冥冥长怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371005_comment'></div>魂魄幽愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371005_comment'></div>故敢及其能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371005_comment'></div>贡书编文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371005_comment'></div>冒昧严威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371005_comment'></div>以毕其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371005_comment'></div>伏惟览观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371005_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371005_comment'></div>阁下相天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371005_comment'></div>致太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371005_comment'></div>用之郊报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371005_comment'></div>则天神降地祇出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371005_comment'></div>用之经邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371005_comment'></div>则百货殖万物成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371005_comment'></div>用之文教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371005_comment'></div>则经术兴行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371005_comment'></div>用之武事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371005_comment'></div>则暴乱剪灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371005_comment'></div>依倚而冒荣者尽去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371005_comment'></div>幽隐而怀道者毕出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371005_comment'></div>然后中分主忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371005_comment'></div>以临东诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371005_comment'></div>而天下无患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371005_comment'></div>盛德大业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371005_comment'></div>光明如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371005_comment'></div>而又有周公接下之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371005_comment'></div>斯宗元所以废锢滨<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作摈）</span>死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371005_comment'></div>而犹欲致其志焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371005_comment'></div>阁下倘以一言而扬举之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371005_comment'></div>则毕命荒裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371005_comment'></div>固不恨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371005_comment'></div>谨以杂文十首上献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371005_comment'></div>缧囚而干丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371005_comment'></div>大罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371005_comment'></div>宁为有闻而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371005_comment'></div>不为无闻而生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371005_comment'></div>去就乖野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371005_comment'></div>不胜大惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371005_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1371005_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年6月29日</a>　将所著文章十篇献给李吉甫。六月二十九日，道州刺史吕温移刺衡州过永，示李吉甫手札，宗元献启回谢。作品：《谢李吉甫相公示手札启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第920页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371006' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371006' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371006?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢李吉甫相公示手札启</a><span id='poem_sentence_1_1371006_comment'></div>衡州刺史吕温道过永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371006_comment'></div>辱示相公手札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371006_comment'></div>省录狂瞽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371006_comment'></div>收抚羁缧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371006_comment'></div>沐以含宏之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371006_comment'></div>忘其进越之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371006_comment'></div>感深益惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371006_comment'></div>喜极增悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371006_comment'></div>五情交战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371006_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371006", 1371006, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>不知所措</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371006_comment'></div>宗元性质庸塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371006_comment'></div>行能无取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371006_comment'></div>著书每成于废疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371006_comment'></div>进德且乏其馨香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371006_comment'></div>常愿操彗医门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371006_comment'></div>掬溜兰室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371006_comment'></div>良辰不与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371006_comment'></div>夙志多违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371006_comment'></div>昨者踊跃残魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371006_comment'></div>奋扬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371006", 1371006, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>蓄念</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371006_comment'></div>激以死灰之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371006_comment'></div>陈其弊帚之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371006_comment'></div>致之烟霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371006_comment'></div>分绝流眄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371006_comment'></div>今则垂露在手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371006_comment'></div>清风入怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371006_comment'></div>华衮滥褒于赭衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371006_comment'></div>龙门俯收于埳井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371006_comment'></div>藻镜洞开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371006_comment'></div>而秋毫在照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371006_comment'></div>文律傍畅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371006_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371006", 1371006, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>寒谷</span>生辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371006_comment'></div>化幽郁之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371006_comment'></div>若觌清明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371006_comment'></div>换兢危之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371006_comment'></div>如承抚荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371006_comment'></div>非常之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371006_comment'></div>岂独此生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371006_comment'></div>伏以淮海剧九天之遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371006_comment'></div>潇湘参百越之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371006_comment'></div>倾心积念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371006_comment'></div>长悬星汉之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371006_comment'></div>流形委骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371006_comment'></div>永沦魑魅之群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371006_comment'></div>何以报恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371006_comment'></div>唯当结草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371006_comment'></div>无任喜惧感恋之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1371006_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　谪居永州。安南都护张舟卒，宗元为杨侍御作文祭之。作品：《为安南杨侍御祭张都护文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1065页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371304' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371304' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为安南杨侍御祭张都护文</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371304")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371304'>维年月日。故吏某职官某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371304_comment'></div>致祭于故都护御史中丞张公之灵。交州之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371304_comment'></div>南极天际。禹绩无施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371304_comment'></div>秦强莫制。或宾或叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371304_comment'></div>越自汉世。圣唐宣风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371304_comment'></div>初鲜宁岁。稍臣卉服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371304_comment'></div>渐化椎髻。卒为华人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371304_comment'></div>流我恺悌。士燮之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371304_comment'></div>惟公克继。勤劳远图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371304_comment'></div>敷赞嘉惠。铜柱南表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371304_comment'></div>前功载修。空道北出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371304_comment'></div>式遏蛮陬。梯航连连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371304_comment'></div>旌旆悠悠。辐凑都会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371304_comment'></div>皇威以流。方荷天宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371304_comment'></div>宜公宜侯。声驰帝乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371304_comment'></div>魄降炎州。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371304_comment'></div>公昔试吏。时推清能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371304_comment'></div>公昔乘轺。人知准绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371304_comment'></div>鳏嫠以安。征赋用登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371304_comment'></div>柱史稍迁。郎曹继升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371304_comment'></div>程功佐理。海裔斯澄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371304_comment'></div>乃纪南方。专任是凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371304_comment'></div>礼分五玉。恩锡百朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371304_comment'></div>开府辟掾。群英攸属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371304_comment'></div>顾兹陋微。敢厕甄录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371304_comment'></div>既受筐篚。载加命服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371304_comment'></div>赐有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371304", 1371304, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>楚冠</span>。用惭豸角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371304_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371304", 1371304, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>星言</span>赴命。注望帷幄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371304_comment'></div>视险如夷。瞻程非邈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371304_comment'></div>伯氏左宦。爰滞中途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371304_comment'></div>流连隐忧。言念涕濡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371304_comment'></div>子姓莫在。使命顿殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371304_comment'></div>兢魂吊影。敢废斯须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371304_comment'></div>情留江徼。梦结天隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371304_comment'></div>恩切有裕。义乖从役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371304_comment'></div>顾慕长恸。展转增惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371304_comment'></div>膂力犹在。中肠屡激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371304_comment'></div>方俟消忧。永期投迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371304_comment'></div>谦德不福。法星降灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371304_comment'></div>庭悬遽彻。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371304", 1371304, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>驲讣</span>爰来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371304_comment'></div>抚躬益恨。循顾增哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371304_comment'></div>瞻容莫及。报德何阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371304_comment'></div>輤车北辕。申奠克谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371304_comment'></div>望拜徒至。音尘永乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371122'>下殇女子生长安善和里。其始名和娘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371122_comment'></div>既得病。乃曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371122_comment'></div>佛我依也。愿以为役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371122_comment'></div>更名佛婢。既病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371122_comment'></div>求去发为尼。号之为初心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371122_comment'></div>元和五年四月三日。死永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371122_comment'></div>凡十岁。其母微也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371122_comment'></div>故为父子晚。性柔惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371122_comment'></div>类可以为成人者。然卒夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371122_comment'></div>敛以<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作用）</span>缁褐。铭用塼甓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371122_comment'></div>葬零陵东郭门外第二岗之西隅。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371122_comment'></div>孰致也而生。孰召也而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371122_comment'></div>焉从而来。焉往而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371122_comment'></div>魂气无不之也。骨肉归复于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371122_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1371122_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　谪居永州。八月，好友衡州刺史吕温卒。岁末下葬，宗元撰诔文悼念。作品：《衡州刺史吕君诔》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷9第216页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371278' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371278' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371278?labeling=true' target='_blank'>衡州刺史东平吕君诔</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371278")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371278_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371278'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371278'>维唐元和六年八月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371278_comment'></div>衡州刺史东平吕君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371278_comment'></div>爰用十月二十四日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371278_comment'></div>稿葬于江陵之野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371278_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371278_comment'></div>君有智勇孝仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371278_comment'></div>惟其能可用康天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371278_comment'></div>惟其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371278_comment'></div>可用经百世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371278_comment'></div>不克而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371278_comment'></div>世亦无由知焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371278_comment'></div>君由道州以陟为衡州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371278_comment'></div>君之卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371278_comment'></div>二州之人哭者逾月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371278_comment'></div>湖南人重社乡饮酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371278_comment'></div>是月上戊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371278_comment'></div>不酒去乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371278_comment'></div>会哭于神所而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371278_comment'></div>余居永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371278_comment'></div>在二州中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371278_comment'></div>闻其哀声交于南北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371278_comment'></div>舟船之下上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371278_comment'></div>必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371278", 1371278, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>呱呱</span>然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371278_comment'></div>盖尝闻于古而观于今也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371278_comment'></div>君之志与能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371278_comment'></div>不施于生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371278_comment'></div>知之者又不过十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371278_comment'></div>世徒读君之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371278_comment'></div>歌君之理行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371278_comment'></div>不知二者之于君其末也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371278_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371278_comment'></div>君之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371278_comment'></div>宜传于百世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371278_comment'></div>今其存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371278_comment'></div>非君之极言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371278_comment'></div>独其词耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371278_comment'></div>君之理行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371278_comment'></div>宜及于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371278_comment'></div>今其闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371278_comment'></div>非君之尽力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371278_comment'></div>独其迹耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371278_comment'></div>万不试而一出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371278_comment'></div>犹为当世甚重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371278_comment'></div>若使幸得出其什二三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371278_comment'></div>巍然为伟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371278_comment'></div>与世无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371278_comment'></div>其可涯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371278_comment'></div>君所居官为第三品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371278_comment'></div>宜得谥于太常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371278_comment'></div>余惧州吏之逸其辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371278_comment'></div>私为之诔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371278_comment'></div>以志其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371278_comment'></div>其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371278_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_1371278'>麟死鲁郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371278_comment'></div>其灵不施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371278_comment'></div>濯濯夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371278_comment'></div>故洁其仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371278_comment'></div>冠仁服义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371278_comment'></div>干橹书诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371278_comment'></div>忠贞继佩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371278_comment'></div>智勇承綦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371278_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1371278", 1371278, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>跨腾</span>商周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371278_comment'></div>尧舜是师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371278_comment'></div>道不胜祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371278_comment'></div>天固余欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371278_comment'></div>鬼神齐怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371278_comment'></div>妖孽咸疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371278_comment'></div>何付之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371278_comment'></div>而夺其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371278_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371278_comment'></div>命姓为吕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371278_comment'></div>勤唐以力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371278_comment'></div>辅宁万邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371278_comment'></div>受胙尔国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371278_comment'></div>维师元圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371278_comment'></div>周以降德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371278_comment'></div>世征五侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371278_comment'></div>伊祖之则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371278_comment'></div>嗣济厥武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371278_comment'></div>前书是式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371278_comment'></div>至于化光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371278_comment'></div>爰耀其特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371278_comment'></div>春秋之元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371278_comment'></div>儒者咸惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371278_comment'></div>君达其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371278_comment'></div>卓焉孔直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371278_comment'></div>圣人有心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371278_comment'></div>由我而得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371278_comment'></div>敷施变化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371278_comment'></div>动无不克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371278_comment'></div>推理惟公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371278_comment'></div>舒文以翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371278_comment'></div>宣于事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371278_comment'></div>与古同极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371278_comment'></div>道不苟用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371278_comment'></div>资仕乃扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371278_comment'></div>进于礼司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371278_comment'></div>奋藻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1371278", 1371278, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>含章</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371278_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1371278", 1371278, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>决科</span>联中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371278_comment'></div>休问用张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371278_comment'></div>署雠百氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371278_comment'></div>错综逾光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371278_comment'></div>超都谏列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371278_comment'></div>屡皂其囊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371278_comment'></div>帝殊尔能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371278_comment'></div>人服其智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371278_comment'></div>戎悔厥祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371278_comment'></div>款边求侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371278_comment'></div>盛选<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1371278", 1371278, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>邦良</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371278_comment'></div>难乎始使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371278_comment'></div>君登御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371278_comment'></div>赞命承事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371278_comment'></div>风动海壖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371278_comment'></div>皇威以致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371278_comment'></div>来总徵赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371278_comment'></div>甲兹郎吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371278_comment'></div>制用经邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371278_comment'></div>时推重器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371278_comment'></div>诸臣之复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371278_comment'></div>周官匪易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371278_comment'></div>汉课笺奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371278_comment'></div>鲜云能备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371278_comment'></div>君自他曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371278_comment'></div>载出其技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371278_comment'></div>笔削自任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371278_comment'></div>群儒革议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371278_comment'></div>正郎司刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371278_comment'></div>邦宪为贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371278_comment'></div>糺佞肃邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371278_comment'></div>谄谀具畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371278_comment'></div>迁理于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371278_comment'></div>民服休嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371278_comment'></div>恩疏若昵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371278_comment'></div>惕迩如遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371278_comment'></div>实闭其阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371278_comment'></div>而抚于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371278_comment'></div>载其愉乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371278_comment'></div>申以舞歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371278_comment'></div>赋无吏迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371278_comment'></div>威不刑加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371278_comment'></div>浩然顺风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371278_comment'></div>从令无哗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371278_comment'></div>丝蚕外邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371278_comment'></div>我茧盈车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371278_comment'></div>杂耕邻邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371278_comment'></div>我黍之华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371278_comment'></div>既字其畜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371278_comment'></div>亦艺其麻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371278_comment'></div>鼛鼓斯屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371278_comment'></div>人喜则多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371278_comment'></div>始富中教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371278_comment'></div>兴良废邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371278_comment'></div>考绩既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371278_comment'></div>王用兴嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371278_comment'></div>陟于岳滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371278_comment'></div>言进其律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371278_comment'></div>号呼南竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371278_comment'></div>讴谣北溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371278_comment'></div>欺吏悍民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371278_comment'></div>先声如失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371278_comment'></div>逋租匿役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371278_comment'></div>归诚自出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371278_comment'></div>今我兴仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371278_comment'></div>化为齐人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371278_comment'></div>惟昔富人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371278_comment'></div>或赈之粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371278_comment'></div>今我厚生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371278_comment'></div>不竭而足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1371278_comment'></div>邦思其弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1371278_comment'></div>人戴惟父。<div id='poem_sentence_180_1371278_comment'></div>廪不馀食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1371278_comment'></div>藏无积帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1371278_comment'></div>内厚族姻。<div id='poem_sentence_189_1371278_comment'></div>君昔与余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1371278_comment'></div>讲德讨儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1371278_comment'></div>时中之奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1371278_comment'></div>疑生所怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1371278_comment'></div>怒起特殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1371278_comment'></div>齿舌嗷嗷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1371278_comment'></div>雷动风驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1371278_comment'></div>良辰不偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1371278_comment'></div>卒与祸俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1371278_comment'></div>直道莫试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1371278_comment'></div>嘉言罔敷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1371278_comment'></div>王佐之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1371278_comment'></div>穷以郡符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1371278_comment'></div>秩在三品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1371278_comment'></div>宜谥王都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1371278_comment'></div>诸生群吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1371278_comment'></div>尚拥良图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1371278_comment'></div>故友咨怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1371278_comment'></div>累行陈谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1371278_comment'></div>是旌是告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1371278_comment'></div>永永不渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1371278_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_216_1371278_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　谪居永州。八月，好友衡州刺史吕温卒，宗元作文祭之。作品：《祭吕衡州温文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1052页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371299' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371299?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭吕衡州温文</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371299")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371299_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371299'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371299'>维元和六年岁次辛卯九月癸巳朔某日。友人守永州司马员外置同正员柳宗元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371299_comment'></div>谨遣书吏同曹家人襄儿。奉清酌庶羞之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371299_comment'></div>敬祭于吕八兄化光之灵。呜呼天乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371299_comment'></div>君子何厉。天实仇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371299_comment'></div>生人何罪。天实雠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371299_comment'></div>聪明正直。行为君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371299_comment'></div>天则必速其死。道德仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371299_comment'></div>志存生人。天则必夭其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371299_comment'></div>吾固知苍苍之无信。漠漠之无神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371299_comment'></div>今于化光之殁。悲逾深而毒逾甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371299_comment'></div>故复呼天以云云。天乎痛哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371299_comment'></div>尧舜之道。至大以简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371299_comment'></div>仲尼之文。至幽以默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371299_comment'></div>千载纷争。或失或得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371299_comment'></div>倬乎吾兄。独取其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371299_comment'></div>贯于化始。与道咸极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371299_comment'></div>推而下之。法度不忒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371299_comment'></div>旁而肆之。中和允塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371299_comment'></div>道大艺备。斯为全德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371299_comment'></div>而官止刺一州。年不逾四十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371299_comment'></div>佐王之志。没而不立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371299_comment'></div>岂非修正直以召灾。好仁义以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371299", 1371299, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>速咎</span>者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371299_comment'></div>宗元幼虽好学。晚未闻道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371299_comment'></div>洎乎获友君子。乃知适于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371299", 1371299, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>中庸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371299_comment'></div>削去邪杂。显陈直正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371299_comment'></div>为道不谬。兄实使然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371299_comment'></div>呜呼。积乎中不必施于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371299_comment'></div>裕乎古不必谐于今。二事相兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371299_comment'></div>从古至少。至于化光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371299_comment'></div>最为太甚。理行第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371299_comment'></div>尚非所长。文章过人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371299_comment'></div>略而不有。夙志所蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371299_comment'></div>巍然可知。贪愚皆贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371299_comment'></div>险很皆老。则化光之夭厄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371299_comment'></div>反不荣欤。所恸者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371299_comment'></div>志不得行。功不得施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371299_comment'></div>蚩蚩之民。不被化光之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371299_comment'></div>庸庸之俗。不知化光之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371299_comment'></div>斯言一出。内若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1371299", 1371299, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>焚裂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371299_comment'></div>海内甚广。知音几人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371299_comment'></div>自友朋凋丧。志业殆绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371299_comment'></div>惟望化光。伸其宏略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371299_comment'></div>震耀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371299", 1371299, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>昌大</span>。兴行于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371299_comment'></div>使斯人徒。知我所立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371299_comment'></div>今复往矣。吾道息矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371299_comment'></div>虽其存者。志亦死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371299_comment'></div>临江大哭。万事已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371299_comment'></div>穷天之英。贯古之识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371299_comment'></div>一朝去此。终复何适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371299_comment'></div>呜呼化光。今何为乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371299_comment'></div>止乎行乎。昧乎明乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371299_comment'></div>岂荡为太空。与化无穷乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371299_comment'></div>将结为光耀。以助临照乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371299_comment'></div>岂为雨为露。以泽下土乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371299_comment'></div>将为雷为霆。以泄怨怒乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371299_comment'></div>岂为凤为麟。为景星为卿云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371299_comment'></div>以寓其神乎。将为金为锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371299_comment'></div>为圭为璧。以栖其魄乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371299_comment'></div>岂复为贤人。以续其志乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371299_comment'></div>将奋为神明。以遂其义乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371299_comment'></div>不然。是昭昭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371299_comment'></div>其得已乎。其不得已乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371299_comment'></div>抑有知乎。其无知乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371299_comment'></div>彼且有知。其可使吾知之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371299_comment'></div>幽明茫然。一恸肠绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371299_comment'></div>呜呼化光。庶或听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371299_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_66_1371299_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　四月，姊夫崔简刺永州，未至而流驩州，其家属为湖南李中丞妥为安置。宗元谪居永州，献启答谢李中丞。作品：《谢李中丞安抚崔简戚属启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷35第902页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371023' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371023' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371023?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢李中丞安抚崔简戚属启</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371023'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371023_comment'></div>伏见四月六日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371023_comment'></div>刺史崔简以前任赃罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371023_comment'></div>决一百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371023_comment'></div>长流驩州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371023_comment'></div>伏奉去月二十三日牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371023_comment'></div>崔简家口牒州安存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371023_comment'></div>并借官宅什器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371023_comment'></div>差人与驱使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371023_comment'></div>伏惟中丞以直清去败政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371023_comment'></div>以恻隐抚穷人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371023_comment'></div>罪迹暴著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371023_comment'></div>则桉之以至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371023_comment'></div>家属流离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371023_comment'></div>则施之以大惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371023_comment'></div>各由其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371023_comment'></div>咸适于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371023_comment'></div>威怀并行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371023_comment'></div>仁义齐正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371023_comment'></div>绳愆纠缪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371023_comment'></div>列郡肃澄清之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371023_comment'></div>匡困资无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371023_comment'></div>阖境知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371023", 1371023, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>喔咻</span>之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371023_comment'></div>凡在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371023", 1371023, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>巡属</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371023_comment'></div>庆惧交深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371023_comment'></div>伏见崔简儿女十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371023_comment'></div>皆柳氏所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371023_comment'></div>简之所犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371023_comment'></div>首末知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371023_comment'></div>盖以风毒所加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371023_comment'></div>渐成狂易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371023_comment'></div>不知畏法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371023_comment'></div>坐自抵刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371023_comment'></div>名为赃贿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371023_comment'></div>卒无储蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371023_comment'></div>得罪之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371023_comment'></div>百口熬然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371023_comment'></div>叫号<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1371023", 1371023, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>羸顿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371023_comment'></div>不知所赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371023_comment'></div>傥非至仁厚德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371023_comment'></div>深加<span
