id='poem_sentence_41_1371023_comment'></div>期在须臾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371023_comment'></div>某幸被缧囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371023_comment'></div>久沐恩造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371023_comment'></div>至于骨肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371023_comment'></div>又荷哀矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371023_comment'></div>循念始终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371023_comment'></div>感惧无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371023_comment'></div>谨勒祗承人沈澹奉启陈谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371023_comment'></div>下情轻黩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1371023_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　谪居永州，心沉抑不舒，作赋抒怀。作品：《闵生赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷2第57页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370868' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370868' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370868?labeling=true' target='_blank'>闵生赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370868")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370868_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370868'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370868'>闵吾生之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>险阨</span>兮。纷丧志以逢尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370868_comment'></div>气沈郁以杳渺兮。涕浪浪而尝流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370868_comment'></div>膏液竭而枯居兮。魄离散而远游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370868_comment'></div>言不信而莫余白兮。虽遑遑欲焉求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370868_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>合喙</span>而隐志兮。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>幽默</span>以待尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370868_comment'></div>为与世而斥谬兮。固离披以颠陨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370868_comment'></div>骐骥之弃辱兮。驽骀以为骋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370868_comment'></div>元虬蹶泥兮。畏避蛙黾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370868_comment'></div>行不容之峥嵘兮。质<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>魁垒</span>而无所隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370868_comment'></div>鳞介槁以横陆兮。鸱啸群而厉吻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370868_comment'></div>心沈抑以不舒兮。形<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>低摧</span>而自悯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370868_comment'></div>肆余目于湘流兮。望九嶷之垠垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370868_comment'></div>波淫溢以不返兮。苍梧郁其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>蜚云</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370868_comment'></div>重华幽而野死兮。世莫得其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>伪真</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370868_comment'></div>屈子之悁微兮。抗危辞以赴渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370868_comment'></div>古固有此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>极愤</span>兮。矧吾生之藐艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370868_comment'></div>列往则以考已兮。指斗极以自陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370868_comment'></div>登高岩而企踵兮。瞻故邦之殷辚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370868_comment'></div>山水浩以蔽亏兮。路蓊勃以扬氛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370868_comment'></div>空庐颓而不理兮。翳邱木之榛榛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370868_comment'></div>块穷老以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>沦放</span>兮。匪魑魅吾谁邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370868_comment'></div>仲尼之不惑兮。有垂训之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>谟言</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370868_comment'></div>孟轲四十乃始持心兮。犹希勇乎黝贲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370868_comment'></div>顾余质愚而齿减兮。宜触祸以阽身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370868_comment'></div>知徙善而革非兮。又何惧乎今之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370868_comment'></div>噫禹绩之勤备兮。曾莫理夫兹川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370868_comment'></div>殷周之廓大兮。南不尽夫衡山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370868_comment'></div>余囚楚越之交极兮。邈离绝乎中原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370868_comment'></div>壤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>污潦</span>以坟洳兮。蒸沸热而恒昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370868_comment'></div>戏凫鹳乎中庭兮。蒹葭生于堂筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370868_comment'></div>雄虺蓄形于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>木杪</span>兮。短狐伺景于深渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370868_comment'></div>仰矜危而俯慄兮。弭日夜之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370868", 1370868, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>拳挛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370868_comment'></div>虑吾生之莫保兮。忝代德之元醇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370868_comment'></div>孰眇躯之敢爱兮。窃有继乎古先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370868_comment'></div>明神之不欺余兮。庶激烈而有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370868_comment'></div>冀后害之无辱兮。匪徒盖乎曩愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370868_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1370868_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　在永州司马任。安南都护张舟卒一年而葬，宗元撰墓志。作品：《安南都护张公志并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷10第239页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371231' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371231' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371231?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故中散大夫检校国子祭酒兼安南都护御史中丞充安南本管经略招讨处置等使上柱国武城县开国男食邑三百户张公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371231")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371231_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371231'>汉光中兴。马援雄绝域之志。晋武一统。陶璜布殊俗之恩。理随德成。功与时并。今皇帝载新景命。丕冒海隅。时惟张公。祗复厥绩。交趾之理。续于前人。公讳某。字某。某郡人也。曾祖彦师。朝散大夫尚书驾部郎中。祖瑾。怀州武德县令。考清。朝议郎试大理寺丞。赠右赞善大夫。咸有懿美。积为馀庆。公以忠肃循其中。以文术昭于外。推经旨以饰吏事。本法理以平人心。始命蕲州蕲春主簿。句会敏给。厥声显扬。仍以左领军卫兵曹为安南经略巡官。申固捍卫。有闻彰彻。转金吾卫判官。三历御史。绩用宏大。扬于天庭。加检校尚书礼部员外郎。换山南东道节度判官。复转郎中。为安南副都护。赐紫金鱼袋。充经略副使。迁检校太子右庶子。兼安南都护御史中丞。充本管经略招讨处置等使。公自为吏。习于海邦。凡其比较勤劳。利泽长久。去之则夷獠复乱。复至而寇攘顺化。及受命专征。得陈嘉谟。誓拔祸本。纳于夷轨。乃命一其贡奉。平其敛施。牧人尽区处之方。制国备刑体之法。道阻而通百货。地偏而具五人。储偫委积。师旅无庚癸之呼。缮完板干。控带兼戊己之位。文单环王。怙力背义。公于是陆联长毂。海合艨艟。再举而克殄其徒。廓地数圻。以归于我理。乌蛮酋帅。负险蔑德。公于是外申皇威。旁达明信。一动而悉朝其长。取州二十。以被于华风。易皮弁以冠带。化奸宄为诚敬。皆用周礼。率由汉仪。公患浮海之役。可济可覆。而无所恃。乃刳连乌。以辟坦途。鬼工来并。人力罕用。沃日之大。束成通沟。摩霄之阻。硩为高岸。而终古蒙利。公患疆埸之制。一彼一此。而不可常。乃复铜柱。为正古制。鼓铸既施。精坚是立。固圉之下。明若白黑。易野之守。险逾邱陵。而万世无虞。奇琛良货。溢于玉府。殊俗异类。盈于稿街。优诏累旌其忠良。太史嗣书其功烈。就加国子祭酒。封武城男。食邑三百户。凡再策勋至上柱国。三增秩至中散大夫。某年月。薨于位。年若干。天子震悼。伤辞有加。明年。其孤某官与宗人号奉裳帷。率其家老。咨于叔父延唐令某。卜宅于潭州某原。葬用某月某日。人谋皆从。龟兆袭吉。乃刻兹石。著公之阀。以志于邱竁。告于幽明。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371231_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371231'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371231'>周限荆衡，秦开百粤。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1371231_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　在永州司马任。受岳父杨凭之托，为邕管招讨副使兼贵州刺史邓君撰墓志。作品：《唐故邕管招讨副使试大理司直兼贵州刺史邓君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷10第250页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第32页系《邕管招讨副使邓君墓志》于元和五年。）</span><div id='poem_1371233' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371233' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371233?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故邕管招讨副使试大理司直兼贵州刺史邓君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371233")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371233_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371233'>君讳某。字某。南阳人。汉司徒禹之后也。曾祖倚。皇建州浦城令。祖少立。皇沧州司马。考邕。皇左武卫兵曹参军。惟君敏给以御下。廉忠以承上。干蛊之称。洽于诸侯。信谨之迹。彰于所莅。故自始仕以至没世。未尝无闻焉。初以试太常寺奉礼郎。更职于剑南湖南江西。前后连帅。咸器其能。以柄于事。于剑南则亭拟阅实。以循官刑。尽哀敬之情。致淑问之颂。宽猛之适。克合于中。于湖南则外桉属城。内专平准。莅丱人锡石之地。参凫氏鼓铸之功。溢山告祥。国用益赡。吏无并缘以巧法。人无怨讟以苦役。凡处斯职。莫能加焉。于江西则旁缉传置。下绳支郡。俾无有异政。以一于诏条。财赋之重。待君而理。无何。邕州经略使路公恕奏署试大理评事兼贵州刺史。参帷幕之任。董龟虎之威。夷俗敬爱。革面受事。朝廷将以武定南服。命安南大校御史中丞赵良金为邕州。复以君兼招讨判官。录其异能。奏加司直。升招讨副使兼统横廉贵三州事。厖茸之下。直道有立。犷悍之内。义威必行。赋增而不扰。法一而无憾。然以忧慄间于多虞。卒成耳目之塞。遂致齿牙之猾。元和五年五月二十一日。疾卒于公馆。年五十五。明年某月日。返葬于潭州某原。夫人陇西李氏。大理评事练之女。年三十三。贞元十六年。终于郴州。有子四人。曰贽曰某。贽十三年矣。哀礼具焉。京兆尹宏农公始由湖南为江西。再以君为从事。知之最厚。痛君之能不施于剧任。惜君之志见屈于群疑。且以志授宗元。使备其缺。古者观其所使。而知在上之德。今也观其所使。而知在下之诚。呜呼。可无辞乎。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371233_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371233'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371233'>曼姓之裔，司徒隆汉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371233_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371233'>惟君是承，有植其干。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371233_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1371233'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1371233_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　在永州司马任。为堂叔、大理评事柳宽撰墓志。作品：《故大理评事柳君墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷11第273页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371248' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371248' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371248?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故大理评事柳君墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371248")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371248_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371248'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371248'>晋之乱。柳氏始分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371248_comment'></div>曰耆。为汝南守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371248_comment'></div>居河东。又五世曰庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371248_comment'></div>相魏。魏相之嗣曰旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371248_comment'></div>仕隋为黄门侍郎。其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371248", 1371248, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>小宗</span>曰楷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371248_comment'></div>至于唐。刺济房兰廓四州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371248_comment'></div>楷生夏县令府君讳绎。绎生司议郎府君讳遗爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371248_comment'></div>皆葬长安少陵原。遗爱生御史府君讳开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371248_comment'></div>葬南阳。其嗣曰宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371248_comment'></div>字存谅。读其世书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371248_comment'></div>扬于文词。南方之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371248_comment'></div>多讽其什。颇学礼而善为容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371248_comment'></div>修吏事。始仕家令主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371248_comment'></div>进左骁卫兵曹。试大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371248_comment'></div>为岭南节度推官荆南永安军判官。府罢为游士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371248_comment'></div>出桂阳。下广州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371248_comment'></div>中厉气呕泄。卒于公馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371248_comment'></div>元和六年八月七日也。年四十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371248_comment'></div>前娶琅琊王拱子。拱国子祭酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371248_comment'></div>后娶河东裴陵子。陵告成令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371248_comment'></div>裴氏之出曰裴七。君之从弟以君之丧归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371248_comment'></div>过零陵。哭且告于宗元曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371248_comment'></div>吾伯兄从事岭南。其地多货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371248_comment'></div>其民轻乱。能以简惠和柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371248_comment'></div>匡弼所奉。假守支郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371248_comment'></div>海隅以宁。斗狠仇怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371248_comment'></div>敦谕克顺。从公于荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371248_comment'></div>绥戎永安。仍专郡治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371248_comment'></div>政用休阜。是时蜀寇始灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371248_comment'></div>邦人疮痍。怀君之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371248_comment'></div>咸忘其痛。其理也惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371248_comment'></div>而不施之于大。其行也和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371248_comment'></div>而不至于年。其言也文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371248_comment'></div>而不显其声。今将以某月日祔葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371248_comment'></div>苟又不得令词而志焉。是无以盖前人之大痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371248_comment'></div>敢固以请。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371248_comment'></div>予惧辞之不令。以为神羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371248_comment'></div>予曷敢不诺。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371248_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1371248'>柳族之分。在北为高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371248_comment'></div>充于史氏。世相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371248", 1371248, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>重侯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371248_comment'></div>中书之世。实曰兰州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371248_comment'></div>夏县政良。司议德优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371248_comment'></div>营营御史。乃佐元侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371248_comment'></div>惟君是嗣。其政克修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371248_comment'></div>储闱补吏。环卫分曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371248_comment'></div>南越之庞。从事以宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371248_comment'></div>永安披攘。荐仍于兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371248_comment'></div>是董是经。既柔且平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371248_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1371248", 1371248, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>浩浩</span>呻呼。革为和声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371248_comment'></div>胡不使寿。而夺之龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371248_comment'></div>柩于海壖。圹于邓邦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371108_comment'></div>释迦牟尼如来示现之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371108_comment'></div>彼佛言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371108_comment'></div>西方过十万亿佛土。<div id='poem_sentence_20_1371108_comment'></div>周密微妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371108_comment'></div>迷者咸赖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371108_comment'></div>盖其留异迹而去者甚众。<div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　谪居永州。元和五年十一月，宗元作书及《说车》一文与妻弟杨诲之；六年，诲之答书至，宗元再致书详论《说车》之旨。作品：《与杨诲之第二书》<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370985'>张操来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370985_comment'></div>致足下四月十八日书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370985_comment'></div>始复去年十一月书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370985_comment'></div>言说车之说及亲戚相知之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370985_comment'></div>是二者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370985_comment'></div>吾于足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370985_comment'></div>固具焉不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370985_comment'></div>又何逾岁时而乃克也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370985_comment'></div>徒亲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370985_comment'></div>不过欲其勤读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370985_comment'></div>决科求仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370985_comment'></div>不为大过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370985_comment'></div>如斯已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370985_comment'></div>告之而不更则忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370985_comment'></div>忧则思复之。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1370985_comment'></div>何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370985_comment'></div>戚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370985_comment'></div>安有以尧舜孔子所传者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370985_comment'></div>而往责焉者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370985_comment'></div>徒相知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370985_comment'></div>则思责以尧舜孔子所传者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370985_comment'></div>就其道施于物斯已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370985_comment'></div>告之而不更则疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370985_comment'></div>疑则思复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370985_comment'></div>复之而又不更则去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370985_comment'></div>何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370985_comment'></div>外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370985_comment'></div>安有以忧悲且怜之之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370985_comment'></div>而强役焉者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370985_comment'></div>吾于足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370985_comment'></div>固具是二道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370985_comment'></div>虽百复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370985_comment'></div>亦将不巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370985_comment'></div>况一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370985_comment'></div>敢怠于言乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370985_comment'></div>仆之言车也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370985_comment'></div>以内可以守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370985_comment'></div>外可以行其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370985_comment'></div>今子之说曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370985_comment'></div>柔外刚中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370985_comment'></div>子何取于车之疏耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370985_comment'></div>果为车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370985_comment'></div>柔外刚中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370985_comment'></div>则未必不为弊车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370985_comment'></div>果为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370985_comment'></div>柔外刚中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370985_comment'></div>则未必不为恒人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370985_comment'></div>夫刚柔无常位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370985_comment'></div>皆宜存乎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370985_comment'></div>有召焉者在外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370985_comment'></div>则出应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370985_comment'></div>应之咸宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370985_comment'></div>谓之时中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370985_comment'></div>然后得名为君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370985_comment'></div>必曰外恒柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370985_comment'></div>则遭夹谷武子之台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370985_comment'></div>及为蹇蹇匪躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370985_comment'></div>以革君心之非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370985_comment'></div>庄以莅乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370985_comment'></div>君子其不克欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370985_comment'></div>中恒刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370985_comment'></div>则当下气怡色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370985_comment'></div>济济切切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370985_comment'></div>哀矜淑问之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370985_comment'></div>君子其卒病欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370985_comment'></div>吾以为刚柔同体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370985_comment'></div>应变若化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370985_comment'></div>然后能志乎道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370985_comment'></div>今子之意近是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370985_comment'></div>其号非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370985_comment'></div>内可以守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370985_comment'></div>外可以行其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370985_comment'></div>吾以为至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370985_comment'></div>而子不欲焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370985_comment'></div>是吾所以惕惕然忧且疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370985_comment'></div>今将申告子以古圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370985_comment'></div>书之言尧曰允恭克让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370985_comment'></div>言舜曰温恭允塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370985_comment'></div>禹闻善言则拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370985_comment'></div>汤乃改过不吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370985_comment'></div>高宗曰启乃心沃朕心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370985_comment'></div>惟此文王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370985_comment'></div>小心翼翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370985_comment'></div>日昃不暇食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370985_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>坐以待旦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370985_comment'></div>武王引天下诛纣而代之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370985_comment'></div>其意宜肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370985_comment'></div>而曰予小子不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>荒宁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370985_comment'></div>周公践天子之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370985_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>握发吐哺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370985_comment'></div>孔子曰言忠信行笃敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370985_comment'></div>其弟子言曰夫子温良恭俭让以得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370985_comment'></div>今吾子曰自度不可能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370985_comment'></div>然则自尧舜以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370985_comment'></div>与子果异类耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370985_comment'></div>乐放弛而愁检局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370985_comment'></div>虽圣人与子同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370985_comment'></div>圣人能求诸中以厉乎巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370985_comment'></div>久则安乐之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370985_comment'></div>子则肆之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370985_comment'></div>其所以异乎圣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370985_comment'></div>在是决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370985_comment'></div>若果以圣与我异类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370985_comment'></div>则自尧舜以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370985_comment'></div>皆宜纵目卬鼻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370985_comment'></div>四手八足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370985_comment'></div>鳞毛羽鬣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370985_comment'></div>飞走变化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370985_comment'></div>然后乃可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370985_comment'></div>苟不为是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370985_comment'></div>则亦人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370985_comment'></div>而子举将外之耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370985_comment'></div>若然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370985_comment'></div>圣自圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370985_comment'></div>贤自贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370985_comment'></div>众人自众人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370985_comment'></div>咸任其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370985_comment'></div>又何以作言语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370985_comment'></div>立道理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370985_comment'></div>千百年天下传道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370985_comment'></div>是皆无益于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370985_comment'></div>独遗好事者藻缋文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370985_comment'></div>以矜世取誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370985_comment'></div>圣人不足重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370985_comment'></div>故曰中人以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370985_comment'></div>可以语上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370985_comment'></div>唯上智与下愚不移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370985_comment'></div>吾以子近上智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370985_comment'></div>今其言曰自度不可能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370985_comment'></div>则子果不能为中人以上耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370985_comment'></div>吾之忧且疑者以此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370985_comment'></div>凡儒者之所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370985_comment'></div>大莫尚孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370985_comment'></div>孔子七十而纵心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370985_comment'></div>彼其纵之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370985_comment'></div>度不踰矩而后纵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370985_comment'></div>今子年有几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370985_comment'></div>自度果能不踰矩乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370985_comment'></div>而遽乐于纵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370985_comment'></div>傅说曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1370985_comment'></div>惟狂克念作圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1370985_comment'></div>今夫狙猴之处山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1370985_comment'></div>叫呼跳梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1370985_comment'></div>其轻躁狼戾异甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1370985_comment'></div>然得而絷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1370985_comment'></div>未半日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1370985_comment'></div>则定坐求食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1370985_comment'></div>唯人之为制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1370985_comment'></div>其或优人得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1370985_comment'></div>加鞭箠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1370985_comment'></div>狎而扰焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1370985_comment'></div>跪起趋走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1370985_comment'></div>咸能为人所为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1370985_comment'></div>未有一焉狂奔掣顿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1370985_comment'></div>踣弊自绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1370985_comment'></div>故吾信夫狂之为圣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1370985_comment'></div>今子有贤人之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1370985_comment'></div>反不肯为狂之克念者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1370985_comment'></div>而曰我不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1370985_comment'></div>舍子其孰能乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1370985_comment'></div>是孟子之所谓不为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1370985_comment'></div>非不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1370985_comment'></div>凡吾之致书为说车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1370985_comment'></div>皆圣道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1370985_comment'></div>今子曰我不能为车之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1370985_comment'></div>但当则法圣道而内无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1370985_comment'></div>乃可长久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1370985_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1370985_comment'></div>吾车之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1370985_comment'></div>果不为圣道耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1370985_comment'></div>吾以内可以守外可以行其道告子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1370985_comment'></div>今子曰我不能剪剪拘拘以同世取荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1370985_comment'></div>吾岂教子为剪剪拘拘者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1370985_comment'></div>子何考吾说车之不详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1370985_comment'></div>吾之所云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1370985_comment'></div>其道自尧舜禹汤高宗文武周公孔子皆由之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1370985_comment'></div>而子不谓圣道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1370985_comment'></div>抑以吾为与世同波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1370985_comment'></div>工为剪剪拘拘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1370985_comment'></div>以是教已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1370985_comment'></div>固迷吾文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1370985_comment'></div>而悬定吾意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1370985_comment'></div>甚不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1370985_comment'></div>圣人不以人废言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1370985_comment'></div>吾虽少时与世同波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1370985_comment'></div>然未尝剪剪拘拘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1370985_comment'></div>又子自言处众中偪侧扰攘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1370985_comment'></div>欲弃去不敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1370985_comment'></div>犹勉强与之居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1370985_comment'></div>苟能是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1370985_comment'></div>何以不克为车之说耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1370985_comment'></div>忍污杂嚣哗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1370985_comment'></div>尚可恭其体貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1370985_comment'></div>逊其言辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1370985_comment'></div>何故不可吾之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1370985_comment'></div>吾未尝为佞且伪。<div id='poem_sentence_199_1370985_comment'></div>如斯而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1370985_comment'></div>尧舜之让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1370985_comment'></div>禹汤高宗之戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1370985_comment'></div>文王之小心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1370985_comment'></div>武王之不敢<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_205_1370985_comment'></div>孔子之六十九未尝纵心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1370985_comment'></div>彼七八圣人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1370985_comment'></div>所为若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1370985_comment'></div>岂恒愧于心乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1370985_comment'></div>慢其貌。<div id='poem_sentence_212_1370985_comment'></div>偃蹇而后行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1370985_comment'></div>道人是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1370985_comment'></div>不顾齿类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1370985_comment'></div>人皆心非之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1370985_comment'></div>曰是礼不足者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1370985_comment'></div>甚且见骂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1370985_comment'></div>如是而心反不愧耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1370985_comment'></div>圣人之礼让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1370985_comment'></div>其且为伪乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1370985_comment'></div>为佞乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1370985_comment'></div>今子又以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_223_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/223/Comments/0")'>行险</span>为车之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1370985_comment'></div>夫车之为道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1370985_comment'></div>岂乐行于险耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1370985_comment'></div>度不得已而至乎险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1370985_comment'></div>期勿败而已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1370985_comment'></div>夫君子亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1370985_comment'></div>不求险而利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1370985_comment'></div>故曰危邦不入。<div id='poem_sentence_232_1370985_comment'></div>其默足以容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1370985_comment'></div>不幸而及于危乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1370985_comment'></div>期勿祸而已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1370985_comment'></div>且子以及物行道为是耶非耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1370985_comment'></div>伊尹以生人为已任。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1370985_comment'></div>其卒果何为乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1370985_comment'></div>是之不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1370985_comment'></div>而甘罗终军以为慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1370985_comment'></div>弃大而录小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1370985_comment'></div>贱本而贵末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1370985_comment'></div>夸世而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_251_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/251/Comments/0")'>钓奇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1370985_comment'></div>苟求之于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1370985_comment'></div>以圣人之道为不若二子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1370985_comment'></div>仆以为过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1370985_comment'></div>彼甘罗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1370985_comment'></div>左右反覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1370985_comment'></div>得利弃信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1370985_comment'></div>使秦背燕之亲己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1370985_comment'></div>而反与赵合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1370985_comment'></div>以致危于燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1370985_comment'></div>天下是以益知秦无礼不信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1370985_comment'></div>视函谷关若虎豹之窟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1370985_comment'></div>罗之徒实使然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1370985_comment'></div>子而慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1370985_comment'></div>非夸世欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1370985_comment'></div>彼终军者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1370985_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_267_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/267/Comments/0")'>诞谲</span>险薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1370985_comment'></div>不能以道匡汉主好战之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1370985_comment'></div>视天下之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1370985_comment'></div>若观蚁之移穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1370985_comment'></div>玩而不戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1370985_comment'></div>人之死于胡越者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1370985_comment'></div>赫然千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1370985_comment'></div>不能谏而又纵臾之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1370985_comment'></div>已则决起奋怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1370985_comment'></div>掉强越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1370985_comment'></div>挟淫夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1370985_comment'></div>以媒老妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1370985_comment'></div>欲蛊夺人之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1370985_comment'></div>智不能断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1370985_comment'></div>而俱死焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1370985_comment'></div>是无异卢狗之遇嗾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1370985_comment'></div>呀呀而走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1370985_comment'></div>不顾险阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1370985_comment'></div>唯嗾者之从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1370985_comment'></div>何无已之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1370985_comment'></div>子而慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1370985_comment'></div>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_288_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/288/Comments/0")'>钓奇</span>欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1370985_comment'></div>二小子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1370985_comment'></div>吾不欲吾子言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1370985_comment'></div>孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1370985_comment'></div>是闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1370985_comment'></div>非达也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1370985_comment'></div>使二小子及孔子氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1370985_comment'></div>曾不得与琴张牧皮狂者之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1370985_comment'></div>是固不宜以为的也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1370985_comment'></div>且吾子之要于世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1370985_comment'></div>处耶出耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_298_1370985_comment'></div>主上以圣明进有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_299_1370985_comment'></div>兴大化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_300_1370985_comment'></div>枯槁伏匿缧锢之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1370985_comment'></div>皆思踊跃洗沐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_302_1370985_comment'></div>期辅尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_303_1370985_comment'></div>万一有所不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_304_1370985_comment'></div>丈人方用德艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_305_1370985_comment'></div>达于邦家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_306_1370985_comment'></div>为大官以立于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_307_1370985_comment'></div>吾子虽欲为处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_308_1370985_comment'></div>何可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_309_1370985_comment'></div>则固出而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_310_1370985_comment'></div>将出于世而仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_311_1370985_comment'></div>未二十而任其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_312_1370985_comment'></div>吾为子不取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_313_1370985_comment'></div>冯妇好搏虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_314_1370985_comment'></div>卒为善士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_315_1370985_comment'></div>周处狂横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_316_1370985_comment'></div>一旦改节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_317_1370985_comment'></div>皆老而自克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_318_1370985_comment'></div>今子素善士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_319_1370985_comment'></div>年又甚少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_320_1370985_comment'></div>血气未定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_321_1370985_comment'></div>而忽欲为阮咸嵇康之所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_322_1370985_comment'></div>守而不化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_323_1370985_comment'></div>不肯入尧舜之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_324_1370985_comment'></div>此甚未可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_325_1370985_comment'></div>吾意足下所以云云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_326_1370985_comment'></div>恶佞之尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_327_1370985_comment'></div>而不悦于恭耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_328_1370985_comment'></div>观过而知仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_329_1370985_comment'></div>弥见吾子之方其中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_330_1370985_comment'></div>其乏者独外之圆耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_331_1370985_comment'></div>屈子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_332_1370985_comment'></div>惩于羹者而吹齑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_333_1370985_comment'></div>吾子其类是欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_334_1370985_comment'></div>佞之恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_335_1370985_comment'></div>而恭反得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_336_1370985_comment'></div>圣人所贵乎中者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_337_1370985_comment'></div>能时其时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_338_1370985_comment'></div>苟不适其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_339_1370985_comment'></div>则肆与佞同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_340_1370985_comment'></div>山虽高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_341_1370985_comment'></div>水虽下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_342_1370985_comment'></div>其为险而害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_343_1370985_comment'></div>要之不异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_344_1370985_comment'></div>足下当取吾说车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_345_1370985_comment'></div>申而复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_346_1370985_comment'></div>非为佞而利于险也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_347_1370985_comment'></div>吾子恶乎佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_348_1370985_comment'></div>而恭且不欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_349_1370985_comment'></div>今吾又以圆告子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_350_1370985_comment'></div>则圆之为号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_351_1370985_comment'></div>固子之所宜甚恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_352_1370985_comment'></div>方于恭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_353_1370985_comment'></div>又将千百焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_354_1370985_comment'></div>然吾所谓圆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_355_1370985_comment'></div>不如世之突梯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_356_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/356/Comments/0")'>苟冒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_356_1370985_comment'></div>以务利乎己者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_357_1370985_comment'></div>固若轮焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_358_1370985_comment'></div>非特于可进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_359_1370985_comment'></div>锐而不滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_360_1370985_comment'></div>亦将于可退也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_361_1370985_comment'></div>安而不挫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_362_1370985_comment'></div>欲如循环之无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_363_1370985_comment'></div>不欲如转丸之走下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_364_1370985_comment'></div>乾健而运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_365_1370985_comment'></div>离丽而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_366_1370985_comment'></div>夫岂不以圆克乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_367_1370985_comment'></div>而恶之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_368_1370985_comment'></div>吾年十七求进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_369_1370985_comment'></div>四年乃得举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_370_1370985_comment'></div>二十四求博学宏词科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_371_1370985_comment'></div>二年乃得仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_372_1370985_comment'></div>其间与常人为群辈数十百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_373_1370985_comment'></div>当时志气类足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_374_1370985_comment'></div>时遭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_375_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/375/Comments/0")'>讪骂</span>诟辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_375_1370985_comment'></div>不为之面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_376_1370985_comment'></div>则为之背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_377_1370985_comment'></div>积八九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_378_1370985_comment'></div>日思摧其形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_379_1370985_comment'></div>锄其气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_380_1370985_comment'></div>虽甚自挫折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_381_1370985_comment'></div>然已得号为狂疏人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_382_1370985_comment'></div>及为蓝田尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_383_1370985_comment'></div>留府庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_384_1370985_comment'></div>旦暮走谒于大官堂下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_385_1370985_comment'></div>与卒伍无别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_386_1370985_comment'></div>居曹则俗吏满前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_387_1370985_comment'></div>更说买卖商算赢缩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_388_1370985_comment'></div>又二年为此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_389_1370985_comment'></div>度不能去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_390_1370985_comment'></div>益学和其光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_391_1370985_comment'></div>同其尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_392_1370985_comment'></div>虽自以为得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_393_1370985_comment'></div>然已得号为轻薄人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_394_1370985_comment'></div>及为御史郎官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_395_1370985_comment'></div>自以登朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_396_1370985_comment'></div>利害益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_397_1370985_comment'></div>愈恐惧思欲不失色于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_398_1370985_comment'></div>虽戒砺加切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_399_1370985_comment'></div>然卒不免为连累废逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_400_1370985_comment'></div>犹以前时遭狂疏轻薄之号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_401_1370985_comment'></div>既闻于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_402_1370985_comment'></div>为恭让未洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_403_1370985_comment'></div>故罪至而无所明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_404_1370985_comment'></div>到永州七年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_405_1370985_comment'></div>蚤夜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_406_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/406/Comments/0")'>惶惶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_406_1370985_comment'></div>追思咎过往来甚熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_407_1370985_comment'></div>讲尧舜孔子之道亦熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_408_1370985_comment'></div>益知出于世者之难自任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_409_1370985_comment'></div>今足下未为仆向所陈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_410_1370985_comment'></div>宜乎欲任己之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_411_1370985_comment'></div>此与仆少时何异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_412_1370985_comment'></div>然循吾向所陈者而由之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_413_1370985_comment'></div>然后知难耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_414_1370985_comment'></div>今吾先尽陈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_415_1370985_comment'></div>不欲足下如吾更<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_416_1370985", 1370985, "Clauses/416/Comments/0")'>讪辱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_416_1370985_comment'></div>被称号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_417_1370985_comment'></div>已不信于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_418_1370985_comment'></div>而后知慕中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_419_1370985_comment'></div>费力而多害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_420_1370985_comment'></div>故勤勤焉云尔而不巳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_421_1370985_comment'></div>子其详之熟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_422_1370985_comment'></div>无徒为烦言往复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_423_1370985_comment'></div>幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_424_1370985_comment'></div>又所言书意有不可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_425_1370985_comment'></div>令仆专专为掩匿覆盖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_426_1370985_comment'></div>慎勿与不知者道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_427_1370985_comment'></div>此又非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_428_1370985_comment'></div>凡吾与子往复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_429_1370985_comment'></div>皆为言道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_430_1370985_comment'></div>道固公物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_431_1370985_comment'></div>非可私而有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_432_1370985_comment'></div>假令子之言非是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_433_1370985_comment'></div>则子当自求暴扬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_434_1370985_comment'></div>使人皆得刺列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_435_1370985_comment'></div>卒采其可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_436_1370985_comment'></div>以正乎已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_437_1370985_comment'></div>然后道可显达也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_438_1370985_comment'></div>今乃专欲覆盖掩匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_439_1370985_comment'></div>是固自任其志而不求益者之为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_440_1370985_comment'></div>士传言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_441_1370985_comment'></div>庶人谤于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_442_1370985_comment'></div>子产之乡校不毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_443_1370985_comment'></div>独何如哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_444_1370985_comment'></div>君子之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_445_1370985_comment'></div>如日月之蚀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_446_1370985_comment'></div>又何盖乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_447_1370985_comment'></div>是事吾不能奉子之教矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_448_1370985_comment'></div>幸悉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_449_1370985_comment'></div>足下所为书言文章极正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_450_1370985_comment'></div>其辞奥雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_451_1370985_comment'></div>后来之驰于是道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_452_1370985_comment'></div>吾子且以为蒲捎駃騠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_453_1370985_comment'></div>何可当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_454_1370985_comment'></div>其说韩愈处甚好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_455_1370985_comment'></div>其他但用庄子国语文字太多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_456_1370985_comment'></div>反累正气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_457_1370985_comment'></div>果能遗是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_458_1370985_comment'></div>则大善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_459_1370985_comment'></div>忧闵废锢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_460_1370985_comment'></div>悼籍田之罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_461_1370985_comment'></div>意思恳恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_462_1370985_comment'></div>诚爱我厚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_463_1370985_comment'></div>吾自度罪大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_464_1370985_comment'></div>敢以是为欣且戚耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_465_1370985_comment'></div>但当把锄荷锸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_466_1370985_comment'></div>决溪泉为圃以给茹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_467_1370985_comment'></div>其隙则浚沟池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_468_1370985_comment'></div>艺树木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_469_1370985_comment'></div>行歌坐钓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_470_1370985_comment'></div>望青天白云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_471_1370985_comment'></div>以此为适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_472_1370985_comment'></div>亦足老死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_473_1370985_comment'></div>无戚戚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_474_1370985_comment'></div>时时读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_475_1370985_comment'></div>不忘圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_476_1370985_comment'></div>已不能用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_477_1370985_comment'></div>有我信者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_478_1370985_comment'></div>则以告之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_479_1370985_comment'></div>朝廷更宰相来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_480_1370985_comment'></div>政事益修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_481_1370985_comment'></div>丈人日夕还北阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_482_1370985_comment'></div>吾待子郭南亭上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_483_1370985_comment'></div>期口言不久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_484_1370985_comment'></div>至是当尽吾说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_485_1370985_comment'></div>今因道人行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_486_1370985_comment'></div>粗道大旨如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_487_1370985_comment'></div>宗元白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_488_1370985_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　谪居永州。作书与姊夫崔简，劝戒服食长生事。作品：《与崔连州论石钟乳书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷32第835页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370981' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370981' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370981?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与崔连州论石钟乳书</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370981")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370981_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370981'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370981'>宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370981_comment'></div>前以所致石钟乳非良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370981_comment'></div>闻子敬所饵与此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370981_comment'></div>又闻子敬时愤闷动作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370981_comment'></div>宜以为未得其粹美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370981_comment'></div>而为粗矿惨悍所中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370981_comment'></div>惧伤子敬醇懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370981_comment'></div>仍习谬误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370981_comment'></div>故勤以为告也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370981_comment'></div>再获书辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370981_comment'></div>辱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370981", 1370981, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>徵引</span>地理證验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370981_comment'></div>多过数百言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370981_comment'></div>以为土之所出乃良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370981_comment'></div>无不可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370981_comment'></div>是将不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370981_comment'></div>夫言土之出者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370981_comment'></div>固多良而少不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370981_comment'></div>不谓其咸无不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370981_comment'></div>草木之生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370981_comment'></div>依于土然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370981_comment'></div>即其类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370981_comment'></div>而有居山之阴阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370981_comment'></div>或近于水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370981_comment'></div>或附于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370981_comment'></div>其性移焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370981_comment'></div>又况钟乳直产于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370981_comment'></div>石之精粗疏密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370981_comment'></div>寻尺特异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370981_comment'></div>而穴之上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370981_comment'></div>土之薄厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370981_comment'></div>石之高下不可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370981_comment'></div>则其依而产者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370981_comment'></div>固不一性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370981_comment'></div>然由其精密而出者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370981_comment'></div>则油然而清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370981_comment'></div>炯然而辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370981_comment'></div>其窍滑以夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370981_comment'></div>其肌廉以微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370981_comment'></div>食之使人荣华温柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370981_comment'></div>其气宣流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370981_comment'></div>生胃通肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370981_comment'></div>寿善康宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370981_comment'></div>心平意舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370981_comment'></div>其乐愉愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370981_comment'></div>由其粗疏而下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370981_comment'></div>则奔突结涩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370981_comment'></div>乍大乍小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370981_comment'></div>色如枯骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370981_comment'></div>或类死灰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370981_comment'></div>淹悴不发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370981_comment'></div>丛齿积颣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370981_comment'></div>重浊顽朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370981_comment'></div>食之使人偃蹇壅郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370981_comment'></div>泄火生风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370981_comment'></div>戟喉痒肺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370981_comment'></div>幽关不聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370981_comment'></div>心烦喜怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370981_comment'></div>肝举<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1370981", 1370981, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>气刚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370981_comment'></div>不能和平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370981_comment'></div>故君子慎焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370981_comment'></div>取其色之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370981_comment'></div>而不必唯土之信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370981_comment'></div>以求其至精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370981_comment'></div>凡为此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370981_comment'></div>幸子敬饵之近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370981_comment'></div>不至于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370981_comment'></div>故可止御也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370981_comment'></div>必若土之出无不可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370981_comment'></div>则东南之竹箭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370981_comment'></div>虽旁岐揉曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以贯犀革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370981_comment'></div>北山之木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370981_comment'></div>虽离奇液暪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370981_comment'></div>空立中枯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以梁百尺之观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370981_comment'></div>航千仞之渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370981_comment'></div>冀之北土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370981_comment'></div>马之所生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370981_comment'></div>凡其大耳短脰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370981_comment'></div>拘挛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1370981", 1370981, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>踠跌</span>薄蹄而曳者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以胜百钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370981_comment'></div>驰千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370981_comment'></div>雍之块璞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以备<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1370981", 1370981, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>砥砺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370981_comment'></div>徐之粪壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以封大社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370981_comment'></div>荆之茅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1370981", 1370981, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>缩酒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370981_comment'></div>九江之元龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370981_comment'></div>泗滨之石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以击考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370981_comment'></div>若是而不大谬者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370981_comment'></div>少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370981_comment'></div>其在人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370981_comment'></div>则鲁之晨饮其羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370981_comment'></div>关毂而輠轮者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以为师儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370981_comment'></div>卢之沽名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以为太医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370981_comment'></div>西子之里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370981_comment'></div>恶而矉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以当侯王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370981_comment'></div>山西之冒没轻儳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370981_comment'></div>沓贪而忍者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以凿凶门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370981_comment'></div>制阃外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370981_comment'></div>山东之稚骏朴鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370981_comment'></div>力农桑啖枣栗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370981_comment'></div>皆可以谋谟于庙堂之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370981_comment'></div>若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370981_comment'></div>则反伦悖道者甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370981_comment'></div>何以异于是物哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370981_comment'></div>是故经中言丹砂者以类芙蓉而有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370981_comment'></div>言当归者以类马尾蚕首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370981_comment'></div>言人参者似人形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370981_comment'></div>黄芩似腐肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370981_comment'></div>附子八角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370981_comment'></div>甘遂赤肤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370981_comment'></div>类不可悉数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370981_comment'></div>若果土宜乃善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370981_comment'></div>则云生某所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370981_comment'></div>不当又云某者良也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370981_comment'></div>又经注曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370981_comment'></div>始兴为上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370981_comment'></div>次乃广连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370981_comment'></div>则不必服正为始兴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370981_comment'></div>今再三为言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370981_comment'></div>唯欲得其英精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370981_comment'></div>以固子敬之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370981_comment'></div>非以知药石角技能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370981_comment'></div>若以服饵不必利己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370981_comment'></div>姑务胜人而夸辩博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370981_comment'></div>素不望此于子敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370981_comment'></div>其不然明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370981_comment'></div>故毕其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370981_comment'></div>宗元再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_136_1370981_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　谪居永州。将所著文章四十三篇献与李中丞，并附书启。作品：《上李中丞献所著文启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第926页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371011' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371011' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371011?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李中丞献所著文启</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371011")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371011_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371011'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371011'>宗元启。宗元无异能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371011_comment'></div>独好为文章。始用此以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371011_comment'></div>终用此以退。今者畏罪悔咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371011_comment'></div>伏匿惴慄。犹未能去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371011_comment'></div>时时举首。长吟哀歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371011_comment'></div>舒泄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371011", 1371011, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>幽郁</span>。因取笔以书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371011_comment'></div>纫韦而编。略成数卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371011_comment'></div>伏念阁下以文章升大僚。统方隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371011_comment'></div>而宗元幸缘罪辜。得与编人齿于部内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371011_comment'></div>不以此时露其所为。以希大君子顾视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371011_comment'></div>则为陋劣而自弃也。敢饰近文及在京师官命所草者凡三卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371011_comment'></div>合四十三篇。不敢繁故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371011_comment'></div>傥或以为有可采者。当缮录其馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371011_comment'></div>以增几席之污。去就鄙野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371011_comment'></div>伏用兢惶。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371011_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1371011_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　谪地永州饥馑，廪食困乏，宗元上启湖南李中丞，求告助食。作品：《上湖南李中丞干廪食启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷35第904页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371024' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371024' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371024?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上湖南李中丞干廪食启</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371024")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371024_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371024'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371024'>某启。某尝读列子书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371024_comment'></div>有言于郑子阳者。则曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371024_comment'></div>列御寇盖有道之士也。居君之地而穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371024_comment'></div>若不好士。使之然乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371024_comment'></div>子阳于是以君命输粟于列子。列子不受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371024_comment'></div>固尝高其志。又读孟子书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371024_comment'></div>言诸侯之于士。曰使之穷于吾地则赒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371024_comment'></div>赒之亦可受也。又怪孟子以希圣之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371024_comment'></div>命代而出。不卓然自异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371024_comment'></div>以洁白其德。取食于诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371024_comment'></div>不以为非。断而言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371024_comment'></div>则列子独任<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作往）</span>之士。唯已一毛之为爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371024_comment'></div>故遁以自免。孟子兼爱之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371024_comment'></div>唯利万物之为谋。故当而不辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371024_comment'></div>今宗元处则无列子之道。出则无孟子之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371024_comment'></div>穷则去让而自求。至则捧受而无惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371024_comment'></div>斯固为贪淩苟冒人矣。董生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371024_comment'></div>明明求财利。唯恐困乏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371024_comment'></div>庶人之事也。是皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371024", 1371024, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>诟耻</span>之大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371024_comment'></div>而无所避之。何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371024_comment'></div>以为士则黜辱。为农则斥远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371024_comment'></div>无伎不可以为工。无赀不可以为商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371024_comment'></div>抱大罪。处穷徼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371024_comment'></div>以当恶岁。而无廪食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371024_comment'></div>又不自列于阁下。则非所以待君子之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371024_comment'></div>伏惟览子阳孟子之说。以垂德惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371024_comment'></div>无使惶惶然控于他邦。重为董生所笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371024_comment'></div>则缧囚之幸大矣。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371024_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1371024_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　谪居永州第七年，剑南西川节度使武元衡写信抚问，宗元复启谢之。作品：《上西川武元衡相公谢抚问启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷35第897页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371019' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371019' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371019?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上西川武元衡相公谢抚问启</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371019")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371019_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371019'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371019'>某启。某愚陋狂简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371019_comment'></div>不知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371019", 1371019, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>周防</span>。失于夷途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371019_comment'></div>陷在大罪。伏匿岭下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371019_comment'></div>于今七年。追念往愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371019_comment'></div>寒心飞魄。幸蒙在宥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371019_comment'></div>得自循省。岂敢彻闻于廊庙之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371019_comment'></div>见志于樽俎之际。以求必于万一者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371019_comment'></div>相公以含宏光大之德。广博渊泉之量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371019_comment'></div>不遗垢污。先赐荣示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371019_comment'></div>捧读流涕。以惧以悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371019_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371019", 1371019, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>屏营</span>舞跃。不敢宁处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371019_comment'></div>是将收孟明于三败。责曹沬于一举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371019_comment'></div>俾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371019", 1371019, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>折胁</span>膑脚之伦。得自拂饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371019_comment'></div>以期效命于鞭策之下。此诚大君子并容广览弃瑕录用之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371019_comment'></div>自顾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371019", 1371019, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>孱钝</span>。无以克堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371019_comment'></div>祗受大赐。岂任负戴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371019_comment'></div>精诚之至。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371019", 1371019, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>炯然</span>如日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371019_comment'></div>拜伏无路。不胜惶惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371019_comment'></div>轻冒威重。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371019", 1371019, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>战汗</span>交深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371019_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1371019_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　谪居永州第七年，襄州大都督府长史李夷简致书抚问，宗元复启谢之。作品：《谢襄阳李夷简尚书委曲抚问启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷35第898页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371020' id='poem_sentence_0_1371020_comment'></div>特赐记忆。过蒙存问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371020_comment'></div>奉读喜惧。浪然涕流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371020_comment'></div>庆幸之深。出自望外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371020_comment'></div>伏惟尚书鹗立朝端。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371020", 1371020, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>风行</span>天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371020_comment'></div>入统邦宪。出分主忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371020_comment'></div>控此<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371020_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371020", 1371020, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>蹑履</span>于<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_9_1371020_comment'></div>某负罪沦伏。声销迹灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371020_comment'></div>固世俗之所弃。亲友之所遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371020_comment'></div>敢希大贤。曲见存念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371020_comment'></div>是以展转歔欷。昼咏宵兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371020_comment'></div>愿为厮役。以报恩遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371020_comment'></div>瞻仰霄汉。邈然无由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371020_comment'></div>网罗未解。纵羽翼而何施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371020_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371020", 1371020, class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371009'>宗元启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371009_comment'></div>伏念往岁司空由尚书郎出贰太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371009_comment'></div>宗元获于天长专用候谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371009_comment'></div>伏蒙叙以世旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371009_comment'></div>许造门阑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371009_comment'></div>自后司空累膺宠荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371009_comment'></div>位极公辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371009_comment'></div>宗元得罪朝列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371009_comment'></div>窜身湘南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371009_comment'></div>霄汉益高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371009_comment'></div>泥尘永弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371009_comment'></div>瞻仰辽绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371009_comment'></div>陈露无由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371009_comment'></div>司空统临旧荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371009_comment'></div>控制南服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371009_comment'></div>道路非远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371009_comment'></div>德化所覃。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371009_comment'></div>特赐抚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371009_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371009", ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　六月，叔父柳公绰自御史中丞迁湖南观察使；至任后，上表谢恩，宗元时谪永州，代作此表。作品：《代柳公绰谢上任表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷38第993页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　六月，叔父柳公绰由御史中丞迁湖南观察使；至任后，永州龙兴寺僧重巽应其召赴潭州弘法，宗元作序送之。作品：《送巽上人赴中丞叔父召序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第671页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371076' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371076' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371076?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送巽上人赴中丞叔父召序</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371076'>或问宗元曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371076_comment'></div>悉矣子之得于巽上人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371076_comment'></div>其道果何如哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371076_comment'></div>对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371076_comment'></div>吾自幼好佛。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1371076_comment'></div>世之言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371076_comment'></div>罕能通其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371076_comment'></div>于零陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371076_comment'></div>吾独有得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371076_comment'></div>且佛之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371076_comment'></div>吾不可得而闻之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371076_comment'></div>其存于世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371076_comment'></div>独遗其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371076_comment'></div>不于其书而求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371076_comment'></div>则无以得其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371076_comment'></div>言且不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371076_comment'></div>况其意乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371076_comment'></div>今是上人穷其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371076_comment'></div>得其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371076_comment'></div>谕其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371076_comment'></div>推而大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371076_comment'></div>逾万言而不烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371076_comment'></div>总而括之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371076_comment'></div>立片辞而不遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371076_comment'></div>与夫世之析章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371076_comment'></div>徵文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371076_comment'></div>言至虚之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371076_comment'></div>则荡而失守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371076_comment'></div>辩群有之夥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371076_comment'></div>则泥而皆存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371076_comment'></div>其不以远乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371076_comment'></div>以吾所闻知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371076_comment'></div>凡世之善言佛者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371076_comment'></div>于吴则惠诚师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371076_comment'></div>荆则海云师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371076_comment'></div>楚之南则重巽师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371076_comment'></div>师之言存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371076_comment'></div>则佛之道不远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371076_comment'></div>惠诚师已死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371076_comment'></div>今之言佛者加少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371076_comment'></div>其由儒而通者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371076_comment'></div>郑中书洎孟常州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371076_comment'></div>中书见上人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371076_comment'></div>执经而师受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371076_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371076_comment'></div>于中道吾得以益达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371076_comment'></div>常州之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371076_comment'></div>从佛法生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371076_comment'></div>得佛法分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371076_comment'></div>皆以师友命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371076_comment'></div>今连帅中丞公具舟来迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371076_comment'></div>饰馆而俟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371076_comment'></div>欲其道之行于远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371076_comment'></div>夫岂徒然哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371076_comment'></div>以中丞公之直清严重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371076_comment'></div>中书之辩博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371076_comment'></div>常州之敏达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371076_comment'></div>且犹宗重其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371076_comment'></div>况若吾之昧昧者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371076_comment'></div>夫众人之和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371076_comment'></div>由大人之倡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371076_comment'></div>洞庭之南竟南海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371076_comment'></div>其士<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作土）</span>汪汪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371076_comment'></div>求道者多半天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371076_comment'></div>一唱而大行于远者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371076_comment'></div>是行有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371076_comment'></div>则和焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371076_comment'></div>将若群蛰之有雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371076_comment'></div>不可止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371076_comment'></div>于是书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371076_comment'></div>以为巽上人赴中丞叔父召序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1371076_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　谪居永州。夏初，雨后游愚溪，作诗。作品：《夏初雨后寻愚溪》<span id='poem_content_1371294'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371294'>年月日。八舅十舅以酒肉之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371294_comment'></div>敬祭外甥韦六小卿之魂。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371294_comment'></div>生有孝姿。淑且茂兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371294_comment'></div>谓吉其终。道克就兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371294_comment'></div>胡典而丧。离厥咎兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371294_comment'></div>蹈道而违。死谁祐兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371294_comment'></div>岂汝之昧。不能究兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371294_comment'></div>将夺之鉴。使昏霿兮。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　谪居永州。永州刺史韦某所建新堂落成，宗元撰记文。作品：《永州韦使君新堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷27第732页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第84页认为韦使君为韦彪，据此补录。）</span><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371098_comment'></div>见公之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371098_comment'></div>知公之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371098_comment'></div>公之因土而得胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371098_comment'></div>岂不欲因俗以成化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371098_comment'></div>将使继公之理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371098_comment'></div>视其细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371098_comment'></div>知其大也。<div
