id='poem_sentence_80_1371098_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　谪居永州。游袁家渴，撰记。作品：《袁家渴记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷29第768页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371115' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371115' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371115?labeling=true' target='_blank'>袁家渴记</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371115")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371115_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371115'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371115'>由冉溪西南水行十里。山水之可取者五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371115_comment'></div>莫若钴鉧潭。由溪口而西陆行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371115_comment'></div>可取者八九。莫若西山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371115_comment'></div>由朝阳岩东南水行至芜江。可取者三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371115_comment'></div>莫若袁家渴。皆永中幽丽处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371115_comment'></div>楚越之间方言。谓水之反流者为渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371115_comment'></div>音若衣褐之褐。渴上与南馆高嶂合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371115_comment'></div>下与百家濑合。其中重洲小溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371115_comment'></div>澄潭浅渚。间厕曲折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371115_comment'></div>平者深黑。峻者沸白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371115_comment'></div>舟行若穷。忽又无际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371115_comment'></div>有小山出水中。山皆美石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371115_comment'></div>上生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371115", 1371115, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>青丛</span>。冬夏常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371115", 1371115, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>蔚然</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371115_comment'></div>其旁多岩洞。其下多白砾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371115_comment'></div>其树多枫楠石楠楩槠樟柚。草则兰芷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371115_comment'></div>又有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371115", 1371115, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>异卉</span>。类合欢而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371115", 1371115, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>蔓生</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371115_comment'></div>轇轕水石。每风自四山而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371115_comment'></div>振动大木。掩苒众草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371115_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371115", 1371115, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>纷红骇绿</span>。蓊葧香气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371115_comment'></div>冲涛旋濑。退贮溪谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371115_comment'></div>摇飏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371115", 1371115, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>葳蕤</span>。与时推移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371115_comment'></div>其大都如此。余无以穷其状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371115_comment'></div>永之人未尝游焉。予得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371115_comment'></div>不敢专也。出而传于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371115_comment'></div>其地世主袁氏。故以名焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371115_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1371115_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　谪居永州。游石渠，撰记。作品：《石渠记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷29第770页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371116' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371116' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371116?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石渠记</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371116")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371116_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371116'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371116'>自渴西南行不能百步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371116_comment'></div>得石渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371116_comment'></div>民桥其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371116_comment'></div>有泉幽幽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371116_comment'></div>其鸣乍大乍细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371116_comment'></div>渠之广或咫尺或倍尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371116_comment'></div>其长可十许步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371116_comment'></div>其流抵大石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371116_comment'></div>伏出其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371116_comment'></div>踰石而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371116_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371116", 1371116, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>石泓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371116_comment'></div>昌蒲被之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371116_comment'></div>青藓环周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371116_comment'></div>又折西行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371116_comment'></div>旁陷岩石下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371116_comment'></div>北堕小潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371116_comment'></div>潭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371116", 1371116, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>幅员</span>减百尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371116_comment'></div>清深多鯈鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371116_comment'></div>又北曲行纡馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371116_comment'></div>睨若无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371116_comment'></div>然卒入于渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371116_comment'></div>其侧皆诡石怪木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371116_comment'></div>奇卉美箭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371116_comment'></div>可列坐而休焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371116_comment'></div>风摇其巅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371116_comment'></div>韵动崖谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371116_comment'></div>视之既静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371116_comment'></div>其听始远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371116_comment'></div>予从州牧得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371116_comment'></div>揽去翳朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371116_comment'></div>决疏土石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371116_comment'></div>既崇而焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371116_comment'></div>既酾而盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371116_comment'></div>惜其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371116", 1371116, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>未始</span>有传焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371116_comment'></div>故累记其所属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371116_comment'></div>遗之其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371116_comment'></div>书之其阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371116_comment'></div>俾后好事者求之得以易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371116_comment'></div>元和七年正月八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371116_comment'></div>蠲渠至大石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371116_comment'></div>十月十九日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371116_comment'></div>踰石得<span id='poem_sentence_42_1371116_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　谪居永州。游石涧，撰记。作品：《石涧记》<span id='poem_sentence_1_1371117_comment'></div>民又桥焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371117_comment'></div>其水之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371117_comment'></div>倍石渠三之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371117_comment'></div>亘石为底。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371117_comment'></div>达于两涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371117_comment'></div>若床若堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371117_comment'></div>若陈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371117", 1371117, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>筵席</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371117_comment'></div>若限<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371117", 1371117, id='poem_sentence_12_1371117_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371117", 1371117, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>揭跣</span>而往。<div class='inline' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371117", 1371117, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>触激</span>之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371117_comment'></div>皆在床下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371117_comment'></div>道狭不可穷也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1371117_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　谪居永州。岭南节度使郑絪于所寄永州韦使君书中存问宗元。宗元为表感激，献文并寄启以谢之。作品：《上岭南郑相公献所著文启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第925页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371010' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371010' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371010?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上岭南郑相公献所著文启</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371010")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371010_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371010'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371010'>宗元启。伏见与当州韦使君书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371010_comment'></div>猥赐存问。惊怍悼惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371010_comment'></div>交动于中。循念竟日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371010_comment'></div>若无容措。幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371010_comment'></div>宗元素乏智能。复阙周慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371010_comment'></div>一自得罪。八年于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371010_comment'></div>兢愧吊影。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371010", 1371010, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>追咎</span>无既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371010_comment'></div>自以终身沈废。无踪自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371010_comment'></div>不意相国垂悯。特记名姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371010_comment'></div>守穾奥者。忽仰晞于白日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371010_comment'></div>负泥涂者。遂自濯于清源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371010_comment'></div>快心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371010", 1371010, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>畅目</span>。不知所喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371010_comment'></div>伏以圣人之道。与其进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371010_comment'></div>不保其往。故敢藻饰文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371010_comment'></div>洗涤心神。致之门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371010_comment'></div>祗候严命。伏惟收抚奖励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371010_comment'></div>以成其终。谨献杂文三十六首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371010_comment'></div>冒昧上黩。无任踊跃惶恐之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371010_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1371010_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　新任永州刺史韦彪上表谢恩，宗元时谪永州，代为此表。作品：《代韦永州谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷38第999页，中华书局1979年版。韦永州即韦彪，据吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第112页补录。）</span><div id='poem_1370922' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370922' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370922?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代韦永州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370922")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370922_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370922'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370922'>臣某言。伏奉月日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370922_comment'></div>除臣永州刺史。以月日到州上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370922_comment'></div>受命若惊。临职弥惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370922_comment'></div>臣以无能。累更事任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370922_comment'></div>神州赤县实所备尝。过量<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370922", 1370922, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>逾涯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370922_comment'></div>每深兢惕。不谓圣恩推择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370922_comment'></div>滥驾朱轮。禄秩徒增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370922_comment'></div>讵施乳哺之惠。服命虚受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370922_comment'></div>宁兴襦裤之谣。况此州地极三湘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370922_comment'></div>俗参百越。左衽居椎髻之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370922_comment'></div>可垦乃石田之馀。旷牧守于再秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370922_comment'></div>弥骄犷俗。代徵赋于三郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370922_comment'></div>重困疲人。分灾本出于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370922_comment'></div>积弊遂逾于十稔。抚安未易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370922_comment'></div>知法出而奸生。子育诚难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370922_comment'></div>惧力劳而功寡。夙夜忧切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370922_comment'></div>不敢遑宁。庶当宣布天慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370922_comment'></div>奉扬神化。以日系月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370922_comment'></div>傥或有成。少裨恺悌之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370922_comment'></div>用答生成之造。无任感恩陨越之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370922_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1370922_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　谪居永州。崔策“六选而不获”，元和七年又因家事迁延而不及赴考，故来永探访。离永时，宗元邀集友人为其饯行，作序送之。作品：《送崔子符罢举诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第625页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371053' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371053' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371053?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送崔子符罢举诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371053")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371053_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371053'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371053'>世有病进士科者。思易以孝悌经术兵农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371053_comment'></div>曰庶几厚于俗。而国得以为理乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371053_comment'></div>柳子曰否。以今世尚进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371053_comment'></div>故凡天下家推其良。公卿大夫之名子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371053_comment'></div>国之秀民举归之。且而更其科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371053_comment'></div>以为得异人乎。无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371053_comment'></div>惟其所尚。又举<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作文学）</span>移而从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371053_comment'></div>尚之以孝悌。孝悌犹是人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371053_comment'></div>尚之以经术。经术犹是人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371053_comment'></div>虽兵与农皆然。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371053_comment'></div>然则宜如之何。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371053_comment'></div>即其辞。观其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371053_comment'></div>考其智。以为可化人及物者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371053_comment'></div>隆之。文胜质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371053_comment'></div>行无观。智无考者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371053_comment'></div>下之。俗其以厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371053_comment'></div>国其以理。科不俟易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371053_comment'></div>今有博陵崔策子符者。少读经书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371053_comment'></div>为文辞。本于孝悌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371053_comment'></div>理道多容。以善别时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371053_comment'></div>刚以知柔。进于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371053_comment'></div>六选而不获。家有冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371053_comment'></div>连伏阙下者。累月不解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371053_comment'></div>仕将晚矣。而戚其幼孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371053_comment'></div>往复不惮万里。再岁不就选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371053_comment'></div>世皆曰孝<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作仁）</span>悌人也。如是且不见隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371053_comment'></div>虽百易科。其可厚而理乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371053_comment'></div>今夫天下已理。民风已厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371053_comment'></div>欲继之于无穷。其在慎是而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371053_comment'></div>朝廷未命有司。既命而果得有道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371053_comment'></div>则是术也宜用。崔子之仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371053_comment'></div>又何晚乎。仆智不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371053_comment'></div>而独为文。故始见进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371053_comment'></div>而卒以废。居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371053", 1371053, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>草野</span>八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371053_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371053", 1371053, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>丽泽</span>之益。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371053", 1371053, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>镞砺</span>之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371053_comment'></div>空于耳而荒于心。崔子幸来而亲<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作觌）</span>予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371053_comment'></div>读其书。听其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371053_comment'></div>发予始志。若寤而言梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371053_comment'></div>醒而问醉。未及悉而告予以行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371053_comment'></div>予惧其悼时之往。而不得于内也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371053_comment'></div>献之酒。赋之诗而歌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371053_comment'></div>坐者从而和之。既和而叙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371053_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1371053_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　谪居永州。元皓师谒永后离，宗元作序送之。作品：《送元皓师序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第678页，中华书局1979年版。施子愉《柳宗元年谱》第135页系《送元皓师序》一文于永州时期，确年不可考；吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》系此文于元和六年。）</span><div id='poem_1371078' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371078' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371078?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送元皓师序</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371078")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371078_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371078'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371078'>中山刘禹锡。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371078", 1371078, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>明信</span>人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371078_comment'></div>不知人之实。未尝言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371078_comment'></div>言未尝不雠。元皓师居武陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371078_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371078", 1371078, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>年数</span>矣。与刘游久且昵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371078_comment'></div>持其诗与引而来。予视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371078_comment'></div>申申其言。勤勤其思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371078_comment'></div>其为知而言也信矣。予观世之为释者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371078_comment'></div>或不知其道。则去孝以为达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371078_comment'></div>遗情以贵虚。今元皓衣粗而食菲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371078_comment'></div>病心而墨貌。以其先人之葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371078_comment'></div>未返其土。无族属以移其哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371078_comment'></div>行求仁者以冀终其心。勤而为逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371078_comment'></div>远而为近。斯盖释之知道者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371078_comment'></div>释之书有大报恩十篇。咸言由孝而极其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371078_comment'></div>世之荡诞慢訑者。虽为其道而好违其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371078_comment'></div>于元皓师。吾见其不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371078_comment'></div>且与儒合也。元皓陶氏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371078_comment'></div>其上为通侯。为高士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371078_comment'></div>为儒先。资其儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371078_comment'></div>故不敢忘孝。迹其高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371078_comment'></div>故为释。承其侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371078_comment'></div>故能与达者游。其来而从吾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371078_comment'></div>观其为人。益见刘之明且信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371078_comment'></div>故又与之言。重叙其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371078_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1371078_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　谪居永州。元皓师谒永后离，宗元作诗送之。作品：《送元皓师诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集补遗第1400页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_40607' class='_poem'><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　谪居永州。游南涧，感怀作诗。作品：《南涧中题》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷43第1192页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_40659' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_50_40628_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　谪居永州。游黄溪，撰记。作品：《游黄溪记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷29第759页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371110' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371110' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371110?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游黄溪记</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371110")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371110_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371110'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371110'>北之晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371110_comment'></div>西适豳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371110_comment'></div>东极吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371110_comment'></div>南至楚越之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371110_comment'></div>其间名山水而州者以百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371110_comment'></div>永最善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371110_comment'></div>环永之治百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371110_comment'></div>北至于浯溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371110_comment'></div>西至于湘之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371110_comment'></div>南至于泷泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371110_comment'></div>东至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371110", 1371110, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>黄溪</span>东屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371110_comment'></div>其间名山水而村者以百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371110_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371110", 1371110, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>黄溪</span>最善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371110_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371110", 1371110, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>黄溪</span>距州治七十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371110_comment'></div>由东屯南行六百步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371110_comment'></div>至黄神祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371110_comment'></div>祠之上两山墙立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371110_comment'></div>如丹碧之华叶骈植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371110_comment'></div>与山升降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371110_comment'></div>其缺者为崖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371110_comment'></div>峭岩窟水之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371110_comment'></div>皆小石平布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371110_comment'></div>黄神之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371110_comment'></div>揭水八十步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371110_comment'></div>至初潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371110_comment'></div>最奇丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371110_comment'></div>殆不可状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371110_comment'></div>其略若剖大瓮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371110_comment'></div>侧立千尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371110_comment'></div>溪水积焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371110_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371110", 1371110, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>黛蓄</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371110", 1371110, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>膏渟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371110_comment'></div>来若白虹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371110_comment'></div>沈沈无声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371110_comment'></div>有鱼数百尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371110_comment'></div>方来会石下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371110_comment'></div>南去又行百步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371110_comment'></div>至第二潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371110_comment'></div>石皆巍然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371110_comment'></div>临峻流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371110_comment'></div>若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371110", 1371110, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>颏颔</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371110", 1371110, "Clauses/39/Comments/1")'>龂腭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371110_comment'></div>其下大石<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1371110", 1371110, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>离列</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371110_comment'></div>可坐饮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371110_comment'></div>有鸟赤首乌翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371110_comment'></div>大如鹄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371110_comment'></div>方东向立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371110_comment'></div>自是又南数里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371110_comment'></div>地皆一状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371110_comment'></div>树益壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371110_comment'></div>石益瘦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371110_comment'></div>水鸣皆锵然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371110_comment'></div>又南一里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371110_comment'></div>至大冥之川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371110_comment'></div>山舒水缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371110_comment'></div>有土田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371110_comment'></div>始黄神为人时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371110_comment'></div>居其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371110_comment'></div>传者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371110_comment'></div>黄神王姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371110_comment'></div>莽之世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371110_comment'></div>莽既死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371110_comment'></div>神更号黄氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371110_comment'></div>逃来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371110_comment'></div>择其深峭者潜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371110_comment'></div>始莽尝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371110_comment'></div>予黄虞之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371110_comment'></div>故号其女曰黄皇室主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371110_comment'></div>黄与王声相迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371110_comment'></div>而又有本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371110_comment'></div>其所以传言者益验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371110_comment'></div>神既居是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371110_comment'></div>民咸安焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371110_comment'></div>以为有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371110_comment'></div>死乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1371110", 1371110, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>俎豆</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371110_comment'></div>为立祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371110_comment'></div>后稍徙近乎民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371110_comment'></div>今祠在山阴溪水上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371110_comment'></div>元和八年五月十六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371110_comment'></div>既归为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371110_comment'></div>以启后之好游者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1371110_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　表弟吕恭卒，宗元在永州司马任，撰墓志。恭乃宗元挚友吕温弟。作品：《吕侍御恭墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷10第255页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371234' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371234' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371234?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吕侍御恭墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371234")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371234_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371234'>吕氏世居河东。至延之始大。以御史大夫为浙东道节度大使。延之生渭。为中书舍人尚书礼部侍郎。刺湖南七州。生四子。温恭俭让。以温为尚书郎。再赠至右仆射。恭字敬叔。他名曰宗礼。或以为字。实惟吕氏宗子。尚气节。有勇略。不事小谨。读从横书。理阴符握机孙子之术。曰。我师尚父冑也。大父洎先人。咸统方岳。今天下将理。平蔡兖冀幽。洎戎犹负命。早夜呼愤。以为宜得任爪牙。毕力通天子命。作文章咸道其志云。又曰。由吾兄而上三世。世为进士。吾为文不坠教诫。独武事未克缵厥绪。因弃去。从山南西道节度府掌书记。预谋画不甚合。以试守军卫佐加协律郎。入荐为长安主簿。复出以监察御史参江南西道都团练军事。府表进殿中侍御史。为桂管都防御副使。元和八年去桂州。相国尚书郑公遮留。假岭南道节度判官。至广州。病痞疟加㿃。六月二十八日卒。妻裴氏。户部尚书延龄女。有丈夫子三人。曰爽曰瑰曰特。女子三人。曰环曰鸾曰倩。皆幼。行于道而倩又死。遂以柩如洛阳。祔葬于大墓。款志吕氏世仕至大官。皆有道。宜兴于世。温洎恭名为豪杰。知者以为是必立王功活生人。不幸温刺衡州。年四十卒。恭未及理人。年三十七又卒。世固有有其具而不及其用若温恭者耶。恭貌奇壮。有大志。信善容物。宜寿考硕大。而又不克。吕氏之道恶乎兴。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371234_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371234'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371234'>沨沨之风兮不可追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371234_comment'></div>有志之大乎今安归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371234_comment'></div>吕君去我死乎吾谁依。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1371234_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　表弟吕恭卒，宗元在永州司马任，作文祭之。恭乃宗元挚友吕温弟。作品：《祭吕敬叔文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1070页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　在永州司马任。元和七年、八年夏，永州多火灾。民间传说此乃火神毕方所为，宗元撰文声讨之。作品：《逐毕方文并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷18第501页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371138' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371138' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371138?labeling=true' target='_blank'>逐毕方文</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371138")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371138_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371138'>永州元和七年夏。多火灾。日夜数十发。少尚五六发。过三月乃止。八年夏。又如之。人咸无安处。老弱燔死。晨不爨。暝不烛。皆列坐屋上。左右视。罢不得休。盖类物为之者。讹言相惊。云有怪鸟。莫实其状。山海经云。章义之山。有鸟如鹤。一足。赤文白喙。其名曰毕方。见则其邑有讹火。若今火者。其可谓讹欤。而人有以鸟传者。其毕方欤。遂邑中状而图之。禳而磔之。为之文而逐之。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371138_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371138'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371138'>后皇庇人兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371138_comment'></div>急急如律令。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1371138_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　在永州司马任。以永州城北码头“铁炉步”得名为题，作文发论。作品：《永州铁炉步志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷28第755页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371109' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371109' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371109?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永州铁炉步志</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371109")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371109_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371109'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371109'>江之浒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371109_comment'></div>凡舟可縻而上下者曰步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371109_comment'></div>永州北郭有步曰铁炉步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371109_comment'></div>予乘舟来居九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371109_comment'></div>往来求其所以为铁炉者无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371109_comment'></div>问之人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371109_comment'></div>盖尝有锻者居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371109_comment'></div>其人去而炉毁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371109_comment'></div>不知年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371109_comment'></div>独有其号冒而存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371109_comment'></div>予曰嘻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371109_comment'></div>世固有事去名存而冒焉若是耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371109_comment'></div>步之人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371109_comment'></div>子何独怪是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371109_comment'></div>今世有负其姓而立于天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371109_comment'></div>曰吾门大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371109_comment'></div>他不我敌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371109_comment'></div>问其位与德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371109_comment'></div>曰久矣其先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371109_comment'></div>然而彼犹曰我大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371109_comment'></div>世亦曰某氏大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371109_comment'></div>其冒于号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371109_comment'></div>有以异于兹步者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371109_comment'></div>向使有闻兹步之号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371109_comment'></div>而不足釜锜钱镈刀鈇者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371109_comment'></div>怀价而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371109_comment'></div>能有得其欲乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371109_comment'></div>则求位与德于彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371109_comment'></div>其不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371109_comment'></div>亦犹是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371109_comment'></div>位存焉而德无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371109_comment'></div>犹不足以大其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371109_comment'></div>然且乐为之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371109_comment'></div>子胡不怪彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371109_comment'></div>而独怪于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371109_comment'></div>大者桀冒禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371109_comment'></div>纣冒汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371109_comment'></div>幽厉冒文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371109_comment'></div>以傲天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371109_comment'></div>由不推知其本而姑大其故号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371109_comment'></div>以至于败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371109_comment'></div>为世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1371109", 1371109, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>笑僇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371109_comment'></div>斯可以甚惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371109_comment'></div>若求兹步之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371109_comment'></div>而不得釜锜钱镈刀鈇者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371109_comment'></div>则去而之他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371109_comment'></div>又何害乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371109_comment'></div>子之惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371109_comment'></div>于是末矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371109_comment'></div>予以为古有太史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371109_comment'></div>观民风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371109_comment'></div>采民言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371109_comment'></div>若是者则有得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371109_comment'></div>嘉其言可采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371109_comment'></div>书以为志。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1371109_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　在永州司马任。韦中立自京师来永求为师，宗元答以书，论师道及为文之道。作品：《答韦中立论师道书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第871页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370988' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370988' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370988?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答韦中立论师道书</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370988")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370988_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370988'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370988'>二十一日。宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370988_comment'></div>辱书。云欲相师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370988_comment'></div>仆道不笃。业甚浅近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370988_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>环顾</span>其中。未见可师者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370988_comment'></div>虽尝好言论为文章。甚不自是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370988_comment'></div>不意吾子自京师来蛮夷间。乃幸见取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370988_comment'></div>仆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>自卜</span>固无取。假令有取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370988_comment'></div>亦不敢为人师。为众人师且不敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370988_comment'></div>况敢为吾子师乎。孟子称人之患在好为人师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370988_comment'></div>由魏晋氏以下。人益不事师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370988_comment'></div>今之世不闻有师。有辄哗笑之以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>狂人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370988_comment'></div>独韩愈奋不顾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>流俗</span>。犯笑侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370988_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>收召</span>后学。作师说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370988_comment'></div>因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>抗颜</span>而为师。世果群怪聚骂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370988_comment'></div>指目牵引。而增与为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>言辞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370988_comment'></div>愈以是得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>狂名</span>。居长安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370988_comment'></div>炊不暇熟。又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>挈挈</span>而东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370988_comment'></div>如是者数矣。屈子赋曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370988_comment'></div>邑犬群吠。吠所怪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370988_comment'></div>仆往闻庸蜀之南。恒雨少日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370988_comment'></div>日出则犬吠。予以为过言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370988_comment'></div>前六七年仆来南。二年冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370988_comment'></div>幸大雪踰岭。被南越中数州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370988_comment'></div>数州之犬。皆苍黄吠噬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370988_comment'></div>狂走者累日。至无雪乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370988_comment'></div>然后始信前所闻者。今韩愈既自以为蜀之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370988_comment'></div>而吾子又欲使吾为越之雪。不以病乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370988_comment'></div>非独见病。亦以病吾子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370988_comment'></div>然雪与日岂有过哉。顾吠者犬耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370988_comment'></div>度今天下不吠者几人。而谁敢衒怪于群目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370988_comment'></div>以召闹取怒乎。仆自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>谪过</span>以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370988_comment'></div>益少志虑。居南中九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370988_comment'></div>增<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>脚气</span>病。渐不喜闹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370988_comment'></div>岂可使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>呶呶</span>者早暮咈吾耳。骚吾心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370988_comment'></div>则固僵仆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>烦愦</span>。逾不可过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370988_comment'></div>平居望外遭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>齿舌</span>不少。独欠为人师耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370988_comment'></div>抑又闻之。古者重冠礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370988_comment'></div>将以责成人之道。是圣人所尤用心者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370988_comment'></div>数百年来。人不复行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370988_comment'></div>近有孙昌允者。独发愤行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370988_comment'></div>既成礼。明日造朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370988_comment'></div>至外廷。荐笏言于卿士曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370988_comment'></div>某子冠毕。应之者咸怃然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370988_comment'></div>京兆尹郑叔则怫然曳笏却立。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370988_comment'></div>何预我耶。廷中皆大笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370988_comment'></div>天下不以非郑尹而怪孙子。何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370988_comment'></div>独为所不为也。今之命师者大类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370988_comment'></div>吾子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>行厚</span>而辞深。凡所作皆恢恢然有古人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>形貌</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370988_comment'></div>虽仆敢为师。亦何所增加也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370988_comment'></div>假而以仆年先吾子。闻道著书之日不后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370988_comment'></div>诚欲往来言所闻。则仆固愿悉陈中所得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370988_comment'></div>吾子苟自择之。取某事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370988_comment'></div>去某事。则可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370988_comment'></div>若定是非以教吾子。仆才不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370988_comment'></div>而又畏前所陈者。其为不敢也决矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370988_comment'></div>吾子前所欲见吾文。既悉以陈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370988_comment'></div>非以耀明于子。聊欲以观子气色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370988_comment'></div>诚好恶何如也。今书来言者皆大过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370988_comment'></div>吾子诚非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>佞誉</span>诬谀之徒。直见爱甚故然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370988_comment'></div>始吾幼且少。为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370988_comment'></div>以辞为工。及长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370988_comment'></div>乃知文者以明道。是故不苟为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>炳炳烺烺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370988_comment'></div>务采色夸声音而以为能也。凡我所陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370988_comment'></div>皆自谓近道。而不知道之果近乎远乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370988_comment'></div>吾子好道而可吾文。或者其于道不远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370988_comment'></div>故吾每为文章。未尝敢以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370988", 1370988, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>轻心</span>掉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370988_comment'></div>惧其剽而不留也。未尝敢以怠心易之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370988_comment'></div>惧其弛而不严也。未尝敢以昏气出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370988_comment'></div>惧其昧没而杂也。未尝敢以矜气作之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370988_comment'></div>惧其偃蹇而骄也。抑之欲其奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370988_comment'></div>扬之欲其明。疏之欲其通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370988_comment'></div>廉之欲其节。激而发之欲其清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370988_comment'></div>固而存之欲其重。此吾所以羽翼夫道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370988_comment'></div>本之书以求其质。本之诗以求其恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370988_comment'></div>本之礼以求其宜。本之春秋以求其断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370988_comment'></div>本之易以求其动。此吾所以取道之原也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370988_comment'></div>参之谷梁氏以厉其气。参之孟荀以畅其支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370988_comment'></div>参之庄老以肆其端。参之国语以博其趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370988_comment'></div>参之离骚以致其幽。参之太史以著其洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370988_comment'></div>此吾所以旁推交通而以为之文也。凡若此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370988_comment'></div>果是耶非耶。有取乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370988_comment'></div>抑其无取乎。吾子幸观焉择焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370988_comment'></div>有馀以告焉。苟亟来以广是道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370988_comment'></div>子不有得焉。则我得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370988_comment'></div>又何以师云尔哉。取其实而去其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370988_comment'></div>无招越蜀吠怪。而为外廷所笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370988_comment'></div>则幸矣。宗元复白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370988_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_87_1370988_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　谪居永州。撰文论择师及交友。作品：《师友箴并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷19第530页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371150' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371150' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>师友箴</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371150")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371150_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371150'>今之世。为人师者众笑之。举世不师。故道益离。为人友者。不以道而以利。举世无友。故道益弃。呜呼。生于是病矣。歌以为箴。既以儆己。又以诫人。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371150'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371150'>不师<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371150", 1371150, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>如之何</span>，吾何以成。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371150'>不友<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371150", 1371150, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>如之何</span>，吾何以增。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371150'>吾欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371150", 1371150, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>从师</span>，可从者谁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371150'>借有可从，举世笑之。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371150'>吾欲取友，谁可取者。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1371150'>借有可取，中道或舍。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1371150'>仲尼不生，牙也久死。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1371150'>二人可作，惧吾不似<span class='inlineComment2'>（似一作以）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1371150'>中焉可师，耻焉可友。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1371150'>谨是二物，用惕尔后。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1371150'>道苟在焉，佣丏为偶。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1371150'>道之反是，公侯以走。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1371150'>内考诸古，外考诸物。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1371150'>师乎友乎，敬尔不忽。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1371150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1371150'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1371150_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　谪居永州。答书与严厚舆，论为师之道。作品：《答严厚舆秀才论为师道书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第878页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　谪居永州。与袁君陈秀才书，论不敢为师之意。作品：《报袁君陈秀才避师名书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第880页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370991' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370991' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370991?labeling=true' target='_blank'>报袁君陈秀才避师名书</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370991")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370991_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370991'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370991'>秀才足下。仆避师名久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370991_comment'></div>往在京都。后学之士到仆门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370991_comment'></div>日或数十人。仆不敢虚其来意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370991_comment'></div>有长必出之。有不至必惎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370991_comment'></div>虽若是。当时无师弟子之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370991_comment'></div>其所不乐为者。非以师为非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370991_comment'></div>弟子为罪也。有两事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370991_comment'></div>故不能。自视以为不足为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370991_comment'></div>一也。世久无师弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370991_comment'></div>决为之。且见非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370991_comment'></div>且见罪。惧而不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370991_comment'></div>二也。其大说具答韦中立书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370991_comment'></div>今以往可观之。秀才貌甚坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370991_comment'></div>辞甚强。仆自始觌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370991_comment'></div>固奇秀才。及见两文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370991_comment'></div>愈益奇。虽在京都日数十人到门者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370991_comment'></div>谁出秀才右耶。前已必秀才可为成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370991_comment'></div>仆之心固虚矣。又何鲲鹏互乡于尺牍哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370991_comment'></div>秋风益高。暑气益衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370991_comment'></div>可偶居卒谈。秀才时见咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370991_comment'></div>仆有诸内者。不敢爱惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370991_comment'></div>大都文以行为本。在先诚其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370991_comment'></div>其外者当先读六经。次论语孟轲书皆经言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370991_comment'></div>左氏国语庄周屈原之辞。稍采取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370991_comment'></div>谷梁子太史公甚峻洁。可以出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370991_comment'></div>馀书俟文成。异日讨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370991_comment'></div>其归在不出孔子。此其古人贤士所懔懔者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370991_comment'></div>求孔子之道。不于异书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370991_comment'></div>秀才志于道。慎勿怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370991_comment'></div>勿杂。勿务速显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370991_comment'></div>道苟成。则勃然尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370991_comment'></div>久则蔚然尔。源而流者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370991_comment'></div>岁旱不涸。蓄谷者不病凶年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370991_comment'></div>蓄珠玉者不虞殍死矣。然则成而久者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370991_comment'></div>其术可见。虽孔子在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370991_comment'></div>为秀才计。未必过此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370991_comment'></div>不具。宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370991_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1370991_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　谪居永州。湖南观察使柳公绰平黔巫东部蛮夷之叛，宗元撰铭纪之。作品：《武冈铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷20第551页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371156' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371156' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371156?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武冈铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371156")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371156_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371156'>元和七年四月。黔巫东鄙。蛮獠杂扰。盗弄库兵。贼胁守帅。南钩牂牁。外诱西原。置魁立帅。杀牲盟誓。洞窟林麓。啸呼成群。皇帝下铜兽符。发庸蜀荆汉南越东瓯之师。四面讨问。畏罪凭阻。逃遁不即诛。时惟潭部戎帅御史中丞柳公绰。练立将校。提卒五百。屯于武冈。不震不骞。如山如林。告天子威命。明白信顺。乱人大恐。视公之师如百万。视公之令如风雷。怨号呻吟。喜有攸诉。投刃顿伏。愿完父子。卒为忠信。奉职输赋。进比华人。无敢不龚。母弟生婿。继来于潭。咸致天庭。皇帝休嘉。式新厥命。凶渠同恶。革面向化。如醉之醒。如狂之宁。公为药石。俾复其性。诏书显异。进临江汉。益兵三倍。为时硕臣。殿于大邦。文儒申申。有此武功。于是夷人始复。闻公之去。相与高蹈涕呼。若寒去裘。昔公不夸首级。为已能力。专务教诲。俾邦斯平。我老洎幼。由公之仁。小不为虺蜮。大不为鲸鲵。恩重事特。不迩而远。莫可追已。愿铭武冈首。以慰我思。以昭我邻。以示我子孙。弥亿万年。俾我奉国。如令之诚。邻之我怀。如公之勤。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371156_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371156'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371156'>黔山之巑，巫水之磻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371156'>鱼骇而离，兽犯而残。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371156'>户恐谷窜，披攘仍乱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371156'>王师来诛，期死以缓。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371156'>公明不疑，公信不欺。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1371156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1371156'>援师定命，俾邦克正。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1371156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1371156'>皇仁天施，我反其性。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1371156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1371156'>揲蓍以占，公宜百禄。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1371156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1371156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1371156'>有穴之丹，有犀之颠。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1371156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　在永州司马任，与刘禹锡、张署二友次韵和诗。作品：《同刘二十八院长述旧言怀感时书事奉寄澧州张员外使君五十二韵之作因其韵增至八十通赠二君子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷42第1111页，中华书局1979年版。施子愉《柳宗元年谱》第135页系《同刘二十八院长述旧言怀感时书事奉寄澧州张员外使君五十二韵之作因其韵增至八十通赠二君子》一诗于永州时期，确年不可考；吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第124页则系于元和七年。）</span><div id='poem_40633' class='_poem'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_40633'>继酬<span class='inlineComment2'>（酬当作校雠之雠）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8323, "poem_sentence_3_40633")'>天禄署</span><sup id='poem_sentence_5_40633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_40633'>执简宁循枉，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_40633", 40633, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_40633", 40633, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>熊武</span>负崇牙。<div id='poem_sentence_7_40633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_40633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_40633'>京邑搜贞干<span class='inlineComment2'>（署自江陵掾入为京兆府司录参军）</span>，南宫步渥洼<span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_40633", 40633, "Clauses/111/Comments/1")'>讹火</span>亟生煆<span class='inlineComment2'>（訾火，野火也。煆，火气）</span>。<div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_40633_0'>⑵ 署至武功，拜监察御史。子厚亦自集贤殿正字为监察御史</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_40633_0'>⑶ 张自贞元十九年癸未贬官，至元和元年乙酉宪宗即位，三年矣，故云</div></div><div id='poem_note_40633_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_40633'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(40633)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州时，除游览山水，亦喜种植花木。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州十年，仍未召回。宗元环望周山，自觉囹圄，作赋抒愤。作品：《囚山赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷2第63页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370870' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370870' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370870?labeling=true' target='_blank'>囚山赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370870")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370870_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370870'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370870'>楚越之郊环万山兮。势腾涌夫波涛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370870_comment'></div>纷对回合仰伏以离迾兮。若重墉之相褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370870_comment'></div>争生角逐上轶旁出兮。其下坼裂而为壕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370870_comment'></div>欣下颓以就顺兮。曾不亩平而又高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370870_comment'></div>沓云雨而渍厚土兮。蒸郁勃其腥臊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370870_comment'></div>阳不舒以拥隔兮。群阴冱而为曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370870_comment'></div>侧耕危穫苟以食兮。哀斯民之增劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370870_comment'></div>积林麓以为丛棘兮。虎豹咆㘚代狴牢之吠嗥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370870_comment'></div>予胡井眢以管视兮。穷坎险其焉逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370870_comment'></div>顾幽昧之罪加兮。虽圣犹病夫嗷嗷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370870_comment'></div>匪兕吾为柙兮。匪豕吾为牢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370870_comment'></div>积十年莫吾省者兮。增蔽吾以蓬蒿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370870_comment'></div>圣日以理兮贤日以进。谁使吾山之囚吾兮滔滔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370870_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1370870_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。州刺史崔能重修湘源二妃庙，宗元撰碑文记之。作品：《湘源二妃庙碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷5第132页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371202' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371202' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371202?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湘源二妃庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371202")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371202_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371202'>元和九年八月二十日。湘源二妃庙灾。司功掾守令彭城刘知刚主簿安邑卫之武。告于州刺史御史中丞清河崔公能。祗栗厥戒。会群吏洎众工。发开元诏书。惧废守祀。搜考赢羡。均节委积。咸执牍聿。(大典作笔英华作律)至于祠下。稽度既备。佣役惟时。斩木于上游。陶埴于水涯。乃桴乃载。工逸事遂。作貌显严。粲然而威。十有一月庚辰。陈奠荐辞。立石于庙门之宇下。惟父子夫妇。人道之大。大哉二神。咸极其会。为子而父尧。为妇而夫舜。齐圣并明。弼成授受。内若嚚瞽。上承辉光。克艰以乂。德罔不至。帝既野死。神亦不返。食于兹川。古有常典。驱祓戾孽。恢宣淑灵。敢或失职。以奸大刑。有翼其躬。有苾其馨。沈牲爰告。即石是铭。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371202_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371202'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371202'>渊懿承圣。舜妻尧女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371202_comment'></div>德刑妫汭。神位湘浒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371202_comment'></div>揆兹有初。克硕厥宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371202_comment'></div>唐命<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371202", 1371202, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>秩祀</span>。兹邑攸主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371202_comment'></div>毛牷既副。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371202", 1371202, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>椒馨</span>爰糈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371202_comment'></div>允于万年。期保伊祜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371202_comment'></div>潜火煽孽。炖于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371202", 1371202, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>融风</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371202_comment'></div>神用播迁。时罔克龚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371202_comment'></div>邑令群吏。告于郡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371202_comment'></div>廉用积馀。以就尔功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371202_comment'></div>桴木负埴。载流于江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371202_comment'></div>既夷以成。崇宇峻墉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371202_comment'></div>絜严清闲。左右率从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371202_comment'></div>神乐来归。徒御雍雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371202_comment'></div>神既安止。邦人载喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371202_comment'></div>奉其吉玉。以对嘉祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371202_comment'></div>南风<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371202", 1371202, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>湑湑</span>。湘水如舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371202_comment'></div>将子无欢。神听钟鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371202_comment'></div>丰其交报。邦邑是与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371202_comment'></div>刻此乐歌。以极终古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371202_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1371202_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。为南岳衡山大明寺大明师律和尚作碑。作品：《南岳大明寺律和尚碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷7第170页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371211' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371211' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371211?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南岳大明寺律和尚碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371211")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371211_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371211'>儒以礼立仁义。无之则坏。佛以律持定慧。去之则丧。是故离礼于仁义者。不可与言儒。异律于定慧者。不可与言佛。达是道者。惟大明师。师姓欧阳氏。号曰惠闻。唐开元二十一年始生。天宝十一载始为浮图。大历十一年始登坛为大律师。贞元十三年十一月十一日卒。元和九年正月。其弟子怀信道嵩尼无染等。命高道僧灵屿为行状。列其行事。愿刊之兹碑。宗元今掇其大者言曰。师先因官。世家潭州为大族。有勋烈爵位。今不言。大浮图也。凡浮图之道衰。其徒必小律而去经。大明恐焉。于是从峻洎侃。以究戒律。而大法以立。又从秀洎昱。以通经教。而奥义以修。由是二道出入隐显。后学以不惑。来求以有得。广德二年。始立大明寺于衡山。诏选居寺僧二十一人。师为之首。乾元元年。又命衡山立毗尼藏。诏选讲律僧七人。师应其数。凡其衣服器用。动有师法。言语行止。皆为物轨。执巾匜奉杖屦为侍者数百。剪发髦被教戒为学者数万。得众若独。居尊若卑。晦而光。介而大。灏灏焉无以加也。其塔在祝融峰西趾下。碑在塔东。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371211_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371211'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371211'>其一/儒以礼行。觉以律兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371211_comment'></div>一归真源。无大小乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371211_comment'></div>大明之律。是定是慧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371211_comment'></div>丕穷经教。为法出世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371211_comment'></div>化人无量。垂裕无际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371211_comment'></div>诏尊硕德。威仪有继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371211_comment'></div>道遍大洲。徽音勿替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371211_comment'></div>祝融西麓。洞庭南裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371211_comment'></div>金石刻辞。弥亿千岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371211_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1371211'>其二/碑阴凡葬大浮图无竁穴。其于用碑不宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371211_comment'></div>然昔之公室。礼得用碑以葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371211_comment'></div>其后子孙因宜不去。遂铭德行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371211_comment'></div>用图久于世。及秦刻山石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371211_comment'></div>号其功德。亦谓之碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371211_comment'></div>而其用遂行。然则虽浮图亦宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371211_comment'></div>凡葬大浮图。其徒广则能为碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371211_comment'></div>晋宋尚法。故为碑者多法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371211_comment'></div>梁尚禅。故碑多禅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371211_comment'></div>法不周施。禅不大行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371211_comment'></div>而律存焉。故近世碑多律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371211_comment'></div>凡葬大浮图。未尝有比邱尼主碑事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371211_comment'></div>今惟无染实来。涕泪以求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371211_comment'></div>其志益坚。又能言其师他德尤备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371211_comment'></div>故书之碑阴。师凡主戒事二十二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371211_comment'></div>宰相齐公映李公泌赵公憬。尚书曹王皋裴公冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371211_comment'></div>侍郎令狐公峘。或师或友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371211_comment'></div>齐亲执经受大义为弟子。又言师始为童时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371211_comment'></div>梦大人缟冠素舄来告曰。居南岳大吾道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371211_comment'></div>必尔也。已而信然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371211_comment'></div>将终。夜有光明笙磬之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371211_comment'></div>众咸见闻。若是类甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371211_comment'></div>以儒者所不道。而无染勤以为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371211_comment'></div>故末传焉。无染韦氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371211_comment'></div>世显贵。今主衡山戒法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371211_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1371211_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。为南岳衡山大明寺大明师律和尚作碑，同撰碑阴文。作品：《南岳大明寺律和尚碑阴》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷7第172页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371211' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371211' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371211?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南岳大明寺律和尚碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371211")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371211_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371211'>儒以礼立仁义。无之则坏。佛以律持定慧。去之则丧。是故离礼于仁义者。不可与言儒。异律于定慧者。不可与言佛。达是道者。惟大明师。师姓欧阳氏。号曰惠闻。唐开元二十一年始生。天宝十一载始为浮图。大历十一年始登坛为大律师。贞元十三年十一月十一日卒。元和九年正月。其弟子怀信道嵩尼无染等。命高道僧灵屿为行状。列其行事。愿刊之兹碑。宗元今掇其大者言曰。师先因官。世家潭州为大族。有勋烈爵位。今不言。大浮图也。凡浮图之道衰。其徒必小律而去经。大明恐焉。于是从峻洎侃。以究戒律。而大法以立。又从秀洎昱。以通经教。而奥义以修。由是二道出入隐显。后学以不惑。来求以有得。广德二年。始立大明寺于衡山。诏选居寺僧二十一人。师为之首。乾元元年。又命衡山立毗尼藏。诏选讲律僧七人。师应其数。凡其衣服器用。动有师法。言语行止。皆为物轨。执巾匜奉杖屦为侍者数百。剪发髦被教戒为学者数万。得众若独。居尊若卑。晦而光。介而大。灏灏焉无以加也。其塔在祝融峰西趾下。碑在塔东。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371211_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371211'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371211'>其一/儒以礼行。觉以律兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371211_comment'></div>一归真源。无大小乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371211_comment'></div>大明之律。是定是慧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371211_comment'></div>丕穷经教。为法出世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371211_comment'></div>化人无量。垂裕无际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371211_comment'></div>诏尊硕德。威仪有继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371211_comment'></div>道遍大洲。徽音勿替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371211_comment'></div>祝融西麓。洞庭南裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371211_comment'></div>金石刻辞。弥亿千岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371211_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1371211'>其二/碑阴凡葬大浮图无竁穴。其于用碑不宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371211_comment'></div>然昔之公室。礼得用碑以葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371211_comment'></div>其后子孙因宜不去。遂铭德行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371211_comment'></div>用图久于世。及秦刻山石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371211_comment'></div>号其功德。亦谓之碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371211_comment'></div>而其用遂行。然则虽浮图亦宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371211_comment'></div>凡葬大浮图。其徒广则能为碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371211_comment'></div>晋宋尚法。故为碑者多法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371211_comment'></div>梁尚禅。故碑多禅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371211_comment'></div>法不周施。禅不大行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371211_comment'></div>而律存焉。故近世碑多律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371211_comment'></div>凡葬大浮图。未尝有比邱尼主碑事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371211_comment'></div>今惟无染实来。涕泪以求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371211_comment'></div>其志益坚。又能言其师他德尤备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371211_comment'></div>以儒者所不道。而无染勤以为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371211_comment'></div>故末传焉。无染韦氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371211_comment'></div>世显贵。今主衡山戒法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371211_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1371211_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。大历年间荥泽尉崔君卒后，崔佑甫曾撰墓志，然因故崔君久不得安葬。元和九年崔太素命子归乡安葬父亲崔君，墓志仍用崔佑甫所写，又请宗元续写墓志，表迟葬之因。作品：《续荥泽尉崔君墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷11第290页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371255' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371255' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371255?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_1371255_comment'></div>荥泽君之嗣曰膺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371255_comment'></div>备物具货入于汴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371255_comment'></div>汴陷于戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371255_comment'></div>丧焉不果行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371255_comment'></div>会世难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371255_comment'></div>不幸膺亦死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371255_comment'></div>膺之亚曰太素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371255_comment'></div>仕至云阳令。<div /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。易师杨君应永州刺史崔能之请，至永州主持易学研讨。离永临行，宗元作序送之。作品：《送易师杨君序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第658页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371069' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371069' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371069?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371069'>世之学易者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371069_comment'></div>率不能穷究师说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371069_comment'></div>本承孔氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371069_comment'></div>而妄意乎物表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371069_comment'></div>争伉乎理外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371069_comment'></div>务新以为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371069_comment'></div>纵辩以为高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371069_comment'></div>离其原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371069_comment'></div>振其末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371069_comment'></div>故羲文周孔之奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371069_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371069", 1371069, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>诋冒</span>混乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371069_comment'></div>人罕由而通焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371069_comment'></div>不违古师以入道妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371069_comment'></div>若宏农杨君者其鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371069_comment'></div>御史中丞崔公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371069_comment'></div>博而守儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371069_comment'></div>达而好礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371069_comment'></div>故杨君之来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371069_comment'></div>馆于燕堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371069_comment'></div>馈之侯食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371069_comment'></div>日命合邦之学者。<div "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>挥散</span>而咸同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371069_comment'></div>幽昏而大明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371069_comment'></div>言若诞而不乖于圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371069_comment'></div>理若肆而不失其正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371069_comment'></div>不为他奇以立名氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371069_comment'></div>姑务达其旨而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371069_comment'></div>古人谓驾孔子之说者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371069_comment'></div>杨君固其徒欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371069_comment'></div>宗元以为太学立儒官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371069_comment'></div>传儒业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371069_comment'></div>朝廷立槐棘之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371069_comment'></div>皆用儒先。<div class='inline'
