id='poem_sentence_49_1371069_comment'></div>敢以变君之志。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1371069_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。御史大夫、岭南节度使马总改建飨军堂落成，宗元撰文记之。作品：《岭南节度使飨军堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷26第706页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371091' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371091' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371091?labeling=true' target='_blank'>岭南节度飨军堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371091")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371091_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371091'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371091'>唐制岭南为五府。府部州以十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371091_comment'></div>其大小之戎。号令之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371091_comment'></div>则听于节度使焉。其外大海多蛮夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371091_comment'></div>由流求诃陵西抵大夏康居。环水而国以百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371091_comment'></div>则统于押蕃舶使焉。内之幅员万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371091_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371091", 1371091, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>执秩</span>拱稽。时听教命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371091_comment'></div>外之羁属数万里。以译言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371091", 1371091, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>贽宝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371091_comment'></div>岁帅贡职。合二使之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371091_comment'></div>以治于广州。故宾军之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371091_comment'></div>宜无与校大。且宾有牲牢饔饩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371091_comment'></div>嘉乐好礼。以同远合疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371091_comment'></div>军有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371091", 1371091, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>犒馈</span>宴飨。劳旋勤归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371091_comment'></div>以群力一心。于是治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371091_comment'></div>闬闳阶序。不可与他邦类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371091_comment'></div>必厚栋大梁。夷庭高门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371091_comment'></div>然后可以上充于揖让。下周于步武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371091_comment'></div>今御史大夫扶风公廉广州。且专二使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371091_comment'></div>增德以来远人。申威以修戎政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371091_comment'></div>大飨宴合乐。从其丰盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371091_comment'></div>先是为堂于治城西北陬。其位公北向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371091_comment'></div>宾众南向。奏部伎于其西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371091_comment'></div>视泉池于其东。隅奥庳仄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371091_comment'></div>庭庑下陋。日未及晡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371091_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371091", 1371091, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>赫炎</span>当目。汗眩更起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371091_comment'></div>而礼莫克终。故凡大宴飨大宾旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371091_comment'></div>则寓于外垒。仪型不称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371091_comment'></div>公于是始斥其制。为堂南面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371091_comment'></div>横八楹。纵十楹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371091_comment'></div>飨宴之位。化为东序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371091_comment'></div>西又如之。其外更衣之次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371091_comment'></div>膳食之宇。列观以游目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371091_comment'></div>偶亭以展声。弥望极顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371091_comment'></div>莫究其往。泉池之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371091_comment'></div>增浚益植。以暇以息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371091_comment'></div>如在林壑。问工焉取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371091_comment'></div>则师舆是供。问役焉取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371091_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371091", 1371091, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>蛮隶</span>是徵。问材焉取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371091_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1371091", 1371091, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>隙宇</span>是迁。或益其阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371091_comment'></div>伐山浮海。农贾拱手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371091_comment'></div>张目视具。乃十月甲子克成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371091_comment'></div>公命飨于新堂。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1371091", 1371091, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>幢牙</span>茸纛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371091_comment'></div>金节析羽。旆旗旟旞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371091_comment'></div>咸饰于下。鼓以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371091", 1371091, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>鼖晋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371091_comment'></div>金以铎铙。公与监军使肃上宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371091_comment'></div>延群僚。将校士吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371091_comment'></div>咸次于位。卉裳𦋺衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371091_comment'></div>胡夷蜑蛮。睢盱就列者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371091_comment'></div>千人以上。铏鼎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1371091", 1371091, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>体节</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371091_comment'></div>燔炮胾炙。羽鳞狸互之物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371091_comment'></div>沈泛醍盎之齐。均饫于卒士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371091_comment'></div>兴王之舞。服夷之伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371091_comment'></div>揳击吹鼓之音。飞腾幻怪之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371091_comment'></div>寰观于远迩。礼成乐遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371091_comment'></div>以叙而贺。且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371091_comment'></div>是邦临护之大。五人合之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371091_comment'></div>非是堂之制。不可以备物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371091_comment'></div>非公之德。不可以容众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371091_comment'></div>旷于往初。肇自今兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371091_comment'></div>太和有人。以观远方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371091_comment'></div>古之戎政。其曷用加此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371091_comment'></div>华元名大夫也。杀羊而御者不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371091_comment'></div>霍去病良将军也。馀肉而士有饥色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371091_comment'></div>犹克称能。以垂到今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371091_comment'></div>矧兹具美。其道不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371091_comment'></div>愿勒于金石。以永示后祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371091_comment'></div>遂相与来告。且乞辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371091_comment'></div>某让不获。乃刻于兹石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371091_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1371091_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。应道州刺史薛伯高之请，作文记其拆毁道州鼻亭神庙一事。作品：《道州毁鼻亭神记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷28第743页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371102' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371102' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371102?labeling=true' target='_blank'>道州毁鼻亭神记</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371102")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371102_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371102'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371102'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371102", 1371102, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>鼻亭神</span>。象祠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371102_comment'></div>不知何自始立。因而勿除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371102_comment'></div>完而恒新。相传且千岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371102_comment'></div>元和九年。河东薛公由刑部郎中刺道州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371102_comment'></div>除秽革邪。敷和于下州之罢人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371102_comment'></div>去乱即治。变呻为谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371102_comment'></div>若痿而起。若矇而瞭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371102_comment'></div>腾踊相视。欢爱克顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371102_comment'></div>既底于理。公乃考民风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371102_comment'></div>披地图。得是祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371102_comment'></div>骇曰。象之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371102_comment'></div>以为子则傲。以为弟则贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371102_comment'></div>君有鼻。而天子之吏实理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371102_comment'></div>以恶德而专世祀。殆非化吾人之意哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371102_comment'></div>命亟去之。于是撤其屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371102_comment'></div>墟其地。沈其主于江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371102_comment'></div>公又惧楚俗之尚鬼而难谕也。乃遍告于人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371102_comment'></div>吾闻鬼神不歆非类。又曰淫祀无福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371102_comment'></div>凡天子命刺史于下。非以专土疆督货贿而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371102_comment'></div>盖将教孝弟。去奇邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371102_comment'></div>俾斯人敦忠睦友。祗肃信让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371102_comment'></div>以顺于道。吾之斥是祠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371102_comment'></div>以明教也。苟离于正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371102_comment'></div>虽千载之违。吾得而更之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371102_comment'></div>况今兹乎。苟有不善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371102_comment'></div>虽异代之鬼。吾得而攘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371102_comment'></div>况斯人乎。州民既谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371102_comment'></div>相与歌曰。我有耇老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371102_comment'></div>公燠其肌。我有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371102", 1371102, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>病癃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371102_comment'></div>公起其羸。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1371102", 1371102, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>髫童</span>之嚚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371102_comment'></div>公实智之。鳏孤孔艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371102_comment'></div>公实遂之。孰尊恶德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371102_comment'></div>远矣自古。孰羡淫昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371102_comment'></div>俾我斯瞽。千岁之冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371102_comment'></div>公辟其户。我子洎孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371102_comment'></div>延世有慕。宗元时谪永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371102_comment'></div>迩公之邦。闻其歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371102_comment'></div>以为古道罕用。赖公而存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371102_comment'></div>斥一祠而二教兴焉。明罚行于鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371102_comment'></div>恺悌达于蛮夷。不惟禁淫祀黜非类而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371102_comment'></div>愿为记以刻山石。俾知教之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371102_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1371102_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。撰文传记段秀实生平事迹，以寄史官韩愈用作编修国史。作品：《段太尉逸事状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷8第175页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371267' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371267' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371267?labeling=true' target='_blank'>段太尉逸事状</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371267")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371267_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371267'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371267'>太尉始为泾州刺史时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371267_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>汾阳王</span>以副元帅居蒲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371267_comment'></div>王子晞为尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371267_comment'></div>领行营节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371267_comment'></div>寓军邠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371267_comment'></div>纵士卒无赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371267_comment'></div>邠人偷嗜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>暴恶</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371267_comment'></div>卒以货窜名军伍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371267_comment'></div>则肆志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371267_comment'></div>吏不得问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371267_comment'></div>日群行丏取于市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371267_comment'></div>不嗛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371267_comment'></div>辄奋击折人手足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371267_comment'></div>椎釜鬲瓮盎盈道上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371267_comment'></div>袒臂徐去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371267_comment'></div>至撞杀孕妇人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371267_comment'></div>邠宁节度使白孝德以王故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371267_comment'></div>戚不敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371267_comment'></div>太尉自州以状白府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371267_comment'></div>愿计事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371267_comment'></div>至则曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371267_comment'></div>天子以生人分公理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371267_comment'></div>公见人被暴害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371267_comment'></div>因恬然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371267_comment'></div>且大乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371267_comment'></div>若何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371267_comment'></div>孝德曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371267_comment'></div>愿奉教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371267_comment'></div>太尉曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371267_comment'></div>某为泾州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371267_comment'></div>甚适少事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371267_comment'></div>今不忍人无寇暴死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371267_comment'></div>以乱天子边事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371267_comment'></div>公诚以都虞候命某者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371267_comment'></div>能为公已乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371267_comment'></div>使公之人不得害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371267_comment'></div>孝德曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371267_comment'></div>幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371267_comment'></div>如太尉请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371267_comment'></div>既署一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371267_comment'></div>晞军士十七人入市取酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371267_comment'></div>又以刃刺酒翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371267_comment'></div>坏酿器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371267_comment'></div>酒流沟中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371267_comment'></div>太尉列卒取十七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371267_comment'></div>皆断头注槊上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371267_comment'></div>植市门外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371267_comment'></div>晞一营大噪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371267_comment'></div>尽甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371267_comment'></div>孝德震恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371267_comment'></div>召太尉曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371267_comment'></div>将奈之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371267_comment'></div>太尉曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371267_comment'></div>无伤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371267_comment'></div>请辞于军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371267_comment'></div>孝德使数十人从太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371267_comment'></div>太尉尽辞去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371267_comment'></div>解佩刀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371267_comment'></div>选老躄者一人持马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371267_comment'></div>至晞门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371267_comment'></div>甲者出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371267_comment'></div>太尉笑且入曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371267_comment'></div>杀一老卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371267_comment'></div>何甲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371267_comment'></div>吾戴吾头来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371267_comment'></div>甲者愕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371267_comment'></div>因谕曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371267_comment'></div>尚书固负若属耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371267_comment'></div>副元帅固负若属耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371267_comment'></div>奈何欲以乱败郭氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371267_comment'></div>为白尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371267_comment'></div>出听我言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371267_comment'></div>晞出见太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371267_comment'></div>太尉曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371267_comment'></div>副元帅勋塞天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371267_comment'></div>当务始终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371267_comment'></div>今尚书恣卒为暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371267_comment'></div>暴且乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371267_comment'></div>乱天子边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371267_comment'></div>欲谁归罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371267_comment'></div>罪且及副元帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371267_comment'></div>今邠人恶子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371267_comment'></div>以货窜名军籍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371267_comment'></div>杀害人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371267_comment'></div>如是不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371267_comment'></div>几日不大乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371267_comment'></div>大乱由尚书出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371267_comment'></div>人皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371267_comment'></div>尚书倚副元帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371267_comment'></div>不戢士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371267_comment'></div>然则郭氏功名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371267_comment'></div>其与存者几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371267_comment'></div>言未毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371267_comment'></div>晞再拜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371267_comment'></div>公幸教晞以道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371267_comment'></div>恩甚大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371267_comment'></div>愿奉军以从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371267_comment'></div>顾叱左右曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371267_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>解甲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371267_comment'></div>散还<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>火伍</span>中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371267_comment'></div>敢哗者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371267_comment'></div>太尉曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371267_comment'></div>吾未<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>晡食</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371267_comment'></div>请<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_103_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>假设</span>草具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371267_comment'></div>既食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371267_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371267_comment'></div>吾疾作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371267_comment'></div>愿留宿门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371267_comment'></div>命持马者去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371267_comment'></div>明旦来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371267_comment'></div>遂卧军中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371267_comment'></div>晞不解衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371267_comment'></div>戒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>候卒</span>击柝卫太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371267_comment'></div>旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371267_comment'></div>俱至孝德所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371267_comment'></div>谢不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371267_comment'></div>请改过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371267_comment'></div>邠州由是无祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371267_comment'></div>先是太尉在泾州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371267_comment'></div>为营田官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371267_comment'></div>泾大将焦令谌取人田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371267_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_121_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>自占</span>数十顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371267_comment'></div>给与农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371267_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371267_comment'></div>且熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371267_comment'></div>归我半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371267_comment'></div>是岁大旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371267_comment'></div>野无草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371267_comment'></div>农以告谌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371267_comment'></div>谌曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371267_comment'></div>我知入数而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371267_comment'></div>不知旱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371267_comment'></div>督责益急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371267_comment'></div>农且饥死无以偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371267_comment'></div>即告太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371267_comment'></div>太尉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_135_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>判状</span>辞甚巽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371267_comment'></div>使人来谕谌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371267_comment'></div>谌盛怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371267_comment'></div>召农者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371267_comment'></div>我畏段某耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371267_comment'></div>何敢言我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371267_comment'></div>取判铺背上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371267_comment'></div>以大杖击二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371267_comment'></div>垂死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371267_comment'></div>舆来庭中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371267_comment'></div>太尉大泣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371267_comment'></div>乃我困汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371267_comment'></div>即自取水洗去血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371267_comment'></div>裂裳衣疮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371267_comment'></div>手注善药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371267_comment'></div>旦夕自哺农者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371267_comment'></div>然后食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371267_comment'></div>取骑马卖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371267_comment'></div>市谷代偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371267_comment'></div>使勿知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371267_comment'></div>淮西寓军帅少尹荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371267_comment'></div>刚直士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371267_comment'></div>入见谌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371267_comment'></div>大骂曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371267_comment'></div>汝诚人耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371267_comment'></div>泾州野如赭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371267_comment'></div>人且饥死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371267_comment'></div>而必得谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371267_comment'></div>又用大杖击无罪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1371267_comment'></div>段公仁信大人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371267_comment'></div>而汝不知敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371267_comment'></div>今段公惟一马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371267_comment'></div>贱卖市谷入汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371267_comment'></div>汝取之不耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371267_comment'></div>凡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_169_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/169/Comments/0")'>为人</span>傲天灾犯大人击无罪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371267_comment'></div>又取仁者谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371267_comment'></div>使主人出无马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1371267_comment'></div>汝将何以视天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1371267_comment'></div>尚不愧<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1371267_comment'></div>然闻言则大愧流汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1371267_comment'></div>不能食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1371267_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1371267_comment'></div>吾终不可以见段公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1371267_comment'></div>一夕自恨死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1371267_comment'></div>及太尉自泾州以司农徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1371267_comment'></div>戒其族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1371267_comment'></div>过岐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1371267_comment'></div>朱泚幸致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_183_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/183/Comments/0")'>货币</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1371267_comment'></div>慎勿纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1371267_comment'></div>及过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1371267_comment'></div>泚固致大绫三百疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1371267_comment'></div>太尉婿韦晤坚拒不得命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1371267_comment'></div>至都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1371267_comment'></div>太尉怒曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1371267_comment'></div>果不用吾言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1371267_comment'></div>晤谢曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1371267_comment'></div>处贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1371267_comment'></div>无以拒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1371267_comment'></div>太尉曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1371267_comment'></div>然终不以在吾第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1371267_comment'></div>以绫如司农治事堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1371267_comment'></div>栖之梁木上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1371267_comment'></div>泚反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1371267_comment'></div>太尉终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1371267_comment'></div>吏以告泚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1371267_comment'></div>泚取视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1371267_comment'></div>其故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_202_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/202/Comments/1")'>封识</span>具存<span class='inlineComment2'>（太尉逸事如右）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1371267_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_203_1371267'>元和九年某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1371267_comment'></div>守永州司马员外置同正员柳宗元谨上史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1371267_comment'></div>今之称太尉大节者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1371267_comment'></div>出入以为武人一时奋不虑死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1371267_comment'></div>以取名天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1371267_comment'></div>不知太尉之所立如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1371267_comment'></div>宗元尝出入岐周邠斄间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1371267_comment'></div>过真定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1371267_comment'></div>北上马岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1371267_comment'></div>历亭鄣堡戍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1371267_comment'></div>窃好问<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_213_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/213/Comments/0")'>老校</span>退卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1371267_comment'></div>能言其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1371267_comment'></div>太尉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_215_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/215/Comments/0")'>为人</span>姁姁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1371267_comment'></div>常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_216_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/216/Comments/0")'>低首</span>拱手促步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1371267_comment'></div>言气卑弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1371267_comment'></div>未尝以色待物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1371267_comment'></div>人视之儒者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1371267_comment'></div>遇不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1371267_comment'></div>必达其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1371267_comment'></div>决非偶然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1371267_comment'></div>会州刺史崔公来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1371267_comment'></div>言信行直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1371267_comment'></div>备得太尉遗事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1371267_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_226_1371267", 1371267, "Clauses/226/Comments/0")'>覆校</span>无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1371267_comment'></div>或恐尚逸坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1371267_comment'></div>未集太史氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1371267_comment'></div>敢以状私于执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1371267_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_230_1371267_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。友韩愈为史馆修撰，宗元将所集段秀实逸事上报史馆，并修书以告。作品：《与史官韩愈致段太尉逸事书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷31第811页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370972' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370972' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370972?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与史官韩愈致段秀实太尉逸事书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370972")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370972_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370972'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370972'>退之馆下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370972_comment'></div>前者书进退之力史事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370972_comment'></div>奉答诚中吾病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370972_comment'></div>若疑不得实未即籍者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370972_comment'></div>诚是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370972_comment'></div>退之平生不以不信见遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370972_comment'></div>窃自冠好游边上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370972_comment'></div>问故老卒吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370972_comment'></div>得段太尉事最详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370972_comment'></div>今所趋走州刺史崔公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370972_comment'></div>时赐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370972", 1370972, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>言事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370972_comment'></div>又具得太尉实迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370972_comment'></div>参桉备具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370972_comment'></div>太尉大节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370972_comment'></div>古固无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370972_comment'></div>然人以为偶一奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370972_comment'></div>遂名无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370972_comment'></div>今大不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370972_comment'></div>太尉自有难在军中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370972_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370972", 1370972, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>处心</span>未尝亏侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370972_comment'></div>其莅事无不可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370972_comment'></div>会在下名未达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370972_comment'></div>以故不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370972_comment'></div>非直以一时取笏为谅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370972_comment'></div>太史迁死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370972_comment'></div>退之复以史道在职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370972_comment'></div>宜不苟过时日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370972_comment'></div>昔与退之期为史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370972_comment'></div>志甚壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370972_comment'></div>今孤囚废锢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370972_comment'></div>连遭瘴疠羸顿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370972_comment'></div>朝夕就死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370972_comment'></div>无能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370972_comment'></div>第不能竟其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370972_comment'></div>若太尉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370972_comment'></div>宜使勿坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370972_comment'></div>太史迁言荆轲徵夏无且。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370972_comment'></div>言大将军徵苏建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370972_comment'></div>言留侯徵画容貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370972_comment'></div>今孤囚贱辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370972_comment'></div>虽不及无且建等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370972_comment'></div>然比画工传容貌尚差胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370972_comment'></div>春秋传所谓传信传著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370972_comment'></div>虽孔子亦犹是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370972_comment'></div>窃自以为信且著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370972_comment'></div>其逸事有状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370972_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1370972_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。友韩愈为史馆修撰，春，宗元作书与韩愈论史官。作品：《与韩愈论史官书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷31第807页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370971' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370971' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370971?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与韩愈论史官书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370971")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370971_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370971'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370971'>正月二十一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370971_comment'></div>某顿首十八丈退之侍者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370971_comment'></div>前获书言史事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370971_comment'></div>云具与刘秀才书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370971_comment'></div>及今乃见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370971", 1370971, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>书稿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370971_comment'></div>私心甚不喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370971_comment'></div>与退之往年言史事甚大谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370971_comment'></div>若书中言退之不宜一日在馆下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370971_comment'></div>安有探宰相意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370971_comment'></div>以为苟以史荣一韩退之耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370971_comment'></div>若果尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370971_comment'></div>退之岂宜虚受宰相荣已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370971_comment'></div>而冒居馆下近密地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370971_comment'></div>食奉养役使掌故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370971_comment'></div>利纸笔为私书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370971_comment'></div>取以供子弟费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370971_comment'></div>古之志于道者不宜若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370971_comment'></div>且退之以为纪录者有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1370971", 1370971, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>刑祸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370971_comment'></div>避不肯就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370971_comment'></div>尤非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370971_comment'></div>史以名为褒贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370971_comment'></div>犹且恐惧不敢为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370971_comment'></div>设使退之为御史中丞大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370971_comment'></div>其褒贬成败人愈益显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370971_comment'></div>其宜恐惧尤大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370971_comment'></div>则又将扬扬入台府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370971_comment'></div>美食安坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370971_comment'></div>行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370971", 1370971, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>呼唱</span>于朝廷而已耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370971_comment'></div>在御史犹尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370971_comment'></div>设使退之为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370971_comment'></div>生杀出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370971_comment'></div>升黜天下士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370971_comment'></div>其敌益众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370971_comment'></div>则又将扬扬入政事堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370971_comment'></div>美食安坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370971_comment'></div>行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1370971", 1370971, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>呼唱</span>于内庭外衢而已耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370971_comment'></div>又何以异不为史而荣其号利其禄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370971_comment'></div>又言不有人祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370971_comment'></div>则<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作必）</span>有天刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370971_comment'></div>若以罪夫前古之为史者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370971_comment'></div>然亦甚惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370971_comment'></div>凡居其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370971_comment'></div>思直其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370971_comment'></div>道苟直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370971_comment'></div>虽死不可回也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370971_comment'></div>如回之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370971_comment'></div>莫若亟去其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370971_comment'></div>孔子之困于鲁卫陈宋蔡齐楚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370971_comment'></div>其时闇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370971_comment'></div>诸侯不能以也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370971_comment'></div>其不遇而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370971_comment'></div>不以作春秋故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370971_comment'></div>当其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370971_comment'></div>虽不作春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370971_comment'></div>孔子犹不遇而死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370971_comment'></div>若周公史佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370971_comment'></div>虽纪言书事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370971_comment'></div>犹遇且显也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370971_comment'></div>又不得以春秋为孔子累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370971_comment'></div>范煜悖乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370971_comment'></div>虽不为史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370971_comment'></div>其族亦诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370971_comment'></div>司马迁触天子喜怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370971_comment'></div>班固不检下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370971_comment'></div>崔浩沽其直以斗暴虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370971_comment'></div>皆非中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370971_comment'></div>左邱明以疾盲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370971_comment'></div>出于不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370971_comment'></div>子夏不为史亦盲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370971_comment'></div>不可以是为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370971_comment'></div>其馀皆不出此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370971_comment'></div>是退之宜守中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370971_comment'></div>不忘其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370971_comment'></div>无以他事自恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370971_comment'></div>退之之恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370971_comment'></div>唯在不直不得中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370971_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1370971", 1370971, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>刑祸</span>非所恐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370971_comment'></div>凡言二百年文武事多有诚如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370971_comment'></div>今退之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370971_comment'></div>我一人也何能明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370971_comment'></div>则同职者又所云若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370971_comment'></div>后来继今者又所云若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370971_comment'></div>人人皆曰我一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370971_comment'></div>则卒谁能纪传之耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370971_comment'></div>如退之但以所闻知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370971_comment'></div>孜孜不敢怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370971_comment'></div>同职者及后来继今者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370971_comment'></div>亦各以所闻知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370971_comment'></div>孜孜不敢怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370971_comment'></div>则庶几不坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370971_comment'></div>使卒有明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370971_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370971_comment'></div>徒信人口语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370971_comment'></div>每每异辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370971_comment'></div>日以滋多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370971_comment'></div>则所云磊磊轩天地者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370971_comment'></div>决必沈没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370971_comment'></div>且乱杂无可考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370971_comment'></div>非有志者所忍恣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370971_comment'></div>果有志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370971_comment'></div>岂当待人督责迫蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370971_comment'></div>然后为官守耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370971_comment'></div>又凡鬼神事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370971_comment'></div>渺茫荒惑无可准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370971_comment'></div>明者所不道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370971_comment'></div>退之之智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370971_comment'></div>而犹惧于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370971_comment'></div>今学如退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370971_comment'></div>辞如退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370971_comment'></div>好议论如退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370971_comment'></div>慷慨自谓正直行行焉如退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370971_comment'></div>犹所云若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370971_comment'></div>则唐之史述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370971_comment'></div>其卒无可托乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370971_comment'></div>明天子贤宰相得史才如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370971_comment'></div>而又不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370971_comment'></div>甚可痛哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370971_comment'></div>退之宜更思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370971_comment'></div>可为速为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370971_comment'></div>果卒以为恐惧不敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370971_comment'></div>则一日可引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370971_comment'></div>又何以云行且谋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370971_comment'></div>今当为而不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370971_comment'></div>又诱馆中他人及后生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370971_comment'></div>此大惑巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370971_comment'></div>不勉巳而欲勉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370971_comment'></div>难矣哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_126_1370971_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。献启与河阳节度使乌重胤，赞其功业。作品：《上河阳乌尚书启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第928页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第107页系《上河阳乌尚书启》于元和十三年，在柳州作。）</span><div id='poem_1371013' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371013' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371013?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上河阳乌尚书重允欲献文启</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371013")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371013_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371013'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371013'>宗元启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371013_comment'></div>伏以尚书以硕德伟才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371013_comment'></div>代著勋烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371013_comment'></div>两河定乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371013_comment'></div>三城建功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371013_comment'></div>鼎彝竹帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371013_comment'></div>未足云纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371013_comment'></div>进临汝上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371013_comment'></div>控制东方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371013_comment'></div>隐然长城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371013_comment'></div>朝野倚赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371013_comment'></div>宗元虽屏弃遐壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371013_comment'></div>而饱闻德声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371013_comment'></div>所恨不获亲执鞭弭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371013_comment'></div>以备戎伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371013_comment'></div>夙夜踊跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371013_comment'></div>不克宁居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371013_comment'></div>伏以威棱所加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371013_comment'></div>狂狡已震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371013_comment'></div>莫大之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371013_comment'></div>重复增崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371013_comment'></div>小子久以文字进身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371013_comment'></div>尝好古人事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371013_comment'></div>专当具笔札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371013_comment'></div>拂缣缃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371013_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371013", 1371013, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>赞扬</span>大功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371013_comment'></div>垂之不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371013_comment'></div>瞻望霄汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371013_comment'></div>恋慕交深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371013_comment'></div>冒黩威严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371013_comment'></div>伏增战越。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1371013_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。八月，秀才段弘古客死他乡，归葬途中过永，宗元撰祭文。作品：《祭段弘古文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1075页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371308' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371308' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371308?labeling=true' "poem_title_1371308")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371308_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371308'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371308'>世病乎直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371308_comment'></div>人悦其和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371308_comment'></div>行而不容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371308_comment'></div>虽圣奈何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371308_comment'></div>提其信义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371308_comment'></div>谁与同波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371308_comment'></div>硁硁以终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371308_comment'></div>坚不可磨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371308_comment'></div>游得其仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371308_comment'></div>友择其益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371308_comment'></div>始如可进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371308_comment'></div>终会于厄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371308_comment'></div>精诚介然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371308_comment'></div>将贯金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371308_comment'></div>追恩怀旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371308_comment'></div>兴词愤激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371308_comment'></div>君昔来辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371308_comment'></div>备闻嘉言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371308_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371308", 1371308, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>宵会</span>北堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371308_comment'></div>昼宴南轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371308_comment'></div>去适于越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371308_comment'></div>不日其旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371308_comment'></div>载除我居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371308_comment'></div>望尔北辕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371308_comment'></div>今者之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371308_comment'></div>丹旐有翩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371308_comment'></div>閟兹英志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371308_comment'></div>限此中年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371308_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371308_comment'></div>居实斯贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371308_comment'></div>有子而幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371308_comment'></div>孰云履信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371308_comment'></div>惟天所祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371308_comment'></div>道途之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371308_comment'></div>敢废于旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371308_comment'></div>志君之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371308_comment'></div>铭石斯授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371308_comment'></div>有洁其觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371308_comment'></div>有楚其豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371308_comment'></div>庶鉴于诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371308_comment'></div>临兹飨侑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1371308_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。八月，秀才段弘古客死他乡，归葬途中过永，宗元撰墓志。作品：《处士段弘古墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集补遗第1391页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371240' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371240' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371240?labeling=true' target='_blank'>处士段宏古墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371240")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371240_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371240'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371240'>段处士宏古。读纵横书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371240_comment'></div>刚峭少合。尤濩落不事产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371240_comment'></div>人或交之。度非义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371240_comment'></div>辄去。以故年五十不就禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371240_comment'></div>常以法家言抵御史大夫何士干。延以上座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371240_comment'></div>将用之。会士干死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371240_comment'></div>闻襄阳节度使于頔爱人大言。遂干以兵画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371240_comment'></div>一见喜甚。居月馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371240_comment'></div>视頔终不可与立功。又遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371240_comment'></div>陇西李景俭东平吕温。高气节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371240_comment'></div>尚道义。闻其名求见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371240_comment'></div>大欢。留门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371240_comment'></div>或一岁或半岁。与言不知日出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371240_comment'></div>温卒。景俭逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371240_comment'></div>前右拾遗张宿与然诺。南见中山刘禹锡河东柳宗元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371240_comment'></div>二人者言于御史中丞崔公。公时降治永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371240_comment'></div>知其信贤。徼其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371240_comment'></div>又南抵好义容州扶风窦群。途过桂林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371240_comment'></div>守旧知君。拒不为礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371240_comment'></div>君愤怒发病。不肯治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371240_comment'></div>曰。平生见大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371240_comment'></div>未尝相下。今穷于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371240_comment'></div>年加老。接接无所容入也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371240_comment'></div>益困于俗笑。吾安用生为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371240_comment'></div>埋道边耳。居六月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371240_comment'></div>死逆旅中。崔公为出涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371240_comment'></div>命特赠赙。致其丧来永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371240_comment'></div>哭为祭之。与丧具道里费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371240_comment'></div>归葬澧州安乡县黄山南麓上。君之死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371240_comment'></div>元和九年八月十六日。后某月日葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371240_comment'></div>祖某官。父某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371240_comment'></div>妻彭城刘氏。子知微知章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371240_comment'></div>皆未冠。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371240_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1371240'>廉不贪。直不倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371240_comment'></div>困者安之。通者不以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371240_comment'></div>不惩其踬。卒以亢死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371240_comment'></div>观游非类。有贱非鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371240_comment'></div>何以葬之。黄山南趾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371240_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1371240_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　谪居永州。姊夫崔简元和七年卒后权厝于永州，九年将复故葬，宗元撰文祭之。作品：《又祭崔简旅榇归上都文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷41第1104页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div
