ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作赋自戒，表守中庸之道。作品：《佩韦赋并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷2第41页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370863' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370863' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370863?labeling=true' target='_blank'>佩韦赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370863")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370863_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1370863'>柳子读古书。睹直道守节者则壮之。盖有激也。恒惧过而失中庸之义。慕西门氏佩韦以戒。故作是赋。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1370863_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370863'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370863'>邈予生此下都兮。块天质之悫醇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370863_comment'></div>日月迭而化升兮。遁初而枉神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370863_comment'></div>雕大素而生华兮。汨末流以丧真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370863_comment'></div>晞往躅而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1370863", 1370863, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>周章</span>兮。懵倚伏其无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370863_comment'></div>世既夺予之太和兮。眷授予以经常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370863_comment'></div>循圣人之通途兮。郁纵臾而不扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370863_comment'></div>犹悉力而究陈兮。获贞则于典章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370863_comment'></div>嫉时以奋节兮。悯已以抑志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370863_comment'></div>登嵩邱而垂目兮。瞰中区之疆理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370863_comment'></div>横万里而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370863", 1370863, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>极海</span>兮。颓风浩其四起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370863_comment'></div>恟惊怛而踯躅兮。恶浮诈之相诡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370863_comment'></div>思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370863", 1370863, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>贡忠</span>于明后兮。振教导乎遐轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370863_comment'></div>纷吾守此狂狷兮。惧执竞而不柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370863_comment'></div>探先哲之奥谟兮。攀往列之洪休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370863_comment'></div>曰沈潜而刚克兮。固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370863", 1370863, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>谠人</span>之嘉猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370863_comment'></div>嗟行行而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370863", 1370863, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>踬踣</span>兮。信往古之所仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370863_comment'></div>彼穹壤之廓殊兮。寒与暑而交修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370863_comment'></div>执中而俟命兮。固仁圣之善谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370863_comment'></div>吾祖士师之直道兮。亦愀然于伐国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370863_comment'></div>尼父戮齐而诛卯兮。本柔仁以作极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370863_comment'></div>蔺竦颜以诮秦兮。入降廉犹臣仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370863_comment'></div>吉优繇而布和兮。残萑蒲以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370863", 1370863, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>屏匿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370863_comment'></div>刿拔刃于霸侯兮。退<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370863", 1370863, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>匑匑</span>而畏服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370863_comment'></div>宽与猛其相济兮。孰不颂兹之盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370863_comment'></div>克明哲而保躬兮。恢大雅之所勖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370863_comment'></div>阳宅身以执刚兮。卒易师而蒙辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370863_comment'></div>羽愎心以盭志兮。首身离而不惩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370863_comment'></div>云<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370863", 1370863, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>岳岳</span>而专强兮。果黜志而乖图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370863_comment'></div>咸触屏以拒训兮。肆殒越而就陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370863_comment'></div>冶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370863", 1370863, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>讦谏</span>于昏朝兮。名崩弛而陷诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370863_comment'></div>苟纵直而不羁兮。乃变罹而祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370863_comment'></div>仍历九折而直奔兮。固摧辕而失途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370863_comment'></div>遵大路而曲辙兮。又求达而不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370863_comment'></div>广守柔以允塞兮。抵暴梁而坏节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370863_comment'></div>家撝谦而温美兮。胁子公而丧哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370863_comment'></div>义师仁而恶狠兮。遂溃腾而灭裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370863_comment'></div>斯委懦以从邪兮。悼上蔡其何补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370863_comment'></div>徐偃柔以屏义兮。倏邦离而身虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370863_comment'></div>桑宏和而却武兮。涣宗覆而国举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370863_comment'></div>设任柔而自处兮。蒙大戮而不悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370863_comment'></div>故曰。纯柔纯弱兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370863_comment'></div>必削必薄。纯刚纯强兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370863_comment'></div>必丧必亡。韬义于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370863_comment'></div>服和于躬。和以义宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370863_comment'></div>刚以柔通。守而不迁兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370863_comment'></div>变而无穷。交得其宜兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370863_comment'></div>乃获其终。姑佩兹韦兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370863_comment'></div>考古齐同。乱曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370863_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1370863'>韦之申申。佩于躬兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370863_comment'></div>本正生和。探厥中兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370863_comment'></div>哲人交修。乐有终兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370863_comment'></div>庶寡其过。追古风兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370863_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1370863_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作赋以瓶自喻，表清白之志。作品：《瓶赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷2第47页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370864' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370864' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370864?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瓶赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370864")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370864_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370864'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370864'>昔有智人。善学鸱夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370864_comment'></div>鸱夷蒙鸿。罍罃相追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370864_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370864", 1370864, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>谄诱</span>吉士。喜悦依随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370864_comment'></div>开喙倒腹。斟酌更持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370864_comment'></div>味不苦口。昏至莫知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370864_comment'></div>颓然纵傲。与乱为期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370864_comment'></div>视白成黑。颠倒妍媸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370864_comment'></div>已虽自售。人或以危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370864_comment'></div>败众亡国。流连不归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370864_comment'></div>谁主斯罪。鸱夷之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370864_comment'></div>不知为瓶。居井之眉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370864_comment'></div>钩深挹洁。淡泊是师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370864_comment'></div>和齐五味。宁除渴饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370864_comment'></div>不甘不坏。久而莫遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370864_comment'></div>清白可鉴。终不媚私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370864_comment'></div>利泽广大。孰能去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370864_comment'></div>绠绝身破。何足怨咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370864_comment'></div>功成事遂。复于土泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370864_comment'></div>归根反初。无虑无思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370864_comment'></div>何必巧曲。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370864", 1370864, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>徼觊</span>一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370864_comment'></div>子无我愚。我智如斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370864_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1370864_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。以牛为喻，作赋抒愤。作品：《牛赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷2第49页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370865' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370865' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370865?labeling=true' target='_blank'>牛赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370865")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370865_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370865'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370865'>若知牛乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370865_comment'></div>牛之为物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370865_comment'></div>魁形巨首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370865_comment'></div>垂耳抱角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370865_comment'></div>毛革疏厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370865_comment'></div>牟然而鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370865_comment'></div>黄钟满脰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370865_comment'></div>抵触<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370865", 1370865, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>隆曦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370865_comment'></div>日耕百亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370865_comment'></div>往来修直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370865_comment'></div>植乃禾黍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370865_comment'></div>自种自敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370865_comment'></div>服箱以走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370865_comment'></div>输入官仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370865_comment'></div>已不适口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370865_comment'></div>富穷饱饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370865_comment'></div>功用不有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370865_comment'></div>陷泥蹶块。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370865_comment'></div>常在草野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370865_comment'></div>人不惭愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370865_comment'></div>利满天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370865_comment'></div>皮角见用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370865_comment'></div>肩尻莫保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370865_comment'></div>或穿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370865", 1370865, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>缄縢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370865_comment'></div>或实俎豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370865_comment'></div>由是观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370865_comment'></div>物无踰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370865_comment'></div>不如羸驴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370865_comment'></div>服逐驽马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370865_comment'></div>曲意随势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370865_comment'></div>不择处所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370865_comment'></div>不耕不驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370865_comment'></div>藿菽自与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370865_comment'></div>腾踏康庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370865_comment'></div>出入轻举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370865_comment'></div>喜则齐鼻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370865_comment'></div>怒则奋踯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370865_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1370865", 1370865, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>当道</span>长鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370865_comment'></div>闻者惊辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370865_comment'></div>善识门户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370865_comment'></div>终身不惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370865_comment'></div>牛虽有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370865_comment'></div>于已何益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370865_comment'></div>命有好丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370865_comment'></div>非若能力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370865_comment'></div>慎勿怨尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370865_comment'></div>以受多福。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1370865_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。不胜群小谗言之烦扰，作赋抒怀，表以不辩为辩、求清者自清。作品：《解崇赋并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷2第51页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。为抨击藩镇跋扈及复辟分封制之思潮，作文论封建制、郡邑制历史发展之规律及其优劣。作品：《封建论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷3第69页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371125' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371125' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371125?labeling=true' target='_blank'>封建论</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371125")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371125_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371125'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371125'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>天地</span>果无初乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371125_comment'></div>吾不得而知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371125_comment'></div>生人果有初乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371125_comment'></div>吾不得而知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371125_comment'></div>然则孰为近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371125_comment'></div>曰有初为近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371125_comment'></div>孰明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371125_comment'></div>由<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>封建</span>而明之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371125_comment'></div>彼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>封建</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371125_comment'></div>更古<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>圣王</span>尧舜禹汤文武而莫能去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371125_comment'></div>盖非不欲去之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371125_comment'></div>势不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371125_comment'></div>势之来<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本来字下有则字）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371125_comment'></div>其生人之初乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371125_comment'></div>不初无以有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>封建</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>封建</span>非圣人意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371125_comment'></div>彼其初与万物皆生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371125_comment'></div>草木<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>榛榛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371125_comment'></div>鹿豕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>狉狉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371125_comment'></div>人不能搏噬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>而且</span>无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>毛羽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371125_comment'></div>莫克<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>自奉</span>自卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371125_comment'></div>荀卿有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371125_comment'></div>必将假物以为用者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371125_comment'></div>夫假物者必争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371125_comment'></div>争而不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371125_comment'></div>必就其能断<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>曲直</span>者而听命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371125_comment'></div>其智而明者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371125_comment'></div>所伏必众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371125_comment'></div>告之以直而不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371125_comment'></div>必痛之而后畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371125_comment'></div>由是君长<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>刑政</span>生焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371125_comment'></div>故近者聚而为群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371125_comment'></div>群之分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371125_comment'></div>其争必大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371125_comment'></div>大而后有兵有德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371125_comment'></div>乂有大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371125_comment'></div>众群之长又就而听命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371125_comment'></div>以安其属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371125_comment'></div>于是有诸侯之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371125_comment'></div>则其争又有大者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371125_comment'></div>德又大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371125_comment'></div>诸侯之列又就而听命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371125_comment'></div>以安其封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371125_comment'></div>于是有方伯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>连帅</span>之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371125_comment'></div>则其争又有大者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371125_comment'></div>德又大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371125_comment'></div>方伯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>连帅</span>之类又就而听命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371125_comment'></div>以安其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371125_comment'></div>然后天下会于一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371125_comment'></div>是故有里胥而后有县大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371125_comment'></div>有县大夫而后有诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371125_comment'></div>有诸侯而后有方伯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>连帅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371125_comment'></div>有方伯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>连帅</span>而后有天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371125_comment'></div>自天子至于里胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371125_comment'></div>其德在人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371125_comment'></div>死必求其嗣而奉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371125_comment'></div>故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>封建</span>非圣人意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371125_comment'></div>势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371125_comment'></div>夫尧舜禹汤之事远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371125_comment'></div>及有周而甚详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371125_comment'></div>周有天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371125_comment'></div>裂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>土田</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/62/Comments/1")'>瓜分</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371125_comment'></div>设五等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371125_comment'></div>邦群后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371125_comment'></div>布濩星罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371125_comment'></div>四周于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>轮运</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/67/Comments/1")'>辐集</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371125_comment'></div>合为朝觐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>会同</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371125_comment'></div>离为守臣捍城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371125_comment'></div>然而降于夷王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371125_comment'></div>害礼伤尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371125_comment'></div>下堂而迎觐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371125_comment'></div>历于宣王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371125_comment'></div>挟中兴复古之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371125_comment'></div>雄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>南征北伐</span>之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371125_comment'></div>卒不能定鲁侯之嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371125_comment'></div>陵夷迄于幽厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371125_comment'></div>王室东徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371125_comment'></div>而自列为诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371125_comment'></div>厥后问鼎之轻重者有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371125_comment'></div>射王中肩者有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371125_comment'></div>伐凡伯诛苌宏者有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371125_comment'></div>天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>乖盭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371125_comment'></div>无君君之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371125_comment'></div>予以为周之丧久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371125_comment'></div>徒建空名于公侯之上耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371125_comment'></div>得非诸侯之盛强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>末大不掉</span>之咎欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371125_comment'></div>遂判为十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371125_comment'></div>合为七国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371125_comment'></div>威分于陪臣之邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371125_comment'></div>国殄于后封之秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371125_comment'></div>则周之败端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371125_comment'></div>其在乎此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371125_comment'></div>秦有天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371125_comment'></div>裂都会而为之郡邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371125_comment'></div>废侯卫而为之守宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371125_comment'></div>据天下之雄图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371125_comment'></div>都六合之上游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371125_comment'></div>摄制四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371125_comment'></div>运于掌握之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371125_comment'></div>此其所以为得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371125_comment'></div>不数载而天下大坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371125_comment'></div>其有由矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371125_comment'></div>亟役万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371125_comment'></div>暴其威刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371125_comment'></div>竭其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>货贿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371125_comment'></div>负<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>锄梃</span>谪戍之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>圜视</span>而合从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371125_comment'></div>大呼而成群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371125_comment'></div>时则有叛人而无叛吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371125_comment'></div>人怨于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371125_comment'></div>而吏畏于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371125_comment'></div>天下相合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371125_comment'></div>杀守劫令而并起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371125_comment'></div>咎在人怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371125_comment'></div>非郡邑之制失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371125_comment'></div>汉有天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371125_comment'></div>矫秦之枉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371125_comment'></div>徇周之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371125_comment'></div>剖海内而立宗子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371125_comment'></div>封<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_122_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>功臣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371125_comment'></div>数年之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371125_comment'></div>奔命<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_124_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>扶伤</span>而不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371125_comment'></div>困平城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371125_comment'></div>病流矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371125_comment'></div>陵迟不救者三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371125_comment'></div>后乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_128_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>谋臣</span>献画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371125_comment'></div>而离削自守矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371125_comment'></div>然而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_130_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>封建</span>之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371125_comment'></div>郡国居半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371125_comment'></div>时则有叛国而无叛郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371125_comment'></div>秦制之得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371125_comment'></div>亦以明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371125_comment'></div>继汉而帝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371125_comment'></div>虽百代可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371125_comment'></div>唐兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371125_comment'></div>制州邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371125_comment'></div>立守宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371125_comment'></div>此其所以为宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371125_comment'></div>然犹桀猾时起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371125_comment'></div>虐害方域者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371125_comment'></div>失不在于州而在于兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371125_comment'></div>时则有叛将而无叛州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371125_comment'></div>州县之设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371125_comment'></div>固不可革也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371125_comment'></div>或者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_148_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>封建</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371125_comment'></div>必私其土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371125_comment'></div>子其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371125_comment'></div>适其俗。<div id='poem_sentence_153_1371125_comment'></div>守宰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371125_comment'></div>苟其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371125_comment'></div>思迁其秩而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371125_comment'></div>何能理乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371125_comment'></div>予又非之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371125_comment'></div>周之事迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371125_comment'></div>断可见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371125_comment'></div>列侯骄盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371125_comment'></div>黩货事戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371125_comment'></div>大凡乱国多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371125_comment'></div>侯伯不得变其政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371125_comment'></div>天子不得变其君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371125_comment'></div>私土于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371125_comment'></div>百不有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371125_comment'></div>失在于制。<div id='poem_sentence_199_1371125_comment'></div>大刻于民者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1371125_comment'></div>无如之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1371125_comment'></div>及夫郡邑。<div
