id='poem_sentence_209_1371125_comment'></div>复其位可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1371125_comment'></div>卧而委之以辑一方可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1371125_comment'></div>有罪得以黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1371125_comment'></div>有能得以奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1371125_comment'></div>朝拜而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_214_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/214/Comments/0")'>不道</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1371125_comment'></div>夕斥之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1371125_comment'></div>夕受而不法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1371125_comment'></div>朝斥之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1371125_comment'></div>设使汉室尽城邑而侯王之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1371125_comment'></div>纵令其乱人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1371125_comment'></div>戚之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1371125_comment'></div>孟舒魏尚之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1371125_comment'></div>莫得而施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1371125_comment'></div>黄霸汲黯之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1371125_comment'></div>莫得而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1371125_comment'></div>明谴而导之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1371125_comment'></div>拜受而退已违矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1371125_comment'></div>下令而削之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1371125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_228_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/228/Comments/0")'>缔交</span>合从之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1371125_comment'></div>周于同列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1371125_comment'></div>则相顾裂眦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1371125_comment'></div>勃然而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1371125_comment'></div>幸而不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1371125_comment'></div>则削其半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1371125_comment'></div>削其半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1371125_comment'></div>民犹瘁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1371125_comment'></div>曷若举而移之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1371125_comment'></div>以全其人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1371125_comment'></div>汉事然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1371125_comment'></div>今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_239_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/239/Comments/0")'>国家</span>尽制郡邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1371125_comment'></div>连置守宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1371125_comment'></div>其不可变也固矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1371125_comment'></div>善<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_242_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/242/Comments/0")'>制兵</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1371125_comment'></div>谨择守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1371125_comment'></div>则理平矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1371125_comment'></div>或者又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1371125_comment'></div>夏商周汉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_246_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/246/Comments/0")'>封建</span>而延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1371125_comment'></div>秦郡邑而促。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1371125_comment'></div>尤非所谓知理者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1371125_comment'></div>魏之承汉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1371125_comment'></div>封爵犹建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1371125_comment'></div>晋之承魏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1371125_comment'></div>因循不革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1371125_comment'></div>而二姓陵替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1371125_comment'></div>不闻延祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1371125_comment'></div>今矫而变之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1371125_comment'></div>垂二百祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1371125_comment'></div>大业弥固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1371125_comment'></div>何系于诸侯哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1371125_comment'></div>或者又以为殷周<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_259_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/259/Comments/0")'>圣王</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1371125_comment'></div>而不革其制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1371125_comment'></div>固不当复议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1371125_comment'></div>是大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_262_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/262/Comments/0")'>不然</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1371125_comment'></div>夫殷周之不革者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1371125_comment'></div>是不得已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1371125_comment'></div>盖以诸侯归殷者三千焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1371125_comment'></div>资以黜夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1371125_comment'></div>汤不得而废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1371125_comment'></div>归周者八百焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1371125_comment'></div>资以胜殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1371125_comment'></div>武王不得而易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1371125_comment'></div>徇之以为安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1371125_comment'></div>仍之以为俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1371125_comment'></div>汤武之所不得已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1371125_comment'></div>夫不得已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1371125_comment'></div>非公之大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1371125_comment'></div>私其力于己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1371125_comment'></div>私其卫于子孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1371125_comment'></div>秦之所以革之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1371125_comment'></div>其为制公之大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1371125_comment'></div>其情私也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1371125_comment'></div>私其一己之威也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1371125_comment'></div>私其尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_282_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/282/Comments/0")'>臣畜</span>于我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1371125_comment'></div>然而公天下之端自秦始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1371125_comment'></div>夫天下之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1371125_comment'></div>理安斯得人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1371125_comment'></div>使贤者居上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1371125_comment'></div>不肖者居下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1371125_comment'></div>而后可以理安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1371125_comment'></div>今夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_289_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/289/Comments/0")'>封建</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1371125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_290_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/290/Comments/0")'>继世</span>而理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1371125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_291_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/291/Comments/0")'>继世</span>而理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1371125_comment'></div>上果贤乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1371125_comment'></div>下果不肖乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1371125_comment'></div>则生人之理乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1371125_comment'></div>未可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1371125_comment'></div>将欲利其社稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1371125_comment'></div>以一其人之视听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1371125_comment'></div>则又有世大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_298_1371125_comment'></div>世食禄邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_299_1371125_comment'></div>以尽其封略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_300_1371125_comment'></div>圣贤生于其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1371125_comment'></div>亦<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本无亦字）</span>无以立于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_302_1371125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_303_1371125", 1371125, "Clauses/303/Comments/0")'>封建</span>者为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_303_1371125_comment'></div>岂圣人之制使至于是乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_304_1371125_comment'></div>吾固曰非圣人之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_305_1371125_comment'></div>势也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_306_1371125_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文评《管子》“礼义廉耻”治国四维之说，论“礼仪”二维之观点。作品：《四维论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷3第77页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371124' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371124' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371124?labeling=true' target='_blank'>四维论</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371124")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371124_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371124'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371124'>管子以礼义廉耻为四维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371124_comment'></div>吾疑非管子之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371124_comment'></div>彼所谓廉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371124_comment'></div>曰不蔽恶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371124_comment'></div>世人之命廉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371124_comment'></div>曰不苟得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371124_comment'></div>所谓耻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371124_comment'></div>曰不从枉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371124_comment'></div>世人之命耻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371124_comment'></div>曰羞为非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371124_comment'></div>然则二者果义欤非欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371124_comment'></div>吾见其有二维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371124_comment'></div>未见其所以为四也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371124_comment'></div>夫不蔽恶者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371124_comment'></div>岂不以蔽恶为不义而去之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371124_comment'></div>夫不苟得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371124_comment'></div>岂不以苟得为不义而不为乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371124_comment'></div>虽不从<span class='inlineComment2'>（虽不从一无不字）</span>枉与羞为非皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371124_comment'></div>然则廉与耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371124_comment'></div>义之小节也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371124_comment'></div>不得与义抗而为维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371124_comment'></div>圣人之所以立天下曰仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371124_comment'></div>仁主恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371124_comment'></div>义主断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371124_comment'></div>恩者亲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371124_comment'></div>断者宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371124_comment'></div>而理道毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371124_comment'></div>蹈之斯为道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371124_comment'></div>得之斯为德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371124_comment'></div>履之斯为礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371124_comment'></div>诚之斯为信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371124_comment'></div>皆由其所之而异名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371124_comment'></div>今管氏所以为维者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371124_comment'></div>殆非圣人之所立乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371124_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371124_comment'></div>一维绝则倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371124_comment'></div>二维绝则危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371124_comment'></div>三维绝则覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371124_comment'></div>四维绝则灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371124_comment'></div>若义之绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371124_comment'></div>则廉与耻其果存乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371124_comment'></div>廉与耻存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371124_comment'></div>则义果绝乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371124_comment'></div>人既蔽恶矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371124_comment'></div>苟得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371124_comment'></div>从枉矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371124_comment'></div>为非而无羞矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371124_comment'></div>则义果存乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371124_comment'></div>使管子庸人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371124_comment'></div>则为此言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371124_comment'></div>管子而少知理道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371124_comment'></div>则四维者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371124_comment'></div>非管子之言也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1371124_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论孟子“天爵”观。作品：《天爵论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷3第79页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371126' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371126' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371126?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天爵论</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371126")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371126_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371126'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371126'>柳子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371126_comment'></div>仁义忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371126_comment'></div>先儒名以为天爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371126_comment'></div>未之尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371126_comment'></div>夫天之贵斯人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371126_comment'></div>则付刚健纯粹于其躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371126_comment'></div>倬为至灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371126_comment'></div>大者圣神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371126_comment'></div>其次贤能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371126_comment'></div>所谓贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371126_comment'></div>刚健之气钟于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371126_comment'></div>为志得之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371126_comment'></div>运行而可大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371126_comment'></div>悠久而不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371126_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371126", 1371126, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>拳拳</span>于得善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371126_comment'></div>孜孜于嗜学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371126_comment'></div>则志者其一端耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371126_comment'></div>纯粹之气注于人也为明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371126_comment'></div>得之者爽达而先觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371126_comment'></div>鉴照而无隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371126_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371126", 1371126, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>盹盹</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371126", 1371126, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>独见</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371126_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371126", 1371126, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>渊渊</span>于默识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371126_comment'></div>则明者又其一端耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371126_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371126", 1371126, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>明离</span>为天之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371126_comment'></div>恒久为天之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371126_comment'></div>举斯二者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371126_comment'></div>人伦之要尽是焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371126_comment'></div>故善言天爵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371126_comment'></div>不必在道德忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371126_comment'></div>明与志而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371126_comment'></div>道德之于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371126_comment'></div>犹阴阳之于天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371126_comment'></div>仁义忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371126_comment'></div>犹春秋冬夏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371126_comment'></div>举<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371126", 1371126, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>明离</span>之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371126_comment'></div>运恒久之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371126_comment'></div>所以成四时而行阴阳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371126_comment'></div>宣无隐之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371126_comment'></div>著不息之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371126_comment'></div>所以备<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371126", 1371126, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>四美</span>而富道德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371126_comment'></div>故人有好学不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371126_comment'></div>而迷其道挠其志者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371126_comment'></div>明之不至耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371126_comment'></div>有照物无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371126_comment'></div>而荡其性脱其守者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371126_comment'></div>志之不至耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371126_comment'></div>明以鉴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371126_comment'></div>志以取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371126_comment'></div>役用其道德之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371126_comment'></div>舒布其五常之质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371126_comment'></div>充之而弥六合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371126_comment'></div>播之而奋百代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371126_comment'></div>圣贤之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371126_comment'></div>然则圣贤之异愚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371126_comment'></div>职此而巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371126_comment'></div>使仲尼之志之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371126_comment'></div>可得而夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371126_comment'></div>则庸夫矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371126_comment'></div>授之于庸夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371126_comment'></div>则仲尼矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371126_comment'></div>若乃明之远迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371126_comment'></div>志之恒久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371126_comment'></div>庸非天爵之有级哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371126_comment'></div>故圣人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371126_comment'></div>敏以求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371126_comment'></div>明之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371126_comment'></div>为之不厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371126_comment'></div>志之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371126_comment'></div>道德与五常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371126_comment'></div>存乎人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371126_comment'></div>克明而有恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371126_comment'></div>受于天者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371126_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371126_comment'></div>后之学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371126_comment'></div>尽力于斯<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本无斯字）</span>所及焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371126_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371126_comment'></div>子所谓天付之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371126_comment'></div>若开府库焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371126_comment'></div>量而与之耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371126_comment'></div>曰否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371126_comment'></div>其各合乎气者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371126_comment'></div>庄周言天曰自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371126_comment'></div>吾取之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1371126_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论国家政令、人事与时令无关，驳斥汉儒"五行政治"之谬说。作品：《时令论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷3第84-89页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论赏罚刑令与天道无关，而应顺人顺道，驳斥汉儒"五行政治"之谬说。作品：《断刑论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷3第89页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371130' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371130' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371130?labeling=true' target='_blank'>断刑论下</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371130")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371130_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371130'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371130'>余既为断刑论。或者以释刑复于余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371130_comment'></div>其辞云云。余不得已而为之一言焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371130_comment'></div>夫圣人之为赏罚者。非他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371130_comment'></div>所以惩劝者也。赏务速而后有劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371130_comment'></div>罚务速而后有惩。必曰赏以春夏而刑以秋冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371130_comment'></div>而谓之至理者。伪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371130_comment'></div>使秋冬为善者。必俟春夏而后赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371130_comment'></div>则为善者必怠。春夏为不善者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371130_comment'></div>必俟秋冬而后罚。则为不善者必懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371130_comment'></div>为善者怠。为不善者懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371130_comment'></div>是驱天下之人而入于罪也。驱天下之人入于罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371130_comment'></div>又缓而慢之。以滋其懈怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371130_comment'></div>此刑之所以不措也。必使为善者不越月踰时而得其赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371130_comment'></div>则人勇而有劝焉。为不善者不越月踰时而得其罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371130_comment'></div>则人惧而有惩焉。为善者日以有劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371130_comment'></div>为不善者日以有惩。是驱天下之人而从善远罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371130_comment'></div>驱天下之人而从善远罪。是刑之所以措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371130_comment'></div>而化之所以成也。或者务言天而不言人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371130_comment'></div>是惑于道者也。胡不谋之人心以熟吾道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371130_comment'></div>吾道之尽而人化矣。是知苍苍者焉能与吾事而暇知之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371130_comment'></div>果以为天时之可得顺。太和之可得致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371130_comment'></div>则全吾道而得之矣。全吾道而不得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371130_comment'></div>非所谓天也。非所谓太和也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371130_comment'></div>是亦必无而已矣。又何必枉吾之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371130_comment'></div>曲顺其时。以谄是物哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371130_comment'></div>吾固知顺时之得天。不如顺人顺道之得天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371130_comment'></div>何也。使犯死者自春而穷其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371130_comment'></div>欲死不可得。贯三木加连锁而致之狱吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371130_comment'></div>大暑者数月。痒不得搔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371130_comment'></div>痹不得摇。痛不得摩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371130_comment'></div>饥不得时而食。渴不得时而饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371130_comment'></div>目不得瞑。支不得舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371130_comment'></div>怨号之声。闻于里人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371130_comment'></div>如是而太和之不伤。天时之不逆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371130_comment'></div>是亦必无而已矣。彼其所宜得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371130_comment'></div>死而已也。又若是焉何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371130_comment'></div>或者乃以为雪霜者。天之经也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371130_comment'></div>雷霆者。天之权也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371130_comment'></div>非常之罪。不时可以杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371130_comment'></div>人之权也。当刑者必顺时而杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371130_comment'></div>人之经也。是又不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371130_comment'></div>夫雷霆雪霜者。特一气耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371130_comment'></div>非有心于物者也。圣人有心于物者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371130_comment'></div>春夏之有雷霆也。或发而震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371130_comment'></div>破巨石。裂大木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371130_comment'></div>木石岂为非常之罪也哉。秋冬之有霜雪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371130_comment'></div>举草木而残之。草木岂有非常之罪也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371130_comment'></div>彼岂有惩于物也哉。彼无所惩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371130_comment'></div>则效之者惑也。果以为仁必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1371130", 1371130, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>知经</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371130_comment'></div>智必知权。是又未尽于经权之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371130_comment'></div>何也。经也者常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371130_comment'></div>权也者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371130", 1371130, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>达经</span>者也。皆仁智之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371130_comment'></div>离之滋惑矣。经非权则泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371130_comment'></div>权非经则悖。是二者强名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371130_comment'></div>曰当斯尽之矣。当也者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371130_comment'></div>大中之道也。离而为名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371130_comment'></div>大中之器用也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1371130", 1371130, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>知经</span>而不知权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371130_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1371130", 1371130, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>知经</span>者也。知权而不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1371130", 1371130, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>知经</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371130_comment'></div>不知权者也。偏知而谓之智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371130_comment'></div>不智者也。偏守而谓之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371130_comment'></div>不仁者也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1371130", 1371130, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>知经</span>者不以异物害吾道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371130_comment'></div>知权者不以常人怫吾虑。合之于一而不疑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371130_comment'></div>信于<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本无于字）</span>道而已矣。且古之所以言天者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371130_comment'></div>盖以愚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1371130", 1371130, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>蚩蚩者</span>耳。非为聪明睿智者设也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371130_comment'></div>或者之未达。不思之甚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371130_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1371130_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论“桐叶封弟”事，批驳“天子无戏言”帝王神化论。作品：《桐叶封弟辩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷4第105页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371169' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371169' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371169?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桐叶封弟辩</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371169")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371169_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371169'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371169'>古之传者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371169_comment'></div>有言成王以桐叶与小弱弟戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371169_comment'></div>曰以封汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371169_comment'></div>周公入贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371169_comment'></div>王曰戏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371169_comment'></div>周公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371169_comment'></div>天子不可戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371169_comment'></div>乃封小弱弟于唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371169_comment'></div>吾意不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371169_comment'></div>王之弟当封耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371169_comment'></div>周公宜以时言于王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371169_comment'></div>不待其戏而贺以成之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371169_comment'></div>不当封耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371169_comment'></div>周公乃成其不中之戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371169_comment'></div>以地以人与小弱弟者为之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371169_comment'></div>其得为圣乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371169_comment'></div>且周公以王之言不可苟焉而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371169_comment'></div>必从而成之耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371169_comment'></div>设有不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371169_comment'></div>王以桐叶戏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371169", 1371169, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>妇寺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371169_comment'></div>亦将举而从之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371169_comment'></div>凡王者之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371169_comment'></div>在行之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371169", 1371169, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>何若</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371169_comment'></div>设未得其当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371169_comment'></div>虽十易之不为病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371169_comment'></div>要于其当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371169_comment'></div>不可使易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371169_comment'></div>而况以其戏乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371169_comment'></div>若戏而必行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371169_comment'></div>是周公教王<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1371169", 1371169, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>遂过</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371169_comment'></div>吾意周公辅成王宜以道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371169_comment'></div>从容<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371169", 1371169, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>优乐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371169_comment'></div>要归之大中而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371169_comment'></div>必不逢其失而为之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371169_comment'></div>又不当束缚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371169_comment'></div>驰骤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371169_comment'></div>使若牛马然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371169_comment'></div>急则败矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371169_comment'></div>且家人父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371169_comment'></div>尚不能以此自克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371169_comment'></div>况号为君臣者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371169_comment'></div>是直小丈夫者之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371169_comment'></div>非周公所宜用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371169_comment'></div>故不可信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371169_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371169_comment'></div>封唐叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371169_comment'></div>史佚成之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1371169_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文考辩《列子》成书时间及文学价值。作品：《辩列子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷4第106页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371170' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371170' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371170?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辩列子</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371170")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371170_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371170'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371170'>刘向古称博极群书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371170_comment'></div>然其录列子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371170_comment'></div>独曰郑穆公时人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371170_comment'></div>穆公在孔子前几百岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371170_comment'></div>列子书言郑国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371170_comment'></div>皆云子产邓析。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371170_comment'></div>不知向何以言之如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371170_comment'></div>史记郑繻公二十四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371170_comment'></div>楚悼王四年围郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371170_comment'></div>郑杀其相驷子阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371170_comment'></div>子阳正与列子同时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371170_comment'></div>是岁周安王四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371170_comment'></div>秦惠公韩烈侯赵武侯二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371170_comment'></div>魏文侯二十七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371170_comment'></div>燕釐公五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371170_comment'></div>齐康公七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371170_comment'></div>宋悼公六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371170_comment'></div>鲁穆公十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371170_comment'></div>不知向言鲁穆公时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371170_comment'></div>遂误为郑耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371170_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371170_comment'></div>何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371170", 1371170, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>乖错</span>至如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371170_comment'></div>其后张湛徒知怪列子书言穆公后事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371170_comment'></div>亦不能推知其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371170_comment'></div>然其书亦多遭增窜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371170_comment'></div>非其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371170_comment'></div>要之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371170_comment'></div>庄周为放依其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371170_comment'></div>其称夏徂公纪渻子季咸等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371170_comment'></div>皆出列子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371170_comment'></div>不可尽纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371170_comment'></div>虽不槩于孔子道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371170_comment'></div>然其虚泊寥阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371170_comment'></div>居乱世远于利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371170_comment'></div>祸不得逮于身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371170_comment'></div>而其心不穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371170_comment'></div>易之遁世无闷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371170_comment'></div>其近是欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371170_comment'></div>予故取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371170_comment'></div>其文辞类庄子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371170_comment'></div>而尤质厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371170_comment'></div>少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1371170", 1371170, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>为作</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371170_comment'></div>好文者可废耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371170_comment'></div>其杨朱力命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371170_comment'></div>疑其杨子书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371170_comment'></div>其言魏牟孔穿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371170_comment'></div>皆出列子后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371170_comment'></div>不可信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371170_comment'></div>然观其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371170_comment'></div>亦足通知古之多异术也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371170_comment'></div>读焉者慎取之而已矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1371170_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文考辩《文子》成书情形及其价值。作品：《辩文子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷4第108页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371171' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371171' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371171?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辩文子</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371171")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371171_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371171'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371171'>文子书十二篇。其传曰老子弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371171_comment'></div>其辞时有若可取。其指意皆本老子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371171_comment'></div>然考其书。盖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371171", 1371171, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>驳书</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371171_comment'></div>其浑而类者少。窃取他书以合之者多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371171_comment'></div>凡孟管辈数家。皆见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371171", 1371171, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>剽窃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371171_comment'></div>峣然而出其类。其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371171", 1371171, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>意绪</span>文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371171_comment'></div>义牙相抵而不合。不知人之增益之欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371171_comment'></div>或者众为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371171", 1371171, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>聚敛</span>以成其书欤。然观其往往有可立者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371171_comment'></div>又颇惜之。悯其为之也劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371171_comment'></div>今刊去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371171", 1371171, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>谬恶</span>乱杂者。取其似是者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371171_comment'></div>又颇为发其意。藏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371171_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1371171_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论辩《论语》成书作者及其卒章《尧曰》篇。作品：《论语辩二篇》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷4第110页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371172' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371172' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371172?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论语辩二篇<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>上篇</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371172")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371172_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371172'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371172'>或问曰。儒者称论语孔子弟子所记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371172_comment'></div>信乎。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371172_comment'></div>未然也。孔子弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371172_comment'></div>曾参最少。少孔子四十六岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371172_comment'></div>曾子老而死。是书记曾子之死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371172_comment'></div>则去孔子也远矣。曾子之死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371172_comment'></div>孔子弟子略无存者矣。吾意曾子弟子之为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371172_comment'></div>何哉。且是书载弟子必以字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371172_comment'></div>独曾子有子不然。由是言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371172_comment'></div>弟子之号之也。然则有子何以称子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371172_comment'></div>曰。孔子之殁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371172_comment'></div>诸弟子以有子为似夫子。立而师之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371172_comment'></div>其后不能对诸子之问。乃叱避而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371172_comment'></div>则固尝有师之号矣。今所记独曾子最后死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371172_comment'></div>予是以知之。盖乐正子春子思之徒与为之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371172_comment'></div>或曰。孔子弟子尝杂记其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371172_comment'></div>然而卒成其书者。曾氏之徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371172_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1371172_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371173' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371173' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371173?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>下篇</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371173_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371173'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371173'>尧曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371173_comment'></div>咨尔舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371173_comment'></div>天之历数在尔躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371173_comment'></div>四海困穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371173_comment'></div>天禄永终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371173_comment'></div>舜亦以命禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371173_comment'></div>子小子履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371173_comment'></div>敢用元牡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371173_comment'></div>敢昭告于皇天后土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371173_comment'></div>有罪不敢赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371173_comment'></div>万方有罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371173_comment'></div>罪在朕躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371173_comment'></div>朕躬有罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371173_comment'></div>无以尔万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371173_comment'></div>或问之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371173_comment'></div>论语书记问对之辞尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371173_comment'></div>今卒篇之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371173_comment'></div>章然有是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371173_comment'></div>何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371173_comment'></div>柳先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371173_comment'></div>论语之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371173_comment'></div>莫大乎是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371173_comment'></div>是乃孔子常常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371173", 1371173, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>讽道</span>之辞云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371173_comment'></div>彼孔子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371173_comment'></div>覆生人之器者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371173_comment'></div>上之尧舜之不遭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371173_comment'></div>而禅不及已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371173_comment'></div>下之无汤之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371173_comment'></div>而已不得为天吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371173_comment'></div>生人无以泽其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371173_comment'></div>日视闻其劳死怨呼<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作乎）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371173_comment'></div>而已之德涸焉无所依而施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371173_comment'></div>故于常常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371173", 1371173, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>讽道</span>云尔而止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371173_comment'></div>此圣人之大志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371173_comment'></div>无容问对于其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371173_comment'></div>弟子或知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371173_comment'></div>或疑之不能明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371173_comment'></div>相与传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371173_comment'></div>故于其为书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371173_comment'></div>卒篇之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371173_comment'></div>严而立之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1371173_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论辩《鬼谷子》一书之怪谬难信。作品：《辩鬼谷子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷4第112页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辩鬼谷子</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371174")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371174'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371174'>元冀好读古书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371174_comment'></div>然甚贤鬼谷子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371174_comment'></div>为其指要几千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371174_comment'></div>鬼谷子要为无取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371174_comment'></div>汉时刘向班固录书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371174_comment'></div>无鬼谷子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371174_comment'></div>鬼谷子后出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371174_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371174", 1371174, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>险盭</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371174", 1371174, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>峭薄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371174_comment'></div>恐其妄言乱世难信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371174_comment'></div>学者宜其不道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371174_comment'></div>而世之言纵横者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371174_comment'></div>时葆其书尤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371174_comment'></div>晚乃益出七术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371174_comment'></div>怪谬异甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371174_comment'></div>不可考校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371174_comment'></div>其言益奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371174_comment'></div>而道益惬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371174_comment'></div>使人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371174", 1371174, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>狙狂</span>失守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371174_comment'></div>而易于陷坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371174_comment'></div>幸矣人之葆之者少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371174_comment'></div>今元子又文之以指要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371174_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371174_comment'></div>其为好术也过矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1371174_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论辩《晏子春秋》一书应列之墨家。作品：《辩晏子春秋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷4第113页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371175' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371175' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371175?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辩晏子春秋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371175")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371175_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371175'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371175'>司马迁读晏子春秋高之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371175_comment'></div>而莫知其所以为书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371175_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371175_comment'></div>晏子为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371175_comment'></div>而人接焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371175_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371175_comment'></div>晏子之后为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371175_comment'></div>皆非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371175_comment'></div>吾疑其墨子之徒有齐人者为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371175_comment'></div>墨好俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371175_comment'></div>晏子以俭名于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371175_comment'></div>故墨子之徒尊著其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371175_comment'></div>以增高为己术者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371175_comment'></div>且其旨多尚同兼爱非乐节用非厚葬久丧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371175_comment'></div>是皆出墨子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371175_comment'></div>又非孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371175_comment'></div>好言鬼事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371175_comment'></div>非儒明鬼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371175_comment'></div>又出墨子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371175_comment'></div>其言问枣及古冶子等尤怪诞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371175_comment'></div>又往往言墨子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371175_comment'></div>闻其道而称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371175_comment'></div>此甚显白者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371175_comment'></div>自刘向歆班彪固父子皆录之儒家中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371175_comment'></div>甚矣数子之不详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371175_comment'></div>盖非齐人不能具其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371175_comment'></div>非墨子之徒则其言不若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371175_comment'></div>后之录诸子书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371175_comment'></div>宜列之墨家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371175_comment'></div>非晏子为墨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371175_comment'></div>为是书者墨之道也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1371175_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论辩道家《亢仓子》一书之空伪。作品：《辩亢仓子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷4第115页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371176' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371176' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371176?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辩亢仓子</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371176")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371176_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371176'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371176'>太史公为庄周列传。称其为书畏累亢桑子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371176_comment'></div>皆空言无事实。今世有亢桑子书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371176_comment'></div>其首篇出庄子。而益以庸言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371176_comment'></div>盖周所云者尚不能有事实。又况取其语而益之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371176_comment'></div>其为空言尤也。刘向班固录书无亢仓子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371176_comment'></div>而今之为术者。乃始为之传注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371176_comment'></div>以教于世。不亦惑乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371176_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1371176_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论辩《鹖冠子》一书乃“好事者伪为”作品：《辩鹖冠子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷4第115页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371177' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371177' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371177?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辩鹖冠子</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371177")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371177_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371177'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371177'>予读贾谊鵩赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371177_comment'></div>嘉其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371177_comment'></div>而学者以为尽出鹖冠子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371177_comment'></div>予往来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371177_comment'></div>求鹖冠子无所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371177_comment'></div>至长沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371177_comment'></div>始得其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371177_comment'></div>读之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371177_comment'></div>尽鄙浅言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371177_comment'></div>唯谊所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371177", 1371177, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>引用</span>为美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371177_comment'></div>馀无可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371177_comment'></div>吾意好事者伪为其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371177_comment'></div>反用鵩赋以文饰之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371177_comment'></div>非谊有所取之决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371177_comment'></div>太史公伯夷列传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371177_comment'></div>称贾子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371177_comment'></div>贪夫殉财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371177_comment'></div>烈士殉名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371177_comment'></div>夸者死权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371177_comment'></div>不称鹖冠子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371177_comment'></div>迁号为博极群书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371177_comment'></div>假令当时有其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371177_comment'></div>迁岂不见耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371177_comment'></div>假令真有鹖冠子书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371177_comment'></div>亦必不取鵩赋以充入之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371177_comment'></div>何以知其然耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371177_comment'></div>曰不类。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1371177_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰碑文记饶娥之事。作品：《饶娥碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷5第135页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371205' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371205' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371205?labeling=true' target='_blank'>饶娥碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371205")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371205_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371205'>饶娥饶人。饶姓娥名。世渔鄱水。娥为室女。渊懿靖专。虽小家。未尝出游。治絺葛供女事循整。乡闾敬式。娥父醉渔。风卒起不能舟。遂以溺死。求尸不得。娥闻父死。走哭水上。三日不食。耳鼻流血。气尽伏死。明日尸出。鼋鱼鼍蛟浮死万数。塞川下流。鄱旁小民。悲感怨号。以为神奇。县人乡人会钱具仪。葬娥鄱水西横道上。追思不足。相与作石。以诏后世。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371205_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371205'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371205'>生德无类。气灵而休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371205_comment'></div>嗟兹孝娥。惟行之周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371205_comment'></div>渊懿含贞。好靖不游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371205_comment'></div>纤葛絺纻。克供以修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371205_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371205", 1371205, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>蒸蒸</span>在家。其父世渔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371205_comment'></div>饮酒不节。死乎风涛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371205_comment'></div>匍匐来哭。号天以呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371205_comment'></div>颜目耳鼻。膏血交流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371205_comment'></div>三日顿踣。气竭形枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371205_comment'></div>父尸既出。孝质已殂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371205_comment'></div>龟鳖鼋鼍。有蛟洎鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371205_comment'></div>充流溢岸。旁出仰浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371205_comment'></div>见怪形异。适与我谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371205_comment'></div>鄱民哀号。或以颂歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371205_comment'></div>齐女色忧。伤槐罢诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371205_comment'></div>赵姬完父。操棹爰讴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371205_comment'></div>肉刑不施。汉美淳于。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371205_comment'></div>烈烈曹娥。水死上虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371205_comment'></div>娥之至德。实与为俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371205_comment'></div>恒人有言。惟教是图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371205_comment'></div>懿兹德女。家世不儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371205_comment'></div>奇行特出。神道莫酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371205_comment'></div>穷哀罔泄。终古以留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371205_comment'></div>乡人好礼。爰立兹邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371205_comment'></div>建铭当道。过者下车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371205_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1371205_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。岳州法剑和尚卒于当地圣安寺，宗元应约撰碑文。作品：《岳州圣安寺无姓和尚碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷6第155页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371213?labeling=true' target='_blank'>岳州圣安寺无姓和尚碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371213")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371213_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371213'>维某年月日。岳州大和尚终于圣安寺。凡为僧若干年。年若干。有名无姓。世莫知其闾里宗族所设施者。有问焉。而以告曰。性吾姓也。其原无初。其冑无终。承于释师。以系道本。吾无姓耶。法剑云者。我名也。实且不有。名恶乎存。吾有名耶。性海吾乡也。法界吾宇也。戒为之墉。惠为之户。以守则固。以居则安。吾闾里不具乎。度门道品。其数无极。菩萨大士。其众无涯。吾与之戚而不吾异也。吾宗族不大乎。其道可闻者如此。而止读法华经金刚般若经。数逾千万。或讥以有为。曰。吾未尝作。呜呼。佛道逾远。异端竞起。唯天台大师为得其说。和尚绍承本统。以顺中道。凡受教者。不失其宗。生物流动。趣向混乱。惟极乐正路为得其归。和尚勤求端悫。以成至愿。凡听信者。不惑其道。或讥以有迹。曰。吾未尝行。始居房州龙兴寺。中徙居是州。作道场于楞伽北峰。不越阃者五十祀。和尚凡所严事。皆世高德。始出家事而依者。曰卓然师。居南阳立山。卒葬岳州。就受戒者。曰道颖师。居荆州。弟子之首曰怀远师。居长沙安国寺。为南岳戒法。岁来侍师。会其终。遂以某月日葬于卓然师塔东若干步。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371213_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371213'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371213'>道本于一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371213_comment'></div>离为异门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371213_comment'></div>以性为姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371213_comment'></div>乃归其根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371213_comment'></div>无名而名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371213_comment'></div>师教是尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371213_comment'></div>假以示物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371213_comment'></div>非吾所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371213_comment'></div>大乡不居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371213_comment'></div>大族不亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371213_comment'></div>渊懿内朗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371213_comment'></div>冲虚外仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371213_comment'></div>圣有遗言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371213_comment'></div>是究是勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371213_comment'></div>惟动惟默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371213_comment'></div>逝如浮云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371213_comment'></div>教久益微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371213_comment'></div>世罕究陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371213_comment'></div>爰有大智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371213_comment'></div>出其真门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371213_comment'></div>师以显示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371213_comment'></div>俾民惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371213_comment'></div>情动生变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371213_comment'></div>物由湮沦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371213_comment'></div>爰授乐国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371213_comment'></div>参乎化源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371213_comment'></div>师以诱导。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371213_comment'></div>俾民不昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371213_comment'></div>道用不作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371213_comment'></div>神行无迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371213_comment'></div>晦明俱如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371213_comment'></div>生死偕寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371213_comment'></div>法付后学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371213_comment'></div>施之无斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371213_comment'></div>葬从我师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371213_comment'></div>无忘真宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371213_comment'></div>荐是昭铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371213_comment'></div>刻兹贞石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371213_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1371213'>其二碑阴记/无姓和尚既居是山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371213_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371213_comment'></div>凡吾之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371213_comment'></div>非在外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371213_comment'></div>吾不动矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371213_comment'></div>宏农杨公炎自道州以宰相徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371213_comment'></div>过焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371213_comment'></div>以为宜居京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371213_comment'></div>强以行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371213_comment'></div>不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371213_comment'></div>将以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371213_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371213_comment'></div>愿间岁乃往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371213_comment'></div>明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371213_comment'></div>杨去相位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371213_comment'></div>窜谪南海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371213_comment'></div>终如其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371213_comment'></div>赵郡李萼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371213_comment'></div>辩博人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371213_comment'></div>为岳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371213_comment'></div>盛气欲屈其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371213_comment'></div>闻一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371213_comment'></div>服为弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371213_comment'></div>河东裴藏之举族受教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371213_comment'></div>京兆尹宏农杨公某以其隐地为道场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371213_comment'></div>奉和州刺史张惟俭买西峰广其居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371213_comment'></div>凡以货利委堂下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371213_comment'></div>不可选纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371213_comment'></div>受之亦无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371213_comment'></div>将终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371213_comment'></div>命其大弟子怀远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371213_comment'></div>授以道妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371213_comment'></div>终不告其姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371213_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371213_comment'></div>周人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371213_comment'></div>信州刺史李某为之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371213_comment'></div>长沙谢楚为行状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371213_comment'></div>博陵崔行俭为性守一篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371213_comment'></div>凡以文辞道和尚功德者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371213_comment'></div>不可悉数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371213_comment'></div>宏农公自馀杭命以行状来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371213_comment'></div>怀远师自长沙以传来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371213_comment'></div>使予为碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371213_comment'></div>既书其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371213_comment'></div>故又假其阴以记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1371213_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。岳州法剑和尚卒于当地圣安寺，宗元应约撰碑文，同作碑阴文。作品：《岳州圣安寺无姓和尚碑阴记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷6第158页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371213?labeling=true' target='_blank'>岳州圣安寺无姓和尚碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371213")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371213_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371213'>维某年月日。岳州大和尚终于圣安寺。凡为僧若干年。年若干。有名无姓。世莫知其闾里宗族所设施者。有问焉。而以告曰。性吾姓也。其原无初。其冑无终。承于释师。以系道本。吾无姓耶。法剑云者。我名也。实且不有。名恶乎存。吾有名耶。性海吾乡也。法界吾宇也。戒为之墉。惠为之户。以守则固。以居则安。吾闾里不具乎。度门道品。其数无极。菩萨大士。其众无涯。吾与之戚而不吾异也。吾宗族不大乎。其道可闻者如此。而止读法华经金刚般若经。数逾千万。或讥以有为。曰。吾未尝作。呜呼。佛道逾远。异端竞起。唯天台大师为得其说。和尚绍承本统。以顺中道。凡受教者。不失其宗。生物流动。趣向混乱。惟极乐正路为得其归。和尚勤求端悫。以成至愿。凡听信者。不惑其道。或讥以有迹。曰。吾未尝行。始居房州龙兴寺。中徙居是州。作道场于楞伽北峰。不越阃者五十祀。和尚凡所严事。皆世高德。始出家事而依者。曰卓然师。居南阳立山。卒葬岳州。就受戒者。曰道颖师。居荆州。弟子之首曰怀远师。居长沙安国寺。为南岳戒法。岁来侍师。会其终。遂以某月日葬于卓然师塔东若干步。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371213_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371213'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371213'>道本于一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371213_comment'></div>离为异门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371213_comment'></div>以性为姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371213_comment'></div>乃归其根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371213_comment'></div>无名而名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371213_comment'></div>师教是尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371213_comment'></div>假以示物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371213_comment'></div>非吾所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371213_comment'></div>大乡不居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371213_comment'></div>大族不亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371213_comment'></div>渊懿内朗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371213_comment'></div>冲虚外仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371213_comment'></div>圣有遗言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371213_comment'></div>是究是勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371213_comment'></div>惟动惟默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371213_comment'></div>逝如浮云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371213_comment'></div>教久益微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371213_comment'></div>世罕究陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371213_comment'></div>爰有大智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371213_comment'></div>出其真门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371213_comment'></div>师以显示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371213_comment'></div>俾民惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371213_comment'></div>情动生变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371213_comment'></div>物由湮沦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371213_comment'></div>爰授乐国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371213_comment'></div>参乎化源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371213_comment'></div>师以诱导。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371213_comment'></div>俾民不昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371213_comment'></div>道用不作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371213_comment'></div>神行无迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371213_comment'></div>晦明俱如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371213_comment'></div>生死偕寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371213_comment'></div>法付后学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371213_comment'></div>施之无斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371213_comment'></div>葬从我师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371213_comment'></div>无忘真宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371213_comment'></div>荐是昭铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371213_comment'></div>刻兹贞石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371213_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1371213'>其二碑阴记/无姓和尚既居是山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371213_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371213_comment'></div>凡吾之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371213_comment'></div>非在外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371213_comment'></div>吾不动矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371213_comment'></div>宏农杨公炎自道州以宰相徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371213_comment'></div>过焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371213_comment'></div>以为宜居京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371213_comment'></div>强以行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371213_comment'></div>不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371213_comment'></div>将以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371213_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371213_comment'></div>愿间岁乃往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371213_comment'></div>明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371213_comment'></div>杨去相位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371213_comment'></div>窜谪南海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371213_comment'></div>终如其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371213_comment'></div>赵郡李萼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371213_comment'></div>辩博人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371213_comment'></div>为岳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371213_comment'></div>盛气欲屈其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371213_comment'></div>闻一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371213_comment'></div>服为弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371213_comment'></div>河东裴藏之举族受教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371213_comment'></div>京兆尹宏农杨公某以其隐地为道场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371213_comment'></div>奉和州刺史张惟俭买西峰广其居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371213_comment'></div>凡以货利委堂下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371213_comment'></div>不可选纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371213_comment'></div>受之亦无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371213_comment'></div>将终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371213_comment'></div>命其大弟子怀远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371213_comment'></div>授以道妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371213_comment'></div>终不告其姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371213_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371213_comment'></div>周人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371213_comment'></div>信州刺史李某为之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371213_comment'></div>长沙谢楚为行状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371213_comment'></div>博陵崔行俭为性守一篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371213_comment'></div>凡以文辞道和尚功德者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371213_comment'></div>不可悉数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371213_comment'></div>宏农公自馀杭命以行状来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371213_comment'></div>怀远师自长沙以传来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371213_comment'></div>使予为碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371213_comment'></div>既书其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371213_comment'></div>故又假其阴以记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1371213_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。南岳云峰和尚卒，宗元撰碑文。作品：《南岳云峰寺和尚碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷7第163页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371209' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371209' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371209?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南岳云峰寺和尚碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371209")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371209_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371209'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371209'>乾元元年某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371209_comment'></div>皇帝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371209_comment'></div>予欲俾慈仁怡愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371209_comment'></div>洽于生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371209_comment'></div>惟浮图道允迪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371209_comment'></div>乃命五岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371209_comment'></div>求厥元德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371209_comment'></div>以仪于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371209_comment'></div>惟兹岳上于尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371209_comment'></div>其首曰云峰大师法證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371209_comment'></div>凡莅事五十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371209_comment'></div>贞元十七年乃没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371209_comment'></div>其徒曰诠曰远曰振曰巽曰素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371209_comment'></div>凡三千馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371209_comment'></div>其长老咸来言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371209_comment'></div>吾师轨行峻特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371209_comment'></div>器宇宏大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371209_comment'></div>有来受律者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371209_comment'></div>吾师示之以为尊严整齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371209_comment'></div>明列义类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371209_comment'></div>而人知其所不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371209_comment'></div>有来求道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371209_comment'></div>吾师示之以为高广通达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371209_comment'></div>一其空有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371209_comment'></div>而人知其所必至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371209_comment'></div>元臣硕老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371209_comment'></div>稽首受教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371209_comment'></div>髫童毁齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371209_comment'></div>踊跃执役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371209_comment'></div>故从吾师之命而度者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371209_comment'></div>凡五万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371209_comment'></div>吾师冬不燠裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371209_comment'></div>饥不丰食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371209_comment'></div>每岁会其类读群经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371209_comment'></div>俾圣言毕出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371209_comment'></div>有以见其大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371209_comment'></div>又率其仵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371209_comment'></div>伐木辇土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371209_comment'></div>作佛塔庙洎经典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371209_comment'></div>俾象法益广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371209_comment'></div>有以见其用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371209_comment'></div>将没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371209_comment'></div>告门人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371209_comment'></div>吾自始学至去世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371209_comment'></div>未尝有作焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371209_comment'></div>然后知其动无不虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371209_comment'></div>静无不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371209_comment'></div>生而未始来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371209_comment'></div>殁而未始往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371209_comment'></div>其道备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371209_comment'></div>愿刻山石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371209_comment'></div>知教之所以大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371209_comment'></div>其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371209_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_1371209'>师之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371209_comment'></div>尊严有耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371209_comment'></div>恭天子之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371209_comment'></div>维大中以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371209_comment'></div>后学是效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371209_comment'></div>师之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371209_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1371209", 1371209, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>简峻</span>渊默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371209_comment'></div>柔惠以直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371209_comment'></div>涣焉而不积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371209_comment'></div>同焉而皆得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371209_comment'></div>兹道惟则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371209_comment'></div>师之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371209_comment'></div>勤劳以庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371209_comment'></div>维奥秘必通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371209_comment'></div>以兴祠宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371209_comment'></div>遐迩攸从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371209_comment'></div>师之族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371209_comment'></div>由虢而郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371209_comment'></div>世德有奕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371209_comment'></div>从佛于释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371209_comment'></div>师之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371209_comment'></div>七十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371209_comment'></div>惟终始罔缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371209_comment'></div>丕冒遗烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371209_comment'></div>厥徒<span id='poem_sentence_78_1371209_comment'></div>维宪言是徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371209_comment'></div>溥博恢宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371209_comment'></div>如川之增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371209_comment'></div>如云之兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371209_comment'></div>如岳之不崩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371209_comment'></div>终古其承之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_84_1371209_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。南岳云峰和尚卒，门徒修塔以纪，应其弟子大乘师重巽之请，宗元撰塔铭。作品：《南岳云峰和尚塔铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷7第165页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div
