class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371265")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371265_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371265'>云峰和尚。族郭氏。号法證。(一作澄)为竺乾道五十有七年。年七十有八。贞元十七年九月十七日终。十月二十七日葬。凡度学者五万人。为弟子者三千人。色厉而仁。行峻而周。道广而不尤。功高而不有。毅然居山之北峰。以为仪表。世之所谓贤人大臣者。至南方。咸所严事。由其内者。闻大师之言律义。莫不震动悼惧。如听誓命。由其外者。闻大师之称道要。莫不悽欷欣踊。如获肆宥。故时推人师。则专其首。诏求教宗。则冠其位。披山伐木。崇构法宇。则地得其胜。捐衣去食。广阅群经。则理得其深。其道实勤。而其心无求。自大师化去。教亦随丧。呜呼。大师之葬。门人慕号。长老愁痛。遂相与以为兹塔。砻石峻整。植木蓊茂。凡衡山无与为比者。然而未有能纪其事。余既与大乘师重巽游。巽其徒也。亟为余言。故为其铭。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371265_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371265'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371265'>苞元极兮韬大方。威而仁兮幽以光。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371265_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371265'>行峻洁兮貌斋庄。气混溟兮德洋洋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371265_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371265'>演大律兮离毫芒。度群有兮耀柔刚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371265_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371265'>栋宇立兮像法彰。文字阐兮圣言扬。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371265_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371265'>诏褒列兮宅南方。道之广兮用其常。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1371265_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1371265'>后是式兮宜久长。閟灵室兮记崇冈。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1371265_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1371265'>即元石兮垂文章。学者慕兮哀无疆。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1371265_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1371265'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1371265_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。衡山中院大律师父希操卒后二十七年，应其弟子诫盈和尚之请，宗元撰塔铭。作品：《衡山中院大律师塔铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷7第173页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371266' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371266' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371266?labeling=true' target='_blank'>衡山中院大律师塔铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371266")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371266_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371266'>衡山中院大律师曰希操。没年五十七。既没二十七年。其大弟子诫盈。奉公之遗事。愿铭塔石。公昝姓。凡去儒为释者三十一祀。掌律度众者二十六会。南尼戒法。坏而复正。由公而大兴。衡岳佛寺。毁而再成。由公而丕变。故当世之士若李丞相泌。道未尝屈。睹公而稽首。尊之不名。出世之士若石廪瓒公。言未尝形。遇公而叹息。推以护法。是以建功之始。则震雷大风示其兆。灭迹之际。则陨星黑祲告其期。斯为神怪。不可度已。故其与物大同。终始无争。受学之众。他莫能偕也。凡所受教。若华严照公兰若贞公荆州至公律公。皆大士。凡所授教。若惟瑗道郢灵干惟正惠常诫盈。皆闻人。呜呼。始终哉。为之铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371266_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371266'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371266'>首有承兮卒有传。革大讹兮持法权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371266_comment'></div>众之至兮志益虔。雷发兆兮功已宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371266_comment'></div>星告妖兮寿不延。灵变化兮迎大仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371266_comment'></div>砻兹石兮垂万年。世有坏兮德无迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371266_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1371266_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　被贬出京时，业师陆质卒。到永州后，陆质将葬，宗元撰墓表详述其学术思想。作品：《文通先生陆给事墓表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷9第208页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371217' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371217' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371217?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故给事中皇太子侍读陆文通先生墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371217")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371217_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371217'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371217'>孔子作春秋千五百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371217_comment'></div>以名为传者五家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371217_comment'></div>今用其三焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371217_comment'></div>秉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371217", 1371217, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>觚牍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371217_comment'></div>焦思虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371217_comment'></div>以为论注疏说者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371217_comment'></div>百千人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371217_comment'></div>攻讦狠怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371217_comment'></div>以词气相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371217", 1371217, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>击排冒没</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371217_comment'></div>其为书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371217_comment'></div>处则充栋宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371217_comment'></div>出则汗牛马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371217_comment'></div>或合而隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371217_comment'></div>或乖而显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371217_comment'></div>后之学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371217_comment'></div>穷老尽气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371217_comment'></div>左视右顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371217_comment'></div>莫得而本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371217_comment'></div>则专其所学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371217_comment'></div>以訾其所异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371217_comment'></div>党枯竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371217_comment'></div>护朽骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371217_comment'></div>以至于父子伤夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371217_comment'></div>君臣诋悖者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371217_comment'></div>前世多有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371217_comment'></div>甚矣圣人之难知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371217_comment'></div>有吴郡人陆先生质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371217_comment'></div>与其师友天水啖助洎赵匡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371217_comment'></div>能知圣人之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371217_comment'></div>故春秋之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371217_comment'></div>及是而光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371217_comment'></div>使庸人小童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371217_comment'></div>皆可积学以入圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371217_comment'></div>传圣人之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371217_comment'></div>是其德岂不侈大矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371217_comment'></div>先生字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371217_comment'></div>既读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371217_comment'></div>得制作之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371217_comment'></div>而获其师友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371217_comment'></div>于是合古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371217_comment'></div>散同异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371217_comment'></div>联之以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371217_comment'></div>累之以文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371217_comment'></div>盖讲道者二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371217_comment'></div>书而志之者又十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371217_comment'></div>其事大备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371217_comment'></div>为春秋集注十篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371217_comment'></div>辩疑七篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371217_comment'></div>微指二篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371217_comment'></div>明章大中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371217_comment'></div>发露公器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371217_comment'></div>其道以圣人为主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371217_comment'></div>以尧舜为的。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371217_comment'></div>包罗旁魄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371217_comment'></div>胶轕下上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371217_comment'></div>而不出于正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371217_comment'></div>其法以文武为首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371217_comment'></div>以周公为翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371217_comment'></div>揖让升降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371217_comment'></div>好恶喜怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371217_comment'></div>而不过乎物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371217_comment'></div>既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371217_comment'></div>以授世之聪明之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371217_comment'></div>使陈而明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371217_comment'></div>故其书出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371217_comment'></div>而先生为巨儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371217_comment'></div>用是为天子诤臣尚书郎国子博士给事中皇太子侍读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371217_comment'></div>皆得其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371217_comment'></div>刺二州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371217_comment'></div>守人知仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371217_comment'></div>永贞年侍东宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371217_comment'></div>言其所学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371217_comment'></div>为古君臣图以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371217_comment'></div>而道达乎上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371217_comment'></div>是岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371217_comment'></div>嗣天子践阼而理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371217_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1371217", 1371217, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>尊优</span>师儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371217_comment'></div>先生以疾闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371217_comment'></div>临问加礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371217_comment'></div>某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371217_comment'></div>终于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371217_comment'></div>某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371217_comment'></div>葬于某郡某里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371217_comment'></div>呜呼先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371217_comment'></div>道之存也以书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371217_comment'></div>不及施于政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371217_comment'></div>道之行也以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371217_comment'></div>不及睹其理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371217_comment'></div>门人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1371217", 1371217, id='poem_sentence_90_1371217_comment'></div>以先生为能文圣人之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371217_comment'></div>通于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371217_comment'></div>遂相与谥曰文通先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371217_comment'></div>后若干祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371217_comment'></div>有学其书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371217_comment'></div>过其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371217_comment'></div>哀其道之所由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371217_comment'></div>乃作石以表碣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1371217_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。为覃季子撰墓志，记其个人品格及学术成就。作品：《覃季子墓铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷11第289页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371254' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371254' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371254?labeling=true' target='_blank'>覃季子墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371254")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371254_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371254'>覃季子。其人生爱书。贫甚。尤介特。不苟受施。读经传言其说数家。推太史公班固书下到今。横竖钩贯。又且数十家。通为书。号覃子史纂。又取鬻老管庄子思晏孟下到今。其术自儒墨名法。至于狗彘草木。凡有益于世者。为子纂。又百有若干家。笃于闻。不以仕为事。黜陟使取其书以氏名闻。除太子校书。某年月日。死永州祁阳县某乡。将死。叹曰。宁有闻而穷乎。将无闻而丰乎。宁介而踬乎。将溷而遂乎。葬其乡。后若干年。柳先生来永州。戚其文不大于世。求其墓以石铭。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371254_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371254'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371254'>困其独。丰其辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371254_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1371254_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。马家女雷五年十五即病逝，临终时请父母求柳公志文于墓，宗元应其遗愿，撰墓志。作品：《马室女雷五葬志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷13第349页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371227' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371227' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371227?labeling=true' target='_blank'>马氏女雷五葬志</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371227")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371227_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371227'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371227'>马室女雷五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371227_comment'></div>父曰师儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371227_comment'></div>业进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371227_comment'></div>雷五生巧慧异甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371227_comment'></div>凡事丝纩文绣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371227_comment'></div>不类人所为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371227_comment'></div>余睹之甚骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371227_comment'></div>家贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371227_comment'></div>岁不易衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371227_comment'></div>而天姿洁清修严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371227_comment'></div>恒若簪珠玑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371227_comment'></div>衣纨縠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371227_comment'></div>寥然不易为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371227", 1371227, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>尘垢</span>杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371227_comment'></div>年十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371227_comment'></div>病死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371227_comment'></div>后二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371227_comment'></div>葬永州东郭东里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371227_comment'></div>以其姨母为嫂于余也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371227_comment'></div>将死曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371227_comment'></div>吾闻柳公尝巧我慧我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371227_comment'></div>今不幸死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371227_comment'></div>安得公之文志我于墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371227_comment'></div>其父母不敢以云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371227_comment'></div>葬之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371227_comment'></div>余乃闻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371227_comment'></div>既而闵焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371227_comment'></div>以攻石之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371227_comment'></div>遂为砂书元砖。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_833_1371186_comment'></div>又使至代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_834_1371186_comment'></div>天集厥命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_835_1371186_comment'></div>惟德受之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_836_1371186_comment'></div>允怠以弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_837_1371186_comment'></div>天又祐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_838_1371186_comment'></div>初汤臣挚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_839_1371186_comment'></div>后兹承辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_840_1371186_comment'></div>何卒官汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_841_1371186_comment'></div>尊食宗绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_842_1371186_comment'></div>汤挚之合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_843_1371186_comment'></div>祚以久食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_844_1371186_comment'></div>昧始以昭末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_845_1371186_comment'></div>克庸成绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_846_1371186_comment'></div>勋阖梦生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_847_1371186_comment'></div>少离散亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_848_1371186_comment'></div>何壮武厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_849_1371186_comment'></div>能流厥严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_850_1371186_comment'></div>光徵梦祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_851_1371186_comment'></div>憾离以厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_852_1371186_comment'></div>仿偟激覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_853_1371186_comment'></div>而勇益德迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_854_1371186_comment'></div>彭铿斟雉帝何飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_855_1371186_comment'></div>受寿永多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_856_1371186_comment'></div>夫何久长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_857_1371186_comment'></div>铿羹于帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_858_1371186_comment'></div>圣孰嗜味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_859_1371186_comment'></div>夫死自暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_860_1371186_comment'></div>而谁飨以俾寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_861_1371186_comment'></div>中央共牧后何怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_862_1371186_comment'></div>蚁微命力何固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_863_1371186_comment'></div>螝齧已毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_864_1371186_comment'></div>不以外肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_865_1371186_comment'></div>细腰群螫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_866_1371186_comment'></div>夫何足病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_867_1371186_comment'></div>惊女采薇鹿何祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_868_1371186_comment'></div>比至回水萃何喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_869_1371186_comment'></div>萃回偶昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_870_1371186_comment'></div>鹿曷祐以女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_871_1371186_comment'></div>兄有噬犬弟何欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_872_1371186_comment'></div>易之以百两卒无禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_873_1371186_comment'></div>针欲兄爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_874_1371186_comment'></div>以快侈富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_875_1371186_comment'></div>愈多厥车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_876_1371186_comment'></div>卒逐以旅。<div class='inline'
