id='poem_sentence_879_1371186_comment'></div>伏匿穴处爰何云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_880_1371186_comment'></div>荆勋作师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_881_1371186_comment'></div>夫何长先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_882_1371186_comment'></div>悟过改更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_883_1371186_comment'></div>我又何言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_884_1371186_comment'></div>咨吟于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_885_1371186_comment'></div>胡若之很。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_886_1371186_comment'></div>严坠谊殄丁厥任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_887_1371186_comment'></div>合行违匿固若所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_888_1371186_comment'></div>咿嚘忿毒意谁与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_889_1371186_comment'></div>丑齐徂秦啖厥诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_890_1371186_comment'></div>谗登狡庸咈以施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_891_1371186_comment'></div>甘恬祸凶亟锄夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_892_1371186_comment'></div>愎不可化徒若罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_893_1371186_comment'></div>吴光争国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_894_1371186_comment'></div>久予是胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_895_1371186_comment'></div>何环穿自闾社邱陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_896_1371186_comment'></div>爰出子文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_897_1371186_comment'></div>吾告堵敖以不长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_898_1371186_comment'></div>何试上自予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_899_1371186_comment'></div>忠名弥彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_900_1371186_comment'></div>阖绰厥武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_901_1371186_comment'></div>滋以侈颓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_902_1371186_comment'></div>于菟不可以作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_903_1371186_comment'></div>怠焉庸归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_904_1371186_comment'></div>款吾敖之阏以旅尸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_905_1371186_comment'></div>诚若名不尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_906_1371186_comment'></div>曷极而辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_907_1371186_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。以柳子和贺者对答为题，撰文抒写贬后极度哀戚之情。作品：《对贺者》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷14第361页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371184' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371184' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371184?labeling=true' target='_blank'>对贺者</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371184")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371184_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371184'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371184'>柳子以罪贬永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371184_comment'></div>有自京师来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371184_comment'></div>既见曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371184_comment'></div>予闻子坐事逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371184_comment'></div>予适将唁子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371184_comment'></div>今予视子之貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371184_comment'></div>浩浩然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371184_comment'></div>能是达矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371184_comment'></div>予无以唁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371184_comment'></div>敢更以为贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371184_comment'></div>柳子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371184_comment'></div>子诚以貌乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371184_comment'></div>则可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371184_comment'></div>然吾岂若是而无志者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371184_comment'></div>姑以戚戚为无益乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371184_comment'></div>道故若是而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371184_comment'></div>吾之罪大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371184_comment'></div>会主上以宽理人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371184_comment'></div>用和天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371184_comment'></div>故吾得在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371184_comment'></div>凡吾之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371184", 1371184, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>贬斥</span>幸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371184_comment'></div>而又戚戚焉何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371184_comment'></div>夫为天子尚书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371184_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371184", 1371184, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>谋画</span>无所陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371184_comment'></div>而群比以为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371184_comment'></div>蒙耻遇僇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371184_comment'></div>以待不测之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371184_comment'></div>苟人尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371184_comment'></div>有不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371184", 1371184, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>汗栗</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371184", 1371184, "Clauses/28/Comments/1")'>危厉</span>偲偲然者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371184_comment'></div>吾尝静处以思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371184_comment'></div>独行以求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371184_comment'></div>自以上不得自列于圣朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371184_comment'></div>下无以奉宗祀近邱墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371184_comment'></div>徒欲苟生幸存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371184_comment'></div>庶几<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371184", 1371184, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>似续</span>之不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371184_comment'></div>是以傥荡其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371184_comment'></div>倡佯其形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371184_comment'></div>茫乎若升高以望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371184_comment'></div>溃乎若乘海而无所往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371184_comment'></div>故其容貌如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371184_comment'></div>子诚以浩浩而贺我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371184_comment'></div>其孰承之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371184_comment'></div>嘻笑之怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371184_comment'></div>甚乎裂眦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371184_comment'></div>长歌之哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371184_comment'></div>过乎恸哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371184_comment'></div>庸讵知吾之浩浩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371184_comment'></div>非戚戚之尤者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371184_comment'></div>子休矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1371184_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。以渔者和智伯对话为题，撰寓言文，讽刺贪得无厌而终自取灭亡者。作品：《设渔者对智伯》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷14第351页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371182' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371182' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371182?labeling=true' target='_blank'>设渔者对智伯</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371182")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371182_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371182'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371182'>智氏既灭范中行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371182_comment'></div>志益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371182_comment'></div>合韩魏围赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371182_comment'></div>水晋阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371182_comment'></div>智伯瑶乘舟以临赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371182_comment'></div>且又往来观水之所自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371182_comment'></div>务速取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371182_comment'></div>群渔者有一人坐渔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371182_comment'></div>智伯怪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371182_comment'></div>问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371182_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371182_comment'></div>若渔几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371182_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371182_comment'></div>臣始渔于河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371182_comment'></div>中渔于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371182_comment'></div>今主大兹水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371182_comment'></div>臣是以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371182_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371182_comment'></div>若之渔何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371182_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371182_comment'></div>臣幼而好渔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371182_comment'></div>始臣之渔于河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371182_comment'></div>有鲨鱮鳣鰋者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371182_comment'></div>不能自食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371182_comment'></div>以好臣之饵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371182_comment'></div>日收者百焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371182_comment'></div>臣以为小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371182_comment'></div>去而之龙门之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371182_comment'></div>伺大鲔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371182_comment'></div>夫大鲔之来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371182_comment'></div>从鲂鲤数万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371182_comment'></div>垂涎流沫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371182_comment'></div>后者得食焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371182_comment'></div>然其饥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371182_comment'></div>亦返吞其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371182_comment'></div>愈肆其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371182_comment'></div>逆流而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371182_comment'></div>慕为螭龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371182_comment'></div>及夫抵大石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371182_comment'></div>乱飞涛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371182_comment'></div>折鳍秃翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371182_comment'></div>颠倒顿踣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371182_comment'></div>顺流而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371182_comment'></div>宛委<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371182", 1371182, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>冒懵</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371182_comment'></div>环坻溆而不能出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371182_comment'></div>向之从鱼之大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371182_comment'></div>幸而啄食之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371182_comment'></div>臣亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1371182", 1371182, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>徒手</span>得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371182_comment'></div>犹以为小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371182_comment'></div>闻古之渔有任公子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371182_comment'></div>其得益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371182_comment'></div>于是去而之海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371182_comment'></div>北浮于碣石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371182_comment'></div>求大鲸焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371182_comment'></div>臣之具未及施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371182_comment'></div>见大鲸驱群鲛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371182_comment'></div>逐肥鱼于渤澥之尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371182_comment'></div>震动大海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371182_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1371182", 1371182, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>簸掉</span>巨岛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371182_comment'></div>一啜而食若舟者数十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371182_comment'></div>勇而未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371182_comment'></div>贪而不能止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371182_comment'></div>北蹙于碣石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371182_comment'></div>槁焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371182_comment'></div>向之为食者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371182_comment'></div>反相与食之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371182_comment'></div>臣亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1371182", 1371182, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>徒手</span>得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371182_comment'></div>犹以为小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371182_comment'></div>闻古之渔有太公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371182_comment'></div>其得益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371182_comment'></div>钓而得文王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371182_comment'></div>于是舍而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371182_comment'></div>智伯曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371182_comment'></div>今若遇我也如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371182_comment'></div>渔者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371182_comment'></div>向者臣已言其端矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371182_comment'></div>始晋之侈家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371182_comment'></div>若栾氏祁氏郤氏羊舌氏以十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371182_comment'></div>不能自保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371182_comment'></div>以贪晋国之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371182_comment'></div>而不见其害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371182_comment'></div>主之家与五卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371182_comment'></div>尝裂而食之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371182_comment'></div>是无异鲨鱮鳣鰋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371182_comment'></div>脑流骨腐于主之故鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371182_comment'></div>可以惩矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371182_comment'></div>然而犹不肯悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371182_comment'></div>又有大者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371182_comment'></div>若范氏中行氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371182_comment'></div>贪人之土田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371182_comment'></div>侵人之势力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371182_comment'></div>慕为诸侯而不见其害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371182_comment'></div>主与三卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371182_comment'></div>又裂而食之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371182_comment'></div>脱其鳞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371182_comment'></div>鲙其肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371182_comment'></div>刳其肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371182_comment'></div>断其首而弃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371182_comment'></div>鲲鲕遗允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371182_comment'></div>莫不备俎豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371182_comment'></div>是无异夫大鲔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371182_comment'></div>可以惩矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371182_comment'></div>然而犹不肯悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371182_comment'></div>又有大者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371182_comment'></div>吞范中行以益其肥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371182_comment'></div>犹以为不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371182_comment'></div>力愈大而求食愈无餍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371182_comment'></div>驱韩魏以为群鲛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371182_comment'></div>以逐赵之肥鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371182_comment'></div>而不见其害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371182_comment'></div>贪肥之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371182_comment'></div>将不止于赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371182_comment'></div>臣见韩魏惧其将及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371182_comment'></div>亦幸王之蹙于晋阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371182_comment'></div>其目动矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371182_comment'></div>而主乃慠然以为咸在机俎之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371182_comment'></div>方磨其舌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371182_comment'></div>抑臣有恐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371182_comment'></div>今辅果舍族而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371182_comment'></div>不肯同祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371182_comment'></div>段规怨深而造谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371182_comment'></div>主之不悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371182_comment'></div>臣恐主为大鲸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371182_comment'></div>首解于邯郸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371182_comment'></div>鬣摧于安邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371182_comment'></div>胸披于上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371182_comment'></div>尾断于中山之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371182_comment'></div>而肠流于大陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371182_comment'></div>为鲜薧以充三家子孙之腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371182_comment'></div>臣所以大惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371182_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371182_comment'></div>主之勇力强大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371182_comment'></div>于文王何有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371182_comment'></div>智伯不悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371182_comment'></div>然终以不悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371182_comment'></div>于是韩魏与赵合灭智氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371182_comment'></div>其地三分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_136_1371182_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。以永州父老和柳先生问答起废之事为题，抒写久不起用之苦闷。作品：《起废答》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷15第436页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371189' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371189' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371189?labeling=true' target='_blank'>起废答</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371189")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371189_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371189'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371189'>柳先生既会州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371189_comment'></div>即治事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371189_comment'></div>还游于愚溪之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371189_comment'></div>溪上聚黧老壮齿十有一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371189_comment'></div>谡足以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371189_comment'></div>列植以庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371189_comment'></div>卒事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371189_comment'></div>相顾加进而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371189_comment'></div>今兹是州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371189_comment'></div>起废者二焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371189_comment'></div>先生其闻而知之欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371189_comment'></div>答曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371189_comment'></div>谁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371189_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371189_comment'></div>东祠躄浮图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371189_comment'></div>中厩病颡之驹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371189_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371189_comment'></div>若是何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371189_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371189_comment'></div>凡为浮图道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371189_comment'></div>都邑之会必有师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371189_comment'></div>师善为律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371189_comment'></div>以敕戒始学者与女释者甚尊严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371189_comment'></div>且优游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371189_comment'></div>躄浮图有师道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371189_comment'></div>少而病躄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371189_comment'></div>日愈以剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371189_comment'></div>居东祠十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371189_comment'></div>扶服舆曳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371189_comment'></div>未尝及人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371189_comment'></div>仄匿愧恐殊甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371189_comment'></div>今年他有师道者悉以故去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371189_comment'></div>始学者与女释者伥伥无所师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371189_comment'></div>遂相与出躄浮图以为师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371189_comment'></div>盥濯之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371189_comment'></div>扶持之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371189_comment'></div>壮者执舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371189_comment'></div>幼者前驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371189_comment'></div>被以其衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371189_comment'></div>导以其旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371189_comment'></div>怵惕疾视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371189_comment'></div>引且翼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371189_comment'></div>躄浮图不得已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371189_comment'></div>凡师数百生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371189_comment'></div>日馈饮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371189_comment'></div>时献巾帨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371189_comment'></div>洋洋也举莫敢踰其制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371189_comment'></div>中厩病颡之驹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371189_comment'></div>颡之病亦且十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371189_comment'></div>色元不厖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371189_comment'></div>无异技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371189_comment'></div>硿然大耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371189_comment'></div>然以其病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371189_comment'></div>不得齿他马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371189_comment'></div>食斥弃异皂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371189_comment'></div>恒少食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371189_comment'></div>屏立摈辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371189_comment'></div>掣顿异甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371189_comment'></div>垂首披耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371189_comment'></div>悬涎属地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371189_comment'></div>凡厩之马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371189_comment'></div>无肯为伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371189_comment'></div>会今刺史以御史中丞来莅吾邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371189_comment'></div>屏弃群驷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371189_comment'></div>舟以溯江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371189_comment'></div>将至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371189_comment'></div>无以为乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371189_comment'></div>厩人咸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371189_comment'></div>病颡驹大而不厖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371189_comment'></div>可秣饰焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371189_comment'></div>他马巴僰痹狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371189_comment'></div>无可当吾刺史者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371189_comment'></div>于是众牵驹上燥土大庑下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371189_comment'></div>荐之席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371189_comment'></div>縻之丝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371189_comment'></div>浴剔蚤鬋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371189_comment'></div>刮恶除洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371189_comment'></div>莝以雕胡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371189_comment'></div>秣以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1371189", 1371189, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>香萁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371189_comment'></div>错贝鳞纕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371189_comment'></div>凿金文羁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371189_comment'></div>络以和铃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371189_comment'></div>缨以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1371189", 1371189, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>朱绥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371189_comment'></div>或膏其鬣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371189_comment'></div>或劘其脽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371189_comment'></div>御夫尽饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371189_comment'></div>然后敢持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371189_comment'></div>除道履石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371189_comment'></div>立之水涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371189_comment'></div>幢旟前罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371189_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1371189", 1371189, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>杠盖</span>后随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371189_comment'></div>千失翼卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371189_comment'></div>当道上驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371189_comment'></div>抗首<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1371189", 1371189, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>出臆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371189_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1371189", 1371189, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>震奋</span>遨嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371189_comment'></div>当是时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371189_comment'></div>若有知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371189_comment'></div>岂不曰宜乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371189_comment'></div>先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371189_comment'></div>是则然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371189_comment'></div>叟将何以教我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371189_comment'></div>黧老进曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371189_comment'></div>今先生来吾州亦十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371189_comment'></div>足轶疾风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371189_comment'></div>鼻知膻香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371189_comment'></div>腹溢儒书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371189_comment'></div>口盈宪章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371189_comment'></div>包今统古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371189_comment'></div>进退齐良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371189_comment'></div>然而一废不复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371189_comment'></div>曾不若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1371189", 1371189, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>躄足</span>涎颡之犹有遭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371189_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1371189", 1371189, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>朽人</span>不识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371189_comment'></div>敢以其惑愿质之先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371189_comment'></div>先生笑且答曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371189_comment'></div>叟过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371189_comment'></div>彼之病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371189_comment'></div>病乎足与颡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371189_comment'></div>吾之病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371189_comment'></div>病乎德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371189_comment'></div>又彼之遭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371189_comment'></div>遭其无耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371189_comment'></div>今朝廷洎四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371189_comment'></div>豪杰林立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371189_comment'></div>谋猷川行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371189_comment'></div>群谈角智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371189_comment'></div>列坐争英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371189_comment'></div>披华发辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371189_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_127_1371189", 1371189, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>挥喝</span>雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371189_comment'></div>老者育德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371189_comment'></div>少者驰声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371189_comment'></div>丱角羁贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371189_comment'></div>排厕鳞征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371189_comment'></div>一位暂缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371189_comment'></div>百事交并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371189_comment'></div>骈倚悬足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371189_comment'></div>曾不得逞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371189_comment'></div>不若是州之乏释师大马也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371189_comment'></div>而吾以德病伏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371189_comment'></div>岂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_138_1371189", 1371189, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>躄足</span>涎颡之可望哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371189_comment'></div>叟之言过昭昭矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371189_comment'></div>无重吾罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371189_comment'></div>于是黧老壮齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371189_comment'></div>相视以喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371189_comment'></div>且吁曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371189_comment'></div>谕之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371189_comment'></div>拱揖而旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371189_comment'></div>为先生病焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_146_1371189_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。以客与柳先生问答为题，抒写贬谪之情。作品：《答问》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷15第432页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371188' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371188' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371188?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答问</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371188")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371188_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371188'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371188'>有问柳先生者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371188_comment'></div>先生貌类学古者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371188_comment'></div>然遭有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371188_comment'></div>不能奋厥志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371188_comment'></div>独被罪辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371188_comment'></div>废斥伏匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371188_comment'></div>交游<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>解散</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371188_comment'></div>羞与为戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371188_comment'></div>生平向慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371188_comment'></div>毁书灭迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371188_comment'></div>他人有恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371188_comment'></div>指诱增益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371188_comment'></div>身居下流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371188_comment'></div>为谤薮泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371188_comment'></div>骂先生者不忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371188_comment'></div>陵先生者无谪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371188_comment'></div>遇揖目动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371188_comment'></div>闻言心惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371188_comment'></div>时行草野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371188_comment'></div>不知何适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371188_comment'></div>独何劣耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371188_comment'></div>观今之贤智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371188_comment'></div>莫不舒翘扬英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371188_comment'></div>推类援朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371188_comment'></div>謺足天庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371188_comment'></div>魁垒恢张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371188_comment'></div>群驱连行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371188_comment'></div>奇谋高论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371188_comment'></div>左右抗声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371188_comment'></div>出入翕忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371188_comment'></div>拥门填扃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371188_comment'></div>一言出口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371188_comment'></div>流光垂荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371188_comment'></div>岂非伟耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371188_comment'></div>先生虽读古人书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371188_comment'></div>自谓知理道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371188_comment'></div>识事机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371188_comment'></div>而其施为若是其悖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371188_comment'></div>狼狈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>摈僇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371188_comment'></div>何以自表于今之世乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371188_comment'></div>先生答曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371188_comment'></div>敬闻命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371188_comment'></div>然客言仆知理道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371188_comment'></div>识事机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371188_comment'></div>过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371188_comment'></div>仆懵夫屈伸去就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371188_comment'></div>触罪受辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371188_comment'></div>幸得联肢体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371188_comment'></div>完肌肤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371188_comment'></div>犹食人之食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371188_comment'></div>衣人之衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371188_comment'></div>用人之货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371188_comment'></div>无耕织<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>居贩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371188_comment'></div>然而活给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371188_comment'></div>羞愧恐慄之不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371188_comment'></div>今客又推当世贤智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371188_comment'></div>以深致诮责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371188_comment'></div>吾缧囚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371188_comment'></div>逃山林入江海无路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371188_comment'></div>其何以容吾躯乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371188_comment'></div>愿客少假声气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371188_comment'></div>使得详其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371188_comment'></div>次其论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371188_comment'></div>客曰何取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371188_comment'></div>先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371188_comment'></div>仆少尝学问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371188_comment'></div>不根师说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371188_comment'></div>心信古书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371188_comment'></div>以为凡事皆易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371188_comment'></div>不折之以当世急务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371188_comment'></div>徒知开口而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371188_comment'></div>闭目而息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371188_comment'></div>挺而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371188_comment'></div>踬而伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371188_comment'></div>不穷喜怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371188_comment'></div>不究曲直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371188_comment'></div>冲罗陷阱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371188_comment'></div>不知颠踣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371188_comment'></div>愚憃狂悖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371188_comment'></div>若是甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371188_comment'></div>又何以恭客之教而承厚德哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371188_comment'></div>今之世工拙不欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371188_comment'></div>贤不肖明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371188_comment'></div>其显进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371188_comment'></div>语其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371188_comment'></div>则皆茫洋深闳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371188_comment'></div>端贞鲠亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371188_comment'></div>苞并涵养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371188_comment'></div>与道俱往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371188_comment'></div>而仆乃蹇浅窄僻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371188_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>跳浮</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/90/Comments/1")'>嚄唶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371188_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>抵瑕</span>陷厄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371188_comment'></div>固不足以趑趄批捩而追其迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371188_comment'></div>举其理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371188_comment'></div>则皆谟明渊沈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371188_comment'></div>剖微穷深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371188_comment'></div>劈析是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371188_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>校度</span>古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371188_comment'></div>而仆乃缄钳默塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371188_comment'></div>耗眊窒惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371188_comment'></div>抉异探怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371188_comment'></div>起幽作匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371188_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>攸攸</span>恤恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371188_comment'></div>卒自祸贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371188_comment'></div>固不足以睢盱激昂而效其则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371188_comment'></div>言其学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371188_comment'></div>则皆总揽罗络。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371188_comment'></div>横竖杂博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371188_comment'></div>天旋地缩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371188_comment'></div>鬼神交错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371188_comment'></div>而仆乃单庸撇莩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371188_comment'></div>离疏空虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371188_comment'></div>窃听道涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371188_comment'></div>颛嚚蒙愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371188_comment'></div>不知所如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371188_comment'></div>固不足以抗颜摇舌而与之俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371188_comment'></div>称其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371188_comment'></div>则皆汗漫辉煌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371188_comment'></div>呼嘘阴阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371188_comment'></div>轇轕三元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371188_comment'></div>陶镕帝皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371188_comment'></div>而仆乃朴鄙艰涩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371188_comment'></div>培塿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_122_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>潗湁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371188_comment'></div>毫联缕缉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371188_comment'></div>尘出坱入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371188_comment'></div>固不足以摅摛踊跃而涉其级。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371188_comment'></div>兹四者悬判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371188_comment'></div>虽庸童小女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371188_comment'></div>皆知其不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371188_comment'></div>而又裹以罪恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371188_comment'></div>缠以羁絷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371188_comment'></div>客从而挤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371188_comment'></div>不亦忍乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371188_comment'></div>且夫白羲騄耳之得康庄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371188_comment'></div>逐奔星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371188_comment'></div>先飘风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371188_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_136_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>跛驴</span>不出泥滓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371188_comment'></div>黄钟元间之登清庙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371188_comment'></div>铿天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371188_comment'></div>动神祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371188_comment'></div>而呜呜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_140_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>咬哇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371188_comment'></div>不入里耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371188_comment'></div>西子毛嫱之蹈后宫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371188_comment'></div>皦朝日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371188_comment'></div>焕浮云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371188_comment'></div>而无盐逐于乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371188_comment'></div>蛟龙之腾于天渊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371188_comment'></div>弥六合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371188_comment'></div>泽万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371188_comment'></div>而虾与蛭不离尺水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371188_comment'></div>卓诡倜傥之士之遇明世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371188_comment'></div>用智能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371188_comment'></div>显功烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371188_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_153_1371188", 1371188, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>么眇</span>连蹇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371188_comment'></div>颠顿披靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371188_comment'></div>固其所也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371188_comment'></div>客又何怪哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371188_comment'></div>且夫一涉险阨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371188_comment'></div>惩而不再者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371188_comment'></div>烈士之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371188_comment'></div>知其不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371188_comment'></div>而速已者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371188_comment'></div>君子之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371188_comment'></div>吾将窃取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1371188_comment'></div>以没吾世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371188_comment'></div>不亦可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371188_comment'></div>乃歌曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371188_comment'></div>尧舜之修兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371188_comment'></div>禹益之忧兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371188_comment'></div>能者任而愚者休兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371188_comment'></div>跹跹蓬藋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371188_comment'></div>乐吾囚兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1371188_comment'></div>文墨之彬彬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1371188_comment'></div>足以舒吾愁兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1371188_comment'></div>已乎已乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1371188_comment'></div>曷之求乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1371188_comment'></div>客乃笑而去。</div><div id='poem_sentence_176_1371188_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文论《论语》之“乘桴”作品：《乘桴说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷16第459页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371163' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371163' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371163?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乘桴说</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371163")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371163_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371163'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371163'>子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371163_comment'></div>道不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371163_comment'></div>乘桴浮于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371163_comment'></div>从我者其由与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371163_comment'></div>子路闻之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371163_comment'></div>子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371163_comment'></div>由也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371163_comment'></div>好勇过我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371163_comment'></div>无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371163", 1371163, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>取材</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371163_comment'></div>说曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371163_comment'></div>海与桴与材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371163_comment'></div>皆喻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371163_comment'></div>海者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371163_comment'></div>圣人至道之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371163_comment'></div>所以浩然而游息者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371163_comment'></div>桴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371163_comment'></div>所以游息之具也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371163_comment'></div>材者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371163_comment'></div>所以为桴者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371163_comment'></div>易曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371163_comment'></div>复其见天地之心乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371163_comment'></div>则天地之心者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371163_comment'></div>圣人之海也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371163_comment'></div>复者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371163_comment'></div>圣人之桴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371163_comment'></div>所以复者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371163_comment'></div>桴之材也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371163_comment'></div>孔子自以拯生人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371163_comment'></div>不得行乎其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371163_comment'></div>将复于至道而游息焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371163_comment'></div>谓由也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371163_comment'></div>勇于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371163", 1371163, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>闻义</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371163_comment'></div>果于避世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371163_comment'></div>故许其从之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371163_comment'></div>其终曰无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371163", 1371163, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>取材</span>云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371163_comment'></div>言子路徒勇于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1371163", 1371163, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>闻义</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371163_comment'></div>果于避世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371163_comment'></div>而未得所以为复者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371163_comment'></div>此以退子路兼人之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371163_comment'></div>而明复之难耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371163_comment'></div>然则有其材以为其桴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371163_comment'></div>而游息于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371163_comment'></div>其圣人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371163_comment'></div>子谓颜渊曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371163_comment'></div>用之则行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371163_comment'></div>舍之则藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371163_comment'></div>唯我与尔有是夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371163_comment'></div>由是而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371163_comment'></div>以此追庶几之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371163_comment'></div>则回近得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371163_comment'></div>而曰其由也与者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371163_comment'></div>当是叹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371163_comment'></div>回死矣夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371163_comment'></div>或问曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371163_comment'></div>子必圣人之云尔乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371163_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371163_comment'></div>吾何敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371163_comment'></div>吾以广异闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371163_comment'></div>且使遁世者得吾言以为学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371163_comment'></div>其于无闷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371163_comment'></div>揵焉而已矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1371163_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。感猛禽鹘不食所取暖足之鸟、并放之以报恩事，作寓言文以抒悲慨。作品：《鹘说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷16第450页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371159?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鹘说</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371159")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371159_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371159'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371159'>有鸷曰鹘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371159_comment'></div>巢于长安荐福浮图有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371159_comment'></div>浮图之人室宇于其下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371159_comment'></div>伺之甚熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371159_comment'></div>为予说之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371159_comment'></div>冬日之夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371159_comment'></div>是鹘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371159_comment'></div>必取鸟之盈握者完而致之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371159_comment'></div>以燠其爪掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371159_comment'></div>左右易之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371159_comment'></div>旦则执而上浮图之跂焉纵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371159_comment'></div>延其首以望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371159_comment'></div>极其所如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371159_comment'></div>往必背而去焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371159_comment'></div>苟东矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371159_comment'></div>则是日也不东逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371159_comment'></div>南北西亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371159_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371159_comment'></div>孰谓爪吻毛翮之物而不为仁义器耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371159_comment'></div>是固无号位爵禄之欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371159_comment'></div>里闾亲戚朋友之爱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371159_comment'></div>出乎鷇卵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371159_comment'></div>而知攫食决裂之事尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371159_comment'></div>不为其他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371159_comment'></div>凡食类之饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371159_comment'></div>唯旦为甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371159_comment'></div>今忍而释之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371159_comment'></div>以有报也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371159_comment'></div>是不亦卓然有立者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371159_comment'></div>用其力而爱其死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371159_comment'></div>以忘其饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371159_comment'></div>又远而违之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371159_comment'></div>非仁义之道耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371159_comment'></div>恒其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371159_comment'></div>一其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371159_comment'></div>不欺其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371159_comment'></div>斯固世之所难得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371159_comment'></div>予又疾夫今之说曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371159_comment'></div>以喣喣而默徐徐而俯者善之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371159_comment'></div>以翘翘而厉炳炳而白者暴之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371159_comment'></div>今夫枭鸺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371159_comment'></div>晦于昼而神于夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371159_comment'></div>鼠不穴寝庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371159_comment'></div>循墙而走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371159_comment'></div>是不近于喣喣者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371159_comment'></div>今夫鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371159_comment'></div>其立<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1371159", 1371159, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>趯然</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371159_comment'></div>其动砉然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371159_comment'></div>其视的然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371159_comment'></div>其鸣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1371159", 1371159, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>革然</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371159_comment'></div>是不近于翘翘者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371159_comment'></div>由是而观其所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371159_comment'></div>则今之说为未得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371159_comment'></div>孰若鹘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371159_comment'></div>吾愿从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371159_comment'></div>毛耶翮耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371159_comment'></div>胡不我施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371159_comment'></div>寂寥泰清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371159_comment'></div>乐以忘饥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1371159_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。以龙女谪后重返天宫之事为题，作文寄寓贬后心境。作品：《谪龙说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷16第464页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371165' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371165' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371165?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谪龙说</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371165")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371165_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371165'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371165'>扶风马孺子言年十五六时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371165_comment'></div>在泽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371165_comment'></div>与群儿戏郊亭上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371165_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371165", 1371165, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>顷然</span>有奇女坠地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371165_comment'></div>有光煜然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371165_comment'></div>被緅裘白纹之里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371165_comment'></div>首步摇之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371165_comment'></div>贵游年少骇且悦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371165_comment'></div>稍狎焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371165_comment'></div>奇女頩尔怒曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371165_comment'></div>不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371165_comment'></div>吾故居钧天帝宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371165_comment'></div>下上星辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371165_comment'></div>呼嘘阴阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371165_comment'></div>薄蓬莱羞昆崙而不即者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371165_comment'></div>帝以吾心侈大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371165_comment'></div>怒而谪来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371165_comment'></div>七日当复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371165_comment'></div>今吾虽辱尘土中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371165_comment'></div>非若俪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371165_comment'></div>吾复且害若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371165_comment'></div>众恐而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371165_comment'></div>遂入居佛寺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371165", 1371165, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>讲室</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371165_comment'></div>及期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371165_comment'></div>进取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371165", 1371165, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>杯水</span>饮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371165_comment'></div>嘘成云气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371165_comment'></div>五色<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371165", 1371165, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>翛翛</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371165_comment'></div>因取裘反之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371165_comment'></div>化为白龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371165_comment'></div>徊翔登天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371165_comment'></div>莫知其所终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371165_comment'></div>亦怪甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371165_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371165_comment'></div>非其类而狎其谪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371165_comment'></div>不可哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371165_comment'></div>孺子不妄人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371165_comment'></div>故记其说。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1371165_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文记观《八骏图》之感想与议论。作品：《观八骏图说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷16第468页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371168' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371168' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371168?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观八骏图说</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371168")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371168_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371168'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371168'>古之书有记周穆王驰八骏升昆崙之墟者。后之好事者为之图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371168_comment'></div>宋齐以下传之。观其状甚怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371168_comment'></div>咸若骞若翔。若龙凤麒麟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371168_comment'></div>若螳螂然。其书尤不经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371168_comment'></div>世多有。然不足采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371168_comment'></div>世闻其骏也。因以异形求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371168_comment'></div>则其言圣人者亦类是矣。故传伏羲曰牛首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371168_comment'></div>女娲曰其形类蛇。孔子如倛头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371168_comment'></div>若是者甚众。孟子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371168_comment'></div>何以异于人哉。尧舜与人同耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371168_comment'></div>今夫马者。驾而乘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371168_comment'></div>或一里而汗。或十里而汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371168_comment'></div>或数十里百里而不汗者。视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371168_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371168", 1371168, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>毛物</span>尾鬣。四足而蹄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371168_comment'></div>龁草饮水。一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371168_comment'></div>推是而至于骏。亦类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371168_comment'></div>今夫人有不足为负贩者。有不足为吏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371168_comment'></div>有不足为士大夫者。有足为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371168_comment'></div>视之。圆首横目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371168_comment'></div>食谷而饱肉。絺而凊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371168_comment'></div>裘而燠。一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371168_comment'></div>推是而至于圣。亦类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371168_comment'></div>然则伏羲氏女娲氏孔子氏。是亦人而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371168_comment'></div>骅骝白羲山子之类。若果有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371168_comment'></div>是亦马而已矣。又乌得为牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371168_comment'></div>为蛇。为倛头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371168_comment'></div>为龙凤麒麟螳螂然也哉。然而世之慕骏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371168_comment'></div>不求之马。而必是图之似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371168_comment'></div>故终不能有得于骏也。慕圣人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371168_comment'></div>不求之人。而必若牛若蛇若倛头之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371168_comment'></div>故终不能有得于圣人也。诚是天下有是图者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371168_comment'></div>举而焚之。则骏马与圣人出矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371168_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1371168_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文说永州捕蛇与苛政之事。作品：《捕蛇者说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷16第455页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371161' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371161' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371161?labeling=true' target='_blank'>捕蛇者说</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371161")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371161_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371161'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371161'>永州之野产异蛇。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>黑质</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>白章</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371161_comment'></div>触草木尽死。以齧人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371161_comment'></div>无御之者。然得而腊之以为饵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371161_comment'></div>可以已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>大风</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>挛踠</span>瘘疠。去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>死肌</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371161_comment'></div>杀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>三虫</span>。其始大医以王命聚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371161_comment'></div>岁赋其二。募有能捕之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371161_comment'></div>当其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>租入</span>。永之人争<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>奔走</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371161_comment'></div>有蒋氏者。专其利三世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371161_comment'></div>问之。则曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>吾祖</span>死<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>于是</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371161_comment'></div>吾父死<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>于是</span>。今吾嗣为之十二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371161_comment'></div>几死者数矣。言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371161_comment'></div>貌若甚戚者。予悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371161_comment'></div>且曰。若毒之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371161_comment'></div>予将告于莅事者。更若役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371161_comment'></div>复若赋。则如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371161_comment'></div>蒋氏大戚。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>汪然</span>出涕曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371161_comment'></div>君将哀而生之乎。则吾斯役之不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371161_comment'></div>未若复吾赋不幸之甚也。向吾不为斯役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371161_comment'></div>则久已病矣。自吾氏三世居是乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371161_comment'></div>积于今六十岁矣。而乡邻之生日蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371161_comment'></div>殚其地之出。竭其庐之入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371161_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>号呼</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/42/Comments/1")'>转徙</span>。饥渴而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>顿踣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371161_comment'></div>触风雨。犯寒暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371161_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>呼嘘</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/46/Comments/1")'>毒疠</span>。往往而死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371161_comment'></div>相籍也。曩与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>吾祖</span>居者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371161_comment'></div>今其室十无一焉。与吾父居者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371161_comment'></div>今其室十无二三焉。与吾居十二年者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371161_comment'></div>今其室十无四五焉。非死即徙尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371161_comment'></div>而吾以捕蛇独存。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>悍吏</span>之来吾乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371161_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>叫嚣</span>乎东西。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>隳突</span>乎南北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371161_comment'></div>哗然而骇者。虽鸡狗不得宁焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371161_comment'></div>吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>恂恂</span>而起。视其缶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371161_comment'></div>而吾蛇尚存。则弛然而卧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371161_comment'></div>谨食之。时而献焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371161_comment'></div>退而甘食其土之有。以尽吾齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371161_comment'></div>盖一岁之犯死者二焉。其馀则熙熙而乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371161_comment'></div>岂若吾乡邻之旦旦有是哉。今虽死乎此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371161_comment'></div>比吾乡邻之死。则已后矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371161_comment'></div>又安敢毒耶。予闻而愈悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371161_comment'></div>孔子曰。苛政猛于虎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371161_comment'></div>吾尝疑乎是。今以蒋氏观之犹信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371161_comment'></div>呜呼。孰知赋敛之毒有甚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>于是</span>蛇者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371161_comment'></div>故为之说。以俟夫观<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371161", 1371161, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>人风</span>者得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371161_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1371161_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文，以罴食猎人之事，讽喻现世。作品：《罴说 》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷16第467页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371167' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371167' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371167?labeling=true' target='_blank'>罴说</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371167")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371167_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371167'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371167'>鹿畏䝙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371167_comment'></div>䝙畏虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371167_comment'></div>虎畏罴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371167_comment'></div>罴之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371167_comment'></div>被发人立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371167_comment'></div>绝有力而甚害人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371167_comment'></div>楚之南有猎者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371167_comment'></div>能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371167", 1371167, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>吹竹</span>为百兽之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371167_comment'></div>昔云<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作寂寂）</span>持弓矢罂火而即之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371167_comment'></div>为鹿鸣以感其类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371167_comment'></div>伺其至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371167_comment'></div>发火而射之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371167_comment'></div>䝙闻其鹿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371167_comment'></div>趋而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371167_comment'></div>其人恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371167_comment'></div>因为虎而骇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371167_comment'></div>䝙走而虎至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371167_comment'></div>愈恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371167_comment'></div>则又为罴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371167_comment'></div>虎亦亡去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371167_comment'></div>罴闻而求其类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371167_comment'></div>至则人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371167_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371167", 1371167, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>捽搏</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371167", 1371167, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>挽裂</span>而食之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371167_comment'></div>今夫不善内而恃外者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371167_comment'></div>未有不为罴之食也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1371167_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文，以受宠麋鹿被外犬撕食之事，讽刺赴势之徒。作品：《临江之麋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷19第534页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371179' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371179' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371179?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三戒<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>临江之麋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371179")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371179_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371179'>吾恒恶世之人。不知推己之本。而乘物以逞。或依势以干非其类。出技以怒强。窃时以肆暴。然卒迨于祸。有客谈麋驴鼠三物。似其事。作三戒。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371179_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371179'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371179'>临江之人。畋得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371179", 1371179, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>麋麑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371179_comment'></div>畜之。入门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371179_comment'></div>群犬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371179", 1371179, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>垂涎</span>。扬尾皆来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371179_comment'></div>其人怒怛之。自是日抱就犬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371179_comment'></div>习示之。使勿动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371179_comment'></div>稍使麋与之戏。积久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371179_comment'></div>犬皆如人意。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371179", 1371179, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>麋麑</span>稍大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371179_comment'></div>忘己之麋也。以为犬良我友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371179_comment'></div>抵触偃仆益狎。犬畏主人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371179_comment'></div>与之俯仰甚善。然时啖其舌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371179_comment'></div>三年。麋出门外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371179_comment'></div>见外犬在道甚众。走欲与为戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371179_comment'></div>外犬见而喜且怒。共杀食之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371179_comment'></div>狼籍道上。麋至死终不悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371179_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1371179_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文，以黔之驴被虎吞食之事，讽刺无德无能之徒。作品：《黔之驴》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷19第534页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371180' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371180' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371180?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三戒<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>黔之驴</a><span
