class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371180'>黔无驴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371180_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371180", 1371180, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>好事</span>者船载以入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371180_comment'></div>至则无可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371180_comment'></div>放之山下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371180_comment'></div>虎见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371180_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371180", 1371180, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>庞然大物</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371180_comment'></div>以为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371180_comment'></div>蔽林间窥之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371180_comment'></div>稍出近之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371180_comment'></div>憖憖然莫相知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371180_comment'></div>他日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371180_comment'></div>驴一鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371180_comment'></div>虎大骇远遁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371180_comment'></div>以为且噬己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371180_comment'></div>甚恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371180_comment'></div>然往来视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371180_comment'></div>觉无异能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371180_comment'></div>益习其声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371180_comment'></div>又近出前后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371180_comment'></div>终不敢搏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371180_comment'></div>稍近益狎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371180_comment'></div>荡倚冲冒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371180_comment'></div>驴不胜怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371180_comment'></div>蹄之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371180_comment'></div>虎因喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371180_comment'></div>计之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371180_comment'></div>技止此耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371180_comment'></div>因跳踉大㘚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371180_comment'></div>断其喉尽其肉乃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371180_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371180_comment'></div>形之庞也类有德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371180_comment'></div>声之宏也类有能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371180_comment'></div>向不出其技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371180_comment'></div>虎虽猛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371180_comment'></div>疑畏卒不敢取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371180_comment'></div>今若是焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371180_comment'></div>悲夫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1371180_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文，以永州某人因迷信而纵容家中老鼠横行之事，讽喻现世。作品：《永某氏之鼠》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷19第535页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371181' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371181' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371181?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三戒<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>永某氏之鼠</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371181")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371181_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371181'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371181'>永有某氏者。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371181", 1371181, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>畏日</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371181", 1371181, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>拘忌</span>特甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371181_comment'></div>以为己生岁直子。鼠子神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371181_comment'></div>因爱鼠。不畜猫犬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371181_comment'></div>禁僮勿击鼠。仓廪庖厨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371181_comment'></div>悉以恣鼠不问。由是鼠相告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371181_comment'></div>皆来某氏。饱食而无祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371181_comment'></div>某氏室无完器。椸无完衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371181_comment'></div>饮食大率鼠之馀也。昼累累与人兼行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371181_comment'></div>夜则窃齧斗暴。其声万状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371181_comment'></div>不可以寝。终不厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371181_comment'></div>数岁。某氏徙居他州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371181_comment'></div>后人来居。鼠为态如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371181_comment'></div>其人曰。是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371181", 1371181, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>阴类</span>恶物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371181_comment'></div>盗暴尤甚。且何以至是乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371181_comment'></div>假五六猫。阖门撤瓦灌穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371181_comment'></div>购童<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371181", 1371181, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>罗捕</span>之。杀鼠如邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371181_comment'></div>弃之隐处。臭数月乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371181_comment'></div>呜呼。彼以其饱食无祸为可恒也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371181_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1371181_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文，传记江湖浪人李赤之“病心”事迹，讽喻现世。作品：《李赤传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371275' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371275?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李赤传</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371275")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371275_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371275'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371275'>李赤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371275_comment'></div>江湖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371275", 1371275, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>浪人</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371275_comment'></div>尝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371275_comment'></div>吾善为歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371275_comment'></div>诗类李白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371275_comment'></div>故自号曰李赤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371275_comment'></div>游宣州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371275_comment'></div>州人馆之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371275_comment'></div>其友与俱游者有姻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371275_comment'></div>间累日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371275_comment'></div>乃从之馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371275_comment'></div>赤方与妇人言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371275_comment'></div>其友戏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371275_comment'></div>赤曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371275_comment'></div>是媒我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371275_comment'></div>吾将娶乎是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371275_comment'></div>友大骇曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371275_comment'></div>足下妻固无恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371275_comment'></div>太夫人在堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371275_comment'></div>安得有是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371275_comment'></div>岂狂易病惑耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371275_comment'></div>取绛雪饵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371275_comment'></div>赤不肯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371275_comment'></div>有间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371275_comment'></div>妇人至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371275_comment'></div>又与赤言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371275_comment'></div>即取巾经其脰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371275_comment'></div>赤两手助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371275_comment'></div>舌尽出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371275_comment'></div>其友号而救之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371275_comment'></div>妇人解其巾走去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371275_comment'></div>赤怒曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371275_comment'></div>汝无道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371275_comment'></div>吾将从吾妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371275_comment'></div>汝何为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371275_comment'></div>赤乃就牖间为书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371275_comment'></div>辗而圆封之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371275_comment'></div>又为书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371275_comment'></div>博而封之讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371275_comment'></div>如厕久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371275_comment'></div>其友从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371275_comment'></div>见赤轩厕抱瓮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371275_comment'></div>诡笑而侧视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371275_comment'></div>势且下入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371275_comment'></div>乃倒曳得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371275_comment'></div>又大怒曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371275_comment'></div>吾已升堂面吾妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371275_comment'></div>吾妻之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371275_comment'></div>世固无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371275_comment'></div>堂宇之饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371275_comment'></div>宏大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1371275", 1371275, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>富丽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371275_comment'></div>椒兰之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371275_comment'></div>油然而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371275_comment'></div>顾视汝之世犹溷厕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371275_comment'></div>而吾妻之居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371275_comment'></div>与帝居钧天清都无以异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371275_comment'></div>若何苦余至此哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371275_comment'></div>然后其友知赤之所遭乃厕鬼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371275_comment'></div>聚仆谋曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371275_comment'></div>亟去是厕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371275_comment'></div>遂行宿三十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371275_comment'></div>夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371275_comment'></div>赤又如厕久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371275_comment'></div>从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371275_comment'></div>且复入矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371275_comment'></div>持出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371275_comment'></div>洗其污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371275_comment'></div>众环之以至旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371275_comment'></div>去抵他县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371275_comment'></div>县之吏方宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371275_comment'></div>赤拜揖跪起无异者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371275_comment'></div>酒行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371275_comment'></div>友未及言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371275_comment'></div>饮已而顾赤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371275_comment'></div>则已去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371275_comment'></div>走从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371275_comment'></div>赤入厕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371275_comment'></div>举其床捍门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371275_comment'></div>门坚不可入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371275_comment'></div>其友叫且言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371275_comment'></div>众发墙以入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371275_comment'></div>赤之面陷不洁者半矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371275_comment'></div>又出洗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371275_comment'></div>县之吏更召巫师善咒术者守赤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371275_comment'></div>赤自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371275_comment'></div>夜半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371275_comment'></div>守者怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371275_comment'></div>皆睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371275_comment'></div>及觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371275_comment'></div>更呼而求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371275_comment'></div>见其足于厕外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371275_comment'></div>赤死久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371275_comment'></div>独得尸归其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371275_comment'></div>取其所封书读之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371275_comment'></div>盖与其母妻诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371275_comment'></div>其言辞犹人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371275_comment'></div>柳先生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371275_comment'></div>李赤之传不诬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371275_comment'></div>是其病心而为是耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371275_comment'></div>抑故有厕鬼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371275_comment'></div>赤之名闻江湖间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371275_comment'></div>其始为士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371275_comment'></div>无以异于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371275_comment'></div>一惑于怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371275_comment'></div>而所为若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371275_comment'></div>乃反以世为溷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371275_comment'></div>溷为帝居清都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371275_comment'></div>其属意明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371275_comment'></div>今世皆知笑赤之惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371275_comment'></div>及至是非取与向背决不为赤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371275_comment'></div>几何人耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371275_comment'></div>反修而身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371275_comment'></div>无以欲利好恶迁其神而不返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371275_comment'></div>则幸耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371275_comment'></div>又何暇赤之笑哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_114_1371275_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文，传记妇人河间事迹，以寓现世。作品：《河间传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集卷上第1341页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文，传记长安西市药商宋清之事迹。作品：《宋清传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷17第471页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371271?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋清传</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371271")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371271'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371271'>宋清。长安西部药市人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371271_comment'></div>居善药。有自山泽来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371271_comment'></div>必归宋清氏。清优主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371271_comment'></div>长安医工得清药辅其方。辄易雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371271_comment'></div>咸誉清。疾病<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371271", 1371271, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>疕疡</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371271_comment'></div>亦皆乐就清求药。冀速已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371271_comment'></div>清皆乐然响应。虽不持钱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371271_comment'></div>皆与善药。积券如山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371271_comment'></div>未尝诣取直。或不识遥与券。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371271_comment'></div>清不为辞。岁终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371271_comment'></div>度不能报。辄焚券。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371271_comment'></div>终不复言。市人以其异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371271_comment'></div>皆笑之曰。清<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371271", 1371271, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>蚩妄</span>人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371271_comment'></div>或曰。清其有道者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371271_comment'></div>清闻之曰。清逐利以活妻子耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371271_comment'></div>非有道也。然谓我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371271", 1371271, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>蚩妄</span>者亦谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371271_comment'></div>清居药四十年。所焚券者百数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371271_comment'></div>或至大官。或连数州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371271_comment'></div>受俸博。其馈遗清者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371271_comment'></div>相属于户。虽不能立报而以赊死者千百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371271_comment'></div>不害清之为富也。清之取利远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371271_comment'></div>远故大。岂若小市人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371271_comment'></div>一不得直。则怫然怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371271_comment'></div>再则骂而仇耳。彼之为利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371271_comment'></div>不亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371271", 1371271, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>剪剪</span>乎。吾见蚩之有在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371271_comment'></div>清诚以是得大利。又不为妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371271_comment'></div>执其道不废。卒以富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371271_comment'></div>求者益众。其应益广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371271_comment'></div>或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371271", 1371271, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>斥弃</span>沈废。亲与交视之落然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371271_comment'></div>清不以怠遇其人。必与善药如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371271_comment'></div>一旦复柄用。益厚报清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371271_comment'></div>其远取利皆类此。吾观今之交乎人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371271_comment'></div>炎而附。寒而弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371271_comment'></div>鲜有能类清之为者。世之言徒曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371271", 1371271, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>市道交</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371271_comment'></div>呜呼。清市人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371271_comment'></div>今之交有能望报如清之远者乎。幸而庶几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371271_comment'></div>则天下之穷困废辱得不死亡者众矣。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371271", 1371271, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>市道交</span>岂可以少耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371271_comment'></div>或曰。清非市道人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371271_comment'></div>柳先生曰。清居市不为市之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371271_comment'></div>然而居朝廷居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371271", 1371271, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>官府</span>居庠塾乡党以士大夫自名者。反争为之不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371271_comment'></div>悲夫。然则清非独异于市人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371271_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1371271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文，以小虫蝜蝂贪婪覆灭之事，讽喻现世。作品：《蝜蝂传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷17第483页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蝜蝂传</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371276")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371276'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371276", 1371276, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>蝜蝂</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371276_comment'></div>善负小虫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371276_comment'></div>行遇物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371276_comment'></div>辄持取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371276_comment'></div>卬其首负之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371276_comment'></div>背愈重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371276_comment'></div>虽困剧不止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371276_comment'></div>其背甚涩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371276_comment'></div>物积因不散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371276_comment'></div>卒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371276", 1371276, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>踬仆</span>不能起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371276_comment'></div>人或怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371276_comment'></div>为去其负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371276_comment'></div>苟能行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371276_comment'></div>又持取如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371276_comment'></div>又好上高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371276_comment'></div>极其力不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371276_comment'></div>至坠地死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371276_comment'></div>今世之嗜取者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371276_comment'></div>遇货不避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371276_comment'></div>以厚其室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371276_comment'></div>不知为己累也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371276_comment'></div>唯恐其不积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371276_comment'></div>及其怠而踬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371276_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371276", 1371276, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>黜弃</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371276_comment'></div>迁徙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371276_comment'></div>亦已病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371276_comment'></div>苟能起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371276_comment'></div>又不艾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371276_comment'></div>日思高其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371276_comment'></div>大其禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371276_comment'></div>而贪取滋甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371276_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371276", 1371276, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>近于</span>危坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371276_comment'></div>观前之死亡不知戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371276_comment'></div>虽其形<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371276", 1371276, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>魁然</span>大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371276_comment'></div>其名人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371276_comment'></div>而智则小虫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371276_comment'></div>亦足哀夫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1371276_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作骚体文，借乞巧题材反省正直人格。作品：《乞巧文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷18第487页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371133' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371133' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371133?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞巧文</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371133")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371133_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371133'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371133'>柳子夜归自外庭。有设祠者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371133_comment'></div>●99A1饵馨香。蔬果交罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371133_comment'></div>插竹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>垂绥</span>。剖瓜犬牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371133_comment'></div>且拜且祈。怪而问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371133_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>女隶</span>进曰。今兹秋孟七夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371133_comment'></div>天女之孙将嫔于河鼓。邀而祠者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371133_comment'></div>幸而与之巧。驱去蹇拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371133_comment'></div>手目开利。组纴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>缝制</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371133_comment'></div>将无滞于心焉。为是祷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371133_comment'></div>柳子曰。苟然欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371133_comment'></div>吾亦有所大拙。傥可因是以求去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371133_comment'></div>乃缨弁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>束衽</span>。促武缩气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371133_comment'></div>旁趋曲折。伛偻将事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371133_comment'></div>再拜稽首。称臣而进曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371133_comment'></div>下土之臣。窃闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>天孙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371133_comment'></div>专巧于天。轇轕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>璇玑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371133_comment'></div>经纬星辰。能成文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371133_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>黼黻</span>帝躬。以临下民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371133_comment'></div>钦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>圣灵</span>仰光耀之日久矣。今闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>天孙</span>不乐其独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371133_comment'></div>得贞卜于元龟。将蹈石梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371133_comment'></div>款天津。俪于神夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371133_comment'></div>于汉之滨。两旗开张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371133_comment'></div>中星<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>耀芒</span>。灵气翕欻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371133_comment'></div>兹辰之良。幸而弭节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371133_comment'></div>薄游<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>民间</span>。临臣之庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371133_comment'></div>曲听臣言。臣有大拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371133_comment'></div>智所不化。医所不攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371133_comment'></div>威不能迁。宽不能容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371133_comment'></div>乾坤之量。包含海岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371133_comment'></div>臣身甚微。无所投足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371133_comment'></div>蚁适于垤。蜗休于壳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371133_comment'></div>龟鼋螺蚌。皆有所伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371133_comment'></div>臣物之灵。进退唯辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371133_comment'></div>仿佯为狂。局束为谄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371133_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>吁吁</span>为诈。坦坦为忝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371133_comment'></div>他人有身。动必得宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371133_comment'></div>周旋获笑。颠倒逢嘻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371133_comment'></div>已所尊眤。人或怒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371133_comment'></div>变情徇势。射利抵巇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371133_comment'></div>中心甚憎。为彼所奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371133_comment'></div>忍仇佯喜。悦誉迁随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371133_comment'></div>胡执臣心。常使不移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371133_comment'></div>反人是已。曾不惧疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371133_comment'></div>贬名绝命。不负所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371133_comment'></div>忭嘲似傲。贵者启齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371133_comment'></div>臣旁震惊。彼且不耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371133_comment'></div>叩稽匍匐。言语谲诡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371133_comment'></div>令臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>缩恧</span>。彼则大喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371133_comment'></div>臣若效之。瞋怒丛已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371133_comment'></div>彼诚大巧。臣拙无比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371133_comment'></div>王侯之门。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>狂吠</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/101/Comments/1")'>狴犴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371133_comment'></div>臣到百步。喉喘颠汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371133_comment'></div>睢盱逆走。魄遁神叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371133_comment'></div>欣欣巧夫。徐入纵诞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371133_comment'></div>毛群掉尾。百怒一散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371133_comment'></div>世途昏险。拟步如漆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371133_comment'></div>左低右昂。斗冒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>冲突</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371133_comment'></div>鬼神<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>恐悸</span>。圣智危慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371133_comment'></div>泯焉直透。所至如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371133_comment'></div>是独何工。纵横不恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371133_comment'></div>非天所假。彼智焉出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371133_comment'></div>独啬于臣。恒使玷黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371133_comment'></div>沓沓骞骞。恣口所言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371133_comment'></div>迎知喜恶。默测<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>憎怜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371133_comment'></div>摇唇一发。径中心原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371133_comment'></div>胶加钳夹。誓死无迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371133_comment'></div>探心扼胆。踊跃拘牵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371133_comment'></div>彼虽佯退。胡可得旃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371133_comment'></div>独结臣舌。喑抑衔冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371133_comment'></div>擘眦流血。一辞莫宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371133_comment'></div>胡为赋授。有此奇偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371133_comment'></div>眩耀为文。琐碎排偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371133_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/144/Comments/0")'>抽黄对白</span>。唵哢飞走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371133_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>骈四俪六</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>锦心绣口</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371133_comment'></div>宫沈羽振。笙簧触手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371133_comment'></div>观者舞悦。誇谈雷吼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371133_comment'></div>独溺臣心。使甘老丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371133_comment'></div>嚚昏莽卤。朴钝枯朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371133_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>不期</span>一时。以俟悠久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371133_comment'></div>旁罗万金。不鬻弊帚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371133_comment'></div>跪呈豪杰。投弃不有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371133_comment'></div>眉矉頞蹙。喙唾胸呕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371133_comment'></div>大赧而归。填恨低首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371133_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/166/Comments/0")'>天孙</span>司巧。而穷臣若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371133_comment'></div>卒不余畀。独何酷欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371133_comment'></div>敢愿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>圣灵</span>悔祸。矜臣独艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371133_comment'></div>付与姿媚。易臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/173/Comments/0")'>顽颜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371133_comment'></div>凿臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>方心</span>。规以大圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371133_comment'></div>拔去呐舌。纳以工言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371133_comment'></div>文词婉软。步武轻便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371133_comment'></div>齿牙饶美。眉睫增妍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371133_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/182/Comments/0")'>突梯</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/182/Comments/1")'>卷脔</span>。为世所贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371133_comment'></div>公侯卿士。五属十连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371133_comment'></div>彼独何人。长享终天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371133_comment'></div>言讫。又再拜稽首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371133_comment'></div>俯伏以俟。至夜半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371133_comment'></div>不得命。疲极而睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371133_comment'></div>见有青袖朱裳。手持绛节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371133_comment'></div>而来告曰。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/197/Comments/0")'>天孙</span>告汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371133_comment'></div>汝词良苦。凡汝之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371133_comment'></div>吾所极知。汝择而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371133_comment'></div>嫉彼不为。汝之所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371133_comment'></div>汝自可期。胡不为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371133_comment'></div>而诳我为。汝唯知耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371133_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_104_1371133", 1371133, "Clauses/208/Comments/0")'>谄貌</span>淫辞。宁辱不贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371133_comment'></div>自适其宜。中心已定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371133_comment'></div>胡妄而祈。坚汝之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371133_comment'></div>密汝所持。得之为大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371133_comment'></div>失不污卑。凡吾所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371133_comment'></div>不敢汝施。致命而升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371133_comment'></div>汝慎勿疑。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371133_comment'></div>天之所命。不可中革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371133_comment'></div>泣拜欣受。初悲后怿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371133_comment'></div>抱拙终身。以死谁惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371133_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_114_1371133_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。永州法曹史唐登被水怪螭所害，宗元撰文控诉螭之恶行，呼吁严惩，以投江中。作品：《愬螭文并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷18第504页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371140' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371140' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371140?labeling=true' target='_blank'>愬螭文</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371140")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371140_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371140'>零陵城西有螭。室于江。法曹史唐登浴其涯。螭牵以入。一夕浮水上。吾闻凡山川必有神司之。抑有是耶。于是作愬螭。投之江曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371140_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371140'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371140'>天明地幽。孰主之兮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371140'>寿善夭殇。终何为兮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371140'>堆山酾江。司者谁兮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371140'>突然为人。使有知兮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371140'>畏危虑害。趋走祗兮。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1371140'>父母孔爱。妻子嘻兮。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1371140'>出入公门。不获非兮。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1371140'>浟浟湘流。清且微兮。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1371140'>阴幽洞石。蓄怪螭兮。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1371140'>胡濯兹热。卒无归兮。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1371140'>亲戚叫号。闾里思兮。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1371140'>魂其安游。觐湘累兮。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1371140'>嗟尔怪螭。害江湄兮。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1371140'>游泳重澜。物莫威兮。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1371140'>蟉形决目。潜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371140", 1371140, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>伺窥</span>兮。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1371140'>膏血是利。私自肥兮。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1371140'>岁既大旱。泽莫施兮。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1371140'>妖猾下民。使颠危兮。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1371140'>充心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371140", 1371140, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>饱腹</span>。肆敖嬉兮。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1371140'>洋洋往复。流逶迤兮。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1371140'>惟神高明。胡纵斯兮。<div id='poem_sentence_20_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1371140'>蔑弃无辜。逞怪姿兮。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1371140'>胡不降罚。肃川坻兮。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1371140'>舟者欣欣。游者熙兮。<div id='poem_sentence_23_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1371140'>蒲鱼浸用。吉无疑兮。<div id='poem_sentence_24_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1371140'>牲牷玉帛。人是依兮。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1371140'>匪神之愬。将安期兮。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1371140'>神之有亡。于是推兮。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1371140'>投之北流。心孔悲兮。<div id='poem_sentence_28_1371140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1371140'></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1371140_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰文，借记因不肯舍金而致被溺之事，讽喻现世。作品：《哀溺文并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷18第506页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371141' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371141' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371141?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哀溺文</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371141")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371141_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371141'>零陵之氓咸善游。一日。水暴甚。有五六氓乘小船绝湘水。中济船破。皆游。其一氓尽力而不能寻常。其侣曰。汝善游最也。今何后为。曰。吾腰千钱。重。是以后。曰。何不去之。不应。摇其首。有顷益怠。已济者立岸上呼且号曰。汝愚之甚。蔽之甚。身且死。何以货为。又摇其首。遂溺死。吾哀之。且若是。得不有大货之溺大氓者乎。于是作哀溺。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371141_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371141'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371141'>吾哀溺者之死货兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371141_comment'></div>惟大氓之为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371141_comment'></div>泄涛鼓以风涌兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371141_comment'></div>浩滉荡而无舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371141_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371141", 1371141, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>让禄</span>以辞富兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371141_comment'></div>又旁窥而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371141", 1371141, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>诡求</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371141_comment'></div>手足乱而无如兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371141_comment'></div>负重踰乎崇邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371141_comment'></div>既浮颐而灭膂兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371141_comment'></div>不欲释利而离尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371141_comment'></div>呼号者之莫救兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371141_comment'></div>愈摇首以沈流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371141_comment'></div>发披鬤以舞澜兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371141_comment'></div>魂伥伥而焉游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371141_comment'></div>龟鼋互进以争食兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371141_comment'></div>鱼鲔族而为羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371141_comment'></div>始贪赢以啬厚兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371141_comment'></div>终负祸而怀雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371141_comment'></div>前既没而后不知惩兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371141_comment'></div>更揽取而无时休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371141_comment'></div>哀兹氓之蔽愚兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371141_comment'></div>反贼己而从仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371141_comment'></div>不量多以自谏兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371141_comment'></div>姑指幸者而为谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371141_comment'></div>夫人固灵于鸟鱼兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371141_comment'></div>胡昧罻而蒙钩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371141_comment'></div>大者死大兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371141_comment'></div>小者死小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371141_comment'></div>善游虽最兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371141_comment'></div>卒以道夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371141_comment'></div>与害偕行兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371141_comment'></div>以死自绕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371141_comment'></div>推今而鉴古兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371141_comment'></div>鲜克以保其生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371141_comment'></div>衣宝焚纣兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371141_comment'></div>专利灭荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371141_comment'></div>豺狼死而犹饿兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371141_comment'></div>牛腹尸而不盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371141_comment'></div>民既贸贸而无知兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371141_comment'></div>故与彼咸谥为氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371141_comment'></div>死者不足哀兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371141_comment'></div>冀中人之为余再更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371141_comment'></div>噫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1371141_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文，借骂尸虫，讽刺批评现世。作品：《骂尸虫文并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷18第491页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371134' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371134' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371134?labeling=true' target='_blank'>骂尸虫文</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371134")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371134_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371134'>有道士言。人皆有尸虫三。处腹中。伺人隐微失误。辄籍记。日庚申。幸其人之昏睡。出谗于帝以求飨。以是人多谪过。疾疠夭死。柳子特不信。曰。吾闻聪明正直者为神。帝。神之尤者。其为聪明正直宜大也。安有下比阴秽小虫。纵其狙诡。延其变诈。以害于物。而又悦之以飨。其为不宜也殊甚。吾意斯虫若果为是。则帝必将怒而戮之。投于下土。以殄其类。俾夫人咸得安其性命。而苛慝不作。然后为帝也。余既处卑。不得质之于帝。而嫉斯虫之说。为文而骂之。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371134_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371134'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371134'>来尸虫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371134_comment'></div>汝曷不自形其形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371134_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371134", 1371134, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>阴幽</span>诡仄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371134_comment'></div>而寓乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371134_comment'></div>以贼厥灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371134_comment'></div>膏肓是处兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371134_comment'></div>不择秽卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371134_comment'></div>潜觑默听兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371134_comment'></div>导人为非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371134_comment'></div>冥持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371134", 1371134, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>札牍</span>兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371134_comment'></div>摇动祸机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371134_comment'></div><span class='link' "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>拳缩</span>兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371134_comment'></div>宅体险微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371134_comment'></div>以曲为形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371134_comment'></div>以邪为质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371134_comment'></div>以仁为凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371134_comment'></div>以僭为吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371134_comment'></div>以淫谀谄诬为族类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371134_comment'></div>以中正和平为罪疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371134_comment'></div>以通行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371134", 1371134, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>直遂</span>为颠蹶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371134_comment'></div>以逆施反斗为安佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371134_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371134", 1371134, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>谮下谩上</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371134_comment'></div>恒其心术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371134_comment'></div>妒人之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371134_comment'></div>幸人之失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371134_comment'></div>利昏伺睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371134_comment'></div>旁睨窃出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371134_comment'></div>走谗于帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371134_comment'></div>遽入自屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371134_comment'></div>羃然无声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371134_comment'></div>其意乃毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371134_comment'></div>求味已口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371134_comment'></div>胡人之恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371134_comment'></div>彼脩蛔恙心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371134_comment'></div>外搜疥疠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371134_comment'></div>下索瘘痔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371134_comment'></div>侵人肌肤。<div id='poem_sentence_49_1371134_comment'></div>答汝谗慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371134_comment'></div>叱付九关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371134_comment'></div>贻虎豹食。<div id='poem_sentence_53_1371134_comment'></div>荷帝之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371134_comment'></div>是则宜然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371134_comment'></div>何利之得。<div id='poem_sentence_63_1371134_comment'></div>乃施于刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371134_comment'></div>群邪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1371134", 1371134, class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371134_comment'></div>祸无所伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371134_comment'></div>下民百禄。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371135_comment'></div>圣主取焉。以建家国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371135_comment'></div>亘为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371135", 1371135, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>栋楹</span>。齐为阃阈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371135_comment'></div>外隅<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_7_1371135_comment'></div>欹形诡状。曲程诈力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371135_comment'></div>制类奇邪。用绝绳墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371135_comment'></div>支不得舒。胁不遑息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371135_comment'></div>余胡斯蓄。以乱人极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371135_comment'></div>追咎厥始。惟物之残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371135_comment'></div>禀气失中。遭生不完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371135_comment'></div>托地<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371135", 1371135, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>硗垤</span>。反时燠寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371135_comment'></div><span class='link' "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>癃蹇</span>艰难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371135_comment'></div>不可以遂。遂亏其端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371135_comment'></div>离奇诘屈。缩恧巑岏。<div id='poem_sentence_41_1371135_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1371135_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作骚体文，以蝮蛇喻说恶人。作品：《宥蝮蛇文并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷18第496页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371136' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371136' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371136?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宥蝮蛇文</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371136")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371136_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371136'>家有僮。善执蛇。晨持一蛇来谒曰。是为蝮蛇。犯于人。死不治。又善伺人。闻人咳喘步骤。辄不胜其毒。捷取巧噬肆其害。然或慊不得于人。则愈怒。反齧草木。草木立死。后人来触死茎。犹堕指挛腕肿足为废病。必杀之。是不可留。余曰。汝恶得之。曰。得之榛中。曰。榛中若是者可既乎。曰。不可。其类甚博。余谓僮曰。彼居榛中。汝居宫内。彼不汝即。而汝即彼。犯而斗死。以执而谒者。汝实健且险。以轻近是物。然而杀之。汝益暴矣。彼耕穫者。求薪苏者。皆土其乡。知防而入焉。执耒操鞭。持芟朴以远其害。汝今非有求于榛者也。密汝居。易汝庭。不凌奥。不步闇。是恶能得而害汝。且彼非乐为此态也。造物者赋之形。阴与阳命之气。形甚怪僻。气甚祸贼。虽欲不为是。不可得也。是独可悲怜者。又孰能罪而加怒焉。汝勿杀也。余悲其不得已而所为若是。叩其脊。谕而宥之。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371136_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371136'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371136'>吾悲乎天形汝躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371136_comment'></div>绝翼去足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371136_comment'></div>无以自扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371136_comment'></div>曲膂屈胁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371136_comment'></div>惟行之纡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371136_comment'></div>目兼蜂虿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371136_comment'></div>色混泥涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371136_comment'></div>其颈蹙恧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371136_comment'></div>其腹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371136", 1371136, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>次且</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371136_comment'></div>褰鼻钩牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371136_comment'></div>穴出榛居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371136_comment'></div>蓄怒而蟠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371136_comment'></div>衔毒而趋。<div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371136", 1371136, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>潜狙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371136_comment'></div>汝之禀受若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371136_comment'></div>虽欲为蛙为螾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371136_comment'></div>焉可得已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371136_comment'></div>凡汝之为恶。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1371136_comment'></div>百毒齐起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371136_comment'></div>首拳脊努。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371136_comment'></div>呥舌摇尾。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1371136_comment'></div>世皆寒心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371136_comment'></div>我独悲尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371136_comment'></div>吾将薙吾庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371136_comment'></div>葺吾楹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371136_comment'></div>窖<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作窒）</span>吾垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371136_comment'></div>严吾扃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371136_comment'></div>俾奥草不植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371136_comment'></div>而穴隙不萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371136_comment'></div>与汝异途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371136_comment'></div>不相交争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371136_comment'></div>虽汝之恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371136_comment'></div>焉得而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371136_comment'></div>嘻。<div id='poem_sentence_42_1371136_comment'></div>既禀乎此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371136_comment'></div>能无危物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371136_comment'></div>贼害无辜。<div id='poem_sentence_62_1371136_comment'></div>形既不化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371136_comment'></div>中焉能悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371136_comment'></div>呜呼悲乎。<div id='poem_sentence_67_1371136_comment'></div>反讼其内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371136_comment'></div>今虽宽焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371136_comment'></div>后则谁赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371136_comment'></div>阴阳尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371136_comment'></div>造化尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371136_comment'></div>道乌乎在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371136_comment'></div>可不悲欤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1371136_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作骚体文，以记猿、王孙两种猴类不同习性，影射现世。作品：《憎王孙文并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷18第498页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371137' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371137' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371137?labeling=true' target='_blank'>憎王孙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371137")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371137_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371137'>猿王孙居异山。德异性。不能相容。猿之德静以恒。类仁让孝慈。居相爱。食相先。行有列。饮有序。不幸乖离。则其鸣哀。有难。则内其柔弱者。不践稼蔬。木实未熟。相与视之谨。既熟。啸呼群萃。然后食衎衎焉。山之小草木。必环而行。遂其植。故猿之居山恒郁然。王孙之德躁以嚣。勃诤号呶。唶唶彊彊。虽群不相善也。食相噬齧。行无列。饮无序。乖离而不思。有难。推其柔弱者以免。好践稼蔬。所过狼籍披攘。木实未熟。辄龁咬投注。窃取人食。皆知自实其嗛。山之小草木。必凌挫折挽。使之瘁然后已。故王孙之居山恒蒿然。以是猿群众则逐王孙。王孙群众亦齰猿。猿弃去。终不与抗。然则物之甚可憎。莫王孙若也。余弃山间久。见其趣如是。作憎王孙云。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371137_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371137'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371137'>湘水之浟浟兮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371137_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371137'>其上群山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371137_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371137'>胡兹郁而彼瘁兮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371137_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371137'>善恶异居其间。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371137_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371137'>恶者王孙兮善者猿。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1371137_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1371137'>环行遂植兮止<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371137", 1371137, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>暴残</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1371137_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1371137'>王孙兮甚可憎。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1371137_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1371137'>噫山之灵兮。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1371137_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1371137'>胡不贼旃。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作骚体文，为死于海难的商贾招魂。作品：《招海贾文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷18第508页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371142' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371142_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371142'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371142'>咨海贾兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371142_comment'></div>君胡以利易生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371142_comment'></div>而卒离其形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371142_comment'></div>大海荡汨兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371142_comment'></div>颠倒日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371142_comment'></div>龙鱼倾侧兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371142_comment'></div>神怪隳突。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371142_comment'></div>沧茫无形兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371142_comment'></div>往来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371142", 1371142, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>遽卒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371142_comment'></div>阴阳开阖兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371142_comment'></div>氛雾滃渤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371142_comment'></div>君不返兮逝恍惚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371142_comment'></div>舟航<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371142", 1371142, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>轩昂</span>兮。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371142_comment'></div>奔螭出忭兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371142_comment'></div>翔鹏振舞。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371142_comment'></div>挥霍旁午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371142_comment'></div>君不返兮终为虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371142_comment'></div>投之必沈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371142_comment'></div>负羽无力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371142_comment'></div>鲸鲵疑畏。<div "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>行贾</span>南面孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371142_comment'></div>宏羊心计登谋谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371142_comment'></div>煮盐大冶九卿居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371142_comment'></div>禄秩山委收国租。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371142_comment'></div>贤智走诺争下车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371142_comment'></div>逍遥纵傲世所趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371142_comment'></div>君不返兮谥为愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371142_comment'></div>咨海贾兮。<div id='poem_sentence_78_1371142_comment'></div>生为贪夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371142_comment'></div>亦独何乐哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371142_comment'></div>归来兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371142_comment'></div>宁君躯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1371142_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文称赞超道人利用电击桐木制作霹雳琴之雅事。作品：《霹雳琴赞引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷19第524页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371144' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371144' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371144?labeling=true' target='_blank'>霹雳琴赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371144")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371144_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371144'>霹雳琴者。零陵湘水西震馀枯桐之为也。始枯桐生石上。说者言有蛟龙伏其窾。一夕暴震。为火之焚。至旦乃已。其馀硿然。倒卧道上。震旁之民。稍柴薪之。超道人闻之。取以为三琴。琴莫良于桐。桐之良。莫良于生石上。石上之枯。又加良焉。火之馀。又加良焉。震之于火为异。是琴也。既良且异。合为二美。天下将不可载焉。微道人。天下之美几丧。余作赞辞。识其越之左与右。以著其事。又益以序。而为他传。辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371144_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371144'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371144'>惟湘之涯，惟石之危。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371144'>龙伏之灵，震焚之奇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371144'>既良而异，爰合其美。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371144'>超实为之，赞者柳子。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371144'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1371144_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文称赞伊尹政治思想及政治品格。作品：《伊尹五就桀赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷19第521页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371147' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371147' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371147?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伊尹五就桀赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371147")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371147_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371147'>伊尹五就桀。或疑曰。汤之仁闻且见矣。桀之不仁闻且见矣。夫胡去就之亟也。柳子曰。恶。是吾所以见伊尹之大者也。彼伊尹。圣人也。圣人出于天下。不夏商其心。心乎生民而已。曰孰能由吾言。由吾言者为尧舜。而吾生人尧舜人矣。退而思曰。汤诚仁。其功迟。桀诚不仁。朝吾从而暮及于天下可也。于是就桀。桀果不可得。反而从汤。既而又思曰。尚可十一乎。使斯人蚤被其泽也。又往就桀。桀不可而又从汤。以至于百一千一万一。卒不可。乃相汤伐桀。俾汤为尧舜。而人为尧舜之人。是吾所以见伊尹之大者也。仁至于汤矣。四去之。不仁至于桀矣。五就之。大人之欲速其功如此。不然。汤桀之辨。一恒人尽之矣。又奚以憧憧。圣人之足观乎。吾观圣人之急生人。莫若伊尹。伊尹之大。莫若于五就桀。作伊尹五就桀赞。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371147_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371147'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371147'>圣有伊尹，思德于民。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371147'>往归汤之仁，曰仁则仁矣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371147'>非久不亲，退思其速之道。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371147'>宜夏是因，就焉不可。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文称赞梁丘据援助晏子治理齐国之事，曲寄悲愤。作品：《梁丘据赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷19第523页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_0_1371148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371148'>知之为美，莫若去之。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371148'>非曰童昏，昧昧勿思。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371148'>祸至后惧，是诚不知。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371148'>君子之惧，惧乎未始。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1371148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1371148'>几动乎微，事迁乎理。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1371148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1371148'>将言以思，将行以止。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1371148'>君子不惧，为惧之初。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1371148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1371148'></div><div href='/Writing/1371149?labeling=true' target='_blank'>忧箴</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1371149'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371149'>忧可无乎，无谁以宁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1371149'>子如不忧，忧日以生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1371149'>忧不可常，常则谁怿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1371149'>子常其忧，乃小人戚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1371149'>敢问忧方，吾将告子。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1371149'>有闻不行，有过不徙。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1371149'>宜言不言，不宜而烦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1371149'>宜退而勇，不宜而恐。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1371149'>中之诚恳，过又不及。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1371149'>忧之大方，惟是焉急。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1371149'>内不自得，甚泰为忧。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1371149'>省而不疚，虽死优游。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1371149'>所忧在道，不在乎祸。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1371149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰文论居安思危、戒“敌去而舞”之理，讽喻现世。作品：《敌戒并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷19第532页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371178' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371178' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371178?labeling=true' target='_blank'>敌戒</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371178")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371178_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371178'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371178'>皆知敌之仇。而不知为益之尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371178_comment'></div>皆知敌之害。而不知为利之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371178_comment'></div>秦有六国。兢兢以强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371178_comment'></div>六国既除。訑訑乃亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371178_comment'></div>晋败楚鄢。范文为患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371178_comment'></div>厉之不图。举国造怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371178_comment'></div>孟孙恶臧。孟死臧恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371178_comment'></div>药石去矣。吾亡无日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371178_comment'></div>智能知之。犹卒以危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371178_comment'></div>矧今之人。曾不是思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371178_comment'></div>敌存而惧。敌去而舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371178_comment'></div>废备自盈。秪益为瘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371178_comment'></div>敌存灭祸。敌去召过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371178_comment'></div>有能知此。道大名播。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371178_comment'></div>惩病克寿。矜壮死暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371178_comment'></div>纵欲不戒。匪愚伊耄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371178_comment'></div>我作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371178", 1371178, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>戒诗</span>。思者无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371178_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1371178_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰文论历史“禅让”问题。作品：《舜禹之事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷20第555页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371191' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371191' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371191?labeling=true' target='_blank'>舜禹之事</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371191")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371191_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371191'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371191'>魏公子丕由其父得汉禅。还自南郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371191_comment'></div>谓其人曰。舜禹之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371191_comment'></div>吾知之矣。由丕以来皆笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371191_comment'></div>柳先生曰。丕之言若是可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371191_comment'></div>向者丕若曰。舜禹之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371191_comment'></div>吾知之矣。丕罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371191_comment'></div>其事则信。吾见笑之者不知言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371191_comment'></div>未见丕之可笑者也。凡易姓授位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371191_comment'></div>公与私。仁与强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371191_comment'></div>其道不同。而前者忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371191_comment'></div>后者系。其事同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371191_comment'></div>使以尧之圣。一日得舜而与之天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371191_comment'></div>能乎。吾知小争于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371191_comment'></div>大争于野。其为乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371191_comment'></div>尧无以已之。何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371191_comment'></div>尧未忘于人。舜未系于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371191_comment'></div>尧之得于舜也以圣。舜之得于尧也以圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371191_comment'></div>两圣独得于天下之上。奈愚人何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371191_comment'></div>其立于朝者放齐犹曰朱启明。而况在野者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371191_comment'></div>尧知其道不可。退而自忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371191_comment'></div>舜知尧之忘己而系舜于人也。进而自系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371191_comment'></div>舜举十六族。去四凶族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371191_comment'></div>使天下咸得其人。命二十二人兴五教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371191_comment'></div>立礼刑。使天下咸得其理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371191_comment'></div>合时月。正历数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371191_comment'></div>齐律度。量权衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371191_comment'></div>使天下咸得其用。积十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371191_comment'></div>人曰。明我者舜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371191_comment'></div>齐我者舜也。资我者舜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371191_comment'></div>天下之在位者。皆舜之人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371191_comment'></div>而尧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371191", 1371191, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>隤然</span>聋其聪。昏其明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371191_comment'></div>愚其圣。人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371191_comment'></div>往之所为尧者。果乌乎在哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371191_comment'></div>或曰耄矣。曰匿矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371191_comment'></div>又十馀年。其思而问者加少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371191_comment'></div>至于尧死。天下曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371191_comment'></div>久矣舜之君我也。夫然后能揖让受终于文祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371191_comment'></div>舜之于禹也亦然。禹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1371191", 1371191, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>旁行</span>天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371191_comment'></div>功系于人者多。而自忘也晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371191_comment'></div>益之自系犹是也。而启贤闻于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371191_comment'></div>故不能。夫其始系于人也厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371191_comment'></div>则其忘之也迟。不然反是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371191_comment'></div>汉之失德久矣。其不系而忘也甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371191_comment'></div>宦董袁陶之贼盈矣。丕之父攘祸以立强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371191_comment'></div>积三十馀年。天下之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371191_comment'></div>曹氏而已。无汉之思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371191_comment'></div>丕嗣而禅。天下得之以为晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371191_comment'></div>何以异夫舜禹之事耶。然则汉非能自忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371191_comment'></div>其事自忘也。曹氏非能自系也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371191_comment'></div>其事自系也。公与私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371191_comment'></div>仁与强。其道不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371191_comment'></div>其忘而系者。无以异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371191_comment'></div>尧舜之忘。不使如汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371191_comment'></div>不能授舜禹。舜禹之系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371191_comment'></div>不使如曹氏。不能受之尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371191_comment'></div>然而世徒探其情而笑之。故曰笑其言者非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371191_comment'></div>问者曰。尧崩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371191_comment'></div>天下若丧考妣。四海遏密八音三载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371191_comment'></div>子之言忘若甚然。是可不可欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371191_comment'></div>曰。是舜归德于尧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371191_comment'></div>史尊尧之德之辞者也。尧之老更一世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371191_comment'></div>德乎尧者。盖已死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371191_comment'></div>其幼而存者。尧不使之思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371191_comment'></div>不若是。不能与人天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371191_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1371191_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。因革新失败被贬后，遭受流言蜚语之攻击，故撰文论“谤”及“誉”，对诽谤予以回击。作品：《谤誉》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷20第558页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371192' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371192' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371192?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谤誉</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371192")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371192_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371192'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371192'>凡人之获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371192", 1371192, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>谤誉</span>于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371192_comment'></div>亦各有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371192_comment'></div>君子在下位则多谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371192_comment'></div>在上位则多誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371192_comment'></div>小人在下位则多誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371192_comment'></div>在上位则多谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371192_comment'></div>何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371192_comment'></div>君子宜于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371192_comment'></div>不宜于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371192_comment'></div>小人宜于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371192_comment'></div>不宜于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371192_comment'></div>得其宜则誉至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371192_comment'></div>不得其宜则谤亦至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371192_comment'></div>此其凡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371192_comment'></div>然而君子遭乱世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371192_comment'></div>不得已而在于上位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371192_comment'></div>则道必咈于君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371192_comment'></div>而利必及于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371192_comment'></div>由是谤行于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371192_comment'></div>而不及于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371192_comment'></div>故可杀可辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371192_comment'></div>而人犹誉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371192_comment'></div>小人遭乱世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371192_comment'></div>而后得居于上位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371192_comment'></div>则道必合于君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371192_comment'></div>而害必及于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371192_comment'></div>由是誉行于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371192_comment'></div>而不及于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371192_comment'></div>故可宠可富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371192_comment'></div>而人犹谤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371192_comment'></div>君子之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371192_comment'></div>非所谓誉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371192_comment'></div>其善显焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371192_comment'></div>小人之谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371192_comment'></div>非所谓谤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371192_comment'></div>其不善彰焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371192_comment'></div>然则在下而多谤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371192_comment'></div>岂尽愚而狡也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371192_comment'></div>在上而多誉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371192_comment'></div>岂尽仁而智也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371192_comment'></div>其谤且誉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371192_comment'></div>岂尽明而善褒贬也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371192_comment'></div>然而世之人闻而大惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371192_comment'></div>出一庸人之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371192_comment'></div>则群而邮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371192_comment'></div>且置于远迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371192_comment'></div>莫不以为信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371192_comment'></div>岂惟不能褒贬而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371192_comment'></div>则又蔽于好恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371192_comment'></div>夺于利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371192_comment'></div>吾又何从而得之耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371192_comment'></div>孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371192_comment'></div>不如乡人之善者好之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371192_comment'></div>其不善者恶之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371192_comment'></div>善人者之难见也。<div class='inline'
