id='poem_sentence_54_1371192_comment'></div>则其谤君子者为不少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371192_comment'></div>其谤孔子者亦为不少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371192_comment'></div>传之记者叔孙武叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371192_comment'></div>时之显贵者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371192_comment'></div>其不可记者又不少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371192_comment'></div>是以在下而必困也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371192_comment'></div>及乎遭时得君而处乎人上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371192_comment'></div>功利及于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371192_comment'></div>天下之人皆欢而戴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371192_comment'></div>向之谤之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371192_comment'></div>今从而誉之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371192_comment'></div>是以在上而必彰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371192_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371192_comment'></div>然则闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1371192", 1371192, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>谤誉</span>于上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371192_comment'></div>反而求之可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371192_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371192_comment'></div>是恶可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371192_comment'></div>无亦徵其所自而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371192_comment'></div>其所自善人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371192_comment'></div>则信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371192_comment'></div>不善人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371192_comment'></div>则勿信之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371192_comment'></div>苟吾不能分于善不善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371192_comment'></div>则已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371192_comment'></div>如有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1371192", 1371192, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>谤誉</span>乎人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371192_comment'></div>吾必徵其所自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371192_comment'></div>未敢以其言之多而举且信之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371192_comment'></div>其有及乎我者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371192_comment'></div>未敢以其言之多而荣且惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371192_comment'></div>苟不知我而谓我盗蹠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371192_comment'></div>吾又安取惧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371192_comment'></div>苟不知我而谓我仲尼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371192_comment'></div>吾又安取荣焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371192_comment'></div>知我者之善不善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371192_comment'></div>非吾果能明之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371192_comment'></div>要必自善而已矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_90_1371192_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰文，驳斥以门阀观念衡量人事成败的谬论，讽喻现世。作品：《咸宜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷20第560页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371193' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371193' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371193?labeling=true' target='_blank'>咸宜</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371193")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371193_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371193'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371193'>兴王之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371193_comment'></div>多起污贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371193_comment'></div>人曰幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371193_comment'></div>亡主之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371193_comment'></div>多死寇盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371193_comment'></div>人曰祸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371193_comment'></div>予咸宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371193_comment'></div>当两汉氏之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371193_comment'></div>屠贩徒隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371193_comment'></div>出以为公侯卿相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371193_comment'></div>无他焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371193_comment'></div>彼固公侯卿相器也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371193_comment'></div>遭时之非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371193_comment'></div>是以诎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371193_comment'></div>独其始之不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371193_comment'></div>非遭高光而以为幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371193_comment'></div>汉晋之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371193_comment'></div>公侯卿相劫戮困饿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371193_comment'></div>伏墙壁间以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371193_comment'></div>无他焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371193_comment'></div>彼固劫戮困饿器也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371193_comment'></div>遭时之非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371193_comment'></div>是以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371193_comment'></div>独其始之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371193_comment'></div>非遭卓曜而后为祸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371193_comment'></div>彼困于昏乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371193_comment'></div>伏志气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371193_comment'></div>屈身体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371193_comment'></div>以下奴虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371193_comment'></div>平难泽物之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371193_comment'></div>不施于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371193_comment'></div>一得适其傃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371193_comment'></div>其进晚尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371193_comment'></div>而人犹幸之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371193_comment'></div>彼伸于昏乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371193_comment'></div>抗志气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371193_comment'></div>肆身体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371193_comment'></div>以傲豪杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371193_comment'></div>残民兴乱之伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371193_comment'></div>行于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371193_comment'></div>一得适其傃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371193_comment'></div>其死后耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371193_comment'></div>而人犹祸之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371193_comment'></div>悲夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371193_comment'></div>予是以咸宜之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1371193_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。有文论忠孝。作品：《吾子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集卷上第1339页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371197' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371197' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371197?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吾子</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371197")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371197_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371197'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371197'>曰吾子来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371197_comment'></div>以有馀而欲及人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371197_comment'></div>曰然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371197_comment'></div>若用子而能使竭忠孝乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371197_comment'></div>曰否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371197_comment'></div>夫无忠而忠见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371197_comment'></div>无孝而孝闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371197_comment'></div>曷若使不见而忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371197_comment'></div>无闻而孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371197_comment'></div>肃然已出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371197_comment'></div>熙然已及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371197_comment'></div>夫己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371197_comment'></div>浑然矣乎。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1371197_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作文，以鞭贾骗人及富家子被骗之现实故事，讽刺现世。作品：《鞭贾》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷20第561页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371194' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371194' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371194?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鞭贾</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371194")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371194_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371194'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371194'>市之鬻鞭者。人问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371194_comment'></div>其贾直五十。必曰五万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371194_comment'></div>复之以五十。则伏而笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371194_comment'></div>以五百。则小怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371194_comment'></div>五千则大怒。必以五万而后可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371194_comment'></div>有富者子适市。买鞭出五万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371194_comment'></div>持以夸予。视其首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371194_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371194", 1371194, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>拳蹙</span>而不遂。视其握。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371194_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371194", 1371194, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>蹇仄</span>而不植。其行水者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371194_comment'></div>一去一来不相承。其节朽黑而无文材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371194_comment'></div>掐之灭爪。而不得其所穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371194_comment'></div>举之翲然。若挥虚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371194_comment'></div>予曰。子何取于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371194_comment'></div>而不爱五万。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371194_comment'></div>吾爱其黄而泽。且贾者云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371194_comment'></div>予乃召僮爚汤以濯之。则遫然枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371194_comment'></div>苍然白。向之黄者栀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371194_comment'></div>泽者蜡也。富者不悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371194_comment'></div>然犹持之三年。后出东郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371194_comment'></div>争道长乐坂下。马相踶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371194_comment'></div>因大击。鞭折而为五六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371194_comment'></div>马踶不已。坠于地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371194_comment'></div>伤焉。视其内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371194_comment'></div>则空空然。其理若粪壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371194_comment'></div>无所赖者。今之栀其貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371194_comment'></div>蜡其言。以求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371194", 1371194, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>贾技</span>于朝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371194_comment'></div>当其分则善。一误而过其分则喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371194_comment'></div>当其分则反怒曰。予曷不至于公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371194_comment'></div>然而至焉者亦良多矣。居无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371194_comment'></div>虽过三年不为害。当其有事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371194_comment'></div>驱之于陈力之列。以御乎物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371194_comment'></div>以夫空空之内。粪壤之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371194_comment'></div>而以责其大击之效。恶有不折其用而获坠伤之患者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371194_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1371194_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰文，论官吏经商之事。作品：《吏商》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷20第563页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371195?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吏商</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371195")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371195'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371195'>吏而商也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371195_comment'></div>污吏之为商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371195_comment'></div>不若廉吏之商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371195_comment'></div>其为利也博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371195_comment'></div>污吏以货商资同恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371195_comment'></div>与之为曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371195_comment'></div>大率多减耗役<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371195", 1371195, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>佣工</span>费舟车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371195_comment'></div>射时有得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371195_comment'></div>取货有苦良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371195_comment'></div>盗贼水火杀敚焚溺之为患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371195_comment'></div>幸而得利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371195_comment'></div>不能什一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371195_comment'></div>身败禄夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371195_comment'></div>大者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371195_comment'></div>次<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371195", 1371195, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>贬废</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371195_comment'></div>小者恶终不遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371195_comment'></div>污吏恶能商矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371195_comment'></div>廉吏以行商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371195_comment'></div>不役<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371195", 1371195, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>佣工</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371195_comment'></div>不费舟车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371195_comment'></div>无资同恶减耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371195_comment'></div>时无得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371195_comment'></div>货无良苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371195_comment'></div>盗贼不得杀敚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371195_comment'></div>水火不得焚溺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371195_comment'></div>利愈多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371195_comment'></div>名愈尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371195_comment'></div>身富而家强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371195_comment'></div>子孙葆光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371195_comment'></div>是故廉吏之商博也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371195_comment'></div>苟修严洁白以理政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371195_comment'></div>由小吏得为县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371195_comment'></div>由小县得大县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371195_comment'></div>由大县得刺小州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371195_comment'></div>其利月益各倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371195_comment'></div>其行不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371195_comment'></div>又由小州得大州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371195_comment'></div>其利月益三之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371195_comment'></div>其行又不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371195_comment'></div>又由大州得廉一道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371195_comment'></div>其利月益之三倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371195_comment'></div>不胜富矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371195_comment'></div>苟其行又不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371195_comment'></div>则其为得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371195_comment'></div>夫可量哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371195_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1371195", 1371195, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>赭山</span>以为章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371195_comment'></div>涸海以为盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371195_comment'></div>未有利大能若是者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371195_comment'></div>然而举世争为货商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371195_comment'></div>以故贬吏相逐于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371195_comment'></div>百不能一遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371195_comment'></div>人之知谋好迩富而近祸如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371195_comment'></div>悲夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371195_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371195_comment'></div>君子谋道不谋富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371195_comment'></div>子见孟子之对宋牼乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371195_comment'></div>何以利为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371195_comment'></div>柳子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371195_comment'></div>君子有二道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371195_comment'></div>诚而明者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371195_comment'></div>不可教以利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371195_comment'></div>明而诚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371195_comment'></div>利进而害退焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371195_comment'></div>吾为是言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371195_comment'></div>为利而为之者设也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371195_comment'></div>或安而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371195_comment'></div>或利而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371195_comment'></div>及其成功一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371195_comment'></div>吾哀夫没于利者以乱人而自败也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371195_comment'></div>姑设是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371195_comment'></div>庶由利之小大登进其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371195_comment'></div>幸而不挠乎下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371195_comment'></div>以成其政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371195_comment'></div>交得其大利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371195_comment'></div>吾言不得已尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371195_comment'></div>何暇从容若孟子乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371195_comment'></div>孟子好道而无情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371195_comment'></div>其功缓以疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371195_comment'></div>未若孔子之急民也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1371195_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰文，以东海若之寓言故事，抒忧寄怀。作品：《东海若》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷20第565页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371196' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371196' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371196?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东海若</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371196")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371196_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371196'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371196'>东海若陆游。登孟诸之阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371196_comment'></div>得二瓠焉。刳而振其犀以嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371196_comment'></div>取海水。杂粪壤蛲蛔而实之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371196_comment'></div>臭不可当也。窒以密石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371196_comment'></div>举而投之海。逾时焉而过之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371196_comment'></div>是故弃粪耶。其一彻声而呼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371196_comment'></div>我大海也。东海若呀然而笑曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371196_comment'></div>怪矣。今夫大海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371196_comment'></div>其东无东。其西无西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371196_comment'></div>其北无北。其南无南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371196_comment'></div>旦则浴日而出之。夜则滔列星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371196_comment'></div>涵太阴。扬阴火珠宝之光以为明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371196_comment'></div>其尘霾之杂不处也。必泊之西澨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371196_comment'></div>故其大也深也洁也光明也。无我若者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371196_comment'></div>今汝海之弃滴也。而与粪壤同体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371196_comment'></div>臭朽之与曹。蛲蛔之与居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371196_comment'></div>其狭咫也。又冥暗若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371196_comment'></div>而同之海。不亦羞而可怜哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371196_comment'></div>子欲之乎。吾将为汝抉石破瓠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371196_comment'></div>荡群秽于大荒之岛。而同子于向之所陈者可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371196_comment'></div>粪水泊然不悦曰。我固同矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371196_comment'></div>吾又何求于若。吾之性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371196_comment'></div>亦若是而已矣。秽者自秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371196_comment'></div>不足以害吾洁。狭者自狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371196_comment'></div>不足以害吾广。幽者自幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371196_comment'></div>不足以害吾明。而秽亦海也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371196_comment'></div>狭幽亦海也。突然而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371196_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371196", 1371196, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>于然</span>而来。孰非海者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371196_comment'></div>子去矣。无乱我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371196_comment'></div>其一闻若之言。号而祈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371196_comment'></div>吾毒是久矣。吾以为是固然不可异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371196_comment'></div>今子告我以海之大。又目我以故海之弃粪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371196_comment'></div>吾愈急焉。涌吾沫不足以发其窒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371196_comment'></div>旋吾波不足以穴瓠之腹也。就能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371196_comment'></div>穷岁月耳。愿若幸而哀我哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371196_comment'></div>东海若乃抉石破瓠。投之孟诸之陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371196_comment'></div>荡其秽于大荒之岛。而水复于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371196_comment'></div>尽得向之所陈者焉。而向之一者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371196_comment'></div>终与臭腐处而不变也。今有为佛者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371196_comment'></div>同出于毗卢遮那之海。而汨于五浊之粪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371196_comment'></div>而幽于三有之瓠。而窒于无明之石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371196_comment'></div>而杂于十二类之蛲蛔。人有问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371196_comment'></div>其一人曰。我佛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371196_comment'></div>毗卢遮那五浊三有无明十二类。皆空也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371196_comment'></div>一也。无善无恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371196_comment'></div>无因无果。无修无證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371196_comment'></div>无佛无众生。皆无焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371196_comment'></div>吾何求也。问者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371196_comment'></div>子之所言性也。有事焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371196_comment'></div>夫性与事。一而二二而一者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371196_comment'></div>子守而一定。则大患者至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371196_comment'></div>其人曰。子去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371196_comment'></div>无乱我。其一人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371196_comment'></div>嘻。吾毒之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371196_comment'></div>吾尽吾力而不足以去无明。穷吾智而不足以超三有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371196_comment'></div>离五浊。而异夫十二类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371196_comment'></div>就能之。其大小劫之多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371196_comment'></div>不可知也。若之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371196_comment'></div>问者乃为陈西方之事。使修念佛三昧一空有之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371196_comment'></div>于是圣人怜之。接而致之极乐之境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371196_comment'></div>而得以去群恶。集万行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371196_comment'></div>居圣者之地。同佛知见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371196_comment'></div>向之一人者。终与十二类同而不变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371196_comment'></div>夫二人之相违也。不若二瓠之水哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371196_comment'></div>今不知去一而取一。甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371196_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1371196_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。姊夫裴墐修订唐德宗、顺宗丧葬礼仪，将其集为《崇丰二陵集礼》，宗元为之序。作品：《裴墐崇丰二陵集礼后序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷21第572页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371027' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371027' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371027?labeling=true' target='_blank'>裴瑾崇丰二陵集礼后序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371027")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371027_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371027'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371027'>传曰。诗书执礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371027_comment'></div>礼不执则不行。自开元制礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371027_comment'></div>大臣讳避。去国恤章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371027_comment'></div>而山陵之礼。遂无所执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371027_comment'></div>世之不学者。乃妄取预凶事之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371027_comment'></div>而大典阙焉。由是累圣山陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371027_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371027", 1371027, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>摭拾</span>残缺。附比伦类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371027_comment'></div>已乃斥去。其后莫能徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371027_comment'></div>永贞元和间。天祸仍遘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371027_comment'></div>自崇陵至于丰陵。不能周岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371027_comment'></div>司空杜公由太常相天子<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作天下）</span>。连为礼仪使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371027_comment'></div>择其寮以备损益。于是河东裴瑾以太常丞陇西辛秘以博士用焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371027_comment'></div>内之则攒涂秘器。象物之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371027_comment'></div>外之则复土斥上<span class='inlineComment2'>（一无斥上二字）</span>。因山之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371027_comment'></div>上之则顾命典册。与文物以授万<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作方）</span>国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371027_comment'></div>下之则制服节文。颁宪则以示四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371027_comment'></div>由其肃恭。礼无不备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371027_comment'></div>且苞并总统。千载之盈缩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371027_comment'></div>罗络旁午。百氏之异同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371027_comment'></div>搜扬剪截。而毕得其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371027_comment'></div>顾问关决。而不悖于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371027_comment'></div>议者以为司空得其人。而邦典不坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371027_comment'></div>裴氏乃悉取其所刊定。及奏复于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371027_comment'></div>辨列于下。联百执事之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371027_comment'></div>以为崇丰二陵集礼。藏于太常书阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371027_comment'></div>君子以为爱礼而近古焉。昔韦孟以诗礼传楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371027_comment'></div>而郊庙之制。卒正于元成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371027_comment'></div>郑元以笺注师汉。而禅代之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371027_comment'></div>卒集于小同。贾谊以经术起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371027_comment'></div>而嘉最好学。卢植以儒学用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371027_comment'></div>而谌为祭法。旧史咸以为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371027_comment'></div>今裴氏太尉公以礼匡义。嗣侍中公以礼议封禅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371027_comment'></div>祠部公以礼承大事。大理公以礼辅东宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371027_comment'></div>而瑾也以礼奉二陵。又能成书以充其阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371027_comment'></div>其为爱礼近古也。源远乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371027_comment'></div>瑾字封叔。其伯仲咸以文学显于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371027_comment'></div>大理之兄正平节公。以仪范成家道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371027_comment'></div>以文雅经邦政。今相国郇公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371027_comment'></div>其宗子也。郇公以孝友勤劳扬于家邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371027_comment'></div>游其门若闻韶濩。入其庙如至邹鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371027_comment'></div>恩溢乎九族。礼仪于他门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371027_comment'></div>则封叔之习礼也。其出于孝弟欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371027_comment'></div>成书也。其本于忠敬欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371027_comment'></div>由于家而达于邦国。其取荣于史氏也果矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371027_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1371027_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。从弟柳宗直编《西汉文类》，宗元为序。作品：《柳宗直西汉文类序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷21第575页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371028' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371028' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371028?labeling=true' target='_blank'>柳宗直西汉文类序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371028")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371028_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371028'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371028'>左右史混久矣。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371028", 1371028, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>言事</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371028", 1371028, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>驳乱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371028_comment'></div>尚书春秋之旨不立。自左邱明传孔氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371028_comment'></div>太史公述历古今。合而为史记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371028_comment'></div>迄于今。交错相糺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371028_comment'></div>莫能离其说。独左氏国语纪言不参于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371028_comment'></div>战国策春秋后语。颇本右史尚书之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371028_comment'></div>然无古圣人蔚然之道。大抵促数耗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371028_comment'></div>而后之文者宠<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作袭）</span>之。文之近古而尤壮丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371028_comment'></div>莫若汉之西京。班固书传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371028_comment'></div>吾尝病其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371028", 1371028, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>畔散</span>不属。无以考其变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371028_comment'></div>欲采比义会。年长疾作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371028_comment'></div>驽堕日甚。未能胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371028_comment'></div>幸吾弟宗直爱古书。乐而成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371028_comment'></div>搜讨磔裂。捃摭融结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371028_comment'></div>离而同之。与类推移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371028_comment'></div>不易时月。而咸得从其条贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371028_comment'></div>森然炳然。若开群玉之府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371028_comment'></div>指挥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371028", 1371028, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>联累</span>圭璋琮璜之状。各有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371028", 1371028, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>列位</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371028_comment'></div>不失其序。虽第其价可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371028_comment'></div>以文观之。则赋颂诗歌书奏诏策辨论之辞毕具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371028_comment'></div>以语观之。则右史纪言尚书国语战国策成败兴坏之说大备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371028_comment'></div>无不苞也。噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371028_comment'></div>是可以为学者之端耶。始吾少时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371028_comment'></div>有路子者。自赞为是书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371028_comment'></div>吾嘉而叙其意。而其书终莫能具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371028_comment'></div>卒俟宗直也。故删取其叙系于左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371028_comment'></div>以为西汉文类。首纪殷周之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371028_comment'></div>其文简而野。魏晋已降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371028_comment'></div>则荡而靡。得其中者汉氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371028_comment'></div>汉氏之东。则既衰矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371028_comment'></div>当文帝时。始得贾生明儒术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371028_comment'></div>武帝尤好焉。而公孙宏董仲舒司马迁相如之徒作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371028_comment'></div>风雅益盛。敷施天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371028_comment'></div>自天子至公卿大夫士庶人咸通焉。于是宣于诏策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371028_comment'></div>达于奏议。讽于辞赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371028_comment'></div>传于歌谣。由高帝迄于哀平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371028_comment'></div>王莽之诛。四方之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371028_comment'></div>盖烂然矣。史臣班孟坚修其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371028_comment'></div>拔其尤者充于简册。则二百三十年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371028_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371028", 1371028, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>列辟</span>之达道。名臣之大范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371028_comment'></div>贤能之志业。黔黎之风习列焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371028_comment'></div>若乃合其英精。离其变通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371028_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371028", 1371028, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>论次</span>其叙位。必俟学古者兴行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371028_comment'></div>唐兴用文理。贞元间文章特盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371028_comment'></div>本之三代。接于汉氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371028_comment'></div>与之相准。于是有能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371028_comment'></div>取孟坚书。类其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371028_comment'></div>次其先后。为四十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371028_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1371028_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。桂管观察使留后杜周士自桂幕来永，宗元同友吴武陵作诗文送之。作品：《同吴武陵送前桂州杜留后诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷22第593页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371035' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371035' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371035?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同吴武陵送前桂州杜留后诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371035")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371035_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371035'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371035'>观室者观其隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371035_comment'></div>隅之巍然直方以固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371035_comment'></div>则其中必端庄宏达可居者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371035_comment'></div>人孰异夫是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371035_comment'></div>今若杜君之隅可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371035_comment'></div>而中可居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371035_comment'></div>居之者德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371035_comment'></div>赞南方之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371035_comment'></div>理是以大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371035_comment'></div>总留府之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371035_comment'></div>政是以光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371035_comment'></div>其道不挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371035_comment'></div>好古书百家言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371035_comment'></div>洋洋满车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371035_comment'></div>行则与俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371035_comment'></div>止则相对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371035_comment'></div>积为义府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371035_comment'></div>溢为高文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371035_comment'></div>悫而和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371035_comment'></div>肆而信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371035_comment'></div>岂诗所谓抑抑威仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371035_comment'></div>惟德之隅者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371035_comment'></div>今往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371035_comment'></div>有以其道闻于天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371035_comment'></div>天子惟士之求为急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371035_comment'></div>杜君欲辞争臣侍从之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371035_comment'></div>其可得乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371035_comment'></div>濮阳吴武陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371035_comment'></div>直而甚文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371035_comment'></div>乐杜君之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371035_comment'></div>作诗以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371035_comment'></div>予犹吴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371035_comment'></div>故于是乎序焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1371035_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。薛存义之任，宗元作序送之。作品：《送薛存义之任序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷23第615页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371047' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371047' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371047?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送薛存义之任序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371047")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371047_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371047'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371047'>河东薛存义将行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371047_comment'></div>柳子载肉于俎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371047_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371047", 1371047, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>崇酒</span>于觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371047_comment'></div>追而送之江之<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本无之字）</span>浒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371047_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371047", 1371047, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>饮食</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371047_comment'></div>且告曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371047_comment'></div>凡吏于土者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371047_comment'></div>若知其职乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371047_comment'></div>盖民之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371047_comment'></div>非以役民而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371047_comment'></div>凡民之食于土者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371047_comment'></div>出其十一佣乎吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371047_comment'></div>使司平于我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371047_comment'></div>今我受其直怠其事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371047_comment'></div>天下皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371047_comment'></div>岂唯怠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371047_comment'></div>又从而盗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371047_comment'></div>向使佣一夫于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371047_comment'></div>受若直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371047_comment'></div>怠若事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371047_comment'></div>又盗若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371047", 1371047, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>货器</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371047_comment'></div>则必甚怒而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371047", 1371047, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>黜罚</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371047_comment'></div>以今天下多类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371047_comment'></div>而民莫敢肆其怒与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371047", 1371047, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>黜罚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371047_comment'></div>何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371047_comment'></div>势不同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371047_comment'></div>势不同而理同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371047_comment'></div>如吾民何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371047_comment'></div>有达于理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371047_comment'></div>得不恐而畏乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371047_comment'></div>存义<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371047", 1371047, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>假令</span>零陵二年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371047_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371047", 1371047, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>蚤作</span>而夜思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371047_comment'></div>勤力而劳心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371047_comment'></div>讼者平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371047_comment'></div>赋者均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371047_comment'></div>老弱无怀诈暴憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371047_comment'></div>其为不虚取直也的矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371047_comment'></div>其知恐而畏也审矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371047_comment'></div>吾贱且辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371047_comment'></div>不得与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371047", 1371047, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>考绩幽明</span>之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371047_comment'></div>于其往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371047_comment'></div>故赏以酒肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371047_comment'></div>而重之以辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1371047_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。族属柳澥来访，临行宗元作序送别。作品：《送澥序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷24第635页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371059' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371059' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371059?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送澥序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371059")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371059_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371059'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371059'>人咸言吾宗宜硕大。有积德焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371059_comment'></div>在高宗时。并居尚书省二十二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371059_comment'></div>遭诸武。以故衰耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371059_comment'></div>武氏败。犹不能兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371059_comment'></div>为尚书吏者。间十数岁乃一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371059_comment'></div>永贞年。吾与族兄登并为礼部属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371059_comment'></div>吾黜。而季父公绰更为刑部郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371059_comment'></div>则加稠焉。又观宗中为文雅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371059_comment'></div>炳炳然以十数。仁义固其素也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371059_comment'></div>意者其复兴乎。自吾为僇人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371059_comment'></div>居南乡。后之颖然出者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371059_comment'></div>吾不见之也。其在道路幸而过予者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371059_comment'></div>独得澥。澥质厚不谄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371059_comment'></div>敦朴有裕。若器焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371059_comment'></div>必隆然大。而后可以有受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371059_comment'></div>择所以入之者而巳矣。其文蓄积甚富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371059_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371059", 1371059, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>好慕</span>甚正。若墙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371059_comment'></div>必基之广而后可以有蔽。择其所以出之者而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371059_comment'></div>勤圣人之道。辅以孝悌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371059_comment'></div>复向时之美。吾于澥焉是望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371059_comment'></div>汝往哉。见诸宗人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371059_comment'></div>为我谢而勉焉。无若太山之麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371059_comment'></div>止而不得升也。其唯川之不已乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371059_comment'></div>吾去子。终老于夷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371059_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1371059_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。吕让至永州问其仕进，宗元作序答之，并送别。作品：《送表弟吕让将仕进序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷24第638页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371061' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371061' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371061?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送表弟吕让将仕进序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371061")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371061_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371061'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371061'>吾观古豪贤士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371061_comment'></div>能知生人艰饥羸寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371061_comment'></div>蒙难抵暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371061_comment'></div>捽抑无告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371061_comment'></div>以呼而怜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371061_comment'></div>皆饱穷厄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371061_comment'></div>恒孤危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371061_comment'></div>訑訑冲冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371061_comment'></div>东西南北无所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371061_comment'></div>然后至于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371061_comment'></div>今有吕氏子名让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371061_comment'></div>生而食肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371061_comment'></div>厌粱稻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371061_comment'></div>欺纨縠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371061_comment'></div>幼专靖不好游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371061_comment'></div>不践郊牧坰野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371061_comment'></div>不目小民农夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371061", 1371061, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>耕筑</span>之倦苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371061_comment'></div>不耳呼怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371061_comment'></div>而独悴然怜天下之穷氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371061_comment'></div>坐而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371061_comment'></div>未尝不至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371061_comment'></div>此孰告之而孰示之耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371061_comment'></div>积于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371061_comment'></div>得于诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371061_comment'></div>往而复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371061_comment'></div>咸在其内者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371061_comment'></div>彼告而后知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371061_comment'></div>示而后哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371061_comment'></div>由外以铄己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371061_comment'></div>因物以激志者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371061_comment'></div>中之积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371061_comment'></div>诚之得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371061_comment'></div>其为贤也莫尚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371061_comment'></div>吕氏子得贤人之上资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371061_comment'></div>增以嗜儒书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371061_comment'></div>多文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371061_comment'></div>上下古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371061_comment'></div>左绳右准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371061_comment'></div>以为直道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371061_comment'></div>其于远且大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371061_comment'></div>若稼而谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371061_comment'></div>圃而蔬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371061_comment'></div>不丐买而有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371061_comment'></div>今来言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371061_comment'></div>道不可特出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371061_comment'></div>功不可徒成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371061_comment'></div>必由仕以登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371061_comment'></div>假辞以通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371061_comment'></div>然后及乎物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371061_comment'></div>吾将通其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371061_comment'></div>干于仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371061_comment'></div>庶施吾道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371061_comment'></div>愿一决其可不可于子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371061_comment'></div>何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371061_comment'></div>予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371061_comment'></div>志存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371061_comment'></div>学不至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371061_comment'></div>不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371061_comment'></div>学存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371061_comment'></div>辞不至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371061_comment'></div>不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371061_comment'></div>辞存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371061_comment'></div>时不至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371061_comment'></div>不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371061_comment'></div>今以子之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371061_comment'></div>且学而文之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371061_comment'></div>又当主上兴太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371061_comment'></div>贤士大夫为宰相卿士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371061_comment'></div>吾子以其道从容以行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371061_comment'></div>由于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371061_comment'></div>达于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371061_comment'></div>旁施其事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371061_comment'></div>若健者之升梯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371061_comment'></div>举足愈多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371061_comment'></div>身愈高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371061_comment'></div>人愈仰之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371061_comment'></div>道不误矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371061_comment'></div>勤而不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371061_comment'></div>斯可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371061_comment'></div>怠而忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371061_comment'></div>斯不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371061_comment'></div>舍是吾无以为决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371061_comment'></div>子其行焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1371061_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。娄图南将其留居永州三年间与柳氏及他人唱和诗编辑成集，宗元作序。作品：《娄二十四秀才花下对酒唱和诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷24第644页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371064' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371064' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371064?labeling=true' target='_blank'>娄二十四秀才花下对酒唱和诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371064")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371064_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371064'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371064'>君子遭世之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371064_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371064", 1371064, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>呻呼</span>踊跃以求知于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371064_comment'></div>而遁隐之志息焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371064_comment'></div>于是感激愤悱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371064_comment'></div>思奋其志略以效于当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371064_comment'></div>必形于文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371064_comment'></div>伸于歌咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371064_comment'></div>是故有其具而未得行其道者之为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371064_comment'></div>娄君志乎道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371064_comment'></div>而遭乎理之世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371064_comment'></div>其道宜行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371064_comment'></div>而其术未用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371064_comment'></div>故为文而歌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371064_comment'></div>有求知之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371064_comment'></div>以予弟同志而偕未达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371064_comment'></div>故为赠诗以悼时之往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371064_comment'></div>予既困辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371064_comment'></div>不得预睹世之光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371064_comment'></div>而幽乎楚越之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371064_comment'></div>故合文士以申其致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371064_comment'></div>将俟夫木铎以间于金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371064_comment'></div>大凡编辞于斯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371064_comment'></div>皆太平之不遇人也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1371064_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。娄图南留居永州三年，将游淮南，临行宗元作序送别。作品：《送娄图南秀才游淮南将入道序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第655页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371068' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371068' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371068?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送娄图南秀才游淮将入道序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371068")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371068_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371068'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371068'>仆未冠求进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371068_comment'></div>闻娄君名甚熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371068_comment'></div>其所为歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371068_comment'></div>传咏都中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371068_comment'></div>通数经及群书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371068_comment'></div>当时为文章若崔比部于卫尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371068_comment'></div>相与称其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371068_comment'></div>众皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371068_comment'></div>纳言曾孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371068_comment'></div>而又有是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371068_comment'></div>咸推让为先登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371068_comment'></div>后十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371068_comment'></div>仆自尚书郎谪来零陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371068_comment'></div>觏娄君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371068_comment'></div>犹为白衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371068_comment'></div>居无室宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371068_comment'></div>出无僮御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371068_comment'></div>仆深异而讯之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371068_comment'></div>乃曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371068_comment'></div>今夫取科者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371068_comment'></div>交贵势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371068_comment'></div>倚亲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371068_comment'></div>合则插羽翮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371068_comment'></div>生风涛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371068_comment'></div>沛焉而有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371068_comment'></div>吾无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371068_comment'></div>不则餍饮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371068_comment'></div>驰坚良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371068_comment'></div>以欢于朋徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371068_comment'></div>相贸为资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371068_comment'></div>相易为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371068_comment'></div>有不诺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371068_comment'></div>以气排之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371068_comment'></div>吾无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371068_comment'></div>不则多筋力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371068_comment'></div>善造请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371068_comment'></div>朝夕屈折于恒人之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371068_comment'></div>走高门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371068_comment'></div>邀大车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371068_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371068", 1371068, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>矫笑</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371068", 1371068, "Clauses/39/Comments/1")'>伪言</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371068_comment'></div>卑陬而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1371068", 1371068, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>姁媮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371068_comment'></div>偷一旦之容以售其技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371068_comment'></div>吾无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371068_comment'></div>自度卒不能堪其劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371068_comment'></div>故舍之而游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371068_comment'></div>逾湖江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371068_comment'></div>出豫章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371068_comment'></div>至南海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371068_comment'></div>复由桂而下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371068_comment'></div>少好道士言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371068_comment'></div>饵药为寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371068_comment'></div>未尽其术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371068_comment'></div>故行且求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371068_comment'></div>仆闻而愈疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371068_comment'></div>往时观得进士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371068_comment'></div>不必若娄君之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371068_comment'></div>又少能类娄君之文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371068_comment'></div>又无纳言之大德以为之祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371068_comment'></div>无比部卫尉以为之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371068_comment'></div>而升名者百数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371068_comment'></div>今娄君非不足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371068_comment'></div>顾不乐而遁耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371068_comment'></div>因为予留三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371068_comment'></div>他日又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371068_comment'></div>吾所以求于心者未克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371068_comment'></div>今其行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371068_comment'></div>予既异其遁于名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371068_comment'></div>而又德其久留于我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371068_comment'></div>故为之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371068_comment'></div>夫君子之出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371068_comment'></div>以行其道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371068_comment'></div>其处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371068_comment'></div>以独善其身也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371068_comment'></div>今天下理平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371068_comment'></div>主上亟下求士之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371068_comment'></div>娄君智可以任职用事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371068_comment'></div>文可以宣风歌德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371068_comment'></div>行于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371068_comment'></div>必有合其道而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1371068", 1371068, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>进荐</span>之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371068_comment'></div>遽而为处士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371068_comment'></div>吾以为非时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371068_comment'></div>将曰老而就休耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371068_comment'></div>则甚少且锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371068_comment'></div>羸而自养耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371068_comment'></div>则甚硕且武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371068_comment'></div>问其所以处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371068_comment'></div>咸无名焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371068_comment'></div>若苟焉以图寿为道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371068_comment'></div>又非吾之所谓道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371068_comment'></div>夫形躯之寓于土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371068_comment'></div>非吾能私之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371068_comment'></div>幸而好求尧舜孔子之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371068_comment'></div>唯恐不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371068_comment'></div>幸而遇行尧舜孔子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371068_comment'></div>唯恐不慊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371068_comment'></div>若是而寿可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371068_comment'></div>求之而得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371068_comment'></div>行之而慊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371068_comment'></div>虽夭其谁悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371068_comment'></div>今将以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1371068", 1371068, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>呼嘘</span>为食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371068_comment'></div>咀嚼为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371068_comment'></div>无事为閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371068_comment'></div>不死为生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371068_comment'></div>则深山之木石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371068_comment'></div>大泽之龟蛇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371068_comment'></div>皆老而久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371068_comment'></div>其于道何如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371068_comment'></div>仆尝学于儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371068_comment'></div>持之不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371068_comment'></div>以陷于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371068_comment'></div>以出则穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371068_comment'></div>以处则乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371068_comment'></div>其不宜言道也审矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371068_comment'></div>以吾子见私于仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371068_comment'></div>而又重其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371068_comment'></div>故窃言而书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371068_comment'></div>而密授焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_116_1371068_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。徐从事北游，宗元作序送之。作品：《送徐从事北游序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第660页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371070' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371070' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371070?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送徐从事北游序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371070")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371070_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371070'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371070'>读诗礼春秋莫能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371070", 1371070, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>言说</span>。其容貌充充然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371070_comment'></div>而声名不闻传于世。岂天下广大多儒而使然欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371070_comment'></div>将晦其说。讳其读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371070_comment'></div>不使世得闻传其名欤。抑处于远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371070_comment'></div>仕于远。不与通都大邑豪杰角其技而至于是欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371070_comment'></div>不然。无显者为之倡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371070_comment'></div>以振动其声欤。今之世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371070_comment'></div>不能多儒可以盖生者。观生亦非晦其说讳其读者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371070_comment'></div>然则馀二者为之决矣。生北游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371070_comment'></div>必至通都大邑。通都大邑必有显者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371070_comment'></div>由是其果闻传于世欤。苟闻传必得位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371070_comment'></div>得位而以诗礼春秋之道施于事。及于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371070_comment'></div>思不负孔子之笔舌。能如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371070_comment'></div>然后可以为儒。儒可以说读为哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371070_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1371070_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。廖有方至永拜访，临别宗元作序送别。作品：《送诗人廖有方序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第661页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371071' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371071' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371071?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送诗人廖有方序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371071")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371071_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371071'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371071'>交州多南金珠玑玳瑁象犀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371071_comment'></div>其产皆奇怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371071_comment'></div>至于草木亦殊异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371071_comment'></div>吾尝怪阳德之炳耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371071_comment'></div>独发于纷葩瑰丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371071_comment'></div>而罕钟乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371071_comment'></div>今廖生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371071", 1371071, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>刚健</span>重厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371071_comment'></div>孝悌信让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371071_comment'></div>以质乎中而文乎外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371071_comment'></div>为唐诗有大雅之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371071_comment'></div>夫固钟于阳德者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371071_comment'></div>是世之所罕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371071_comment'></div>今之世恒人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371071_comment'></div>其于纷葩瑰丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371071_comment'></div>则凡知贵之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371071_comment'></div>其亦有贵廖生者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371071_comment'></div>果能是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371071_comment'></div>则吾不谓之恒人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371071_comment'></div>实亦世之所罕也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1371071_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。族属文郁到永探访，临别宗元作序送别。作品：《送文郁师序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第681页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371080' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371080?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送文郁师序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371080")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371080_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371080'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371080'>柳氏以文雅高于前代。近岁颇乏其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371080_comment'></div>百年间无为书命者。登礼部科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371080_comment'></div>数年乃一人。后学小童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371080_comment'></div>以文儒自业者又益寡。今有文郁师者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371080_comment'></div>读孔氏书。为诗歌逾百篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371080_comment'></div>其为有意乎文儒事矣。又遁而之释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371080_comment'></div>背笈箧。怀笔牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371080_comment'></div>挟海溯江。独行山水间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371080_comment'></div>翛翛然模状物态。搜伺隐隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371080_comment'></div>登高远望。悽怆超忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371080_comment'></div>游其心以求胜语。若有程督之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371080_comment'></div>已则被缁艾。茹蒿芹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371080_comment'></div>志终其身。吾诚怪而讥焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371080_comment'></div>对曰。力不任奔竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371080_comment'></div>志不任烦挐。苟以其所好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371080_comment'></div>行而求之而已尔。终不可变化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371080_comment'></div>吾思当世以文儒取名声为显官。入朝受憎媢讪黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371080_comment'></div>摧伏不得守其土者。十恒八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371080_comment'></div>若师者。其可讪而黜耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371080_comment'></div>用是不复讥其行。返退而自讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371080_comment'></div>于其辞而去也。则书以畀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371080_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1371080_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。元十八来永探访，居留时日后将离永南游，临行宗元作序送别。作品：《送元十八山人南游序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第662页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371072' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371072' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371072?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送元十八山人南游序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371072")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371072_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371072'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371072'>太史公尝言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371072_comment'></div>世之学孔氏者则黜老子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371072_comment'></div>学老子者则黜孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371072_comment'></div>道不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371072_comment'></div>不相为谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371072_comment'></div>予观老子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371072_comment'></div>亦孔氏之异流也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371072_comment'></div>不得以相抗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371072_comment'></div>又况杨墨申商刑名纵横之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371072_comment'></div>其迭相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371072", 1371072, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>訾毁</span>抵捂而不合者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371072_comment'></div>可胜言耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371072_comment'></div>然皆有以佐世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371072_comment'></div>太史公没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371072_comment'></div>其后有释氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371072_comment'></div>固学者之所怪骇舛逆其尤者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371072_comment'></div>今有河南元生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371072_comment'></div>其人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371072", 1371072, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>闳旷</span>而质直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371072_comment'></div>物无以挫其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371072_comment'></div>其为学恢博而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371072", 1371072, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>贯统</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371072_comment'></div>数无以踬其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371072_comment'></div>悉取向之所以异者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371072_comment'></div>通而同之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371072_comment'></div>搜择融液。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371072_comment'></div>与道大适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371072_comment'></div>咸伸其所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371072_comment'></div>而黜其奇邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371072_comment'></div>要之与孔子同道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371072_comment'></div>皆有以会其趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371072_comment'></div>而其器足以守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371072_comment'></div>其气足以行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371072_comment'></div>不以其道求合于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371072_comment'></div>常有意乎古之守雌者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371072_comment'></div>及至是邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371072_comment'></div>以予道穷多忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371072_comment'></div>而尝好斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371072_comment'></div>留三旬有六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371072_comment'></div>陈其大方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371072_comment'></div>勤以为谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371072_comment'></div>予始得其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371072_comment'></div>今又将去予而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371072_comment'></div>历营道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371072_comment'></div>观九疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371072_comment'></div>下漓水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371072_comment'></div>穷南越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371072_comment'></div>以临大海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371072_comment'></div>则吾未知其还也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371072_comment'></div>黄鹄一去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371072_comment'></div>青冥无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371072_comment'></div>安得不冯丰隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371072_comment'></div>愬蜚廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371072_comment'></div>以寄声于寥廓耶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1371072_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。湖南从事李础往东都洛阳省父，返时带韩愈致宗元书信，罪其不斥浮图。宗元作序回应，并为浩初送别。作品：《送僧浩初序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第673页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371077' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371077' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371077?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送僧浩初序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371077")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371077_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371077'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371077'>儒者韩退之与予善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371077_comment'></div>尝病予嗜浮屠言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371077_comment'></div>訾予与浮屠游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371077_comment'></div>近陇西李生础自东都来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371077_comment'></div>退之又寓书罪予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371077_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371077_comment'></div>见送元生序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371077_comment'></div>不斥浮屠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371077_comment'></div>浮屠诚有不可斥者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371077_comment'></div>往往与易论语合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371077_comment'></div>诚乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371077_comment'></div>其于性情奭然不与孔子异道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371077_comment'></div>退之好儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371077_comment'></div>未能过杨子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371077_comment'></div>杨子之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371077_comment'></div>于庄墨申韩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371077_comment'></div>皆有取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371077_comment'></div>浮屠者反不及庄墨申韩之怪僻险贼耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371077_comment'></div>曰以其夷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371077_comment'></div>果不信道而斥焉以夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371077_comment'></div>则将友恶来盗蹠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371077_comment'></div>而贱季札由余乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371077_comment'></div>非所谓去名求实者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371077_comment'></div>吾之所取者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371077_comment'></div>与易论语合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371077_comment'></div>虽圣人复生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371077_comment'></div>不可得而斥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371077_comment'></div>退之所罪者其迹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371077_comment'></div>曰瞢而缁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371077_comment'></div>无夫妇父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371077_comment'></div>不为耕农蚕桑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371077_comment'></div>而活乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371077_comment'></div>若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371077_comment'></div>虽吾亦不乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371077_comment'></div>退之忿其外而遗其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371077_comment'></div>是知石而不知韫玉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371077_comment'></div>吾之所以嗜浮屠之言以此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371077_comment'></div>与其人游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371077_comment'></div>未必能通其言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371077_comment'></div>且凡为其道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371077_comment'></div>不爱官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371077_comment'></div>不争能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371077_comment'></div>乐山水而嗜閒安者为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371077_comment'></div>吾病世之逐逐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371077_comment'></div>唯印组为务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371077_comment'></div>以相轧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371077_comment'></div>则舍是其焉从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371077_comment'></div>吾之好与浮屠游以此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371077_comment'></div>今浩初閒其性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371077_comment'></div>安其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371077_comment'></div>读其书通易论语。<div
