class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371077_comment'></div>唯山水之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371077_comment'></div>有文而文之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371077_comment'></div>又父子咸为其道以养而居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371077_comment'></div>泊焉而无求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371077_comment'></div>则其贤于为庄墨申韩之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371077_comment'></div>而逐逐然唯印组为务以相轧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371077_comment'></div>其亦远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371077_comment'></div>李生础与浩初又善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371077_comment'></div>今之往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371077_comment'></div>以吾言示之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371077_comment'></div>因此人寓退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371077_comment'></div>视何如也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1371077_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。琛上人自京师至永，又将赴桂州，宗元作序送别。作品：《送琛上人南游序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第680页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371079' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371079' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371079?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送琛上人南游序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371079")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371079_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371079'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371079'>佛之迹。去乎世久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371079_comment'></div>其留而存者。佛之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371079_comment'></div>言之著者为经。翼而成之者为论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371079_comment'></div>其流而来者。百不能一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371079_comment'></div>然而其道则备矣。法之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371079_comment'></div>莫尚乎般若。经之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371079_comment'></div>莫极乎涅槃。世之上士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371079_comment'></div>将欲由是以入者。非取乎经论则悖矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371079_comment'></div>而今之言禅者。有流荡舛误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371079_comment'></div>迭相师用。妄取空语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371079_comment'></div>而脱略方便。颠倒真实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371079_comment'></div>以陷乎已。而又陷乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371079_comment'></div>又有能言体而不及用者。不知二者之不可斯须离也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371079_comment'></div>离之外矣。是世之所大患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371079_comment'></div>吾琛则不然。观经得般若之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371079_comment'></div>读论悦三观之理。昼夜服习而身行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371079_comment'></div>有来求者。则为讲说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371079_comment'></div>从而化者。皆知佛之为大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371079_comment'></div>法之为广。菩萨大士之为雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371079_comment'></div>修而行者之为空。荡而无者之为碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371079_comment'></div>夫然。则与夫增上慢者异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371079_comment'></div>异乎是而免斯名者。吾无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371079_comment'></div>将以广其道而被于远。故好游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371079_comment'></div>自京师而来。又南出乎桂林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371079_comment'></div>未知其极也。吾病世之傲逸者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371079_comment'></div>嗜乎彼而不求乎此。故为之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371079_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1371079_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。玄举持诗求教，宗元作序送别。作品：《送玄举归幽泉寺序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第682页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371081' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371081' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371081?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送元举归幽泉寺序</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371081")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371081_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371081'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371081'>佛之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371081_comment'></div>大而多容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371081_comment'></div>凡有志乎物外而耻制于世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371081_comment'></div>则思入焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371081_comment'></div>故有貌而不心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371081_comment'></div>名而异行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371081_comment'></div>刚狷以离偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371081_comment'></div>纡舒以纵独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371081_comment'></div>其状类不一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371081_comment'></div>而皆童发毁服以游于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371081_comment'></div>其孰能知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371081_comment'></div>今所谓元举者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371081_comment'></div>其视瞻容体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371081_comment'></div>未必尽思迹佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371081_comment'></div>而持诗句以来求予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371081_comment'></div>夫岂耻制于世而有志乎物外者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371081_comment'></div>夫道独而迹狎则怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371081_comment'></div>志远而形羁则泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371081_comment'></div>幽泉山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371081_comment'></div>山之幽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371081_comment'></div>閒其志而由其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371081_comment'></div>以遁而乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371081_comment'></div>足以去二患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371081_comment'></div>舍是又何为耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371081_comment'></div>既曰为予来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371081_comment'></div>故于其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371081_comment'></div>不可以不告也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1371081_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰文记零陵县令薛存义于署内修建三亭之事。作品：《零陵三亭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷27第737页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371100' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371100' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371100?labeling=true' target='_blank'>零陵三亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371100")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371100_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371100'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371100'>邑之有观游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371100_comment'></div>或者以为非政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371100_comment'></div>是大不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371100_comment'></div>夫气烦则虑乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371100_comment'></div>视壅则志滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371100_comment'></div>君子必有游息之物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371100_comment'></div>高明之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371100_comment'></div>使之清宁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371100", 1371100, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>平夷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371100_comment'></div>恒若有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371100_comment'></div>然后理达而事成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371100_comment'></div>零陵县东有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371100", 1371100, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>山麓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371100_comment'></div>泉出石中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371100_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371100", 1371100, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>沮洳</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371100", 1371100, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>污涂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371100_comment'></div>群畜食焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371100_comment'></div>墙藩以蔽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371100_comment'></div>为县者积数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371100_comment'></div>莫知发视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371100_comment'></div>河东薛存义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371100_comment'></div>以吏能闻荆楚间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371100_comment'></div>潭部举之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371100_comment'></div>假湘源令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371100_comment'></div>会零陵政厖赋扰。<div "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>披露</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371100", 1371100, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>首服</span>。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371100_comment'></div>薛拜手曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371100_comment'></div>吾志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371100_comment'></div>遂刻之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_94_1371100_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰文记连州石钟乳由无而有一事。“零陵”为“连州”之误。作品：《零陵郡复乳穴记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷28第741页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。游小石城山，撰记文。作品：《小石城山记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷29第772页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371118' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371118' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371118?labeling=true' target='_blank'>小石城山记</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span
