class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371118_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371118'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371118'>自西山道口径北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371118_comment'></div>踰黄茅岭而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371118_comment'></div>有二道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371118_comment'></div>其一西出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371118_comment'></div>寻之无所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371118_comment'></div>其一少北而东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371118_comment'></div>不过四十丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371118_comment'></div>土断而川分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371118_comment'></div>有积石横当其垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371118_comment'></div>其上为睥睨梁欐之形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371118_comment'></div>其旁出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371118", 1371118, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>堡坞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371118_comment'></div>有若门焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371118_comment'></div>窥之正黑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371118_comment'></div>投以小石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371118_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371118", 1371118, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>洞然</span>有水声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371118_comment'></div>其响之激越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371118_comment'></div>良久乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371118_comment'></div>环之可上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371118_comment'></div>望甚远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371118_comment'></div>无土壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371118_comment'></div>而生嘉树美箭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371118_comment'></div>益奇而坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371118_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371118", 1371118, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>疏数</span>偃仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371118_comment'></div>类智者所施设也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371118_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371118_comment'></div>吾疑造物者之有无久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371118_comment'></div>及是愈以为诚有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371118_comment'></div>又怪其不为之中州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371118_comment'></div>而列是夷狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371118_comment'></div>更千百年不得一售其伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371118_comment'></div>是固<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作故）</span>劳而无用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371118_comment'></div>神者倘不宜如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371118_comment'></div>则其果无乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371118_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371118_comment'></div>以慰夫贤而辱于此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371118_comment'></div>或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371118_comment'></div>其气之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371118_comment'></div>不为伟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371118_comment'></div>而独为是物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371118_comment'></div>故楚之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371118_comment'></div>少人而多石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371118_comment'></div>是二者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371118_comment'></div>予未信之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1371118_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。感于玩弹棋之事，作序议之。作品：《序棋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷24第648页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371084' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371084' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371084?labeling=true' target='_blank'>序棋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371084")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371084_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371084'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371084'>房生直温与予二弟游。皆好学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371084_comment'></div>予病其确也。思所以休息之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371084_comment'></div>得木局。隆其中而规焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371084_comment'></div>其下方以直。置棋二十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371084_comment'></div>贵者半。贱者半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371084_comment'></div>贵曰上。贱曰下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371084_comment'></div>咸自第一至十二。下者二乃敌一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371084_comment'></div>用朱墨以别焉。房于是取二毫如其第书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371084_comment'></div>既而抵戏者二人。则视其贱者而贱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371084_comment'></div>贵者而贵之。其使之击触也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371084_comment'></div>必先贱者。不得巳而使贵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371084_comment'></div>则皆慄焉惛焉。亦鲜克以中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371084_comment'></div>其获也。得朱焉则若有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371084_comment'></div>得墨焉则若不足。予<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371084", 1371084, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>谛睨</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371084_comment'></div>以思其始。则皆类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371084_comment'></div>房子一书之而轻重若是。适近其手而先焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371084_comment'></div>非能择其善而朱之。否而墨之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371084_comment'></div>然而上焉而上。下焉而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371084_comment'></div>贵焉而贵。贱焉而贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371084_comment'></div>其易彼而敬此。遂以远焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371084_comment'></div>然则若世之所以贵贱人者。有异房之贵贱于兹棋者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371084_comment'></div>无亦近而先之耳。其有果能择其善否者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371084_comment'></div>其敬而易者。亦从而动心矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371084_comment'></div>有敢议其善否者欤。其得于贵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371084_comment'></div>有不气扬而志荡者欤。其得于贱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371084_comment'></div>有不貌慢而心肆者欤。其所谓贵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371084_comment'></div>有敢轻而使之击触者欤。其所谓贱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371084_comment'></div>有敢避其使之击触者欤。彼朱而墨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371084_comment'></div>相去千万且不啻。有敢以二敌其一者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371084_comment'></div>予墨者徒也。观其始与末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371084_comment'></div>有似棋者。故叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371084_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1371084_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰文回应韩愈“言天之说”，表天人相分论。作品：《天说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷16第441页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371158' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371158' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371158?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天说</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371158")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371158_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371158'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371158'>韩愈谓柳子曰。若知天之说乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371158_comment'></div>吾为子言天之说。今夫人有疾痛倦辱饥寒甚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371158_comment'></div>因仰而呼天曰。残民者昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371158_comment'></div>佑民者殃。又仰而呼天曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371158_comment'></div>何为使至此极戾也。若是者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371158_comment'></div>举不能知天。夫果蓏饮食既坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371158_comment'></div>虫生之。人之血气败逆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371158", 1371158, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>壅底</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371158_comment'></div>为痈疡疣赘瘘痔。虫生之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371158_comment'></div>木朽而蝎中。草腐而萤飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371158_comment'></div>是岂不以坏而后出耶。物坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371158_comment'></div>虫由之生。元气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371158", 1371158, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>阴阳</span>之坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371158_comment'></div>人由之生。虫之生而物益坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371158_comment'></div>食齧之。攻穴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371158_comment'></div>虫之祸物也滋甚。其有能去之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371158_comment'></div>有功于物者也。繁而息之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371158_comment'></div>物之雠也。人之坏元气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371158", 1371158, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>阴阳</span>也亦滋甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371158_comment'></div>垦原田。伐山林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371158_comment'></div>凿泉以井饮。窾墓以送死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371158_comment'></div>而又穴为匽溲。筑为墙垣城郭台榭观游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371158_comment'></div>疏为川渎沟洫陂池。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371158", 1371158, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>燧木</span>以燔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371158_comment'></div>革金以镕。陶甄琢磨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371158_comment'></div>悴然使天地万物不得其情。倖倖冲冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371158_comment'></div>攻残败挠而未尝息。其为祸元气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371158", 1371158, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>阴阳</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371158_comment'></div>不甚于虫之所为乎。吾意有能残斯人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371158_comment'></div>使日薄岁削。祸元气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371158", 1371158, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>阴阳</span>者滋少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371158_comment'></div>是则有功于天地者也。蕃而息之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371158_comment'></div>天地之雠也。今夫人举不能知天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371158_comment'></div>故为是呼且怨也。吾意天闻其呼且怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371158_comment'></div>则有功者受赏必大矣。其祸焉者受罚亦大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371158_comment'></div>子以吾言为何如。柳子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371158_comment'></div>子诚有激而为是耶。则信辩且美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371158_comment'></div>吾能终其说。彼上而元者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371158_comment'></div>世谓之天。下而黄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371158_comment'></div>世谓之地。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371158", 1371158, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>浑然</span>而中处者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371158_comment'></div>世谓之元气。寒而暑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371158_comment'></div>世谓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1371158", 1371158, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>阴阳</span>。是虽大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371158_comment'></div>无异果蓏痈痔草木也。假而有能去其攻穴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371158_comment'></div>是物也。其能有报乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371158_comment'></div>蕃而息之者。其能有怒乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371158_comment'></div>天地大果蓏也。元气大痈痔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371158_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1371158", 1371158, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>阴阳</span>大草木也。其乌能赏功而罚祸乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371158_comment'></div>功者自功。祸者自祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371158_comment'></div>欲望其赏罚者。大谬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371158_comment'></div>呼而怨。欲望其哀且仁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371158_comment'></div>愈大谬矣。子而信子之仁义以游其内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371158_comment'></div>生而死尔。乌置存亡得丧于果蓏痈痔草木耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371158_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1371158_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。撰文讨学，答刘禹锡《天论》三篇。作品：《答刘禹锡天论书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷31第816页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370974' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370974' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370974?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答刘禹锡天论书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370974")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370974_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370974'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370974'>宗元白。发书得天论三篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370974_comment'></div>以仆所为天说为未究。欲毕其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370974_comment'></div>始得之。大喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370974_comment'></div>谓有以开明吾志虑。及详读五六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370974_comment'></div>求其所以异吾说。卒不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370974_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370974", 1370974, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>归要</span>曰。非天预乎人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370974_comment'></div>凡子之论。乃吾天说传疏耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370974_comment'></div>无异道焉。谆谆佐吾言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370974_comment'></div>而曰有以异。不识何以为异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370974_comment'></div>子之所以为异者。岂不以赞天之能生植也欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370974_comment'></div>夫天之能生植久矣。不待赞而显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370974_comment'></div>且子以天之生植也。为天耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370974_comment'></div>为人耶。抑自生而植乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370974_comment'></div>若以为为人。则吾愈不识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370974_comment'></div>若果以为自生而植。则彼自生而植耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370974_comment'></div>何以异夫果蓏之自为果蓏。痈痔之自为痈痔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370974_comment'></div>草木之自为草木耶。是非为虫谋明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370974_comment'></div>犹天之不谋乎人也。彼不我谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370974_comment'></div>而我何为务胜之耶。子所谓交胜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370974_comment'></div>若天恒为恶。人恒为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370974_comment'></div>人胜天则善者行。是又过德乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370974_comment'></div>过罪乎天也。又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370974_comment'></div>天之能者生植也。人之能者法制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370974_comment'></div>是判天与人为四而言之者也。余则曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370974_comment'></div>生植与灾荒。皆天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370974_comment'></div>法制与悖乱。皆人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370974_comment'></div>二之而已。其事各行不相预。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370974_comment'></div>而凶丰理乱出焉。究之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370974_comment'></div>凡子之辞。枝叶甚美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370974_comment'></div>而根不直。取以遂焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370974_comment'></div>又子之喻乎旅者。皆人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370974_comment'></div>而一曰天胜焉。一曰人胜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370974_comment'></div>何哉。莽苍之先者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370974_comment'></div>力胜也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1370974", 1370974, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>邑郛</span>之先者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370974_comment'></div>智胜也。虞芮力穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370974_comment'></div>匡宋智穷也。是非存亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370974_comment'></div>皆未见其可以喻乎天者。若子之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370974_comment'></div>要以乱为天理。理为人理耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370974_comment'></div>谬矣。若操舟之言人与天者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370974_comment'></div>愚民恒说耳。幽厉之云为上帝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370974_comment'></div>无所归怨之辞尔。皆不足喻乎道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370974_comment'></div>子其熟之。无羡言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1370974", 1370974, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>侈论</span>以益其枝叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370974_comment'></div>姑务本之为得。不亦裕乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370974_comment'></div>独所谓无形为无常形者甚善。宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370974_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1370974_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作书寄友刘禹锡，商榷学易。作品：《与刘禹锡论周易九六书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷31第813页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370975' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370975' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370975?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与刘禹锡论周易九六说书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370975")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370975_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370975'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370975'>见与董生论周易九六义。取老而变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370975_comment'></div>以为毕中和承一行僧得此说。异孔颖达疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370975_comment'></div>而以为新奇。彼毕子董子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370975_comment'></div>何肤末于学而遽云云也。都不知一行僧承韩氏孔氏说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370975_comment'></div>而果以为新奇。不亦可笑矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370975_comment'></div>韩氏注乾之策二百一十有六。曰乾一爻三十有六策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370975_comment'></div>则是取其过揲四分而九也。坤之策一百四十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370975_comment'></div>曰坤一爻二十四策。则是取其过揲四分而六也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370975_comment'></div>孔颖达等作正义。论云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370975_comment'></div>九六有二义。其一者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370975_comment'></div>阳得兼阴。阴不得兼阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370975_comment'></div>其二者曰。老阳数九也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370975_comment'></div>老阴数六也。二者皆变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370975_comment'></div>周易以变者占。郑元注易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370975_comment'></div>亦称以变者占。故云九六也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370975_comment'></div>所以老阳九老阴六者。九过揲得老阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370975_comment'></div>六过揲得老阴。此具在正义乾篇中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370975_comment'></div>周简子之说亦若此。而又详备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370975_comment'></div>何毕子董子之不视其书。而妄以口承之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370975_comment'></div>君子之学。将有以异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370975_comment'></div>必先究穷其书。究穷而不得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370975_comment'></div>乃可以立正也。今二子尚未能读韩氏注孔氏正义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370975_comment'></div>是见其道听而途说者。又何能知所谓易者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370975_comment'></div>足下取二家言观之。则见毕子董子肤末于学而遽云云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370975_comment'></div>足下所为书。非元凯兼三易者则诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370975_comment'></div>若曰孰与颖达著。则此说乃颖达也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370975_comment'></div>非一行僧毕子董子能有异说者也。无乃即其谬而承之者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370975_comment'></div>观足下出入筮数。考校左氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370975_comment'></div>今之世罕有如足下求易之悉者也。然务先穷昔人书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370975_comment'></div>有不可者而后革之。则大善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370975_comment'></div>谨之勿遽。宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370975_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1370975_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作书答元饶州，论春秋学。作品：《答元饶州论春秋书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷31第818页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370976' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370976' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370976?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答元饶州论春秋书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370976")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370976_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370976'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370976'>辱复书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370976_comment'></div>教以报张生书及答衢州书言春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370976_comment'></div>此诚世所希闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370976_comment'></div>兄之学为不负孔氏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370976_comment'></div>往年曾记裴封叔宅闻兄与裴太常言晋人及姜戎败秦师于殽一义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370976_comment'></div>尝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1370976", 1370976, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>讽习</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370976_comment'></div>又闻韩宣英及亡友吕和叔辈言他义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370976_comment'></div>知春秋之道久隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370976_comment'></div>而近乃出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370976_comment'></div>京中于韩安平处始得微指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370976_comment'></div>和叔处始见集注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370976_comment'></div>恒愿扫于陆先生之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370976_comment'></div>及先生为给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370976_comment'></div>与宗元入尚书同日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370976_comment'></div>居又与先生同巷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370976_comment'></div>始得执弟子礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370976_comment'></div>未及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370976", 1370976, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>讲讨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370976_comment'></div>会先生病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370976_comment'></div>时闻要论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370976_comment'></div>常以易教诲见宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370976_comment'></div>不幸先生疾弥甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370976_comment'></div>宗元又出邵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370976_comment'></div>乃大乖谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370976_comment'></div>不克卒业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370976_comment'></div>复于亡友淩生处尽得宗指辨疑集注等一通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370976_comment'></div>伏而读之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370976_comment'></div>于纪侯大去其国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370976_comment'></div>见圣人之道与尧舜合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370976_comment'></div>不惟文王周公之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370976_comment'></div>独取其法耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370976_comment'></div>于夫人姜氏会齐侯于禚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370976_comment'></div>见圣人立孝经之大端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370976_comment'></div>所以明其分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370976_comment'></div>于楚人杀陈夏徵舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370976_comment'></div>丁亥楚子入陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370976_comment'></div>纳公孙宁仪行父于陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370976_comment'></div>见圣人褒贬与夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370976_comment'></div>唯当之所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370976_comment'></div>所谓瑕瑜不掩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370976_comment'></div>反覆甚喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370976_comment'></div>若吾生前距此数十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370976_comment'></div>则不得是学矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370976_comment'></div>今适后之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370976_comment'></div>不为不遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370976_comment'></div>兄书中所陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370976_comment'></div>皆孔氏大趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370976_comment'></div>无得踰焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370976_comment'></div>其言书荀息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370976_comment'></div>贬立卓之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370976_comment'></div>顷尝怪荀息奉君之邪心以立嬖子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370976_comment'></div>不务正义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370976_comment'></div>弃重耳于外而专其宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370976_comment'></div>孔子同于仇牧孔父为之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370976_comment'></div>今兄言贬息大善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370976_comment'></div>息固当贬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370976_comment'></div>然则春秋与仇孔辞不异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370976_comment'></div>仇孔亦有贬欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370976_comment'></div>宗元尝著非国语六十馀篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370976_comment'></div>其一篇为息发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370976_comment'></div>今录以往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370976_comment'></div>可如愚之所谓者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370976_comment'></div>微指中明郑人来渝平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370976_comment'></div>量力而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370976_comment'></div>告而后绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370976_comment'></div>固先同后异者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370976_comment'></div>今检此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370976_comment'></div>前无与郑同之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370976_comment'></div>后无与郑异之据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370976_comment'></div>独疑此一义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370976_comment'></div>理甚精而事有不合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370976_comment'></div>兄亦当指而教焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370976_comment'></div>往年又闻和叔言兄论楚商臣一义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370976_comment'></div>虽啖赵陆氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370976_comment'></div>皆所未及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370976_comment'></div>请具录当疏微指下以传末学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370976_comment'></div>萧张前书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370976_comment'></div>亦请见及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370976_comment'></div>至之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370976_comment'></div>勒为一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370976_comment'></div>以垂将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370976_comment'></div>宗元始至是州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370976_comment'></div>作陆先生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1370976", 1370976, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>墓表</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370976_comment'></div>今以奉献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370976_comment'></div>与宣英读之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370976_comment'></div>春秋之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370976_comment'></div>如日月不可赞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370976_comment'></div>若赞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370976_comment'></div>必同于孔蹠优劣之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370976_comment'></div>故举其一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370976_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370976_comment'></div>宗元再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_90_1370976_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作书论政理，以答元饶州。作品：《答元饶州论政理书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷32第831页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370980' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370980' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370980?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答元饶州论政理书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370980")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370980_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370980'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370980'>奉书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370980_comment'></div>辱示以政理之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370980_comment'></div>及刘梦得书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370980_comment'></div>往复甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370980_comment'></div>类非今之长人者之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370980_comment'></div>不惟充赋税养禄秩足己而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370980_comment'></div>独以富庶且教为大任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370980_comment'></div>甚盛甚盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370980_comment'></div>孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370980_comment'></div>吾与回言终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370980_comment'></div>不违如愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370980_comment'></div>然则蒙者固难晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370980_comment'></div>必劳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>申谕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370980_comment'></div>乃得悦服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370980_comment'></div>用是尚有一疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370980_comment'></div>兄所言免贫病者而不益富者税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370980_comment'></div>此诚当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370980_comment'></div>乘理政之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370980_comment'></div>固非若此不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370980_comment'></div>不幸乘弊政之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370980_comment'></div>其可尔耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370980_comment'></div>夫弊政之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370980_comment'></div>莫若贿赂行而征赋乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370980_comment'></div>苟然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370980_comment'></div>则贫者无赀以求于吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370980_comment'></div>所谓有贫之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370980_comment'></div>而不得贫之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370980_comment'></div>富者操其赢以韨于吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370980_comment'></div>则无富之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370980_comment'></div>而有富之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370980_comment'></div>贫者愈困饿死亡而莫之省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370980_comment'></div>富者愈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>恣横</span>侈泰而无所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370980_comment'></div>兄若所遇如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370980_comment'></div>则将信其故乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370980_comment'></div>是不可惧挠人而终不问也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370980_comment'></div>固必问其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370980_comment'></div>问其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370980_comment'></div>则贫者固免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370980_comment'></div>而富者固增赋矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370980_comment'></div>安得持一定之论哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370980_comment'></div>若曰止免贫者而富者不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370980_comment'></div>则侥倖者众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370980_comment'></div>皆挟重利以邀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370980_comment'></div>贫者犹若不免焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370980_comment'></div>若曰检富者惧不得实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370980_comment'></div>而不可增焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370980_comment'></div>则贫者亦不得实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370980_comment'></div>不可免矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370980_comment'></div>若皆得实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370980_comment'></div>而故纵以为不均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370980_comment'></div>何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370980_comment'></div>孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370980_comment'></div>不患寡而患不均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370980_comment'></div>不患贫而患不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370980_comment'></div>今富者税益少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370980_comment'></div>贫者不免于捃拾以输<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>县官</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370980_comment'></div>其为不均大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370980_comment'></div>然非唯此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370980_comment'></div>必将服役而奴使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370980_comment'></div>多与之田而取其半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370980_comment'></div>或乃出其一而收其二三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370980_comment'></div>主上思人之劳苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370980_comment'></div>或减除其税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370980_comment'></div>则富者以户独免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370980_comment'></div>而贫者以受役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370980_comment'></div>卒输其二三与半焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370980_comment'></div>是泽不下流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370980_comment'></div>而人无所告诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370980_comment'></div>其为不安亦大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370980_comment'></div>夫如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370980_comment'></div>不一定经界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370980_comment'></div>覈名实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370980_comment'></div>而姑重改作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370980_comment'></div>其可理乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370980_comment'></div>夫富室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370980_comment'></div>贫之母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370980_comment'></div>诚不可破坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370980_comment'></div>然使其太倖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370980_comment'></div>而役于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370980_comment'></div>则又不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370980_comment'></div>兄云惧富人流为工商<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>浮窳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370980_comment'></div>盖甚急而不均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370980_comment'></div>则有此尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370980_comment'></div>若富者虽益赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370980_comment'></div>而其实输当其十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370980_comment'></div>犹足安其堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370980_comment'></div>虽驱之不肯易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1370980_comment'></div>检之逾精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1370980_comment'></div>则下逾巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1370980_comment'></div>诚如兄之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1370980_comment'></div>管子亦不欲以民产为征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1370980_comment'></div>故有杀畜伐木之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1370980_comment'></div>今若非韨井之征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1370980_comment'></div>则舍其产而唯丁田之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1370980_comment'></div>推以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>诚质</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1370980_comment'></div>示以恩惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1370980_comment'></div>严责吏以法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1370980_comment'></div>如所陈一社一村之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1370980_comment'></div>递以信相考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1370980_comment'></div>安有不得其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1370980_comment'></div>不得其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1370980_comment'></div>则一社一村之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1370980_comment'></div>亦不可行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1370980_comment'></div>是故乘弊政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1370980_comment'></div>必须一定制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1370980_comment'></div>而后兄之说乃得行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1370980_comment'></div>蒙之所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1370980_comment'></div>及此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1370980_comment'></div>永州以僻隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1370980_comment'></div>少知人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1370980_comment'></div>兄之所代者谁耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1370980_comment'></div>理欤弊欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1370980_comment'></div>理则其说行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1370980_comment'></div>若其弊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1370980_comment'></div>蒙之说其在可用之数乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1370980_comment'></div>因南人来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1370980_comment'></div>重晓之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1370980_comment'></div>其他皆善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1370980_comment'></div>愚不足以议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1370980_comment'></div>愿同梦得之云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1370980_comment'></div>兄通春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1370980_comment'></div>得圣人大中之法以为理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1370980_comment'></div>饶之理小也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1370980_comment'></div>不足费其虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1370980_comment'></div>无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_124_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>论刺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1370980_comment'></div>故独举均赋之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1370980_comment'></div>以求往复而除其惑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1370980_comment'></div>不习吏职而强言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1370980_comment'></div>宜为长者所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_128_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>笑弄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1370980_comment'></div>然不如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1370980_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_130_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>无以</span>来至当之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1370980_comment'></div>盖明而教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1370980_comment'></div>君子所以开后学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1370980_comment'></div>又闻兄之莅政三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1370980_comment'></div>举韩宣英以代己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1370980_comment'></div>宣英<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_135_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>达识</span>多闻而习于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1370980_comment'></div>宜当贤者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_136_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>类举</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1370980_comment'></div>今负罪屏弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1370980_comment'></div>凡人不敢称道其善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1370980_comment'></div>况又闻于大君以二千石荐之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1370980_comment'></div>是乃希世拔俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1370980_comment'></div>果于直道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1370980_comment'></div>斯古人之所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1370980_comment'></div>而兄行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1370980_comment'></div>宗元与宣英同罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1370980_comment'></div>皆世所背驰者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1370980_comment'></div>兄一举而德皆及焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1370980_comment'></div>祁大夫不见叔向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1370980_comment'></div>今而预知斯举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1370980_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_149_1370980", 1370980, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>下走</span>之大过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1370980_comment'></div>书虽多言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1370980_comment'></div>不足导意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1370980_comment'></div>故止于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1370980_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1370980_comment'></div>宗元再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_154_1370980_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作书答周君巢，论饵药久寿事。作品：《答周君巢饵药久寿书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷32第839页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370982' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370982' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370982?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答周君巢饵药久寿书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370982")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370982_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370982'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370982'>奉二月九日书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370982_comment'></div>所以抚教甚具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370982_comment'></div>无以加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370982_comment'></div>丈人用文雅从知己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370982_comment'></div>日以惇大府之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370982_comment'></div>甚适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370982_comment'></div>东西来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370982_comment'></div>皆曰海上多君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370982_comment'></div>周为倡焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370982_comment'></div>敢再拜称贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370982_comment'></div>宗元以罪大摈废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370982_comment'></div>居小州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370982_comment'></div>与囚徒为朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370982_comment'></div>行则若带<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370982", 1370982, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>纆索</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370982_comment'></div>处则若关<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370982", 1370982, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>桎梏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370982_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370982", 1370982, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>彳亍</span>而无所趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370982_comment'></div>拳拘而不能肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370982_comment'></div>槁焉若蘖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370982_comment'></div>隤焉若璞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370982_comment'></div>其形固若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370982_comment'></div>则其中者可得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370982_comment'></div>然犹未尝肯道鬼神等事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370982_comment'></div>今丈人乃盛誉山泽之臞者以为寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370982_comment'></div>且神其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370982_comment'></div>若与尧舜孔子似不相类焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370982_comment'></div>何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370982_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370982_comment'></div>饵药可以久寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370982_comment'></div>将分以见与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370982_comment'></div>固小子之所不欲得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370982_comment'></div>尝以君子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370982_comment'></div>处焉则外愚而内益智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370982_comment'></div>外讷而内益辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370982_comment'></div>外柔而内益刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370982_comment'></div>出焉则内外若一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370982_comment'></div>而时动以取其宜当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370982_comment'></div>而生人之性得以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370982_comment'></div>圣人之道得以光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370982_comment'></div>获是而中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370982_comment'></div>虽不至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370982", 1370982, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>耇老</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370982_comment'></div>其道寿矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370982_comment'></div>今夫山泽之臞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370982_comment'></div>于我无有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370982_comment'></div>视世之乱若理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370982_comment'></div>视人之害若利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370982_comment'></div>视道之悖若义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370982_comment'></div>我寿而生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370982_comment'></div>彼夭而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370982_comment'></div>固无能动其肺肝焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370982_comment'></div>昧昧而趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370982_comment'></div>屯屯而居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370982_comment'></div>浩然若有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370982_comment'></div>掘草烹石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370982_comment'></div>以私其筋骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370982_comment'></div>而日以益愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370982_comment'></div>他人莫利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370982_comment'></div>己独以愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370982_comment'></div>若是者愈千百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370982_comment'></div>滋所谓天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370982_comment'></div>又何以为高明之图哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370982_comment'></div>宗元始者讲道不笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370982_comment'></div>以蒙世显利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370982_comment'></div>动获大僇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370982_comment'></div>用是奔窜禁锢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370982_comment'></div>为世之所诟病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370982_comment'></div>凡所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1370982", 1370982, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>设施</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370982_comment'></div>皆以为戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370982_comment'></div>从而吠者成群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370982_comment'></div>已不能明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370982_comment'></div>而况人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370982_comment'></div>然苟守先圣之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370982_comment'></div>由大中以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370982_comment'></div>虽万受摈弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370982_comment'></div>不更乎其内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370982_comment'></div>大都类往时京城西与丈人言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370982_comment'></div>愚不能改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370982_comment'></div>亦欲丈人固往时所执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370982_comment'></div>推而大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370982_comment'></div>不为方士所惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370982_comment'></div>仕虽未达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370982_comment'></div>无忘生人之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370982_comment'></div>则圣人之道幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370982_comment'></div>其必有陈矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370982_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370982_comment'></div>宗元再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_84_1370982_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。受吕恭之请，鉴定墓中石书真伪，撰书答之。作品：《与吕恭论墓中石书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷31第826页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370973' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370973' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370973?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与吕恭论墓中石书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370973")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370973_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370973'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370973'>宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370973_comment'></div>元生至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370973_comment'></div>得弟书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370973_comment'></div>甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370973_comment'></div>诸所称道具之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370973_comment'></div>元生又持部中庐父墓者所得石书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370973_comment'></div>模其文示余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370973_comment'></div>曰若将闻于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370973_comment'></div>余故恐而疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370973_comment'></div>仆蚤好观古书家所蓄晋魏时尺牍甚具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370973_comment'></div>又二十年来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370973_comment'></div>遍观长安贵人好事者所蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370973_comment'></div>殆无遗焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370973_comment'></div>以是善知书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370973_comment'></div>虽未尝见名氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370973_comment'></div>亦望而识其时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370973_comment'></div>又文章之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370973", 1370973, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>形状</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370973_comment'></div>古今特异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370973_comment'></div>弟之精敏通达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370973_comment'></div>夫岂不究于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370973_comment'></div>今视石之署其年曰永嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370973_comment'></div>其书则今田野人所作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370973_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1370973", 1370973, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>支离</span>其字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370973_comment'></div>尤不能近古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370973_comment'></div>为其永字等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370973_comment'></div>颇效王氏变法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370973_comment'></div>皆永嘉所未有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370973_comment'></div>辞尤鄙近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370973_comment'></div>若今所谓律诗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370973_comment'></div>晋时盖未尝为此声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370973_comment'></div>大谬妄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370973_comment'></div>又言植松乌擢之怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370973_comment'></div>而掘其土得石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370973_comment'></div>尤不经难信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370973_comment'></div>或者得无奸为之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370973_comment'></div>且古之言葬者藏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370973_comment'></div>壤树之而君子以为议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370973_comment'></div>况庐而居者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370973_comment'></div>其足尚之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370973_comment'></div>圣人有制度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370973_comment'></div>有法令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370973_comment'></div>过则为辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370973_comment'></div>故立大中者不尚异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370973_comment'></div>教人者欲其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370973_comment'></div>是故恶夫饰且伪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370973_comment'></div>过制而不除丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370973_comment'></div>宜庐于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370973_comment'></div>而矫于墓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370973_comment'></div>大中之罪人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370973_comment'></div>况又出怪物诡神道以奸大法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370973_comment'></div>而因以为利乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370973_comment'></div>夫伪孝以奸利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370973_comment'></div>诚仁者不忍擿过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370973_comment'></div>恐伤于教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370973_comment'></div>然使伪可为而利可冒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370973_comment'></div>则教益坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370973_comment'></div>若然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370973_comment'></div>勿与知焉可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370973_comment'></div>伏而不出之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370973_comment'></div>以大夫之政良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370973_comment'></div>而吾子赞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370973_comment'></div>固无阙遗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370973_comment'></div>作东郛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370973_comment'></div>改市廛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370973_comment'></div>去比竹茨草之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370973_comment'></div>而垍土大木陶甄梓匠之工备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370973_comment'></div>孽火不得作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370973_comment'></div>化惰窳之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370973_comment'></div>绝偷浮之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370973_comment'></div>而条桑浴种深耕易耨之力用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370973_comment'></div>宽徭啬货均赋之政起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370973_comment'></div>其道美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370973_comment'></div>于斯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370973_comment'></div>虑善善之过而莫之省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370973_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1370973", 1370973, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>诚悫</span>之道少损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370973_comment'></div>故敢私言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370973_comment'></div>夫以淮济之清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370973_comment'></div>有玷焉若秋毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370973_comment'></div>固不为病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370973_comment'></div>然万一离娄子眇然睨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370973_comment'></div>不若无之者之快也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370973_comment'></div>想默己其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370973_comment'></div>毋出所置书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370973_comment'></div>幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370973_comment'></div>宗元白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_84_1370973_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作书与友人，论文章之难。作品：《与友人论为文书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷31第829页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370979' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370979' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370979?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与友人论为文书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370979")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370979_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370979'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370979'>古今号文章为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370979_comment'></div>足下知其所以难乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370979_comment'></div>非谓比兴之不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370979_comment'></div>恢拓之不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370979_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1370979", 1370979, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>钻砺</span>之不工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370979_comment'></div>颇颣之不除也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370979_comment'></div>得之为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370979_comment'></div>知之愈难耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370979_comment'></div>苟或得其高朗<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作明）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370979_comment'></div>探其深赜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370979_comment'></div>虽有芜败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370979_comment'></div>则为日月之蚀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370979_comment'></div>大圭之瑕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370979_comment'></div>曷足伤其明黜其宝哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370979_comment'></div>且自孔氏以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370979_comment'></div>兹道大阐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370979_comment'></div>家修人励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370979_comment'></div>刓精竭虑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370979_comment'></div>几千年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370979_comment'></div>其间耗费简札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370979_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370979", 1370979, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>役用</span>心神者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370979_comment'></div>其可数乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370979_comment'></div>登文章之箓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370979_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370979", 1370979, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>波及</span>后代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370979_comment'></div>越不过数十人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370979_comment'></div>其馀谁不欲争裂绮绣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370979_comment'></div>互攀日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370979_comment'></div>高视于万物之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370979_comment'></div>雄峙于百代之下乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370979_comment'></div>率皆纵臾而不克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370979_comment'></div>踯躅而不进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370979_comment'></div>力䠞势穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370979_comment'></div>吞志而没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370979_comment'></div>故曰得之为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370979_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370979_comment'></div>道之显晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370979_comment'></div>幸不幸系焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370979_comment'></div>谈之辩讷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370979_comment'></div>升降系焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370979_comment'></div>鉴之颇正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370979_comment'></div>好恶系焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370979_comment'></div>交之广狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370979_comment'></div>屈伸系焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370979_comment'></div>则彼卓然自得以奋其间者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370979_comment'></div>合乎否乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370979_comment'></div>是未可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370979_comment'></div>而又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1370979", 1370979, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>荣古虐今</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370979_comment'></div>比肩謺迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370979_comment'></div>大抵生则不遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370979_comment'></div>死而垂声者众焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370979_comment'></div>扬雄没而法言大兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370979_comment'></div>马迁生而史记未振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370979_comment'></div>彼之二才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370979_comment'></div>犹且若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370979_comment'></div>况乎未甚闻者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1370979_comment'></div>固有文不传于后祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1370979_comment'></div>声遂绝于天下者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1370979_comment'></div>故曰知之愈难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1370979_comment'></div>而为文之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1370979_comment'></div>亦多渔猎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1370979", 1370979, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>前作</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1370979_comment'></div>戕贼文史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1370979_comment'></div>抉其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1370979_comment'></div>抽其华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1370979_comment'></div>置齿牙间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1370979_comment'></div>遇事起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1370979_comment'></div>金声玉耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1370979_comment'></div>诳聋瞽之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1370979_comment'></div>徼一时之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1370979_comment'></div>虽终沦弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1370979_comment'></div>而其夺朱乱雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1370979_comment'></div>为害已甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1370979_comment'></div>是其所以难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1370979_comment'></div>间闻足下欲观仆文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1370979_comment'></div>退发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1370979", 1370979, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>囊笥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1370979_comment'></div>编其芜秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1370979_comment'></div>心悸气动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1370979_comment'></div>交于胸中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1370979_comment'></div>未知孰胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1370979_comment'></div>故久滞而不往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1370979_comment'></div>今往仆所著赋颂碑碣文记议论书序之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1370979_comment'></div>凡四十八篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1370979_comment'></div>合为一通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1370979_comment'></div>想令治书苍头吟讽之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1370979_comment'></div>击辕拊缶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1370979_comment'></div>必有所择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1370979_comment'></div>顾鉴视何如耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1370979_comment'></div>还以一字示褒贬焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1370979_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。友王参元家失火，宗元致书贺之。作品：《贺进士王参元失火书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷33第862页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370987' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370987' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370987?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺进士王参元失火书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370987")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370987_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370987'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370987'>得杨八书。知足下遇火灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370987_comment'></div>家无馀储。仆始闻而骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370987_comment'></div>中而疑。终乃大喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370987_comment'></div>盖将吊而更以贺也。道远言略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370987_comment'></div>犹未能究知其状。果若荡焉泯焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370987_comment'></div>而悉无有。乃吾所以尤贺者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370987_comment'></div>足下勤奉养。乐朝夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370987_comment'></div>惟恬安无事是望也。今乃有焚炀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1370987", 1370987, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>赫烈</span>之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370987_comment'></div>以震骇左右。而脂膏滫瀡之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370987_comment'></div>或以不给。吾是以始而骇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370987_comment'></div>凡人之言。皆曰盈虚倚伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370987_comment'></div>去来之不可常。或将大有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370987_comment'></div>乃始厄困震悸。于是有水火之孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370987_comment'></div>有群小之愠。劳苦变动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370987_comment'></div>而后能光明。古之人皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370987_comment'></div>斯道辽阔诞漫。虽圣人不能以是必信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370987_comment'></div>是故中而疑也。以足下读古人书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370987_comment'></div>为文章。善小学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370987_comment'></div>其为多能若是。而进不能出群士之上以取显贵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370987_comment'></div>盖无他焉。京城人多言足下家有积货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370987_comment'></div>士之好廉名者。皆畏忌不敢道足下之善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370987_comment'></div>独自得之心蓄之。衔忍而不出诸口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370987_comment'></div>以公道之难明。而世之多嫌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370987_comment'></div>一出口则蚩蚩者以为得重赂。仆自贞元十五年见足下之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370987_comment'></div>蓄之者盖六七年未尝言。是仆私一身而负公道久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370987_comment'></div>非特负足下也。及为御史尚书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370987_comment'></div>自以幸为天子近臣。得奋其舌思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370987_comment'></div>以发明足下之郁塞。然时称道于行列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370987_comment'></div>犹有顾视而窃笑者。仆良恨修己之不亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370987_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1370987", 1370987, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>素誉</span>之不立。而为世嫌之所加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370987_comment'></div>常与孟几道言而痛之。乃今幸为天火之所涤荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370987_comment'></div>凡众之疑虑。举为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1370987", 1370987, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>灰埃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370987_comment'></div>黔其庐。赭其垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370987_comment'></div>以示其无有。而足下之才能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370987_comment'></div>乃可显白而不污。其实出矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370987_comment'></div>是祝融回禄之相吾子也。则仆与几道十年之相知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370987_comment'></div>不若兹火一夕之为足下誉也。宥而彰之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370987_comment'></div>使夫蓄于心者。咸得开其喙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370987_comment'></div>发策决科者。授子而不慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370987_comment'></div>虽欲如向之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1370987", 1370987, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>蓄缩</span>受侮。其可得乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370987_comment'></div>于兹吾有望于尔。是以终乃大喜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370987_comment'></div>古者列国有灾。同位皆相吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370987_comment'></div>许不吊灾。君子恶之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370987_comment'></div>今吾之所陈若是。有以异乎古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370987_comment'></div>故将吊而更以贺也。颜曾之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370987_comment'></div>其为乐也大矣。又何阙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370987_comment'></div>足下前要仆文章古书。极不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370987_comment'></div>候得数十幅。乃并往耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370987_comment'></div>吴二十一武陵来。言足下为醉赋及对问大善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370987_comment'></div>可寄一本。仆近亦好作文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370987_comment'></div>与在京城时颇异。思与足下辈言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1370987_comment'></div>桎梏甚固。未可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1370987_comment'></div>因人南来。致书访死生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1370987_comment'></div>不悉。宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1370987_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1370987_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。作书答廖有方。作品：《答贡士廖有方论文书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第883页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370993' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370993' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370993?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答贡士廖有方论文书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370993")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370993_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370993'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370993'>三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370993_comment'></div>宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370993_comment'></div>自得秀才书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370993_comment'></div>知欲仆为序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370993_comment'></div>然吾为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370993_comment'></div>非苟然易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370993_comment'></div>于秀才则吾不敢爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370993_comment'></div>吾在京师时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370993_comment'></div>好以文宠后辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370993_comment'></div>由吾文知名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370993_comment'></div>亦为不少焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370993_comment'></div>自遭斥逐禁锢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370993_comment'></div>益为轻薄小儿哗嚣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370993_comment'></div>群朋增饰无状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370993_comment'></div>当途人率谓仆垢污重厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370993_comment'></div>举将去而远之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370993_comment'></div>今不自料而序秀才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370993_comment'></div>秀才无乃未得向时之益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370993_comment'></div>而受后事之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370993_comment'></div>吾是以惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370993_comment'></div>洁然盛服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370993_comment'></div>而与负涂者处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370993_comment'></div>而又何赖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370993_comment'></div>然观秀才勤恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370993_comment'></div>意甚久远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370993_comment'></div>不为顷刻私利欲以就文雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370993_comment'></div>则吾曷敢以让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370993_comment'></div>当为秀才言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370993_comment'></div>然而无显出于今之世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370993_comment'></div>视不为流俗所扇动者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370993_comment'></div>乃以示之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370993_comment'></div>既无以累秀才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370993_comment'></div>亦不以增仆之诟骂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370993_comment'></div>计无宜于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370993_comment'></div>若果能是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370993_comment'></div>则吾之荒言出矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370993_comment'></div>宗元白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1370993_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。崔黯以所撰文求教，宗元作书答之。作品：《报崔黯秀才论为文书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第886页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370995' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370995' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370995?labeling=true' target='_blank'>报崔黯秀才论为文书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370995")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370995_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370995'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370995'>崔生足下。辱书及文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370995_comment'></div>辞意良高。所向慕不凡近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370995_comment'></div>诚有意乎圣人之言。然圣人之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370995_comment'></div>期以明道。学者务求诸道而遗其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370995_comment'></div>辞之传于世者。必由于书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370995_comment'></div>道假辞而明。辞假书而传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370995_comment'></div>要之之道而已耳。道之及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370995_comment'></div>及乎物而已耳。斯取道之内者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370995_comment'></div>今世因贵辞而矜书。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1370995", 1370995, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>粉泽</span>以为工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370995_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370995", 1370995, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>遒密</span>以为能。不亦外乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370995_comment'></div>吾子之所言道。匪辞而书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370995_comment'></div>其所望于仆。亦匪辞而书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370995_comment'></div>是不亦去及物之道愈以远乎。仆尝学圣人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370995_comment'></div>身虽穷。志求之不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370995_comment'></div>庶几可以语于古。恨与吾子不同州部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370995_comment'></div>闭口无所发明。观吾子文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370995_comment'></div>自秀士可通圣人之说。今吾子求于道也外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370995_comment'></div>而望于予也愈外。是其可惜欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370995_comment'></div>吾且不言。是负吾子数千里不弃朽废者之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370995_comment'></div>故复云尔也。凡人好辞工书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370995_comment'></div>皆病癖也。吾不幸蚤得二病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370995_comment'></div>学道以来。日思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370995", 1370995, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>砭针</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1370995", 1370995, "Clauses/43/Comments/1")'>攻熨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370995_comment'></div>卒不能去。缠结心腑牢甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370995_comment'></div>愿斯须忘之而不克。窃尝自毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370995_comment'></div>今吾子乃始<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370995", 1370995, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>钦钦</span>思易吾病。不亦惑乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370995_comment'></div>斯固有潜块<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370995", 1370995, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>积瘕</span>。中子之内藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370995_comment'></div>恬而不悟。可怜哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370995_comment'></div>其卒与我何异。均之二病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370995_comment'></div>书字益下。而子之意又益下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370995_comment'></div>则子之病又益笃。甚矣子癖于伎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370995_comment'></div>吾尝见病心腹人。有思啖土炭嗜酸咸者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370995_comment'></div>不得则大戚。其亲爱之者不忍其戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370995_comment'></div>因探而与之。观吾子之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370995_comment'></div>亦已戚矣。吾虽未得亲爱吾子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370995_comment'></div>然亦重来意之勤。有不忍矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370995_comment'></div>诚欲分吾土炭酸咸。吾不敢爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370995_comment'></div>但远言其證不可也。俟面乃悉陈吾状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370995_comment'></div>未相见。且试求良医为方已之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370995_comment'></div>苟能已。大善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370995_comment'></div>则及物之道。专而易通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370995_comment'></div>若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1370995", 1370995, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>积结</span>既定。医无所能已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370995_comment'></div>幸期相见时。吾决分子其啖嗜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370995_comment'></div>不具。宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370995_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1370995_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。韩愈向韦珩推重宗元文墨，宗元作书答韦珩。作品：《答韦珩示韩愈相推以文墨事书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第881页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370992' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370992' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370992?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答韦珩示韩愈相推以文墨事书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元",
