class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370992'>足下所封示退之书云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370992_comment'></div>欲推避仆以文墨事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370992_comment'></div>且以励足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370992_comment'></div>若退之之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370992_comment'></div>过仆数等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370992_comment'></div>尚不宜推避于仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370992_comment'></div>非其实可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370992_comment'></div>固相假借为之词耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370992_comment'></div>退之所敬者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370992_comment'></div>司马迁扬雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370992_comment'></div>迁于退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370992_comment'></div>固相上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370992_comment'></div>若雄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370992_comment'></div>如太元法言及四愁赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370992_comment'></div>退之独未作耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370992_comment'></div>使作之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370992_comment'></div>加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1370992", 1370992, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>恢奇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370992_comment'></div>至他文过扬雄远甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370992_comment'></div>雄之遣言措意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370992_comment'></div>颇短局滞涩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370992_comment'></div>不若退之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370992", 1370992, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>猖狂</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370992", 1370992, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>恣睢</span>肆意有所作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370992_comment'></div>若然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370992_comment'></div>使雄来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370992_comment'></div>尚不宜推避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370992_comment'></div>而况仆耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370992_comment'></div>彼好奖人善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370992_comment'></div>以为不屈己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370992_comment'></div>善不可奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370992_comment'></div>故慊慊云尔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370992_comment'></div>足下幸勿信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370992_comment'></div>且足下志气高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370992_comment'></div>好读南北史书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370992_comment'></div>通国朝事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370992_comment'></div>穿穴古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370992_comment'></div>后来无能和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370992_comment'></div>而仆稚骏。<div 1370992, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>趑趄</span>文墨笔砚浅事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370992_comment'></div>今退之不以吾子励仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370992_comment'></div>而反以仆励吾子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370992_comment'></div>愈非所宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370992_comment'></div>吾子年甚少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370992_comment'></div>知己者如麻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370992_comment'></div>不患不显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1370992_comment'></div>患道不立耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1370992_comment'></div>此仆以自励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1370992_comment'></div>亦以佐退之励足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1370992_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1370992_comment'></div>宗元顿首再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1370992_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。吴秀才以新作诗文求教，宗元作书答之。作品：《答吴秀才谢示新文书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第888页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div "poem_title_1370996")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370996_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370996'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370996'>某白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370996_comment'></div>向得秀才书及文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370996_comment'></div>类前时所辱远甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370996_comment'></div>多贺多贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370996_comment'></div>秀才志为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370996_comment'></div>又在族父处蚤夜孜孜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370996_comment'></div>何畏不日日新又日新也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370996_comment'></div>虽间不奉对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370996_comment'></div>苟文益日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370996_comment'></div>则若亟见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370996_comment'></div>夫观文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370996_comment'></div>宜若悬衡然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370996_comment'></div>增之铢两则俯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370996_comment'></div>反是则仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370996_comment'></div>无可私者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370996_comment'></div>秀才诚欲令吾俯乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370996_comment'></div>则莫若增重其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370996_comment'></div>今观秀才所增益者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370996_comment'></div>不啻铢两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370996_comment'></div>吾固伏膺而俯矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370996_comment'></div>愈重则吾俯滋甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370996_comment'></div>秀才其懋焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370996_comment'></div>苟增而不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370996_comment'></div>则吾首惧至地耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370996_comment'></div>又何间疏之患乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370996_comment'></div>还答不悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370996_comment'></div>宗元白。</div><div href='/Writing/1371166?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复吴子松说</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371166")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371166_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371166'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371166'>子之疑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371166", 1371166, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>木肤</span>有怪文。与人之贤不肖寿夭贵贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371166_comment'></div>果气之寓欤。为物者裁而为之欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371166_comment'></div>予固以为寓也。子不见夫云之始作乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371166_comment'></div>勃怒冲涌。击石薄木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371166_comment'></div>而肆乎空中。偃然为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371166_comment'></div>拳然为禽。敷舒为林木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371166_comment'></div>嵑𡿗为宫室。谁其搏而斲之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371166_comment'></div>风出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371166", 1371166, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>洞窟</span>。流离百物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371166_comment'></div>经清触浊。呼召窍穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371166_comment'></div>与夫草木之俪偶纷罗。雕葩剡芒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371166_comment'></div>臭朽馨香。采色之赤碧白黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371166_comment'></div>皆寓也。无裁而为之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371166_comment'></div>又何独疑兹肤之奇诡。与人之贤不肖寿夭贵贱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371166", 1371166, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>参差不齐</span>者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371166_comment'></div>是固无情。不足穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371166_comment'></div>然有可恨者。人或权褒贬黜陟为天子求士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371166_comment'></div>皆学于圣人之道。皆又以仁义为的。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371166_comment'></div>皆曰我知人我知人。披辞窥貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371166_comment'></div>逐其声而覈其所蹈者。以升而降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371166_comment'></div>其所升。恒多蒙瞀祸贼僻邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371166_comment'></div>罔人以自利者。其所降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371166_comment'></div>率多清明冲淳。不为害者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371166_comment'></div>彼非无情物也。非不欲得其升降也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371166_comment'></div>然犹反戾若此。逾千百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371166_comment'></div>乃一二人。幸不出于此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371166_comment'></div>徵之犹无以为告。今子不是病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371166_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371166", 1371166, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>木肤</span>之问。为物者有无之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371166_comment'></div>子胡横讯过诘。扰扰焉如此哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371166_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1371166_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在永州司马任。浙东台州现五色云，以为祥瑞，宗元代浙东观察使薛苹作奏状以告朝廷。作品：《为薛中丞浙东奏五色云状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷39第1014页，中华书局1979年版。在永州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_1_1370941_comment'></div>月日五色云见者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370941_comment'></div>一州官吏僧道耆老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370941_comment'></div>悉皆瞻睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370941_comment'></div>已具奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370941_comment'></div>并写图奉进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370941_comment'></div>伏以景云上瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370941_comment'></div>王者祉符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370941_comment'></div>焕彩彰之在天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370941_comment'></div>知圣德之昭感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370941_comment'></div>伏惟陛下化孚有截。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370941_comment'></div>道洽无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370941_comment'></div>承天地之贞明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370941_comment'></div>导阴阳之和气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370941_comment'></div>遂使纷纷郁郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370941_comment'></div>自东而徂西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370941_comment'></div>若烟非烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370941_comment'></div>一旬而再至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370941_comment'></div>徵诸古谍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370941_comment'></div>事罕前闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370941_comment'></div>伏乞宣付史官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370953_comment'></div>户部钱是准敕收贮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370953_comment'></div>不合别支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370953_comment'></div>又所授员外官。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1370953_comment'></div>今请悉依故事为准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370953_comment'></div>并废员外所置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370953_comment'></div>凡在贬黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371282_comment'></div>敢用牲牢之奠。昭祭于虞帝之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371282_comment'></div>帝入大麓。雷雨不迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371282_comment'></div>帝在璿玑。七政以齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371282_comment'></div>九泽既陂。锡禹元圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371282_comment'></div>至德神化。后谁与稽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371282_comment'></div>勤事南巡。祀典以跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371282_comment'></div>今阳德愆候。有渰凄凄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371282_comment'></div>降是水潦。混为涂泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371282_comment'></div>岸有善崩。流或断堤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371282_comment'></div>泛滥畴陇。陂陁圃畦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371282_comment'></div>恒雨获戾。循咎增悽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371282_comment'></div>忍兹嘉生。均彼蓬藜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371282_comment'></div>敢望诛黑蜧。抶阴蜺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371282_comment'></div>式乾后土。以廓天倪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371282_comment'></div>粢盛不害。馀粮可栖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371282_comment'></div>或簸或溲。为酒为醯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371282_comment'></div>鎗鎗笙镛。坎坎鼓鼙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371282_comment'></div>百代祀德。氓心不携。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371279_comment'></div>举手排直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371279_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371279", 1371279, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>压溺</span>之不虑兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371279_comment'></div>坚刚以为式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371279_comment'></div>知死不可挠兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371279_comment'></div>明章人极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371279_comment'></div>夫何大夫之炳烈兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371279_comment'></div>王不寤夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371279", 1371279, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>谗贼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371279_comment'></div>卒施快于剽狡兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371279_comment'></div>怛就制乎强国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371279_comment'></div>松柏之斩刈兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371279_comment'></div>蓊茸欣植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371279_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371279", 1371279, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>盗骊</span>折足兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371279_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371279", 1371279, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>罢驽</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371279", 1371279, "Clauses/28/Comments/1")'>抗臆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371279_comment'></div>鸷鸟之高翔兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371279_comment'></div>孽狐惴而不食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371279_comment'></div>窃畏忌以群朋兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371279_comment'></div>夫孰病百而伸一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371279_comment'></div>挺寡以校众兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371279_comment'></div>古圣人之所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371279_comment'></div>矧援羸以威慠兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371279_comment'></div>兹固蹈殆而违安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371279_comment'></div>杀身之匪予戚兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371279_comment'></div>闵宗周之不完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371279_comment'></div>岂成城以夸功兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371279_comment'></div>哀清庙之将残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371279_comment'></div>嫉彪子之肆诞兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371279_comment'></div>弥皇览以为谩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371279_comment'></div>姑舍道以从世兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371279_comment'></div>焉用夫考古而登贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371279_comment'></div>指白日以致愤兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371279_comment'></div>卒颓幽而不烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371279_comment'></div>版上帝以飞精兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371279_comment'></div>黮寥廓而殄绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371279_comment'></div>朅冯云以羾愬兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371279_comment'></div>终冥冥以郁结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371279_comment'></div>欲登山以号辞兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371279_comment'></div>愈洋洋以超忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371279_comment'></div>心冱涸其不化兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371279_comment'></div>形凝冰而自慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371279_comment'></div>图始而虑末兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371279_comment'></div>非大夫之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371279_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1371279", 1371279, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>陷瑕</span>委厄兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371279_comment'></div>固衰世之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371279_comment'></div>知不可而愈进兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371279_comment'></div>誓不偷以自好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371279_comment'></div>陈诚以定命兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371279_comment'></div>侔贞臣以为友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371279_comment'></div>比干之以仁义类兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371279_comment'></div>缅辽绝以不群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371279_comment'></div>伯夷殉洁以莫怨兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371279_comment'></div>孰克轨其遗尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371279_comment'></div>苟端诚之内亏兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371279_comment'></div>虽耆老其谁珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371279_comment'></div>古固有一死兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371279_comment'></div>贤者乐得其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371279_comment'></div>大夫死忠兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371279_comment'></div>君子所与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371279_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371279_comment'></div>敬吊忠甫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1371279_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371281' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371281' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371281?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吊乐毅文</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371281")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371281_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371281'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371281'>许纵自燕来。曰燕之南有墓焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371281_comment'></div>其志曰乐生之墓。余闻而哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371281_comment'></div>其返也。与之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371281_comment'></div>使吊焉。大厦之骞兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371281_comment'></div>风雨萃之。车亡其轴兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371281_comment'></div>乘者弃之。呜呼夫子兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371281_comment'></div>不幸类之。尚何为哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371281_comment'></div>昭不可留兮。道不可常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371281_comment'></div>畏死疾走兮。狂顾徬徨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371281_comment'></div>燕复为齐兮。东海洋洋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371281_comment'></div>嗟夫子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371281", 1371281, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>专直</span>兮。不虑后而为防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371281_comment'></div>胡去规而就矩兮。卒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371281", 1371281, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>陷滞</span>以流亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371281_comment'></div>惜功美之不就兮。俾愚昧之周章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371281_comment'></div>岂夫子之不能兮。无亦恶是之遑遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371281_comment'></div>仁夫对赵之悃款兮。诚不忍其故邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371281_comment'></div>君子之容与兮。弥亿载而愈光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371281_comment'></div>谅遭时之不然兮。匪谋虑之不长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371281_comment'></div>跽陈辞以陨涕兮。仰视天之茫茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371281_comment'></div>苟偷世之谓何兮。言余心之不臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371281_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1371281_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　正月，宪宗有诏，召宗元、刘禹锡等返长安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　正月五日，永州刺史兼御史中丞崔能建成万石亭，宗元撰记文。作品：《永州崔中丞万石亭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷27第734页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371099' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371099' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371099?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永州崔中丞万石亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371099")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371099_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371099'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371099'>御史中丞清河男崔公来莅永州。间日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371099_comment'></div>登城北墉。临于荒野<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371099", 1371099, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>丛翳</span>之隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371099_comment'></div>见怪石特出。度其下必有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371099", 1371099, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>殊胜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371099_comment'></div>步自西门。以求其墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371099_comment'></div>伐竹披奥。欹侧以入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371099_comment'></div>绵谷跨溪。皆大石林立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371099_comment'></div>涣若奔云。错若置棋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371099_comment'></div>怒若虎斗。企若鸟厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371099_comment'></div>抉其穴则鼻口相呀。搜其根则蹄股交峙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371099_comment'></div>环行卒愕。疑若搏噬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371099_comment'></div>于是刳辟朽壤。剪焚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371099", 1371099, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>榛秽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371099_comment'></div>决沟浍。导伏流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371099_comment'></div>散为疏林。洄为清池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371099_comment'></div>寥廓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371099", 1371099, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>泓渟</span>。若造物者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371099_comment'></div>始判清浊。效奇于兹地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371099_comment'></div>非人力也。乃立游亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371099_comment'></div>以宅厥中。直亭之西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371099_comment'></div>石若掖分。可以眺望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371099_comment'></div>其上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371099", 1371099, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>青壁</span>斗绝。沈于渊源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371099_comment'></div>莫究其极。自下而望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371099_comment'></div>则合乎攒峦。与山无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371099_comment'></div>明日。州邑耋老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371099_comment'></div>杂然而至曰。吾侪生是州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371099_comment'></div>艺是野。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371099", 1371099, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>眉厖齿鲵</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371099_comment'></div>未尝知此。岂天坠地出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371099_comment'></div>设兹神物。以彰我公之德欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371099_comment'></div>既贺而请名。公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371099_comment'></div>是石之数。不可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371099_comment'></div>以其多而命之曰万石亭。耋老又言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371099_comment'></div>懿夫公之名亭。岂专状物而已哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371099_comment'></div>公尝六为二千石。既盈其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371099_comment'></div>然而有道之士。咸恨公之嘉绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371099_comment'></div>未洽于人。敢颂休声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371099_comment'></div>祝于明神。汉之三公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371099_comment'></div>秩号万石。我公之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371099_comment'></div>宜受兹锡。汉有纯臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371099_comment'></div>惟万石君。我公之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371099_comment'></div>始于闺门。道合于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371099_comment'></div>祐之自天。野夫献辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371099_comment'></div>公寿万年。宗元尝以笺奏隶尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371099_comment'></div>敢专笔削以附零陵故事。时元和十年正月五日记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371099_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1371099_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　正月，宗元与刘禹锡得诏返京。朗州刺史窦常寄诗促其行骑，宗元作诗酬答。作品：《朗州窦常员外寄刘二十八诗见促行骑走笔酬赠》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷42第1150页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　返京临行前，永州亲友为其饯行。宗元至驿站后，有感寄诗相送诸公。作品：《离觞不醉至驿却寄相送诸公》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷42第1151页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_40582' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370923_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370923'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370923'>早以文律。参于士林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370923_comment'></div>德宗选于众流。擢列御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370923_comment'></div>陛下嗣登宝位。微臣官在礼司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370923_comment'></div>百僚称贺。皆臣草奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370923_comment'></div>臣以不慎交友。旋及祸讻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370923_comment'></div>圣恩宏贷。谪在善地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370923_comment'></div>累更大赦。获奉诏追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370923_comment'></div>违离十年。一见宫阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370923_comment'></div>亲受朝命。牧人远方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370923_comment'></div>渐轻不宥之辜。特奉分忧之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370923_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1370923", 1370923, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>铭心镂骨</span>。无报上天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370923_comment'></div>谨当宣布诏条。尽竭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1370923", 1370923, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>驽蹇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370923_comment'></div>皇风不异于遐迩。圣泽无间于华夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370923_comment'></div>庶答鸿私。以塞馀罪<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370923_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1370923_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年8月</a>　在柳州刺史任。八月，道州刺史薛伯高重修文宣王庙克成，宗元从请撰碑记。作品：《道州文宣王庙碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷5第120页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第22页系《道州文宣王庙碑》于元和十一年。）</span><div id='poem_1371199' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371199' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371199?labeling=true' target='_blank'>道州文宣王庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371199")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371199_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371199'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371199'>谨桉某年月日。儒师河东薛公伯高由尚书刑部郎中为道州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371199_comment'></div>明年二月丁亥。公用牲币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371199_comment'></div>祭于先圣文宣王之庙。夜漏未尽三刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371199_comment'></div>公元冕以入。就位于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371199_comment'></div>惕焉。深惟夫子之祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371199_comment'></div>爰自京师太学。遍于州邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371199_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>遐阔</span>僻陋。咸用斯时致奠展诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371199_comment'></div>宿燎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>设悬</span>。樽俎旂章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371199_comment'></div>粲穆布列。周天之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371199_comment'></div>呜呼。夫子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371199_comment'></div>闳肆尊显。二帝三王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371199_comment'></div>其无以侔大也。然其堂庭庳陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371199_comment'></div>椽栋毁坠。曾不及浮图外说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371199_comment'></div>克壮厥居。水潦仍至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371199_comment'></div>岁加荡沃。公蹙然不宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371199_comment'></div>若罔获承。既祭而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371199_comment'></div>登墉以望。爰得美地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371199_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>丰衍</span>端夷。水环以流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371199_comment'></div>有頖宫之制。是日树表列位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371199_comment'></div>由礼考宜。然后节用以制货财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371199_comment'></div>乘时以僦功役。逾年而克有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371199_comment'></div>庙舍峻整。阶序<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>廓大</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371199_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>讲肄</span>之位。师儒之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371199_comment'></div>立廪以周食。圃畦以毓蔬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371199_comment'></div>权其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>子母</span>。赢且不竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371199_comment'></div>由是邑里之秀民。感道怀和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371199_comment'></div>更来门下。咸愿服儒衣冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371199_comment'></div>由公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>训程</span>。公摄衣登席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371199_comment'></div>亲释经旨。丕谕本统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371199_comment'></div>父庆其子。长励其幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371199_comment'></div>化用兴行。人无争讼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371199_comment'></div>公又曰。夫子称门弟子颜回为庶几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371199_comment'></div>其后从于陈蔡。亦各有号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371199_comment'></div>言出一时。非尽其徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371199_comment'></div>于后失厥所谓。妄异科第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371199_comment'></div>坐祀十人以为哲。岂夫子志哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371199_comment'></div>余桉月令。则曰释奠于先圣先师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371199_comment'></div>国之故也。乃立夫子像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371199_comment'></div>配以颜氏。笾豆既嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371199_comment'></div>笙镛既成。九年八月丁未。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371199_comment'></div>公祭于新庙。退考疑义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371199_comment'></div>合以燕飨。万民翼翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371199_comment'></div>观礼识古。于是春秋师晋陵蒋坚易师沙门凝𧦬助教某学生某等来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371199_comment'></div>愿刻金石。明夫子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371199_comment'></div>及公之勤。惟夫子极于化初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371199_comment'></div>冥于道先。群儒咸称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371199_comment'></div>六籍具存。苟赞其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371199_comment'></div>若誉天地之大。褒日月之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371199_comment'></div>非愚则惑。不可犯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371199_comment'></div>惟公探夫子之志。考有国之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371199_comment'></div>光施彝典。革正<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>道本</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371199_comment'></div>俾是荒服。移为阙里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371199_comment'></div>在周则鲁侯申。能修頖宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371199_comment'></div>诗有其歌。在汉蜀守文翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371199_comment'></div>能首儒学。史有其赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371199_comment'></div>今公法古之大同于鲁。化人之艰侔于蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371199_comment'></div>盍铭兹德。以告于史氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371199_comment'></div>而刊之兹碑。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371199_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_1371199'>荆楚之阳。厥服惟荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371199_comment'></div>民鲜由仁。帝降其良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371199_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>振振</span>薛公。惟德之造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371199_comment'></div>赤旗金节。来莅于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371199_comment'></div>师儒咸会。嘉有攸告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371199_comment'></div>吉日丁亥。献于頖宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371199_comment'></div>庭燎伊煌。有焕其容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371199_comment'></div>公升于位。心莫不恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371199_comment'></div>爰念圣祀。遍于海邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371199_comment'></div>服冕陈器。州邑攸同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371199_comment'></div>感忻以欷。思报圣功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371199_comment'></div>卜迁于嘉。惟吉之逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371199_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>畇畇</span>其原。既夷且大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371199_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>涣涣</span>其流。实环于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371199_comment'></div>作庙有严。昭祀显配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371199_comment'></div>洁兹器用。观礼斯会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371199_comment'></div>布筵依位。作廪伊秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371199_comment'></div>以丰其仪。以壮其室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371199_comment'></div>新宫既成。崇报孔明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371199_comment'></div>于古有经。公粹厥诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371199_comment'></div>邦民之良。弁服是缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371199_comment'></div>公躬讲论。虔默以听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371199_comment'></div>公降酬酢。进退齐平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371199_comment'></div>柔肌洽体。莫不充盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371199_comment'></div>归欢于心。父子弟兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371199_comment'></div>钦惟圣王。厥道无涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371199_comment'></div>世有颂辞。益疚其多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371199_comment'></div>公斯考礼。民感休嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371199_comment'></div>从于鲁风。祗以咏歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371199_comment'></div>公锡于天。眉寿来加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371199_comment'></div>公赉于王。休命是荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371199_comment'></div>师于辟雍。大邦以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371199_comment'></div>侑酳申申。王道式讹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371199_comment'></div>诸儒作诗。思继<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1371199", 1371199, "Clauses/183/Comments/0")'>頖水</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371199_comment'></div>丕扬厥声。以告太史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371199_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_93_1371199_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　至柳州刺史任后，着手修复孔庙，撰碑记。作品：《柳州文宣王新修庙碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷5第124页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371200' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371200' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371200?labeling=true' target='_blank'>柳州新修文宣王庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371200")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371200_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371200'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371200'>仲尼之道。与王化远迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371200_comment'></div>惟柳州古为南夷。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371200", 1371200, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>椎髻卉裳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371200_comment'></div>攻劫斗暴。虽唐虞之仁不能柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371200_comment'></div>秦汉之勇不能威。至于有唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371200_comment'></div>始循法度。置吏奉贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371200_comment'></div>咸若采卫。冠带宪令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371200_comment'></div>进用文事。学者道尧舜孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371200_comment'></div>如取诸左右。执经书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371200_comment'></div>引仁义。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371200", 1371200, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>旋辟</span>唯诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371200_comment'></div>中州之士。时或病焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371200_comment'></div>然后知唐之德大以遐。孔氏之道尊而明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371200_comment'></div>元和十年八月。州之庙屋坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371200_comment'></div>几毁神位。刺史柳宗元始至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371200_comment'></div>大惧不任。以坠教基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371200_comment'></div>丁未奠荐。法齐时事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371200_comment'></div>礼不克施。乃合初亚终献三官衣布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371200_comment'></div>洎于赢财。取土木金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371200_comment'></div>徵工<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371200", 1371200, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>僦功</span>。完旧益新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371200_comment'></div>十月乙丑。王宫正室成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371200_comment'></div>乃安神栖。乃正<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371200", 1371200, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>法庭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371200_comment'></div>祗会群吏。卜日之吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371200_comment'></div>虔告于王灵曰。昔者夫子尝欲居九夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371200_comment'></div>其时门人犹有惑圣言。今夫子去代千有馀岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371200_comment'></div>其教始行。至于是邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371200_comment'></div>人去其陋。而本于儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371200_comment'></div>孝父忠君。言及礼义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371200_comment'></div>又况巍然炳然。临而炙之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371200_comment'></div>惟夫子以神道设教。我今罔敢知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371200_comment'></div>钦若兹教。以宁其神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371200_comment'></div>追思告诲。如在于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371200_comment'></div>苟神之在。曷敢不虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371200_comment'></div>居而无陋。罔贰昔言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371200_comment'></div>申陈严祀。永永是尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371200_comment'></div>丽牲有碑。刻在庙门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371200_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1371200_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　在柳州刺史任。皇帝下诏追加曹溪第六祖慧能“大鉴禅师”谥号，岭南节度府更换神祠庙碑石，宗元从请撰碑记。作品：《曹溪大鉴禅师碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷6第149页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第24页系《曹溪大鉴禅师碑》于元和十一年。）</span><div id='poem_1371207' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371207' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371207?labeling=true' target='_blank'>曹溪第六祖赐谥大鉴禅师碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371207")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371207_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371207'>扶风公廉问岭南三年。以佛氏第六祖未有称号。疏闻于上。诏谥大鉴禅师。塔曰灵照之塔。元和十年十月十三日。下尚书祠部符到都府。公命部吏洎州司功掾告于其祠。幢盖钟鼓。增山盈谷。万人咸会。若闻鬼神。其时学者千有馀人。莫不欣踊奋厉。如师复生。则又感悼涕慕。如师始亡。因言曰。自有生物。则好斗夺相贼杀。丧其本实。悖乖淫流。莫克返于初。孔子无大位。没以馀言持世。更杨墨黄老益杂。其术分裂。而吾浮图说后出。推离还源。合所谓生而静者。梁氏好作有为。师达摩讥之。空术益显。六传至大鉴。大鉴始以能劳苦服役。一听其言。言希以究。师用感动。遂受信具。遁隐南海上。人无闻知。又十六年。度其可行。乃居曹溪为人师。会学去来尝数千人。其道以无为为有。以空洞为实。以广大不荡为归。其教人始以性善。终以性善。不假耘锄。本其静矣。中宗闻名。使幸臣再徵。不能致。取其言以为心术。其说具在。今布天下。凡言禅皆本曹溪。大鉴去世百有六年。凡治广部而以名闻者以十数。莫能揭其号。乃今始告天子。得大谥。丰佐吾道。其可无辞。公始立朝。以儒重。刺虔州。都护安南。由海中大蛮夷连身毒之西。浮舶听命。咸被公德。受旗纛节戟。来莅南海。属国如林。不杀不怒。人畏无噩。允克光于有仁。昭列大鉴。莫如公宜。其徒之老。乃易石于宇下。使来谒辞。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371207_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371207'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371207'>达摩乾乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371207_comment'></div>传佛语心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371207_comment'></div>六承其授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371207_comment'></div>大鉴是临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371207_comment'></div>劳勤专默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371207_comment'></div>终揖于深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371207_comment'></div>抱其信器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371207_comment'></div>行海之阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371207_comment'></div>其道爰施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371207_comment'></div>在溪之曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371207_comment'></div>厖合猥附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371207_comment'></div>不夷其高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371207_comment'></div>传告咸陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371207_comment'></div>惟道之褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371207_comment'></div>生而性善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371207_comment'></div>在物而具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371207_comment'></div>荒流奔轶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371207_comment'></div>乃万其趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371207_comment'></div>匪思愈乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371207_comment'></div>匪觉滋误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371207_comment'></div>由师内鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371207_comment'></div>咸获于素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371207_comment'></div>不植胡根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371207_comment'></div>不耘胡苗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371207_comment'></div>中一外融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371207_comment'></div>有粹孔昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371207_comment'></div>在帝中宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371207_comment'></div>聘言于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371207_comment'></div>阴翊王度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371207_comment'></div>俾人逍遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371207_comment'></div>百有六祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371207_comment'></div>号谥不纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371207_comment'></div>由扶风公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371207_comment'></div>告今天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371207_comment'></div>尚书既复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371207_comment'></div>大行乃诔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371207_comment'></div>光于南土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371207_comment'></div>其法再起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371207_comment'></div>厥徒万亿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371207_comment'></div>同悼齐喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371207_comment'></div>惟师教所被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371207_comment'></div>洎扶风公所履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371207_comment'></div>咸戴天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371207_comment'></div>天子休命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371207_comment'></div>嘉公德美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371207_comment'></div>溢于海夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371207_comment'></div>浮图是视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371207_comment'></div>师以仁传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371207_comment'></div>公以仁理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371207_comment'></div>谒辞图坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371207_comment'></div>永允不已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1371207_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　在柳州刺史任。为领南经略副使、弟宗一岳父马君撰墓志。马君其名不详。作品：《唐故岭南经略副使御史马君墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷10第257页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371235'>元和九年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371235_comment'></div>扶风马君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371235_comment'></div>命于守龟祔于先君食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371235_comment'></div>卜葬明年某月庚寅亦食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371235_comment'></div>其孤使来以状谒铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371235_comment'></div>宗元删取其辞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371235_comment'></div>君凡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371235", 1371235, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>受署</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371235_comment'></div>往来桂州岭南江西荆南道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371235_comment'></div>皆大府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371235_comment'></div>凡命官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371235_comment'></div>更佐军卫录王府事番禺令江陵户曹录府事监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371235_comment'></div>皆为显官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371235_comment'></div>凡佐治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371235_comment'></div>由巡官判官至押番舶使经略副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371235_comment'></div>皆所谓右职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371235_comment'></div>凡所严事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371235_comment'></div>御史中丞良司徒佑嗣曹王皋尚书冑尚书伯仪尚书昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371235_comment'></div>皆贤有劳诸侯。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　初至柳州刺史任。柳州司马孟常谦病逝，应其子孟遵庆之请，宗元作墓志。作品：《唐故安州刺史兼侍御史贬柳州司马孟公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷10第260页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371236'>孟氏之孤曰遵庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371236_comment'></div>奉其父命书九篇为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371236", 1371236, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>善状</span>一篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371236_comment'></div>来告曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371236_comment'></div>月日君薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371236_comment'></div>月日将葬于某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371236_comment'></div>敢请刻辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371236_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371236_comment'></div>公自假左赞善大夫桓王司马太常少卿为义成军中军兵马使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371236_comment'></div>其帅魏国公耽为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371236_comment'></div>命公左领军卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371236_comment'></div>事德宗顺宗今上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371236_comment'></div>立朝九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371236_comment'></div>加朝议大夫。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371236_comment'></div>为左神策行营先锋兵马使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371236_comment'></div>知牙而赵兵罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371236_comment'></div>不受禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371236_comment'></div>去金革服丧终期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371236_comment'></div>命安州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371236_comment'></div>仍加侍御史安州防遏兵马使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371236_comment'></div>贬柳州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371236_comment'></div>公尝佐魏公平襄阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371236_comment'></div>靖梁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371236_comment'></div>立义成军。<div id='poem_sentence_40_1371291_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1371291_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年7月16日</a>　六月至柳州刺史任时，值大旱。七月十六日，宗元按当地习俗率众往南郊雷塘祭神祈雨，撰文记之。作品：《雷塘祷雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷41第1087页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_1_1371283_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371283", 1371283, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>风马云车</span>。肃焉徘徊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371283_comment'></div>廉洁自持。忠信是仗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371283_comment'></div>苟有获戾。神其可罔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371283_comment'></div>擢擢嘉生。惟天之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371283_comment'></div>岂使粢盛。夷于草莽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371283_comment'></div>腾波通气。出地奋响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371283_comment'></div>钦若成功。惟神是奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371283_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1371283_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　在柳州刺史任。友吴武陵自永州北还，为裴度言迁宗元于近地。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　在柳州刺史任。贾鹏山人来访后离柳南游，作序送之。作品：《送贾山人南游序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第664页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第77页系《送贾山人南游序》于元和十一年。）</span><div id='poem_1371073' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371073' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371073?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送贾山人南游序</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371073")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371073_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371073'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371073'>传所谓学以为己者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371073_comment'></div>是果有其人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371073_comment'></div>吾长京师三十三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371073_comment'></div>游乡党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371073_comment'></div>入太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371073_comment'></div>取礼部吏部科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371073_comment'></div>校集贤秘书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371073_comment'></div>出入去来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371073_comment'></div>凡所与言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371073_comment'></div>无非学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371073_comment'></div>盖不啻百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371073_comment'></div>然而莫知所谓学而为己者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371073_comment'></div>及见逐于尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371073_comment'></div>居永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371073_comment'></div>刺柳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371073_comment'></div>所见学者益稀少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371073_comment'></div>常以为今之世无是决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371073_comment'></div>居数月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371073_comment'></div>长乐贾景伯来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371073_comment'></div>与之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371073_comment'></div>邃于经书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371073_comment'></div>博取诸史群子昔之为文章者毕贯统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371073_comment'></div>言未尝诐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371073_comment'></div>行未尝怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371073_comment'></div>其居室愔然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371073_comment'></div>不欲出门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371073_comment'></div>其见人侃侃而肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371073_comment'></div>召之仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371073_comment'></div>怏然不喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371073_comment'></div>导之还中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371073_comment'></div>视其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371073_comment'></div>夷夏若均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371073_comment'></div>莫取其是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371073_comment'></div>曰姑为道而已尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371073_comment'></div>若然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371073_comment'></div>其实为已乎非己乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371073_comment'></div>使吾取乎今之世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371073_comment'></div>贾君果其人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371073_comment'></div>其足也则居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371073_comment'></div>其匮也则行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371073_comment'></div>行不苟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371073_comment'></div>居不苟容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371073_comment'></div>以是之于今世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371073_comment'></div>其果逃于匮乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371073_comment'></div>吾名逐禄贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371073_comment'></div>言见疵于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371073_comment'></div>奈贾君何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371073_comment'></div>于其之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371073_comment'></div>即其舟与之酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371073_comment'></div>侑之以歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371073_comment'></div>歌曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371073_comment'></div>充乎巳之居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371073_comment'></div>或踬其涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371073_comment'></div>匮乎己之虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371073_comment'></div>或盈其庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371073_comment'></div>孰匮孰充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371073_comment'></div>为泰为穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371073_comment'></div>君子乌乎取以宁其躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371073_comment'></div>若君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371073_comment'></div>之于道而已尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371073_comment'></div>世孰知其从容者耶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1371073_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　至柳州刺史任后，依制，上表举柳汉自代。作品：《柳州举监察御史柳汉自代状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷39第1023页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370948' class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷20第554页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371157' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371157' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371157?labeling=true' target='_blank'>井铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（816年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", id='poem_preface_1371157'>始州之人。各以罂甈负江水。莫克井饮。崖岸峻厚。旱则水益远。人陟降大艰。雨多则涂滑而颠。恒为咨嗟。怨惑讹言。终不能就。元和十一年三月朔。命为井城北隍上。未晦。果寒食。冽而多泉。邑人以灌。其土坚垍。其利悠久。其相者浮图谈康军事牙将米景。凿者蒋晏。凡用罚布六千三百。役庸三十六。大砖千七百。其深八寻有二尺。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371157_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371157'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371157'>盈以其神。其来不穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371157_comment'></div>惠我后之人。噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371157_comment'></div>畴肯似于政。其来日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371157_comment'></div></div><div class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371297")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371297_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371297'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371297'>年月。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371297", 1371297, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>子婿</span>谨以清酌庶羞之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371297_comment'></div>昭祭于丈人之灵。卿云轮囷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371297_comment'></div>天汉昭回。自然物外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371297_comment'></div>宁杂尘埃。公禀间气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371297_comment'></div>其动如雷。世荣甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371297_comment'></div>亦矜显处。公之俊德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371297_comment'></div>有而不顾。御史之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371297_comment'></div>朝之所注。公勤于养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371297_comment'></div>亦莫有●8648。京兆之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371297_comment'></div>下多怨怒。或由以黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371297_comment'></div>倚法斯绳。南过九疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371297_comment'></div>东逾秣陵。颠沛三载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371297_comment'></div>天书乃徵。入傅王国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371297_comment'></div>嘉声聿兴。詹事东宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371297_comment'></div>致政是膺。年唯始至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371297_comment'></div>道则弥励。颉颃今古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371297_comment'></div>优游德艺。实期<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371297", 1371297, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>浚发</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371297_comment'></div>再光<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371297", 1371297, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>文陛</span>。谁谓昊天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371297_comment'></div>遽兹降厉。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371297_comment'></div>某以通家承德。夙奉良姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371297_comment'></div>莫成子姓。早丧淑人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371297_comment'></div>恩礼斯重。眷抚惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371297_comment'></div>绸缪其志。实敬实勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371297_comment'></div>迨今挈然。十有八祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371297_comment'></div>家缺<span id='poem_sentence_38_1371297_comment'></div>既敛而还。莫传音旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371297_comment'></div>乡风长恸。于兹已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371297_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。承讣之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371297_comment'></div>卜兆既逾。载驰斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371297_comment'></div>出拜路隅。哀从海澨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371297_comment'></div>礼致皇都。寸诚相续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371297_comment'></div>终岁不渝。天道悠远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371297_comment'></div>人世多虞。寄心双表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371297_comment'></div>长恨囚拘。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371297_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1371297_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年7月</a>　在柳州刺史任。七月，姊夫裴墐卒。宗元作文祭之。作品：《祭万年裴令文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1068页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　在柳州刺史任。主持修复大云佛寺，推行教化，以破除当地迷信鬼神、滥杀禽畜之陋习，并撰文记之。作品：《柳州复大云寺记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷28第752页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div class='authorDate'>（817年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371107'>越人信祥而易杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371107_comment'></div>傲化而偭仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371107_comment'></div>病且忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371107_comment'></div>则聚巫师用鸡卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371107_comment'></div>始则杀小牲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371107_comment'></div>不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371107_comment'></div>则杀中牲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371107_comment'></div>又不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371107_comment'></div>则杀大牲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371107_comment'></div>而又不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371107_comment'></div>则诀亲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371107_comment'></div>饬死事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371107_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371107_comment'></div>神不置我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371107_comment'></div>已矣。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371107_comment'></div>可因而入焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371107_comment'></div>有以佐教化。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371107_comment'></div>水北环治城六百室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371107_comment'></div>水南三百室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371107_comment'></div>三百室之人失其所依归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371107_comment'></div>复立神而杀焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371107_comment'></div>元和十年。<div id='poem_sentence_41_1371107_comment'></div>告于大府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371107_comment'></div>取寺之故名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371107_comment'></div>作大门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371107_comment'></div>以字揭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371107_comment'></div>立东西序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371107_comment'></div>崇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1371107", 1371107, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>佛庙</span>为学者居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371107_comment'></div>会其徒而委之食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371107_comment'></div>使击磬鼓钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371107_comment'></div>以严其道而传其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371107_comment'></div>而人始复去鬼息杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371107_comment'></div>而务趣于仁爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371119_comment'></div>豕得以为囿。蛇得以为薮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371119_comment'></div>人莫能居。至是始命披刜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371119", id='poem_sentence_9_1371119_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371119", 1371119, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>嶛阔</span>瀴湾。当邑居之剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371119_comment'></div>而忘乎人间。斯亦奇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371119_comment'></div>乃取馆之北宇。右辟之以为夕室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371119_comment'></div>以为中室。朝室以夕居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371119_comment'></div>夕室以朝居之。中室日中而居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371119_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371119", 1371119, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>阴室</span>以违温风焉。阳室以违凄风焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371119_comment'></div>若无寒暑也。则朝夕复其号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371119_comment'></div>既成。作石于中室。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371243_comment'></div>抃蹈以为神奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371243_comment'></div>会宙贬贺州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371243_comment'></div>遂以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371243_comment'></div>性爱酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371243_comment'></div>不能已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371243_comment'></div>因纵发为黄老术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371243_comment'></div>薛道州伯高抵宙以书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371243_comment'></div>必致之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371243_comment'></div>至与坐起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371243_comment'></div>伯高褒邪人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371243_comment'></div>嗜其音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371243_comment'></div>至善处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371243_comment'></div>辄自为击节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371243_comment'></div>教阍管谨视出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371243_comment'></div>饵仄柏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371243_comment'></div>不食谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371243_comment'></div>三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371243_comment'></div>变服遁逃九疑丛祠中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371243_comment'></div>披取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371243_comment'></div>益善亲遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371243_comment'></div>终不屑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371243_comment'></div>卒乘暴水入小船。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371243_comment'></div>下岣嵝山求道箓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371243_comment'></div>会欧阳师死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371243_comment'></div>不果受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371243_comment'></div>张诫副岭南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371243_comment'></div>又强与偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371243_comment'></div>诫死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371243_comment'></div>至是抵予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371243_comment'></div>时已得骨髓病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371243_comment'></div>日犹鼓音四五行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371243_comment'></div>居数日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371243_comment'></div>益笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371243_comment'></div>既病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371243_comment'></div>自为歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371243_comment'></div>死三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371243_comment'></div>葬州北冈西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371243_comment'></div>志其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371243_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_66_1371243'>云州生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371243_comment'></div>柳州死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371243_comment'></div>年五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371243_comment'></div>病骨髓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371243_comment'></div>天与之音今已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371243_comment'></div>丁酉之年秋既季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371243_comment'></div>月缺其团于是始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371243_comment'></div>心为浮屠形道士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371243_comment'></div>仁人我哀埋勿弃。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1371243_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　在柳州刺史任。向淮南节度使卫次公荐石琴，同附启。作品：《与卫淮南石琴荐启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集卷下第1384页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371015' id='poem_sentence_2_1371015_comment'></div>伏惟阁下禀夔旦之至德。蕴牙旷之元踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371015_comment'></div>人文合宫徵之深。国器专瑚琏之重。<div class='inline' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370937' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370937?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献平淮夷雅表</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370937")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370937_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370937'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370937'>臣某言。臣负罪窜伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370937_comment'></div>违尚书笺奏十有四年。圣恩宽宥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370937_comment'></div>命守<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1370937", 1370937, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>遐壤</span>。怀印曳绂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370937_comment'></div>有社有人<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。伏惟睿圣文武皇帝陛下天造神断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370937_comment'></div>克清大憝。金鼓一动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370937_comment'></div>万方毕臣。太平之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370937_comment'></div>中兴之德。推校千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370937_comment'></div>无所与让。臣伏自忖度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370937_comment'></div>有方刚之力。不得备戎行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370937_comment'></div>致死命。况今已无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370937_comment'></div>思报国恩。独唯文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370937_comment'></div>伏见周宣王时称中兴。其道彰大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370937_comment'></div>于后罕及。然徵于诗大小雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370937_comment'></div>其选徒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1370937", 1370937, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>出狩</span>。则车攻吉日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370937_comment'></div>命官分土。则崧高韩奕烝人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370937_comment'></div>南征北伐。则六月采芑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370937_comment'></div>平淮夷。则江汉常武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370937_comment'></div>铿鍧炳耀。荡人耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370937_comment'></div>故宣王之形容与其辅佐。由今望之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370937_comment'></div>若神人然。此无他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370937_comment'></div>以雅故也。臣伏见陛下自即位已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370937_comment'></div>平夏州。夷剑南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370937_comment'></div>取江东。定河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370937_comment'></div>今又发自天衷。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1370937", 1370937, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>克剪</span>淮右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370937_comment'></div>而又大雅不作。臣诚不佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370937_comment'></div>然不胜愤踊。伏以朝多文臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370937_comment'></div>不敢尽专数事。谨撰平淮夷雅二篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370937_comment'></div>虽不及尹吉甫召穆公等。庶施诸后代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370937_comment'></div>有以佐唐之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1370937", 1370937, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>光明</span>。谨昧死再拜以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370937_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1370937_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在柳州刺史任。淮蔡吴元济叛乱平，宗元作雅诗二篇，赞颂平叛大军统帅裴度和大将李愬之大功，同启献与裴度。作品：《上裴晋公度献唐雅诗启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第915页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371003' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371003' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371003?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上裴晋公度献唐雅诗启</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371003")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371003_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371003'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371003'>宗元启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371003_comment'></div>伏以周汉二宣中兴之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371003_comment'></div>歌于大雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371003_comment'></div>载于史官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371003_comment'></div>然而申甫作辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371003_comment'></div>方召专淮夷之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371003_comment'></div>魏邴谋谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371003_comment'></div>辛赵致罕羌之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371003_comment'></div>文武所注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371003_comment'></div>中外莫同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371003_comment'></div>伏惟相公天授皇家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371003_comment'></div>圣贤克合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371003_comment'></div>谋协一德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371003_comment'></div>以致太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371003_comment'></div>入有申甫魏邴之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371003_comment'></div>出兼方召辛赵之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371003_comment'></div>东取淮右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371003_comment'></div>北服恒阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371003_comment'></div>略不代出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371003_comment'></div>功无与让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371003_comment'></div>故天下文士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371003_comment'></div>皆愿秉笔牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371003_comment'></div>勤思虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371003_comment'></div>以赞述洪烈<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作业）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371003_comment'></div>阐扬大勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371003_comment'></div>宗元虽败辱斥逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371003_comment'></div>守在蛮裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371003_comment'></div>犹欲振发枯槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371003_comment'></div>决疏潢污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371003_comment'></div>罄效蚩鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371003_comment'></div>少佐毫发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371003_comment'></div>谨撰平淮夷雅二篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371003_comment'></div>恐惧不敢进献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371003_comment'></div>私愿彻声闻于下执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371003_comment'></div>庶宥罪戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371003_comment'></div>以明其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371003_comment'></div>出位僭言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371003_comment'></div>惶战<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1371003", 1371003, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>交积</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371003_comment'></div>无任踊跃屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371003_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371003_comment'></div>宗元谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1371003_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在柳州刺史任。淮蔡吴元济叛乱平，作雅诗二篇，赞颂平叛大军统帅裴度和大将李愬之大功，同启献与李愬。作品：《上襄阳李愬仆射献唐雅诗启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第917页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371004' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371004' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371004?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上襄阳李仆射愬献唐雅诗启</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371004")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371004_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371004'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371004'>宗元启。昔周宣中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371004_comment'></div>得其臣召虎。师出江汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371004_comment'></div>以平淮夷。故其诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371004_comment'></div>江汉之浒。王命召虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371004_comment'></div>其卒章曰。于周受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371004_comment'></div>自召祖命。以明虎者召公之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371004_comment'></div>克承其先也。今天子中兴而得阁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371004_comment'></div>亦出江汉以平淮夷。克承于先西平王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371004_comment'></div>其事正类。然而未有嗣大雅之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371004_comment'></div>以布天下。以施后代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371004_comment'></div>岂圣唐之文雅。独后<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作愧）</span>于周室哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371004_comment'></div>宗元身虽陷败。而其论著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371004_comment'></div>往往不为世屈。意者殆不可自薄自匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371004_comment'></div>以坠斯时。苟有补万分之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371004_comment'></div>虽死不憾。谨撰平准夷雅二篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371004_comment'></div>斋沐上献。诚丑言淫声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371004_comment'></div>不足以当金石。庶继代洪烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371004_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371004", 1371004, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>稗官</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371004", 1371004, "Clauses/34/Comments/1")'>里人</span>。得采而歌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371004_comment'></div>不胜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371004", 1371004, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>愤踊</span>之至。轻渎威严<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作尊）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371004_comment'></div>战越交深。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371004_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1371004_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在柳州刺史任。应外甥裴铣之请为二姊夫裴墐撰墓志。作品：《万年令裴府君墓碣》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷9第234页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371223' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371223' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371223?labeling=true' "poem_title_1371223")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371223_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371223'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371223'>公讳墐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371223_comment'></div>字封叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371223_comment'></div>河东闻喜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371223_comment'></div>太尉公讳行俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371223_comment'></div>实高祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371223_comment'></div>侍中公讳光庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371223_comment'></div>实曾祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371223_comment'></div>刑部员外郎府君讳稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371223_comment'></div>实祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371223_comment'></div>大理卿府君讳儆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371223_comment'></div>实父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371223_comment'></div>公由进士上第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371223_comment'></div>校书崇文馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371223_comment'></div>饬馆事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371223_comment'></div>修整左春坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371223_comment'></div>由是立署局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371223_comment'></div>后参京兆军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371223_comment'></div>桉覆<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371223_comment'></div>为太常主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371223_comment'></div>搜剔疑互。<div class='inline' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371223", 1371223, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>条直</span>显遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371223_comment'></div>司空拱手以成。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371223_comment'></div>藏之南阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371223_comment'></div>转殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371223_comment'></div>吾能为祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371223_comment'></div>公大怒。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371223_comment'></div>御史桉章具狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371223_comment'></div>再谪道州循州为佐掾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371223_comment'></div>会赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371223_comment'></div>量移吉州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371223_comment'></div>元和十二年七月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371223_comment'></div>病痁泄卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371223_comment'></div>始公以唯诺闻长安中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371223_comment'></div>奔人危急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371223_comment'></div>轻出财力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371223_comment'></div>如索水火。<div
