id='poem_sentence_168_1371223_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年6月</a>　在柳州刺史任。六月，为邕州刺史李位撰墓志。作品：《邕州刺史李公志并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷10第245页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第32页系《邕州刺史李公墓志》于元和十四年。）</span><div id='poem_1371232' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371232' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371232?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故邕管经略招讨等使朝散大夫持节都督邕州诸军事守邕州刺史兼御史中丞赐紫金鱼袋李公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371232")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371232_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371232'>公讳某。字某。实惟文皇帝之元孙。别子曰承乾。为皇太子。以藩爱逼夺。危慄致祸。后封恒山为悯王。赠荆州大都督。继别曰象。蕲春郡太守。赠越州大都督。封郇国公。大宗曰玭。太子詹事。赠秘书监。生廙。尚书左丞。凡四代有土田。居贵仕。公丕承之。以率南服。克荷天庥。继有功德。公始以通经入崇文馆。登有司第。选同州参军。入佐金吾卫。进太仆主簿。参引大驾。府移为左右神策行营兵马节度。以为推官。拜监察御史。赐绯鱼袋。凡二使。其率皆范司空希朝。进殿中侍御史湖南都团练判官。以宽通简大。辅治得中道。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371232_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371232'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371232'>府迁主后事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371232_comment'></div>师人爱慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371232_comment'></div>欲以贞元故事为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371232_comment'></div>公恐惧抑留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371232_comment'></div>复从浙东为都团练副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371232_comment'></div>转侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371232_comment'></div>又徙浙西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371232_comment'></div>如其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371232_comment'></div>加著作郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371232_comment'></div>凡三使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371232_comment'></div>其率皆薛大夫苹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371232_comment'></div>刺岳信二州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371232_comment'></div>得刘向秘书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371232_comment'></div>以能卒化黄白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371232_comment'></div>日召徒试术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371232_comment'></div>为仇家上变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371232_comment'></div>就鞫无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371232_comment'></div>敕笞杀告者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371232_comment'></div>犹降建州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371232_comment'></div>陟刺泉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371232_comment'></div>会乌𤡈夷刺杀郡吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371232_comment'></div>殴缚农民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371232_comment'></div>诏以公都督邕州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371232_comment'></div>兼御史中丞。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1371232_comment'></div>既至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371232_comment'></div>则韬弓橐甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371232_comment'></div>去斥候。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在柳州刺史任。与邕管经略招讨使李域通书启，论陆卓平定李元庆叛乱之功绩。作品：《与邕州李域中丞论陆卓启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷35第901页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371022'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371022_comment'></div>伏以至公之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371022_comment'></div>施恩而不求报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371022_comment'></div>奖善而不为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371022_comment'></div>所以振宣幽光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371022_comment'></div>激励颓俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371022_comment'></div>诚大君子所蓄积也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371022_comment'></div>窃见故招讨判官试右卫冑曹参军陆卓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371022_comment'></div>生禀清操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371022_comment'></div>长于吏理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371022_comment'></div>累仕所至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371022_comment'></div>必有休声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371022_comment'></div>再举<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371022", 1371022, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>府曹</span>。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371022_comment'></div>构灾扇祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371022_comment'></div>期在旦夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371022_comment'></div>一夫见刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371022_comment'></div>莫为己用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371022_comment'></div>而卓以此时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371022_comment'></div>特立不惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371022_comment'></div>终剪强暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371022_comment'></div>以宁师人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371022_comment'></div>既而不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371022_comment'></div>婴疾物故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371022_comment'></div>不获一日趋事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371022_comment'></div>以受其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371022_comment'></div>有功未报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371022_comment'></div>有善未录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371022_comment'></div>伏承阁下言论之馀。<div id='poem_sentence_37_1371022_comment'></div>使怀愤之魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371022_comment'></div>知感恩于地下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371022_comment'></div>秉志之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371022_comment'></div>思受命于门庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371022_comment'></div>足以劝奖三军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371022_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在柳州刺史任。贞元十八年襄阳县丞赵衿客死柳州，柳州官府葬之野外；元和十三年，赵衿遗子来章来柳寻父骸骨、重葬于汝州，宗元撰墓志。作品：《故襄阳丞赵君墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷11第278页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371250' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371250' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371250?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故襄阳丞赵君墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371250")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371250_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371250'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371250'>贞元十八年月日。天水赵公矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371250_comment'></div>年四十二。客死于柳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371250_comment'></div>官为敛葬于城北之野。元和十三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371250_comment'></div>孤来章始壮。自襄州徒行求其葬不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371250_comment'></div>徵书而名其人。皆死无能知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371250_comment'></div>来章日哭于野。凡十九日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371250_comment'></div>唯人事之穷。则庶于卜筮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371250_comment'></div>五月甲辰。卜秦誗兆之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371250_comment'></div>金食其墨。而火以贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371250_comment'></div>其墓直丑。在道之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371250_comment'></div>南有贵臣。冢土是守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371250_comment'></div>乙巳于野。宜遇西人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371250_comment'></div>深目而髯。其得实因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371250_comment'></div>七日发之。乃觏其神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371250_comment'></div>明日求诸野。有叟荷杖而东者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371250_comment'></div>问之。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371250_comment'></div>是故赵丞儿耶。吾为曹信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371250_comment'></div>是迩吾墓。噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371250_comment'></div>今则夷矣。直社之北二百举武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371250_comment'></div>吾为子蕝焉。辛亥启土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371250_comment'></div>有木焉。发之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371250_comment'></div>绯衣緅衾。凡自家之物皆在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371250_comment'></div>州之人皆为出涕。诚来章之孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371250_comment'></div>神付是叟。以与龟偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371250_comment'></div>不然。其协焉如此哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371250_comment'></div>六月某日就道。月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371250_comment'></div>葬于汝州龙兴县期城之原。夫人河南源氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371250_comment'></div>先殁而祔之。矜之父曰渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371250_comment'></div>南郑尉。祖曰倩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371250_comment'></div>郓州司马。曾祖曰宏安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371250_comment'></div>金紫光禄大夫国子祭酒。始矜由明经为舞阳主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371250_comment'></div>蔡帅反。犯难来归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371250_comment'></div>擢授襄城主簿。赐绯鱼袋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371250_comment'></div>后为襄阳丞。其墓自曾祖以下皆族以位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371250_comment'></div>时宗元刺柳。用相其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371250_comment'></div>哀而旌之以铭。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371250_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1371250'>誗也挈之。信也蕝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371250_comment'></div>有朱其绂。神具列之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371250_comment'></div>恳恳来章。神实恫汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371250_comment'></div>锡之老叟。告以兆语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371250_comment'></div>灵其鼓舞。从而父祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371250_comment'></div>孝斯有终。宜福是与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371250_comment'></div>百越蓁蓁。羁鬼相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371250_comment'></div>有子而孝。独归故乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371250_comment'></div>涕盈其铭。旌尔勿忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371250_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1371250_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在柳州刺史任。为朗州司户薛巽妻、伯姊夫崔简之女崔媛撰墓志。作品：《朗州员外司户薛君妻崔氏墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷13第346页，中华书局1979年版。吴文治《柳宗元大辞典》第41页系《朗州司户薛君妻崔氏墓志》于元和十二年。）</span><div id='poem_1371226' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371226' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371226?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朗州员外司户薛君妻崔氏墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371226")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371226_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371226'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371226'>唐永州刺史博陵崔简女讳媛。嫁为朗州员外司户河东薛巽妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371226_comment'></div>三岁知让。五岁知戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371226_comment'></div>七岁能女事。善笔札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371226_comment'></div>读书通古今。其暇则鸣弦桐讽诗骚以为娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371226_comment'></div>始简以文雅清秀重于当世。其后病惑得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371226_comment'></div>投驩州。诸女蓬垢涕号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371226_comment'></div>柳氏出也。以叔舅命归于薛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371226_comment'></div>惟恭柔专勤。以为妇妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371226_comment'></div>恩其故他姬子。杂己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371226_comment'></div>造次莫能辨。无忮忌之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371226_comment'></div>无犯迕之气。一亩之宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371226_comment'></div>言笑不闻于邻。元和十二年五月二十八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371226_comment'></div>既乳。病肝气逆肺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371226_comment'></div>牵拘左腋。巫医不能已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371226_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371226", 1371226, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>期月</span>之日。洁服饬容而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371226_comment'></div>年若干。某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371226_comment'></div>迁柩于洛。某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371226_comment'></div>祔于墓。在北邙山南洛水东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371226_comment'></div>巽始佐河北军食。有劳未及录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371226_comment'></div>会其长以罪闻。因从贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371226_comment'></div>更大赦。方北迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371226_comment'></div>而其室巳祸。巽之考曰大理司直仲卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371226_comment'></div>祖曰太子右赞善大夫环。曾祖曰平舒令煜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371226_comment'></div>高祖曰工部尚书真藏。简之父曰大理司直煜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371226_comment'></div>祖曰某官鲵。唐兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371226_comment'></div>中书令仁师议刑不孥。其二世大父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371226_comment'></div>巽之他姬子丈夫子曰老。女子曰张婆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371226_comment'></div>妻之子女子曰陀罗尼。丈夫子曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371226_comment'></div>实后子。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371226_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1371226'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1371226", 1371226, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>翼翼</span>仁师。惟仁之硕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371226_comment'></div>一言刑轻。绵载二百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371226_comment'></div>其庆中缺。曾元不绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371226_comment'></div>简之温文。卒昏以易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371226_comment'></div>七男三女。八我之出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371226_comment'></div>仍祸六稔。数存如殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371226_comment'></div>宜福而灾。伊谁云恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371226_comment'></div>惟薛之妇。德良才全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371226_comment'></div>邻无言闻。臧获以虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371226_comment'></div>推仁抚庶。孩不异怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371226_comment'></div>兄公是怙。夫属忻然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371226_comment'></div>髲剃峨峨。笾豆惟嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371226_comment'></div>蒸尝宾燕。其羞孔多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371226_comment'></div>有苾有严。神飨斯何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371226_comment'></div>奚仲仲虺。胡祐不遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371226_comment'></div>高曾祖考。胡嘏之讹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371226_comment'></div>淑人不居。谁任于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371226_comment'></div>书铭告哀。以寘岩阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371226_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1371226_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在柳州刺史任。桂管观察使裴行立建訾家洲亭成，酒宴庆贺。宗元受其托，撰记文。作品：《桂州裴中丞作訾家洲亭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷27第726页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371096' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371096' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371096?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂州裴中丞作訾家洲亭记</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371096'>大凡以观游名于代者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371096_comment'></div>不过视于一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371096_comment'></div>其或傍达左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371096_comment'></div>则以为特异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371096_comment'></div>至若不骛远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371096_comment'></div>不陵危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371096_comment'></div>环山洄江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371096_comment'></div>四出如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371096_comment'></div>夸奇竞秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371096_comment'></div>咸不相让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371096_comment'></div>遍行天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371096_comment'></div>唯是得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371096_comment'></div>桂州多灵山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371096_comment'></div>发地峭坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371096_comment'></div>林立四野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371096_comment'></div>署之左曰漓水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371096_comment'></div>水之中曰訾氏之洲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371096_comment'></div>凡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371096", 1371096, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>峤南</span>之山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371096_comment'></div>达于海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371096_comment'></div>于是毕出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371096_comment'></div>而古今莫能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371096_comment'></div>元和十二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371096_comment'></div>御史中丞裴公来莅兹邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371096_comment'></div>都督二十七州诸军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371096_comment'></div>盗遁奸革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371096_comment'></div>德惠敷施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371096_comment'></div>期年政成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371096_comment'></div>而富且庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371096_comment'></div>登兹以嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371096_comment'></div>观望悠长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371096_comment'></div>悼前之遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371096_comment'></div>心舒目行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371096_comment'></div>忽然若飘浮上腾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371096_comment'></div>以临云气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371096_comment'></div>万山西向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371096_comment'></div>重江东隘。<div id='poem_sentence_47_1371096_comment'></div>常所未睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371096_comment'></div>倏然互见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371096_comment'></div>以为飞舞奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371096_comment'></div>其果有辽绝特殊而不可至者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371096_comment'></div>盖非桂山之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371096_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371096_comment'></div>造物者之设是久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371096_comment'></div>而尽之于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371096_comment'></div>余其可以无籍乎。</div><div id='poem_sentence_110_1371096_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在柳州刺史任。桂管观察使裴行立建訾家洲亭成，酒宴庆贺。宗元受其托，撰记文，附启赠之。作品：《上裴行立中丞撰訾家洲亭记启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷36第927页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371012' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371012' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371012?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上裴行立中丞撰訾家洲记启</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371012")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371012_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371012'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371012'>右。伏奉处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371012_comment'></div>令撰訾家洲亭记。伏以境之殊尤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371012_comment'></div>必待才之绝妙。以极其词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371012_comment'></div>今是亭之胜。甲于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371012_comment'></div>而猥顾鄙陋。使之为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371012_comment'></div>伏受严命。不敢固让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371012_comment'></div>退自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371012", 1371012, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>揣度</span>。惕然汗流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371012_comment'></div>累奉游宴。窃观物象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371012_comment'></div>涉旬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371012", 1371012, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>模拟</span>。不得万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371012_comment'></div>窃伏详忖。进退若坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371012_comment'></div>久稽篆刻。则有违慢之辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371012_comment'></div>速课空薄。又见疏芜之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371012_comment'></div>愆期废事。尤所战慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371012_comment'></div>谨修撰讫上献。退自跼蹐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371012_comment'></div>不知所裁。无任陨越惶恐之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371012_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1371012_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在柳州刺史任。上书宰相李夷简，陈贬后悲愤，希以援引。作品：《上门下李夷简相公陈情书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第891页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370998' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370998' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370998?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上门下李夷简相公陈情书</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370998")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370998_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370998'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370998'>月日。使持节柳州诸军事守柳州刺史柳宗元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370998_comment'></div>谨再拜献书于相公閤下。宗元闻有行三涂之艰<span class='inlineComment2'>（一有难字）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370998_comment'></div>而坠千仞之下者。仰望于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370998_comment'></div>号以求出。过之者日千百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370998_comment'></div>皆去而不顾。就令哀而顾之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370998_comment'></div>不过攀木俯首。深矉太息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370998_comment'></div>良久而去耳。卒无可奈何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370998_comment'></div>然其人犹望而不止也。俄而有若乌获者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370998_comment'></div>持长绠千寻。徐而过焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370998_comment'></div>其力足为也。其器足施也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370998_comment'></div>号之而不顾。顾而曰不能力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370998_comment'></div>则其人知必死于大壑矣。何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370998_comment'></div>是时不可遇而幸遇焉。而又不逮乎己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370998_comment'></div>然后知命之穷。势之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370998_comment'></div>其卒呼愤自毙。不复望于上矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370998_comment'></div>宗元曩者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1370998", 1370998, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>齿少心锐</span>。径行高步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370998_comment'></div>不知道之艰。以陷乎大阨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370998_comment'></div>穷踬殒坠。废为孤囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370998_comment'></div>日号而望者十四年矣。其不顾而去与顾而深矉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370998_comment'></div>俱不乏焉。然犹仰首<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1370998", 1370998, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>伸吭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370998_comment'></div>张目而视曰。庶几乎其有异俗之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370998_comment'></div>非常之力。当路而垂仁者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370998_comment'></div>今閤下以仁义正直。入居相位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370998_comment'></div>宗元实窃拊心自庆。以为获其所望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370998_comment'></div>故敢致其词以声其哀。若又舍而不顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370998_comment'></div>则知沈埋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1370998", 1370998, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>踣毙</span>。无复振矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370998_comment'></div>伏惟动心焉。宗元得罪之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370998_comment'></div>致谤之自。以閤下之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370998_comment'></div>其知之久矣。繁言蔓词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370998_comment'></div>秪益为黩。伏惟念坠者之至穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370998_comment'></div>锡乌获之馀力。舒千寻之绠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370998_comment'></div>垂千仞之艰。致其不可遇之遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370998_comment'></div>以卒成其幸。庶号而望者得毕其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370998_comment'></div>无使呼愤自毙。没有馀恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370998_comment'></div>则士之死于门下者宜无先焉。生之通塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370998_comment'></div>决在此举。无任战汗陨越之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370998_comment'></div>不宣。宗元惶恐再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370998_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1370998_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在柳州刺史任。淮蔡吴元济叛乱平，作雅诗二篇，赞颂平叛大军统帅裴度和大将李愬之大功，同奏表献上。作品：《平淮夷雅二篇并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷1第4页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。为岭南盐铁院李侍御撰墓志，李侍御名不详。作品：《故岭南盐铁院李侍御墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷10第267页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371246'>天宝中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371246_comment'></div>诏李氏由凉武昭王以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371246_comment'></div>皆得籍宗正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371246_comment'></div>故沂州刺史福以姑臧人附属于宁歧为族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371246_comment'></div>曾祖生乐寿令昱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371246_comment'></div>昱生虢州司马叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371246_comment'></div>世以儒闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371246_comment'></div>叶生监察御史浣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371246_comment'></div>字濯缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371246_comment'></div>明两经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371246_comment'></div>仕历永兴临晋尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371246_comment'></div>会天子方事诛伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371246_comment'></div>南平蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371246_comment'></div>北服赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371246_comment'></div>西走戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371246_comment'></div>东讨齐鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371246_comment'></div>五年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371246_comment'></div>兵征卒戍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371246_comment'></div>籴行千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371246_comment'></div>凡进用唯财赋为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371246_comment'></div>君以试大理评事佐荆南两税使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371246_comment'></div>督天下诸侯之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371246_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371246", 1371246, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>调食</span>饶给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371246_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371246", 1371246, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>车击舟连</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371246_comment'></div>又守湖南盐铁转院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371246_comment'></div>以能迁官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371246_comment'></div>妻庐江何氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371246_comment'></div>凡五世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371246_comment'></div>世郑出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371246_comment'></div>父曰士锷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371246_comment'></div>季父曰士干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371246_comment'></div>有大名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371246_comment'></div>君之子二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371246_comment'></div>曰夔曰导。<div id='poem_sentence_40_1371246_comment'></div>夔导皆幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371246_comment'></div>不能事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371246_comment'></div>何夫人哭且戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371246_comment'></div>柩行万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371246_comment'></div>人咸观其礼焉。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371247'>裴氏之昭曰赠户部尚书讳某。穆曰起居郎讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371247_comment'></div>生均州刺史讳某。均州与其弟大理更为刑部郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371247_comment'></div>用文史名于朝。善杜礼书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371247_comment'></div>长子曰某。射进士策不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371247_comment'></div>去过汴。韩司徒宏迎取为从事以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371247_comment'></div>拜太子通事舍人。进大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371247_comment'></div>男之长曰某。通两经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371247_comment'></div>始杖且庐。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371247_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371249_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371249'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371249'>秘书郎姜㟧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371249_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371249_comment'></div>开元皇帝外孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371249_comment'></div>始楚国公皎与上游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371249_comment'></div>益贵幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371249_comment'></div>子庆初得尚某公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371249_comment'></div>生㟧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371249_comment'></div>㟧生三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371249_comment'></div>上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371249_comment'></div>他物无以饷吾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371249_comment'></div>即敕有司以第六品告与绯衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371249_comment'></div>得通籍出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371249_comment'></div>凡名是官七十某年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371249_comment'></div>终不徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371249_comment'></div>然其间在蜀汉荆楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371249_comment'></div>以大诸侯命守州邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371249_comment'></div>辄以劳称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371249_comment'></div>时缺则复命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371249_comment'></div>好游嗜音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371249_comment'></div>以生贵富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371249_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371249", 1371249, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>畜妓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371249_comment'></div>能传宫中声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371249_comment'></div>贤豪大夫多与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371249", 1371249, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>连欢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371249_comment'></div>后加老风病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371249_comment'></div>手足奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371249_comment'></div>右可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371249_comment'></div>不能就官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371249_comment'></div>士有载酒来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371249_comment'></div>则出妓搏髀笑戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371249_comment'></div>观者尚识承平王孙故态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371249_comment'></div>元和十四年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371249_comment'></div>终桂州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371249_comment'></div>都督御史中丞裴公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371249_comment'></div>噫帝戚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371249_comment'></div>葬不可以廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371249_comment'></div>为具物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371249_comment'></div>祭以豚酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371249_comment'></div>月日葬州东南一里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371249_comment'></div>子某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371249_comment'></div>年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371249_comment'></div>母曰雷姬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371249_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371249_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1371249'>始贱终贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371249_comment'></div>于世为遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371249_comment'></div>幼荣老穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371249_comment'></div>在物为凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371249_comment'></div>均之得丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371249_comment'></div>谁缺谁丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371249_comment'></div>若君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371249_comment'></div>银朱于始生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371249_comment'></div>钟鼎以及壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371249_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371249", 1371249, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>矍矍</span>于进取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371249_comment'></div>不施施于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1371249", 1371249, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>骄伉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371249_comment'></div>左弦右壶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371249_comment'></div>乐以自放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371249_comment'></div>虽老而客死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371249_comment'></div>未尝戚乎已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371249_comment'></div>与夫拳拳恐悸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371249_comment'></div>蒙谄负义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371249_comment'></div>得之拘拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371249_comment'></div>荣不盖愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371249_comment'></div>以终其身而不能止者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371249_comment'></div>不犹优乎。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1371249_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。受桂管观察使裴行立之托，为其兄长、处士裴君撰墓志。作品：《故处士裴君墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷11第287页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371253' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371253' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371253?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371253'>河东闻喜裴君。讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371253_comment'></div>字某。好学未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371253_comment'></div>年若干。元和十四年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371253_comment'></div>终于京兆渭南墅。君之弟中丞公督桂州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371253_comment'></div>命其寮柳宗元以铭。君之出河间邢群以状来告曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371253_comment'></div>曾祖讳某。宁州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371253_comment'></div>赠户部尚书。祖讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371253_comment'></div>起居郎。父讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371253_comment'></div>尚书刑部员外郎。议官及浮图事独出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371253_comment'></div>载在史册。以八使行天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371253_comment'></div>当河北道疑危顽狠难处分之地。用天子命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371253_comment'></div>制断得宜。于时为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371253_comment'></div>天下皆仰以为相。会疾终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371253_comment'></div>再赠至大理卿。长老咸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371253_comment'></div>裴氏世积德。起居丞相弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371253_comment'></div>以文史用。大理名世人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371253_comment'></div>咸闻而不大。君以友悌悫植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371253_comment'></div>承其休光。幽而不扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371253_comment'></div>岂天钟美于中丞。啬而不克并耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371253_comment'></div>不然。君无位以夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371253_comment'></div>其可问哉。君前娶韦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371253_comment'></div>成都少尹士谟女。生二子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371253_comment'></div>字曰某。名曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371253_comment'></div>以文敏。中丞公尤爱幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371253_comment'></div>恒从。不幸卒于桂林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371253_comment'></div>某举明经。后娶于薛氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371253_comment'></div>无子。父寀位卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371253_comment'></div>是年月日。葬渭南某里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371253_comment'></div>迁韦夫人之丧自万年来。有俟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371253_comment'></div>犹异室。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371253_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1371253'>畴之沃沃。宜其嘉谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371253_comment'></div>有耕有耨。同施异禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371253_comment'></div>明昭次穆。丞相之族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371253_comment'></div>尚书之孙。大理之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371253_comment'></div>有庆实延。宜硕而繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371253_comment'></div>不位不年。晦于丘园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371253_comment'></div>懿懿大理。惟德之元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371253_comment'></div>摧佞抑释。太史是论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371253_comment'></div>黜陟冀幽。邦命以尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371253_comment'></div>神啬丰福。不并于君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371253_comment'></div>渭之洋洋。爰墓其南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371253_comment'></div>孝思是怀。祖考之依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371253_comment'></div>郡人作铭。惟相其哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371253_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1371253_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。为韦夫人撰坟记，简述其卒殡状况。作品：《韦夫人坟记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷13第348页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371121' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371121' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371121?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韦夫人坟记</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371121")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371121_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371121'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371121'>韦夫人终成都。殡万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371121_comment'></div>迁柩渭南。祔而不合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371121_comment'></div>大葬未利。以俟礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371121_comment'></div>其族系如某人之志。堋用元和十四年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371121_comment'></div>子某。为石刻而纳诸圹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371121_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1371121_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。荆州学子杜温夫多次致信、又亲自来柳，以文章请教，宗元作书答之。作品：《复杜温夫书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷34第889页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370997' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370997' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370997?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复杜温夫书</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370997")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370997_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370997'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370997'>二十五日。宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370997_comment'></div>两月来三辱生书。书皆逾千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370997_comment'></div>意若相望仆以不对答引誉者。然仆诚过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370997_comment'></div>而生与吾文又十卷。噫亦多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370997_comment'></div>文多而书频。吾不对答而引誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370997_comment'></div>宜可自反。而来徵不肯相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370997_comment'></div>亟拜亟问。其得终无辞乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370997_comment'></div>凡生十卷之文。吾已略观之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370997_comment'></div>吾性骏滞。多所未甚谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370997_comment'></div>安敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1370997", 1370997, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>悬断</span>是且非耶。书抵吾必曰周孔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370997_comment'></div>周孔安可当也。儗人必于其伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370997_comment'></div>生以直躬见抵。宜无所谀道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370997_comment'></div>而不幸乃曰周孔吾。吾岂得无骇怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370997_comment'></div>且疑生悖乱浮诞。无所取幅尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370997_comment'></div>以故愈不对答。来柳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370997_comment'></div>见一刺史。即周孔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370997_comment'></div>今而去吾。道连而谒于潮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370997_comment'></div>之二邦。又得二周孔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370997_comment'></div>去之京师。京师显人为文词立声名以千数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370997_comment'></div>又宜得周孔千百。何吾生胸中扰扰焉多周孔哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370997_comment'></div>吾虽少为文。不能自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1370997", 1370997, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>雕斲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370997_comment'></div>引笔行墨。快意累累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370997_comment'></div>意尽便止。亦何所师法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370997_comment'></div>立言状物。未尝求过人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370997_comment'></div>亦不能明辨生之才致。但见生用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370997", 1370997, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>助字</span>不当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1370997", 1370997, "Clauses/49/Comments/1")'>律令</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370997_comment'></div>唯以此奉答。所谓乎欤耶哉夫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370997_comment'></div>疑辞也。矣耳焉也者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1370997_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1370997", 1370997, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>决辞</span>也。今生则一之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1370997_comment'></div>宜考前闻人所使用与吾言类且异。慎思之则一益也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1370997_comment'></div>庚桑子言藿蠋鹄卵者。吾取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1370997_comment'></div>道连而谒于潮。其卒可化乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1370997_comment'></div>然世之求知音者。一遇其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1370997_comment'></div>或为十数文。即务往京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1370997_comment'></div>急日月。犯风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1370997_comment'></div>走谒门户。以冀苟得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1370997_comment'></div>今生年非甚少。而自荆来柳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1370997_comment'></div>自柳将道连而谒于潮。途远而深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1370997_comment'></div>则其志果有异乎。又状貌嶷然类丈夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1370997_comment'></div>视端形直。心无歧径。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1370997_comment'></div>其质气诚可也。独要谨充之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1370997_comment'></div>谨充之。则非吾独能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1370997_comment'></div>生勿怨。亟之二邦以取法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1370997_comment'></div>时思吾言。非固拒生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1370997_comment'></div>孟子曰。予不屑之教诲也者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1370997_comment'></div>是亦教诲而已矣。宗元白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1370997_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1370997_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　二月，朝廷平定淄青李师道，宗元时为柳州刺史，代桂管观察使裴行立作表以贺。作品：《为裴中丞贺破东平表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》外集卷下第1378页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370936' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370936' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370936?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为裴中丞贺破东平表</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370936")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370936_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370936'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370936'>臣某言。月日得进奏官状报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370936_comment'></div>逆贼李师道以某月日克就枭戮。率土臣子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370936_comment'></div>庆忭无涯。中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370936_comment'></div>臣闻负恩干纪者。鬼得而诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370936_comment'></div>犯顺穷凶者。天夺其魄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370936_comment'></div>不自妖孽。曷彰圣功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370936_comment'></div>伏惟陛下先天不违。与神合契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370936_comment'></div>掩周宣中兴之业。陋汉光再造之勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370936_comment'></div>灵旗四临。氛沴皆散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370936_comment'></div>凡在臣庶。尽睹升平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370936_comment'></div>伏以师道席父祖以作威。苞海岳而专禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370936_comment'></div>恃东秦十二之险。诱临淄三七之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370936_comment'></div>窃据一方。岁踰五纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370936_comment'></div>朝宗之地。旷若外区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370936_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1370936", 1370936, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>封祀</span>之山。隔成异域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370936_comment'></div>累圣垂德。曾未悛心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370936_comment'></div>馀孽滔天。果闻折首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370936_comment'></div>遂使云亭有主。知玉牒之将封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370936_comment'></div>辽海无虞。见石砮之巳至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370936_comment'></div>此皆陛下神筹独得。庙略无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370936_comment'></div>授任推尽力之诚。纵舍有感心之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370936_comment'></div>金石可贯。龟筮必从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370936_comment'></div>克成不战之功。遂洽无为之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370936_comment'></div>臣谬司戎旅。远守方隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370936_comment'></div>愧无横草之功。坐见覆盂之泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370936_comment'></div>忭蹈欢庆。倍万恒情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1370936_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1370936_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370907'>臣某言。伏奉月日德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370907_comment'></div>以淄青荡平。褒功宥罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370907_comment'></div>布告遐迩者。臣闻肃杀之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370907_comment'></div>每致阳和。雷霆既施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370907_comment'></div>必闻膏泽。伏惟陛下体乾刚以运行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370907_comment'></div>叶坤元之翕辟。百灵受职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370907_comment'></div>六合从风。阻兵怙乱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370907_comment'></div>必就枭擒。怀忠抱义者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370907_comment'></div>无不甄录。激其效顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370907_comment'></div>特加旄节之荣。宠以元功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370907_comment'></div>遂兼鼎铉之任。戎行穷赏赉之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370907_comment'></div>死事极褒恤之优。劫胁之役尽除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370907_comment'></div>聚敛之名皆去。伤痍受煦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370907_comment'></div>老疾加恩。丰财已复其征徭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370907_comment'></div>赐种更盈于穜稑。严山川之祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370907_comment'></div>神必有依。申义烈之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370907_comment'></div>物无不感。周王推忠厚之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370907_comment'></div>汉帝惭恺悌之风。太平之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370907_comment'></div>斯为至盛。然则虞巡可复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370907_comment'></div>告成将庆于岱宗。汉典方行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370907_comment'></div>讲礼再荣于阙里。臣谬膺重寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370907_comment'></div>获睹太和。忭蹈之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370907_comment'></div>倍万恒品。谨已施行郡邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370907_comment'></div>宣示军戎。莫不动地欢呼。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年7月</a>　七月，宪宗册尊号元和圣文神武法天应道皇帝，宗元在柳州刺史任，上表贺之。作品：《礼部贺册尊号表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷37第935页，中华书局1979年版。此表在柳州作，非礼部表也。）</span><div class='authorDate'>（819年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370877")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370877_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370877'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370877'>臣某伏奉月日制。陛下膺受尊号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370877_comment'></div>率土臣子。庆忭无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370877_comment'></div>臣闻立极之大。四海无以报神功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370877_comment'></div>配天之尊。万物不能崇圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370877_comment'></div>惟有徽号。是彰中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370877_comment'></div>所以上探天心。下极人欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370877_comment'></div>中谢。伏惟元和圣文神武法天应道皇帝陛下统承千载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370877_comment'></div>光被六幽。蟊贼尽除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370877_comment'></div>福应皆集。有首有趾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370877_comment'></div>咸识太平。勋臣增爵禄之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370877_comment'></div>戎士加赏延之宠。片善必录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370877_comment'></div>微功尽升。独惟圣谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370877_comment'></div>事绝酬答。万国觖望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370877_comment'></div>百工怨思。是以启元和之盛典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370877_comment'></div>延昊穹之景祚。理历凝命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370877_comment'></div>实曰圣文。和众定功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370877_comment'></div>时惟神武。运行有法天之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370877_comment'></div>变化乃应道之方。鬼神协谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370877_comment'></div>夷夏同志。大礼既建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370877_comment'></div>鸿恩遂行。欢呼远匝于九围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370877_comment'></div>渗漉普周于八裔。庆超邃古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1370877_comment'></div>美冠将来。臣获守蛮荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1370877_comment'></div>远承大典。潢污比陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1370877_comment'></div>河清幸遂于千年。尘壤均微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1370877_comment'></div>山呼愿同于万岁。无任庆贺屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1370877_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1370877_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　七月，群臣上尊号“元和圣文神武法天应道皇帝”，宗元在柳州刺史任，作笺向皇太子致贺。作品：《贺皇太子笺》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。岭南黄峒土著首领黄少卿等兴兵起事，宗元为桂管观察使裴行立作状，奏报讨平黄家贼事宜。作品：《为裴中丞奏邕管黄家贼事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷39第1015页，中华书局1979年版。）</span><div id='poem_1370942' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370942' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370942?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为裴中丞奏邕管黄家贼事宜状</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370942'>右。今月四日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370942_comment'></div>邕管奏事官严训过称。押衙谭叔向等与黄家贼五千馀人谋为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1370942", 1370942, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>翻动</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370942_comment'></div>虽已诛斩。犹未清宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370942_comment'></div>臣当时差本道同十将试光禄卿雷绕至邕管界首宾州以来迎探事宜。兼为声援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370942_comment'></div>昨得雷绕十四日状。并严训状报同到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370942_comment'></div>其黄家贼并已退散。各归洞穴讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370942_comment'></div>伏以鼠窃狗偷。非足为患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370942_comment'></div>陛下威灵远被。神化旁行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370942_comment'></div>遂使奸狡之谋。先期而自露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370942_comment'></div>回邪之党。不戮而尽夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370942_comment'></div>伏恐飞章已达。吉语未闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370942_comment'></div>所得事宜。不敢不奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370942_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1370942_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。岭南黄峒土著首领黄少卿等兴兵起事，桂管观察使裴行立和容管经略使阳旻争欲讨伐，宗元代裴行立作表上宰相裴度，请伐逆贼。作品：《为裴中丞上裴相乞讨黄贼状》<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371026'>当管奉诏。与诸管齐进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371026_comment'></div>诛讨邕管草贼黄少卿。汉军马步等若干人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371026_comment'></div>神开兴运。微恶尽除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371026_comment'></div>黄少卿等历稔逋诛。举宗肆暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371026_comment'></div>杪忽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371026", 1371026, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>蜂腰</span>。虚见辱于齐斧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371026_comment'></div>突梯鼠首。滥欲寄于旄头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371026_comment'></div>剿绝有时。不索何获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371026_comment'></div>某拱稽致命。执锐忘生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371026_comment'></div>车甲既备于小戎。鲸鲵岂逃于诛戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371026_comment'></div>窃观上略。总制中权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371026_comment'></div>战士义激于身心。列校势成于臂指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371026_comment'></div>蹶张之技。尽出于山林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371026_comment'></div>拔距之材。遍徵于川洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371026_comment'></div>赏悬香饵。令布疾雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371026_comment'></div>莫不鼓舞戎行。虔恭师律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371026_comment'></div>投躯不愆于羽檄。跂足唯俟于牙璋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371026_comment'></div>今月某日。奏事官米兰回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371026_comment'></div>捧受诏命。神飞首勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371026_comment'></div>足蹈心驰。欢声洽于万夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371026_comment'></div>胜气横于千里。国容不入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371026_comment'></div>屦且及于寝门。家事勿关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371026_comment'></div>土已填于左阖。即以月日全军出次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371026_comment'></div>分道并进。所期戮力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371026_comment'></div>敢告同心。孔大夫贞直冠时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371026_comment'></div>清明格物。全体许国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371026_comment'></div>一心在公。兵精食浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371026_comment'></div>为日固久。容府阳中丞以义烈为己任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371026_comment'></div>勋袭太常。安南李中丞以英武为家风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371026_comment'></div>业传彝器。并膺邦寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371026_comment'></div>克达皇威。南则浮海济师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371026_comment'></div>共集堂堂之阵。东则横江誓众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371026_comment'></div>用成善善之功。以此鼓行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371026_comment'></div>坐观尽敌。刑惟勿喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371026_comment'></div>诛有可哀。徵侧之勇冠一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371026_comment'></div>竟就伏波之戮。吕嘉之威行五岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371026_comment'></div>终摧下濑之师。嗟此陋微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371026_comment'></div>自贻禽灭。勉成良画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371026_comment'></div>速致殊勋。虽荒徼之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371026_comment'></div>固不劳于有征。而升平之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371026_comment'></div>将自此而何事。书之竹帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371026_comment'></div>实谓扬名。事须移牒邻管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371026_comment'></div>以成犄角。举牒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371026_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_57_1371026_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。岭南黄峒土著首领黄少卿等兴兵起事，桂管观察使裴行立伐之。宗元代裴行立作文祭战旗。作品：《祭文》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。作文传记柳州牧童区寄之英勇事迹。作品：《童区寄传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷17第475页，中华书局1979年版。在柳州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371273' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371273' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371273?labeling=true' target='_blank'>童区寄传</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371273")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371273_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371273'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371273'>柳先生曰。越人少恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371273_comment'></div>生男女。以货视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371273_comment'></div>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>毁齿</span>以上。父兄鬻卖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371273_comment'></div>以觊其利。不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371273_comment'></div>则盗取他室。束缚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>钳梏</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371273_comment'></div>至有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>须鬣</span>者。力不胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371273_comment'></div>皆屈为僮。当道相贼杀以为俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371273_comment'></div>幸得壮大。则缚取么弱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371273_comment'></div>汉官因以为己利。苟得僮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371273_comment'></div>恣所为不问。以是越中户口滋耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371273_comment'></div>少得自脱。惟童区寄以十一岁胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371273_comment'></div>斯亦奇矣。桂部从事杜周士为余言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371273_comment'></div>童区寄者。郴州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>荛牧</span>儿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371273_comment'></div>行牧且荛。二豪贼劫持反接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371273_comment'></div>布囊其口。去逾四十里之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>虚所</span>卖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371273_comment'></div>寄伪儿啼。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>恐慄</span>为儿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/31/Comments/1")'>恒状</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371273_comment'></div>贼易之。对饮酒醉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371273_comment'></div>一人去为市。一人卧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371273_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>植刃</span>道上。童<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>微伺</span>其睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371273_comment'></div>以缚背刃。力下上得绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371273_comment'></div>因取刃杀之。逃未及远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371273_comment'></div>市者还。得童大骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371273_comment'></div>将杀之。童遽曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371273_comment'></div>为两郎僮。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>孰若</span>为一郎僮耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371273_comment'></div>彼不我恩也。郎诚见完与恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371273_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>无所不可</span>。市者良久计曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371273_comment'></div>与其杀是童。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>孰若</span>卖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371273_comment'></div>与其卖而分。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>孰若</span>吾得专焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371273_comment'></div>幸而杀彼。甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371273_comment'></div>即藏其尸。持童抵主人所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371273_comment'></div>愈束缚牢甚。夜半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371273_comment'></div>童自转以缚即<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>炉火</span>烧绝之。虽疮手勿惮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371273_comment'></div>复取刃杀市者。因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>大号</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371273_comment'></div>一虚皆惊。童曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371273_comment'></div>我区氏儿也。不当为僮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371273_comment'></div>贼二人得我。我幸皆杀之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371273_comment'></div>愿以闻于官。虚吏白州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371273_comment'></div>州白大府。大府召视儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371273_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>幼愿</span>耳。刺史颜证奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371273_comment'></div>留为小吏。不肯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371273_comment'></div>与衣裳。吏护还之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371273_comment'></div>乡之行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1371273", 1371273, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>劫缚</span>者。侧目莫敢过其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371273_comment'></div>皆曰。是儿少秦武阳二岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371273_comment'></div>而计杀二豪。岂可近耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371273_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1371273_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。作序赠方及和尚。作品：《送方及诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷25第666页，中华书局1979年版。在柳州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371074' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371074' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371074?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送方及师序</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371074")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371074_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371074'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371074'>代之游民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371074_comment'></div>学文章不能秀发者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371074_comment'></div>则假浮屠之形以为高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371074_comment'></div>其学浮屠不能愿悫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371074_comment'></div>则又托文章之流以为放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371074_comment'></div>以故为文章浮屠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371074_comment'></div>率皆纵诞乱杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371074_comment'></div>世亦宽而不诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371074_comment'></div>今有方及师者独不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371074_comment'></div>处其伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371074_comment'></div>介然不踰节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371074_comment'></div>交于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371074_comment'></div>冲然不苟狎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371074_comment'></div>遇达士述作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371074_comment'></div>手辄缮录复习而不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371074_comment'></div>行其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371074_comment'></div>不以自怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371074_comment'></div>至于践青折萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371074_comment'></div>汎席灌手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371074_comment'></div>虽小教戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371074_comment'></div>未尝肆其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371074_comment'></div>是故异夫假托为者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371074_comment'></div>薛道州刘连州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371074_comment'></div>文儒之择也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371074_comment'></div>馆焉而备其敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371074_comment'></div>歌焉而致其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371074_comment'></div>夫岂贷而滥欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371074_comment'></div>予用是得不系其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371074_comment'></div>以告于他好事者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1371074_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。游览柳州近郊风景，撰游记。作品：《柳州山水近治可游者记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷29第775页，中华书局1979年版。在柳州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371120' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371120' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371120?labeling=true' target='_blank'>柳州山水近治可游者记</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371120")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371120_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371120'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371120'>古之州治。在薄水南山石间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371120_comment'></div>今徙在水北。直平四十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371120_comment'></div>南北东西皆水汇。北有双山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371120_comment'></div>夹道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>崭然</span>。曰背石山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371120_comment'></div>有支川。东流入于浔水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371120_comment'></div>浔水因是北而东。尽大壁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371120_comment'></div>其壁曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>龙壁</span>。其下多秀石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371120_comment'></div>可砚。南绝水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371120_comment'></div>有山无麓。广百寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371120_comment'></div>高五丈。下上若一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371120_comment'></div>曰甑山。山之南皆大山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371120_comment'></div>多奇。又南且西曰驾鹤山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371120_comment'></div>壮耸环立。古州治负焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371120_comment'></div>有泉在坎下。恒盈而不流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371120_comment'></div>南有山。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>正方</span>而崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371120_comment'></div>类屏者曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>屏山</span>。其西曰姥山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371120_comment'></div>皆独立不倚。北流浔水濑下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371120_comment'></div>又西曰仙奕之山。山之西可上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371120_comment'></div>其上有穴。穴有屏有室有宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371120_comment'></div>其宇下有流石<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>成形</span>。如肺肝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371120_comment'></div>如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>茄房</span>。或积于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371120_comment'></div>如人如禽如器物甚众。东西九十尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371120_comment'></div>南北少半。东登入小穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371120_comment'></div>常有四尺。则廓然甚大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371120_comment'></div>无窍正黑。烛之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371120_comment'></div>高仅见其宇。皆流石怪状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371120_comment'></div>由屏南室中入小穴。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>倍常</span>而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371120_comment'></div>始黑。已而大明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371120_comment'></div>为上室。由上室而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371120_comment'></div>有穴。北出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371120_comment'></div>乃临大野。飞鸟皆视其背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371120_comment'></div>其始登者。得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>石枰</span>于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371120_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>黑肌</span>而赤脉。十有八道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371120_comment'></div>可奕。故以云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371120_comment'></div>其山多柽。多槠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371120_comment'></div>多筼筜之竹。多櫜吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371120_comment'></div>其鸟多秭归。石鱼之山全石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371120_comment'></div>无大草木。山小而高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371120_comment'></div>其形如立鱼。尤多秭归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371120_comment'></div>西有穴类仙奕。入其穴东出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371120_comment'></div>其西北灵泉在东趾下。有麓环之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371120_comment'></div>泉大类毂。雷鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371120_comment'></div>西奔二十尺。有洄在石涧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371120_comment'></div>因伏无所见。多绿青之鱼及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>石鲫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371120_comment'></div>多鯈。雷山两崖皆东西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371120_comment'></div>雷水出焉。蓄崖中曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1371120", 1371120, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>雷塘</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371120_comment'></div>能出云气。作雷雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371120_comment'></div>变见有光。祷用俎鱼豆彘脩形糈𥺌酒阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371120_comment'></div>虔则应。在立鱼南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371120_comment'></div>其间多美山。无名而深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371120_comment'></div>峨山在野中。无麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371120_comment'></div>峨水出焉。东流入于浔水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371120_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1371120_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。为保全百姓莫诚性命，作状呈桂管观察府，请求改判。作品：《柳州上本府状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷39第1024页，中华书局1979年版。在柳州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1370954' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1370954' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1370954?labeling=true' target='_blank'>柳州上本府状</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1370954")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1370954_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1370954'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1370954'>右。奉牒准律文处分者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1370954_comment'></div>已帖县准牒待秋分后举处分讫。伏以中丞慈惠化人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1370954_comment'></div>孝悌成俗。属吏所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1370954_comment'></div>皆许申明。至公之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1370954_comment'></div>敢竭愚虑。窃以莫诚赴急而动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1370954_comment'></div>事出一时。解难为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1370954_comment'></div>岂思他物。救兄有急难之戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1370954_comment'></div>中臂非必死之疮。不幸致殂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1370954_comment'></div>揣非本意。桉文固当恭守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1370954_comment'></div>抚事亦可哀矜。断手方迫于深衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1370954_comment'></div>周身不遑于远虑。律宜无赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1370954_comment'></div>使司明至当之心。情或未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1370954_comment'></div>守吏切惟轻之愿。况俟期尚远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1370954_comment'></div>禀命不遥。伏乞俯赐兴哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1370954_comment'></div>特从屈法。幸全微命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1370954_comment'></div>以慰远黎。则必阖境荷慈育之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1370954_comment'></div>岂惟一夫受生成之赐。傥以律文难变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1370954_comment'></div>使牒己行。则伏望此状便令废格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1370954_comment'></div>轻赐<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作肆）</span>尘黩。惶战交深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1370954_comment'></div>谨录状上。奉听处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1370954_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1370954_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。作文祭友穆质。作品：《祭穆质给事文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷40第1050页，中华书局1979年版。在柳州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_1371298' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371298' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371298?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭穆质给事文</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17578, "中唐", "柳宗元", "poem_title_1371298")'>柳宗元</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371298_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371298'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371298'>昭祭于给事五丈之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371298_comment'></div>自古直道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371298_comment'></div>鲜不颠危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371298_comment'></div>祸之重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371298_comment'></div>则系盛衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371298_comment'></div>矫矫明灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371298_comment'></div>克丁圣时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371298_comment'></div>形躯获宥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371298_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371298", 1371298, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>三黜</span>无亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371298_comment'></div>贤良发策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371298_comment'></div>始振其仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371298_comment'></div>天子动容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371298_comment'></div>敬我直辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371298_comment'></div>载之册府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371298_comment'></div>命以谏司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371298_comment'></div>抗奸替否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371298_comment'></div>与正为期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371298_comment'></div>奏书百上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371298_comment'></div>知无不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371298_comment'></div>谁谓刘贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371298_comment'></div>英风莫追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371298_comment'></div>给事黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371298_comment'></div>奉职枢机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371298_comment'></div>封还付外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371298_comment'></div>动获其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371298_comment'></div>无旷尔位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371298_comment'></div>惟公在斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371298_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371298", 1371298, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>达道</span>之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371298_comment'></div>实惟交友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371298_comment'></div>患难相死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371298_comment'></div>其废日久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371298_comment'></div>公实毅然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371298_comment'></div>誓均悔咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371298_comment'></div>挺身立气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371298_comment'></div>不改其守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371298_comment'></div>黜刺南荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371298_comment'></div>义言盈口。<div id='poem_sentence_2_40572'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_40572_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。有诗感怀。作品：《六言》<span class='inlineComment2'>（王国安《柳宗元诗笺释》卷3第288页，上海古籍出版社1983年版。王国安《柳宗元诗笺释》第288至289页认为《六言》诗乃宗元元和十年春返京途中所作《奉酬杨侍郎丈因送八叔拾遗戏赠诏追南来诸宾二首》之二，不应再加诗题。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在柳州刺史任。尚书省下发公文令各地提供当地风俗史实，以供朝廷编制《江国图》。宗元接公文有感作诗。作品：《南省转牒欲具江国图令尽通风俗故事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柳宗元集》卷42第1145页，中华书局1979年版。在柳州作，确年不可考。）</span><div id='poem_40602' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_40602' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/40602?labeling=true'
